name: Kurhotel Skodsborg
address: Skodsborg Strandvej 139, 2942 Copenhagen, Capital Region
description: Kurhotel Skodsborg offers two restaurants on site and free parking. The spa features a sauna and hot tub. A wide range of massage, spa and beauty treatments can also be booked. Copenhagen is just a 20 minutes' drive away. At Kurhotel Skodsborg, all rooms include a TV, seating area and private bathroom. WiFi is free. The sea-view restaurant offers modern Nordic fine dining with seasonal ingredients, herbs from the garden and freshly-baked breads. The comprehensive wine list completes the dining experience. The Brasserie offers more casual dining yet still focused on local produce. In the lobby, guests can take a coffee break, browse the reading collection or simply relax. Bicycles can be rented on site. Skodsborg Strand Park is 250 metres away. Skodsborg Station is a 10-minute walk from Skodsborg Kurhotel.

name: Benniksgaard Hotel
address: Sejrsvej 101, 6300 Gråsten, South Denmark
description: Situated at the highest point in Rinkenæs by Flensburg Firth – with Benniksgaard Golf Course as its closest neighbour – the four star Benniksgaard Hotel, BW Signature Collection boasts views of unparalleled beauty. Benniksgaard takes its name from a family farm dating all the way back to 1393. Today, Benniksgaard is privately owned and run as a hotel. All the buildings have undergone a comprehensive and painstaking renovation. The rustic style, exposed beams and bright colours create an airy, inviting atmosphere. The old chicken house has been transformed into Restaurant Pejsestuen, the longest wing into a hotel wing with 31 rooms – and the old farmhouse from 1782 into fourteen stunning spacious rooms and suites. With its squinting walls, sash windows and creaking floors, the listed farmhouse is a constant reminder of bygone times. The first floor staircase is a particularly interesting relic, and indeed, its narrow steps have been a constant feature of the farmhouse. The old grain stores and a recently added wing are home to several function and conference rooms, while the wing formerly occupied by agricultural machinery now houses BenniksgaardButik shop, offering a wide range of items to suit all tastes.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel Kirstine
address: Købmagergade 20, 4700 Næstved, Zealand
description: This hotel is 500 metres from Næstved Train Station. Free wired internet, tea/coffee facilities and cable TV are standard room features. Facilities include a sun terrace and a restaurant. Hotel Kirstine’s à la carte restaurant focuses on traditional Danish cuisine. Vegetarian dishes and children's meals are also available. It has a cosy, open fireplace during winter. Staff can help arrange canoeing trips on the Suså River. Free parking is offered at the hotel as well as two charging stations for electric cars (plug 16A CEE). BonBon Land Amusement Park is a 15-minute drive from Kirstine Hotel. Other area activities include golfing, as well as swimming at Karrebæksminde Beach, 10 km away.

name: Munkebjerg Hotel
address: Munkebjergvej 125, 7100 Vejle, South Denmark
description: This stylish hotel is surrounded by forest, 300 metres from the Vejle Fjord. It features a casino, spa and pool area, and terrace and restaurant with views of the water. Munkebjerg Hotel’s modern rooms have a flat-screen TV, designer furniture and a free Wi-Fi access. All overlook either the forest or fjord. Spa facilities include an indoor pool, saunas, hot tubs and massage chairs. More active guests can use the gym or tennis courts. Hotel Munkebjerg also has 3 restaurants and a lobby bar. Dining options range from traditional Danish dishes to gourmet cuisine. The cellar has 600 wines to choose from. Free parking is available on site. Vejle Golf Club is 2 km away, and packages can be arranged at Munkebjerg's reception.

name: Enjoy Resorts Marina Fiskenæs
address: Fiskenæsvej 2, 6300 Gråsten, South Denmark
description: This South Jutland property is on the Fiskenæs peninsula, 1 km from central Gråsten. It offers accommodation with a fully-equipped kitchen and free WiFi. Leisure options include a water park and a free gym and spa. All apartments and holiday homes at Enjoy Resort Marina Fiskenæs feature a living room with digital TV and a DVD player. Guests can also enjoy a dishwasher and washing machine. Communal facilities include a restaurant, a private beach area and a climbing wall. A sauna, steam room and cold bath are among the spa facilities offered, and guests can book beauty treatments on site. A playground and playroom are available for younger guests. Enjoy Resort Marina is within 20 minutes’ drive of Dybbøl Banke Museum, while Gråsten Castle, royal summer residence, is just a 5-minute drive away. On-site parking is free.

name: Ibiza Corso Hotel & Spa
address: c/Illa Plana, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Ibiza Corso Hotel & Spa is a luxury hotel located in the exclusive area of Marina Botafoch Harbour. It offers free access to its gym and unique spa with crystal walls. Each stylish, air-conditioned room at the Ibiza Corso has free WiFi, a balcony and a flat-screen TV. There is also a safe, and a private bathroom with bathrobes and slippers. There are 2 restaurants, one with panoramic views and the other one located in the pool area. You will find an outdoor pool and an indoor one at the spa. The spa also has several types of showers, steam baths and an oxygen room. Pachá nightclub is 15 minutes’ walk away. Ibiza Airport is 11 km away.

name: Bg Hotel Nautico Ebeso
address: Ramon Muntaner 44, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Hotel Nautico Ebeso is set on Ibiza and offers 4-star facilities as well as free Wi-Fi and a seasonal outdoor swimming pool. The multiple amenities this modern hotel features include a 24-hour reception, bicycle rental and an express check-in and check-out feature. The hotel has 123 rooms and has been recently refurbished. In sunny weather, an outdoor terrace provides a nice place to relax. The rooms are air conditioned and include a private bathroom, a mini bar and a flat-screen TV. There is also an in-room safe, a ceiling fan and a desk. Hotel Nautico Ebeso's on-site restaurant offers international-inspired meals, which can enjoyed on the al fresco terrace. In the evening, guests are welcome to relax in the comfortable lounge bar. A wide selection of dining options are also found in the surrounding area. Ibiza Town's popular attractions and landmarks are within close proximity to Hotel Nautico Ebeso, with Figueretes Beach just a short walk away. Amnesia is within a short car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: Hotel Mim Ibiza & Spa - Adults Only
address: Carrer de Carles Roman Ferrer, 8, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: This stylish, Art-Deco hotel is next to the beach and close to central Ibiza. It offers a fantastic outdoor pool, a nightclub and a roof terrace featuring stunning sea views. All air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Es Vive have been carefully decorated. They come with free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TV, minibar and a private bathroom. The restaurant has 1930 design and serves a range of international cuisine including New York-style brunch dishes and deli sandwiches. The Experience bar features chic furnishings and vibrant décor. Hotel Es Vive has a spa offering a wide variety of massages and beauty treatments. Hotel Es Vive is close to Ibiza’s most famous nightclubs such as Pacha or Space. The restaurants in Playa d’en Bossa beach can also be reached within walking distance of the hotel.

name: One Ibiza Suites
address: Passeig de Ses Figueretes, 7800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Set in Ibiza Town, 20 metres from a sandy beach, One Ibiza Suites boasts a seasonal outdoor pool and a sun terrace. The property has a roof terrace with a bar and sea views, and it also has a sun terrace with a heated infinity pool exclusively for adults only. Every room is air conditioned and comes with a flat-screen TV, a terrace or a balcony. They include a private bathroom equipped with a bath or shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. One Ibiza Suites features free WiFi throughout the property. Other facilities available include a fitness centre and a conference room. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant. Dalt Vila is 2 km from One Ibiza Suites, while Marina Botafoch is 2.2 km away. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 6 km from the property. Private valet parking is available on site under request.

name: Hacienda Na Xamena, Ibiza
address: Urbanizacion na Xamena Buzon 11, 07815 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Offering amazing sea views from its clifftop position and from its stylish rooms, this impressive hotel is located in Na Xamena, on Ibiza’s north coast. It offers a spa, a gym, tennis court and 3 swimming pools. Hotel Hacienda Na Xamena’s spa has indoor and outdoor areas, including the Suspended Waterfalls Thalassotherapy Circuit which offers fantastic views. There is a massage area located in a bamboo hut which faces the sunset in the west. The Na Xamena has 2 restaurants, including a poolside bar that serves snacks and drinks for informal all-day dining, and a very chic Mediterranean-inspired space with terraces on various levels overlooking the sea. The bright, air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Hacienda Na Xamena feature a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a private bathroom. All have a private hot tub and many have a mini-pool looking out over the Mediterranean Sea. There is a 24-hour reception and staff can provide information about what Ibiza has to offer, and they can help to arrange transport, car rental and reservations at restaurants or nightclubs. You can drive to Ibiza Town in 30 minutes from Hotel Hacienda Na Xamena, and Sant Antoni de Portmany is 35 minutes away. Es Canar, with its famous hippy market, is 30 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hotel Torre Del Mar
address: Calle Carlos Roman Ferrer, Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Torre del Mar Hotel, on Ibiza’s Playa d'en Bossa Beach, features an outdoor pool, and spa. There is free WiFi, and most rooms have sea or mountain views. The air-conditioned, bright rooms with modern décor feature a private balcony, flat-screen satellite TV, and a free safe. There is a free minibar, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. The Torre del Mar spa includes an indoor pool, sauna, hot tub and Turkish bath. Massage service and treatments are available for a surcharge. The hotel also offers a 24-hour gym and billiards. The Excellence Terrace features Balinese beds, hammocks and an exterior hot tub. Regional and international cuisine is served in the hotel buffet restaurant, open for breakfast and for dinner. 24-hour room service is available, and packed lunches can be requested. At Bar Sa Punta del Dalt you can enjoy drinks and cocktails and Restobar Miramar serves Mediterranean food and drinks throughout the day. Torre del Mar has a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. Free parking is available on-site, and Ibiza Town is a 5-minute drive away.

name: Grand Hotel Palladium
address: Calle Los Lirios, 55, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: This 5-star hotel is next to Siesta Beach, in Ibiza’s Santa Eulalia. Grand Hotel Palladium has a salt-water outdoor swimming pool, a terrace with sunbeds overlooking Santa Eulalia Bay and a springwater spa. Rooms at the Palladium offer free Wi-Fi, satellite TV, mini fridge, kettle and a private balcony or terrace. Rooms are spacious and bright, with elegant design and classic wooden furniture. Grand Hotel Palladium has a bar and a restaurant, serving fresh Mediterranean cuisine. It has a terrace overlooking Santa Eulalia Bay. The Grand Hotel’s indoor spa includes a freshwater pool in Roman-bath style. There is also a sauna, a steam bath and hot tub. Treatments like mud therapy and massages can be booked at reception. Free private parking nearby is available and car rental can be arranged at reception. Golf de Ibiza Golf Club is less than 5 km away. Santa Eulalia’s Old Town and harbour are within a 15-minute walk.

name: Grand Palladium Palace Ibiza Resort & Spa
address: Ctra. Playa D'en Bossa 7, 07817 Sant Jordi de ses Salines, Ibiza Island
description: Located in Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Grand Palladium Palace Ibiza Resort & Spa is a 1-minute drive from Bossa Beach and 8 minutes from Las Salinas Beach. Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Hard Rock Hotel Ibiza
address: Carretera Playa D'en Bossa 10, 07817 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Hard Rock Hotel Ibiza is located right on the beachfront in Playa d'en Bossa. This modern hotel has a large open-air stage hosting prestigious weekly concerts. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. This large hotel has 2 outdoor pools and a spa with a hot tub and sauna, as well as a gym. There is also an exclusive private beach club with beach bar next to the hotel, and a range of chill-out areas. Hard Rock Ibiza is decorated with a range of music memorabilia. The stylish, air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers. The windows also have blackout curtains. There are 6 on-site restaurants and various bars. The hotel also offers a venue for teenagers, and there is an entertainment programme for children. Ibiza Airport is just 7 minutes' drive from Hard Rock Hotel Ibiza.

name: Bellamar Hotel Beach & Spa
address: S'Espartar, 2, Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: The Bellamar offers indoor and outdoor swimming pools, and a spa with gym. The hotel is set next to Ibiza’s San Antonio Bay, just 50 metres from Es Pouet Beach. Free WiFi is provided. The hotel is near the seaside promenade. The centre of San Antonio is just 1.5km away. This lively town is famous for its nightlife. Rooms at the Bellamar are modern and comfortable. They are soundproofed and air-conditioned. Each room has a terrace, satellite TV and a bathroom with hairdryer. The hotel’s wellness centre has a sauna, hot tub and steam bath. It also offers massages, body wraps and other treatments. There is good access to the town centre by bus. There is a bus stop outside the hotel. Boat services also connect the hotel to the town and other beaches. There is also free public parking nearby. This seasonal hotel opens from May to September.

name: W Ibiza
address: Carrer Ricardo Curtoys Gotarredona, 37, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Much anticipated and off the beaten track, W Ibiza luxury beach hotel strikes a pose on the palm-fringed, sand-drenched beachfront of Santa Eulalia. The seasonal escape mixes the parallel realities of Ibiza with a magnetic pull that turns up the sass. This is where you get to stay and play with a brand that was made for the White Isle. Sun-kissed and diverse, Ibiza is more than an island, it’s a brand. This is where flower power meets club culture and myths, legends and nature amplify the compulsive, enigmatic spirit. As the third largest town, Santa Eulalia totally owns its relaxed pace and cosmopolitan attitude. Offering up a heady mix of local art galleries, trendy boutiques and amazing dining, alongside gorgeous beaches and dive-deep sea. Just 21km from Ibiza Airport, you can style it out among the chic marina and hotspots in no time. Worried about leaving your furry friends behind? Bring them along! Our hotel is pet friendly and welcomes trained pets.Marriott

name: Els Pins Resort and Spa
address: Carrer Des Calo, 07820 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Facing the beachfront, Els Pins Resort & Spa - Emar Hotels offers 4-star accommodation in San Antonio Bay and features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, garden and shared lounge. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking is available on site. Guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, certain rooms at Els Pins Resort & Spa - Emar Hotels also offer a sea view. At the accommodation each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A buffet breakfast is available daily at Els Pins Resort & Spa - Emar Hotels. The hotel offers a terrace. You can play table tennis and tennis at Els Pins Resort & Spa - Emar Hotels, and car hire is available. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Cala Pinet Beach, Playa de Pinet and Es Pouet Beach. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 16 km from Els Pins Resort & Spa - Emar Hotels.

name: Fiesta Hotel Cala Gració - Adults Only
address: Ctra. Cala Gracio, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: No description found

name: Oku Ibiza
address: Carrer Portixol, 2, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: OKU Ibiza features a restaurant, fitness centre, a bar and garden in San Antonio. Featuring a terrace, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests. The units in the hotel are equipped with a coffee machine. At OKU Ibiza every room includes a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or a buffet breakfast. OKU Ibiza offers an outdoor pool. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Café del Mar, Golden Buddha Ibiza and Cap Blanc Aquarium. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 22 km from OKU Ibiza.

name: Grand Palladium White Island Resort & Spa
address: C/ Playa d'en Bossa, 07817 Sant Jordi de ses Salines, Ibiza Island
description: Located halfway between the airport and Ibiza city, this magnificent beachfront resort is ideally located in Playa d'en Bossa, offering a quiet and peaceful setting, but yet close enough to the most avant-garde and fashionable district of the area. With its spacious and tastefully decorated guest rooms and a world-class spa offering exclusive beauty treatments, the establishment is a perfect place for those seeking a relaxing holiday, full of luxury, in a beautiful environment. When it comes for dining and wining, guests will be spoilt for choice by the huge variety of restaurants and bars offered by the hotel, which serve delicious local and international specialities. From lying on the beach or enjoying the hot tub of the outdoor swimming pool to practice sport activities and different games, the hotel features a wide range of facilities that will entertain both adults and children.FarePortal

name: Grupotel Ibiza Beach Resort - Adults Only
address: Carrer de Sa Cala Den Xuclar, 50, Sant Joan de Labritja, Ibiza Island
description: Offering an outdoor pool and a free spa with sauna and hot tub, Grupotel Ibiza Beach Resort - Adults Only is located in Portinatx, just off the beach.There is free WiFi throughout. Bright spacious rooms are air-conditioned and feature hardwood floors and a flat-screen satellite TV. There is a desk, a dressing room and a safe is available at an extra cost. The private bathroom comes with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Set in a quiet area, the seafront Grupotel Ibiza Beach Resort - Adults Only offers a buffet restaurant and a bar. There is also a TV lounge and evening entertainment programme. There is a 24-hour reception and you can hire a car or exchange currency at the tour desk. Ibiza Airport is a 40-minute drive away.

name: Palladium Hotel Cala Llonga - Adults Only
address: C/ Po. Box 40, Playa Cala Llonga, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Palladium Hotel Cala Llonga - Adults Only is just 100 metres from Cala Llonga Beach. It has a swimming pool and the air-conditioned rooms have private terraces and a hydromassage shower. Palladium Hotel Cala Llonga - Adults Only has a stylish chill-out area with a hot tub and Balinese sunbeds, providing wonderful Mediterranean views. There is free WiFi in public areas, and an air-conditioned satellite TV lounge. The hotel offer Show cooking restaurant and Buffet. There are also 2 bars, one of them offering live entertainment. All of the hotel´s rooms have comfortable furniture, flat-screen satellite TV and iPod docking station. They also have a minibar and a laptop-sized safe. Palladium Hotel Cala Llonga - Adults Only also has a large sun terrace with loungers and a tennis court.

name: Sandos El Greco Beach- Adults Only
address: Cala Portinatx, Portinatx, Sant Joan de Labritja, Ibiza, 7810, 07810 Sant Joan de Labritja, Ibiza Island
description: Set in the northern end of Ibiza, Sandos El Greco Beach - Adults Only is located on the beachfront of Portinax offering stunning views of the Mediterranean Sea and access to the white sand beach. The hotel boasts an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre. There is also a wellness centre with beauty treatments and massages available at a cost. Guests will also find a chill-out area with a whirlpool. There are 250 rooms spread throughout five floors. All air-conditioned rooms feature free WiFi, a Led TV, telephone and a balcony. Each, has a bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. There is a la carte restaurant, where guests can enjoy an included dinner for stays of 5 nights, a snack bar by the pool and an air-conditioned buffet restaurant with show cooking and a pizzeria. Sandos El Greco Beach also has 3 bars. Sandos El Greco Beach - Adults Only has a 24-reception, an entertainment program and snorkeling and cycling can be arranged. Ibiza Airport is 29 km from the hotel.

name: ME Ibiza
address: Urbanización S'Argamassa, 153, Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Situated right in front of the beach and offering multiple swimming pools, a spa with contemporary beauty treatments, and beautiful ocean views, ME Ibiza hotel is located in S'Argamassa. Free Wi-Fi is available. This stylish and elegant hotel offers a variety of room types, including ground floor suites with direct pool access, sun loungers, private gardens and other exclusive benefits. Some suites have wonderful views of the sea. A free bottle of water is provided in all rooms. All rooms provide Smart TV with Chromecast. The Rooftop offers dazzling views, an infinity-style pool and Balinese beds, available only for adults. The ground floor presents an upbeat environment with daily DJs, Balinese beds and a poolside menu. Thai Room Spa Wellness offers Thai treatments. RADIO Rooftop bar offers Mediterranean cuisine and cocktails, with sea views while at Bianco Mare Restaurant guests can enjoy authentic Italian cuisine from organic ingredients and Origens Restaurant combines characterful Ibizan bohemian style with imaginative interpretations of classic Mediterranean dishes. Fresh ingredients and local specialities for lunch and dinner. The property offers a fitness area and free private parking. Complimentary yoga sessions are offered daily, on request and subject to availability. There is a Kids' Club. Nikki Beach Ibiza is located beside the hotel. Es Cana tourist resort is just 1.5 km away, and Ibiza town is 12 km from the property. Ibiza Airport is a 35-minute drive from the hotel. You can also hire a private boat to the beautiful neighbouring island of Formentera, on request and subject to availability. The hotel offers free valet parking.

name: Insotel Fenicia Prestige Suites & Spa
address: Calle Narcisos, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Insotel Fenicia Prestige Suites & Spa is situated on the seafront next to the Santa Eulalia River. The hotel provides free access to the fitness centre and offers many treatments in the Prestige Spa at an extra charge. Ibiza Airport is 21 km away. All spacious rooms have a balcony and flat-screen TV. The bathroom is complete with a separate bath and hydromassage shower. Guests are also provided with a bathrobe and slippers. Indoor and outdoor pool, a herbal steam room and an ice fountain are some of the spa facilities available at an extra charge. Foot baths and a variety of massages are also on offer. There are 4 restaurants offering a choice of Mediterranean, International and Asian cuisine. Insotel Fenicia Prestige Suites & Spa also has several bars serving snacks, cocktails and ice cream. At the Insotel Fenicia Prestige Suites & Spa reservations can be made for activities, such as yacht hire. There are golf courses within 6 km of the hotel.

name: Aguas de Ibiza Lifestyle & Spa
address: Salvador Camacho, 14, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: The new Aguas de Ibiza Lifestyle and Spa Hotel is the new concept of 5* luxury hotels with 112 rooms designed and managed by the Torres family as an expression of their worship of Ibiza. It is located in Santa Eulalia del R?o a few distance of Ibiza, beside the new congress palace. The hotel has modern facilities for any event, a restaurant with traditional cuisine, a chill out area, Air Ibiza and a bar.priceline.com

name: Iberostar Santa Eulalia - Adults Only
address: Calle Mestral, 42, 07849 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Situated in Santa Eulália del Río, Iberostar Selection Santa Eulalia Ibiza is just 20 metres from S’Argamassa Beach. This hotel is for adults only and offers an outdoor pool and a terrace with sun loungers. The rooms feature air conditioning, satellite TV and a private bathroom. All rooms have a private balcony or terrace and most have views of the sea, outdoor pool or gardens. Es Vedra terrace bar offers daily shows, music and entertainment in the evening. The centre of Santa Eulália del Río is less than 10 minutes’ drive from the hotel. Es Canar is 1 km away and Ibiza Old Town is 15 km away.

name: Bless Hotel Ibiza, a member of The Leading Hotels of the World
address: Cala Nova - Es Canar, 07849 Es Canar, Ibiza Island
description: Overlooking the Mediterranean Sea and the island of Tagomago, Bless Hotel Ibiza is located in a quiet part of eastern Ibiza. It features an outdoor infinity pool and direct beach access. All air-conditioned rooms come with a private furnished terrace or balcony, satellite TV and an iPod docking station. There is also a fan, safe and desk. The private bathroom has a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. The hotel has a bar and restaurant and 24-hour reception. The Micheline star restaurant Etxeko at the accommodation is run by the 12 Michelin-starred chef Martin Berasategui, and serve special menu. Other facilities available at the property are a gym, spa and meeting rooms. In the nearby resort of Es Canar is one of the island’s most famous hippy markets. The town of Santa Eulalia is only 5 km away.

name: Suite Hotel S'Argamassa Palace
address: Avinguda De S'Argamassa, 82, Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Built around an inviting outdoor swimming pool, this suite hotel offers spectacular views over the beach and the Mediterranean Sea beyond – great for a peaceful break on picturesque Ibiza. It offers free Wi-Fi. The S’Argamassa Palace is surrounded by tranquil pine forests on the island’s east coast. It looks out over the golden sands of Cala Pada beach. Take a swim in the beach's clear waters or in the property’s central swimming pool, designed for both adults and children. The hotel features a gym and a hot tub. Beauty treatments are available. Finish off the day by choosing from the varied cuisine served at the hotel restaurant. This charming venue serves dishes ranging from innovative creations to traditional Spanish dishes, all out on the comfortable terrace. The S’Argamassa Palace is just 3 minutes from the Palacio de Congresos de Santa Eulalia.

name: AluaSoul Ibiza - Adults only
address: Playa Es Canar, 07849 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: AluaSoul Ibiza - Adults only is a 4-star hotel featuring a wellness centre, a fitness area, swimming pool and Balinese beds located in Santa Eularia des Riu. Las Dalias Hippy Market is 3.5 km away. Each modern room here will provide you with air conditioning, a balcony and satellite channels. Featuring a bath or shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer. A free safe is also available. There is an a la carte restaurant and a buffet-style restaurant, two bars and a show cooking. Other facilities offered at the property include entertainment staff and a tour desk. The hotel is 3.3 km from Ibiza Conference Centre and 1.2 km from Nikki Beach Ibiza. Aeropuerto de Ibiza Airport is 23 km away.

name: Axelbeach Ibiza Spa & Beach Club - Adults Only
address: Calle Cala de Bou 46., 07800 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Set on the beachfront at San Antonio Beach, AxelBeach Ibiza is an adults only hotel featuring 2 outdoor pools, a free spa and a gym with sea views. The modern, air-conditioned suites and apartments come with a sofa bed and a kitchen with a fridge, microwave and a Bosch coffee machine. All have a balcony or terrace with sea views, as well as free WiFi. The private bathroom includes free toiletries, hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers. The spa includes a hot tub, hammam and sauna. A massage service is also available for an extra charge. There is a restaurant and café with a chill out terrace and a poolside bar. The complex also has direct beach access and a beach club with a restaurant and bar service, and sun beds for rent. An airport shuttle service is available for an extra charge. There is 24-hour reception and a laundry service is available. Ibiza Airport is 23 minutes' drive away and Ses Salines Beach is 27 km from AxelBeach Ibiza - Adults Only. There is parking onsite at a cost.

name: Ocean Drive Talamanca
address: Carrer de Jesús, 28, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Ocean Drive Talamanca is just 50 metres from Talamanca Beach and offers sea views. It features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, and rooms with balconies and free WiFi. Set in a fine location in Ibiza, the hotel offers a concept that aims to personalize the guest experience with a variety of services. The property offers simple, bright décor. Each of its air-conditioned rooms has satellite TV. Guests benefit from 2 free bottles of water upon arrival. The Ocean Drive Talamanca buffet restaurant serves breakfast buffet and overlooks Talamanca Bay. You can get lunch at the hotel's snack bar. There is a direct bus to nearby Ibiza Town, which stops 25 metres from the hotel. Nightclubs including Pacha and Space are a 15-minute drive away. Ferries to the other Balearic islands and mainland Spain leave from the city’s port, 2 km away. Seasonal hotel open from May until October.

name: Trs Ibiza Hotel
address: Carretera Cala Gracio (Cami Del Portixol 1) Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: TRS Ibiza Hotel -All Inclusive Adults Only Hotel, a luxury hotel with direct access to the beach, is located in the San Antonio area next to Cala Gració and Cala Gracioneta, two beautiful coves with crystal clear waters surrounded by Mediterranean vegetation. This environment of great beauty is perfect for you to enjoy exclusive vacations as a couple or with friends that include premium services, an exquisite gastronomic offer of its 3 a la carte restaurants, 24-hour butler service and the Infinite Indulgence experience, the All Inclusive that goes further beyond excellence. The Signature Level rooms includes services, amenities, exclusive drinks, minibar. Access to the Gravity Sky Lounge with Infinity pool, access to exclusive sun lounger area by the Io pool. Access to the Zentropia Spa to enjoy water circuit. Selected events at Ushuaia, Hard Rock and Hi club. Dine out, that include exclusive menus in a selection of Ibiza´s restaurants. TRS Ibiza offers you rooms and suites with hydromassage bathtubs, treatments and massages from Zentropia Palladium Spa & Wellness, three restaurants and four bars, three swimming pools and a complete menu of activities like yoga, Pilates and live music.

name: THB Los Molinos Adults Only
address: C/ Ramon Muntaner, 60, Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: THB Los Molinos is located on the beachfront in Ibiza. It has a sauna, fitness centre and hot tub, and offers air-conditioned rooms with a balcony, satellite TV and minibar. THB Los Molinos is an adults-only hotel including an à la carte restaurant, bar, garden area and a terrace. A 24-hour reception is also available. There are Balinese beds and a bar next to the pool and a spa with free access. All of the rooms and public areas at THB Los Molinos are covered by free WiFi access. There is also a business centre with wired internet. The property also offers banquet facilities. THB Los Molinos is a 5-minute walk from Ibiza Old Town, known as Dalt Vila. Ibiza Cathedral is only 900 metres away, while the Pacha Nightclub is 1.9 km away.

name: 7Pines Resort Ibiza
address: Calle Puig Delfin, 07830 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Situated in Sant Josep de sa Talaia in the Ibiza Region, 18 km from Ibiza Town, 7Pines Resort Ibiza, part of Destination by Hyatt is surrounded by pine trees and boasts views of Es Vedrà Island, has three pools in total including one outdoor pool in our public area of the spa centre. Each Suite at this resort is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a seating area for your convenience. All suites feature a terrace or balcony, and some have a private pool. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. We are provided by three restaurants and three bars: - The View, awarded by 1 Sol by 2023 Repsol Guide and included in the 2023 MICHELIN Guide (Spain & Portugal) offers a fine dining experience with an elevated and sublime tasting menu with a Nordic twist. - Cone club offer dazzling evening during the most popular sunset in Ibiza where guests can drinks exquisite cocktails accompained by nice tapas and a comfort food menu - Pershing Yacht Terrace is the place where modern Asian cuisine meets signature drinks in a sophisticated atmosphere and exceptional setting with infinite views to the Mediterranean Sea. The resort has a 1.500 m2 area with two saunas, a steam bath, showers and waterbeds. The Laguna area is a place where families enjoy in a fantastic pool adapted to kids next to a food truck and our sustainable Kids Club concept, KIO. This resort offers water sports facilities for an extra charge, and bike hire is available. San Antonio is 7 km from 7Pines Resort Ibiza, part of Destination by Hyatt, while Playa d'en Bossa is 17 km away. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 22 km from the property.

name: Destino Pacha Ibiza - Entrance to Pacha Club Included
address: Cap Martinet s/n, 07819 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Set around an outdoor pool, and offering panoramic views of the Mediterranean Sea, Destino Pacha Ibiza is set on the hillside in Cap Martinet. Talamanca Beach is a 5-minute walk away. Air-conditioned rooms feature a stylish, white décor and large windows. Each one includes free Wi-Fi, a TV, safe, minibar and a private bathroom. Destino Pacha Ibiza's restaurant offers fusion cuisine, with Japanese, Mediterranean and Central American influences. It uses fresh, local products. The pool is surrounded by palm trees and hammocks, and poolside massages are available. There is also a large hot tub and hot yoga classes. Pacha Ibiza Club is a 20-minute walk from the resort, while Ibiza city centre is around 3.5 km away. Ibiza Port can be reached in a 10-minute drive, and boats to Formentera, Mallorca and Valencia leave from here.

name: Hotel Abrat
address: Carretera de Cala Gració 5, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Facing the beachfront, Hotel Abrat offers 3-star accommodation in San Antonio and has a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre and garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a shared lounge and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking is available on site. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a bath. The rooms have a wardrobe. Hotel Abrat offers a terrace. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Hotel Abrat include Calo des Moro Beach, Cala Gracio Beach and Cala Gracioneta Beach. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 18 km from the hotel.

name: Nativo Hotel Ibiza
address: Calle De Los Claveles 24, 07849 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Situated in Santa Eularia des Riu, within 6 km of Las Dalias Hippy Market and 1.9 km of Ibiza Conference Centre, the Nativo Hotel Ibiza, offers accommodation with a restaurant and free WiFi. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and room service from 11:30 am to 11:30 pm. The property is set 1.3 km from Santa Eulalia Bus Stop. The units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Each room includes air conditioning, and certain rooms are fitted with a balcony. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the restaurant of the Nativo Hotel Ibiza The accommodation offers 4-star accommodation with a fitness center. Santa Eulalia Port is 1.5 km from the Nativo Hotel Ibiza. The Airport is 18 km from the property.

name: Hipotels Playa De Palma Palace
address: 7600 Avd. Fra Joan Llabres Playa De Palma, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in Playa de Palma, Hipotels Playa de Palma Palace & Spa features a garden, a terrace, an outdoor pool and a spa centre. There is free WiFi throughout. All rooms are spacious and have a balcony, a flat-screen satellite TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Some feature a seating area and views of the sea or the pool. The spa offers a range of beauty treatments, a hamman and a sauna for an extra cost. There is also a free hot tub and a fitness centre. Bike hire is available at this hotel and the area is popular for cycling. The hotel also offers car hire. Palma Aquarium is 2.6 km from Hipotels Playa de Palma Palace & Spa, while Playa de Palma Beach is 1 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 4 km from the property. Private parking is available on site.

name: Hipotels Gran Playa de Palma
address: Avenida Fra Joan Llabrés, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set in Playa de Palma, Hipotels Gran Playa de Palma boasts a seasonal outdoor pool and views of the sea. This modern hotel is 2 km from Aqualand El Arenal. Free WiFi is offered throughout. Featuring plenty of natural light, each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV and a bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms have a seating area. Hipotels Gran Playa de Palma has a restaurant where guests can enjoy a meal. The hotel also offers 24-hour front desk service. The area is an ideal destination for cycling lovers and the hotel has bicycles for rent. Car hire is available as well. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 8 km from the hotel.

name: BQ Belvedere Hotel
address: Mitja Lluna, 4, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set just 850 metres from Cala Mayor, BQ Belvedere Hotel offers a free shuttle service to Palmanova Beach and free parking. It features a large lagoon pool and 2 hot tubs. All of the rooms at BQ Belvedere Hotel come with a private balcony. They all have air conditioning, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi access. A regular entertainment programme is provided for children, including activities in the kids’ pool and live shows. A mini club is also available. All-inclusive accommodation is offered at a good price at the hotel. The Belvedere has a large garden area and sun terrace with snack-bar service, as well as a buffet restaurant. There is also a private bicycle parking. BQ Belvedere Hotel is 4 km from central Palma de Mallorca and less than 15 km from Son Sant Joan Airport. The shops of Cala Mayor are only 500 metres away.

name: Hotel Playa Golf
address: Carretera Del Arenal 45, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hotel Playa Golf is located on Playa de Palma Beach, 10 minutes’ drive outside Palma. It offers an outdoor pool, spa, fitness centre and air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony. Rooms at the Playa Golf are bright and feature simple, comfortable décor. They are equipped with satellite TV and the private bathrooms come with a hairdryer. The hotel has a buffet restaurant as well as two bar-restaurants. There are also 3 bars with a terrace, including one with a Balinese theme. Other services at the property include bicycle parking for an additional cost. Leisure facilities at the Playa Golf Hotel include tennis courts. There is also a car rental service and staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about Mallorca. Puntiró and Marriot’s Son Antem Golf Courses are both around 20 minutes’ drive from the hotel. You can drive to Palma Airport in just 10 minutes.

name: THB El Cid
address: Calle Vaixell 2, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This recently refurbished holiday resort has a fantastic seafront location in a beautiful Mediterranean setting, conveniently positioned just a short drive from the airport. It has free Wi-Fi. THB El Cid - Adults Only, with its peaceful, seaside location, offers well-appointed accommodation, sea views and great facilities and offers a great base while you enjoy all Majorca has to offer. You will never be short of things to do at this complex that features 3 swimming pools (one heated), gardens, a tennis court, a bicycle garage and table-tennis. Guests will also find a sauna, steam bath and a gym. Seasonal hotel: open from February to October.

name: Melia South Beach
address: Avenida Notario Alemany, Nº 1, Calvià Beach Resort, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set on the beachfront at Calvia Beach, Meliá South Beach features 4 seasonal outdoor pools and stylish rooms with free WiFi. The hotel offers an a la càrte restaurant,The Cape Nao Beach Club. Each spacious room at Meliá South Beach has bright, contemporary décor. There is air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a minibar. The private bathroom includes free organic toiletries, plus bathrobe and slippers. Meliá South Beach's poolside bar offers Spanish tapas, fresh seafood and other light dishes. Restaurants, bars and cafés can also be found by the seafront. It is located next to Nikki Beach Club & Restaurant, The hotel Yhi Spa features unique beauty treatments and massage services and a fitness room. Free yoga and pilates classes are also included. One of the pools is adults-only, where you can find Balinese beds to relax on, another one is only for the level guests and the other pool is for children. Room service is available 24 hours. The centre of Palma is 15 km from the Meliá South Beach, while the city’s airport can be reached in 20 minutes by car. The hotel also offers a private jet service. You can drive to both Puerto Portals and Puerto Adriano within 15 minutes.

name: Be Live Experience Costa Palma
address: Calle Guillen Díaz Playa, 2, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set on Cala Major Beach, Hotel Be Live Experience Costa Palma is a hotel with attractive rooms with balconies. It features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool. Hotel Be Live Experience Costa Palma's air-conditioned rooms have modern décor and flat-screen TV. A minibar is available at an extra charge. Guests can enjoy a range of Mediterranean cuisine in the buffet restaurant, which offers live show cooking. There is also a bar. Guests will also find eating options at the complex's Plaza area, including The Bakery, Sports Bar and Burger & Pizzeria. The Hotel Be Live Experience Costa Palma is within 200 metres of San Augustí Marina. The centre of Palma is 6 km away and you can drive to Palma Airport in 20 minutes.

name: Meliá Calviá Beach
address: Calle Violeta 1, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Offering impressive sea views from its setting, the stylish beachfront hotel Meliá Calviá Beach features 3 outdoor swimming pools, 1 heated indoor pool and direct access to the beach. Each of its air-conditioned rooms has a balcony. Rooms are decorated in an elegant, contemporary style. All accommodation offers satellite TV and a minibar. Rooms overlook the sea, gardens or pool area. The hotel features spacious terraces with sea and pool view, as well as 2 restaurants - a la carte and buffet style - offering international cuisine. There is also a pool bar and a lounge bar with a wide range of snacks and drinks. Set in attractive gardens, Meliá Calviá Beach has a large sun terrace with loungers. The hotel offers a lagoon-style pool, one pool for kids, one exclusive pool for the Level Clients and one indoor pool. There is a daily entertainment programme for adults and children, and guests can also relax at the YHI Spa. Meliá Calviá Beach also offers guests special rates for Katmandu Park. The hotel also offers The Level personalized service in some of the hotel’s rooms. This service includes, among others, private reception space, express check-in and check-out, access to a private pool, free usage of superior amenities, pillow menu and a la carte breakfast service in the room. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from the centre of Magalluf and there is a selection of golf courses within 5 km of the hotel. Palma and its airport can be reached in 25 minutes, by car.

name: Hotel Mirador
address: Paseo Maritimo 10, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The Hotel Mirador offers wonderful views across Palma Harbour, towards Palma Cathedral. It has a spa, and air-conditioned rooms with large windows, satellite TV and free WiFi. All of the spacious, soundproofed rooms have telephones, safes and a small fridge. They have white walls, and most have balconies. Rooms include free access to the spa including a heated whirlpool, sauna and Turkish baths. The Hotel Mirador offers car hire. The hotel’s buffet restaurant offers a breakfast. The historic centre of Palma de Mallorca, including the Cathedral, is about 1.5 km away. There is a regular bus service to the airport leaving from outside the hotel.

name: Hm Balanguera Beach- Adults Only
address: Calle Marbella, 35, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: HM Balanguera Beach is situated metres from popular Palma Beach and within 5 km of Aeropuerto de Palma. The hotel is a convenient base from which to enjoy Majorca's great climate. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. All the rooms are en suite and many have their own balcony. Although the beach is just steps away, the complex also has a swimming pool with a bar service. Breakfast, lunch and dinner is served as a buffet, and the dining room is non-smoking. Palma Beach offers an enjoyable base for a holiday given the range of activities on offers from water sports to a walk along the seafront promenade. Palma city is approximately 20 minutes' drive away.

name: Myseahouse Flamingo
address: Misión San Diego, 2, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set on the beachfront of Playa de Palma, Hotel Flamingo - Adults Only 4* Sup boasts two outdoor swimming pool with sea views and has free WiFi throughout. Featuring plenty of natural light, each charming room at this hotel comes with a balcony or a terrace. All of them include satellite TV, a telephone and a free safety deposit box. Most rooms have lateral or frontal views of the Mediterranean sea. Hotel Flamingo offers a spa with a pool, hydromassage baths, thermal circuit, steam bath a sauna and "sensation" showers. It has a relaxation area with loungers and direct access to the garden. The accommodation offers a gym and a bicycle room for washing and storing the bicycles. Guests have easy access to different activities in the area nearby the hotel. Palma's Old Town is 10 minutes' drive from the property. Bars, restaurants and shops are within walking distance from the hotel. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 3 km away.

name: Castillo Hotel Son Vida, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Mallorca
address: Carrer Raixa 2, 07013 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: As of 2022, we invite you to discover our refurbished Rooms & Suites, inspired by Mallorca´s indigenous charms and treasures. An Adults Only 16+ hotel, with captivating panoramic views towards the bay of Palma, Castillo Hotel Son Vida embodies the alluring lifestyle of its affluent neighborhood. Combining an enriching heritage with thoughtful service, the sophisticated ambience extends throughout 164 guestrooms and suites. Surrounded by three excellent golf courses and featuring outdoor swimming pools for unequalled recreation, the 5-star luxury hotel also offers prime downtime at Castillo Hotel Son Vida Spa, including a 24-hour fitness center. A dining destination on its own, an inspired range of restaurants, make the most of the unsurpassed vistas, from fine dining El Castell to the chic Pool Bar. Our meeting rooms boasting natural day light, create the perfect setting for corporate and social events.Marriott

name: Iberostar Selection Llaut Palma - Adults Only
address: Avenida America 2, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Offering an outdoor pool and sun terrace, Iberostar Selection Llaut Palma- Adults Only is set in Playa de Palma. The hotel has a spa centre and hot tub, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. Private parking is available on site. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and comes with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. For your comfort, you will find slippers and a hair dryer. Iberostar Selection Llaut Palma- Adults Only features free WiFi throughout the property. The property has 3 on-site restaurants; an Asian-fusion restaurant, Bistro restaurant, and a Buffet restaurant. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Bike storage is available for a cost. The hotel also offers car hire. Palma Aquarium is 2.8 km from Iberostar Selection Llaut Palma- Adults Only, while Playa de Palma Beach is 200 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 4 km from the property. Please note that dress code allowed in buffet is shorts. (No swimsuit, no tank tops, no flip-flops) and A la carte restaurants: long pants.

name: Hotel Victoria Gran Meliá
address: Avenida Joan Miro 21, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hotel Victoria Gran Meliá has an ideal location in central Palma, offering views of its marina, just 100 metres away. This hotel features parking and indoor and outdoor swimming pools. Many of the rooms at Hotel Victoria Gran Meliá offer views of Palma Bay. They come with flat-screen TVs, satellite channels and a CD player. A bathrobe and slippers are also included. Air conditioning or heating is featured in the rooms according to the season. The Hotel Victoria Gran Meliá’s Marivent restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and La Terraza del Victoria Restaurant serves dinners. The cocktail bar has a terrace offering views of the marina and the Cathedral. The hotel also has a bicycle center with safety hooks for bicycles and professional tools. Bellver Castle and the entrance to the surrounding park are approximately 500 metres from the Hotel Victoria Gran Meliá. There are a number of bars and clubs within a short walk of the hotel.

name: Nixe Palace
address: Avenida Joan Miro 269, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The luxury Nixe Palace is situated next to Cala Major Beach and the Marivent Palace. It offers an outdoor pool, a free spa and air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi access. Rooms at the Nixe Palace are modern. They include satellite TV and a large bathroom with toiletries, bathrobe and slippers. The Nixe’s specialised golf department offers trips to local courses and discounted green fees. Nearby golf courses include Son Vida and Son Muntaner. Hotel Nixe Palace has 3 restaurants, offering the best Mediterranean cuisine, fresh seafood and international dishes. There is also a poolside bar and a garden. The hotel's spa offers a thermal circuit, Turkish steam bath, ice fountain, heated loungers and fantastic sea views. There is also a gym, and massage treatments are available. Entry is subject to a surcharge.

name: Meliá Palma Marina
address: Avenida Gabriel Roca, 29, 07014 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This grand hotel features a spa centre, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and sun terrace with views of the sea and the Bay of Palma. Each air-conditioned room has a balcony and free Wi-Fi. Rooms at the Meliá Palma Marina come with a twin bed or double bed, subject to availability, flat-screen satellite TV and heating / air conditioner, depending on the season. Meliá Palma Marina’s 950m² Yhi spa includes contrast showers, a sauna, a dynamic pool with hot tub and a Turkish bath. All guests have free access to the well-equipped fitness centre. Other spa facilities incur an additional cost. The Palma Marina is located on the seafront promenade, just 500 metres from Palma de Mallorca’s 14th-century Bellver Castle. Palma Cathedral is only 1.5 km away. There are many restaurants and clubs in the local area. The hotel offers a daily buffet breakfast at the Arado Restaurant & Grocery. There is also a lobby bar and a pool bar in summer.

name: Aparthotel Fontanellas Playa
address: 7610 Calle Caravel La Playa De Palma, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Situated in the centre of Playa de Palma and on the beachfront, Aparthotel Fontanellas Playa offers modern accommodation with flat-screen TVs. The complex overlooks the beach and includes an outdoor pool and spa. Fontanellas Playa has a large sports area with a mini-football pitch and guests will find a playground next to the complex. The spa has a sauna, hot tub and a seasonal indoor pool. WiFi is free in all areas incluiding in the rooms. Each of the rooms and apartments has a private bathroom, air conditioning and a furnished balcony. The apartments also have a fully equipped kitchen. The complex is situated just 10 minutes’ drive from the centre of Palma de Mallorca, and is surrounded by bars and restaurants. Palma de Mallorca Airport is just 3 km away.

name: Aya Seahotel
address: Carretera Arenal, 60, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Dinner service is a la carte. Drinks are not included in the price. Set on the beachfront of Playa de Palma, this family-friendly hotel is surrounded by palms, tended gardens and an outdoor swimming pool. Free Wi-Fi is available. All air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Aya feature a private balcony, satellite TV and private bathroom. Safe and minibar are available. The hotel has a café bar with a terrace overlooking the sea. The pool area has a snack bar and sun loungers are also available. There is a 24-hour front desk where staff can provide tourist information. Compulsory bicycle parking is provided for free as well as a repair shop with cleaning area. Palma de Mallorca is 15 minutes’ drive from Hotel Aya while Mallorca International Airport is 5 km away.

name: Catalonia Majorica Hotel
address: Garita 3, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Overlooking Mallorca’s Palma Bay, this hotel features 1 outdoor pool, a hot tub and small gym. Each air-conditioned room includes satellite TV, free WiFi and a private balcony, some with sea views. The Catalonia Majorica offers bright, functional rooms with a minibar and safe. The modern bathrooms come with toiletries and a hairdryer. Hotel Catalonia Majorica has a large sun terrace with a poolside bar. The restaurant offers views of Palma Harbour and serves international cuisine. The hotel can be accessed by funicular. Car rental can be arranged at the Catalonia Majorica’s 24-hour reception. Palma’s historic centre and shops are within 2 km.

name: Hotel Hispania
address: Aguamarina, s/n, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located on Playa de Palma beach in Mallorca, Hotel Hispania offers an outdoor pool, surrounded by gardens, and a sun terrace. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. All spacious rooms come with air conditioning, flat-screen satellite TV and a balcony. Safe is available for an extra charge. For a supplement, guests have access to the spa. Hispania features a buffet restaurant with an outdoor terrace with sea views. The hotel also features a cafeteria with views of the beach, a lounge bar with swimming pool and the Sky Bar, located on the 5th floor, with views of the sea and the Bay of Palma. On Playa de Palma guests can enjoy many water sports, including wind surfing and water skiing. Activities such as cycling and horse-riding are also available in the area. Hispania Hotel is 5 minutes’ drive from Palma de Mallorca Airport. Palma is approximately 10 km away with many shops, bars and restaurants.

name: Be Live Adults Only Marivent
address: Carrer Gavina, 9, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hotel Be Live Adults Only Marivent features outdoor swimming pools and a gym. The relaxation area, available for a surcharge, includes steam baths and a Finnish sauna. It is set on the beachfront of Cala Major. Air-conditioned rooms have modern décor and include a flat-screen TV, and a bathroom with a shower and hairdryer. WiFi, a safe, and a laundry service are available for an extra charge. Items in the minibar carry a supplement. Set on the beachfront, the hotel has an exclusive beach club, Pelicano Beach. Guests will also find 3 different eating options on site at The Bakery, Sports Bar and Burger & Pizzeria. Central Palma is just 10 minutes’ drive away and tourist information is available at the hotel. Palma Airport is 20 km from Cala Major.

name: Nautic Hotel & Spa
address: C/ Virgilio, 24, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set on the beachfront opposite the Nautic Club Can Pastilla, this modern and minimalist hotel features a spa and an outdoor swimming pool. Nautic Hotel & Spa is near the shops, restaurants and bars of the area. The onsite restaurant serves Mediterranean and international-style cuisine. The hotel is also well-equipped to hold business events and meetings. Nautic Hotel & Spa is located next to the beach in a small town just outside the capital of Majorca, Palma, and is only 2 km from the airport.

name: Be Live Adults Only La Cala Boutique
address: Gavina, 4, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Be Live Adults Only La Cala is set on the beachfront of Cala Major, just 10 minutes’ drive from the centre of Palma. This adults-only hotel features an outdoor swimming pool and sun terrace. Rooms at La Cala Boutique Hotel come with an iPod speaker, a Nespresso coffee machine and a safety deposit box. The bright and modern rooms have free WiFi, a minibar with welcome items and a pool towel. The bathroom has a scale, bathrobe and slippers. The hotel offers a buffet breakfast and dinner is available at the buffet restaurants. There is also an outdoor bar. Seasonal Masai Restaurant offers lovely views of the sea and boasts its signature cuisine (additional charge). Other services offered include car rental, a tour desk and a laundry service. Guests may use the relaxation area and gym at the hotel next door, for an extra cost. The property also includes the Pelicano Beach Club, open from May to October. A bus stop is located just a few steps from the hotel and buses will take you to the city centre. Palma Airport is 20 km away. When booking half board, please note that drinks are not included. When booking 9 rooms or more, different policies and additional supplements may apply. For payments over €1000 it is mandatory to make it by credit card

name: Iberostar Bahia de Palma - Adults Only
address: Carrer Marbella, 32, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located only 20 metres from a long sandy beach, Iberostar Bahía de Palma - Adults Only features a rooftop terrace with an infinity pool and sun terrace. Free high speed WiFi is available throughout. Iberostar Bahía de Palma - Adults Only is a hotel for adults only and is equipped to help you relax. Enjoy the excellent facilities offered by the hotel, including the Sensations Spa, the swimming pool and wellness area. This is also an ideal place to participate in sporting activities, such as cycling. "The Origin Beach Soul" À la carte restaurant is not included in any accommodation meal plan. The hotel is 11 km from Palma, the capital of the island of Majorca. The airport is 6.5 km away.

name: Grupotel Orient
address: Carrer de la Duna, 3, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The Grupotel Orient is set in a quiet area, just 500 metres from Majorca´s Playa de Palma Beach. It offers indoor and outdoor swimming pools with sun loungers, a gym and a sauna. The hotel has good access to Palma city centre, and the airport is just 5km away. There are also many shops and bars in the Palma Beach resort. Grupotel Orient has adapted access with ramps. It offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with en-suite bathrooms. They all have a balcony, a music channel and satellite TV. The hotel’s buffet restaurant serves local and international dishes. There is also a lounge bar with terrace. Live entertainment takes place in the evenings. The hotel has internet corner and mini golf. A courtesy room with shower is also available after check-out. Additional facilities are shared with Grupotel Taurus Park hotel, located 25 metres away. Guests have free access to the tennis courts, gym and a spa. The hotel rents bicycles and tennis rackets.

name: Paradiso Garden Hotel
address: Calle Perla 28 - Platja de Palma, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Paradiso Garden is located in a quiet area of Playa de Palma, 200 metres from the beach. The hotel offers free access to the spa offering offering indoor pool, sauna, Turkish bath and cabins for massages at an additional cost. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. All modern rooms at Paradiso feature air conditioning, heating, and have a private balcony or terrace or garden. They feature satellite TV, minibar and safe. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries, shower, and hairdryer. The restaurant offers buffet breakfast, brunch and à la carte dinner. There is an outdoor pool with bar. Bike rental is available for a surcharge. Puntiró and Son Antem Golf Courses are 20-minutes’ drive from the hotel. Palma centre is 9 km from Paradiso Garden. Palma Airport is only 5 km away. There is a bus stop located just 50 metres from the hotel that can take you to Palma centre every 10 minutes and to Palma Airport every 30 minutes.

name: Pure Salt Garonda - Adults Only
address: Carrer de la Mar Negra 2, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The 4-star, adults-only Pure Salt Garonda lies on the seafront at Playa de Palma, 6.5 km from Son Sant Joan Airport. It has an outdoor swimming pool and free WiFi. Offering sea or garden views, all rooms are large, heated and air-conditioned. They come with a satellite TV, balcony and a minibar. Private bathrooms feature a hairdryer. There is a spa with an indoor swimming pool, sauna and Turkish bath. Pure Salt Garonda-Adults Only is equipped to welcome athletes, it offers a fitness area as well as storage facilities for golf accessories and bicycles. Pure Salt Garonda has 2 restaurants. One is open for breakfast and dinner. The other is located in front of the beach and serves lunch and dinner. The hotel offers a concierge service and computers with internet access are available at reception, subject to an additional charge. The hotel also offers car rental, excursions and currency exchange. A laundry and towel service is available. There is a bus stop only 20 metres from Pure Salt Garonda. Buses to Palma de Mallorca, 9 km away, leave every 10 minutes.

name: Hotel Java
address: Carrer de Goleta, 7, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Featuring an outdoor pool and a sauna, Hotel Java Palma de Mallorca is located in Palma de Mallorca and offers relaxed accommodation. It is steps from Palma Aquarium, restaurants and nightlife options. The hotel treats guests to a range of leisure facilities, including bicycle rental, billiards and Swimming Pool. Amenities include free wireless internet, massage services and meeting rooms. After a day of exploring the nearby area, guests can relax in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They all offer a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and an in-room safe. Hotel Java Palma de Mallorca features both a restaurant and a bar where guests can unwind at the end of an evening with dinner and a drink. The hotel also provides breakfast each day. Hotel Java Palma de Mallorca is a 10-minute drive from Son Sant Joan Airport, and sightseers can easily reach Visit Mallorca StadiumVisit Mallorca Stadium by car. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Palma de Mallorca.Revato

name: Hotel Principe
address: Avenida Son Rigo, 14, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set 2 minutes’ walk from Palma Beach, Hotel Principe is located in Palma de Mallorca. Offering an outdoor swimming pool, the air-conditioned hotel has a restaurant serving breakfasts and Mediterranean cuisine. Each room offers a TV and private bathroom. Free WiFi is available in common areas. There is a furnished terrace and a bar available. Guests can access the hotel spa for a supplement. Hotel Principe is a 5-minute walk from a wide variety of restaurants and lively bars. El Arenal and San Antonio de la Playa Ports are within 3 km away. Mallorca Airport is 10 minutes’ drive away and the centre of Palma de Mallorca is 15 minutes by car. Tramuntana National Park is 30 minutes’ drive from the property.

name: Hotel Marina & Wellness Spa
address: Paseo De La Playa Sn 1, 07108 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: When you stay at Hotel Marina Soller & Wellness Spa in Soller, you'll be on the beach, just steps from Port de Soller and Playa d'en Repic. Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Gpro Valparaiso Palace & Spa
address: c/ Francisco Vidal Sureda, 23, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This luxury hotel is set in the exclusive Bonanova district, a secluded location in Palma de Mallorca. It boasts Majorca’s largest spa, beautiful gardens and stunning views. All modern rooms at Valparaiso Palace & Spa have a private balcony with spectacular city, bay or mountain views. They are spacious and air-conditioned, and include satellite TV, a minibar and bathrobes. The Valparaiso Spa includes a huge heated pool, sauna and hot tub. There is also a steam bath, gym, ice cave and vitamin bar. All spa facilities carry an extra cost. Babies from 0 to 1 can't enter the spa. Surrounded by gardens, Valparaiso Palace & Spa is high above Palma Bay and the city. Facilities include tennis and padel courts and two large swimming pools, as well as a poolside bar open all day in summer. The Valparaiso’s gourmet Paraiso Restaurant serves a varied buffet breakfast. Specializing in show cooking, its chefs prepare Mediterranean market cuisine in front of guests. With a poolside terrace the Bistro Bar serves lunches, dinners, lighter snacks and drinks. The hotel is located 12 km from the Palma de Mallorca Airport.

name: Hotel Hospes Maricel & Spa
address: Carretera de Palma-Andraxt, 11, 07181 Calvià, Mallorca
description: Hotel Hospes Maricel y Spa is an impressive hotel located just 10 minutes’ drive from Palma de Mallorca. Featuring both modern, 16th and 17th-century architecture, it has an amazing seafront infinity pool and a well-equipped spa. The hotel is made up of the original mansion and a modern annexe building with contemporary décor and exposed stone walls, located on second sea line. You can access the property's private stone caves, some of which have been converted into seafront massage rooms. The Bodyna Spa at Hospes Maricel y Spa includes indoor and outdoor pools, a hot tub, sauna and Turkish bath. There is also a terrace, garden, a gym, and massage services are available. The stylish, air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Hospes Maricel y Spa feature free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TV and a minibar. Each one comes with a private bathroom with a hairdryer, and some have a private pool. The hotel’s Maricel Restaurant offers traditional Mallorcan food and a range of quality local wines. At the bar you can enjoy a cocktail accompanied by live jazz. Breakfast can be also served on the Mediterranean-style terrace which overlooks the sea. Hospes Maricel y Spa has a private jetty where guests arriving by sea can moor a boat, and Calanova Sailing Club is 30 metres away. There is a golf course 500 metres away, and you can drive to Palma Airport in 15 minutes.

name: Es Princep - The Leading Hotels of the World
address: Carrer Bala Roja, 1, 07001 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Situated in Palma de Mallorca, 1 km from Palma Port, Es Princep features a rooftop terrace, an outdoor pool and spa centre. There is free WiFi. Certain rooms have a seating area for your convenience. A TV is provided. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant. Palma Yacht Club is 1.4 km from Es Princep, while Ca'n Pere Antoni Beach is 550 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 7 km from Es Princep.

name: Iberostar Selection Playa de Palma
address: Marbella, 36, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set on the beachfront, Iberostar Selection Playa de Palma is located near nightlife and just 5 minutes' drive from Palma Airport. It features a swimming pool and sun loungers. Free premium high-speed WiFi is available. Iberostar Selection Playa de Palma offers fully equipped rooms, each one with a satellite TV, minibar and private balcony. The hotel offers 2 restaurants, one buffet-style and one á la carte. There is also an on-site bar, Bar Mar Blau, and a poolside bar. Guests will also be able to enjoy the Sensations Spa. There is also a fitness area and 8 golf courses near by. On the rooftop terrace, guest over 16 years of age staying in the Star Prestige rooms have access to an exclusive solarium with an infinity pool and sun loungers. The hotel is set 15 minutes' drive from the centre of Palma.

name: Hotel de Mar Gran Meliá - Adults Only
address: Paseo De Illetas, 7, 07184 Calvià, Mallorca
description: Situated on the sea front in Illetas, Hotel de Mar Gran Meliá - Adults Only is set within beautiful gardens and features a small exclusive beach. This stylish Hotel features 2 outdoor pools, a sun terrace and an extensive spa with pool. Each of the bright, air-conditioned rooms at the Meliá has stylish, modern décor, a flat-screen TV with Chromecast and a special pillow menu. Rooms also feature balconies with sea views. Red Level guests enjoy additional, exclusive services such as special discount in the parking, VIP check-in, free Nespresso coffee, free access to the Spa's thermal circuit and access to the Red Level lounge with free drinks. For an additional charge, guests have access to the SPA BY CLARINS, where health and beauty treatments are available. The spa includes a Finnish sauna, Turkish bath, hot water indoor pool and a hot tub. The fitness center is available 24 hours and it is free of charge. Hotel de Mar Gran Meliá - Adults Only has 4 restaurants, including the the Amaro Lounge, which offers light food, drinks and cocktails, a poolside restaurant Bardot, specializing in fresh fish, rice dishes and seafood meals. Arrels by Marga Coll is a fine dining restaurant offering tasting menus, with a beautiful terrace and sea views, serving traditional Mallorcan cuisine with a modern twist, and is only open for dinner. Perseo offers a delicious breakfast buffet with show cooking. The hotel is a 10-minute drive from Portals Nous Marina and central Palma is just 7 km away. Bendinat Golf Club is a 10-minute walk from the Meliá.

name: Portixol Hotel & Restaurant
address: Sirena, 27, 07006 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This stylish hotel is located in Palma’s Portixol Harbour, just 300 metres from Portixol Beach. It offers an outdoor pool and elegant, air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony and sea views. The rooms at Portixol Hotel & Restaurant feature free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TV, a DVD player and an iPod docking station. There is also a coffee maker, minibar and private bathroom with a hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers. The hotels’ charming gourmet restaurant overlooks the port from its colonnade. There is also a cocktail bar. Available for an extra cost, the Portixol’s spa features a wide range of relaxation and beauty treatments. There is also an on-site gym. You can also rent bicycles for free from reception, where staff can provide information about what Mallorca has to offer. Central Palma is just 5 minutes’ drive from Portixol Hotel & Restaurant. You can drive to Palma Airport in 10 minutes.

name: Aluasoul Palma Hotel Adults Only
address: Maestro Ekitai Ahn, 40, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The adults-only Alua Soul Palma in Can Pastilla is situated on Cala Estancia Beach in Mallorca’s Palma Bay. Each air-conditioned room includes a balcony, flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. Alua Soul Palma features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and sun terrace. There are wonderful views of Palma Bay and the Mediterranean Sea. The hotel’s restaurant opens for breakfast and dinner, serving a buffet of Mediterranean and international cuisine. The hotel also has a poolside snack bar and a café-bar. Alua Soul Palma Can Pastilla is located less than 2 km from Palma de Mallorca Airport and around 8 km from Palma city centre. Free parking can be found near the hotel, and public buses stop nearby. Reservations of more than 5 rooms are subject to supplements and special conditions. The establishment also offers My Favorite Club®, with exclusive services such as: • Selection of the best rooms. • Personalised check-in and check-out. • Exclusive My Favorite Club Lounge serving and drinks during the day. • Access to “Vértigo Sky Bar” our Rooftop with amazing sea views, exclusively for My Favorite Club guests

name: Hotel y Apartamentos Leman
address: Avinguda Son Rigo 6, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in Playa de Palma, 100 metres from Playa de Palma Beach and 2.4 km from Can Pastilla Beach, Leman Hotel y Apartamentos provides a restaurant, sea views and free WiFi. Fitted with a terrace, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. Some units include a seating area and/or a balcony. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, American and vegetarian options. The aparthotel offers 4-star accommodation with a fitness room and children's playground. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Leman Hotel y Apartamentos, while cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Palma Yacht Club is 14 km from the accommodation, while Palma Port is 14 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 4 km from Leman Hotel y Apartamentos.

name: Zel Mallorca
address: Carrer Duc Estremera, 16, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located on Majorca's south coast, in the Palmanova beach area, Zel Mallorca exudes Mediterranean charm and essence. The unique entrance is a distinctive feature: its courtyard welcomes you in a cozy atmosphere. The rooms are designed in a locally inspired style and offer stunning sea views. Its swimming pools offer sea views, one of them has direct access to the beach. The hotel encourages a healthy, active and relaxed lifestyle and features a fully equipped gym. To maximize your wellbeing there is a spa and a full activities programme, which includes yoga retreats and fitness. A wide range of sports activities are also available, such as tennis, golf, scuba diving, etc. Reconnect with your inner self at Zel Mallorca, your Mediterranean home

name: Aubamar Suites & Spa
address: Calle Misión de San Diego 17, 07600 Llucmajor, Mallorca
description: Aubamar Suites & Spa features a restaurant, outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and bar in Playa de Palma. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. At the hotel each room comes with air conditioning, a desk, a balcony with pool view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. The rooms are fitted with a safety deposit box and certain rooms include sea views. Guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a coffee machine. Guests at Aubamar Suites & Spa can enjoy a continental or a buffet breakfast. Guests can relax in the spa and wellness centre, including a sauna, and a hot tub, or in the garden. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Playa de Palma Beach, and Calo de Sant Antoni Beach. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 4 km from Aubamar Suites & Spa.

name: Azuline Hotel Bahamas y Bahamas II
address: Avenida De Europa, 07600 S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: AzuLine Hotel Bahamas is 8 minutes’ walk from the beach in S’Arenal, just 10 minutes’ drive from Palma Airport. It offers an outdoor pool, hot tub and air-conditioned rooms with a balcony. A free daily shuttle service to Arenal Beach is offered. All rooms at the azuLine Hotel Bahamas have satellite TV and most rooms have views of the sea, swimming pool or pine forest. The hotel offers a varied entertainment programme for adults and children. There is also a games room with a pool table and arcade games. The buffet restaurant at azuLine Hotel Bahamas serves international food, and there are 2 bars. There is a variety of restaurants and bars on the seafront promenade, located under 10 minutes’ walk away. For cyclists, the property offers a bicycle workshop and washing station, bicycle storage and advice on cycling routes.

name: Melia Palma Bay
address: Calle Felicia Fuster 4, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Featuring a roof-top terrace with sea views and an outdoor pool, Melia Palma Bay offers accommodation next to Palma Convention Centre. Ca'n Pere Antoni Beach is 350 metres away. Rooms are bright and feature Scandinavian-style dècor. All have satellite TV and a bathroom with free toiletries and hairdryer. There is also a fitness centre at the property. Parking is available on site for an extra charge. Palma Yacht Club is 2.1 km from Melia Palma Bay, while Cala Major Beach is 5 km away. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 6 km from the property.

name: Isla Mallorca & Spa
address: Pilar Juncosa, 7, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Isla Mallorca & Spa is located in a quiet area of Palma de Mallorca. It offers an outdoor swimming pool, spa and chic rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. The hotel’s wellness spa has a sauna, Hammam and steam bath, and massages and other treatments are available. Use of the spa comes at an additional cost. The hotel also has a gym. The hotel's restaurant, Tragaluz, offers a range of Mallorcan, Spanish and international dishes. It has a terrace and large windows with views of the garden. The hotel is set in the residential area of Son Armadams, between the Pueblo Español and Bellver Castle. The seaside promenade is just 5 minutes’ walk away. Free parking is available in the streets near the hotel. The hotel reception offers car and bicycle rental service.

name: Hotel Costa Azul
address: Avenida Gabriel Roca, 7, 07014 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
