description: Stunning views of Palma Harbour can be enjoyed from the small pool on the third floor of Hotel Costa Azul. Free Wi-Fi, LED satellite TV and fridge are included in the bright, air-conditioned rooms. The hotel boasts a fully equipped gym with views of Palma Bay. The swimming pool is covered in winter, and you can also relax in the hotel’s sauna. The hotel’s modern café and terrace offer panoramic sea views. The restaurant is open for breakfast and dinner. Rooms at Costa Azul are modern and tastefully decorated. They come with a private bathroom, a desk and safe. Rooms with sea views can be booked. Set in front of Palma’s marina, Hotel Costa Azul is 9 km from Palma Airport. Direct buses to the airport and city centre stop right outside the hotel. Please note that the hotel does not offer airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel El Llorenç Parc de la Mar - Adults Only
address: Plaça de Llorenç Villalonga 4, 07001 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: El Llorenc Parc de la Mar - Adults Only (+16) is located in the centre of Palma de Mallorca, an 11-minute walk of Palma Port. Guests have free access to the fitness centre and to the spa, which includes a swimming pool, hot tub, hammam, showers, and sauna. The hotel also features a rooftop terrace with a 40 m² swimming pool that offers views of Palma bay. At the hotel, every room has a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Every room is equipped with air conditioning, and some rooms at El Llorenc have a balcony. An à la carte breakfast is served every morning. Guests can enjoy food cooked by Santi Taura at DINS restaurant. There is also a bar. Speaking Catalan, German and English, staff at the reception can help you plan your stay. Palma Yacht Club is a 14-minute walk from the accommodation. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 7 km away. This is a non- smoking hotel

name: Bordoy Alcudia Port Suites
address: Calle Coral, 4, 07410 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Just 1 km from Alcudia’s historic centre, Bordoy Alcudia Port Suites boutique hotel has Wi-Fi access, a swimming pool and free spa access. Rooms and suites features Nordic-style dècor and come with air conditioning, wardrobe and a private bathroom with free toiletries and pool towels. Some feature a seating area and a hot tub. Bordoy Alcudia Port Suites has a terrace with loungers for sunbathing. The spa includes a sauna, hamman and hot tub. The à la carte restaurant offers international and vegetarian dishes and has outdoor seating. Bordoy Alcudia Port Suites is set a short distance from the harbour. Just 2 km away you will find a shopping centre and an ancient Roman amphitheatre.

name: Hilton Mallorca Galatzo
address: Carretera Palma-Andratx, Km 20, 07160 Peguera, Mallorca
description: Hilton Mallorca Galatzo is a tourist destination that prioritizes the well-being of its guests from arrival to departure. A restorative retreat where you can enjoy the Mediterranean climate and lifestyle during your stay on the island, whether it is a leisure or business trip. In the heart of nature, 20 minutes from Palma de Mallorca and 10 minutes from the marinas of Andratx and Puerto Portals, its 54,000 square meters of gardens promise guests relaxation and direct contact with the sea thanks to memorable views and the nearby beach of Paguera.Hilton

name: Hotel Son Caliu Spa Oasis
address: Avenida De Son Caliu 8, 07181 Palma Nova, Mallorca
description: Son Caliu Hotel Spa Oasis is conveniently located in the popular Calvia area. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, postal service, 24-hour front desk are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as television LCD/plasma screen, additional bathroom, additional toilet, private pool, internet access wireless (complimentary). To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as yoga room, hot tub, fitness center, sauna, golf course (on site). No matter what your reasons are for visiting Majorca, Son Caliu Hotel Spa Oasis will make you feel instantly at home.priceline.com

name: Hipotels Bahia Cala Millor - Adults Only
address: Carrer Castell 3, 07560 Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Hipotels Bahia Cala Millor - Adults Only is set directly in front of Cala Millor Beach, in eastern Majorca. The complex has outdoor and indoor swimming pools and a lovely garden. This modern complex offers comfortable rooms. Featuring plenty of natural light, each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV and a bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms have a seating area. Free WiFi is offered throughout. Hipotels Bahia Cala Millor - Adults Only has a restaurant where guests can enjoy a meal. The hotel also offers 24-hour front desk service. The area is an ideal destination for beach and nature lovers as it is located next to the Natural Area Punta de n'Amer.

name: Hipotels Flamenco
address: Av. Sa Coma, 13, 07560 Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Situated right on the beach front, this modern, family-friendly hotel has superb facilities including a great outdoor pool and well-equipped fitness centre. Free Wi-Fi is provided. Located in the popular Cala Millor, enjoy wonderful sea views. Make the most of the Flamenco’s location by visiting the popular beach where you can swim in the mild waters and practise a number of water-sports. Enjoy hearty meals in the Flamenco restaurant. You can help yourself to a great variety of hot and cold dishes which include both international and regional cuisine. Then sit back and let yourself be entertained by the Flamenco team which put on varied live-music shows. There is plenty to keep you active while staying at the Flamenco. Other than a refreshing swim in the outdoor pool, you can enjoy a challenging workout in the gym or join the fun activities organised by the entertainment team. After all this, head to the sauna and hot tub for a genuine relax.

name: Hipotels Hipocampo Playa
address: Avd. Sa Coma, 45, 07560 Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Set on the beachfront in Cala Millor, this hotel is perfect for a break in the sunshine. Unwind with a drink on a sun lounger before diving into the swimming pool. The 4-star Hipocampo Playa has a wide range of facilities, making it the ideal setting for a family beach holiday on beautiful Majorca. Children are entertained by the hotel’s activity team or play in the swimming pool or playground. Meanwhile, you can head to the sauna or hot tub for some much-needed relaxation. Choose between the golden sands and clear Mediterranean waters of the beach, or the comfort of the hotel sun terrace and attractive gardens. Here you can lie back whilst enjoying refreshing drinks and snacks from the poolside bar. If you feel active during your stay you can make use of the on-site gym. You will also find a variety of water sports along the local coastline, as well as a number of golf courses in the stunning Majorcan countryside.

name: Hotel Illa d'Or & Illa d’Or Club Apartments
address: Passeig De Colon, 265, 07470 Port de Pollença, Mallorca
description: Hotel Illa d'Or & Illa d’Or Club Apartments is located on the beachfront of Puerto Pollensa. The hotel boasts an outdoor pool with sea views. The fully equipped apartments feature a balcony, while the rooms include air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a safe. The hotel offers a buffet breakfast and free in-room breakfast while at dinner guests can have a fine meal from the a là carte menu. We suggest correct and adequate dress in the dining room and trust that gentlemen will understand the request not to wear shorts or T-shirts at dinner. In the summer months it is possible to have breakfast on the terrace. The Sunset Bar serves snacks and cocktails. Hotel Illa d'Or & Illa d’Or Club Apartments has a spa where guests can enjoy facial and body treatments, massages, pedicures and manicures. The spa has an indoor pool, hot tub, sauna, a Turkish bath and much more.

name: Portals Hills Boutique Hotel
address: Calle Seguí 4, 07181 Calvià, Mallorca
description: Surrounded by gardens with an outdoor pool, Portals Hills Boutique Hotel is located a 15-minute walk from Portals Marina. This stylish hotel has an on-site restaurant, pool bar and night club. Offering impressive sea views and a private balcony, all spacious modern accommodation features chic décor, air conditioning and free WiFi. There is a seating area, iPod dock, flat-screen TV and minibar. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and bathrobes. Some suites have Fendi furniture, a roof terrace and private lift. At Portals Hills Boutique Hotel you will find a modern fitness centre, a wellness lounge, and a concierge service. Real Bendinat Golf Course is 3 km from the property and Palma de Mallorca Airport is 23 km away.

name: Hoposa Hotel Daina
address: Carrer D'Atilio Boveri, 2, 07470 Port de Pollença, Mallorca
description: Set next to Albercutx Beach in Port de Pollença, Hoposa Daina- Adults Only has a large saltwater swimming pool with a terrace. Most rooms have a balcony with some offering sea views. The Daina’s bright, air-conditioned rooms include free Wi-Fi access and satellite TV. They all have a safe and a private bathroom. Guests can enjoy breakfast and dinner in Hotel Hoposa Daina- Adults Only’s restaurant, which features show cooking. The hotel also has a café-bar with an outdoor terrace area. In-room breakfast is available for free until December 2020 inclusive. Hotel Daina is next to Pollença harbour, in the pretty seaside town of Port de Pollença. Formentor’s sheltered beaches and the popular town of Alcúdia are both within a 20-minute drive. Parking can be found near the hotel, and car hire can be arranged at reception. The hotel has cycling facilities which include a bike garage, cleaning area and tools. They also offer information on bike tours.

name: Mar Azul Pur Estil Hotel & Spa - Adults Only
address: Cala Guya, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: The beachfront Mar Azul looks out over its outdoor swimming pool to Majorca’s Cala Agulla beach beyond. The centre of the Cala Ratjada resort is only a 10-minute walk away. Take in the Mediterranean sunshine, sea views and welcoming family atmosphere around the hotel’s outdoor pool or take the short, 200-metre walk down to the tranquil Cala Agulla beach itself and bathe in its clear waters. You can also swim all year round thanks to the hotel’s indoor swimming pool.

name: Mar Hotels Paguera & Spa
address: Carrer Gavines, 19, 07160 Peguera, Mallorca
description: Mar Hotels Paguera & Spa, 200 metres from Mallorca’s Paguera Beach, offers indoor and outdoor pools and a spa. Santa Ponsa Golf Club is 5 km away. Surrounded by pine forest and mountains, the Mar Hotels Paguera & Spa is a 5-minute walk from Paguera’s lively main boulevard, with its bars, restaurants, shops and discos. The bright, air-conditioned rooms have a private balcony, as well as a TV and safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. Mar Hotels Paguera & Spa includes a sauna and hot tub, and a massage service is available. There is a TV lounge and a games room with table tennis and billiards. Entertainment is provided for children and adults. Mar Hotels Paguera & Spa has a buffet restaurant, as well as a bar and snack bar. The hotel has a 24-hour front desk, and offers bicycle rental and currency exchange.

name: Hotel Agua Beach
address: Paseo del Mar, 24, 07181 Palma Nova, Mallorca
description: Hotel Agua Beach "Adults only" - Adults Only is situated next to Majorca’s Palma Nova Beach, just 150 metres from Palma Nova centre. It offers free Wi-Fi in public areas and a shared pool. Each air-conditioned room at Hotel Agua Beach "Adults only" - Adults Only includes satellite TV and a safe. Amenities and a hairdryer are included in the private bathrooms. Some rooms have a balcony with views of the sea. Hotel Agua Beach "Adults only" has a buffet restaurant with extensive wine list. Guests can also enjoy a drink in the lounge bar or outside on the seafront terrace. The hotel offers a varied entertainment programme. The Agua Beach - Adults Only is just a 5-minute walk from many of Palma Nova’s lively bars and discos. Palma is 14 km away, and there are various golf courses within a 10-minute drive of the hotel.

name: Bikini Island & Mountain Hotel Port de Sóller - Adults Only
address: Carrer de Migjorn 2, 07108 Soller, Mallorca
description: Enjoying an unbeatable location overlooking Majorca's Puerto de Soller Bay, Bikini Island & Mountain Hotel Port de Soller, part of the Designhotels, offers a heated outdoor pool, a spa and free bikes. Rooms at this hotel come with a flat-screen TV and a fridge. Some have coffee and tea making facilities and a sofa. All have private bathrooms with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Bikini Island & Mountain Hotel Port de Soller is well situated for outdoor activities, including sailing, diving and snorkelling. Yoga classes are also available on site. Palma de Mallorca is 40 minutes' drive away and Palma Airport is 37 km away.

name: Secrets Mallorca Villamil Resort & Spa Only Adults
address: Secrets Mallorca Villamil, 07160 Peguera, Mallorca
description: Housed in a stately building with gardens, the charming Secrets Mallorca Villamil is located on Peguera Beach. It features cycling facilities, an outdoor heated swimming pool, a spa with sauna, steam bath, hot tub and sensation showers (all spa services for an extra cost) Rooms offer city views of Paguera, views to the garden or the sea. They include free WiFi, a flat-screen TV and minibar. The World Café offers a buffet with a selection of international cuisine made with fresh, seasonal produce. There is a daily breakfast buffet and in summer guests can have breakfast on the terrace overlooking the sea. The Olio Restaurant is located by the pool and serves local dishes such as rice, fresh fish and other snacks. Open in the evening, Seaside Grill Restaurant offers beautiful sea views and serves Mediterranean cuisine. You can also enjoy a drink and live music in Piano and Sky Bar. The hotel also has a gym and free parking for bikes. Massages are available for an extra cost and Pilates and Stretching classes are also available for free. Once a week in summer, the hotel organizes a free boat trip for hotel guests. The Secrets Mallorca Villamil is the official hotel of the Triathlon Challenge Paguera Mallorca. The establishment offers Preferred Club®, with preferential status and exclusive services such as: -access to the Preferred Club Lounge with a selection of snacks and drinks during the day, -exclusive concierge service, -selection of the best rooms including superior attributes, among other special advantages. Nicely located, Secret Mallorca Villamil is 3 km from Golf de Andratx; and you can drive to both Golf de Santa Ponsa and Bendinat Golf Club within 15 minutes by car.

name: Hotel Ferrer Concord
address: Carrer Isaac Peral, 89, 07458 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Looking over Alcúdia Bay, this holiday hotel is set beside sand dunes and pine forests and in front of sands and Mediterranean waters. The Ferrer Concord boasts direct access to the beaches of Son Bauló. You can also enjoy the sunshine by lying back on a beachfront sun lounger. Spend your daytime getting involved in the sporting activities available on site, including aqua gym, beach and walking trips. As a guest of the Ferrer Concord you enjoy use of the excellent facilities at the nearby Hotel Ferrer Janeiro. These include a fantastic spa and wellness centre as well as activities for younger guests.

name: Reverence Life Hotel - Adults Only
address: Carrer Lisboa 4, 07180 Calvià, Mallorca
description: Offering views of Santa Ponça Beach, Reverence Life Hotel - Adults Only offers 4 seasonal outdoor pools, 2 of them with a swim-up area, a bike station, and a free spa and wellness centre. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. The hotel is set over 4 different buildings. Each air-conditioned and quiet room comes with modern décor, a free safe, fridge, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and coffee & tea making facilities. Most have a balcony with views of the sea or the pools. The private bathroom comes with with a rainshower, hairdryer, amenities and vanity mirror. The hotel's spa and wellness centre include free access to the gym, sauna, whirlpool, Turkish bath, indoor pool, and massage and treatment cabins. Guests in Premium rooms and suites have exclusive access to the rooftop pools and terraces during the day. The hotel has a pool snack bar and a buffet restaurant for dinner.

name: Universal Hotel Lido Park
address: Calle José Guevara, 4, 07160 Peguera, Mallorca
description: Overlooking Peguera Bay and its sandy beaches, Universal Hotel Lido Park & Spa offers air-conditioned rooms with private balconies and satellite TV. It features an indoor and outdoor swimming pool, sauna and a gym. Rooms are decorated simply and include a safe, fridge, and flat-screen TV. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Universal Lido Park’s buffet restaurant offers themed dinners, and on Fridays there is a gala dinner. Guests can also eat on the terrace which offers lovely views of the sea. Other on-site facilities include games rooms for children, a lounge bar, and an internet corner. Guests can also rent bicycles from the hotel or arrange car hire. Central Palma de Mallorca is around 20 km away, and Palma Airport is 30 km from Universal Hotel Lido Park & Spa. Airport transfers can be arranged for an extra charge.

name: Hotel Bon Sol Resort & Spa
address: Paseo De Illetas, 30, 07181 Calvià, Mallorca
description: This enchanting, family-run hotel overlooks the Bay of Palma, nestling amongst pine trees and tropical gardens. Descend through these gardens to the rock-lined pools and the secluded beach below. At the top of the Bon Sol you will find a Moorish tower offering amazing views across this picturesque bay in southern Majorca. From here, you can head down through the lush gardens, passing by the sun terraces, scenic swimming pools, spa facilities and down to the small, sandy beach on the Mediterranean Sea. Other great facilities include tennis courts and a winter conservatory. Inside, the Arabian-influenced decor, antique-style furniture and precious artwork combine to give the feel of a Medieval castle. This unique atmosphere is made more welcoming by the informal, family atmosphere.

name: H10 Casa Del Mar
address: Gran Via Del Puig Major, 2, 07180 Santa Ponsa, Mallorca
description: H10 Casa del Mar is set on Mallorca and offers 4-star accommodation in addition to free Wi-Fi. It also has a gym, a sauna and a swimming pool. Guests can enjoy a range of massage treatments and beauty therapy at the on-site spa and wellness centre, Despacio Beauty Centre. For families H10 Casa del Mar offers babysitting/child services. The hotel features 245 rooms, each equipped with a flat-screen TV, an in-room safe and an in-room closet. There are also several rooms especially for families. Guests are able to enjoy a drink at H10 Casa del Mar's bar and dine on international style food in the restaurant. Alternatively, the surrounding area features many bars and restaurants serving a choice of different cuisines. The area surrounding H10 Casa del Mar is well-known for its nightlife, with plenty of places to go for a drink or dance. It is also a short drive from Santa Ponsa and Palma de Mallorca.Revato

name: Sallés Hotel Marina Portals
address: Ctra. d'Andratx, Km. 10, 07181 Calvià, Mallorca
description: The traditional-style Marina Portals offers stunning Mediterranean Sea views just 7 minutes’ walk from the beach. It has a pool and a spa, and the air-conditioned rooms have satellite TV. Guests have free access to the spa. The spa includes a water circuit, sauna and steam bath, as well as chromotherapy and other relaxation and beauty treatments. It also has a large sun terrace with loungers. All the spacious rooms in Marina Portals Majorca have a private balcony and free Wi-Fi. They have antique-style furnishings and safes. Many of the rooms have sea views. The hotel offers a breakfast and dinner buffet service. The hotel’s snack bar has a terrace, and the Coral Bar offers a range of drinks. The hotel is Bike Friendly, it has the necessary services so that your bike is ready for each outing. Bike services like safe bike storage rooms, repair services, cleaning and route information. Salles Hotel Marina Portals is less than 10 minutes’ drive from the capital of Palma de Mallorca. The bars and restaurants of Portals Nous, as well as the marina, are within 10 minutes’ walk. The hotel has private parking and there is also public parking nearby.

name: Grupotel Maritimo
address: Arta 158, 07410 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Situated just 150 metres from Alcudia Beach, Grupotel Marítimo offers 2 outdoor pools and a tennis court. The relaxation zone includes an indoor pool, hot tub and massage service. All air-conditioned rooms at Grupotel Marítimo have a private balcony. Each room includes satellite TV and a minibar. A varied breakfast buffet is served in the hotel’s restaurant. The buffet dinner includes a wide range of international cuisine and typical Majorcan dishes. There is also a lounge bar and terrace. You can enjoy evening entertainment, including live music and dancing, at Grupotel Marítimo. There is a kids’ club and play area for children. The hotel is situated next to S’Estany Gran Lake, in Alcudia Bay. The popular resort of Port d’Alcudia is just a 5-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Coronado Thalasso & Spa
address: Carretera Cala Fornells, 80, Calvià, Mallorca
description: Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, which include 2 outdoor swimming pools and a fitness center. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).#Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon We have adult only area: SPA, gym, Panoramic Pool, Panoramic Restaurant and the Pool Suite do not admit children.Expedia

name: Hipotels Hipocampo - Adults Only
address: Carrer Bonanza 2, 97560 Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Enjoy the beachfront location and extensive facilities of this 4-star hotel, located overlooking the bay of Cala Millor. The setting of the Hipotels Hipocampo is ideal for a relaxing break on Majorca’s golden sands. Dive into the clear Mediterranean waters or take a dip in the hotel’s own outdoor swimming pool, surrounded by comfortable sun loungers. Relax with a session in the sauna before cooling off in the hot tub. You will also find a heated indoor swimming pool within the hotel. Choose between dining at the hotel’s own buffet restaurant or strolling along the seafront to the nearby resort centre, where you can enjoy the range of restaurants.

name: Elba Sunset Mallorca Thalasso Spa
address: Carrer Torrenova 25-27, 07181 Palma Nova, Mallorca
description: Situated in Palmanova, 500 metres from Magaluf Beach, Elba Sunset Mallorca Thalasso Spa features accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation offers nightclub and a concierge service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Every room is fitted with a kettle, while some rooms are fitted with a balcony and others also feature sea views. At Elba Sunset Mallorca Thalasso Spa the rooms have bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a gluten-free breakfast. Son Maties Beach is 600 metres from Elba Sunset Mallorca Thalasso Spa, while Palma Nova Beach is 1.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 23 km from the hotel.

name: Js Cape Colom - Adults Only
address: Carrer Assumpcio, 14, Portocolom, Mallorca
description: Offering incredible Mediterranean Sea views Hotel JS Cape Colom has a spectacular cliff-top setting in Porto Colom. It features a large outdoor swimming pool. The hotel has over 1000 m² of terraces and gardens, with direct access to the sea. The buffet restaurant offers local and international foods, as well as show cooking. There is also a snack bar by the pool. The Cape Colom's spa includes a sauna, a hot tub and pressure showers, as well as massages. It also has a gym, a semi olympic swimming pool and sports facilities, including tennis and squash courts. Each of the Cape Colom's air-conditioned rooms has a balcony, with some offering sea views. There is also satellite TV and a private bathroom. Porto Colom is one of Mallorca's best natural harbours, and is 500 metres from the sandy beach at Cala Marsal. Activities including scuba diving, fishing and sailing are on offer here.

name: Parque Nereida Suites Hotel
address: Avenida Cala Lliteras, 4, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: No description found

name: Barceló Illetas Albatros - Adults Only
address: Paseo De Illetas 15, 07181 Calvià, Mallorca
description: Barcelo Illetas Albatros Adults only is an exclusive hotel; just for adults; where you can enjoy the best holiday that Majorca can offer B-Rooms; decorated in a minimalist style; with services and equipment using the latest technology The hotel has a swimming pool area; Balinese beds; Whirlpool Baths and its own cove with private access Foodies will appreciate the best designer cuisine while enjoying the unique sea views; or they can sip a delicious cocktail on the Urban Sky Terrace open during the summer months What is more; guests can communicate directly with the hotel reception via our 24 hour Whatsapp Concierge ServiceBarcelo.com

name: Bahia de Alcudia Hotel & Spa
address: Avenida de la Playa, 6, 07410 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Hotel Bahia de Alcudia is just 200 metres from Alcudia Beach, in north-east Majorca. It has an outdoor swimming pool, gardens and terraces. Alcudia’s 15km beach is ideal for watersports. Alcudia Town is only 2km from the hotel. It has a historic Medieval walls. The port and marina are near the hotel. This area has shops and bars. Rooms at the hotel are all en suite and air-conditioned. They have a terrace or balcony, as well as a minibar. Safes are available to rent. The hotel restaurant serves a varied buffet breakfast and dinner. Snacks are also available for lunch. The hotel has various bar areas, with live entertainment at night.

name: Hotel Inmood Aucanada
address: Cami d'Aucanada 65, Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Less than 1 km from Alcúdia Bay, Inmood Aucanada 4 Sup offers rooms with balconies. Just 15 metres from the beach, it features 4 swimming pools, a spa and a buffet restaurant. The rooms at Inmood Aucanada 4 Sup have simple décor with parquet floors. Each room has a flat-screen TV and seasonal air conditioning. The hotel’s spa offers sea views from its indoor pool and features a hot tub, sauna and Turkish baths. There is also a gym. Choose between a wide range of hot and cold dishes available in the Inmood Aucanada's restaurant as well as a tempting selection of desserts. There are also themed dinners and show cooking. The hotel offers a varied entertainment programme. There is also a possibility of canoeing and diving courses (additional cost). Enjoy discounted rates at various golf courses. There is a bus stop 100 m away to make for easy touring of the island.

name: Grupotel Aguait Resort & Spa - Adults Only
address: Avenida de los Pinos, 61, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: Featuring direct access to Ratjada Beach, the adults-only Grupotel Aguait Resort & Spa - Adults Only offers views of this pretty cove. It features a spa with free entry, outdoor pool and rooms with balconies. Take a refreshing dip in the swimming pool surrounded by a large sun terrace with views of the Mediterranean waters. There is a heated indoor swimming pool, hot tub, sauna, massages, gym, tennis club Aguait with 11 clay courts, table tennis and a billiard table. When booking more than 5 rooms, different policies and additional supplements may apply.

name: Grupotel Gran Vista & Spa
address: Ctra. Artà-Alcúdia, 68, 07458 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Located just a short walk to the Can Picafort beach, surrounded by gardens lays this complex made up of the hotel and apartments with free spa access and free WiFi. The complex offers guests all they need for a fun filled, enjoyable family holiday, including; 2 large swimming pools with children’s pool, mini-club and children’s playground, entertainment programmes, a free Spa & Wellness centre, Conference room for up to 40 people and a sports centre. Alcudia is 12 km away and Palma de Mallorca is 50 km from Grupotel Gran Vista & Spa. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 50 minutes' drive away.

name: Cabot Pollensa Park Spa
address: Bot, 5, 07470 Port de Pollença, Mallorca
description: Cabot Pollensa Park Spa is located just 100 metres from the beach, in Majorca’s Port de Pollença. Surrounded by gardens, it offers an outdoor swimming pool, gym and a spa completed with hot tub, sauna, Turkish bath, foot bath and heated pool. Rooms at the Cabot Pollensa Park Spa are spacious and bright, with tiled floors and air conditioning. Each room has satellite TV and most have a private balcony with sea views. Guests can enjoy breakfast and dinner in the buffet restaurant. The hotel also has a poolside snack bar. Live entertainment and children’s activities are organised by the hotel. Cabot Pollensa Park Spa is located on Calle Bot, a popular street with many bars. Pollença Harbour and the old town are within a 15-minute walk.

name: Cap Rocat
address: Ctra. d'Enderrocat, 07609 Llucmajor, Mallorca
description: Cap Rocat, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World is a former military fortress, carefully restored to offer 5-star luxury accommodation. The hotel offers wonderful views of the Mediterranean Sea and the Majorcan countryside. Hotel Cap Rocat, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World is set in a quiet area of Palma Bay, near Cala Blava. The hotel has direct access to the sea. There is also an outdoor swimming pool and sun terrace. The hotel offers a Spa which guests can use for free, and a Hammam at an extra cost. There are also tennis courts and a fitness centre with a personal training service. Outdoor yoga and pilates classes are also offered. Rooms at the hotel offer a private balcony, air conditioning and a minibar. They also come with a bathrobe and slippers, as well as a CD and DVD player. Cap Rocat, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World’s restaurant serves fresh Mediterranean food. The hotel also offers large public lounges and patios. Free Wi-Fi access is available in all areas. For safety reasons due to the unique architecture of the fortress, Cap Rocat, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World cannot accommodate children younger than 15 years old.

name: The St. Regis Mardavall Mallorca Resort
address: Carretera Palma-Andratx 19, 07181 Calvià, Mallorca
description: A refined tastemaker located on the southwest coast of Mallorca, The St. Regis Mardavall Mallorca is a luxurious family resort offering an exceptional retreat. Arranged across four terracotta-hued buildings, the 125 guestrooms and suites all have large private terraces with an alluring Mediterranean vista. An arbiter of the island’s most distinctive flavors, connoisseurs from near and far converge to dine at our exceptional Michelin-starred Es Fum Restaurant, while the St. Regis Bar with its modern design sets new heights as a lobby art bar on the island. Our new contemporary designed Terra Restaurant brings a fresh air to the hotels classic look with its “Farm to Table” concept, celebrating the island’s rich culinary heritage and local produce. Mar Sea Club will make for a luxurious shore side atmosphere, a go-to destination for those seeking the ultimate in relaxation and indulgence with captivating sea views or by our newly renovated cascade swimming pool.Marriott

name: Hotel & Spa S'Entrador Playa
address: Carrer de l'Agulla, 123, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: Hotel & Spa S’Entrador Playa is set near Cala Agulla Beach, in Majorca’s Cala Ratjada. It is surrounded by pine forests, and has impressive views of the coast and hills. The hotel has an outdoor swimming pool, a sun terrace and gardens. There is a play area for children. There are also tennis courts and a fitness centre. Rooms at the S’Entrador Playa are bright and comfortable. They all have a balcony and satellite TV. The hotel spa has a sauna, hammam and Turkish bath. There is an indoor pool with hot tub. Massages and other treatments are also available. The hotel has a restaurant and a bar. There is also a 24-hour reception, with a tour desk and currency exchange.

name: Bordoy Don Antonio
address: Carrer de Bonavida 11, 07160 Peguera, Mallorca
description: Surrounded by forests, the Bordoy Don Antonio offers stunning panoramic sea views and modern rooms with a balcony. The hotel has indoor and outdoor pools, and a spa area with hot tubs. Spacious rooms come with air conditioning and they also include a private bathroom with a hairdryer and amenities. Hotel Bordoy Don Antonio is 20 km from the capital of Majorca, Palma. There are three 18-hole golf courses within 7 km of the hotel. The hotel provides a free shuttle to the beaches and centre of Peguera. Mediterranean and international cuisine can be enjoyed in the hotel’s buffet restaurant. During summer, a snack bar is open on the hotel’s terrace, between the 2 outdoor pools. There are conference facilities for up to 80 people on site, with free internet and audiovisual equipment.

name: La Residencia, A Belmond Hotel, Mallorca
address: Son Canals, Deia, Mallorca
description: La Residencia, A Belmond Hotel, Mallorca is located in the charming artist village of Deià, Mallorca. With its building dating back to the 16th century, the hotel features 2 outdoor pools, an award-winning restaurant and a spa. Offering sea and mountain views, the hotel has a hot tub and 2 tennis courts, and a tennis coach is available. There is also a sauna and a wellness centre. Complimentary boat excursions are offered during the summer. All rooms at the hotel are unique and feature traditional Mallorcan decor and antique furnishings. WiFi is free in all areas. There are fresh flowers and fruit in rooms every day. La Residencia, A Belmond Hotel, Mallorca boasts a permanent art exhibition and a sculpture garden. There are also classical music concerts and the hotel has a Steinway Piano. Fun donkey trails can be organised with the hotel´s resident donkeys in the olive groves. Staff can organise a private airport transfer. Owners of the property, artists themselves, can provide painting and sculpting lessons to the guests upon request. El Olivo is an award-winning à la carte restaurant. Café Miró is casual and offers tapas and local cuisine. There is also a pool restaurant and a snack bar. Free private parking is available.

name: Aimia Hotel
address: Carrer Santa Maria Del Cami, 1, 07108 Port de Sóller, Mallorca
description: Aimia Hotel & Spa is located just metres from the Sóller Port, in the northwest of Mallorca. It offers a magnificent outdoor pool, free internet and a well-equipped spa. Offering free spa access, the rooms at the Aimia are equipped with a private terrace, satellite TV and great views. All are air conditioned and also come with a bathrobe and hairdryer. The Aimia’s Blue Spa features an indoor pool, Turkish bath, hammam, hot tub and sauna. A resident therapist offers a range of beauty treatments and massages. The Airecel restaurant serves bistro lunch menus and gourmet-style cuisine. It has a large window with views over the garden and the Tramuntana Mountains.

name: AluaSoul Mallorca Resort - Adults only
address: Avinguda De Cala Egos, Cala D'or, 07660 Cala d'Or, Mallorca
description: AluaSoul Mallorca Resort - Adults only is a four-star hotel located in a beautiful cove in south-east Mallorca, facing Cala Egos Beach. It has 3 outdoor pools, one for My Favorite Club guests. AluaSoul Mallorca Resort has extensive solarium areas and chill out. The rooms at the AluaSoul Mallorca have all the facilities: rain shower, air conditioning, equipped balcony, safe, kettle, 42'' TV, free Wi-Fi, hair dryer. The modern rooms at this hotel feature a balcony and satellite TV. The private bathroom include free toiletries. This hotel has 5 restaurants with both à la carte and buffet options and 2 bars, one of which is a beach bar. The Mare Nubium Restaurant offers a selection of international dishes and the bar serves aperitifs and cocktails in the evening. The property offers a varied entertainment programme and has a beach club. The hotel also offers gym, wellness area, 3 swimming pools and solarium. AluaSoul Mallorca Resort - Adults only is just 2.5 km from the centre of Cala d’Or, with its shops, bars and restaurants. The establishment also offers My Favorite Club®, with exclusive services such as: -Personalized check-in and check-out -Access to the My Favorite Club Lounge with snacks and beverages -Reserved areas in indoor and outdoor areas -Selection of the best rooms including superior attributes

name: Jumeirah Port Soller Hotel & Spa
address: Belgica, 91, Port de Sóller, Mallorca
description: Located on Mallorca’s north-west coast, this modern hotel overlooks the Port de Sóller Bay. It offers an impressive infinity pool, a fitness centre and a spa, all with fantastic views. The stylish, air-conditioned rooms at Jumeirah Port Soller Hotel & Spa feature a private balcony, free WiFi and a flat-screen satellite TV. Each one has a coffee maker and a minibar. Jumeirah Port Soller Hotel & Spa has 3 restaurants which serve a wide range of dishes and offer fantastic sea views. Cap Roig offers traditional Mediterranean food and Es Fanals serves a creative selection of Spanish tapas and Sunset Sushi Lounge is popular for its selection of freshly prepared sushi, Asian-style tapas and locally inspired cocktails.There are also 2 pool-side bars. Talise Spa at Jumeirah Port Soller features a hammam suite, a heated hydropool and a thermal area. The town of Valldemossa is a 25-minute drive from the hotel. Central Palma and Palma Airport are each 35 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hoposa Uyal
address: Paseo Londres 68 70Null, Port de Pollença, Mallorca
description: The Majorcan-style Hotel Uyal is set on the seafront in Port de Pollença, overlooking Pollença Beach. It features an outdoor pool and rooms with free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs and views of the mountains or sea. The typical whitewashed Hoposa Uyal lies by the sea, in the shadow of the Tramuntana Mountains. It is 1 km outside the centre of the resort of Port de Pollença. Guests can swim in Uyal Hotel’s outdoor swimming pool, or relax on the terrace’s sun loungers. Guests can explore the natural surroundings using a bicycle hired from the hotel. There is an on-site bicycle garage with space for 70 bikes, and there is also a bicycle-washing area where you can find tools. Mechanical services are available on request. The local golf course is 10 km away. Hotel staff can help you arrange green fees.

name: Ilusion Markus & Spa
address: Via Suiza,66, 7458 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Located in Majorcans Can Picafort and just 200 m from the beach, this hotel has great facilities including an outdoor pool and spa. Workout in the gym and dine in the buffet restaurant. The Markus Park allows you to make the most of Majorcas fantastic climate thanks to its proximity to the local beach and the great sun terrace located next to the pool. There is a childrens area of the pool. After exploring the surroundings, unwind in the Markus Parks spa with sauna and whirlpool. Alternately have a sit and chat with friends or family in the lounge areas of the Markus Park. All the Markus Parks bedrooms have private balconies and complete bathrooms with bathtubs. Choose from a wide range of hot and cold dishes in the Markus Parks buffet restaurant which also serves regional specialities. Accompany your meal with a fine Spanish wine. Begin the day with the continental breakfast.

name: Occidental Cala Viñas
address: Carrer Del Coral, 2-4, 07181 Calvià, Mallorca
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility. The Occidental Cala Vinas hotel is situated in one of the most beautiful spots on the Mallorcan coast on the edge of a white sand beach with crystalline waters. This brand new modern hotel offers magnificent rooms with sea views that you will enjoy from the moment you wake up. After getting up you will be able to have a dip in the incredible Majorcan waters before enjoying the exquisite cuisine of the hotel. This 4-star hotel has communal areas and facilities that are carefully designed to offer guests the utmost wellbeing. Enjoy bathing in the swimming pools of the hotel while your children have fun in the new swimming pool that features a water park. And to crown your holidays you can relax and pamper yourself with a session in the Thalassotherapy Spa while your children have fun in the Barcy Club featuring a ball pool.Barcelo.com

name: Iberostar Playa de Muro
address: Avenida Albufera, 07408 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Iberostar Playa de Muro has an ideal setting overlooking Muro Beach, 100 metres from Albufera Nature Reserve. This resort has a main pool, two children's pools and an indoor pool in the Spa area, a spa and rooms with balconies. Free high speed WiFi is available throughout. The Playa de Muro features elegant décor throughout. Its rooms have TVs with satellite channels and a minibar. The hotel has 3 restaurants,1 snack bar with sea views and a food truck by the pool. The on-site spa features an indoor swimming pool, a hot tub, heated loungers, a rain-effect shower and 2 saunas. There is also a gym. A kid's club is available from May to October. Iberostar Playa de Muro offers unique services for cyclists and sports travelers. There is a repair shop, garage and a fully equipped gym. Bicycles are available for hire, there are special menus, sports shop and a dedicated team. S’Estany Gran Lake is just 15 minutes’ walk from the resort.

name: Nordeste Playa
address: Via Francia, 10, 07458 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: This pleasant, all-inclusive hotel is located in the centre of the resort, 70 metres from pretty Can Picafort Beach. It offers an indoor and outdoor swimming pool, a sun terrace, gym and beauty salon. The comfortable, air-conditioned rooms at Nordeste Playa are bright and feature a furnished balcony. All include satellite TV, a safe and private bathroom with hairdryer. The hotel’s all-inclusive buffet restaurant serves international and local cuisine. Snacks are provided throughout the day and drinks are served at the bar until midnight. The Nordeste Playa offers a number of spa facilities, including a hot tub, sauna, Turkish bath and massage facilities. Alcudia and its ferry port are just 11 km away. The hotel offers car and bicycle rental and is located 50 minutes’ drive from Palma Airport. You can catch a bus to Palma and Inca 150 metres away.

name: Hotel Na Forana
address: Arquitecto Alomar, 5, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: Hotel Na Forana is set on Son Moll Beach, between Cala Rajada and Capdepera. It features a gym, hot tub, an indoor pool and a seasonal outdoor swimming pool overlooking the beach. Each bright, air-conditioned room at Hotel Na Forana has elegant décor, a TV, a safe and a minibar. Many rooms offer balconies with sea views. You can enjoy a range of Mediterranean dishes in the Na Forana’s buffet restaurant, which offers show cooking twice a day. There are also spacious lounge areas with free Wi-Fi. Free kayak tours are organised from the Hotel Na Forana reception desk. The centre of Cala Rajada is a 5-minute walk from the hotel, while Capdepera is a 20-minute walk away. There are 2 golf courses within 5 km of the Na Forana.

name: The Level at Melia Barcelona Sky
address: C/ Lope De Vega, 141-147, Barcelona
description: The Level at Melia Barcelona Sky is located in Barcelona’s Poblenou district. This stylish hotel offers a range of luxury services, including 1 on-site restaurant and free spa access. The Serena SPA Wellness includes a sauna, Turkish baths, bithermal shower and a heated pool with whirlpool. Guests also have access to a discount on massages. The modern, air-conditioned rooms at The Level at Melia Barcelona Sky feature free WiFi, a 55-inch flat-screen satellite TV, a coffee maker and a minibar. Each one has a private bathroom with a rain-effect shower, bathrobe and slippers. There is a restaurant serving Mediterranean dishes, and guests have the option of a buffet breakfast with views over Barcelona. The Level at Melia Barcelona Sky has a poolside bar. On the 24th floor of the hotel The Level at Meliá Barcelona Sky you can enjoy a cocktail or premium drinks at the Skyline 24 which offers views over the city. The Level at Melia Barcelona Sky offers a personalised reception with flexible check-out times, as well as helping to arrange tickets for trips, shows and car hire. Poblenou Metro Station is 450 metres from the hotel, and you can walk to the seafront in around 15 minutes. Torre Agbar Tower is 1 km away.

name: Barcelona Princess
address: Avinguda Diagonal 1, Barcelona
description: Situated in Barcelona, Hotel Barcelona Princess offers trendy 4-star accommodation, as well as a swimming pool and a sauna. It also provides free wireless internet. Guests can enjoy the sun on the terrace or have a drink at the bar. Staff are available 24 hours a day and can book tours and tickets. Hotel Barcelona Princess provides 363 air conditioned rooms. The private bathroom includes complimentary toiletries in addition to slippers and a hair dryer. Guests of Hotel Barcelona Princess are welcome to sample local cuisine at Restaurant N1, or try Mediterranean dishes at Restaurant Estrella. There is also a range of breakfast options available each day. Barcelona El Prat Airport is a 30-minute drive from the hotel. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Selva de Mar Metro Station, which allows for convenient access in and around Barcelona.Revato

name: Hotel Arts Barcelona
address: Marina 19-21, 08005 Barcelona
description: Hotel Arts Barcelona is a landmark with perfect credentials as a premier destination within a destination. An urban resort that stands as the tallest hotel on the coast, overlooking the beachfront offering panoramic city and beach views. The hotel effortlessly combines tranquility and genuine luxury with individual and personalized service provided by a well-connected and passionate team. Offering panoramic city and beach views, the guestrooms, suites and luxury, serviced penthouses are light-filled, luxuriously comfortable.Gastronomy is an inherent part of Hotel Arts Barcelona offering five gastronomic restaurants and a cocktail bar. The hotel has a unique collection of open and leisure spaces exceptional in Barcelona. The artfully designed Infinity Pool and family pool overlook the gardens, offering an oasis of calm by day and vibrant hot spot at night. 43 The Spa, located on the 43rd floor, floating high above the city, captures organic luxury and a sense of well-being.Marriott

name: Hotel SB Diagonal Zero
address: Plaça de Llevant, 08019 Barcelona
description: Hotel SB Diagonal Zero Barcelona is opposite Barcelona’s International Convention Centre and Barcelona's Forum Auditorium. It has a spa, a gym, a seasonal panoramic pool and a solarium on the hotel rooftop. There is free access to the hotel gym. The spa is only for guests over 14, and includes a Turkish bath and Finnish sauna. Beauty and massage treatments are available at a surcharge. All air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel SB Diagonal Zero Barcelona have flat-screen satellite TV, free WiFi and a laptop safe. The soundproofed rooms have facilities to connect iPods. All rooms have ironing facilities, tea and coffee making facilities, and a kettle. There is a touch-screen control for lights and temperature. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer, and bathrobes and slippers can be provided upon request.

name: Gran Hotel La Florida
address: Ctra. Vallvidrera al Tibidabo, 83-93, 08035 Barcelona
description: Set on Tibidabo Hill, the 5-star Gran Hotel La Florida G.L Monumento offers views over Barcelona and the Mediterranean Sea. Guests enjoy free access to the Spa. Rooms at La Florida feature free Wi-Fi access and 37-inch interactive plasma TVs. The bathrooms come with l’Occitane amenities, a bathtub and shower. Some also have a private balcony. Guests can admire the views from the La Florida’s panoramic terraces and gardens. The Spa by L'Occitane includes a stainless steel swimming pool, both indoor and outdoor. A hot tub, sauna, pressure showers and a range of fitness equipment are also available. The hotel’s restaurant serves gourmet Catalan, Spanish and Mediterranean dishes. There are also 2 bars.

name: W Barcelona
address: Plaça Rosa Dels Vents, 1, 08039 Barcelona
description: Step inside. See for yourself. Designed by world-renowned architect Ricardo Bofill, W Barcelona sets the scene for a spectacular stay. W Barcelona is a luxury hotel offering a combination of luxury and comfort in each of its 473 fabulous guestrooms and suites. This 5-star hotel is located on the beachfront along the famous Barceloneta Boardwalk. Each guest room and suite provide panoramic views over the Mediterranean Sea and the city of Barcelona.Marriott

name: Gran Hotel Miramar Gl
address: Paseo Reding, 22, 29016 Málaga, Andalusia
description: The luxurious Gran Hotel Miramar GL is set in a listed XX century building and is located in Malaga, 10 metres from La Malagueta Beach. This beachfront hotel has a spa centre and a seasonal pool. Featuring views of the beach, the garden, or the city, the elegant rooms at this hotel are air conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and an entertainment media library, as well as Bluetooth sound system, USB and HDMI connections. All rooms are fitted with a private bathroom equipped with a bath, mirror with temperature and clock and Bulgari toiletries. The hotel restaurant Príncipe de Asturias offers International cuisine with a Mediterranean touch, as well as an informal snack bar. It also has roof-top chill-out terrace where guests can enjoy drinks, and stunning sea view. Breakfast is served at the pool level and it consist on an extensive buffet offering a great variety of fruit, cold meat and cheese, pastry, and a show-cooking part for your on-demand requests. Other facilities include a children's pool and a seasonal miniclub, or a wide range of meeting and conference rooms. Alcazaba is 700 metres from Gran Hotel Miramar GL, and the city centre is a 10-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 9 km from the property.

name: Essence Hotel Boutique by Don Paquito
address: Avenida Del Lido S/N, Málaga, Andalusia
description: The Essence Hotel Boutique by Don Paquito is situated in Torremolinos, 100 meters from Playamar and Bajondillo beaches and the seaside promenade. A swimming pool, hot tub and free hammam are featured. Their air-conditioned and heated rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, kettle, coffee maker, safe and minibar. The private bathroom includes hair dryer, bathrobe, shower and free toiletries. The hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool, sun terrace, a hot tub and a turkish bath. Their buffet restaurant offers a range of culinary options. Free WiFi is featured. The Essence Hotel Boutique by Don Paquito is within easy reach of all kinds of attractions, places of interest and the renowned nightlife. Malaga Airport is 12 minutes drive away.

name: Hotel Best Siroco
address: Carril del Siroco, s/n, 29630 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Hotel Best Siroco is situated just 250 metres from Torre Bermeja Beach. Set in gardens, this hotel has 2 seasonal outdoor swimming pools and rooms with balconies. Hotel Best Siroco has brightly decorated rooms with wooden floors and furnishings. Each room has a TV and air conditioning. Free WiFi is available. Buffet meals and Spanish dishes are prepared and served in Best Siroco’s restaurant with its show kitchen. Guests can enjoy a drink in the terrace bar, where there is free WiFi access. Gluten-free food is available. Facilities include a gym, and a Turkish bath and sauna are available at an extra cost. Hotel Best Siroco is just 10 minutes’ walk from Torre Bermeja Marina and Torrequebrada Golf Course is approximately 3 km away.

name: Sunset Beach Club Hotel Apartments
address: Av. Del Sol, 5, Benalmádena, 29630 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Sunset Beach Club Hotel Apartments are located on the shores of the Mediterranean Sea, and feature 2 large outdoor pools, and 2 children’s pools. Facilities include 6 seasonal bars and restaurants, a large supermarket, and free wi-fi. All Apartments at the Sunset Beach Club have a balcony or terrace, fully equipped kitchenette, individually controlled air-conditioning/heating, satellite TV, and safe. A hair & beauty salon and fitness centre are also available (fees apply). Free guest activities and entertainment are offered all year round. Guests can enjoy hot buffet breakfasts and dinners inside the Oasis Restaurant. A la carte lunches and dinners, afternoon snacks and cocktails, are available at La Terraza terrace restaurant. The Panorama Bar boasts spectacular sea views, and shows live international sports on TV.

name: Gloria Palace Amadores Thalasso & Hotel
address: La Palma, 2, 35139 Puerto Rico, Gran Canaria
description: Gloria Palace Amadores is set on a cliff top, between Gran Canaria’s Puerto Rico and Amadores Beaches. This luxury spa hotel offers 2 outdoor pools and spectacular Atlantic Ocean views. Gloria Palace, one of the largest thalasotheraphy centres in Europe, offers a seawater pool, massage and various treatments. There is a sauna, Turkish bath and physiotherapy pool. Air-conditioned rooms have a private balcony with sea views. There is satellite TV, and you can hire the safe and minibar. Guests have access to free Wi-Fi in their room and throughout the hotel. Tennis coaching is available on the floodlit tennis court. There is a gym, and you can play table tennis, bowls, archery and darts. Children have their own swimming pool, playground and mini-club. Evening shows are provided for both adults and children. Amadores has a buffet restaurant with show cooking and nightly themed buffets are offered. There are several bars, including a piano bar and pool bar. Gloria Palace has a 24-hour reception and offers car hire. Free parking is offered.

name: Servatur Puerto Azul
address: Avda. de la Cornisa, 13, 35130 Puerto Rico, Gran Canaria
description: When you stay at Servatur Puerto Azul in Mogan, you'll be by the ocean, a 3-minute drive from Amadores Beach and 8 minutes from Puerto Rico Marina. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Bull Reina Isabel & Spa
address: Alfredo L. Jones 40, 35008 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Gran Canaria
description: Located on the beachfront of Las Canteras Beach in Las Palmas, Reina Isabel has a rooftop pool, a free spa and gym, and a sun terrace overlooking the Atlantic. Free parking and Wi-Fi are offered. All air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Reina Isabel feature parquet floors and a balcony. They are equipped with flat-screen satellite TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. The hotel serves a buffet breakfast which includes cava, vodka and fresh orange juice. There are also buffet dinners and a an à la carte-restaurant. The hotel has a poolside bar and a beachfront terrace bar. Parasols, towels and loungers can be provided for use at the beach for free. El Muelle Cinema is 5 minutes’ walk from the Reina Isabel, and you can drive to Las Palmeras Golf Course in 8 minutes. Gran Canaria Airport is around 25 minutes’ drive away.

name: Gloria Palace San Agustin Thalasso & Hotel
address: Calle Las Margaritas, Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Set 600 metres from Las Burras Beach in Gran Canaria, the luxurious Gloria Palace San Agustin offers a rooftop pool with sea views. It features a spa and rooms with a balcony, the hotel has been completely renovated in 2021. Rooms at the Gloria Palace Hotel San Agustin have a simple design and include air conditioning. Most of them enjoy sea views. Free WiFi is available. Gloria Palace has outdoor pools for children and adults, surrounded by gardens and sun terraces with loungers. You can also play padel and tennis, or use the gym, for an extra cost. The rooftop pool also carries a surcharge. The property also offers an on-site bicycle shop, where you can buy equipment and rent a bicycle. Free shuttle buses run to Playa del Inglés and Maspalomas beaches. The Maspalomas Golf Course is 5 km away and special discounts apply to guests at the Gloria Palace Hotel Gran Canaria.

name: Lopesan Costa Meloneras Resort & Spa
address: Mar Mediterraneo 1, 35100 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Set 800 metres from Gran Canaria’s Maspalomas Beach, this luxury complex features a spa, casino and heated lagoon-style swimming pools set in tropical gardens. Each room has a private balcony. Rooms at the Lopesan Costa Meloneras Resort & Spa are spacious and elegant, with marble floors and air conditioning. They all have satellite TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and bathrobes. The Costa Meloneras Resort’s stylish Ambassador restaurant serves nouvelle cuisine. The complex also offers buffet restaurants, cafés and a cocktail bar. The Lopesan Spa offers a hydrotherapy circuit and salt grotto. A wide range of wellness treatments is available. The complex also features an artificial beach and sun terraces with loungers. Situated next to Maspalomas Lighthouse, the Lopesan Costa Meloneras Resort is a 10-minute walk from Maspalomas Dunes. The hotel offers a free shuttle service to Meloneras Golf Course, just 1.5km away.

name: Hotel Riu Palace Oasis
address: Plaza De Las Palmeras 2, 35106 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Hotel Riu Palace Oasis is located on Maspalomas Beach and offers direct access to the beach, large lush garden, 3 heated pools and a spa center. The hotel also offers a gym and evening entertainment. There is also a children's pool, playground and a RiuLand Kids club. Air-conditioned rooms come with a kettle and a private bathroom with a shower, double sink and vanity mirror. A hairdryer, bathrobe and free toiletries are provided. Playa del Ingles is 6 km from the accommodation, while Maspalomas is 2.4 km away. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 36 km from Hotel Riu Palace Oasis.

name: H10 Playa Meloneras Palace
address: Mar Caspio, 5, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: H10 Playa Meloneras Palace is next to Meloneras Beach and Golf Course in southern Gran Canaria. It has 3 swimming pools, a sun terrace, spa and striking design inspired by Antoni Gaudí. The rooms at the H10 Meloneras feature tiled floors and typical Mediterranean décor. They all come with a private balcony and satellite TV. The hotel’s Tamadaba buffet restaurant offers show cooking and international food. Gaudí Restaurant serves à la carte meals, and there is also a poolside bar-café and 2 other bars. Leisure facilities at the H10 Gran Canaria include tennis courts and a mini club for children. The lively resort of Playa del Inglés is around 10 minutes’ drive from the Hotel Playa Meloneras. Gran Canaria Airport is just 25 minutes’ drive away.

name: Atlantic Mirage Suites & Spa - Adults Only
address: Eucaliptus, 4, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Located in Puerto de la Cruz, 1.5 KM from Martiánez Beach, Hotel Atlantic Mirage Suites & SPA offers an all year round swimming pool and free WiFi. All air-conditioned (cold/warm air subject to seasonality)rooms feature a balcony with sea view. Guests will find a private bathroom with shower and hairdryer and a flat TV with Satellite Channels. All units include a seating area with a sofa. The buffet restaurant Mirage offers a wide range of international options. Guests can also have a drink at the bar. Jardín Botánico and Puerto de la Cruz city centre are 1 Km from the property. The rearest airport is airport is Tenerife Norte Airport, 26 Km from the property.

name: H10 Atlantic Sunset
address: Avenida Adeje 300 Playa Paraiso, 38678 Callao Salvaje, Tenerife
description: No description found

name: Corallium Dunamar by Lopesan Hotels - Adults Only
address: Calle Helsinki, 8, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: The Corallium Dunamar by Lopesan Hotel, recently refurbished, is 200 metres from Playa del Inglés Beach, in southern Gran Canaria. Surrounded by tropical gardens, it features an outdoor pool complex. Set in a modern, pyramid-shaped building, the Dunamar Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV. The minibar and safe can be rented, and most rooms have a private balcony. Regional and international cuisine is offered in the hotel restaurant, and there are 2 poolside snack bars. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from the lively Yumbo Centre. Maspalomas Dunes are 20 minutes’ walk from the hotel, and Maspalomas Golf Course is 2 km away.

name: Bohemia Suites & Spa - Adults Only
address: Avenida Estados Unidos, 28, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: This hotel is located about 150 m from the beach. Guests will also find restaurants, bars and links to the public transport network around 150 m from the hotel. It lies 400 m from Yumbo, with its 2 shopping centres and nightspots and is just 500 m from the centre of Playa del Ingles. The hotel is 18 km from Vecindario. Facilities The establishment comprises a total of 95 accommodation units. Guests of the establishment are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. Lift access is provided to the upper floors. Services such as a safe and currency exchange facilities make for a comfortable stay. Internet access and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant and a bar. Shopping facilities are available. A garden is among the features contributing to a pleasant stay. Guests travelling in their own vehicles can make use of the available parking spaces (for a fee). Additional services include medical assistance, room service and a laundry. A bicycle hire service (for a fee) gives guests the opportunity to explore the surrounding area independently. Rooms All accommodation units feature air conditioning, a living room and a bathroom. Most rooms feature a balcony or terrace. Many of the rooms also offer a sea view, adding to the ambience. Each accommodation unit features separate bedrooms or a king-size bed. A safe and a minibar also feature. Tea and coffee making equipment is included as standard. Each accommodation unit offers internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio, a stereo system and wireless internet access. Each of the bathrooms features a shower, a bathtub, a hairdryer and bathrobes. Sports/Entertainment The swimming pool is ideal for a refreshing dip. A terrace, a sun terrace, sun loungers and parasols are available. A hot tub provides an opportunity for relaxation. There is also a poolside snack bar. For those wishing to enjoy some exercise, tennis and golf are offered onsite. A gym and squash are some of the sports and leisure options available at the establishment. The establishment offers various wellness options, including a spa and a sauna, or for a fee, a steam bath, a hammam, a beauty salon and massage treatments. Meals Various meals and board options are bookable. Guests can choose from breakfast, dinner, B & B and half board. Guests can enjoy the show cooking, during which the chefs create delicious specialities. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the establishment: American Express, VISA, Diners Club and MasterCard.WebBeds

name: Hotel Riu Palace Tres Islas
address: Avenida Grandes Playas, 35660 Corralejo, Fuerteventura
description: Set in Corralejo, a few steps from Playa del Pozo, Hotel Riu Palace Tres Islas offers accommodation with three restaurants, free private parking, two outdoor swimming pools and a children's pool. With three bars, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. The units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All guest rooms feature a wardrobe. Guests at Hotel Riu Palace Tres Islas can enjoy a buffet breakfast. The accommodation offers 4-star accommodation with a fitness centre, hot tub and sauna. Parque Natural de Corralejo is 100 metres from Hotel Riu Palace Tres Islas, while Las Agujas is 2.1 km away. The nearest airport is Fuerteventura Airport, 29 km from the hotel.

name: Abora Catarina by Lopesan Hotels
address: Avenida de Tirajana, 1, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Abora Catarina by Lopesan is located in Playa del Inglés, 250 metres from the Maspalomas Sand Dunes. This hotel features a buffet restaurant, bars, 5 outdoor swimming pools, and fitness centre. All rooms have air conditioning, TV, telephone and sofa bed. The Double Family Pool and Double Deluxe Pool rooms have a terrace and private pool. The Double Superior room with hydromassage and terrace and the Double Garden room have a terrace with garden view. The hotel has a 24-hour front desk and a shared terrace. Guests can also enjoy the games room and there is a playground for children. Gran Canarias Airport is located a 20-minute drive from Abora Catarina by Lopesan, and the city of Las Palmas is 55 km away.

name: Barceló Fuerteventura Castillo
address: Avenida Del Castillo, 35610 Antigua, Fuerteventura
description: Canary Island paradise right on the seafrontThe Barcelo Castillo Beach Resort is a hotel especially for families or water sports enthusiasts set in the tranquillity and beauty of Caleta de Fuste. It is located near the airport and the capital of Fuerteventura Puerto del Rosario.This exclusive establishment has modern bungalows and studios next to the beach. They are large and fully equipped to make you feel at home and have been recently refurbished while retaining the traditional Canary Island style. It is a unique resort for sports lovers especially fans of scuba diving and windsurfing but also for those who love golf beach volleyball or any other water sport or outdoor activity. The hotel has several buffet or a la carte restaurants bars and a theatre with a programme to suit audiences of all ages. In addition there is a luxurious USpa for visitors who want to relax and try out the most innovative health and beauty treatments or work out in the fitness studio. There is a kids club offering an endless range of activities and three great swimming pool areas which are also for adults.Barcelo.com

name: Hotel Riu Palace Jandia
address: Playa de Jandia, 35265 Pájara, Fuerteventura
description: Facing the beachfront, Hotel Riu Palace Jandia offers 5-star accommodation in Playa Jandia and has 2 bars and terrace. Featuring 2 restaurants, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, evening entertainment and a 24-hour front desk. Guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at Hotel Riu Palace Jandia. Spa and wellness facilities are at guests' disposal during their stay at the accommodation.The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at this 5-star hotel. Costa Calma is 18 km from Hotel Riu Palace Jandia, while Morro del Jable is 200m from the property. The nearest airport is Fuerteventura Airport, 82 km from the hotel.

name: Resort Cordial Santa Águeda & Perchel Beach Club
address: Urbanización Sector IV, El Pajar, 35128 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Located in La Playa de Arguineguín in the Canary Islands region and Playa Santa Agueda reachable within 600 metres, Resort Cordial Santa Águeda & Perchel Beach Club provides accommodation with free WiFi, a children's playground, a rooftop pool and free private parking. Each unit comes with a terrace, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and bathrobes. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Guests at the holiday home can enjoy a buffet breakfast. The restaurant at Resort Cordial Santa Águeda & Perchel Beach Club serves Japanese, Mediterranean and international cuisine. The accommodation offers a range of wellness facilities including a spa facilities, a fitness room and a solarium. Guests will find a 24-hour front desk, a business centre and housekeeping service at the property. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Resort Cordial Santa Águeda & Perchel Beach Club. Playa Arguineguín is 2.2 km from the holiday home, while Playa Las Marañuelas is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 39 km from Resort Cordial Santa Águeda & Perchel Beach Club.

name: Occidental Jandía Mar
address: C/ Playa Del Jable, 35625 Pájara, Fuerteventura
description: When you stay at Occidental Jandía Mar in Pajara, you'll be near the beach, within a 15-minute walk of Las Gaviotas beach and Matorral Beach. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Planning an event in Pajara? This hotel has 10204 square feet (948 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Dreams Lanzarote Playa Dorada Resort & Spa
address: Urbanización Costa Del Papagayo, 35580 Arrecife, Lanzarote
description: Located in Playa Blanca, Dreams Lanzarote Playa Dorada Resort & Spa offers beachfront accommodation 200 metres from Playa Dorada and provides various facilities, such as a bar, a shared lounge and a garden. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property also features with a restaurant, a water park and a year-round outdoor pool. The accommodation offers evening entertainment and room service. At the hotel, each room comes with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a rain shower. A buffet breakfast is available daily at Dreams Lanzarote Playa Dorada. The accommodation offers a children playground. You can play billiards, table tennis and darts at Dreams Lanzarote Playa Dorada Resort & Spa. A car rental service is available at the property. Playa Blanca is less than 1 km from the hotel, while Flamingo Beach is 2.1 km away. The nearest airport is Lanzarote, 35 km from Dreams Lanzarote Playa Dorada, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Bahia Principe Sunlight San Felipe
address: Avenida de Colon, 22, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Bahia Principe San Felipe is located on the seafront, just 400 metres from the Martíanez Lakes. It offers a spa, tennis courts, and heated outdoor pools set in subtropical gardens. The spacious, air-conditioned rooms are tastefully decorated, and most have views of El Teide Volcano or the Atlantic Ocean. Each room has satellite TV and a private bathroom. The buffet restaurant offers international cuisine, while Italian and Mediterranean dishes are served in the 2 à la carte restaurants. You can relax with a drink from the poolside bar. Bahia Principe San Felipe’s spa includes an indoor pool, gym, sauna and hot tub. A range of relaxing massages and beauty treatments are available. The hotel is situated in central Puerto de la Cruz, a 25-minute walk from Playa Jardín Beach. Limited parking places are available under an additional cost. Not possible to book in advance. Tenerife Norte Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Esmeralda Maris
address: Calle Punta Del Roquito, 1, 35627 Costa Calma, Fuerteventura
description: Just 500 metres from Costa Calma Beach, the Hotel Esmeralda Maris by LIVVO bungalow complex offers gardens with an outdoor pool, a pool bar and a sun terrace. Located in a peaceful, residential area, there are panoramic views of Sotavento Beach. The complex features a spa and a gym, and for a supplement, a sauna, Turkish baths and massages. On the beach you can take diving or surfing classes. The Hotel Esmeralda Maris by LIVVO restaurant has a selection of international and regional cuisine in a buffet-type service. You can also start your day with the Esmeralda buffet breakfast. Hotel Esmeralda Maris by LIVVO has an internet café, which offers free Wi-Fi for guests during opening hours. The complex is situated beside a natural park while the commercial centre of the resort is just one kilometre away.

name: Europe Villa Cortes
address: Avenida Rafael Puig, 38, 38660 Arona, Tenerife
description: Europe Villa Cortes GL is located on the seafront in southern Tenerife’s Playa de las Américas resort. It offers a fitness room, spa, 6 restaurants and luxurious rooms with private balconies. The Villa Cortes GL is styled in the manner of a luxurious Mexican mansion. Rooms feature custom-made Mexican furniture, satellite TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. The Villa Cortes GL has a beach club restaurant and a variety of gourmet dining options. There are also 3 bars, including a beach bar. A buffet breakfast is offered and half-board rates include dishes from the specific daily menu of the half-board restaurant. The hotel’s outdoor pool features a waterfall and a children’s area. There is also a tennis court and a sun terrace with Balinese beds. Las Américas Golf Course is just 5 minutes’ drive from the Villa Cortés. Guests can also drive to Tenerife Sur Airport in 20-25 minutes. The hotel will remain completely closed for improvements to its facilities from May 2 to May 17, 2024

name: Barceló Fuerteventura Mar
address: Avenida de El Castillo, 35610 Caleta de Fuste, Fuerteventura
description: Quality and comfort with a Canary Island soulThe Barcelo Fuerteventura Thalasso Spa hotel is built on Caleta de Fuste Beach. Basking in the tranquillity of the bay it offers the perfect destination for unwinding with the family. Its proximity to the marina also makes El Castillo a great place to discover new sports and leisure.It has 462 rooms that are spacious and full of natural light in a modern functional style. The rooms are also fully equipped so that guests have everything they need to enjoy their holiday to the full. Parents have the tranquillity of taking their children to the modern childrens miniclub that has a pirate theme or to the magnificent theatre with daily shows. Couples and groups of friends can enjoy the endless variety of water sports and outdoor activities on offer as well as the hotel restaurants bars and its famous thalassotherapy centre unique in Fuerteventura where they can have the latest type of treatments. The Fuerteventura Thalasso Spa is designed so that its guests can discover new experiences while they enjoy the beautiful surroundings peaceful beaches and welcoming locals or while they simply sit back and enjoy their holiday in this privileged location.Barcelo.com

name: H10 Rubicón Palace
address: Urb. Montaña Roja, 35580 Playa Blanca, Lanzarote
description: H10 Rubicón Palace is set in white-washed buildings around a lagoon-style pool in the Lanzarote fishing village of Playa Blanca. Overlooking La Mulata Beach, it features a spa and 10 restaurants and bars. Each air-conditioned room at the H10 Rubicon Palace Hotel is spacious and bright. All rooms have flat-screen TVs with satellite channels. Guests can hire beach towels at reception. Two buffet restaurants offer show cooking and themed dinners. À la carte options include The Steakhouse, which offers American specialties; the Dolce Vita features Italian cuisine and Sakura serves fusion-oriental cuisine. Guests can also enjoy a drink at the Piano Bar, Sports Bar, Mike's Coffee, or La Choza pool bar. The Despacio Spa has an indoor pool with hydromassage beds, Turkish baths and a sauna. There is also a gym and treatment booths. For children there are clubs for different ages, with entertainment provided, as well as Daisy Adventure, which offers a pirate ship and water games. There are regular ferries to the neighboring island of Fuerteventura from Playa Blanca Port, 10 minutes’ drive from the Hotel H10 Rubicon Palace.

name: Hotel Beatriz Playa & Spa
address: C/ Mato nº 2 - Puerto Del Carmen, Puerto Del Carmen, 35510 Tías, Lanzarote
description: Offering rooms with balconies, the Beatriz Playa is set on Puerto de Carmen’s Matagorda Beach, 3 km from Lanzarote Aiport. It features an outdoor pool and spa. Each air-conditioned room at the Playa has simple décor and satellite TV. All come with a private bathroom, small fridge and safety deposit box. Mediterranean cuisine is on offer at the buffet restaurant, which features an attractive terrace. The Davao bar serves snacks by the pool and there is also a piano bar, and a lounge bar. The spa features an indoor hydromassage pool, a sauna and hot tub. Treatments on offer include massage and facials, and there is also a gym. The centre of Puerto de Carmen is less than 10 minutes’ drive from the Beatriz Playa and the nearest golf club is just 6 km away.

name: Allegro Isora
address: Avenida De La Gaviota, 1, 36680 Guía de Isora, Tenerife
description: Set just 10 minutes’ walk from La Arena Beach in the south-west of Tenerife, Allegro Isora (formerly Barceló Varadero) features 3 outdoor pools, a children’s pool and a wellness centre. Air-conditioned rooms come with a private balcony or terrace, living area, satellite TV and a private bathroom. Free WiFi is available in all rooms. Allegro Isora's wellness centre includes a sauna, treatment rooms and a fitness centre. Offering games and activities in the water, one of the swimming pools features a slide suitable for adults and children. There is also a kid’s club and entertainment programme, as well as a tennis court and ping pong tables. The hotel features a buffet restaurant, a lounge bar and snack bar. The impressive Los Gigantes Cliffs are just 10 minutes’ drive from the property.

name: Bull Costa Canaria & Spa - Only Adults
address: Las Retamas, 1, 35100 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
