description: Located right on the seafront in San Agustín, The Bull Hotel & Spa Costa Canaria - Adults Only features outdoor pools, a rooftop sun terrace, a fully equipped gym and a spa. Free WiFi is available in public areas. Rooms are modern and come with satellite TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Some offer views of San Agustín beach and its stunning sunsets. The Bull Hotel & Spa Costa Canaria - Adults Only spa features a floating pool, water massage beds, Finnish sauna and Hammam. There is also a jet pool, salt cabin and tanning beds. Guests can enjoy relaxation and beauty treatments, including massages, for an extra cost. The hotel offers a 24-hour library with internet access, and guests can read national and international daily press free of charge. Costa Canaria’s buffet restaurant and poolside bar serves regional and international dishes. The Salón Bar offers snacks, music and cocktails. The resort of Playa del Inglés is less than 3 km away.

name: Landmar Costa Los Gigantes
address: Calle Juan Manuel Capdevielle, 8, 38683 Santiago del Teide, Tenerife
description: Located in Puerto de Santiago, 1.1 km from Playa de Santiago, Landmar Costa los Gigantes offers accommodation with a garden, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and an ATM, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel provides an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, nightclub and a kids' club. At the hotel every room comes with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bath, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Landmar Costa los Gigantes every room has bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, vegetarian and gluten-free options. The accommodation offers a children's playground. You can play table tennis, mini-golf and tennis at this 4-star hotel, and bike hire and car hire are available. Popular points of interest near Landmar Costa los Gigantes include La Arena Beach, Puerto Santiago Beach and Los Gigantes Beach. The nearest airport is Tenerife South Airport, 41 km from the hotel.

name: Gold by Marina - Adults Only
address: Avenida de Los Estados Unidos, 15, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Gold Playa del Ingles - Adults Only is located 500 metres from the beach in Playa del Inglés. This modern hotel has a spacious pool area with stylish design, 2 pools, a hot tub and lots of loungers. The air-conditioned rooms at this adults-only hotel feature cool, white décor with turquoise details. Each one has free WiFi, a flat-screen TV and a mini-kitchenette with a hob, microwave and toaster. All rooms have a private balcony or terrace, and some have sea views. The hotel's restaurant serves an extensive daily buffet breakfast until 12:00. You can enjoy lunch by the pool, and the bar serves cocktails. The hotel's large Planetarium chill-out area with suspended orbs hanging from the ceiling and is a great place to relax with a cocktail. The lively Yumbo Shopping Centre is just 5 minutes' walk from the hotel. You can walk to Maspalomas Sand Dunes in around 10 minutes.

name: Dreams Jardin Tropical Resort & Spa
address: Calle Gran Bretana, Costa Adeje, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Dreams Jardin Tropical Resort & Spa is located in Adeje’s coast, offering spectacular views of the Atlantic Ocean and La Gomera. The luxurious facilities include 12,000 m2 of gardens. Each elegant room has a balcony or terrace with outdoor furniture, flat-screen TV with satellite channels, minibar, and safe. The private bathroom includes a bath or shower and hairdryer. Free WiFi is available throughout. There is an a-la-carte and a buffet restaurant on site, as well as a snack bar and several lounges. The nearest beach is 400 metres from Dreams Jardin Tropical Resort & Spa. Siam Park is a 3-minute drive from the property, and Tenerife Sur Airport is 15 minutes away by car. - The establishment offers Preferred Club®, with preferential status and exclusive services such as: - access to the Preferred Club Lounge with a selection of snacks and drinks during the day, - exclusive concierge service, selection of the best rooms including superior attributes, - among other special advantages.

name: Royal Hideaway Corales Beach - Adults Only, by Barceló Hotel Group
address: Avenida Virgen de Guadalupe 21, 38679 Adeje, Tenerife
description: All rooms are very spacious Junior Suites with sea views.A wide gastronomic offerMARESIA GASTRONOMIC SPACE led by the prestigious canarian chef Juan Carlos Padron winner of 1 Michelin star and 2 Soles Repsol.NAO ATLANTIC FOOD EXPERIENCE Atlantic buffet style restaurant breakfast and dinner.SAN HO A la carte restaurant specialized in Nikkei fusion cuisine Japanese Peruvian. STARFISH A la carte restaurant specialized in rice dishes fish and grilled meat. LA GELATERIA Traditional Italian ice cream shop.*1.000 m2 Spa and Wellness centre a unique area in which to enjoy an extensive array of massages and treatments.Barcelo.com

name: Regency Torviscas Apartments Suites
address: Cataluña 2, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Set around a shared swimming pool, 1.5 km from the beach in Adeje, Regency Torviscas Apartments and Suites offers apartments with sea views. This aparthotel features an on-site spa. All accommodation has a furnished private terrace, as well as a living room with a flat-screen satellite TV, DVD player and sofa bed. The kitchen is equipped with an oven, microwave, coffee machine and kettle. There is a bathroom with a shower, bathrobe and hairdryer. Bed linen and towels are included. The spa includes a sauna and massage services, available for an extra cost. A fitness centre, bar and games room can also be found at the property. Free WiFi is available in public areas. Siam Park Waterpark is 3 km from Regency Torviscas Apartments and Suites and Las Americas Golf Course is 4 km away. Tenerife South Airport is 18 km from the property.

name: Barceló Tenerife
address: Avd. Grenamora, No. 1, Urb. San Blas, 38639 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility. Barcelo Tenerife has 331 fully equipped rooms; a buffet restaurant; La Proa gourmet restaurant; four bars and the Magma performance hall. It also includes other original proposals for leisure and rest such as a navigable lake; a climbing wall; a gym; a recreational sports area with a beach volleyball court; basketball; handball and paddle tennis; eight swimming pools /two of which are heated throughout the year/ and a Wellness areaBarcelo.com

name: Barceló Fuerteventura Royal Level
address: Avenida Del Castillo, 35610 Antigua, Fuerteventura
description: The perfect place to rest.The Barcelo Castillo Royal Level is located right on the beachfront at Caleta de Fuste in Fuerteventura where you can enjoy relaxing walks by the sea with the best views of the Atlantic. The tranquillity of the area and the beauty of the beach make it the perfect destination for families and groups of friends wanting to combine rest with fun during their holidays. There is a marina in the area offering a large range of water sports such as Jet Skis Windsurfing and a Diving School. There are 30 bright spacious apartments with fully equipped modern kitchens. Guests have the added benefit of being on the Barcelo Castillo Beach Resort complex and being able to enjoy all the facilities on offer as well as the Thalassotherapy Centre in the Barcelo Fuerteventura Thalasso Spa. Discover the best local gastronomy in our recently opened restaurant.Barcelo.com

name: Barceló Teguise Beach - Adults only
address: Plaza Janubio s/n, 35508 Costa, Lanzarote - Costa Teguise, 35509 Costa Teguise, Lanzarote
description: This completely refurbished 4 adults only hotel provides stylish elegance and breathtaking sea views in Lanzarote.Barcelo Teguise Beach is a lifestyle oasis with all the modern facilities you need for a relaxing beachside holiday. Most of the romos feature a private hot tub.Combining fabulous facilities with excellent cuisine at the two on-site restaurants we guarantee you will enjoy an unforgettable adult break with your friends or partner.Barcelo.com

name: H10 Tenerife Playa
address: Avenida Colon, 12, Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: H10 Tenerife Playa is set opposite Martiánez Lake and just 50 metres from the sea, in Puerto De La Cruz. This stylish hotel features 2 restaurants and an outdoor pool. All rooms at the Tenerife Playa are bright and air conditioned. Each room has a TV and a fully equipped bathroom. Overlooking the sea, the Tenerife Playa’s El Drago restaurant features live show cooking, while El Lagar offers poolside dining. Guests can enjoy a drink on the terrace, or at the El Tinerfe bar. On the top floor, there is Despacio Beauty Center Wellness center including a fitness centre and a sundeck. Massages services, sauna and jet showers are available at an extra cost. The Playa is just 10 minutes’ walk from the centre of Puerto De La Cruz and 2 km from the nearest golf course. Mount Teide National Park can be reached in 40 minutes, by car.

name: HL Suitehotel Playa del Inglés - Adults Only
address: Avenida de Italia, 21, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Located 100 metres from Playa del Inglés Beach, HL Suitehotel Playa del Inglés offers an outdoor swimming pool and a rooftop sun terrace. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. Each air-conditioned room features a private balcony. It includes a flat-screen TV, a minibar, safe, and a kettle. The complex includes a large restaurant, offering regional dishes. HL Suitehotel Playa del Inglés also offers a poolside snack bar and live entertainment. Maspalomas Dunes, and the lively centre of Playa del Inglés, are within a 20-minute walk of HL Suitehotel Playa del Inglés. The Yumbo Centre is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Princesa Yaiza Suite Hotel Resort
address: Avenida de Papagayo, 22, 35570 Yaiza, Lanzarote
description: The Hotel Yaiza Suite Hotel Resort is set on the beachfront in Playa Blanca. This resort features 6 outdoor swimming pools, a Thalasso and spa centre, sports facilities and 8 restaurants. Each room at the Hotel Yaiza Suite Hotel Resort has a balcony or patio with sea views, or overlooking the pools or the gardens. All include a small kitchenette, flat-screen TV, and a bathrobe and slippers. A safe is available for a surcharge. Guests can enjoy the Thousand and One Nights seawater circuit at Hotel Yaiza’s Thalassotherapy centre for an extra charge. Hydro-massage jets, swan-necks, underwater music and color therapy are also available here, as well as a Turkish bath, treatment cabins, and a tea house. The fitness center has sports classes and a sauna free of charge. The restaurants at Hotel Yaiza Suite Resort serve buffet and individual choice cuisine. Mexican, Italian, Japanese and gourmet Spanish cuisine is offered within the resort. There is also a tapas and a poolside snack bar.

name: Lopesan Villa del Conde Resort & Thalasso
address: Mar Mediterraneo 7, 35100 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Lopesan Villa del Conde Resort offers a picturesque setting and ocean views from its setting on Meloneras Beach. It features a spa, large outdoor swimming pool and free private parking. The Lopesan is 800 metres from Maspalomas Nature Reserve. This large resort and spa has landscape gardens and spacious rooms. All air-conditioned rooms feature stylish décor with bright colours. Each has a balcony or terrace, satellite TV and a minibar. There are 5 restaurants including a buffet option, Mediterranean and an Italian restaurant. The Alpendre Salt Grill serves a large salad buffet, while the Patio Café offers cakes and crêpes. There are 6 bars, one offering live music. The spa covers 1, 200m² and is right on the sea front. It has Turkish baths, an African sauna, flotation pool and hydrothermal circuit. A range of treatments is available for an extra cost.

name: Hotel Livvo Risco Del Gato Suites
address: Calle Sicasumbre, 2, 35627 Costa Calma, Fuerteventura
description: The elegant Hotel LIVVO Risco del Gato Suites is situated 200 metres from Sotavento Beach in Costa Calma. Set within gardens, it is surrounded by swimming pools on different levels and offers a heated indoor pool. The suites feature air conditioning, a living room with satellite TV, a coffee-maker and a private bathroom with a whirlpool bath. Each has its own inner patio with an outdoor shower. There is also a terrace and small private garden. La Terraza del Gato restaurant offers á la carte Mediterranean cuisine and a breakfast buffet is served in the El Despertar restaurant. Guests can enjoy drinks in the El Mirador lobby-bar. Hotel LIVVO Risco del Gato Suites offers a spa and wellness centre complete with a gym, sauna, Turkish bath and hot tub. There is an indoor heated swimming pool, and massage services are also available. The town centre of Costa de Calma is 2 km away from the hotel with shops, restaurants and bars. Fuerteventura Airport is 66 km away. Please note that for stays of 7 nights or longer, half-board service, guest will have a free bottle of wine.

name: Radisson Blu Resort Lanzarote
address: Avda. Del Mar, 26, 35508 Costa Teguise, Lanzarote
description: Radisson Blu Resort, Lanzarote Adults Only is located next to Bastian Beach in Lanzarote’s Costa Teguise Resort. It offers 4 outdoor pools. The air-conditioned junior suites and suites at Radisson Blu Resort, Lanzarote Adults Only feature modern décor, satelite TV and a mini bar. Each one has a private bathroom with a hairdryer, and most come with a private balcony. The hotel’s Tremor Buffet Restaurant serves a range of international food. Sesto Senso restraunt is an al a cart italian restaurant and the Dono features a dancefloor and nightly entertainment. There is also a poolside snack bar and a beach bar with a stunning view to the Bastian beach. Radisson Blu Resort, Lanzarote Adults Only has a beauty and wellness centre offering a range of treatments. Cucharas Beach is around 20 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Central Arrecife and Lanzarote Airport are 15 minutes’ drive away. Please note that the hotel Radisson Blu resort Lanzarote will change to ADULTS ONLY +16 hotel from 01.05.2023

name: Hotel Cristina by Tigotan Las Palmas - Adults Only
address: Calle Gomera, 6, 35008 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Gran Canaria
description: Set overlooking Las Canteras Beach, Hotel Cristina by Tigotan Las Palmas - Adults Only features an outdoor swimming pool. Most of its rooms have a balcony with views of the city and Las Canteras Beach. The Cristina Las Palmas features bright, attractive décor. All rooms have flat-screen TVs with satellite channels, and a fully equipped bathroom. The Areaca restaurant serves à la carte dishes and offers impressive ocean views. The hotel also features a gym. Massage and beauty treatments are also on offer. The Cristina Las Palmas is just 50 metres from Puerto de La Luz Port, where ferries depart for Tenerife and the surrounding Canary Islands.

name: Sir Anthony
address: 3 Meandro, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Featuring direct access to Camisón Beach in Tenerife’s Playa de las Américas, this stylish hotel offers a spa and an outdoor pool. Air-conditioned rooms include a balcony with ocean views and free WiFi. The rooms at Sir Anthony feature parquet floors and modern, elegant décor. Each one has a flat-screen TV, safe and minibar. There is a pillow menu and the private bathroom comes with hairdryer. Some rooms have a private plunge pool. Guests receive a welcome glass of cava on arrival. The Windsor Restaurant serves Mediterranean dishes, and it also features a terrace. There is a poolside juice bar and a private beach club offering live music. Guests can use the neighbouring Mare Nostrum’s spa, where you can find a hot tub, fitness centre and tennis courts. Las Américas Golf Course and Siam Park are 1 km away. Tenerife South Airport is 15 km from the hotel.

name: Iberostar Selection Sábila - Adults Only
address: Ernesto Sarti, 5, 38679 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Iberostar Sábila - Adults Only is located on Fañabe Beach on Tenerife’s Costa Adeje. It has large gardens. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. All rooms at Iberostar Sábila - Adults Only come with a balcony, as well as a private bathroom with hairdryer. There is also satellite TV in each room. Iberostar Sábila - Adults Only has a buffet-style restaurant as well as a selection of bars. These include the lobby bar with terrace and a poolside bar serving snacks and drinks. Guest will find a gourmet market on-site offering a unique gastronomic experience enlivened with music. The hotel offers a gym and the Spa Sensations offers a spa circuit and health and beauty treatments. The hotel is just 10 minutes’ walk from Puerto Colón, an area full of restaurants, bars and nightclubs. Tenerife South Airport is a 20-minute drive away from the hotel.

name: Ac Hotel Iberia Las Palmas
address: Avenida Alcalde J Ramirez Bethencourt 8, 35003 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Gran Canaria
description: AC Hotel Iberia Las Palmas has a privileged location in front of the marina in the historic district of Vegueta a few minutes from Triana Street and the Cathedral, emblems of the cultural center of the city. On the top floor of the hotel is the outdoor swimming pool with a 360º view and a rooftop sunbathing area, perfect for relaxing and enjoying your stay. Also, the AC Hotel Iberia Las Palmas has a Fitness Room, also on the top floor, where you can exercise with incomparable views of the island. Besides, the AC Iberia Las Palmas hotel has the AC Lounge on the ground floor, space where you can taste a selection of local dishes and tapas, organize different events or taste signature cocktails. Ideal for working or enjoying a good book. All rooms have air con and private bathroom fully equipped. Each of them is designed under the concept of functionality, to guarantee a unique experience. Our hotel in Las Palmas also has event rooms that can be used for business meetings, social gatherings and other events.Marriott

name: Hard Rock Hotel Tenerife
address: Avenida de Adeje 300, s/n, 38678 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Featuring an on-site night club and a beauty salon, Hard Rock Hotel Tenerife is located in Adeje and boasts 5-star accommodation. Guests also have exclusive access to the Rock Spa® and Superstar Pools. Guests can soak up the sun on the terrace or have a beverage at the bar. Facilities include complimentary wireless internet, an outdoor pool and outdoor tennis courts. The hotel also has its very own gym, Hard Rock Roxity Kids Club ™. Hard Rock Hotel Tenerife offers 624 rooms, all of which are fitted with an iPod docking station, a rain shower and a mini bar. Hot drinks can be brewed with the provided coffee and tea supplies. There is also a private balcony, an in-room safe and a flat-screen TV. Guests of the hotel are invited to sample seafood cuisine at Montauk, or try seafood and Asian meals at Narumi. Dining options at the hotel include Constant Grind Coffee Shop & Bar and Sessions. Other dining options are also available. Hard Rock Hotel Tenerife is within easy reach of Adeje’s popular restaurants, clubs and nightlife. For those with a car, parking is available on site and Costa Adeje is a short drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Hotel Livvo Volcán Lanzarote
address: El Castillo, 1, 35580 Playa Blanca, Lanzarote
description: Hotel LIVVO Volcán Lanzarote is located next to Lanzarote’s Marina Rubicón Port and 900 metres from Playa Blanca. It offers 5 swimming pools, a spa and a gym. Free WiFi is available throughout. All large, air-conditioned rooms at the Volcán Hotel have a separate seating area. They offer views of the marina or the pool and gardens. Satellite TV is provided in all units. The hotel features an adults-only area called Club Volcán, with exclusive rooms offering special treatments and services. The hotel has 4 restaurants, serving a range of international food. There is also a poolside bar where you can get a snack or a drink. The Lanzarote’s spa features a hot tub, a water bubble bed and Turkish bath. You can also use nearby tennis and paddle courts for free. Hotel LIVVO Volcán Lanzarote is 10 km from Timanfaya National Park and 30 minutes away from the international airport of Arrecife.

name: Sheraton Fuerteventura Beach, Golf & Spa Resort
address: Avenida De Las Marismas No. 1, 35610 Caleta de Fuste, Fuerteventura
description: Ideally located on the eastern coast of Fuerteventura, one of the Canary Islands that is especially renowned for its idyllic beaches and warm temperature all year round. Sheraton Fuerteventura Beach, Golf & Spa Resort has 266 comfortable rooms and suites designed in elegant Canarian style with private terraces. Our 5-star hotel is home to excellent restaurants offering delicious gastronomic experiences. Guests recharge in the 1,000 m2 wellness center, Hespérides Thalasso spa with a state-of-the-arts thermal circuit and 12 treatment cabins. Yambaland kid´s club offers hours of fun for children with plenty of creative activities. The rest of the leisure facilities include: 4 swimming pools, a fitness center, a tennis court, a mini golf, access to the beach and access to the close by Fuerteventura Golf Club. The selection of meeting rooms with natural sunlight are ideal for hosting any type of social events or meetings.Marriott

name: H10 Playa Esmeralda - Adults Only
address: Punta del Roquito, 2, 35627 Costa Calma, Fuerteventura
description: Offering impressive views of the Atlantic Ocean, H10 Playa Esmeralda is set directly on Costa Calma Beach. This hotel features a spa and bright, air-conditioned accommodation with balconies. Each of the Esmeralda’s rooms has simple décor and tiled flooring. All rooms have satellite TV and a fully equipped bathroom. Mediterranean cuisine is on offer in the Jandia buffet restaurant, set in a striking dining room with a terrace overlooking the ocean. Snacks are served in the Maxorata poolside bar and free Wi-Fi is available in the lobby bar. The H10’s spa has a large indoor pool, hot tub, Turkish baths and a sauna. Treatments include massage and facials. The H10 Esmeralda Playa is a 5-minute walk from the centre of Costa Calma and Fuerteventura Airport is 50 km away.

name: Occidental Jandía Playa
address: C/ Sancho Panza, 35625 Pájara, Fuerteventura
description: Established in 2004 and located in Pajara, Occidental Jandia Playa features a rooftop terrace, plus views of Fuerteventura. It provides beach views and complimentary Wi-Fi. The hotel has a fitness centre with a swimming pool. For those travelling with children Occidental Jandia Playa offers supervised child care/activities, a kids pool and a kids club. Occidental Jandia Playa features 498 air conditioned rooms filled with all the essentials to ensure an enjoyable stay. Each comes with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, as well as a private bathroom. Guests of Occidental Jandia Playa can wake up to a satisfying breakfast each morning at Morro Jable Snack Restaurant, as well as dinner at Corralejo Buffet Restaurant in the evening. There are a variety of cafés and restaurants near the hotel, and Costa Calma and Tarajalejo are an easy car trip away. La Lajita Oasis Park can be easily accessed by car.Revato

name: Hotel Riu Palace Palmeras
address: Avenida De Estados Unidos De America, 1, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Hotel Riu Palace Palmeras - All Inclusive has an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a fitness centre and bar in San Bartolomé. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant and a terrace. Each room includes a balcony. At the hotel, rooms come with a TV and a private bathroom. The rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Hotel Riu Palace Palmeras offers an on-site restaurant with a terrace, where guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Other facilities at the property include a pool bar and 2 heated swimming pools. A fitness centre and a kids playground are also available. Playa del Ingles is 600 metres from the accommodation, while Maspalomas is 2.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 27 km from Hotel Riu Palace Palmeras - All Inclusive.

name: Ole Tropical Tenerife
address: Calle Bolivia, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Olé Tropical Tenerife Adults Only is located in Playa de las Américas, 550 metres from the beach. It offers a gym and outdoor pools. The hotel has a buffet restaurant. There are 2 cocktail bars, one of which is by the pool area, and a bar with live music and a dancefloor. The air-conditioned rooms at Olé Tropical Tenerife Adults Only feature a flat-screen TV, a private balcony and a bathroom. There are many shops, restaurants and bars in the centre of Playa de las Américas, just a short walk away. Golf Las Américas Golf Course is 5 minutes' drive away.

name: SBH Royal Mónica
address: c/Irlanda, 1, 35570 Playa Blanca, Lanzarote
description: The hotel is located next to a small natural beach with small coves available to our guests. The hotel SBH Royal Mónica features expansive facilities with large, bright rooms decorated with modern and attractive furnishings. The gastronomy is another strength at the hotel SBH Royal Mónica and is present in different areas of the hotel (snack bar and restaurant). The centre of Playa Blanca is just 4 km away and you can get there if you wish by taking a pleasant walk along the maritime walkway next to the hotel or by public transport via the suburban trains. The paradisiacal beaches of Papagayo are approximately ten minutes away by car. Also quite close to the hotel (around 15 km) is the Timanfaya National Park, also known as Montañas de Fuego (Fire Mountains), and El Golfo, a picturesque fishing village where you can enjoy their rich gastronomic offering based on top quality fresh fish and seafood. If you'd like to visit the neighbouring island, Fuerteventura, there are several daily connections by boat from the Playa Blanca port. The journey only takes 20 minutes.Viajes Exito Hotels

name: H10 Big Sur Boutique Hotel
address: Avenida Juan Carlos I, 28, 38650 Los Cristianos, Tenerife
description: H10 Big Sur Boutique Hotel is situated on Tenerife and provides 4-star accommodation as well as miniature golf. It is also within walking distance of Los Cristianos's popular tourist spots. There are a variety of facilities available to those staying at the hotel, including sauna, kids pool and car hire. Staff are available 24/7 and can book tours and tickets. H10 Big Sur Boutique Hotel offers air conditioned rooms with an iPod docking station, a mini bar and luxury toiletries. They all include a flat-screen TV, a private balcony and bottled water. A satisfying breakfast is prepared every morning at H10 Big Sur Boutique Hotel, and there are numerous cafés and eateries close by. Los Cristianos's attractions, including Los Cristianos Harbour, are within easy walking distance of the hotel. Guests are able to visit Playa de las Americas and Adeje, situated within an easy drive of the property.Revato

name: Hotel Las Costas
address: Avenida De Las Playas 88, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Lanzarote
description: Located on Pocillos Beach, the rooms at Las Costas feature a private balcony, free WiFi, a microwave and fridge. It offers a gym, hot tub, and outdoor pool with sea views. The buffet restaurant at Hotel Las Costas features a terrace. There is a poolside bar with hammocks, which serves light refreshments. Gluten-free meals are available on request. The hotel has a games room with billards, darts and table tennis. There is also an entertainment programme for children. Wi-Fi is available in all bedrooms for an extra cost, and in reception for free. The hotel is situated in the tourist area of Puerto del Carmen with many services, shops and entertainment nearby. Lanzarote Airport is 4 km away.

name: Don Gregory by Dunas, Adults Only
address: Calle de Las Dalias, 11, San Agustin, Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Don Gregory by Dunas - Adults Only is next to Gran Canaria’s Las Burras Beach, in the San Agustín area of Playa del Inglés. It has an outdoor swimming pool and gym. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. All air-conditioned rooms at the Don Gregory have a private balcony/terrace with Atlantic Ocean views. Rooms feature satellite TV, and a minibar and safe are available to hire. Don Gregory by Dunas - Adults Only has gardens and sun terraces. There is a poolside snack bar and the on-site restaurant serves buffet meals, with regular themed dinners. The hotel is located 3 km from the centre of Playa del Inglés, in an area full of shops and bars. San Agustín Shopping Centre is opposite the hotel, and Maspalomas Golf Course is 4 km away. There is a 24-hour front desk, and parking is available for an extra charge.

name: Gf Victoria
address: Calle Fernando Lopez Arvelo, 1, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Located in Costa Adeje just 150 m from Playa del Duque Beach, GF Victoria offers 4 bathing areas and 2 restaurants. Free private parking is available on site. The 242 Suites offer a bedroom with ensuite bathroom, lounge area with separate WC, kettle, coffee-maker and minibar. Smart TV, safety deposit box, air-conditioning and amenities are provided. Free WiFi is available in public areas. Guests will find an adult pool, a family area and naturist pool on the property. GF Victoria also features a glass pool, with transparent walls and bottom which overhangs the façade of the hotel. Children will enjoy the aquatic park, which includes a surf pool. Guests will find sun loungers service. The wide gastronomic offer includes the cuisine of the à la carte restaurant Donaire, and the buffet restaurant Chaboco, where children can learn about healthy food choices. Guests can visit the chill-out Sky Bar Zambra only for adults. Plaza del Duque Shopping Centre is a 2-minute walk from the accommodation, while Gran Sur Shopping Centre is 1.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tenerife Sur Airport, 17 km from GF Victoria.

name: Iberostar Selection Lanzarote Park
address: Avenida Archipielago, 7, 35580 Yaiza, Lanzarote
description: This beachfront hotel is situated a short walk from the bay of Playa Flamingo, enjoying impressive views of the Atlantic Ocean around Lanzarote. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Rooms at Iberostar Selection Lanzarote Park feature a TV and the bathroom includes free toiletries. Beach towels, bathrobe and slippers, a Nespresso Coffee machine, kettle and free safe are provided in the Star Prestige rooms. This hotel features 4 outdoor swimming pools for adults and 3 for children. There is a free gym and sun terrace with sun loungers. The spa, available for a surcharge, includes a sauna, a hammam and a hot tub. Timanfaya National Park is 20 km from Iberostar Selection Lanzarote Park, and a 30-minute drive will take you to Lanzarote Airport.

name: Barceló Corralejo Bay - Adults Only
address: Avenida Grandes Playas, 12, 35660 Corralejo, Fuerteventura
description: The hotel Barcelo Corralejo Bay - Adults Only hotel 4 stars has an unparalleled location 80 m from the beach and 3 km from the Dunas de Corralejo Natural Park in the north of Fuerteventura. Only for adults aged 18 and older a heaven for anyone looking for relaxation and rest.Its 241 rooms are perfect for unwinding for a few days in the utmost tranquillity. The hotel has a wonderful U.Spa where you can enjoy a massage or hydromassage and keep in shape in the fitness studio or regain energy at the poolside bar-restaurant. For a romantic holiday by the shores of the Atlantic Ocean or a business trip in unbeatable surroundings well away from the daily grind Barcelo Corralejo Bay- Adults Only is undoubtedly the best choice for adults only.Barcelo.com

name: HD Beach Resort
address: Avenida Islas Canarias, s/n, 35509 Costa Teguise, Lanzarote
description: Located 250 metres from Las Cucharas Beach, on Lanzarote’s Costa Teguise, HD Beach Resort offers tennis courts, gym, spa and outdoor pool. The spa includes an indoor pool, sauna, hot tub and Turkish bath. Air-conditioned suites have a balcony with views of the Atlantic Ocean or mountains. There is a seating area with a sofa bed, safe and flat-screen satellite TV. A fridge, toaster and coffee maker are provided, and a microwave is available on request. The HD Beach Resort features 2 restaurants. It also has a bar and snack bar, and packed lunches can be requested. The complex has free Wi-Fi and on-site water sports facilities. There is a night club and entertainment staff. Free parking is offered nearby, and you can hire a car or bicycle from the tour desk. An airport shuttle service is available for a supplement.

name: Hotel Livvo Costa Taurito & Aquapark
address: Alcazaba, 1, 35138 Taurito, Gran Canaria
description: Hotel LIVVO Costa Taurito & Aquapark is located in Gran Canaria’s Taurito Valley, a 5-minute bus or car ride from the fishing village of Mogán. Surrounded by gardens, this elegant hotel offers tennis, paddle and squash courts, a mini golf course and an outdoor pool. The water park includes Gran Canaria’s largest saltwater pool, as well as slides and a pirate ship. Each modern air-conditioned room at Hotel LIVVO Costa Taurito & Aquapark has a private balcony and a minibar. Bathrooms include a hairdryer. Hotel LIVVO Costa Taurito & Aquapark has a Mediterranean restaurant with show cooking and thematic evenings, and a snack bar by the pool. The 24-hour reception offers car rental, and there is free public parking on site. When making a reservation at the Hotel LIVVO Costa Taurito & Aquapark, the entrance to the water park is included: Lago Oasis every day except the day of departure. All services included do not apply inside the water park. Lago Taurito water park will be partially closed (children's area is affected) from 24/04/23 to 31/05/23 and totally closed from 01/11/23 to 12/12/23 due to improvements to the facilities. We apologize for the inconvenience.

name: Sol Tenerife
address: Avenida Rafael Puig Llivina, 12, 38640 Arona, Tenerife
description: Sol Tenerife is located 200 metres from the beach in Tenerife’s Playa de las Américas Resort. It offers 3 outdoor pools with sun loungers, a tennis court and rooms with a furnished balcony with partial or front sea views. The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Sol Tenerife feature tiled floors and cheerful colours. They are equipped with satellite TV, fridge, desk and chair. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer. There is free WiFi available in all areas of the hotel. The hotel has a kids' club, hairdressers and supermarket on site. Sports facilities include a volleyball court and a small football pitch. There is also a massage service. The Tenerife Sol’s restaurant serves international buffet meals. There are also 2 bars, including a poolside bar. Las Américas Golf Course is 500 metres away from the hotel. Tenerife Sur Airport is 14 km away. You can take a boat to La Gomera Island in 35 minutes.

name: Hotel Lava Beach
address: Calle Marte 6, 35510 Tías, Lanzarote
description: Set in Puerto del Carmen, Hotel Lava Beach offers 5-star accommodation with a fitness centre, a garden and a terrace. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a restaurant. The tour desk is available to assist guests in planning their days out. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the property. You can play mini-golf at the hotel. Puerto del Carmen is 2 km from Hotel Lava Beach. The nearest airport is Lanzarote Airport, 6 km from the property.

name: Sbh Costa Calma Palace Thalasso & Spa
address: Avenida Jahn Reisen, 35627 Costa Calma, Fuerteventura
description: This elegant hotel, 50 metres from Fuerteventura’s Costa Calma Beach, features indoor and outdoor pools, a spa and free parking. All air-conditioned rooms have a private balcony with sea views. The SBH Costa Calma Palace & Spa offers 2 tennis courts, a giant chess board, and a golf area with a putting green. You can also go windsurfing and diving for an additional charge. The large, bright rooms at the SBH Costa Calma Palace & Spa come with satellite TV. You can rent a safe, and the private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer. Guests can relax in the Costa Calma Palace thalassotherapy spa, with its indoor seawater swimming pool and treatments. There is a gym and sauna, and massage is available. The hotel has a restaurant and 2 bars. You can also have lunch or a drink at the poolside snack bar. Live music and shows are offered daily.

name: Iberostar Grand Salomé - Adults Only
address: Calle Londres 15, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: These luxury suites on the Costa Adeje all have a balcony and a hot tub. Grand Hotel Salomé has a Spa Sensations, wellness centre and a modern gym. Free high speed WiFi is available throughout. This boutique hotel has a large outdoor swimming pool, surrounded by a sun terrace and a pool bar. There is also a tennis court. The Grand Hotel Salomé has a huge outdoor relaxation area, with armchairs and sea views. The hotel restaurant also has a terrace with sea views. The hotel is set between Duque and Fañabé Beach in Tenerife. The area is ideal for diving, golf and windsurfing. All rooms have a flat-screen TV and a bathrobe. 50 meters from the beach. Costa Adeje all have a balcony OR TERRACE and a hot tub. This boutique hotel features a large outdoor pool AND INFINITY POOL.

name: Barceló Santiago - Adults Only
address: Calle La Hondura, 8, 38683 Santiago del Teide, Tenerife
description: The hotel is situated in the area of South Tenerife that has the most beautiful landscapes with unique views of the island of La Gomera and the cliffs of Los Gigantes. Recently renovated this unique and attractive hotel has a wide variety of facilities for your complete relaxation. Enjoy large and comfortable rooms with sea views its 3 swimming pools one of them heated its spa and direct access to the beach from the hotel only 200 m away. In addition lovers of good food will enjoy the hotels fabulous cuisine ranging from the most traditional to the most international of cooking.Barcelo.com

name: H10 Conquistador
address: Avenida Rafael Puig, 36, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: H10 Conquistador is situated on Tenerife and offers 4-star accommodation as well as outdoor tennis courts and a Turkish steam bath. This modern hotel is close to everything Playa de las Americas has to offer. There are a range of facilities at H10 Conquistador that guests can enjoy, such as body treatments, a swimming pool and a golf course. The hotel's amenities, such as meeting rooms, kids pool, kids club and playground, and massage make this an ideal choice for business travellers, families and couples alike. After a day of exploring the nearby area, guests can relax in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. All provide a mini bar, a flat-screen TV and an in-room safe. H10 Conquistador is within walking distance of Playa de las Vistas. The hotel's multilingual staff will make sure that every guest has a comfortable stay.Revato

name: Bahia Principe Sunlight Costa Adeje
address: Calle Idafe, 38670 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Set in Adeje, 600 metres from Playa Las Salinas, Bahia Principe Sunlight Costa Adeje provides accommodation with a garden, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. Among the facilities at this property are an ATM and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, karaoke and a kids' club. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. Bahia Principe Sunlight Costa Adeje features some units with sea views, and each room includes a balcony. At the accommodation all rooms have bed linen and towels. A continental, American or vegetarian breakfast is available every morning at the property. Bahia Principe Sunlight Costa Adeje offers a children's playground. You can play table tennis, darts and tennis at this 4-star hotel, and bike hire is available. Languages spoken at the reception include German, English, Spanish and French. Playa del Puertito is less than 1 km from the hotel, while Playa El Pinque is a 14-minute walk from the property. The nearest airport is Tenerife South Airport, 27 km from Bahia Principe Sunlight Costa Adeje.

name: Tivoli la Caleta Resort
address: C/la Enramada 9, 38670 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Immerse yourself in luxury at Tivoli La Caleta Tenerife Resort, the first Tivoli property to open in Spain. A fully renewed property, the hotel benefits from an astonishing seafront setting in Tenerife’s exclusive Costa Adeje resort. The hotel itself has a distinctive southern Moroccan style that includes sensual lines and soft edges. Inside, guests will find 284 guest rooms and suites that have been designed as inviting spaces. During their stay, guests will enjoy use of a luxurious collection of leisure facilities, including three swimming pools, a 24-hour gym, a spa, paddle/tennis courts and a terrace with gardens. A dining destination in itself, Tivoli La Caleta Tenerife Resort provides guests with a fantastic selection of food and beverage options, including four restaurants and five bars. From the signature Tivoli Breakfast Buffet to the widest cocktail offering in the area and the three restaurants signed by Olivier, guests will find an option that suits their cravings at any time of day.NH Hoteles

name: H10 Costa Adeje Palace
address: Playa La Enramada La Caleta, 38679 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Situated just 50 metres from La Enramada Beach in Tenerife, H10 Costa Adeje Palace features large outdoor pools, a hot tub and spa. The chic rooms include a furnished balcony. The hotel runs a free shuttle service to the popular resort of Playa de las Americas, 4 km away. Costa Adeje Golf Course is less than 2 km away. The hotel also offers golf packages and special green fees for some courses. The luxurious Despacio Spa Centre has a heated indoor pool, gym and Turkish bath. Guests can also book health and beauty treatments. A full programme of sport and other activities is available. H10 Costa Adeje Palace offers many dining options, including buffet and á la carte restaurants. There is a poolside bar

name: H10 Tindaya
address: Punta Del Roquito, 35627 Costa Calma, Fuerteventura
description: Set on the beautiful, white sandy beaches of the Costa Calma, this hotel is an ideal spot to enjoy a sunny break in Fuerteventura. This new hotel has been built in a modern, Canarian style and is set around 3 outdoor swimming pools. When not relaxing in the pool or on one of the sun loungers beside it you can head to the hotel’s spa centre for a session of pampering. Here you can enjoy a dip in the hydromassage or indoor pool, experience showers, a sauna, and a range of massage and beauty treatments. Out in the sunshine, you can have fun playing mini-golf whilst children enjoy themselves at the mini club. Then, round off the day with a meal at the buffet restaurant and drink at the bar.

name: Neptuno Costadeje
address: Calle Cataluña Nº3, 38670 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Located 1.5 kilometres from the beach, this family friendly hotel has much to keep you active and outdoors, and a great pool to relax in the sunshine by. Playa de las Américas is set a short journey from Aparthotel Neptuno Costadeje. Guests at the aparthotel also have discounts at the spa and sports centre, 300 metres away. Enjoy your holiday at your own pace with the property’s great balance of self-catered accommodation complemented by great facilities. You can cook basic meals in the well-equipped kitchen of your apartment or take the night off and dine in the Neptune’s onsite restaurant. The property has badminton and volleyball facilities. Children will have fun and make friends in the play area while grownups will like the traditional-style bar with plenty of seating. Challenge yourself to a workout in the property’s gym before treating yourself to a relaxing massage.

name: H10 Gran Tinerfe
address: Av. Rafael Puig Lluvina 13, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: H10 Gran Tinerfe is situated on Tenerife and provides 4-star accommodation as well as outdoor tennis courts. Guests also have exclusive access to the casino and Bar Discoteca Teide nightclub. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or have a beverage at the bar. Guests can take advantage of the recreational activities available, such as an outdoor pool, billiards and a sauna. H10 Gran Tinerfe is an adults-only hotel. After a day of exploring the nearby region, guests can relax in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They also offer a range of entertainment options, including a flat-screen TV. Guests of H10 Gran Tinerfe Hotel can sit down to a satisfying breakfast daily at Asensen Food & Experience, plus dinner at Los Menceyes after a day of sightseeing. Places to dine at the hotel include Mike's Coffee and El Mirador Brasserie. There is also a variety of beverages to choose from at the outdoor bar, which offers a view of the beach. There are a range of cafés and restaurants close to H10 Gran Tinerfe Hotel Tenerife, and Adeje and Costa Adeje are a brief drive away. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Playa de las Americas.Revato

name: Hipotels Natura Palace - Adults only
address: Urbanización Montaña Roja, 35580 Playa Blanca, Lanzarote
description: Located on the sea front of Playa Blanca, the Natura Palace offers 2 large outdoor swimming pools set within landscaped gardens. All elegant rooms feature a balcony or terrace. This hotel includes a snack-bar and a buffet restaurant with a variety of regional, national and international dishes. The Talasso Natura Spa offers beauty treatments and facilities such as a sauna and steam room. There is also a hair salon and fitness centre with views of the Atlantic Ocean. Within Hipotels Natura Palace guests can relax with drinks in the cosy bar and also enjoy the hotel’s discotheque.

name: R2 Rio Calma
address: C/ Artistas Canarios 8, 35627 Costa Calma, Fuerteventura
description: The attractive R2 Rio Calma complex is located next to the beaches of Costa Calma, southern Fuerteventura. It has 2 swimming pools, beautiful gardens and a range of dining options. All of the rooms in Rio Calma have air conditioning. They also have panoramic windows offering great views of the sea, gardens or swimming pool. The complex offers a children’s entertainment programme and evening shows. It also offers a range of water sports on the beach, including windsurfing, diving and sailing. The Rio Calma’s popular restaurant offers a range of Canarian flavours, as well as traditional Spanish dishes. Apart from the buffet, à la carte and snack restaurants, there are 5 bars around the complex.

name: Hotel Suite Villa Maria
address: Av. De Los Acantilados, 38679 Adeje, Tenerife
description: This 5-star hotel complex is located 1 km from La Caleta de Adeje Beach, in south-west Tenerife. It offers villas with furnished terraces and views of the Atlantic Ocean and the island of La Gomera. Some villas at Hotel Suite Villa María have a hot tub and others have a private pool. All have free internet access and feature a lounge with flat-screen satellite TV, a fully equipped kitchen and bathroom with hydromassage shower. A buffet breakfast is served daily at Villa María. The á la carte La Torre Restaurant serves traditional Canarian dishes while the Pool Bar offers light snacks and drinks. The hotel can organise excursions, including green fees for Costa Adeje Golf Course, located less than 1 km away. Car rental service can also be arranged at the property. A free shuttle service to Plaza del Duque Shopping centre is provided twice a day. Tenerife South Airport can be reached by car in 25 minutes.

name: Elba Carlota Beach & Convention
address: Avenida de Las Marismas 3, 35610 Antigua, Fuerteventura
description: Elba Carlota Beach & Convention Resort is set within Fuerteventura Golf Club and a few metres from the beach. This resort features a casino, 2 outdoor swimming pools, sports facilities and 2 restaurants. Rooms at the Elba Carlota are spacious and bright. All rooms are air conditioned and have a minibar and satellite TV. The resort offers guests a wide range of dining options, including Tindaya Buffet Restaurant and El Arrecife Restaurant, which serves Italian dishes. The Chiringuito Restaurant and Bar is set on a small island opposite the hotel and serves seafood cuisine. The Elba features a heated swimming pool, a hot tub and gym. There are beach volley ball courts, tennis courts and a shooting range. There is also evening entertainment for adults and daytime activities arranged for children. Gran Casino Antigua Fuerteventura is located inside the hotel. It offers a range of games including Roulette, Black Jack and Texas Hold 'Em. The Costa Calma is an ideal location for activities such as golf, sailing and surfing.

name: Coral Ocean View - Adults Only
address: Avenida de Los Pueblos, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Coral Ocean View - Adults Only is set on Tenerife and provides 4-star accommodation in addition to free Wi-Fi. It is also moments from Playa de las Americas's well-known tourist spots. Guests staying at Coral Ocean View - Adults Only can enjoy taking a dip in the swimming pool, working out in the gym or relaxing with a drink in the on site bar. Staff are available 24 hours a day and can help with booking tours and tickets. Coral Ocean View - Adults Only is an adults-only hotel. The rooms are air conditioned and feature a kitchenette, a private balcony and a refrigerator. Bathrooms are equipped with necessities such as slippers and bathrobes. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient place to enjoy a meal. Guests can also try one of the various bars and cafés nearby. Local attractions close to the hotel include Aqualand Costa Adeje, Siam Park and The Patch. Those wishing to discover the region are able to visit Adeje, situated within an easy drive of the property.Revato

name: Hotel Mirador Papagayo By Livvo
address: C/ Las Palmas, 5, 35570 Playa Blanca, Lanzarote
description: The 4-star Iberostar Papagayo Resort offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Lanzarote. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Take advantage of the hotel's safety deposit boxes, bicycle rental, restaurant, salon, elevator. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer air conditioning, balcony/terrace, mini bar, television, shower to ensure a restful night. To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as spa, massage, steamroom, water sports (non-motorized), fitness center. Convenience and comfort makes Iberostar Papagayo Resort the perfect choice for your stay in Lanzarote.Agoda

name: Elba Sara Beach & Golf Resort
address: Carretera de Jandia, Km. 11, 35610 Antigua, Fuerteventura
description: Located on Caleta de Fuste Beach in Fuerteventura, Hotel Elba Sara has an outdoor pool, tennis court and free parking nearby. Fuerteventura Golf Course is a 10-minute drive away. All air-conditioned rooms at the Elba Sara Beach & Golf Hotel have a private balcony, most with superb ocean views. There is a minibar, TV and private bathroom. The hotel’s restaurant serves buffet meals, and has a terrace overlooking the Atlantic Ocean. There is also a poolside grill bar, and a snack bar at the beach. The Sara Beach & Golf Resort features a gym, hot tub and sauna. There is also mini golf, ping pong and a pool table. Children have a dedicated pool, play area and supervised activities club. Fuerteventura Thalasso Spa is 400 metres from the hotel.

name: Gran Melia Palacio de Isora
address: Avenida Los Océanos, s/n, Alcalá, 38686 Guía de Isora, Tenerife
description: With its privileged Oceanfront location, this spectacular Design Hotel offers stunning views of the island La Gomera and Mount Teide. It is perfectly integrated in the South west coast of Tenerife, in the fishing village Alcala, Guia de Isora. The resort is at five minutes car distance from the beautiful Los Gigantes cliffs, while offering an inspiring proposal to live magic moments and new sensations. Highlights are the impressive colonial Plaza with fountains and chill-out corners and the huge sea water lagoon infinity pool. In addition various fresh water pools, including a pool only for adults, a family pool and a separate childrens pool, as well as the exclusive RedLevel pool. 6 Restaurants, 6 Bars, Yhi Spa with thermal circuit and Yhi Moves, a 24 hours fitness centre. The resort also offers a programme of life enriching activities, professional animation, tennis and paddle courts, archery, miniclub and subtropical gardens. The glorious room facilities are all very spacious with beautiful garden and ocean views and a minimum of 48sqm with private terrace of balcony. The exclusive RedLevel Demi Suites and Oceanfront Garden Villas offer an even superior level of luxury and personalised service, for adults only.priceline.com

name: Vincci Selección La Plantación del Sur
address: C/ Roque Nublo, 1, 38670 Adeje, Tenerife
description: This colonial-style hotel on the Costa Adeje features a luxurious spa and beautiful views of the Atlantic Ocean. It offers 5 swimming pools, surrounded by sun terraces and gardens. The elegant rooms at the Vincci Selección La Plantación del Sur have a balcony and sea views. They include an interactive flat-screen TV, and a separate hydromassage shower and bath. Vincci Selección La Plantación del Sur includes the Nammu Spa with thermal circuits. Massage and beauty treatments are also available. Duque Beach is just 500 metres from the hotel and there is also a fitness centre on-site. Bicycle and car rental can be organised for guests. There are 2 restaurants at the Vincci La Plantación del Sur, one serves creative Canarian cuisine using local produce; the second one, is specialised in charcoal-grilled meat. The hotel's breakfast includes products for celiacs. There is also a bar. Vincci Selección La Plantación del Sur is 20 minutes’ by car from Reina Sofía Airport.

name: Barceló Tenerife Royal Level
address: Avenida Greñamora 1, 38639 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: Barcelo Tenerife Royal Level has 59 fully equipped and renovated rooms. A range of exclusive gastronomy options and the Magma performance hall. It also includes other original proposals for leisure and rest such as a navigable lake; a climbing wall; a gym; a recreational sports area with a beach volleyball court; basketball; tennis and paddle tennis; eight swimming pools /two of which are heated throughout the year/ and a Wellness area.Barcelo.com

name: Alua Atlantico Golf
address: Avenida Del Atlántico, 3, 38639 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: Alua Atlantico Golf - All Inclusive has a restaurant, fitness centre, a bar and garden in San Miguel de Abona. Boasting a kids' club, this property also provides guests with a children's playground. The hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool, indoor pool, karaoke and a 24-hour front desk. All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a bath and a desk. At the hotel the rooms are equipped with a wardrobe and a private bathroom. The establishment also offers My Favourite Club®, with exclusive services and special attributes in room categories. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at Alua Atlantico Golf - All Inclusive The accommodation offers a terrace. You can play table tennis, and tennis at Alua Atlantico Golf - All Inclusive, and car hire is available. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Playa San Miguel de Abona, Playa El Barranco and Playa de San Blas. The nearest airport is Tenerife Sur, 10 km from Alua Atlantico Golf - All Inclusive, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Las Terrazas de Abama Suites
address: Carretera General, TF- 47 Km9, 38687 Guía de Isora, Tenerife
description: Offering an outdoor pool and views of the sea, Las Terrazas de Abama Suites is situated within the Abama Golf Course, and features stunning views of La Gomera and the Teide Volcano. Set in a luxurious complex, this property is surrounded by beautiful gardens. Some suites feature views of the sea and the golf course, while others feature views of the complex. Guests can benefit from a free transfer to the facilities within the property and the beach. Featuring a terrace, each air-conditioned suite features a dining area and a living space with a satellite flat-screen TV. There is also a kitchen, equipped with a dishwasher, oven and microwave. A refrigerator and kettle are also featured. Other facilities on site include the Melvin Restaurant, offers guests a variety of dining options. The menu, designed by Berasategui, is a special selection of local products that constitutes a unique culinary offer. There is also a gourmet shop at Abama Terraces, offering a wide range of local artisan products and an exquisite selection of wines. Puerto de la Cruz is 37 km from Las Terrazas de Abama Suites. The nearest airport is Tenerife Sur Airport, 26 km from the property.

name: Gf Fañabe
address: Avda de Bruselas 13, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Situated 500 metres from Fañabe Beach in Costa Adeje, Tenerife, GF Fañabe has a large year-round outdoor pool and sun terrace. The colourful rooms have air conditioning and balconies. GF Fañabe has a basketball court and mini golf. The wellness centre offers massages, sauna and hot tub. Two more pools can be found on the roof terrace. There is also a separate area for naturists. There is a kids’ club and an entertainment team that organizes a range of daytime and night time activities. A pool for children is also available. The GF Fañabe’s restaurant offers a varied buffet with show cooking and regular themed dinners. The informal pool bar serves light meals and cocktails, while the hall bar offers live music. Free WiFi is also provided.

name: The Ritz-Carlton, Abama
address: Carretera General, TF-47, km 9, 38687 Guía de Isora, Tenerife
description: The Ritz-Carlton Tenerife, Abama is an oasis of tranquility and seclusion, where sea, land and subtropical vegetation effortlessly collide with Moorish-inspired architecture. The 459 guest rooms & suites - divided between the Citadel and four exclusive rows of villas - enjoy magnificent views over the Atlantic Ocean, Mount Teide or our lush gardens. The resort offers a collection of restaurants ranging from light, simple cooking to world-class gourmet cuisine. At the top end of the scale, our Michelin-starred restaurants - M.B awarded with two stars and Kabuki with one. Providing a heaven of escape, this timeless island retreat features 7 swimming pools, a 2500m2 Spa & Fitness Center and the largest Ritz Kids in Europe. Guests can enjoy an 18-hole championship golf course designed by Ryder Cup player Dave Thomas, the Abama Tennis Academy, and an exclusive area on the Abama beach with complimentary use of sunbeds and umbrellas, serviced by our Ladies & Gentlemen.Marriott

name: Red Level at Gran Melia Palacio de Isora - Adults Only
address: Calle La Costa, 38686 Guía de Isora, Tenerife
description: This adults-only oceanfront complex offers a personalised butler service in all rooms. The outdoor pool has Balinese beds and hydromassage loungers. Each room has a private terrace with ocean or garden views. The Red Level at Gran Melia Palacio de Isora is an exclusive private area of the Gran Melia Palacio de Isora. Guests have access to all hotel facilities, including a wide range of international restaurants, 8 bars, including a beach bar, a lagoon-style infinity pool, sun terrace and tennis courts. Each spacious, elegant room at the Red Level comes with a coffee machine, an iPod dock and free WiFi. Bathrooms include a hydromassage shower and an over-sized bath tub. The exclusive Red Level lounge offers free tea and coffee all day. It also includes a poolside bar service and a business centre. There is direct access to Alcalà Beach from the hotel. 40 minutes’ drive from Las Cañadas del Teide National Park, and 35 minutes from Tenerife Reina Sofia Airport. The centre of Alcalá is a 10-minute walk away. Please note that all guests at this hotel must be 16 years old or older.

name: Hotel Botanico & The Oriental Spa Garden
address: Avenida Richard Yeoward, 1, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Hotel Botanico y Oriental Spa Garden offers 3 outdoor pools and luxurious accommodation set in attractive gardens, overlooking the Atlantic Ocean and Mount Teide. Free unlimited spa access is included for all guests over 16 years old. Hotel Botanico Tenerife’s spacious rooms have air conditioning, satellite TV and views of the ocean, mountains or hotel gardens. All rooms have a large, fully equipped bathroom. The 3,500 m2 spa includes an indoor swimming pool, as well as outdoor pools, a Japanese sauna, and Turkish baths. Beauty treatments including massages and aromatherapy are available. There are 4 restaurants on site, offering Asian, Spanish and Italian dishes. The La Palmera restaurant features an outdoor dining area in the gardens, where you can also find an elegant cocktail bar. Jardin Beach is a 10-minute drive from the property.

name: Royal Hideaway Corales Suites - by Barceló Hotel Group
address: Avenida Virgen de Guadalupe 21, 38679 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Spacious and modern apartment style Deluxe Suites with 1 2 or 3 bedrooms for all guests. Terrace with ocean views and many also have a private pool.Family friendly.Wide gastronomy offer in exclusive restaurants.1.000 m2 Spa and Wellness Centre 16 yearsBarcelo.com

name: Gran Tacande Wellness & Relax Costa Adeje
address: Alcalde Walter Paetzmann, Adeje, Tenerife
description: Located on Duque Beach, Gran Tacande Wellness & Relax Costa Adeje overlooks the island of La Gomera. Set around 2 outdoor swimming pools, this luxurious hotel offers a spa and rooms with balconies. The Gran Tacande has bright, attractive décor and spacious rooms. with views of the surrounding mountains or the hotel gardens. Some also have sea views. Gold Level rooms feature access to San Sebastian Exclusive Plaza private area, including an infinity pool and a whirlpool with 8 seats. The Zurrón Buffet Restaurant serves International and themed cuisine, while the Bocana Beach Club specialises in Mediterranean dishes. Both have terraces offering ocean views. The Gran Tacande also has a cocktail bar on the rooftop, the Azotea Sunset Bar. The hotel's spa offers hydrotherapy, massage and a range of beauty treatments with an extra cost. There is also a gym with free access and a hairdresser’s. The surrounding Playa de Fañabe resort has a selection of shops and bars. Costa Adeje Golf Resort is 15 minutes’ drive from the Gran Tacande.

name: Hotel Best Semiramis
address: C/ Leopoldo Cologan Zulueta, 12, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Set on a cliff overlooking the Atlantic Ocean, Hotel Best Semiramis is located in Puerto de la Cruz. It offers rooms with balconies, a spa, and 2 outdoor swimming pools surrounded by gardens. Each air-conditioned room at the Hotel Best Semiramis has simple décor with parquet floors. All accommodation has satellite TV and a minibar. Guests can enjoy a range of Mediterranean and international cuisine in the Semiramis’ buffet and à la carte restaurants. There is also a poolside bar. The spa features a hot tub and sauna, and massage is available. There is also a gym. The centre of Puerto de la Cruz is 10 minutes’ walk from the Semiramis, while Lago Martiánez Beach is 1.5 km away. Teide National Park and Tenerife Norte Airport can be reached within an hour by car.

name: Coral Suites & Spa - Adults Only
address: Calle Noelia Afonso Cabrera, 10, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Located 400 metres from the beach in Playa de las Américas, this adults-only design hotel offers a spa and outdoor pool. The rooftop terrace enjoys stunning views over the Atlantic. The Coral Suites & Spa offers stylish accommodation, decorated in bold colours. Rooms include a kitchen and a balcony. The lounge area comes with a sofa and flat-screen TV. Sunprime Coral Suites is situated near the beaches of Troya and Las Vistas. The Las Américas Golf Course is also within walking distance. Guests can enjoy breakfast and dinner in the Nuevo restaurant with views over the pool. There is a poolside bar and the Lobby Bar where cocktails are available.

name: Hotel Baobab Suites
address: Roques Del Salmor 5, 38679 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Set 10 minutes’ walk from Duque Beach in a residential area of Costa Adeje, Hotel Baobab Suites offers 2 heated outdoor pool and sun terrace, Saplings Kids club and Squash. Featuring a white, modern décor and large windows, each bright suite includes a living-dining area with a flat-screen TV. Their kitchen areas include an oven, microwave, dishwasher and washing machine. Free WiFi is available throughout. Guests can enjoy a welcome package. The hotel offers 3 breakfast options; Breakfast box can be delivered in the privacy and intimacy of the suite. Also, breakfast is served at Bite Buffet restaurant. The centre of Costa Adeje is a 15-minute walk from Hotel Baobab Suites and offers a selection of restaurants, bars and shops. Sports and activities such as spinning, pilates, yoga, meditation, and beach volleyball are organized at the on-site Activate sports and leisure center, which also offers paddle tennis courts and boules. Wellness and beauty Centre based on Ayurveda. Teide National Park is around 45 minutes’ drive away, while Tenerife South Airport is just a 20-minute drive from the complex. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Alua Tenerife
address: C. Antonio Ruiz Alvarez 7, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Alua Tenerife is 300 metres from Playa Jardín and 10 minutes’ walk from Puerto de la Cruz. It has 2 outdoor pools a children and an adult one, a buffet restaurant and a free pitch and putt golf course. Guests have access to an indoor pool, sauna and hot tub for an extra charge. Facilities also include gym, tennis and squash courts. The establishment offers My Favorite Club®, with exclusive services such as: - personalized check-in and check-out, access to My Favorite Club Lounge with snacks and drinks, - access to exclusive areas - and welcome bottle of sparkling wine and a letter from the General Manager at check-in. Each room comes with a fridge, balcony or terrace and satellite TV. A safe, cot or extra bed are available on request. Air conditioning is available during certain hours of the day throughout the summer months. Free WiFi is available in rooms. There is a small on-site shopping centre including a supermarket. There is a children’s play area and a games room. There is a bus station 15 minutes’ walk away in Puerto de la Cruz offering services to other parts of the island.

name: Hotel Jardines de Nivaria
address: Paris S.N., 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: The luxurious Hotel Jardines de Nivaria is set next to Fañabé Beach in southern Tenerife. It offers exotic gardens with 2 outdoor pools, a spa and stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi and a private balcony. The air-conditioned rooms at the Jardines de Nivaria Hotel feature modern décor and tiled floors. They are equipped with satellite TV and the balconies are furnished with loungers. The extensive leisure facilities include a putting green, tennis court and a fitness centre. The hotel’s spa features a sauna, steam bath and Vichy shower. This member of Adrian Hotels in Tenerife serves an extensive buffet breakfast. There is also a poolside bar and 3 restaurants, including an international buffet and a gourmet restaurant. The Cúpula Restaurant is set beneath an impressive stained-glass dome. There are 3 golf courses within a 10-minute drive from the Jardines de Nivaria. Tenerife Sur Airport is just 15 minutes’ drive away.

name: Bahia Principe Sunlight Tenerife
address: Idafe Urb Playa Paraiso, 38670 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Featuring outdoor pools, sun terraces and on-site restaurants, Bahia Principe Tenerife is set on the Costa Adeje coast, 10 minutes’ drive from Adeje town and Costa Adeje Golf Club. The property includes an on-site gym, tennis courts, spa and children’s playground. You will also find entertainment options such as karaoke. Air-conditioned rooms come with a private balcony and TV. They each have a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Playa de las Americas is a 20-minute drive away, and there you will find a range of shops and dining options. Tenerife Sur Airport can also be reached in 20 minutes’ drive.

name: Grand Muthu Golf Plaza Hotel
address: Urbanizacion Golf Del Sur, 38620 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: Grand Muthu Golf Plaza Hotel is situated on Tenerife and provides 5-star accommodation in addition to free Wi-Fi. Popular amenities, such as a sauna and a swimming pool, make for an enjoyable stay in San Miguel de Abona. The hotel treats guests to a variety of recreational facilities, such as billiards, a playground and Swimming pool. For those travelling with children Grand Muthu Golf Plaza Hotel offers a games room and a kids pool. Rooms have a modern décor, air-conditioning and a refrigerator. They come with tea and coffee making facilities, an in-room safe and an in-room dining area. Grand Muthu Golf Plaza Hotel provides a variety of places to dine, including Golden Buffet and Piano Bar. Eateries at the hotel include Cakes & Bakes Café and Spice Garden. A selection of dining options can also be found in the area. Grand Muthu Golf Plaza Hotel has easy access to Amarilla Golf and Country Club. For guests with a car, parking is available and Granadilla de Abona is a short drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Regency Country Club, Apartments Suites
address: Calle Armiche, 1, 38650 Chayofa, Tenerife
description: Located in Arona, Regency Country Club CHAFOYA is a perfect starting point from which to explore Tenerife. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the property provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Regency Country Club CHAFOYA. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Regency Country Club CHAFOYA combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Tenerife unforgettable.Agoda

name: Alexandre Hotel Troya
address: Rafael Puig Lluvina, 2, 38670 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Set in tropical gardens, Alexandre Hotel Troya is located in Playa de las Americas beachfront. The hotel boasts an outdoor pool, spa and fitness center. The bright and modern rooms at the Troya Hotel include air conditioning, satellite TV and a balcony. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer. The hotel’s poolside Palapa Restaurant serves snacks, as well as Mediterranean and international cuisine. There is also a buffet restaurant and a cocktail lounge. There is a children’s play area and paddling pool at the hotel. Massage is available, and you can play billiards. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The Troya has easy access to the TF-1 Motorway, and Siam Water Park is a 5-minute drive away.

name: Sol Costa Atlantis
address: Avenida Venezuela, 15, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Sol Costa Atlantis Tenerife has an ideal setting 50 metres from Martiánez Beach and the Lago Martiánez pool complex. This hotel features a spa and outdoor swimming pool, and free WiFi. Each of the property’s air-conditioned rooms has elegant décor and a balcony. All rooms have flat-screen TVs with satellite channels. A safe is available for an extra cost. The on-site restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and Spanish cuisine for dinner. There are also a pool bar and a modern bar-lounge with terrace. The spa is located on the hotel's top floor and offers sea views. It features a thermal circuit with sauna, Turkish bath and a pool with several water jets. It also offers beauty treatments, including massages. Entry comes at an additional cost. Free fitness facilities are available. Sol Costa Atlantis Tenerife is located in the city centre, where you can find a selection of shops, bars and cafés. Loro Parque Theme Park is less than 3 km away.

name: Bahia Del Duque
address: Avenida Bruselas, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Overlooking Duque Beach in Tenerife, the luxurious Bahia Del Duque is surrounded by 6 hectares of subtropical gardens. It offers 5 outdoor pools, fitness centre and stylish accommodation with private balcony. At Gran Hotel Bahia del Duque Resort you can choose between modern rooms and chic villas. All accommodation comes with LCD satellite TV and a bathrobe and slippers. The Gran Bahia del Duque complex offers 8 restaurants, including Italian and Oriental options. There are also 7 bars, including a juice bar and a beach bar. The hotel offers a huge variety of leisure activities, including aerobics classes and whale watching. There are tennis courts, a table tennis table and a botanical walking route. Adeje Golf Course and Siam Water Park are around 5 minutes’ drive from the Bahía Duque. You can drive to Tenerife Sur Airport in around 15 minutes.

name: Hotel Las Aguilas Tenerife, Affiliated By Melia
address: Calle Doctor Barajas 19, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Overlooking Puerto de la Cruz, Hotel Las Águilas, Affiliated by Meliá has 2 pools, one heated in the winter. The spacious suites have spectacular views of the Atlantic Ocean or Mount Teide. Suites at Las Aguilas Affiliated by Meliá have large balconies or terraces. Inside, the lounge and separate bedroom are decorated in warm colours, and the bathrooms have hydromassage baths. Children from 4 to 12 years old can enjoy the miniclub, as well as the kids' pool, and giant chess. In the evenings there is entertainment for all the family. Hotel Las Águilas, Affiliated by Meliá is 3 km from the centre of Puerto de la Cruz. There is a free shuttle to the city centre, and free on-site parking.

name: Alexandre Hotel Gala
address: Av. Del Arquitecto Gomez Cuesta, 3, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Alexandre Hotel Gala is set in Playa de las Américas, approximately 100 metres from the beach. This large complex features an outdoor swimming pool, spa and rooms with balconies. The Gala offers simple, attractive décor throughout. The air-conditioned rooms are spacious and have a desk and a minibar. Buffet-style cuisine is on offer in the Gala’s restaurant. There is also a pool bar and cocktail bar. Guests can relax in the Gala’s Chill-Out terrace, which offers views of Atlantic and the island of Gomera. The hotel provides evening entertainment and a range of activities throughout the day. There is also a children’s club. The TV lounge has free WiFi, while computers with internet access are available in reception for an extra cost. The Gala’s spa has a large indoor pool, and offers a range of hydrotherapy and massage treatments. There is also a hot tub and gym area.

name: Bahia Principe Fantasia Tenerife
address: Avenida JM Galván Bello, 38639 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: Situated in San Miguel de Abona, 1.5 km from Playa de San Blas, Bahia Principe Fantasia Tenerife features accommodation with a garden, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, an ATM and free WiFi. The hotel has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, karaoke and a shared lounge. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Bahia Principe Fantasia Tenerife the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, American and vegetarian options. The accommodation offers a children's playground. Popular points of interest near Bahia Principe Fantasia Tenerife include Playa Grande, Playa San Miguel de Abona and Golf del Sur. The nearest airport is Tenerife South Airport, 7 km from the hotel.

name: Royal Garden Villas & Spa
address: Campo de Golf Costa Adeje - Finca Los Olivos, Adeje, Tenerife
description: This 5-star resort features luxurious, Balinese-style villas with private heated pools. Set in gardens, Royal Garden Villas offers a gym, spa and impressive ocean views. Each spacious property is individually decorated with chic décor and wooden furnishings. All villas have a terrace, a 40-inch flat-screen TV, DVD player and a well-equipped kitchen. Each one comes with a hydromassage shower and bath. The Royal Garden’s Jardín Restaurant offers à la carte cuisine and a selection of Spanish dishes in a stylish environment decorated with intricate wooden lattices. The Tucán Tucán Pub serves a range of cocktails and light snacks. The Golden Pond spa features Oriental-style design and has an indoor pool and Turkish baths. It also has a hot tub, ice fountain and various beauty treatments. There is also a squash court and gym. The Royal Garden can arrange yacht hire, green fees for local golf courses and various excursions, including trips to Puerto de la Cruz and the island of La Gomera.

name: Roca Nivaria Gran Hotel
address: Av. Adeje 300, 38678 Adeje, Tenerife
description: This luxurious 5-star hotel is situated on Costa Adeje, overlooking Playa Paraiso Beach. It features a spa area and a heated infinity pool with stunning views of the Atlantic Ocean. The modern rooms at Adrián Hoteles Roca Nivaria include air conditioning and satellite TV. The private bathroom comes with a bathrobe, slippers and hairdryer. The hotel has tennis and archery facilities. A hot tub, mud bath and a range of beauty treatments are also offered. Guests have access RoniAventura, the hotel's water and adventure park, which includes 2 pools, 4 slides, climbing walls and suspension bridges. Adrián Hoteles Roca Nivaria features a buffet restaurant and 2 à la carte restaurants, serving Italian and Spanish cuisine. There is also a poolside bar.

name: Spa & Sport Hotel Mar y Sol
address: Avenida Amsterdam 8, 38650 Los Cristianos, Tenerife
description: Located in Arona, Spa & Sport Hotel Mar y Sol offers accommodation with free WiFi and flat-screen TV, as well as an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. Opening to a terrace with sea, pool or garden views, all units are fitted with a kitchenette with a fridge and kitchenware. A continental, Full English/Irish or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the aparthotel you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine. Spa & Sport Hotel Mar y Sol offers a range of wellness facilities including a wellness packages and a public bath.
