Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the accommodation, while cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Popular points of interest near Spa & Sport Hotel Mar y Sol include Playa De Los Tarajales, Los Cristianos Beach and Playa del Callao. The nearest airport is Tenerife South Airport, 18 km from the aparthotel.

name: Luz Del Mar
address: Avenida Sibora, 10, 38400 Los Silos, Tenerife
description: Located in the traditional village of Los Silos, this spa hotel has a tropical garden and a solar-heated swimming pool. Free WiFi is available. The hotel’s wellness suite offers an organic sauna, a dry sauna, a relaxation room and adventure showers. There is also a fitness centre. Hotel Luz del Mar is surrounded by the Teno Mountains and the El Teide National Park. There is free public parking on site and the sea is a short walk away. Buenavista’s 18-hole Golf Course is within a short drive. The Luz del Mar is in the Isla Baja region, full of traditional farm houses. The hotel has a large wind-protected terrace and rooms have a balcony or terrace. There is also a Chimney Lounge with an open fireplace.

name: Royal River, Luxury Hotel - Adults Only
address: Calle Alcojora, 38670 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Royal River, Luxury Hotel - Adults Only has four restaurants, five outdoor swimming pools, a fitness centre and three bars in Adeje. Boasting suites and villas, each with a private pool or plunge pool, this property offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests. All units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a wardrobe. Featuring a private bathroom with a bath and free toiletries, villas also feature a terrace and pool view. Continental and buffet breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodation. Guests can relax in the spa and wellness centre, including a hammam and a sauna, or in the garden. Playa de Fanabe is 2.7 km from the hotel. The nearest airport is Tenerife Sur, 25 km from Royal River, Luxury Hotel - Adults Only, and the property offers an airport shuttle service for an extra cost.

name: Oceano Health Spa Hotel
address: Calle Océano Pacifico 1, 38240 Punta del Hidalgo, Tenerife
description: Just 1 km from the centre of the peaceful fishing village of Punta del Hidalgo, OCEANO Hotel Health Spa features an outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and a medical spa. The hotel is surrounded by a garden with palm trees, and the Anaga Mountains. You can enjoy fantastic views of the Atlantic Ocean and Mount Teide from the balconies of the studios and apartments. All have a fully-equipped kitchen. The hotel’s spa and F.X.Mayr Centre offer a professional team of doctors and therapists to help you relax and rejuvenate. Treatments include osteopathy, massages, shiatsu and natural cosmetics, with many taking advantage of the natural healing powers of seawater (in the heated saltwater swimming pools). There is also a gym designed for low-stress workouts. You will find shops and restaurants in Punta del Hidalgo, and staff are happy to give you more information about sights and activities in the surrounding area, including guided visits and historic walks. Santa Cruz de Tenerife Ferry Terminal is about 30 km away.

name: Hotel Hacienda Del Conde a Meliá Collection Hotel
address: Paseo Severiano Ballesteros, Buenavista del Norte, Tenerife
description: Featuring free WiFi, 3 restaurants and 2 pools, Hacienda del Conde member of Meliá Collection - Adults Only is a luxury hotel located in Buenavista del Norte, Tenerife. This adults-only property has a spa centre and hot tub. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a furnished terrace, flat-screen TV with international channels, seating area with a sofa, and walk-in closet. The luxurious bathroom comes with a bath, walk-in shower, hairdryer, VIP toiletries, and double vanities. The property has an 18-hole golf course, designed by Severiano Ballesteros, as well as a free fitness centre and banquet rooms. The spa includes a thermal circuit, sauna, and Turkish bath. Free parking is provided. Hacienda del Conde member of Meliá Collection - Adults Only offers bike parking, wash station, bicycle workshop and personalised cycling routes. Tenerife South Airport is 70 km from Hacienda del Conde member of Meliá Collection - Adults Only.

name: Atlantic El Tope
address: Calzada Martianez, 2, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Offering views of Mount Teide, El Tope is 400 metres from Puerto de la Cruz Beach and the Martiánez Pools. It has an outdoor pool, spa and buffet restaurant. The property features private parking. Each of the air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Atlantic El Tope have satellite TV and a fridge. Some rooms have a balcony. Show cooking and Mediterranean cuisine are offered at the hotels restaurant. A lounge bar is also available. The centre of Puerto de La Cruz is a 10-minute walk from the El Tope and Lagos de Martiánez Shopping Centre is just 100 metres away. Tenerife Norte Airport can be reached in 20 minutes, by car.

name: Kn Hotel Arenas Del Mar - Adults Only
address: Avda. Europa, N 2, 38612 El Médano, Tenerife
description: This adults-only design hotel is set right next to Jaquita Beach and has a well-equipped spa, available for an additional cost. The Arenas del Mar’s outdoor swimming pool and bar area have amazing sea views. There is a large outdoor terrace, a garden and a gym. Free WiFi is offered in the property. There are also several restaurants in Arenas del Mar. La Jaquita offers buffet meals while El Ancla specialises in fish dishes with a traditional Canarian twist. The pool bar offers fresh juice, snacks and cocktails. Café Babor has a terrace with views of Medano Bay. There is also a disco with shows and entertainment. Suites have a private balcony, a double bed and a sofa bed. The bathroom has a hairdryer.

name: Vincci Tenerife Golf
address: Urbanizacion Golf Del Sur. Carretera de Los Abrigos, 38639 Los Abrigos, Tenerife
description: Located 100 metres from Tenerife’s Golf del Sur Golf Course, this seafront hotel offers an outdoor pool and a spa. Many rooms at Vincci Tenerife Golf include a private balcony, some with sea views. The Vincci Tenerife’s spacious rooms are decorated in soft, natural colours. They are all air conditioned and include flat-screen satellite TV and a modern bathroom with toiletries. The hotel’s Nammu Spa has a sauna, steam room and dynamic swimming pool, and massages and beauty treatments can be booked. The hotel also has a sun terrace with loungers. Vincci Tenerife Golf offers a buffet restaurant and a bar with a terrace, overlooking the sea. Upon request, the hotel can offer products for special diet requirement including celiacs. Room service is available. The Vincci’s reception can arrange car rental and currency exchange. Staff can also provide information about the region and help to book excursions, including tours of the impressive Mount Teide National Park.

name: Hotel Ecolife Tenerife
address: C. Garañaña 43, 38620 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: Situated within 9.4 km of Golf del Sur and 18 km of Aqualand, Hotel Ecolife Tenerife features rooms in San Miguel de Abona. This 3-star hotel offers a tour desk and luggage storage space. The property offers bike hire and features a garden and year-round outdoor pool. At the hotel, rooms are equipped with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Rooms are fitted with a safety deposit box, while some rooms include a terrace and others also boast sea views. Los Gigantes is 43 km from Hotel Ecolife Tenerife, while Golf Las Americas is 17 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tenerife South Airport, 12 km from the accommodation.

name: Meliá Jardines del Teide
address: Urbanizacion Mirador del Duque, 38670 La Caleta (Tenerife)
description: Melia Jardines del Teide - Adults Only is built around a pool complex and 12,000m² of tropical gardens. It has views of the coast and mountains, including Mount Teide. All rooms at the hotel have air conditioning and satellite TV. Each room has a balcony or terrace, with views of the pool, sea or mountains. Free WiFi is available throughout. The Level services are available in some rooms, including a private lounge with free coffee and tea, private check-in area and daily cocktail hour, as well as private pool and rooms with, pillow menu, coffee maker with a selection of coffees and designer toiletries. Melia Jardines del Teide - Adults Only offers 2 swimming pools, one being exclusive for The Level guests. Dining options includes a buffet restaurant, there are 2 a-la-carte restaurants, one has a bar and there is also a lobby bar with large terrace and panoramic ocean views. The hotel is set just 5 minutes’ walk from Playa del Duque beach, in southern Tenerife. Costa Adeje Golf Club is 1.5 km away. There is also a free shuttle service to a nearby shopping centre. There are also several shops on site.

name: Hotel Neptuno
address: Paseo Neptuno 2, 46011 Valencia, Valencia
description: This design beachfront hotel overlooks Valencia harbour and has a small spa and a gym The modern, air-conditioned rooms have flat-screen TV, free WiFi and sea or marina views. Marina Real Juan Carlos I tram stop can be found just outside the hotel, and offers a link with central Valencia. There is also direct access to the beach. Attractively located in the Poblats Maritims district, this hotel provides a popular beachside bar and a restaurant. The restaurant offers a range of traditional rice dishes and fresh seafood for dinner. Oceanografic is 2.4 km from the hotel, while City of Arts & Sciences is 2.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 13 km from the property.

name: Las Arenas Balneario Resort
address: Eugenia Vines 22-24, 46011 Valencia, Valencia
description: This 5-star resort has a superb seafront location with direct access to Valencia's Las Arenas Beach. The Las Arenas Balneario Resort features 2 seasonal outdoor pools surrounded by loungers, and a luxurious spa. All rooms at this design hotel are elegantly decorated with neutral colours. They include free Wi-Fi and a 32-inch flat-screen TV. The Sorolla restaurant serves traditional but creative cuisine. Guests can enjoy a breakfast buffet and light refreshments are available from the pool bar. The spa at Las Arenas Balneario Resort Valencia includes a heated indoor pool with views to the gardens. Massage and beauty treatments are available, and there is a gym. The Palacio de la Música and the America’s Cup Port are a short walk from the hotel. There are 2 metro stations and many bus stops nearby the Hotel Las Arenas Balneario Resort.

name: Parador de El Saler
address: Avda. De Los Pinares, 151, 46012 El Saler, Valencia
description: This Parador is located on the famous El Saler golf course, within a coastal nature reserve. Luxurious and contemporary, it has a spa and free Wi-Fi. The rooms of the Parador Campo de Golf El Saler are modern and spacious. All have heating, air conditioning and TV. Many of them have views of the golf course. In the spa you will find a range of exclusive treatments and massages. It also has saunas and a heated swimming pool. During the summer the hotel has an outdoor swimming pool. The Parador has free parking. The restaurant of the El Saler specialises in local rice dishes, above all paella. The El Saler golf course is ranked in the top 10 in Spain. Alternatively, you can explore the Albufera Nature Reserve which is home to a wide range of plant and wildlife. The city of Valencia is just 18 km away.

name: Hotel Almirante
address: Avenida Niza, 38, 03540 Alicante, Valencia
description: Hotel Almirante is the only hotel with direct access to Alicante's San Juan Beach, and has a large outdoor pool. San Juan is the Costa Blanca's longest beach, at 6 km long. The hotel is a 10-minute drive from Alicante city centre, and 20 minutes from the airport. There is free on-site parking, and a tram to Alicante stops 100 metres away. Each modern, air-conditioned room at the Almirante has a flat-screen satellite TV and a private bathroom with amenities. A safe is available at an extra charge. The Almirante’s Pocardy restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and offers Mediterranean cuisine for lunch and dinner, including rice dishes and fish. You can enjoy a meal on the outdoor terrace, with music in the evenings. There is also a bar.

name: Meliá Alicante
address: Plaza Del Puerto, 3, 03001 Alicante, Valencia
description: Set between Alicante Harbour and Postiguet Beach, Meliá Alicante offers an outdoor pool and free WiFi throughout. All rooms feature a terrace, some with sea views. A kid's club is available in high season. All rooms at the Melia Alicante are air conditioned and spacious. They have flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and a safe. The modern bathrooms come with toiletries and a hairdryer. The hotel’s Trasluz Restaurant specialises in rice dishes and fresh fish. There is also a poolside snack bar and an elegant lounge bar. The hotel also offers The Level personalized service in some of the hotel’s rooms. This adults only service includes a range of superior services and facilities, such as private reception, express check-in and check-out, access to private pool with magnificent sea views, access to the Open Bar with free drinks and snacks, etc. The hotel faces Alicante Casino, and is just 50 metres from the yacht club and marina. Santa Barbara Castle and Archaeology Museum are just 800 metres away.

name: Hotel Spa Porta Maris by Melia
address: Plaza Puerta Del Mar, 3, Alicante, Valencia
description: Hotel Spa Porta Maris by Melia is set between Postiguet Beach and Alicante Marina, offers views of the Mediterranean and free Wi-Fi. It is 100 metres from Alicante’s historic centre. All rooms have a private terrace, flat-screen TV, pillow menu and seasonal air conditioning and heating. Rooms offer views of the marina or Alicante's Bay. The suites also have a lounge. The hotel has a gym and a spa, available at an extra cost. The spa features a heated pool and a thermal circuit. It also offers massages and body and facial treatments. Buffet breakfast is served in the Alborada room, with views of Alicante's bay. The Marabierta Restaurant, offering views of the sea and Alicante's sports dock, serves typical Mediterranean dishes daily. Hotel Spa Porta Maris by Melia is near the Mediterranean Casino and 100 metres from Paseo de Las Palmeras. The airport is a 15-minute drive away. Nearby tram and train connections provide quick access to the Terra Mítica Theme Park.

name: Hotel Suites del Mar by Melia
address: Plaza Del Mar, 3, Alicante, Valencia
description: Suites del Mar by Melia is part of Spa Porta Maris Hotel complex. There is free WiFi, and free use of the Sanarium Circuit and Non-heated outdoor pool on the 1st floor with fantastic views. Its junior suites are elegant and have a furnished terrace with superb views over the Marina or the sea.They have seasonal heating and air conditioning (centralized system). There are 2 Smart TVs with USB input. The modern bathroom comes with free toiletries, a shower, a double washbasin, a magnifying mirror, and a hairdryer. There is also a bathtub near the bed Discover The Socarrat restaurant where you can taste a wide variety of rice dishes as well as tapas and local gourmet dishes. With a privileged location and fantastic sea views, enjoy the finest cocktail options as well as our full breakfast buffet served at “Socarrat” breakfast room, both with fantastic sea views. The junior suites are 300 metres from Alicante’s central Explanada Avenue.The hotel offers therapeutic massage services and a new urban spa at a special price for guests staying. On-site parking is available for a supplement.

name: Eurostars Sitges
address: Av. Cami De Miralpeix, 12, 08870 Sitges, Catalonia
description: Overlooking the Mediterranean sea and the Terramar Golf Club, Eurostars Sitges is 2 km from the beach in Sitges. Free WiFi and free parking are available. The air-conditioned rooms feature a private terrace with views, a flat-screen TV, a laptop safe, a minibar, a tea/coffee maker and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and bathrobes. The property provides restaurants, bars, a chill-out lounge and a boutique restaurant. Guests can enjoy à la carte fine wine, dining, snacks and cocktails. Eurostars Sitges offers a wellness centre with a spa, an indoor pool, a hot tub, a sauna and a steam bath for an extra charge. Therapies and beauty treatments are also available. A 24-hour reception and a tour desk services are provided at the property. Guests have free access to the 24-hour fitness room. Sitges centre is 3.5 km away from the property. Guest can reach Eurostars Sitges within 25 minutes by train from Barcelona International Airport and within 50 minutes from Barcelona city centre.

name: Hotel Marsol
address: Passeig Jacint Verdaguer, 7, 17310 Lloret de Mar, Catalonia
description: Marsol is located right on the seafront in Lloret de Mar, on Catalunya’s Costa Brava. It offers a fitness centre, spa and a rooftop pool with a terrace and loungers. All rooms at the Hotel Marsol are air-conditioned. They all come with free WiFi, a satellite TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. A safe is available at no extra cost. The hotel’s buffet restaurant serves a varied breakfast and a range of international dishes for lunch and dinner. There is also a café-bar with a terrace, set on the seafront promenade. The Marsol is a 5-minute walk from the centre of Lloret de Mar, where there is a wide selection of restaurants, bars and nightclubs. Sant Romà Church is located just 100 metres from the hotel.

name: H10 Porto Poniente
address: San Pedro, 24, 03501 Benidorm, Valencia
description: Located next to the seafront promenade at Poniente Beach in Benidorm, the H10 Porto Poniente offers 2 plunge pools with sea views. The on-site adults-only Despacio Spa Centre includes a heated swimming pool and a gym. Its elegant rooms are bright and air-conditioned. Each one comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. There is free WiFi available throughout. The hotel also features the Tortuga Restaurant and the Marea Alta Rooftop Bar offering sea views. There are 3 meeting rooms, all with natural light. Private parking with an electric vehicle charging point, including Tesla, can be arranged at an extra charge. Register number HA-1539

name: Higueron Hotel Malaga, Curio Collection by Hilton
address: Avenida del Higueron,48, 29640 Fuengirola, Andalusia
description: Located in one of the most exclusive areas of Málaga, Higuerón Hotel Málaga, CURIO Collection by Hilton is a benchmark in exclusivity, a resort where luxury finds its maximum expression and excellence takes on a new meaning. A journey through the most cultural, culinary and artistic aspects of Málaga. 290 bedrooms and suites carefully designed to cover the most demanding needs of guests. Including the new suites in which exclusivity becomes the norm, opening up a world of disconnection, such as our Picasso Suites, duplex rooms with outdoor jacuzzi, solarium and Balinese beds. An unforgettable experience in our prestigious sport club, 24-hour gymnasium & our renowned NagomiSpa. 6 restaurants, which take diners on a trip around the world. A journey that begins with the local flavours of the area at Chupadeo and continues at MED. A culture based on flavour, starting at exclusive Sollo Restaurant, awarded a Michelin star. A strategic location with direct access to the beach thanks to our curious tram, which will also take you to the train station, from where you can travel to Málaga International Airport and the provincial capital city centre in just a few minutes.Official Hotel Information

name: URH Sitges Playa
address: Port Alegre 53, 08870 Sitges, Catalonia
description: All rooms at the URH Sitges Playa have a private balcony and air conditioning. All include a spacious and elegant bathroom, safe, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. The Amanit Restaurant offers a unique fusion, the best of Balinese and Mediterranean food facing the sea. The URH Sitges Playa has a fitness center and a massage area (subject to availability and upon request). It also offers airport shuttle service and private covered parking for a daily fee.

name: Meliá Sitges
address: Joan Salvat Papasseit, 38, 08870 Sitges, Catalonia
description: Melia Sitges is set in a quiet area of Sitges, just 3 minutes’ walk from Balmins and Aiguadolç beaches. The hotel features a stylish garden with an outdoor pool, and a restaurant with a terrace. The Meliá Sitges is 5 minutes’ walk from Aiguadolç Marina and 15 minutes’ walk from the lively town centre. It is a 20-minute walk to the train station, which connects you with central Barcelona in just 40 minutes. The air-conditioned rooms at the Meliá feature modern, minimalist decor. Each one has a pillow menu and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The Bistrot Saffron restaurant serves modern Mediterranean food. There is also a stylish cocktail bar with modern seats in the garden.

name: Hotel MIM Sitges
address: Avinguda Sofia, 12, 08870 Sitges, Catalonia
description: Just 120 metres from Sitges Beach, Hotel MiM Sitges & Spa features a spa and a rooftop seasonal pool. Its stylish rooms have contemporary décor and some offer sea views. Each spacious room at Hotel MiM Sitges & Spa has air conditioning, a TV and minibar. The hotel provides beach towels for a refundable deposit. The hotel restaurant serves a range of both local and international cuisine. The rooftop sky bar offers sea and mountain views. Hotel MiM Sitges & Spa's Spa features a sauna, steam bath, sensation showers, leisure pool and heated beds where you can access with special discount. There is a 24 hour gym with free access for all guests. Sitges’ seafront promenade is just a few metres from the hotel. The town’s railway station is a 10-minute walk away and here you will find regular trains to Barcelona, 40 km away.

name: Melia Genova
address: Via Corsica, 4, Genoa, Genoa
description: This 5-star design hotel is set in a quiet tree-lined boulevard in a residential area in the heart of Genoa, a 10-minute walk from the main shopping street XX Settembre and city centre. Guests can reserve the services of the wellness centre with an indoor swimming pool, gym, Turkish bath and hot tub. With free WiFi, all the rooms are elegantly designed and come with modern amenities such as LCD satellite TV, minibar and work area. Each one has oak parquet floors, a private bathroom and safe. A buffet breakfast with sweet and savoury food and gluten-free items is served daily at the Blue Lounge & Restaurant. Open also at lunch and dinner, it serves innovative Ligurian and international cuisine and a wide choice of wines. The Blue Lounge & Terrace hosts aperitifs with DJ set, Sunday brunches and special dinners. Just 600 metres from the Fiera di Genova exhibition centre, the hotel is 5 minutes' walk from the Renaissance church of Santa Maria Assunta. Carlo Felice Theatre is just 10 minutes away on foot. Tickets for the Aquarium of Genoa, which is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Cipriani, A Belmond Hotel, Venice
address: Isola Della Giudecca 10, 30133 Venice, Veneto
description: Set on Giudecca Island, Hotel Cipriani, A Belmond Hotel, Venice offers stunning views of Venice Lagoon and the Doge's Palace. It features a large outdoor swimming pool, tennis court and luxury wellness facilities. The 5-star Hotel Cipriani, A Belmond Hotel, Venice offers elegant interior design and plenty of outdoor areas where you are invited to relax and enjoy the view. A full buffet breakfast is available each morning. Drinks are available from the bar and the à la carte restaurant serves delicious Italian cuisine. Dining options include the gourmet Oro Restaurant, Cip's Club with its wooden terrace with views on St Mark's and the Il Porticciolo Restaurant, ideal for a seafood lunch. Rooms and suites are spacious, comfortable and packed with amenities. You will have free Wi-Fi, complimentary e-magazines and a HD flat-screen TV. Views are across the lagoon or of the garden and vineyard. You are 4 minutes from St. Mark's Square by the hotel's private boat service. A shuttle service from/to Venice Marco Polo Airport and Venezia Santa Lucia Train Station can be organized on request.

name: Catania Hills Residence
address: Via Adige 21, 95027 Catania, Sicily
description: No description found

name: Grand Hotel Baia Verde
address: Via Angelo Musco, 8/10, 95021 Catania, Sicily
description: The 4-star Grand Hotel Baia Verde is set on volcanic rocks overlooking a natural bay, on the road between Acicastello and Catania. It offers an outdoor pool and a free gym. Baia Verde is surrounded by a garden with palm and pine trees and a semi-Olympic pool. It has a sun terrace built into the rocks, which features a staircase leading down to the sea. All rooms at Baia Verde come with elegant Italian furniture, a 32-inch HD LED TV with Sky channels, and a minibar. Many rooms also have a view of the Ionian Sea. The Oleandro Restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and traditional Sicilian and Mediterranean dishes at dinner. It has a wide selection of local wines and a sea-view terrace. The outdoor bar offers traditional Sicilian ice cream, snacks and drinks. The beauty centre is available for a variety of treatments and a free fitness centre is available for all guests.

name: 4 Spa Resort Hotel
address: Via Nazionale, 114, Aci Castello, Sicily
description: Situated on the road between Acicastello and Catania, 4 Spa Resort Hotel features a large paid spa, wellness centre and indoor pool, a free seasonal outdoor pool and a restaurant. Parking and Wi-Fi are free. Featuring air conditioning, the rooms come with a satellite flat-screen TV and minibar. A continental breakfast is served buffet style. The hotel’s restaurant offers regional specialties for lunch and dinner. In summer, they can be enjoyed near the pool. You can relax in Spa Luxury Beauty, one of the largest spa and wellness centres in Southern Italy, providing many services such as a Turkish bath, Finnish sauna and massages. This 4-star property also has its paid fitness centre with indoor pool and a top-quality medical clinic, dermatology and dietary services. Resort Hotel 4 Spa is 12 km from Catania Airport.

name: Four Points by Sheraton Catania Hotel and Conference Center
address: Via Antonello da Messina 45, Aci Castello, 95021 Catania, Sicily
description: Where You Want to Be. Blue skies and smiling faces greet you at the Four Points by Sheraton Catania Hotel and Conference Center, located on the breathtaking Cyclops Coast. Stroll across the street to the rocky beach and admire beautiful views. Visit Catania's celebrated sites, just 6 miles away and explore the rich history of Acireale and Taormina, at the foot of Mount Etna. This place offers the perfect combination of local hospitality, art and enviroinment. At the fON Art Gallery, art reigns supreme thanks to the great job of Fondazione Oelle. Fully accessible to all, even people with reduced mobility, the hotel offers 166 guest rooms and suites and all the amenities to enjoy your sicilian journey. After a full day, recharge in the fitness center, in the tennis court, in the wellness and beauty area of Arantia Rubra, take a dip by the pool or by the sea deck or dine surrounded by lemon trees sitting on the Chef's Table of our Horto Vegetable Garden for a unique taste experienceMarriott

name: Palazzo Tirso Cagliari MGallery
address: 4 Piazza Deffenu, 09125 Cagliari, Sardinia
description: Palazzo Tirso Cagliari. Refined 5 star hotel, with 85 rooms, 2 restaurants, 2 bars, 1 Spa by l Occitane, 1 gym and 3 meeting rooms. Do not miss the view from its rooftop of the medieval city and the Gulf of Angels. In front of the marina, close to the cit y center, starting point to visit the main tourist attractions. A 10-minute drive will take you to the famous Poetto Beach.accorhotels.com

name: Grande Albergo Delle Nazioni
address: Lungomare Nazario Sauro 7, 70121 Bari, Bari
description: Right on the seafront, Grande Albergo Delle Nazioni features a heated outdoor pool, a gourmet restaurant, and a spacious terrace with sea views. Rooms are modern and air conditioned, and Wi-Fi is free throughout. The rooms are spacious, elegant and fitted with parquet floors, and they all feature a light-blue marine décor, as well as en suite bathrooms. Some rooms also have sea views. At Grande Albergo Delle Nazioni you can also unwind just by admiring the sea and city views from the spacious terrace. Breakfast is served daily in the dining room, and it includes sweet and savoury products. The top-floor restaurant, Ristorante La Terrazza, offers panoramic views and international and Mediterranean cuisine. Bari Centrale Train Station is just 1 km from the hotel. Basilica di San Nicola cathedral is a 20-minute walk away.

name: J44 Lifestyle Hotel
address: Via Dante Alighieri, 46, 30016 Jesolo, Veneto
description: Situated in Lido di Jesolo, 100 metres from Lido di Jesolo, J44 Lifestyle Hotel features accommodation with free bikes, private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. Each accommodation at the 5-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a shared lounge and to a terrace. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a shuttle service, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. All rooms have a wardrobe. The daily breakfast offers buffet, à la carte or continental options. At J44 Lifestyle Hotel you will find a restaurant serving Italian, Mediterranean and Seafood cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. You can play tennis at the accommodation, and the area is popular for cycling. Caribe Bay is 4.5 km from J44 Lifestyle Hotel, while Caorle Archaeological Sea Museum is 25 km from the property. The nearest airport is Venice Marco Polo Airport, 32 km from the hotel.

name: Grand Hotel Vesuvio
address: Via Partenope, 45, 80121 Naples, Naples
description: Located right on the seafront, the prestigious Grand Hotel Vesuvio overlooks the Gulf of Naples, the island of Capri and Mount Vesuvius. This hotel features a luxury indoor pool, fitness centre with personal trainer and a wellness area with hot tub, sauna and steam bath. From April to October, the Wonderful Sky Lounge Solarium & Cocktail Bar has full views of Gulf of Naples. Rooms are spacious and elegantly decorated. All air-conditioned, they also feature a minibar and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some have a balcony with sea views. The Vesuvio Grand Hotel serves a varied buffet breakfast each morning. The Caruso Roof Garden Restaurant on the 9th floor offers classic Italian cuisine and panoramic views across the Mediterranean Sea. The hotel is opposite the Castel dell'Ovo in the historic quarter of Santa Lucia. The port for boats to Capri, Sorrento and other destinations is 15 minutes' walk away.

name: Hotel Belair
address: Via Capo, 29, 80067 Sorrento, Naples
description: Set on the cliff tops and a 15-minute walk from the centre of Sorrento, Hotel Belair offers an outdoor pool, à la carte restaurant and elegant-style accommodation with a sea-view balcony. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. Air-conditioned rooms at the 5-star Belair Hotel feature a satellite flat-screen TV, minibar and safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. A continental breakfast is provided daily and includes both hot and cold items. The on-site restaurant specialises in local cuisine and meals are served on one of the panoramic terraces with views of the Bay of Naples. Guests can enjoy the fitness centre and relax on the terrace with sun loungers. The property provides free private parking on site. Sorrento Train Station, where guests can catch trains to Naples, is 2 km away. Positano is a 30-minute drive away.

name: La Plage Resort
address: Via Nazionale 107/A, 98039 Taormina, Sicily
description: Overlooking the Ionian Sea, La Plage Resort is set directly on its free private beach, within the Isola Bella Nature Reserve. It features modern rooms and bungalows with garden or sea views. The cable way to the historic centre of Taormina is a 10-minute walk away. All accommodation comes with a modern design, air conditioning, and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All rooms have a balcony or patio, and some bungalows offer a private garden with hot tub. The Fusion restaurant specialises in traditional Sicilian cuisine, made with genuine local products. The bar serves international cocktails and spirits. A sweet Italian breakfast is available daily. La Plage provides a variety of beauty treatments and an outdoor massage gazebo. Expure Spa is complete with Turkish bath, hydromassage showers and chromotherapy. Staff can organise excursions to Mount Etna Regional Park, a 45-minute drive away. Parking is free.

name: Hotel Continental
address: Via Pagana, 8, 16038 Santa Margherita Ligure, Genoa
description: Overlooking the Bay of Santa Margherita Ligure and Portofino Promontory, Hotel Continental is surrounded by a landscaped garden leading to the beach. It features a fitness and wellness centre, and 2 restaurants. Continental Hotel's rooms are all equipped with free Wi-Fi and air conditioning. Some rooms have a private balcony with views of the garden or the sea. The restaurant with panoramic sea-view terrace serves buffet breakfast, lunch and dinner. Between May until October the small restaurant on the beach offers fresh fish, pasta, and salads. The Continental offers free use of the gym. The wellness centre includes a sauna, caldarium, and massage rooms. The hotel features both an indoor garage and a private outdoor parking.

name: Grand Hotel Royal
address: Via Correale 42, 80067 Sorrento, Naples
description: Featuring a private on-site beach and lush, palm-filled gardens, the Grand Hotel Royal is located on a cliff top in central Sorrento. It has an outdoor pool and panoramic views of the Gulf of Naples and Vesuvius. The rooms offer views of the sea, the gardens, or the town. Classically decorated with Sorrentine wooden furniture, each room has free WiFi and most include a marble bathroom and a balcony. In high season, guests enjoy free access to the beach, and free use of parasols, sun beds and beach towels. Inside, the lounges feature antique furniture, marbled staircases and crystal chandeliers. Grand Hotel Royal offers a complete gastronomic experience. It includes different on-site restaurants and bars serving regional and classic Italian cuisine. Several have panoramic views of the surrounding landscape. The hotel is a 5-minute walk from the Circumvesuviana Railway Station, which connects Sorrento with Naples, 50 km away. Pompeii and the Vesuvius National Park are a 40-minute drive away.

name: Grand Hotel La Favorita
address: Via Tasso 61, 80067 Sorrento, Naples
description: Set in the centre of Sorrento and boasting a sun terrace and heated outdoor pool with views of the Gulf of Naples and Mount Vesuvius, Grand Hotel La Favorita offers accommodation with a balcony. Wi-Fi is free. Air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel La Favorita feature Vietri tiles, a satellite TV and minibar. The private bathroom comes with slippers, a hairdryer and free toiletries. An Italian buffet breakfast is provided daily. The à la carte restaurant specialises in Mediterranean dishes with typical products from Sorrento, while the bar serves snacks and a selection of cocktails. The 5-star hotel is located 1 km from Sorrento Harbour where guests can catch ferries to the island of Capri. Positano is a 30-minute drive away. When staying more than 2 nights, a welcome drink is offered.

name: Marina Place Resort
address: Via Pionieri e Aviatori d'Italia 129, 16154 Genoa, Genoa
description: Marina Place Resort is 1 km from Genoa's Cristoforo Colombo Airport. It offers air-conditioned rooms with modern décor and LCD satellite TV. Free parking is provided. Featuring contemporary furnishings, rooms provide free Wi-Fi. They also have a bathroom with hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers. Some overlook the Marina. The hotel has a 24-hour reception, a gym and a wellness area with Turkish bath. Marina Place is 8 km from the centre of Genoa and 2.5 km from the A10 Motorway. Genova Cornigliano Train Station is 10 minutes away on foot.

name: Ortea Palace Hotel, Sicily, Autograph Collection
address: Via Riva Nazario Sauro 1, 96100 Siracusa, Sicily
description: Ortea Palace, Autograph Collection is a magnificent building dating back to 1920 and known as the Syracuse Post Office. Located in the heart of Ortygia island, it overlooks the charming Porto Piccolo. After an impeccable restructuring and restoration, the old post office building is now home to our splendid hotel, unique of its kind, which preserves the fascinating history of the original structure. Ortea Palace is a luxury destination, inclusive and exclusive at the same time, offering immersive and authentic experiences, inspired by the abundance of the local heritage.Since opened, the Ortea Palace has become the obvious choice for visitors looking for a luxury hotel where every detail is like nothing else.The hotel offers 75 rooms and suites with views over the Porto Piccolo and the Gulf of Ortygia, all decorated in an exclusive refined style, featuring elegant marble and luxury fabrics.The place where to relax, discover and indulge in ancient rituals, rooted in the authentic heritage of the island.Marriott

name: Romeo Napoli
address: Via Cristoforo Colombo 45, 80133 Naples, Naples
description: The ROMEO Napoli is opposite the ferry port for Capri and Ischia. The hotel features a rooftop pool overlooking Naples Harbour. The property offers free Wi-Fi. Rooms at ROMEO Napoli offer a coffee machine. The property offers a bar and a concierge is available. A breakfast buffet is served each morning. The property offers a cigar room and games lounge in the lobby. The restaurant offers gourmet cuisine and views of the Gulf of Naples. Guests can enjoy a daily free access to the spa, the spa features a gym, kneipp path, hot tubs, saunas and sensory showers.

name: Grand Hotel Ambasciatori
address: Via A Califano 18, 80067 Sorrento, Naples
description: The luxury Grand Hotel Ambasciatori is perched on a cliff overlooking the Tyrrhenian Sea in Sorrento. Offering views of the Bay of Naples from its rooftop terrace, it also has a private beach, garden with pool and free WiFi. Decorated with stucco ceilings, all rooms are very elegant and come with antique furniture and chairs or armchairs. Each one has an LCD TV and a balcony, some with beautiful sea views. Hotel Ambasciatori has a private beach with sunbathing terrace. In high season, guests enjoy free access to the beach, as well as free use of deck chairs, parasols and towels. A tennis court is available in the property's surroundings. Restaurant Le Muse serves traditional Italian, Neapolitan and international cuisine. Meals are served in the elegant dining room or on the terrace, both with views of the sea. There are 3 bars, one in the building, one by the pool, one at the bottom of the cliff. Snacks, drinks and cocktails, are available day and night. The hotel is a 5-minute walk from Piazza Tasso, Sorrento’s main square. The pier for ferries to Capri island can be reached on foot in 15 minutes.

name: Hotel Weber Ambassador
address: Via Marina Piccola 118, Capri, Naples
description: The 4-star Weber Ambassador overlooks the bay of Marina Piccola and the Faraglioni rocks. It offers a free shuttle to/from Capri centre, and free access to its 2 pools, hot tub and fitness centre. Spacious rooms are air conditioned, and feature an LCD TV and en suite bathroom. Most come with a balcony or terrace, and some have views of the Tyrrhenian Sea. Wi-Fi is available. The property is complete with 2 bars and an international à la carte restaurant specialising in fresh fish dishes. You can relax at the on-site hair salon, or take in the panoramic view from the terrace. A stairway from Hotel Weber Ambassador takes you directly to the beach shore.

name: Imperiale Palace Hotel
address: Via Pagana, 19, 16038 Santa Margherita Ligure, Genoa
description: An elegant, 19th-century villa, lush gardens, a private beach, and a spectacular view across the bay, these are just some of the reasons to choose Imperiale Palace Hotel. Once the residence of a noble family, this impressive villa has now been turned into a luxury hotel. It has a panoramic location in Santa Margherita Ligure, 5 km from Portofino and 3 km from Rapallo. Your room comes with air conditioning and Satellite TV, and some have a beautiful sea view. Throughout the summer you can relax on the private beach or at the sea-water pool with sunbathing terrace. You will also find a fitness centre, which includes a Turkish bath and a massage room. The Imperiale Palace features modern conference facilities with a maximum capacity of 200. The restaurant with sea-view terrace provides a special setting for a candlelit meal. In summer, lunch is served on the beach in the form of a rich buffet of local specialities and fresh fish.

name: Hotel Rufolo
address: Via San Francesco 1, 84010 Ravello, Salerno
description: The family-run Hotel Rufolo is in the historic centre of Ravello, next to the beautiful Villa Rufolo gardens. Rooms offer views of the garden or the sea. This elegant hotel features a garden with outdoor swimming pool, and a beautiful lounge with a terrace overlooking the Villa's 12th-century tower. The interiors are decorated with luxurious marble flooring and antique furnishings. With free WiFi, all rooms at the Rufolo come with air conditioning, a satellite TV, and private bathroom. A continental breakfast is served daily. The Sigilgaida restaurant specialises in local and Mediterranean cuisine, made from ingredients grown in the garden. The panoramic dining veranda offers views of the lemon groves all along the Amalfi coast. The hotel is a 15-minute drive from Amalfi.

name: Hotel Piccolo Sant'Andrea
address: Via Campo 15, 84010 Praiano, Salerno
description: Located in Pietra Piana between Positano and Praiano, Hotel Piccolo Sant'Andrea features free access to the spa centre. It offers free WiFi throughout, free parking,a spacious and furnished garden and on-site bar. It is provided with elegantly decorated rooms with a sea-view balcony. Boasting a contemporary style, the rooms come with a satellite flat-screen TV, air conditioning, minibar and tea/coffee making facilities. Each room includes a private bathroom, which is equipped with bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. Some also come with a four-poster bed. Positano is just 4 km from Piccolo Sant'Andrea Hotel, while Amalfi can be reached in a 1-hour drive. A free shuttle service to/from Positano and Praiano is available.

name: Hotel La Floridiana
address: Via Campo Di Teste 16, 80073 Capri, Naples
description: Offering views of the Mediterranean Sea on Capri Island, La Floridiana features a seasonal outdoor pool with mosaic tiles and hydromassage jets. Via Camerelle shopping street is 3 minutes away on foot. Air-conditioned rooms at the Floridiana include a minibar, and satellite TV with pay-per-view channels. Many have a sea-view balcony or terrace. Wi-Fi is free in the entire building. A varied buffet breakfast is served daily from 07:30 to 10:30, including pastries, fruit juices and cheeses. The restaurant features a terrace with sea view and drinks are available from the stylish wine bar. Relaxing Thai massages are available on request and the property's staff is multilingual, including Russian and Arabic. The hotel is 5 minutes' drive from the port in Marina Grande for boats to Italy's mainland. The popular streets of Via Krupp and Via Tragara are also nearby.

name: The Pelican Beach Resort & Spa - Adults Only
address: Via Mar Adriatico, 34, 07026 Olbia, Sardinia
description: The Pelican Beach Resort & SPA is an adult-only hotel set right by the sea between Olbia and Golfo Aranci on the north-east coast of Sardinia. It offers a garden, wellness centre and access to a sandy beach. It consists of 2 buildings, 1 a few steps from the beach and the other 60 metres away. The Pelican Beach Resort & SPA - Adults Only also features an outdoor pool, sunbathing area, and a restaurant with a spacious terrace overlooking the sea. Dining on the terrace is available on request. The outdoor fitness area has views of the Tavolara Island. Rooms come with satellite TV and air conditioning and some also have a private balcony with table and chairs. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. Scooters and cars can be rented at reception. Olbia is just 8 km away, while the airport and harbour can be reached in 15 minutes by car. Porto Cervo is approximately 30 km away.

name: Hyatt Regency Nice Palais de la Mediterranee
address: 13-15 Promenade Des Anglais, 06000 Nice
description: Set on the Promenade des Anglais, Hyatt Regency Nice Palais de la Méditerranée is an art-deco style hotel featuring an on-site casino, an indoor and outdoor swimming pool, a hammam and a sauna. The terrace offers panoramic views of the Baie des Anges. Free WiFi, a minibar, tea and coffee making facilities and a flat-screen TV are provided in the air-conditioned guest rooms and suites. Most have a furnished terrace with views of the sea or of the town. Regional cuisine and Mediterranean dishes are served in the hotel's restaurant, Le 3e. You can enjoy drinks in the Lounge Bar Le 3e at Hyatt Regency Nice Palais de la Méditerranée. The fitness centre at the Hyatt Regency Nice Palais de la Méditerranée has cardio-training gym equipment. Nice Train Station is a 5-minute walk, while Nice-Cote d’Azur Airport is just 6 km away. This hotel is eco-certified by Green Globe.

name: Le Méridien Nice
address: 1 Promenade Des Anglais, 06046 Nice
description: Discover a modern design hotel in Nice and unlock the timeless elegance of the South of France. Offering a chic French Riviera beachfront hotel setting, Le Meridien Nice is the ideal place to unwind, indulge and relax in the alluring Cote d Azur. Located at the iconic, No 1. Promenade des Anglais, just steps away from Nice Old Town, this family friendly hotel invites guests to take in everything the destination has to offer. Be captivated by exhilarating views of the Mediterranean Sea from a selection of the 318 luxury guest rooms, including 15 suites. Reimagined to evoke the glamorous 1960s, each curated space reflects regional and cosmopolitan flair. Delight in local flavours and creative cocktails at Latitude Bar. Head to the rooftop with its panoramic Baie des Anges views, experience elevated dining at La Terrasse or awaken the senses with a dip in the outdoor heated pool.Marriott

name: Intercontinental Marseille - Hotel Dieu, An IHG Hotel
address: 1 Place Daviel, 13002 Marseille, Bouches-du-Rhône
description: The epitome of luxury, the InterContinental Marseille-Hotel Dieu is located in Marseille’s historic Panier district. You can enjoy a pastis aperitif on the terrace with views of Notre Dame de la Garde Basilica before dining on Mediterranean dishes in the Michelin-starred Alcyone restaurant. Work out in the fitness room, swim in the indoor pool, or unwind with a treatment in the chic SPA by Clarins. Five minutes’ walk away, boats line the quay of the Vieux-Port, in the heart of the city.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Novotel Marseille Vieux Port
address: 36 Boulevard Charles Livon, 13007 Marseille, Bouches-du-Rhône
description: Get away from it all at the Novotel Marseille Vieux-Port hotel situated in the heart of Marseilles. Relax in the hotel's comfortable rooms during a family vacation, a romantic weekend or a business trip. The six meeting rooms can accommodate your conferen ces, then you can relax in the outdoor pool or the whirlpool bath. Enjoy the friendly atmosphere and contemporary decor of the restaurant overlooking the Old Port and discover the calanques of Marseilles. Enjoy the Mediterranean way of life at Novotelaccorhotels.com

name: Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Ajaccio Bay
address: D55 Agosta Plage, 20166 Ajaccio, Corsica
description: Just 100 metres from Agosta Beach, this hotel features a spa with hammam and hot tub, a terrace and a garden with a heated, outdoor pool with a poolside bar. It proposes air-conditioned rooms and car rental. Free Wi-Fi is available in each en suite room. All rooms feature extras long beds, a balcony and ironing facilities. Breakfast is provided in the form of a buffet each morning. For other meals you can try regional food in the restaurant while enjoying views of Ajaccio Bay. Afterwards you can relax in the hotel bar. Located 5 km from Porticcio and its beach, the Radisson Blu Resort & Spa is 19 km from Ajaccio town centre. Services include a laundry, business centre and organisation of excursions.

name: Hotel Port Toga
address: Rond Point DE Toga, 20200 Bastia, Corsica
description: Hotel Port Toga is located in Bastia, just a 2-minute walk from Port de Toga. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Free WiFi is available throughout. The guest rooms and suites feature a flat-screen TV, desk and security deposit box. The private bathrooms have either a bath or shower. The suites also offer a balcony. A buffet breakfast is available every morning serving locally sourced produce. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Saint-Florent is 24 km away. The nearest airport is Poretta Airport, 21 km from Hotel Port Toga.

name: Hotel Mariana
address: Avenue Santa Maria,0495653138, 20260 Calvi, Corsica
description: Just a 5-minute walk from the centre of Calvi, this hotel features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool with panoramic views of the sea and the mountains. It also has a hot tub, a sauna and fitness room. A flat-screen TV is provided in the air-conditioned guest rooms. Each has its own balcony and a private bathroom with bathroom products. Continental breakfasts can be delivered directly to guests’ rooms or selected from the buffet. Afterwards, guests can relax on sun loungers on the large terrace and use Wi-Fi for free. Calvi’s sandy beaches are a 10-minute walk from Le Mariana and Ile Rousse is 25 km away. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Boutique Hotel Liberata
address: La Marinella - - Isola Rossa, 20220 L'Île-Rousse, Corsica
description: Set in a traditional Corsican mansion in the centre of L’Île-Rousse, Hôtel Liberata offers direct access to the beach and panoramic sea views. Guests can relax by the heated, outdoor swimming pool or in the spa free of charge. The rooms at Hôtel Liberata are air conditioned and offer free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV and a minibar. Some rooms have a balcony or terrace and all rooms have a private bathroom with a shower, slippers and bathrobe. Every morning a buffet breakfast is served, and guests can enjoy a drink at the on-site bar. Restaurants can be found within a 5 minute walk from the hotel. The Calvi - Sainte-Catherine Airport is just 30 minutes away and L’Île-Rousse Port with ferries to Marseilles, Nice, Toulon and Vado Ligure is just 1 km away. Guests can enjoy the hammam, massages, and fitness room at the hotel. Free private parking is available on-site.

name: Hotel Kasano
address: Avenue de l'Uruguay, 20260 Calvi, Corsica
description: Set in Calvi, 400 metres from Roncu Beach, KASANO & Spa features views of the sea. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property features an outdoor pool, fitness centre, sauna and bar. At the hotel all rooms come with air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a terrace with a city view. The units feature a safety deposit box. A buffet, continental or Full English/Irish breakfast is available every morning at the property. Pinède Beach is less than 1 km from KASANO & Spa, while Alga Beach is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Calvi – Sainte-Catherine Airport, 5 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Corsica
address: Route De Pietramaggiore,48, 20260 Calvi, Corsica
description: Hotel Corsica offers panoramic view of Calvi bay, set in the Corsican hills. It has an outdoor heated pool, sunbathing terrace Each of the Hotel Corsica’s air-conditioned guest rooms has a private bathroom with amenities, satellite TV and a private balcony. Free WiFi is available. For no extra fee, guests of Hotel Corsica can relax in the spa area which includes a hammam, a sauna, a hot tub and a fitness room. For a fee, massages and other treatments using Corsican products can be booked. A full buffet breakfast is available in the mornings and lunch can be enjoyed by the Hotel Corsica’s swimming pool. Room service options are also available. The shuttle to the Calvi airport and train station is free and the shuttle to the city centre and the beach is possible provided the purchase of a package for € 20.00 per day and per room.

name: Hotel Revellata
address: 2 Avenue Napoleon, 20260 Calvi, Corsica
description: Hotel Revellata is located in the Corsican town of Calvi, 450 metres from the harbour and 100 metres from Ronco Beach. It has an outdoor heated pool, a gym, and a spa with a hot tub, sauna and indoor lap pool. Free WiFi is available throughout and free secure private parking is available onsite. Each guest room at the Revellata features air-conditioning, a TV and a private bathroom. Some of the rooms have a private balcony. Guests of the Revellata Hotel can relax with a drink in the bar. A buffet breakfast is served daily for a supplement. Massages are available upon reservation and for an extra charge. The Hotel Revellata is situated 1 km from Calvi Beach and the Cathedral. The Torra di Calvi are just 500 metres away and guests can enjoy tennis and water sports nearby.

name: La Villa Calvi
address: Chemin de Notre Dame de la Serra, 20260 Calvi, Corsica
description: This 5-star hotel is set a 5-minute drive from the centre of Calvi, in the North West of Corsica. It offers 5 different swimming pools, a tennis court, a fitness centre and a variety of beauty treatments. Each spacious room has a simple, elegant décor and includes a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an iPod docking station and a minibar. A bathrobe, slippers, a hairdryer and free toiletries are provided in each private bathroom. La Table by La Villa offers Mediterranean-inspired cuisine featuring locally-caught fish and other local produce. There is also the Pool Bar or the more intimate Jo’s Bar for snacks and drinks. Guests have access to the restaurant which has a private beach. Sunbeds are reserved for guests. Calvi beach is a 15-minute walk away. Free WiFi is available and there is free private parking on site.

name: A'mare Corsica - Seaside Resort
address: Route De La Corniche, 20110 Propriano, Corsica
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 26 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring minibars and espresso makers. Your Select Comfort bed comes with premium bedding. Flat-screen televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Bathrooms have designer toiletries and hair dryers. Amenities Dip into one of the 2 spa tubs or enjoy other recreational amenities including a sauna and a fitness center. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a fireplace in the lobby. Getting to the surf and sand is a breeze with the complimentary beach shuttle. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and multilingual staff. Planning an event in Propriano? This hotel has 700 square feet (65 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and a meeting room. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at Miramar Corsica in Propriano, you'll be on the waterfront, just a 3-minute walk from Southern Corsica Beaches and a 2-minute drive from Les Bains de Baracci. This 5-star hotel is 2.2 mi (3.5 km) from Plage de Capu Laurosu and 4.9 mi (7.9 km) from Portigliolo Beach. Dining Grab a bite to eat at Le Deck Lounge, a poolside bar/lounge which features a pool view. You can also stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7:30 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee. Renovations The property is closed between September 19 and May 25. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 2.20 per person, per night. This tax does not apply to children under 18 years of age. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Optional Charges Fee for buffet breakfast: approximately EUR 32 for adults and EUR 25 for children Pet fee: EUR 35 per pet, per day Service animals are exempt from fees Rollaway bed fee: EUR 75.0 per night The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. name: Résidence Chiar' DI Luna
address: Ferrulaghjolu, 20144 Sainte-Lucie-de-Porto-Vecchio, Corsica
description: No description found

name: Hotel & Spa Des Pecheurs
address: Ile de Cavallo, 20169 Bonifacio, Corsica
description: Hotel & SPA des Pecheurs is located on the island of Cavallo, between Corsica and Sardinia. The elegant hotel offers a swimming pool in its garden, a spa centre and a French and Italian restaurant. The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel & SPA des Pecheurs have a view of the sea or the garden. Guests can relax in the seating area, watching TV or using the free WiFi access. The continental breakfast is included and served in the dining room, or it can be brought to your room. The elegant hotel’s bar features a terrace that provides direct access to the private beach. Other activities include a tennis court, concierge service and diving activities. Massages are available at an additional cost. The hotel is located 8 km from the coast of Sardinia. Hotel boat transfers are available upon request for an extra charge. Public boat transfers are available only from Corsica with scheduled timetables.

name: Les Regalia Hotel & Spa
address: D168A Pinarello, 20144 Sainte-Lucie-de-Porto-Vecchio, Corsica
description: Set in Sainte-Lucie de Porto-Vecchio, 600 metres from Plage de Pinarellu, Les Regalia Hôtel & Spa offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation features a concierge service, a tour desk and luggage storage for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Les Regalia Hôtel & Spa provides certain units with sea views, and each room has a balcony. At the accommodation all rooms come with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes buffet, à la carte and continental options. Guests can make use of the business centre or relax in the bar. Plage de Villata is 2.9 km from Les Regalia Hôtel & Spa, while Porto Vecchio Port is 18 km away. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 37 km from the hotel.

name: Hôtel & Spa Version Maquis Citadelle
address: Lieu-Dit Brancuccio, 20169 Bonifacio, Corsica
description: Situated in Bonifacio, Hôtel & Spa Version Maquis Citadelle boasts air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The hotel has a year-round outdoor infinity pool, a spa and fitness centre, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant. Free private parking is available on site. Each room features a private terrace with a view. The rooms are equipped with an extra large double bed, a coffee machine, a flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and a safety deposit box. The private bathrooms have a shower, free essential oils toiletries and a hair dryer. A buffet breakfast is available every day and features local produce and Corsican recipes. Bike hire is available at this hotel and the area is popular for golfing. The hotel also offers car hire. The King Aragon Steps down to the beach are 1.6 km from the property while Spérone Golf Course is 7 km away. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 24 km from the property. for any reservation of more than 3 rooms special conditions are applicable

name: Hotel L'Acquale
address: Avenue Santa Maria, 20260 Calvi, Corsica
description: This 4-star hotel is located in the town centre of Calvi and offers a heated outdoor swimming pool. The hotel is 500 metres from the port and 800 metres from the white sandy beach. The spacious guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a minibar. All rooms feature a balcony with a view. Each guest room has a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. Hotel L'Acquale features a lounge bar. A continental breakfast is served every morning. Guests can also order breakfast à la carte. Free, secure, covered parking garage is available on site. The property is 7 km from Calvi Sainte-Catherine Airport.

name: Hôtel Les Terrasses D'Eze
address: 1138 Route De La Turbie, 06360 Eze, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Offering a panoramic sea view and a seasonal infinity swimming pool, Les Terrasses d'Eze - Hôtel & Spa is set in the hills of Èze, 14 km from Nice and 9 km from Monaco. Among the various facilities of this property are a garden and a terrace. The restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine. Offering a terrace, all air-conditioned rooms are fitted with a flat-screen satellite TV, a kettle, a bath, free toiletries and a desk. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The daily breakfast offers continental and buffet options. Guests can also enjoy a drink in the lounge bar. The on-site paid spa offers treatments including massages, wraps and a floating room (reservation is needed). A fitness centre and a pétanque court are available at an extra cost. Staff are available to help at the 24-hour front desk. Some family rooms are accessible to people with reduced mobility (only on request and subject to availability) The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, 20 km from Les Terrasses d'Eze - Hôtel & Spa.

name: Chateau De La Chevre D Or
address: Rue du Barri, 06360 Eze, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Set in the heart of Eze, this luxury hotel offers spectacular views of Saint-Jean-Cap-Ferrat. The five-star facilities include private gardens, outdoor heated pool, wellness centre and air-conditioned accommodation with spa bath. All of the soundproofed rooms and suites are decorated with elegant furniture. They are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV and a minibar. Guests can choose from four different restaurants, each with a panoramic sea view, serving different types of cuisine. Mediterranean specialities are served in 1 restaurant, while the Café du Jardin offers light lunches. The Bar du Chateau, has a castle-style decor with marble columns and a large fireplace. It features all kinds of spirits, vintage brandies and champagne. Guests have access to Eze tennis club and the wellness centre. It includes a fitness room, overlooking the sea. Massages are also possible on request. Free Wi-Fi access is provided in the entire hotel, and the 24-hour reception can organise the valet service.

name: Hotel Metropole, Monte Carlo
address: 4, Avenue De La Madone, Monaco 98000
description: The Hotel Metropole Monte-Carlo offers a guest experience marked by luxury, serenity and gastronomy. This magnificent five-star hotel perfectly embodies the glamour of yesteryear and the modern elegance of Monte-Carlo; as well as being located in a unique location in the Carré d’Or, just a few steps from the Casino. Hotel Metropole Monte-Carlo features 4 restaurants. Les Ambassadeurs by Christophe Cussac offers a gourmet contemporary Mediterranean cuisine. Yoshi, the only Japanese restaurant on the Côte d'Azur to be awarded a Michelin star since 2010, showcases typically Japanese cuisine. The Odyssey restaurant where you can enjoy lunch by the pool, was designed by Karl Lagerfeld and the Lobby Bar with its terrace, trendy and elegant, proposes delightful gourmet moments all day long… Covered throughout the winter and al fresco during the rest of the year, the Odyssey pool is an oasis of relaxation and well-being nestled in the heart of Monte-Carlo. The Spa Metropole by Givenchy, designed by architect Didier Gomez, reflects the refinement and modernity of the House, to the finest detail. Beauty, well-being, relaxation: each treatment ritual is a ‘haute couture’ experience. With private parking on site, the hotel is 2 km from the Monte-Carlo Golf Club and Nice Côte-d’Azur Airport is 30 km away.

name: Canopy by Hilton Cannes
address: 2 Boulevard Jean Hibert, 06400 Cannes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Overlooking the harbor and sandy beaches, we are just a five-minute walk from La Croisette, the world-famous Palais des Festivals and the main shopping streets. The art district is just around the corner and we’re only five minutes from the Musée des Explorations du Monde, the Tour Carrée and the church. Take in beautiful views of the city from our rooftop restaurant and bar.Hilton

name: Hotel Royal Riviera
address: 3, Avenue Jean Monnet, 06230 Saint-Jean-Cap-Ferrat, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Located on the peninsula of Cap-Ferrat and offering panoramic views of Provençal gardens and the Mediterranean, this five-star 96-room hotel provides the intimacy of a private villa with the luxury and glamour of a palace. Guests have free access to the seasonal beach from mid-May to the end of September and to the heated pool, sauna, hammam and fitness room. Each air-conditioned room has a private bathroom stocked with free toiletries. Some rooms offer sea and garden views. The Hotel Royal-Riviera Hotel has a gourmet restaurant 'La Table du Royal' with a terrace and panoramic view of the sea. The poolside bar and restaurant 'Jasmin Grill & Lounge', open for lunch all year round, offers a view of Kerylos Villa. Free WiFi access and valet service are available on site. Hotel Royal-Riviera is just 15 minutes from Monaco and Nice and 30 minutes from Nice International Airport. A charging station for electric cars is available at this property.

name: Fairmont Monte-Carlo
address: 12 Avenue Des Spélugues, Monaco 98000
description: Set in the heart of the Principality of Monaco, overlooking the Mediterranean and with splendid views of the Riviera, the Fairmont Monte Carlo invites you to enjoy a unique stay in one of the world's most glamorous destinations. Located close to the legendary Monte Carlo Casino and the elegant Carré d'Or shopping district, the hotel provides unparalleled experiences, including a prime view of the most famous bend in the F1 circuit, the Fairmont Hairpin. A kids club is available in July and August.accorhotels.com

name: Thalazur Antibes - Hôtel & Spa
address: 770 Chemin des Moyennes Breguieres, 06600 Antibes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: The Thalazur Antibes - Hôtel & Spa is a 12-minute drive from the center of Antibes, in the heart of the Côte d'Azur. It offers views of the Baie des Anges and the Southern Alps. Decorated in a modern style, all air-conditioned rooms feature flat-screen TVs and telephones. Private bathrooms feature bath or shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. The hotel's restaurant, L'Angelus, serves traditional cuisine and buffet breakfast at an additional cost. Breakfast is free for children under 12. Guests can enjoy the indoor spa, which includes a heated seawater pool, whirlpool, sauna, hammam, fitness room, relaxation area and outdoor seawater pools, one of which is heated at certain times of the year. The hotel specializes in Thalassotherapy, offering seawater treatments and massages. The property features a 24-hour reception and private parking. A shuttle service to and from Antibes train station, 3.8 km from the property, is also available at an additional cost and upon reservation. The Picasso Museum is a 15-minute drive away. The Biot golf course is a 7-minute drive away. Nice Côte d'Azur airport is 14 km from Thalazur Antibes - Hôtel & Spa.

name: Kube Saint-Tropez
address: 319 Route du Littoral, 83580 Gassin, Var
description: Kube Hotel St Tropez is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Saint-Tropez. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Kube Hotel St Tropez. Television LCD/plasma screen, slippers, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms can be found in selected guestrooms. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include fitness center, golf course (within 3 km), outdoor pool, garden. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Kube Hotel St Tropez.Agoda

name: Hôtel Martinez Cannes
address: 73 La Croisette, 06400 Cannes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Located on the famous La Croisette Boulevard in Cannes, Hotel Martinez - in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt is a 5-star hotel featuring a private beach, which is accessible for an extra charge. Guests can enjoy a meal in one of the onsite restaurants or a drink at the Martinez bar. Entirely renovated in May 2018, guest rooms at Hotel Martinez - in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt are decorated in a contemporary Art Deco style and feature a seating area. Each air-conditioned room features a marble bathroom and some have a private terrace with views of the Mediterranean Sea. Opened in May 2018, the restaurant Le Jardin du Martinez offers seating on a terrace in the shade of palm and cypress trees, and in fine weather guests can enjoy the 1930's themed garden parties hosted at the restaurant. Guests seeking a fine dining experience are invited to dine at the 2 Michelin star La Palme d'Or restaurant, which specialises in cuisine inspired by cinema and offers a view of the Croisette. Located on the beach, the La Plage du Martinez restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine with local produce and fresh seafood. The Martinez Bar celebrates the history of the Hotel Martinez and proposes a range of cocktails and gin and tonics, in addition to a nightly live culinary show on the Teppan plancha grill. Spa services such as massages, body treatments and facials are available and guests can exercise in the fitness centre. Hotel Martinez - in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt offers direct access onto the beach and is within walking distance of the shopping area. With a secure private car park, the hotel also offers valet parking. Nice-Cote-d’Azur Airport is 20 km away.

name: Hôtel Barrière Le Majestic Cannes
address: 10, La Croisette, 06407 Cannes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Offering views of the Mediterranean Sea, Hôtel Barrière Le Majestic Cannes is located on the famous Boulevard La Croisette in Cannes, 110 meters from the Palais des Festivals and the old port. It has a heated outdoor swimming pool, a spa and a private beach. Guests have free access to the wellness area and the 24-hour gym. The Hotel Barrière Le Majestic Cannes offers air-conditioned, soundproofed rooms and suites, LCD satellite TV, free Wi-Fi and private bathroom. Most have sea views. During your stay at Hôtel Barrière Le Majestic Cannes, you can enjoy massages and relaxation therapies at the hotel spa, Spa Diane Barrière, which uses Biologique Recherche products. You can also relax on the hotel terrace or on the private beach, deck chairs can be rented on site. The hotel has 3 restaurants: The traditional French brasserie, Fouquet's, serves a menu created in collaboration with the three-star chef Pierre Gagnaire. Paradiso Nicole & Pierre serves Italian cuisine with a Mediterranean influence. The BFire by Mauro Colagreco restaurant is located on the private beach. The hotel offers a children's club, Le Studio by Petit VIP, free for children from 4 to 12 years old. The hotel is located just a minute's walk from the beach, 400 meters from Cannes train station and 27 km from Nice airport. Secure private parking is also available at an additional cost. Charging stations for electric cars are available on site. During private events or congresses, the beach may be closed. During this period, customers can access the establishment's partner beaches. Cannes is a dynamic city that hosts a multitude of cultural, professional and festive events throughout the year, which can cause some inconveniences due to the crowds, such as noise or large structures erected in all places, especially on the Croisette and the beach. Prior to arrival, the property encourages guests to check in advance for upcoming events. You can visit the site of the Palais des Festivals or that of the city of Cannes.

name: Boutique Hotel & Spa la Villa Cap Ferrat
address: 49 Avenue Denis Semeria, 06230 Saint-Jean-Cap-Ferrat, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 22 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring refrigerators and flat-screen televisions. Your bed comes with premium bedding, and all rooms are furnished with sofa beds. Digital programming and iPod docking stations are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Amenities Relax and unwind with massages, body treatments, and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and a sauna. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. If you're ready for some gaming fun, you can hop on the casino shuttle (surcharge). Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. For a surcharge, guests may use a shuttle from the airport to the hotel (available 24 hours) and a ferry terminal shuttle. Property Location Located in Saint-Jean-Cap-Ferrat, Boutique Hôtel & Spa la Villa Cap Ferrat is near the bay, a 4-minute walk from Cros Dei Pin Beach and 7 minutes by foot from Passable Beach. This hotel is 0.4 mi (0.7 km) from Villa Ephrussi. Dining Grab a bite from the snack bar/deli, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7:30 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 2.01 per person, per night. This tax does not apply to children under 18 years of age. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Optional Charges Fee for buffet breakfast: approximately EUR 16 for adults and EUR 8 for children Airport shuttle fee: EUR 85 per vehicle (maximum occupancy 7) Self parking fee: EUR 15 per night The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.
