name: Grand-Hôtel Du Cap-Ferrat, A Four Seasons Hotel
address: 71 Boulevard Du Général De Gaulle, 06230 Saint-Jean-Cap-Ferrat, Alpes-Maritimes
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a sauna and a pool, as well as a lifeguard on site and free WiFi. Other amenities include Egyptian cotton sheets, designer toiletries, premium bedding, and laundry facilities.Expedia

name: Hotel Cap Estel
address: 1312, Avenue Raymond Poincaré, 06360 Eze, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Located on the Cap and facing the sea, Hotel Cap Estel features luxury accommodation and a private beach. Guests can enjoy the indoor and outdoor swimming pools, the garden and the wellness centre. All rooms offer free WiFi access, a terrace and panoramic views of the sea and the garden. They also feature a minibar with free soft drinks and a Nespresso coffee machine. The private bathrooms are complete with shower and/or bathtub and toilet. Breakfast is included and the hotel also offers a restaurant and a bar on site. Additional restaurants and bars can be found 2 km from the property. Massages are available upon reservation at an additional cost. Eze Village is 7 km away, Nice is 15 km away and Monaco is 7 km away. Free parking is available on site.

name: La Villa Mauresque
address: 1792 Route De La Corniche, 83700 Saint-Raphaël, Var
description: La Villa Mauresque is a hotel located right on the seafront with far-reaching views of the Gulf of St Tropez. Guests can enjoy free access to the hotel’s swimming pool, seafront spa with hot tub, beach and boathouse with sailing equipment. Free WiFi access is provided in all guest rooms. Most of the rooms at La Villa Mauresque have a view of the sea and some have swimming pool or garden views. The bathrooms have a shower and/or spa bath. Each is equipped with a Malongo machine, a fruit bowl and free Phytomer toiletries. The hotel serves a daily breakfast, which can be taken on the private terrace, by the sea or near the pool. The on-site restaurant, Le Bougainvillier, managed by our chef, offers culinary delights using locally sourced products and best quality ingredients with fixed menus, "à la carte" dining and daily suggestions Guests can enjoy many activities thanks to its free canoes, kayaks, snorkeling material, table tennis and children's toys. Massages, beauty treatments, babysitting, fitness and yacht hire services are available.

name: Hôtel Hermitage Monte-Carlo
address: Square Beaumarchais, Monaco 98000
description: Ideally located steps from Casino Square, the Hôtel Hermitage Monte-Carlo enjoys a fabulous location overlooking the Mediterranean, the Rock, and the Port of Monaco. Built in the early 1900s, its Belle Epoque architecture showcases the magnificent Eiffel cupola located in the Winter Garden and designed by Gustave Eiffel. Respecting its rich heritage, the hotel offers 277 rooms and suites with a perfect blend of authenticity and modernity, including 53 Junior Suites, 22 Suites, and a collection of 13 Diamond Suites, all decorated with classic furniture. Whether you have a quick lunch at the Limùn bar after a shopping spree or indulge in a fabulous dinner at Yannick Alléno's Michelin-starred restaurant Pavyllon Monte-Carlo, you will enjoy an unforgettable culinary journey. For a casual gathering, meet at the Crystal Bar. During the summer, its terrace becomes the Crystal Lounge, a spectacular spot where you can enjoy a glass of champagne under the stars. At the Hôtel Hermitage Monte-Carlo, staying with children will create lasting memories. Children are considered V.I.K. (Very Important Kids) and are offered a special attention. In summer, a playroom is available, providing a perfect opportunity for parents to spend time at the Thermes Marins Monte-Carlo, a 71,000 sq. ft. spa directly connected to the hotel. If you feel like shopping, the Monte-Carlo Shopping Promenade, located just across the street from the hotel offers more than 50 haute-couture boutiques in a chic pedestrian area. For Casino lovers, the best gambling experience is at the world-famous Casino de Monte-Carlo and at Casino Café de Paris. All guests can join our loyalty programme « My Monte-Carlo » to benefit from many advantages, ranging from free admission to the Casino de Monte-Carlo to preferential rates on golf and tennis fees.

name: Monte-Carlo Bay Hotel & Resort
address: 40, Avenue Princesse Grace, Monaco 98000
description: The Monte Carlo Bay Hotel & Resort is a spectacular resort with 332 roomsand suites, set on a garden peninsula. Cultivating a chic but casual ambiance, with 3 restaurants, 3 bars, a Cinq Mondes spa and a casino, it offers a new approach to a legendary destination,blending lightness, enjoyment and an aura of festivity.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hôtel Reisen in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt
address: Skeppsbron 12, 111 30 Stockholm, Stockholms Lan
description: Hotel Reisen in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt provides luxury 5-star accommodation in Stockholm. A short walk from Stockholm Palace, it offers modern rooms equipped with free wireless internet access, a mini bar and a private bathroom. This historic hotel provides a number of facilities, including a plunge pool, a sauna and free Wi-Fi. Romance seekers will enjoy the hotel's features like valet parking and massage services. Hotel Reisen in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt's 144 elegant rooms offer tea and coffee making facilities, an in-room safe and a flat-screen TV, plus all the essentials required for a comfortable stay. They are also fitted with a shower, cable/satellite channels and a hair dryer. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient spot to have a meal. Each evening, guests can enjoy a drink in the lounge bar. Guests are also able to try one of the various bars and restaurants in the local area. Hotel Reisen in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt is conveniently situated for sightseeing in Stockholm, with Stortorget Stockholm just a short stroll away. The Royal Swedish Opera and Kungstradgarden are a 10-minute stroll away.Revato

name: Berns, Historical Boutique Hotel & House of Entertainment since 1863
address: Berzelii Park, Näckstroemsgatan 8, Stockholm, Stockholms Lan
description: Berns, a historical boutiques hotel and house of entertainment since 1863, has 82 personally decorated rooms, 2 restaurants, several night clubs/bars and a large selection of meeting and event venues. The hotel offers the full range of on-site amenities and services like 24 hours room service and Concierge Welcome to the world of Berns!iHotelier/iStay

name: Elite Hotel Marina Tower
address: Saltsjoqvarns Kaj 25, 131 71 Stockholm, Stockholms Lan
description: Situated right by Saltsjö Bay, Elite Hotel Marina Tower offers free WiFi and rooms with flat-screen cable TVs. Stockholm city centre is a 10-minute bus ride away. All rooms at Elite Marina Tower Hotel feature contemporary furnishings and wooden floors. Some rooms include a small seating area and a work desk. The hotel’s outside seating offers magnificent views of the bay and Djurgården island. Both Swedish and international meals are on offer at the in-house restaurant. A buffet breakfast is served every morning 06:30-09:30 weekdays and 07-11:00 on weekends. The vibrant Södermalm district is a 5-minute walk away. The nearest bus stop is within 50 metres. The neighbouring Saltsjökvarn Brygga ferry terminal offers connections to Djurgården, as well as Nybrokajen harbour in Östermalm.

name: Grand Hôtel Stockholm
address: Södra Blasieholmshamnen 8, Stockholm, Stockholms Lan
description: Grand Hôtel Stockholm is situated on the waterfront opposite the Royal Palace and the Old Town, 1 km from Central Station. It offers fine dining, a spa and free WiFi access. Grand’s air-conditioned rooms have an LCD TV with satellite channels and a minibar. Rooms also offer courtyard, city or waterfront views. Grand Hôtel Nordic Spa & Fitness has exercise equipment and an in-door pool. Spa treatments include facials, foot massages and naprapathy. Grand Stockholm also offers chauffeur-driven limousine transfers and 24-hour room service.

name: Clarion Hotel Wisby
address: Strandgatan 6, 621 57 Visby, Gotlands Lan
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Wisby in Visby, SE near the Visby City Center, Botanical Garden, Gotlands Fornsal museum and the Visby Airport. Amenities at our hotel include a free organic breakfast, wireless Internet access, a restaurant and more. All guest rooms have standard room amenities. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues and explore all the best at Visby hotels like our Clarion Hotel Wisby. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required.Choice Hotels

name: Nynäs Havsbad
address: Oskarsgatan 9, 149 23 Nynäshamn, Stockholms Lan
description: This early 1900s property is in Nynäshamn, on Trehörningen Island. It offers spa treatments, panoramic sea views and fine dining. Stockholm city centre is just 45 minutes’ drive away. Nynäs Havsbad’s modern rooms have a TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with shower. Modern European cuisine made from seasonal, local produce is served in the restaurant. A set 3-course menu is offered Monday-Thursday, with à la carte options at weekends. The hotel offers pool and sauna facilities for an extra fee. Various treatments are offered at the on-site spa. In the wintertime, it is possible to take a dip in a hole in the ice. Free public parking spaces are found nearby. Nynäs Havsbad Hotel is 1.5 km from Nynäshamn Station, and Nynäshamn Ferry Terminal is within 5 minutes’ drive.

name: Scandic Park Sandefjord
address: Strandpromenaden 9, 3201 Sandefjord, Vestfold
description: Scandic Park Sandefjord is situated in Sandefjord and is close to the area's popular attractions. It offers complimentary Wi-Fi, an indoor pool and a sauna. The hotel has a gym with a swimming pool. Corporate amenities include meeting rooms. Rooms at Scandic Park Sandefjord are well-appointed and offer a private bathroom, a telephone and a refrigerator. There are also a number of rooms geared towards families. Guests staying at Scandic Park Sandefjord can sit down to a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, conveniently situated for those who want to stay close when looking for a bite to eat. In the evening, guests can relax in the comfortable lounge bar. A wide selection of dining options are also found in close proximity to the property. Scandic Park Sandefjord is within a short walk of the Sandefjord Museum. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Sandefjord Railway Station, which allows convenient access in and around Sandefjord.Revato

name: Atlantic Grand Hotel Travemünde
address: Kaiserallee 2, 23570 Lübeck, Schleswig-Holstein
description: This Grand hotel overlooks the Baltic Sea beach promenade in Lübeck-Travemünde. It offers a free spa with a 20-metre swimming pool, a gym and several saunas. The ATLANTIC Grand Hotel Travemünde offers stylish and elegant rooms and suites that make you feel at home. 5 non-alcoholic drinks from the minibar and WiFi access are all offered free of charge. ATLANTIC Grand Hotel Travemünde offers a restaurant with lovely views of the Baltic Sea at all times of the day. The cosy Holstein's restaurant offers regional cuisine and culinary diversity. The hotel terrace offers great views of the Baltic Sea. Drinks and entertainment are also offered at the hotel bar, the Seven C's Bar. Lübeck city centre is 18 km from the ATLANTIC Grand Hotel Travemünde

name: Athens Marriott Hotel
address: Syngrou Avenue 385, Athens 175 64
description: The Athens Marriott hotel is located on the bustling artery of Syngrou Avenue, within walking distance of the Stavros Niarchos Foundation Cultural Centre and the Athenian Riviera.Designed to perfection, our rooms and suites, are outfitted with contemporary decor and plush bedding, spa inspired bathrooms and modern workspaces. M Club rooms afford guests access to the M Club, the perfect space to recharge. Stay active in our well-equipped fitness centre or recharge your body and soul with our signature spa treatments. Take your seat in The Great Room or join us outdoors in the Atrium and relax in to the chic, urban setting. Indulge in Mediterranean flavours at the Made in Athens restaurant and surround yourself with impeccable views on the e&o Athens rooftop while relaxing with a cocktail and savouring delicious fusion cuisine. Do business in style in our sophisticated spaces where our on site planners and culinary team will take your event to the next level, ensuring you a memorable experience.Marriott

name: Cavo Tagoo Mykonos
address: Tagoo, Mykonos
description: Set in a prime location of Mykonos, Cavo Tagoo Hotel puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas are there for guest's enjoyment. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer television LCD/plasma screen, separate living room, internet access – wireless (complimentary), whirlpool bathtub, air conditioning to ensure a restful night. Access to the hotel's hot tub, fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool, spa will further enhance your satisfying stay. Cavo Tagoo Hotel combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Mykonos unforgettable.Agoda

name: Asty Mykonos Hotel & Spa
address: New Periferal Road of Mykonos, Mykonos 846 00
description: Located in Drafaki, 550 metres from Megali Ammos Beach, Asty Mykonos Hotel & Spa provides accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. 10.2 km from Agia Anna Beach, the property features a bar and a garden. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a patio and a private bathroom with a shower. Every room comes with a coffee machine, while some rooms are equipped with a balcony and others also offer sea views. At Asty Mykonos Hotel & Spa each room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or a à la carte breakfast. Asty Mykonos Hotel & Spa offers a terrace. Bike hire and car hire are available at the hotel and the area is popular for hiking and cycling. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 1 km from Asty Mykonos Hotel & Spa.

name: Aeonic Suites and Spa
address: Paralia Korfos, Mykonos 846 00
description: Set in Mýkonos City, 200 metres from Korfos, Aeonic Suites and Spa offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Less than 1 km from Ornos and a 18-minute walk from Korfos Beach, the property features a terrace and a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Every room has a kettle, while selected rooms will provide you with a balcony and others also have sea views. At Aeonic Suites and Spa all rooms come with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, American or vegetarian options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Greek and Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. The property has a hairdresser's and business centre. Mykonos Windmills is 3.3 km from Aeonic Suites and Spa, while Archaeological Museum of Mykonos is 4.3 km away. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 4 km from the hotel.

name: Mykonos Theoxenia, a member of Design Hotels
address: Kato Mili 1, Mykonos 846 00
description: The 4-star Mykonos Theoxenia offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Mykonos. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Facilities like 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, postal service are readily available for you to enjoy. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with television LCD/plasma screen, linens, slippers, towels, whirlpool bathtub. To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as hot tub, fitness center, outdoor pool, massage, garden. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Mykonos Theoxenia.priceline.com

name: Kensho Ornos
address: Ornos Beach, Mykonos
description: Combining luxury with traditional Cycladic touches, Kensho Ornos boast elegantly designed units with state-of-the-art amenities within a 1-minute walk of Ornos Beach. Some feature their own private pool, while others are equipped with a private hot tub. Free WiFi is available throughout. Bright and airy, each air-conditioned room and suite boasts a bathroom with a spa bath, as well as free luxury Hermes bath amenities and is equipped with a hairdryer. Most of them open to a furnished terrace with magnificent sea, pool and mountain views. There is a seating area in every room, along with a flat-screen LED TV, a Nespresso machine and an iPad with unlimited access to music lists and the Kensho app which allows you to contact with all hotels departments instantly. The awarded gourmet restaurant of Kensho Boutique Hotel & Suites enjoys Ornos beach views and offers Greek and Mediterranean cuisine with fresh and local ingredients from all over Greece. Embrace in a laid-back atmosphere, sophisticated lounge experience at the famous Kensho bar where the experienced mixologists offer signature cocktails and refreshing drinks. Relaxing moments can be enjoyed at the property's hammam. The more active ones can use the on-site fitness centre. The spa has a make-up artist and a hairdresser, and offers beauty, face, body and nail treatments. The hotel also offers car hire services. The cosmopolitan centre of Mykonos, featuring an array of premium boutiques and high-end restaurants, lies within 3 km of Kensho Ornos. The lively Psarou Beach is at 3 km. Mykonos Airport is 4 km way. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Mykonos Riviera
address: Tourlos, Mykonos 846 00
description: The brand new 5 star Mykonos Riviera is set in Tourlos port and marina and features ultra chic nautical-themed style, panoramic sunset views and luxurious accommodation options. Unparalleled services and amenities including an exquisite Spa, 2 restaurants, and an infinity pool with fiber optic lighting are also provided. The hotel is amphitheatrically built across the marina, merely few minutes from Agios Stefanos beach, and a short stroll from the scenic Mykonos Town. The spacious rooms and suites of Mykonos Riviera include nautical aesthetics going hand in hand with their unique island chic style, minimalistic luxury and unobstructed Aegean sea views. Each room is fitted with open plan bathrooms, designer bathtubs, nautical-themed decoration, flat-screen TVs, Nespresso machines, ambiance lighting, and private terraces overlooking the Aegean sea and the port with its marina. Some rooms or suites also feature an outdoor hot tub or a private pool. A la carte breakfast is available each morning at the property. Mykonos Riviera also offers a car rental service and a business centre and shuttle service from/to the airport upon extra charge and request. Staff at reception can assist around the clock with information on the area.

name: Lovia Mykonos
address: Chora Mykonou, Mykonos 846 00
description: Situated in Mýkonos City, less than 1 km from Agia Anna Beach, Lovia Mykonos features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers a bar. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. Lovia Mykonos provides some rooms with sea views, and each room comes with a balcony. At the accommodation rooms include bed linen and towels. Guests at Lovia Mykonos can enjoy an American breakfast. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Agios Charalabos Beach, Megali Ammos Beach and Mykonos Windmills. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 1 km from Lovia Mykonos.

name: Anemelia Hotel Mykonos
address: Elia - Ano Mera, Mykonos 846 00
description: Set in Mýkonos City, 1.1 km from Elia Beach, Anemelia Hotel Mykonos offers accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers a concierge service, luggage storage space and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.5 km from Elia Nudist Beach. All guest rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. All rooms include a coffee machine, while selected rooms also offer a balcony and others also have sea views. At Anemelia Hotel Mykonos all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a continental or Full English/Irish breakfast. Kalo Livadi Beach is 3 km from Anemelia Hotel Mykonos, while Mykonos Windmills is 11 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 6 km from the hotel.

name: Mileo
address: Kalo Livadi 0 Kalo Livadi, Mykonos 846 00
description: Set in Kalo Livadi, 300 metres from Kalo Livadi Beach, Mileo offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. Offering a restaurant, the property also has a terrace, as well as a sauna and a hot tub. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Mileo every room includes bed linen and towels. Loulos Beach is less than 1 km from the accommodation, while Agia Anna Beach is 2.1 km away. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 7 km from Mileo.

name: Domes Noruz Mykonos
address: Mykonos, Agios Stefanos, Kalafati 846 00
description: Near Mykonos New Port With a stay at Domes Noruz Mykonos - Adults Only in Mykonos, you'll be within a 5-minute drive of Mykonos New Port and Mykonos Old Port. This 5-star hotel is 4.4 mi (7.1 km) from Ornos Beach and 5.1 mi (8.2 km) from Platis Gialos Beach. Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a seasonal outdoor pool, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, and coffee/tea in a common area. Free self parking is available onsite. Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer. Agios Stefanos Beach - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi Houlakia Beach - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi Mykonos New Port - 1.7 km / 1 mi Tourlos Beach - 1.7 km / 1 mi Armenistis Lighthouse - 3 km / 1.9 mi Archaeological Museum of Mykonos - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi Mykonos Old Port - 3.1 km / 2 mi Matoyianni Street - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi Mykonos Library - 3.5 km / 2.1 mi Mykonos Town Hall - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi Aegean Maritime Museum - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi Church of Panagia Paraportiani - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi Mykonos Museum of Folklore - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi Lena's House - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi Tria Pigadia - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi The nearest airports are: Mykonos Island National Airport (JMK) - 6 km / 3.7 mi Ermoupolis (JSY-Syros Island National) - 39.8 km / 24.8 mi Naxos (JNX-Naxos Island National) - 48.2 km / 30 mi Enjoy a satisfying meal at Topos Bar Restaurant serving guests of Domes Noruz Mykonos - Adults Only. Need to unwind? Take a break with a tasty beverage at one of the 2 bars/lounges. A complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast is served daily from 8:00 AM to 11:00 AM. For the benefit of our customers, we have provided a rating based on our rating system. Make yourself at home in one of the 38 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and plasma televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and complimentary bottled water, and housekeeping is provided daily.Ticket Package

name: Mykonos Blanc
address: Ornos 1, Ornos 846 00
description: Mykonos Blanc Hotel is a 5-star beachfront luxury boutique hotel in Mykonos, a proud member of the LVX Preferred Hotels and Resorts network. The non-color conformity of its interiors and exterior outdoor landscape acts as a soft touch to the soul, embossing the intense blue nature of the Aegean sea and the cosmopolitan lifestyle of Mykonian living, making Mykonos Blanc luxury boutique hotel, the perfect holiday canvas at the popular Ornos bay in Mykonos. Mykonos Blanc Hotel features 42 luxury seaside boutique styled rooms and suites. This dreamy luxury hotel has one and only destination, the everyday living at sea. Arched doorways and candle-lit living areas give this wonder-around feeling. Follow the path to a pool and garden wonderworld, a dreamy riviera landscape overlooking the blue waters of Ornos bay in Mykonos. Indulge in an in-room relaxing hot tubbing with a sea-view bliss, romancing or friend-mingling during evenings at their own en-suite lounging space. Yet, as an element of surprise, the secluded calm is interchanged by the upbeat Mykonian fun, a few steps further away on the coast of Ornos bay, on a choice of award winning resto’s and beach bars. Try out exotic gourmet pleasures at Kuzina Mykonos and Pasaji’s Asian Fusion cuisine and the trattoria Farina of Italian origin.

name: Amyth of Mykonos Hotel
address: Agios Stefanos P O Box 7159, Agios Stefanos 846 00
description: Situated in Agios Stefanos, 500 metres from Agios Stefanos Beach, Amyth of Mykonos Hotel features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. This 5-star hotel offers a business centre and a concierge service. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Each room has a kettle, while some rooms are fitted with a balcony and others also feature sea views. At Amyth of Mykonos Hotel the rooms have bed linen and towels. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and halal options can also be requested. Popular points of interest near Amyth of Mykonos Hotel include Choulakas Beach, Tourlos Beach and Mykonos New Port. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 4 km from the hotel.

name: Once in Mykonos - Designed for Adults
address: Ornos, Ornos 846 00
description: Once in Mykonos - Designed for Adults located above Ornos Beach, features a blend of classic Cycladic style with modern boho décor. All rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The suites in the hotel are equipped with a terrace with Aegean sea views, coffee machine and fridge. Some rooms have its own private pool. Guests can relax on the sun loungers surrounding the hotel's swimming pool and enjoy delicious meals at the restaurant. Massage and beauty treatments are also available. Mykonos Windmills is 2.6 km from Once in Mykonos, while Little Venice is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 2 km from the hotel.

name: Belvedere Hotel
address: School Of Fine Arts District, Mykonos 846 00
description: This chic hotel in Mykonos’ Chora offers a magnificent swimming pool with sunset views, a 24-hour state-of-the-art gym, gourmet restaurant and airy rooms with beautiful sea views. Free WiFi is available in all areas. Belvedere’s romantic rooms are unique, each with its own design elements, fabrics, furnishings and textured details. Bathrooms feature rain showers. I-pod docking stations, flat-screen TVs, DVDs and high fidelity surround systems are featured. The gym features a stretching area, cardio vascular equipment area, as well as a strength equipment area. Guests can enjoy a variety of invigorating and restorative treatments at Six Senses Mykonos upon request. Guest can enjoy fine dining at Matsuhisa Mykonos or the Belvedere Club. Live performances are organized during the summer season. Belvedere’s front-office team will be happy to assist guests with travel arrangements and restaurants reservations. Valet parking and concierge service is offered. Daily newspapers, magazines, books, as well as complimentary internet points are available.

name: Boheme Mykonos Adults Only - Small Luxury Hotels of the World
address: Mykonos Town, P.O. Box 110, Mykonos 846 00
description: Set in a prime location of Mykonos, Boheme Mykonos Hotel puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. 24-hour room service, daily housekeeping, grocery deliveries, private check in/check out, 24-hour front desk are just some of the facilities on offer. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room or take advantage of the hotel's recreational facilities, including outdoor pool, massage, garden. Boheme Mykonos Hotel is an excellent choice from which to explore Mykonos or to simply relax and rejuvenate.priceline.com

name: Mykonos Grand Hotel & Resort
address: Agios Ioannis, Agios Ioannis
description: Located right on Agios Ioannis Beach, Mykonos Grand Hotel & Resort provides 5-star, boutique accommodation set amidst cobbled paths overlooking Delos Island. It includes a health centre and offers fine dining in stylish settings. Rooms and suites at Mykonos Grand combine the cube-shaped Cycladic architecture with the restful interior décor. They are equipped with a satellite LCD TV, DVD player and iPod docking station. All units open out to balconies or patios with sea, garden or pool views. Guests can enjoy fresh seafood, grilled specialities and other Mediterranean flavours either at the open-air dining room or by the pool offering panoramic sea views. The White Bar is ideal for a glass of champagne in a minimalist setting featuring an outdoor terrace. Althea Spa Centre offers a wide variety of natural treatments based on traditional Greek techniques. Guests can spend relaxing moments by the pool featuring private areas, while a state-of-the-art gym and a tennis court are also available. The cosmopolitan centre of Mykonos Town is around 4 km away from the resort. The island’s port and airport are both 4.5 km away. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout and free on-site parking is possible.

name: Tharroe Of Mykonos
address: Angelika, Mykonos
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Mykonos City, Tharroe of Mykonos Hotel promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, kitchen, postal service, ticket service are just some of the facilities on offer. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with television LCD/plasma screen, clothes rack, complimentary tea, linens, sewing kit. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Mykonos has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Tharroe of Mykonos Hotel.priceline.com

name: Petasos Beach Resort And Spa
address: 84600, Platis Gialos 846 00
description: Petasos Beach stands on a private peninsula between Platis Yialos and Psarou Beach. It offers a 500 square-meter spa & wellness centre, a fitness centre and a 2-level swimming pool with waterfall. The Aqua Marine Spa offers revitalizing and thalasso-therapy treatments, as well as honeymoon packages. The luxuriously renovated Petasos Beach combines aesthetically perfect premises with breathtaking nature. Its innovatively designed rooms offer stunning views of the Aegean Sea. All accommodations are equipped with Wi-Fi internet access. Deluxe and superior rooms also feature a spa bath and steam cabin. There are 2 restaurants within the premises of the Resort, with a great view of the Aegean sea.

name: Elia Mykonos Resort
address: Elia Beach, Mykonos, Mykonos 846 00
description: Located right on the sandy Elia Mykonos Resort of Mykonos, the Cycladic-style Elia Mykonos Resort features a beachfront restaurant, a boutique and a garden full of palm and olive trees. It offers free WiFi in all areas and tastefully decorated units with a balcony. Overlooking the Aegean Sea or the garden, the rooms and suites of Elia are fitted with tiled floors and beamed ceilings. Each air-conditioned unit is equipped with a minibar, a safe and a flat-screen TV. Some of the suites also include a seating area and a well-equipped kitchenette. The private bathroom is stocked with a hairdryer. Each room includes free sunbeds and towels. Featuring a wellness center contains Spa, Gym, and a swimming pool. Guests can enjoy drinks, coffee and Mediterranean dishes at the bar-restaurant offering sea views. Sunbeds and beach towels are offered. Elia Mykonos Resort lies within 10 km from the cosmopolitan Mykonos Town and 9 km from Mykonos National Airport. Psarrou Beach with its famous beach bars and clubs is at 13 km. A pharmacy store, supermarket and ATM can be found at 3 km. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Santa Marina, a Luxury Collection Resort, Mykonos
address: Ornos Bay, Ornos 846 00
description: Experience the mesmerizing magic of Santa Marina, a Luxury Collection Resort, Mykonos. Our luxury beach resort is just 10 minutes from the airport and town, Santa Marina makes it easy to explore all the island’s must-see attractions – then return to our sanctuary of authentic Aegean beauty at Ornos Bay. Choose from 102 guest rooms and suites, along with 13 villas featuring two to seven bedrooms. Beach-chic interiors offer modern, natural luxury, opening to balconies with hypnotic Aegean views. Discover the only private sandy beach on Mykonos, gorgeous infinity pools, the international-caliber Ginkgo Spa and four options for dining and drinks, highlighted by the world’s first ever Buddha-Bar Beach. Our Santa Marina resort invites you to savour the glamorous lifestyle of Mykonos in the island’s most fashionable and sophisticated setting.Marriott

name: Bill & Coo Suites and Lounge
address: Megali Amos Beach, 500M From Mykonos Town, Mykonos 846 00
description: The 5-star Bill & Coo offers sea-view suites & villas, Mediterranean flavours and an infinity pool with views of the sea. Situated in Megali Ammos Beach of Mykonos, it is a proud member of Leading Hotels of the World. Bill & Coo’s luxury suites feature contemporary design and modern bathrooms with walk-in shower. Each is equipped with free WiFi, satellite LCD TV and working desk. Some rooms include an outdoor hot tub or pool. The coastal suites are located in Agios Ioannis, at the Bill & Coo Coast adults-only complex, 3 km from the main complex and 3.5 from Mykonos town. Bill & Coo brand-new Villas are located a few meters away from Megali Ammos beach and connected with Bill & Coo Suites and Lounge property through an internal path. The hotel's awarded fine dining restaurant, the Gastronomy Project, is situated by the pool and offers spectacular sea and sunset views. It serves a Mediterranean creative cuisine based on seasonal local products. Signature cocktails and refreshing drinks are proposed at the sunset lounge bar. Beauty and body treatments are available at the Spa by Valmont as well a gym in the spa area. The hotel offers a great array of personalised services including round-trip transfers to Mykonos Airport and port. Bill & Coo is conveniently located 10 minutes walking distance from Mykonos Town. It is 2.5 km from the Mykonos Airport and port.

name: Mykonos Ammos Hotel
address: Ornos Beach, Mykonos 846 00
description: Situated on the sandy and lively Ornos Beach, the 5-star boutique hotel of Mykonos Ammos provides trendy sun loungers and beach service. Member of the Small Luxury Hotels of the World, it features an outdoor pool, and a wellness and beauty centre. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. Stylishly decorated with earth tones and white washed walls, the spacious rooms and suites are air conditioned. Each comes with a 37” flat-screen TV, DVD player, laptop safe, toiletries and hairdryer. They all open out to a terrace or balcony, while some offer sea views. Kuzina Restaurant provides fusion culinary dishes that combine Asian and Mediterranean flavours and can be enjoyed by the seaside. Farina Italian Restaurant serves genuine Italian cuisine in a stylish setting, while Mykonos Ammos Beach and Bar prepares signature cocktails throughout the day. Room service is also accessible. Guests are provided with complimentary beach towels and daily newspapers. The 24-hour front desk can arrange tours of Mykonos and concierge services upon request with surcharge. Mykonos Ammos Hotel is just 2.5 km from Mykonos Town, as well as Mykonos Airport and the port. Various restaurants, cafés and a supermarket are all within a short walking distance. Private parking can be found on site.

name: Kouros Hotel & Suites
address: Mykonos Town, Mykonos 846 00
description: Located on the seafront of Mykonos town, just 300 metres from Mykonos Town, the Kouros Hotel & Suites offers elegant accommodation and a quiet location with views over the old and new harbours. Mykonos Windmills is 5.1 km from the accommodation, while Archaeological Museum of Mykonos is 6.1 km away. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 2 km from Charisma Hotel and Wellness Suites.

name: Myconian Korali Relais & Chateaux
address: Main Street, Mykonos Town, Mykonos 846 00
description: Standing gracefully over the island of Delos and the cosmopolitan Mykonos Town, Myconian Korali Relais & Chateaux offers 5-star accommodation within 1 km from the town centre. Rooms and suites at Myconian Korali have an ethnic chic character, underlined with colourful details, impeccable fabrics and handpicked art pieces. Some have their own private pool and most of them offer breathtaking views of the Aegean Sea. At the heart of the Myconian Korali, lies the Relais et Châteaux Restaurant where the fine art of haute cuisine meets the carefully selected raw materials, produced locally and exclusively for Korali’s guests. At the elegant bar by the pool terrace you will enjoy early drinks strolling along the deck at sunset. Within 1 km, you can visit the famous Mykonos Windmills and Little Venice, while Mykonos Port is 3 km away. Free private on-site parking is possible and free WiFi is available throughout.

description: Palladium Hotel is located at Platys Gyalos, a 5-minute walk from Psarou and Platys Gyalos Beaches, as well as just a breath away from the famous Nammos. Each of the elegant suites and rooms is air-conditioned and includes a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and furnished private balconies. All units in the hotel are equipped with a coffee machine, hair dryer and ironing facilities. Korres toiletries can be found at the private bathroom. Some units also feature a private pool or hot tub. Guests are greeted with a welcome drink and wake up to a rich American breakfast buffet served daily. Guests in rooms with a private pool can also enjoy a floating breakfast in the privacy of their own pool. Services that can be enjoyed at the spa center include massages, hair, beauty and facial treatments, hammam and hot tub. La Veranda restaurant serves innovative Mediterranean cuisine created from fresh Greek products. Palladium’s lobby bar, overlooking the Aegean sea and the starlit swimming pool offers Signature cocktails. The poolside bar offers lounge-style sunbeds and refreshing drinks. Other options include a snack bar. In-room dining is also available upon request. The hotel’s 24-hour front desk can arrange baby-sitting and laundry service. Guest services include free two-way transfer to/from Mykonos Airport/Port, concierge service and doctor on call. Mykonos town and Mykonos airport are 10-minute drive away. Free on-site parking is available. Guest services include free two-way transfer to/from Mykonos Airport/Port from 07:00 until 00:00.

Accommodation varies to apartments that include a well-equipped kitchenette for self catering, deluxe rooms with outdoor hot tubs and suites/villas with private pools. Guests can enjoy a wide variety of local delights in our Mediterranean buffet breakfast served at “Comus” restaurant, as well as an all day a la carte menu, with breathtaking views of the Aegean Sea. Snacks are served in the 3 pool bars and the snack bar. Guests can also enjoy the Greek and Italian dishes served at the beach restaurant. For those who seek body and mind balance, our state of the art gym operates daily and is located inside our own “Calliope” Spa, which offers a variety of massage therapies and additionally features a steam bath, sauna and hot tub. The picturesque main town and port of Mykonos is 5 km away from Tropicana Hotel, Suites & Villas Mykonos. Mykonos Airport is at 3 km. Free parking can be found near the premises.

name: Katikies Mykonos - The Leading Hotels of the World
address:

description: Located just 500 metres from the beach of Agios Ioannis in Mykonos, Katikies Mykonos is a 5-star boutique hotel featuring a selection of fine dining options, 2 infinity pools, a spa centre and a gym. Blending Cycladic style with modern elements, the hotel offers elegantly decorated rooms and suites with unobstructed sea view. Featuring private pools or outdoor jetted tubs, the units at Katikies Mykonos open to a private terrace with lounge area. Facilities include a flat-screen satellite TV, I-Pod music player, Nespresso coffee machine, in-room safe and minibar. The modern bathrooms are fitted with hairdryer, bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. Room service is available 24/7. Guests can relax at the sun loungers by the pool, enjoy a refreshing dip at the infinity pools or rejuvenate at the on-site spa centre offering a variety of massage sessions, feet washing rituals and rejuvenating facial and body treatments. A fashion boutique with Greek and international designers and brands is also featured on site. Dining options include Botrini's Mykonos restaurant. After the amazing success of Botrini’s Santorini in the emblematic Katikies Santorini Hotel, the island of Mykonos will be boasting its very own Botrini’s Restaurant in the stunning premises of Katikies Mykonos Hotel. Botrini’s Mykonos stays true to all the values that earned Botrini’s its multiple awards and of course its Michelin-star, but in a most mesmerising Cycladic setting with the eternal blue of the Aegean Sea serving as the ideal background. In a truly magical ambiance and in front of the infinity pool seamlessly blending in with the sea and the sky, guests sample the eye-catching dishes of renowned Greek-Italian chef Ettore Botrini. Here the freshest and finest gifts of the sea and the land find their way into the chef’s kitchen to be transformed into refined pieces of contemporary culinary art. At the Lower Deck Lounge, where the whitewashed background is disturbed only by the blooming bougainvilleas, that is where you can spend a full day dedicated to the indulgence of your palate and the relaxation of your mind. The glorious Greek sun reflects its beams on the iconic whitewashed setting of the Upper Deck Lounge and the view of the infinity pool almost becoming one with the azure waters of the Aegean Sea where you can take your pick from the tempting choices of the exciting all-day menu, based on Greek flavours but with a creative international touch. Finally, Fleur de Miraval's ultra-chic Champagne Bar awaits to become your personal haven of elegance and exquisite tastes.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Selected rooms here will provide you with a kitchen with a fridge and an oven. At Kalesma Mykonos all rooms come with bed linen and towels. Vegetarian and gluten-free breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodation. At Kalesma Mykonos you will find a restaurant serving Greek and Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. Bike hire and car hire are available at this hotel and the area is popular for cycling. Glyfadi Beach is 1.2 km from the hotel, while Agios Ioannis Beach is 1.3 km away. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 5 km from Kalesma Mykonos.

name: Anax Resort & Spa
address: Agios Ioannis, Mykonos 846 00
description: Boasting a seafront location in Agios Ioannis in Mykonos, Anax Resort ideally blends Cycladic architecture with modern amenities. Facilities include a superb spa centre offering an abundance of beauty treatments, infinity pool, hot tub and a restaurant serving fine Mediterranean cuisine. A private beach area is also available. Stylish and spacious, the bright units at Anax Resort and Spa open to a balcony and patio with magnificent views of the sea. Some feature their very own private pool. Each boasts an elegant bathroom stocked with a spa bath and shower, while free toiletries are also offered. A smart TV and Bluetooth access is available in every unit. Air conditioning comes standard. Guests will find a fully equipped gym within the premises. The services that can be enjoyed at the spa centre range from hammam and sauna to rejuvenating massages and facial treatments. The poolside bar offers lounge-style sunbeds and a wide variety of premium cocktails. Other options include a lobby bar and a snack bar. Free WiFi is available throughout. The cosmopolitan centre of Mykonos, boasting an array of exclusive boutiques and high-profile bars and restaurants, lies within approximately 4.5 km of Anax Resort and Spa. The lively Psarou Beach is at 4 km. Mykonos Airport is 5 km away. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Alissachni Mykonos
address: Psarou, Agios Lazaros, Mykonos, Mykonos 846 00
description: Situated in Psarou, 2.9 km from Psarou Beach, Alissachni Mykonos features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Each accommodation at the 5-star hotel has sea views, and guests can enjoy access to a terrace and to a hot tub. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. The hotel offers some rooms with pool views, and rooms are equipped with a balcony. At Alissachni Mykonos rooms have bed linen and towels. A continental, Full English/Irish or American breakfast is available each morning at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Greek, Italian and Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, halal and kosher options can also be requested. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire and car hire are available at Alissachni Mykonos. Platis Gialos Beach is 2.9 km from the hotel, while Mykonos Windmills is 4.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 5 km from Alissachni Mykonos.

name: Dionysos Luxury Hotel Mykonos
address: Ornos Beach 24242, Ornos 846 00
description: Set in a prime location of Mykonos, Dionysos Hotel puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Dionysos Hotel. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include hiking trails, hot tub, fitness center, outdoor pool, diving. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Dionysos Hotel.priceline.com

name: Kivotos Mykonos
address: Ornos Bay, Mykonos 846 00
description: Kivotos Luxury Boutique Hotel is situated on Mykonos Island, and offers 5-star accommodation as well as a private beach and a saltwater swimming pool. It provides free Wi-Fi, a Turkish steam bath and squash courts. Guests can enjoy a range of massage treatments and beauty therapy at the on-site spa and wellness centre, Mykonos Spa Club. It is pet-friendly and has free public parking on site for those travelling with a car. Part of the premium service at Kivotos Luxury Boutique Hotel includes items such as a complimentary fruit bowl in each of the rooms. Deluxe fixtures include a flat-screen TV with cable/satellite channels and luxury linen and luxury toiletries. A mini bar, a seating area and a private balcony are also included. The chic bar is a convenient place to relax with a drink before a meal at the restaurant, which offers international and Mediterranean cuisine for dinner. Within a 20-minute drive of Paradise Beach and Mykonos Island National Airport, the hotel provides an airport shuttle service. Guests can also take an easy stroll to Agios Ioannis and Psarou.Revato

name: Nimbus My Aktis
address: Super Paradise, Mykonos
description: Perched only a breath away from the famous sandy beach of Super Paradise, Nimbus My Aktis is ideally set amongst Mykonos most popular destinations. Nimbus My Aktis offers elegantly decorated units with private or shared pools or hot tubs and free WiFi access. The cosmopolitan town of Mykonos is 5 km away. Fitted with built-in beds and sofas and minimally decorated in soft tones, every villa and suite has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a modern bathroom with a shower. Most units offer views over the Aegean Sea, while others overlook the gardens. Extras include free toiletries and a hairdryer. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 3 km from Nimbus My Aktis. Free, on-site parking is offered and car rental services can be provided.

name: Yiannaki Hotel
address: Main Street, Ornos 846 00
description: Yiannaki Hotel is situated in Ornos bay, walking distance from the beach and the bus stop. It offers rooms with free Wi-Fi. Parking is complimentary. The hotel features a beautiful pool area with a sea-water pool, pool bar and a relaxing terrace with sun beds and umbrellas. Pool towels are complimentary. All Yiannaki Hotel guest rooms have balconies, air conditioning, and in-room safes. Rooms also include marble bathroom with a hairdryer, a fridge and TV with satellite channels. Towels are changed daily. A rich buffet breakfast is served each morning. Local delicacies and International dishes are prepared with care by the family run restaurant Aleka’s. Other facilities include sauna and a small fitness centre. Massage sessions and beauty therapies are arranged upon request. A paid airport or port transfer can also be arranged by the property upon request.

name: Amazon Suites
address: aghios ioannis mykonos, Agios Ioannis 846 00
description: Situated in Agios Ioannis Mykonos, 600 metres from Agios Ioannis Beach, Amazon Suites features accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. You can play mini-golf at this 5-star hotel. Korfos is 1 km from the hotel, while Ornos is 1.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 5 km from Amazon Suites.

name: The Majestic Hotel
address: Fira Town P.O. Box 11, Thera
description: Situated over the dramatic Santorini cliffs, The Majestic Hotel features soundproofed rooms with private balcony enjoying views of the Aegean Sea or the volcano. It lies within 400 metres from Fira centre and just a few metres from the Caldera. The Majestic Hotel offers various accommodation types all with marble bathrooms with spa bath and verandas offering astounding views. Each room is equipped with air conditioning, flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi internet. Hotel facilities include 3 fresh water swimming pools from which one is heated. A 24-hour front desk is available. At the Beauty Hall, guests may choose among several facial and body treatments, massage, Turkish bath, sauna or aromatherapy. The Capparis a-la carte restaurant serves rich breakfast every morning. The Crocus Restaurant offers an interesting wine list along with gourmet dishes prepared with seasonal products from the company’s organic farm.

name: Abyssanto Suites & Spa
address: Imerovigli, Thera 847 00
description: Set in Imerovigli and with Archaeological Museum of Thera reachable within 1.9 km, Abyssanto Suites and Spa offers concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. A hot tub and a bicycle rental service are available for guests. The accommodation provides room service, an ATM and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel all rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a terrace with a city view. Every room has a safety deposit box, while some rooms also offer a balcony. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and American options. At Abyssanto Suites and Spa you will find a restaurant serving Greek, Seafood and local cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and halal options can also be requested. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at the accommodation. Santorini Port is 12 km from Abyssanto Suites and Spa, while Ancient Thera is 13 km from the property. The nearest airport is Santorini International, 8 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Santorini Secret Suites & Spa
address: 84702, Oia, Thera 847 02
description: Santorini Secret Suites & Spa is situated on Santorini, and offers 5-star accommodation as well as an infinity pool and free wireless internet access in all areas. The various facilities this luxury hotel has to offer include facial treatments, body treatments and a sauna. There are a range of amenities on offer to those staying at Santorini Secret Suites & Spa, such as 24-hour room service, an express check-in and check-out feature and a diving centre. For outdoorsy types the hotel has a wide variety of activities, including scuba diving, snorkeling and horse riding. The rooms are air conditioned and include an in-room closet, a private balcony and an alarm clock. The on-site restaurant offers fusion, Greek and Mediterranean cuisine in a modern setting. Santorini Secret Suites & Spa is within walking distance of Amoudi Bay and Tramonto ad Oia. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book tours and sightseeing trips in Oia.Revato

name: Andronis Concept Wellness Resort
address: Imerovigli, Thera 847 02
description: Situated on a hillside position with stunning views over the Mediterranean Sea, Andronis Concept Wellness Resort is peacefully set in Imerovigli. Facing the endless view on the Aegean sunset and the volcano, all minimal suites at Andronis Concept Wellness Resort all luxurious and minimal feature bright and comfortable interiors. Each features its own private swimming pool overlooking the azure Aegean Sea. All suites boast a living room with a flat-screen, satellite TV. Each includes a private bathroom. A variety of Spa treatments, yoga classes and personal training services can be enjoyed. Guests may also taste local recipes at the on site restaurant. Fira, the cosmopolitan capital of Santorini, is 11 km away. Santorini (Thira) Airport is 6 km away.

name: Cocoon Suites
address: Imerovigli, Thera
description: Offering panoramic views over the Aegean Sea and the volcano, Cocoon Suites offers accommodation with hot tubs or plunge pools, located in Imerovigli. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar, as well as in-room candlelit dinners with organic meals made with local produce. Fitted with natural materials like rocks and driftwood, the suites at Cocoon are individually decorated with well-chosen furnishings and soft colours. Each comes with Simmons mattress bed featuring revolutionary sleep technology and also includes a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Bathrobes and slippers are available. Breakfast including organic and local ingredients as well as espresso coffee, is daily served at your suite or at the balcony with panoramic views over the Caldera. Massage sessions can be arranged upon request. The lively Fira Town is 2.5 km from Cocoon Suites, while the scenic Oia is 10 km away. The nearest airport is Thira Airport, 7 km from Cocoon Suites.

name: Andronis Arcadia Hotel
address: Oia, Thera 847 02
description: Set within 6 km of Cape Columbo Beach and 300 metres of Naval Museum of Oia, Andronis Arcadia Hotel in Oia provides a terrace and rooms with free WiFi. The resort is also 3.2 km away from Saint Nicholas’ Church. The resort has an outdoor swimming pool and sea views, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar. The rooms in the resort are fitted with a flat-screen TV. The rooms are fitted with a private bathroom with free toiletries. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can provide tips on the area. The nearest airport is Santorini International Airport, 17 km from Andronis Arcadia Hotel.

name: Aressana Spa Hotel and Suites
address: Fira, Thera 847 00
description: Centrally located in Fira and only steps from the famous Caldera, this family-run hotel provides a peaceful base for its guests, with spa facilities and an outdoor pool area. Αressana Spa Hotel & Suites is a member of the Small Luxury Hotels of the World. Guests can indulge in beauty and relaxation treatments at the hotel’s Tefsion Kallos Spa. There is also a well-appointed fitness centre on the site. Aressana Spa Hotel has many little hideaways where guests can read or just relax. A certified Greek Breakfast buffet with Santorinian specialties and traditional delicacies is served adjacent to the swimming pool between 08:00 and 11:00. The poolside snack bar provides a refreshing break from the Greek sun, serving light Santorinian and International meals, cool drinks and cocktails. Aressana Hotel’s peaceful location offers magnificent sunrise views. Santorini's many local taverns, shops and restaurants are just steps away from the hotel. The hotel is well-serviced by taxi and a bus station, located just 100 metres away. There is also a bank and post office close by. Santorini Airport (JTR) is 6 km away and Athinios Port is 10 km.

name: Nikki Beach Resort & Spa Santorini
address: Ag. Paraskevi, Thera 847 00
description: The 5-star Nikki Beach Resort & Spa Santorini is set on the beachfront in Agia Paraskeyi, 5 km from Archaeological Museum of Thera. The property features a private beach area, as well as a fitness centre and views over the Aegean Sea. In addition to free WiFi, the property also provides an outdoor pool as well as a hot tub. All stylishly outlined guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom with free toiletries, while some boast sea views. Guest rooms at Nikki Beach Resort & Spa Santorini have air conditioning and a wardrobe. The accommodation offers a continental or buffet breakfast. There is an in-house restaurant, which specialises in sophisticated cuisine and also offers vegetarian options. Nikki Beach Resort & Spa Santorini offers a sauna, as well as relaxation and fitness experiences at Nikki Spa and Tone Gym. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire and car hire are available at the hotel. Staff at the reception can assist guests at any time of the day. Museum of Prehistoric Thera is 5 km from Nikki Beach Resort & Spa Santorini, while Central Bus Station is 5 km from the property. Santorini International Airport is 1 km away.

name: Grace Hotel Santorini, Auberge Resorts Collection
address: Imerovigli, Thera 847 00, Grecia, Thera 847 00
description: Located 2 km from Fira, the award-winning Grace Hotel Santorini is an exclusive boutique hotel offering luxurious accommodation with panoramic sea views and free WiFi. It features an infinity pool and provides in-room spa treatments. The modernly decorated rooms and suites feature design items and include a satellite TV, DVD player and a balcony. Some units also have a separate seating room and a plunge pool overlooking the sea. Grace Hotel guests can benefit from a variety of services that they can request prior to arrival, such as bathroom amenities, Apivita cosmetics, in-room fitness kit or seven-choice pillow menu. They can also choose among a wide variety of in-room drinks or special romance packages. Experience culinary excellence at Grace Hotel A Michelin-awarded voyage of sensational taste, at the heart of Santorini’s stunning Imerovigli At Varoulko Santorini, pioneering Michelin-star awarded chef Lefteris Lazarou, proposes the most mouthwatering Mediterranean creations, bursting with authenticity, flavour and Santorinian flair. Sensational renditions of Greek cuisine favourites meet a dazzling backdrop of Cycladic perfection in a journey that captivates the senses from the very first moment. Grace Hotel Santorini can arrange boat trips to nearby islands and private daily cruises. A complimentary use of laptop and iPod is possible at the reception. Situated in Imerovigli village, the hotel is 8 km away from Santorini Airport and 10 km away from Athinios Port.

name: Neo Suites
description: Conveniently situated in the centre of Fira, Neo Suites provides continental breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. A fitness room and a bicycle rental service are available for guests. Private parking is available on site. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Neo Suites offers certain rooms with sea views, and every room is equipped with a balcony. At the accommodation each room is equipped with bed linen and towels. At Neo Suites you will find a restaurant serving Greek and Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Archaeological Museum of Thera, Museum of Prehistoric Thera and Central Bus Station. The nearest airport is Santorini International, 6 km from Neo Suites, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Canaves Oia Suites
address: Oia City, Thera 847 02
description: Canaves Oia Suites & Spa in Oia are built on the side of a cliff overlooking the Caldera. They offer private parking and gourmet dining. A private motor yacht is available for cruises in the Aegean Sea and the islands. 2 outdoor pools, one of which is infinity-style, are featured. Canaves Oia Suites & Spa provide luxurious accommodation in spacious suites and rooms beautifully appointed with antique furniture and art objects. The property facilities include a pool bar and a 24-hour reception. Free Wi-Fi is provided in all areas. Guests may enjoy gourmet dishes served at the à la carte restaurant, while a wine cellar is available to guests. The scenic Fira Town is 11 km away and the port of Athinios is 20 km away. Santorini National Airport is at a distance of 17 km.

name: Dome Santorini Resort & Spa
address: Imerovigli, Thera 847 00
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Imerovigli, Dome Santorini Resort promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. To be found at the hotel are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, fax machine, express check-in/check-out, luggage storage. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as complimentary tea, closet, towels, clothes rack, slippers. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include hot tub, outdoor pool, massage, garden. Dome Santorini Resort is an excellent choice from which to explore Santorini or to simply relax and rejuvenate.priceline.com

name: Mythical Blue Luxury Suites
address: Fira, 12, Thera 847 00
description: Set in a prime location of Santorini, mythical blue puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the property provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at mythical blue. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as free welcome drink, mirror, private entrance, slippers, sofa. To enhance guests' stay, the property offers recreational facilities such as boats, hot tub, outdoor pool, diving, fishing. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at mythical blue.Agoda

name: Astro Palace Hotel & Suites
address: 25is Martiou, Thera
description: Astro Palace Hotel & Suites is situated in an idyllic location, only a short walk from Fira and the caldera. It offers a wellness centre, a swimming pool and rooms with unobstructed Aegean Sea views. The elegant, air-conditioned rooms combine contemporary design with traditional architecture. They are fitted with a satellite LCD TV and minibar, while some also have a spa bath or private pool. Each room also has large balcony or terrace overlooking the Aegean and free Wi-Fi. Guests can use the well-equipped gym, the hot tub and the sauna or relax at the sun beds by the swimming pool. Cassiopeia Spa’ provides a wide selection of massages, facial and body treatments. Pleiades restaurant serves a variety of menus all day and guests can combine their meal with a wine tasting experience, while they are enjoying stunning views of Aegean Sea. Refreshments and snacks are provided at the pool bar. The hotel is just 5 km from Santorini Airport and 8 km away from Santorini port. Laptops and i-pads are available upon request and free private parking is available near the premises.

name: Fanari Villas Santorini
address: Oia, Thera 847 02
description: Fanari Villas is a multi-level complex built on a cliff, with views of the caldera, Thirasia island and the sunset. It features suites carved in the rock and offers wellness treatments. Suites feature arched ceilings and handcrafted, wooden furniture, free Wi-Fi are standard. Laptops can be provided upon request. Each unit has a special seating area, in some separated from the bedroom. Some suites have private spa baths. The outdoor areas feature curved rooftops and terraces with bougainvillea flowers. Half of the swimming pool is open-air and half is enclosed in an arched cavern with a hot tub. Wellness options at Villas Fanari include massages, facials and hair-dressing appointments. A sauna is also available. The restaurant serves local cuisine with a modern twist. Meals are also served in the suites. The Sun Spirit Café-Bar serves refreshments and snacks. A buffet breakfast is served daily. The centre of Oia is a 5-minute walk from Villas Fanari. The Prehistoric Settlement of Akrotiri and Ancient Thira are at 21 km. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Electra Palace Thessaloniki
address: 9, Aristotelous Square, Thessaloniki
description: Electra Palace Thessaloniki is a 5-star flagship hotel in the heart of Thessaloniki, in the impressive Aristotelous Square. On the top floor is the Orizontes Roof Garden Restaurant Bar with panoramic views of the Thermaic Gulf. You can also relax in the rooftop pool or revitalize in the spa with the heated pool. On the ground floor you will find a British style lounge bar with fireplace and chesterfield sofas. Rooms and suites at the Electra Palace are decorated with wooden floors, wood furniture and luxurious curtains. They include a laptop-sized safe, a minibar and a flat-screen satellite TV. The marble bathrooms are equipped with a bathtub, bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. A rich Greek breakfast is served each morning in the rooftop restaurant with fresh produce. Enjoy panoramic views of the Thermaic Gulf, Mount Olympus and the city. For lunch or dinner, you can enjoy several Mediterranean dishes accompanied by a cocktail or a fine wine bottle. The Executive Lounge is the upgraded VIP experience of the newly renovated private space on the ground floor of the emblematic Electra Palace Thessaloniki. An exclusive lobby with access to guests who will choose to enjoy privacy in a space with exceptional architectural touches, with the possibility of holding private meetings and access to an all day buffet with coffee, snacks and drinks. Fully equipped with Premium Wi-Fi, greek and foreign press, snack and drink options and a special meeting room with a capacity of 8 people, Executive Lounge is the perfect place in Aristotelous Square for both relaxation and business meetings. From 10.30 in the morning until 22.00 in the evening guests can choose and enjoy the premium hosting of the Executive Lounge, inviting even friends or partners (extra charge applied). The hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, and room service. This 5-star hotel features 5 conferences rooms with modern equipment and a banquet space that can accommodate up to 350 people. Electra Palace is ideally located within the business, cultural and commercial center of the city. Among the area's attractions are the White Tower and the Museum of Byzantine History, while the famous Ladadika are within walking distance. Electra Palace is 15 km from Macedonia International Airport, 1 km from the main train station and 500 metres from the port. Please note that you must have the credit card with which the reservation was made upon check in.

name: Makedonia Palace
address: 2, Megalou Alexandrou Avenue, Thessaloniki
description: Modern and aristocratic, the majestic Makedonia Palace is a commanding presence on Thessaloniki’s unique seafront, only a few steps away from the city center, that welcomes guests with an incomparable sense of good living. The jewel of Thessaloniki unfolds the art of hospitality. The menu at Salonica Restaurant, one of the city’s best a la carte venues, exudes an air of elevated gastronomy. Mediterranean flavors awarded breakfast service, a la carte menus accompanied by unrivaled views of the sea and the White Tower landmark will transform every meal into a unique experience every hour of the day. In each of the 276 spacious rooms, all guests can feel at home while enjoying the view of the sea or the city. The technology and automations, the Coco-Mat beds, or the connecting rooms offering ideal options for family stays, blended with the superior personalized service, make for the ideal 5 Star hospitality experience in Thessaloniki City. Makedonia Palace is renowned for the impeccable hosting of every type of social and corporate event, with a 900 square meter ballroom and a functional, 2,000 square meter convention center that can hold up to 1,000 persons; the main hall can be divided into four separate rooms. Wellness services are on offer to rejuvenate with traditional hammam, an outdoor swimming pool by the seafront and a fitness center with sauna facilities. Makedonia Palace cares for the family needs with a complete range of baby equipment and essential supplies such as baby kits, strollers, special kids’ menus, and babysitting services upon demand. Everything has been designed to offer you the ‘Makedonia Palace experience’ from the moment you book your stay until the time of your departure. Organized adventure excursions to nearby destinations, alternative themed tours of the city, and air balloon flights are just some of the experiences for every type of guest. A landmark for luxury hospitality in Thessaloniki, Makedonia Palace is so much more than a hotel!bestwestern.com

name: Mediterranean Palace Hotel
address: Salaminos 3 And Karatassou, Thessaloniki
description: Strategically positioned in the heart of the commercial and business centre of Thessaloniki, Mediterranean Palace provides 5-star accommodation with magnificent views of the Thermaikos Gulf. The Mediterranean Palace Hotel has 111 rooms and 7 suites, finely equipped with en suite bathroom with toiletries, satellite TV and air conditioning. Free Wi-Fi internet access is available in all rooms and public areas of the hotel. "Cookoo" restaurant is a place of culinary delight, for a coffee or snack break, a relaxed lunch or dinner. "Fellows" Bar is a pleasant place for friendly or professional meetings, cocktails and drinks. Conference facilities are also available in the 7 fully equipped meeting rooms with a capacity of 300 participants. The hotel is located next to the famous historical area of Ladadika within easy access to the shopping centre of Thessaloniki. Nearby attractions include the White Tower, the Archaeological Museum and the Byzantine churches of the city. Underground 24hour guarded parking is available for all hotel guests.

name: The Met Hotel
address: 48, 26th October Street, Thessaloniki 546 27
description: Situated by the waterfront in Thessaloniki’s up-and-coming industrial harbor area, The Met Hotel is a 212-room cultural icon that blurs the lines between art gallery and luxury hotel. Installations by some of the world’s foremost contemporary artists have been handpicked for the hotel. The broader design concept is centered on open spaces and fine-quality materials. The hotel features an indulgent spa, chic dining options and state of the art business conferencing facilities, all supported by outstanding services and meticulous attention to detail.Marriott

name: The Tanneries Hotel & Spa
address: Vivilaki 19, Chania 731 33
description: In a beautiful seaside setting, The Tanneries is a minimalist boutique that invites guests to connect with Chania’s past. Four conjoining, former tannery buildings have been renovated into an architectural slice of Cretan history. Here, 20 spacious suites present guests with airy, bright interior spaces, many of which overlook the sea. The building’s industrial character is preserved, highlighting natural materials that combine to form for a clean, minimalist look. Periplous Seaside restaurant serves fresh, organic local ingredients complemented by a bar with signature cocktails and local wines, while a fitness/spa/wellness center offers moments of pure relaxation.Marriott

name: Oniros Residences
address: Platia Eleftheriou Venizelou Souda, Chania 731 00
description: Offering free WiFi, Oniros Residence is located in Souda Port, Chania. It offers a rooftop pool, a gym and a spa. Offering views over the sea, all rooms in the hotel come with a balcony, and they are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a coffee machine and a fridge. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the property. You can also have lunch and dinner on site. Chania Old Venetian Harbour is 7 km away. Mitropoleos Square is 6 km from Oniros Residence, while Municipal Art Gallery of Chania is 6 km from the property. Chania International Airport is 8 km away and airport shuttle from the airport to the property is provided with additional charge.

name: Elia Agia Marina Resort
address: 9 Αγίων Θεοδώρων, Agia Marina 731 00
description: Set in Agia Marina Nea Kydonias, a few steps from Agia Marina Beach, Elia Agia Marina Resort offers accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Offering a restaurant, the property also has a terrace, as well as a sauna and a hot tub. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the resort, the rooms have a balcony. Every room has air conditioning and a flat-screen TV, and certain units at Elia Agia Marina Resort have a sea view. The units will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Elia Agia Marina Resort offers a hammam. Stalos Beach is less than 1 km from the resort, while Platanias Beach is 2 km away. The nearest airport is Chania International Airport, 22 km from Elia Agia Marina Resort.

name: Domes Noruz Chania, Autograph Collection- Adults Only
address: Strati Pantelaki 5, Agioi Apostoloi, Agioi Apostoloi (Crete) 731 00
description: Located in a dreamy seaside setting, Domes Noruz Chania is an adults-only 16+ lifestyle resort awarded for its novel design that combines modern Greek design with a wide range of experiences and a cosmopolitan view of the world. From delicious cocktails of local ingredients to moonlit live jazz events at the beach and helicopter rides at the breathtaking Samaria Gorge, guests are invited to a highly curated world where unique experiences are the forefront. By embracing the past and the present of the city Noruz offers a fresh, contemporary way for design-savvy guests to explore Chania and enjoy it differently. The hotel's close proximity to the city makes it even more ideal, as Chania is amongst Mediterranean’s ‘must see’ cultural destinations. The old town offers a blend of Ottoman, Venetian and Greek architectures creating a stunning setting. The promenade, the old light house, the Venetian castle, the port and the Turkish mosque are perfect for exploration.Marriott

name: Domes Zeen Chania, a Luxury Collection Resort, Crete
address: Apteron Street, Kato Daratso, Darátsos 731 00
description: At Domes Zeen we emphasize community, sustainability, and slow living in an elegant setting. Nestled in a protected cove, a short drive from the Town of Chania, and offering spectacular views of the town and the sea, Domes Zeen is a destination in itself. We create the ultimate sensation of togetherness right in the heart of your Cretan sanctuary. Immerse yourself in a gourmet dining experience surrounded by the splendor of nature. Retreat to your private villa for restful moments on your private terrace or balcony before falling asleep under the stars to the silence of nature. This is your Domes Zeen experience, designed to awaken all senses.Marriott

name: Avra Imperial Hotel
address: Kolymbari, Chania 730 06
description: Built within 65,000 m² of gardens, Avra Imperial Hotel features a 1,500-m² pool area with a pool bar in the middle. The resort is 100 metres from Kolimvari Beach.
