Our luxury hotel offers a district-defining retreat in the heart of Ataköy with awe-inspiring sea views at every turn. Resplendent décor, world-class dining, and rejuvenating spa and wellness spaces where visitors can come together to socialize and create meaningful memories or escape and restore their sense of balance. Each and every one of our 204 rooms and suites spread across 17 stories, are spacious and equipped with the latest modern comforts, designed with luxury in mind. Easy access to the heart of Istanbul is of the utmost importance to us. The wondrous sights of the city such as Hagia Sophia, Topkapı Palace, Galata Port, Dolmabahce Palace, and Taksim Square are all within easy reach. Our hotel offers enriching experiences designed to bring guests fun-filled creative adventures thoughtfully curated to leave them feeling inspired and connected throughout their journey.Marriott

name: Sheraton Istanbul Ataköy Hotel
address: Rauf Orbay Caddesi Sahilyolu, No:10, Istanbul 34158
description: It is a treat to experience one of the world’s oldest cities, Istanbul standing astride two continents upon a strait, with Sheraton Istanbul Ataköy Hotel privilege. Sheraton Istanbul Ataköy Hotel is an unmatched option for guests looking to indulge in an unforgettable hotel experience in this exceptional city. Overlooking a splendid Marmara Sea view, Sheraton Istanbul Ataköy Hotel spans over an area of 40.000 square meters of lush nature offers a relaxing feeling to its guests coming for both business & leisure purposes. The hotel offers bright, spacious rooms, a large club lounge and a stunning pool area.The Sheraton Istanbul Ataköy Hotel is also within walking distance to a variety of shopping centers and the marina, with cafes and restaurants nearby.Marriott

name: Radisson Hotel President Beyazit Istanbul
address: Tiyatro Caddesi 25 Beyazit, Fatih, Istanbul 34126
description: Conveniently located in the Old City of Sultanahmet, Radisson President Beyazit Istanbul is just 230 metres from Grand Bazaar and 160 metres from Beyazit Tram Station. The hotel is certified as eco-friendly by Ministry of Culture and Tourism. Panoramic views of Marmara Sea can be admired from the indoor pool and rooftop terrace of the hotel. Free WiFi, satellite TV and a laptop-size safe box are standard in hotel's modern rooms. All rooms have a coffee&tea setup and central heating and cooling system. Some rooms also offer views of the sea or historic city. The day starts with a rich open buffet breakfast including a wide range of cheese, salami and eggs among other varieties and fresh products. Breakfast is served in the Marmara dining room accompanied with views of the Marmara Sea. International cuisine is served as an à la carte menu for lunch and dinner at the Terrace Restaurant. You can also enjoy a drink at the English pub while watching sports however area can be closed from time to time so please contact with the hotel before making your reservations to check it's availability. Surrounded by floor-to-ceiling windows, the indoor swimming area offers panoramic sea views. Access to the state-of-the-art gym is free for guests of Radisson President Beyazit Istanbul. There is also a wellness centre offering massages, sauna, steam room and a hot tub however these areas can be closed from time to time so please contact with the hotel before making your reservations to check their availability. Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque and Topkapi Palace are 1 km from Radisson President Beyazit Istanbul. Cemberlitas Hammam is just 500 metres away. It is also a 20-minute drive from CNR Expo Centre. Free private parking is available on site. Maximum vehicle height for parking garage is 2 meters. Istanbul Airport is 56 km from the property.

name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Istanbul Pera
address: Evliya Celebi Mah. Refik Saydam Cad. No 19 Tepebasi Taksim, Istanbul 34430
description: Located in Pera district, the centre of culture, art, fine dining and nightlife, Radisson Blu Hotel Istanbul Pera has a restaurant with stunning views of the Golden Horn and old city Istanbul. Istiklal Avenue is just a few feet away with numerous restaurants, cafés, bars, shops and art galleries. Tastefully decorated, the rooms of Radisson Blu Hotel Istanbul Pera include complimentary tea and coffee set-up, a minibar and a digital laptop-size safe box. Air conditioning, free WiFi and a flat-screen TV are also standard in the rooms. Located on the top floor, Hamdi Restaurant offers traditional Turkish cuisine accompanied by spectacular views of the Golden Horn. Additional options include Luna Lounge where you can taste variety of coffee and pastry at Luna Lounge. Dream Spa & Fitness includes a gym, sauna, steam bath, spa bath, an indoor pool and a Turkish bath for relaxation. Massage facilities are also available at a surcharge. Please note that a reservation is required for massage services. The historical Tunnel is just 350 metres from the hotel. Pera Museum, Galata District and the Old City are within walking distance. Ataturk Airport is 18 km from the hotel while Istanbul Airport is 50 km away.

name: Ajwa Sultanahmet
address: Emin Sinan Mah Piyerloti Cad No: 30, Istanbul 34122
description: Newly built and opened its door to guests in 2017, AJWA Sultanahmet - a member of Preferred Hotels & Resorts is situated in famous Sultanahmet area, 10-minute walk from the Blue Mosque. This hotel is decorated in Ottoman-style and traditional accents. Featuring rooms with hand made carpets and Ottoman-style sofas, this hotel comes with a spa centre and an indoor pool. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Guests can admire selective pieces of art made by famous Azerbaijani artists such as Sattar Bahlulzade, Mahmud Mahmudzade, İslam İsrafilzade, Jamila Hashimova, Salam Salamzade, Mikayil Abdullayev, Nadir Akhundov and Maral Rahmanzade. Rauf Tuncer's paintings representing the old days of Istanbul are also featured in Amber meeting room. All rooms offer an Loewe Ultra HD TV, electronic curtains, air conditioning and under floor heating system. For indulgence, rooms feature handmade Tabriz-style silk carpets and M Line Slow Motion beds. You will also find hairdryer, tea and coffee setup in the room. Private bathroom features hand-painted tiles and Dornbracht vitrified items. After a work-out in the gym, guests can visit Zeferan Restaurant on the 8th floor, which provides breathtaking views of Marmara Sea, the Princes Islands and Sultanahmet. AJWA Sultanahmet - a member of Preferred Hotels & Resorts's décor boasts unique pieces of solid wood handmade furniture with mother-of-pearl details made by craftsmen from Damascus. 24-hour front desk and room service are available. You can enjoy the hotel's library after a busy day in the city. The Grand Bazaar is less than 1 km from AJWA Sultanahmet - a member of Preferred Hotels & Resorts. Sabiha Gokcen Airport is 45 km away where airport shuttle can be arranged upon request at a surcharge. Istanbul Airport is 53 km from the property.

name: Kaya Istanbul Fair & Convention
address: Gokevler Mahallesi 2317, Sokak No1, Büyükçekmece 34522
description: Located next to the Tüyap Exhibition Centre in Istanbul’s Büyükçekmece district, Kaya İstanbul Fair & Convention offers modern rooms with satellite TV. Its health club features panoramic views of the Sea of Marmara. The air-conditioned rooms at Kaya İstanbul Fair & Convention are decorated with dark wooden furniture. All rooms have a work desk, a minibar, and an en suite bathroom. Guests can get a relaxing massage at the Palaestra Health Club, which also features a Turkish hammam, an indoor pool, and a fitness centre. The hotel also offers table tennis classes, an outdoor pool, and a tour desk. Rich buffet breakfast is served every morning. The Rolling Rock Café offers exotic cocktails, rock & roll music, and American and Mexican specialties. The Summit Restaurant offers international cuisine and panoramic sea views. Kaya İstanbul Fair & Convention is located 35 km from Istanbul’s historic centre, where guests can visit Topkapi Palace, the Blue Mosque, and the Hagia Sophia Museum. The Marmara Park Shopping Centre is 5 km from the hotel. Istanbul Airport is 40 km away.

name: Point Hotel Taksim
address: Topcu Caddesi No.2 Taksim, Istanbul 34437
description: Located just 500 m from Taksim Square and less than 1 km from the Lutfi Kirdar Congress Center, Point Hotel Taksim offers rooms with free WiFi in modern Istanbul.The dcor of the rooms is light and features natural colours. Each room has double glazed windows for a quiet stay and a sofa. Included are an HD TV, Digiturk and LigTV (football channel). Some of the rooms also include free access to executive lounge.The top-floor View Point restaurant offers sweeping views of the Bosporus and is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner. There is also an authentic Japanese restaurant and 2 caf bars.Point Hotel Taksim's spa area includes an indoor swimming pool, sauna and Turkish bath. A variety of massages and beauty treatments are also available at this Istanbul hotel.Shopping options and public transport are readily available in the hotels surroundings.Acbadem Taksim Hospital is 350 metres, Kolan Hospital is 5.5 km away. With elegants shops and cafs, Niantasi district is 2.5 km away. Zorlu Mall is 6.5 km and Kanyon Mall is 6.7 km from the property. Istanbul Congress Centre,Ataturk Cultural Center and Cemal Resit Rey Concert Hall are within 1 km distance. Istanbul Airport is 48.7 km from Point Hotel Taksim. Private parking at the hotel and airport transfer service is available at an additional fee.iHotelier/iStay

name: The Marmara Pera
address: Mesrutiyet Caddesi Tepebasi,1, Istanbul 34430
description: Situated in Istanbul's trendy and hip area in Beyoglu where the ancient history meets modern life, this stylish hotel features a rooftop terrace with an outdoor pool overlooking the lively streets of Istanbul. The area is popular for soaking up to local culture, shopping and entertainment along with many unique restaurants to taste a wide array of dishes of Turkish and international cuisines. Istiklal Street and Demiroren Shopping Mall is just a few steps away and various means of transportation of metro, tram and buses can be accessed in the surrounding area, offering easy transportation through all parts of the city. The Long live Pera is an environmentally friendly accommodation. The classy rooms of this pet-friendly hotel features flat-screen TV with satellite channels, air conditioning, safe box and an electric kettle. The Long live Pera offers international and Turkish cuisine, snacks and refreshing drinks. The Mikla Restaurant provides new Anatolian cuisine with panoramic Bosphorus views. There are also numerous restaurants and bars within a few minutes’ walk. The Long live Pera features a state-of-the-art fitness centre. Wireless internet is free of charge in the entire hotel. A pillow menu will be offered for your comfort. You can discover the area, local shops and cafés by walking through the colourful streets reaching to the famous Galata Tower or Taksim Square within a 10-minute walk distance. Cevahir Shopping Mall is 4 km away, while OzdilekPark and Kanyon malls are 7 km from the hotel. Acibadem Taksim Hospital is 1.8 km away and Madame Tussauds Museum is a 10-minute walk from The Long live Pera. Istanbul Airport is 48.5 km away from The Marmara Pera. On-site car parking is available for a daily fee.

name: Crowne Plaza Antalya
address: Akdeniz Bulvari Gursu Mah. 306, Antalya 07070
description: Enjoy a fascinating holiday experience with the unique beauty of the Mediterranean Sea. We invite you to the world-renowned Konyaalti Beach surrounded by the deep blue sea and the Taurus Mountains. You can enjoy peace in the hot summer months while you swim on the clean beaches of the unique Konyaalti Beach with a blue flag. As soon as you arrive to Crowne Plaza Antalya, the smiling and professional teams will be ready to welcome you and help you have a great holiday. You can also view the matchless landscape of Antalya using the Tunektepe Aerial Tramway next to the hotel. You can watch the sunset and the Beydag Mountains on the terrace of the Neapolis Fine Dining on the 10th floor. Only 23 kilometers away from the airport, you can easily reach the hotel and discover the narrow streets of the ancient city where you can see historical monuments with a 15-minute drive. Charming everyone who loves to do sports anytime they want, Crowne Plaza Antalya offers a wide range of choices with indoor and outdoor swimming pools, gyms furnished with sports equipment, and 7 kilometers of beach and running track lying right before the hotel. The resting pool, Turkish bath and Finnish sauna in the SPA center will help you refresh yourself and relax your soul. The hotel has a car park area, and you can apply to the valet services offered by the hotel. Invite your friends to the meeting rooms in Crowne Plaza Antalya.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Pacco Hotel & Spa
address: Arapsuyu Mahallesi, 605 Sokak, No:2, Antalya 07070
description: Located in Antalya, 2.2 km from Konyaalti Beach, Pacco Hotel & SPA provides accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a shared lounge and a restaurant. A sauna and a car rental service are available for guests. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, American and vegetarian options. Popular points of interest near the hotel include 5M Migros, Antalya Aquarium and Antalya Aqualand. The nearest airport is Antalya Airport, 15 km from Pacco Hotel & SPA.

name: Megasaray Westbeach Antalya
address: Gursu Mah., Akdeniz Blv. 192, Antalya 07050
description: Located on Konyaalti Beach, Megasaray Westbeach Antalya - All Inclusive offers spacious rooms with flat-screen TV and free WiFi. Leisure facilities include an outdoor pool. All rooms have elegant furnishings and luxury bedding. Each room has a private French balcony overlooking the Mediterranean Sea. Megasaray Westbeach Antalya - All Inclusive is 350 metres away from the Akdeniz Blv Bus Stop. Local attractions such as Hadrian’s Gate and Kesik Minaret are 9 km away. The Aquarium is 2 km away and airport can be reached in a 20-minute drive. Free covered parking is available.

name: Puding Hotel
address: Mermerli Sok. No 15 Kaleici, Antalya 07100
description: Located in the heart of Antalya's old city area Kaleici, Puding Hotel features 6 historical mansions, an outdoor pool and a pool bar. The property's location offers a unique panorama of mountains and the Mediterranean Sea, laying under the 30 meter high cliffs. Mermerli Beach and the old marina are within a 5-minute walk distance. Elegantly-designed rooms come with air conditioning, flat-screen TV, safety box, minibar and an electric kettle for your convenience. Private bathroom includes a hairdryer. You will also find free WiFi throughout the property. You can start the day with a buffet breakfast served at Puding Restaurant & Bar. 24-hour front desk service is at your disposal during the stay. Puding Hotel boasts a garden where you can relax after a busy day in the city. Kaleici district features many antique stores and historical mosques. Puding Hotel is just 500 metres from Hadrianus Gate. You can access to the tram line, located 700 metres from the property. Antalya Airport is just a 25-minute drive away.

name: Akra V Hotel
address: Lara Yolu, Antalya 07100
description: Situated in the centre of Antalya, Akra V Hotel is only 300 metres from the Mediterranean coast. It offers spacious guestrooms with free WiFi and has a 24-hour front desk. Rooms at Akra V Hotel include modern wood furnishings and a seating area with satellite TV. An electric kettle with tea/coffee set-up and a minibar are available in each unit. Some rooms include a furnished balcony with views of the sea. Guests can taste delicious croissants along with a cup of coffee or tea. You can sample a range of Turkish and international cuisine dishes at the hotel’s many dining options including the main Restaurant, fine dining restaurant, brasserie, pool bar, lobby bar, snack bar, and the patisserie. Guests can benefit from the facilities of Akra Hotel free of charge. The venue is only 100 metres away and it offers on-site Turkish bath, indoor and outdoor pool, fitness center and an access to the beach. Akra V Hotel is located 15 km from Antalya Airport and offers free on-site private parking. Nearby leisure activities include bowling and water sports.

name: Titanic Mardan Palace
address: Kundu Mah. Yasar Sobutay Bul. No: 450/1, Antalya 07110
description: This resort boasts one of the largest outdoor pools in Europe and 8 à la carte restaurants. Titanic Mardan Palace offers a private beach area and rooms equipped with luxury amenities. Each room has a balcony with views of Taurus Mountains, Mediterranean Sea or swimming pool. All rooms feature remote controlled air conditioning and lighting. Separate restaurants are dedicated to international cuisines. The main restaurant serves each meal. The rooftop bar offers views of the resort and the sea. The luxury spa offers therapies, a state-of-art fitness centre and a meditation room overlooking the indoor pool. The beauty therapy centre provides facial and body care. The centre of Antalya is just 15 km away and can be reached in just 20 minutes by car. EXPO 2016 Antalya is 17 km from Titanic Mardan Palace.

name: Melas Lara Hotel
address: Kemeragzi Koyu Tesisler Cad. Kundu-Lara 402, Antalya 07110
description: Just a few steps from the private beach, all-inclusive Melas Lara Hotel is set in Lara, one of the most popular points of Antalya. The hotel offers a garden, an outdoor pool with water slides, and an indoor pool. Free private parking is possible on site. Air-conditioned accommodations at Melas Lara come with a seating area, flat-screen satellite TV, and a minibar. The private bathroom includes a shower, hairdryer, slippers and free toiletries. Each features a balcony offering garden views, whereas some also have sea views. You can work out at the gym, or get a relaxation at the sauna. Leisure facilities include tennis, billiards, table tennis, darts, squash, mini golf and water sports. You can also have massage treatments, while the little ones can have fun in the children’s playground. Breakfast, lunch and dinner are served buffet style. You can enjoy your meal on the terrace restaurant overlooking the stunning view of the Mediterranean Sea. Antalya Airport is 15 km from Hotel Melas Lara, and airport shuttles can be arranged upon request, at an extra fee.

name: Balmy Beach Resort Kemer
address: Baskomutan, Atatürk Cd. No:41, Block A, Antalya 07985
description: Near Beldibi Beach Park Located in Kemer, Balmy Beach Resort Kemer is a 1-minute drive from Beldibi Beach Park and 7 minutes from topçam. This spa hotel is 10.1 mi (16.2 km) from Konyaalti Beach and 13.4 mi (21.6 km) from Konyaalti Beach Park. Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, and coffee/tea in a common area. Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer. Beldibi Beach Park - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi Champion Holiday Village - 4 km / 2.5 mi Topçam - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi DinoPark - 8.3 km / 5.1 mi Goynuk Canyon - 10.7 km / 6.7 mi Tunektepe Cable Car - 13.3 km / 8.3 mi Sarisu Beach - 13.7 km / 8.5 mi Antalya Trade Port - 14.8 km / 9.2 mi Konyaalti Beach - 16.2 km / 10.1 mi Liman Street - 19.2 km / 11.9 mi Kemer Marina - 19.4 km / 12 mi Nomad Theme Park - 19.8 km / 12.3 mi Moonlight Beach and Park - 20.9 km / 13 mi Kemer Merkez Bati Public Beach - 20.9 km / 13 mi Konyaalti Beach Park - 21.6 km / 13.4 mi The nearest major airport is Antalya Intl. Airport (AYT) - 43.1 km / 26.8 mi Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's many dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/cafe. Mingle with other guests at the complimentary reception, held daily. Need to unwind? Take a break with a tasty beverage at one of the 3 bars/lounges. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 7:00 AM to 11:00 AM. Make yourself at home in one of the 148 air-conditioned rooms featuring free minibar items and espresso makers. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and 50-inch LED televisions are provided for your entertainment. Bathrooms feature showers with rainfall showerheads. Conveniences include desks and separate sitting areas, and housekeeping is provided daily.Ticket Package

name: Rixos Downtown Antalya
address: Sakıp Sabancı Boulevard,Konyaaltı Beach 3, Antalya 07050
description: Rixos Downtown Antalya offers guests a fabulous juxtaposition; an urban resort in the centre of Antalya where city and nature collide. With views over the Mediterranean Sea and the Taurus Mountains, the picturesque setting of the Rixos Downtown Antalya makes it a natural choice for anyone seeking rich and varied culture in a resort setting. From the yacht-filled harbour to Hadrian's Gate, a powerful reminder of Turkey's role in the creation of civilisation, it is easy to see the allure of Antalya.accorhotels.com

name: Falcon Hotel
address: Sirinyali Mah., 1540 Sok. No: 12, Antalya 07310
description: Set in the city centre of Antalya, Falcon hotel features a private platform beach, pools and a garden lawn that overlooks the Mediterranean Sea. It has a traditional Turkish bath, a sauna and tennis court. All rooms have parquet floors and a balcony with land & sea views. They have air conditioning and come equipped with a minibar and satellite TV. The private bathrooms have a hairdryer. The Falcon Hotel provides indoor and outdoor open buffet at Main Restaurant, which serves Turkish and international cuisine. Drinks are available from the restaurant and all bars. Guests can enjoy a relaxing massage, or visit the fitness centre. The hotel has an outdoor pool with waterslides and a tennis court. WiFi access is free in public areas and rooms. Antalya’s historic Kaleiçi neighbourhood is just 5 km from the hotel and Antalya International Airport is 17 km away. The hotel offers 24-hour front desk service and luggage storage.

name: Baia Lara Hotel
address: Kemeragzi Mevkii Kundu Bölgesi Lara, Antalya 07000
description: Featuring a private sandy beach area and a wooden pier, this extensive hotel offers wide outdoor pools, Aqua Park with 9 slides and a heated indoor pool. Spa and sports facilities are all available. Rooms at Baia Lara Hotel include free WiFi, a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and floor-to-ceiling windows. Safety deposit box, minibar and an electric kettle are provided. Private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and a shower or bath. Baia Restaurant serves breakfast, late breakfast, lunch, dinner and midnight snack, all in buffet style. A la carte restaurant with Mediterranean and steak specialties are available, and reservation is needed. Bars and snack corners are scattered around the hotel. Guests can play a game of football, basketball and tennis on the fields offered. Bowling, beach volleyball and games room are available. You can also work out in the fitness centre and relax in the Turkish bath, sauna or in one of the 13 massage rooms. Antalya Airport is only 15 km from Baia Lara Hotel.

name: Özkaymak Falez Hotel
address: Bahçelievler Mahallesi,Tarik Akiltopu Caddesi No:1 (Near Sakip Sabanci Bulvari; ex Konyaalti Falez Mevkii) Muratpasa, Antalya, Antalya 07050
description: Ozkaymak Falez Hotel offers 2 outdoor pools, a children’s pool, an indoor pool, and a water slide. The hotel has a spa centre and 4 tennis courts. Ozkaymak’s private beach is 200 metres away, and a shuttle is provided. The rooms of Hotel Ozkaymak Falez include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, air conditioning and a minibar. They all have a balcony or terrace with city, garden, land or pool views. Some rooms also offer sea views. Outdoor dining is possible at La Pergola Restaurant, which serves buffet-style dishes. À la carte specialities and panoramic views of the Mediterranean can be enjoyed at Mehtap Restaurant. In the evening, you can relax with drinks and live piano music in the lobby bar. Spa facilities include a sauna and a Turkish bath. Massage treatments and a fitness centre are also available. The hotel offers bike and car rentals. Antalya Airport is 16 km away.

name: Rixos Sungate
address: Göynük Mah. Baş Komutan Atatürk Cad. No:153-1/1 Kemer, Antalya,Türkiye, Antalya 07985
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Beldibi, Rixos Sungate Hotel promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. 24-hour room service, 24-hour front desk, facilities for disabled guests, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park are there for guest's enjoyment. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like television LCD/plasma screen, carpeting, mirror, slippers, separate living room. Enjoy the hotel's recreational facilities, including hot tub, private beach, fitness center, sauna, golf course (on site), before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Rixos Sungate Hotel.priceline.com

name: Sealife Kemer Resort Hotel
address: Yenimahalle Ataturk Bl., No:44, Antalya 07980
description: A stay at Sealife Kemer Resort Hotel places you in the heart of Kemer, within a 5-minute drive of Kemer Merkez Bati Public Beach and Liman Street. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Limak Lara De Luxe Hotel
address: Kemeragzi Mevkii P.K. 34 Lara, Antalya 07034
description: This luxurious 5-star hotel is located in the coastal resort of Lara. It features 4 à la carte restaurants and an expansive spa. All guests are offered special benefits such as complimentary fruit basket and a bottle of wine upon arrival, free ironing service, special offers at SPA and restaurants. The spa at the Limak Lara features a Turkish/steam bath, indoor pools and a hot tub. A range of relaxation therapies are also available, including full-body massages, facials and pedicures. The air-conditioned rooms at the Limak Lara Deluxe Hotel & Resort Antalya have modern furnishings with Turkish influences. They include a spacious living area with a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a hot tub and terrace with sea views. Guests will find a complimentary fruit basket in the room upon arrival. Guests can enjoy various international cuisines at the onsite restaurants, including Indian, Thai, Japanese, Italian, Mexican and Turkish. Meals can be enjoyed indoors as well as al fresco. The De Luxe Hotel is only a 10-minute drive from the Antalya city centre and offers free private parking.

name: Lara Barut Collection
address: Güzeloba Mah., Yasar Sobutay Mah. No:30, Antalya 07100
description: This beachfront hotel in Antalya features 8 à la carte restaurants and spa with Turkish bath. Just 10 km from Antalya Airport, it offers kids' club facilities, indoor and outdoor pools with water slides. Guests can enjoy the adults-only beaches. The large rooms at Lara Barut Collection include spacious balconies with tables and chairs. Each room has a seating area equipped with an LCD TV, DVD player (on request) and minibar. The hotel has a turn-down service in order to offer the utmost comfort to their guests. Guests can relax at the Tuva Eurasian Spa & Thalasso Center, which has spa facilities, saunas and a beauty centre. For the active ones, there are also tennis and squash courts, gym, mini golf and a water sports centre. The Lara Barut Collection restaurants serve rich international and local cuisine, both indoors and al fresco. Vegan, lactose-free and gluten-free menu is available. There is also a patisserie serving sweet delicacies and 5 bars for drinks. Entertainment shows are organised by Lara Barut Collection animation team and live music can be enjoyed in the evenings at the on-site nightclub.

name: Holiday Inn Antalya - Lara
address: Lara Guzeloba 2290, Sk Muratpasa, Antalya 81657
description: A contemporary Antalya hotel offering free WiFi, an outdoor pool, a seaview terrace bar and a spa Holiday Inn® Antalya - Lara hotel places you just a 15 minute walk from sandy Lara Beach. A 15-minute drive from the hotel takes you to the international brand name stores and restaurants of TerraCity Shopping Centre. Beach Area, 15 minutes’ drive away, and free parking is also available.A 30-minute drive from the hotel, the winding streets of Kaleiçi Old Town are home to Roman ruins and ancient city gates.The nearby Antalya Museum tells the city’s history through displays of archaeological artefacts, including Byzantine mosaics. Just 10 minutes drive from the hotel, the impressive Düden Waterfalls, surrounded by a leafy park, cascade down cliffs into the Mediterranean Sea.Business guests can host events for up to 120 delegates in the hotel's three flexible meeting spaces. They both come equipped with state-of-the-art AV equipment to ensure presentations go well. And there's free WiFi throughout the hotel.You can swim in the outdoor pool, work out in the fully equipped fitness centre, or relax over drinks on the seaview terrace bar, before dining on international cuisine in the open lobby restaurant. Unwind with a steam bath, sauna or massage in the spa, or enjoy a night in with 24-hour room service.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Akra Hotel
address: Lara Yolu, Antalya 07100
description: Located on the seafront, this 5-star hotel is set in the city centre where you can enjoy the lively streets of the city accompanied by the calm and warm atmosphere of the Mediterranean landscape. Balconies with views of the Mediterranean or the Taurus Mountains are featured in all Akra’s rooms. The contemporary-style rooms include flat-screen TVs with satellite channels and free WiFi. Akra Hotel features multiple restaurants and bars. Pablito Bistro serves selective dishes from Turkish and international cuisines. It serves variety of dishes to indulge yourself including seafood, freshly-made breads, pizzas, grilled dishes and pastas. Organic food and a range of snacks are available. Featuring views of stupendous Bey Mountains, the Mediterranean Sea and the city, Asmani Restaurant is located on the 10th floor of the hotel. The wellness centre includes sauna, Turkish bath and a range of massages. Guests can train at the well-equipped gym, or play some tennis on the resort’s courts. Akra Hotel is situated 3 km from Terracity Mall and the old town area with many cafés and bars. Antalya International Airport is about 15 km away. Free parking is available on site.

name: Sealife Family Resort Hotel
address: Konyaalti Sahil Seridi Antalya 7070 TR, Antalya 07050
description: Sealife Family Resort Hotel is a popular choice amongst travelers in Antalya, whether exploring or just passing through. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. All the necessary facilities, including 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, convenience store, daily housekeeping, are at hand. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature television LCD/plasma screen, bathroom phone, carpeting, mirror, internet access wireless. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Sealife Family Resort Hotel.priceline.com

name: Fame Residence Lara & Spa
address: Kemeragzi Mevkii Lara, Antalya
description: Located on the Mediterranean coast, this seafront hotel offers a private blue flag beach, spa centre and a large outdoor pool with water slides. The hotel features luxurious interiors, modern rooms and free Wi-Fi in public areas. All rooms of Fame Residence Lara & Spa are air-conditioned and decorated in soft colours to provide a comfortable accommodation. Some rooms offer beautiful views of the Mediterranean Sea. Meals are served at the elegant restaurants of Fame Residence and can be enjoyed both indoors and outdoors. Guests can taste Italian and Chinese cuisine as well as Turkish cuisine. Delicious drinks are provided by the hotel’s bars. The spa centre includes a Turkish bath, sauna and massage rooms where guests can have aromatherapy massages and masks. There is also an on-site football field, tennis court and a fitness centre for sporty guests. Little ones can have fun in the children's playground and kids' pool. Antalya city centre is within 20 km. Antalya Airport is a 10-minute drive from Fame Residence Lara & Spa.

name: Rixos Beldibi
address: Göynük Mahallesi, Baskomutan Atatürk Caddesi No:67, Beldibi Mevkii, Kemer, Antalya, Göynük 07985
description: Rixos Beldibi has an enviable position nestled in spectacular greenery and offering stunning views of the Mediterranean Sea. The coastal town of Beldibi is smaller than many on the Turkish Riviera, reflected in the more intimate setting at Rixos Beldibi. Known as the Turquoise coast, the clear warm waters and rugged scenery create a splendid backdrop for the resort and all it has to offer.accorhotels.com

name: Crystal Centro Resort
address: Kundu Mevkii, Antalya 07230
description: Set in Antalya and presenting unique views of Lara Beach Park, Kervansaray Kundu Hotel provides 5-star accommodation, as well as a sauna, a private beach and an outdoor pool. It also offers free Wi-Fi, a Turkish steam bath and water slides. The resort has a gym with a swimming pool. It also provides family-friendly facilities, with room designs and services for families of any size, plus a kids club and a kids pool. The elegant rooms at Kervansaray Kundu Hotel include wireless internet access and a mini bar. There are also several rooms geared towards families. Kervansaray Kundu Hotel houses a restaurant and a bar where guests are able to unwind of an evening. Breakfast is available daily and can be savored in the comfort of the rooms. Antalya Airport is less than a 35-minute drive from Kervansaray Kundu Hotel. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to book and organize activities in Antalya.HotelsCombined

name: Concorde De Luxe Resort
address: Kemeragzi Site Mh. Tesisler Cad. 358/1, Antalya 07230
description: Situated on Lara Beach, this spa resort boasts an elegant landscaped pool area with palm trees and waterslides. It offers air-conditioned guestrooms with balconies and panoramic views of the Mediterranean Sea. Rooms at the Concorde De Luxe Resort - Prive Ultra All Inclusive are spacious and have modern furnishings. They come equipped with satellite TV, free Wi-Fi, and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. The De Luxe Resort boasts 7 restaurants and bars. Da Vinci offers Italian dishes with an à la carte menu. The Concorde has a steakhouse, Havana Bar and a beach bar with sun loungers and sea views. Guests can relax on the private beach or play a game of tennis on the flood-lit court. The resort’s spa offers massages and body treatments. There is also an indoor pool and a games room with a bowling alley and billiards. The Concorde De Luxe Resort - Prive Ultra All Inclusive is located 10 km from Antalya Airport and offers 24-hour front desk service and free public parking is possible on site.

name: Wise Hotel & Spa - Adults Only
address: Sirinyali Mah.1512 Sok No 6, Antalya 07160
description: Set in Antalya in the Mediterranean Region Turkey Region, 5 km from Broken Minaret, Wise Hotel & Spa boasts a seasonal outdoor pool and views of the sea. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Rooms are equipped with a private bathroom fitted with a shower. Wise Hotel & Spa features free WiFi throughout the property. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Hadrian's Gate is 5 km from Wise Hotel & Spa, while Marina is 5 km away. The nearest airport is Antalya Airport, 15 km from Wise Hotel & Spa.

name: Adonis Hotel
address: Eski Lara Yolu Uzeri, Lara, Antalya 07100
description: Featuring an outdoor swimming pool with waterslides and guest rooms with a private balcony, the Adonis Hotel is located on the Antalya seafront overlooking the Mediterranean Sea. Fully renovated in 2019, all rooms at Antalya Adonis Hotel are decorated with framed artwork and wooden furniture. There is a TV and a tiled en suite bathroom in every room. WiFi is available for an additional fee. The Adonis Hotel’s restaurant serves Turkish and International cuisine, with indoor and outdoor dining options available. The bars and clubs of central Antalya are just 5 minutes’ drive from the hotel. A staircase in the cliffs provides access to the Adonis Hotel’s private swimming platform and sun terrace. There is also an indoor pool and a games room with darts and billiards. Antalya Adonis Hotel is 20 minutes’ drive from Antalya International Airport. Free on-site car parking is available.

name: Hotel Su & Aqualand
address: Meltem Mah., Dumlupinar Bulvar No:205, Antalya 07050
description: Set in an immaculate white building on Konyaalti Beach, Hotel SU & Aqualand offers modern minimalist design and an extensive spa. It features an outdoor pool and 5 dining outlets. All rooms and suites at Hotel SU & Aqualand feature trendy interiors and mood lighting. Each has a private balcony with a sofa and central heating/cooling system. Special treats and complimentary toiletries are offered for each guest. Guests have access to the outdoor pool surrounded with ample sun beds and parasols. Sports-minded guests can make use of the well-appointed gym, or the tennis courts. The beach is a local beach and our guests can use the sunbeds, umbrellas and towels free of charge. For relaxation, there is a full spa with a Turkish bath, sauna and massage rooms. Hotel SU & Aqualand also features an on-site hairdresser and shopping arcade. Dining choices range from Mediterranean to Japanese and international cuisine. Guests can also enjoy snacks and drinks at the pool restaurant and the beach bar. SU Hotel is located 1.5 km from the city centre and a 20-minute drive from Antalya International Airport. Antalya Arena Stadium is 2.1 km from the property. From October 15, Aqualand is closed. 2024 Summer season opening date is subject to change depending on weather conditions.

name: Paloma Foresta
address: Ciftecesmeler Mah Ataturk Cad No 143, Göynük 07985
description: Nestled in quiet woodland along the Mediterranean, this 5-star resort boasts a private stretch of sandy beach in Beldibi. It features a luxurious spa offering paraffin treatments and therapy baths. There are also 3 outdoor pools, 1 indoor pool and an aqua park with 3 slides. Paloma Foresta offers richly decorated rooms with private balconies and satellite TV. Bedcovers with brocade patterns, thick curtains and marble bathrooms give an elegant touch to the rooms. With a choice of 7 restaurants, guests can enjoy organic wine, outdoor dining on the panoramic terrace, and a range of cuisines made from locally sourced ingredients. Paloma Foresta has a 24-hour bar, an Irish Pub, and a disco. The Harmonia Spa offers professional massages and beauty treatments. Guests can visit the gym or enjoy a game of tennis on the floodlit court. Beach volleyball, basketball, mini golf and many other games and sports are available. There is also a games room with billiards and darts. Antalya city centre is 30 km away while Antalya Airport is 42 km from the property.

name: Laren Sea Side Hotel Spa
address: Çaglayan Mahallesi 2069 Sokak, Antalya 07230
description: Set in Antalya, Laren Sea Side Hotel Spa features a shared lounge, terrace, bar, and free WiFi throughout the property. Conveniently located in the Eski Lara district, this hotel offers a private beach area, as well as a hammam. The property has a year-round outdoor pool, fitness centre, sauna and garden. All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. All rooms have a safety deposit box, while selected rooms also offer a patio and others also have city views. At the hotel all rooms include bed linen and towels. Laren Sea Side Hotel Spa offers a continental or halal breakfast. You can play darts at the accommodation, and bike hire is available. Speaking English, Russian and Turkish, staff are willing to help at the 24-hour front desk. Hadrian's Gate is 10 km from Laren Sea Side Hotel Spa, while Antalya Clock Tower is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Antalya, 4 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Porto Bello Hotel Resort & Spa
address: Akdeniz Bulvari 1. Sk. Konyaalti, Antalya 07100
description: This luxurious 5-star resort is located on Konyaaltı Beach and near the bustling centre of Antalya. It has an outdoor swimming pool, tennis courts and a modern spa. The guest rooms at the Porto Bello Resort & Spa include a balcony, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a seating area. All rooms have a minibar. Guests of Porto Bello can enjoy a range of international cuisine at the hotel’s restaurants. Meals are served indoors or outdoors, and can be enjoyed with a glass of local wine. Relaxation options at the Porto Bello include a sauna, a hot tub and massage services. The outdoor swimming pool is surrounded by palm trees, and there is also a modern gym featuring state-of-the-art cardiovascular equipment. The Porto Spa is located at the foot of the Beydağları Mountains, 22 km from Antalya International Airport.

name: Onkel Resort Hotel
address: Goynuk Mah Baskomutan Ataturk Cad No 171 Beldibi, Kemer 07070
description: Visit Antalya, Turkey and the Turkish Riviera, and stay at the Ramada Resort Kemer. This idyllic setting across from the beach offers an excellent opportunity to refresh your spirit on-site, or throughout this tranquil resort destination. Enjoy the fitness center, outdoor pool and sundeck, restaurant providing 24-hour room service, and conference hall suitable for up to 120 people. Guest rooms are equipped with mini bar featuring soft drinks, water, mineral water and domestic beer. Additionally, this facility provides complimentary continental breakfast and complimentary wireless Internet access. Sorry, no pets and no smoking allowed.priceline.com

name: Sherwood Exclusive Lara
address: Kopak Cayı mevkii - Kundu, Büyükkumluca 07110
description: This luxurious resort is located on the seafront and it offers a private sandy beach with a dock. The property includes outdoor pools, water slides, sauna and a Turkish bath. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Sherwood Exclusive Lara has bright rooms with central air conditioning, a TV with satellite channels and a minibar. All rooms include a balcony. The hotel offers ultra all-inclusive service including meals at all its 5 restaurants and selected beverages. You can enjoy Turkish or Italian specialties in the à la carte restaurants as well as cookies at patisserie. The bars serve a variety of drinks during the day. There are 2 outdoor tennis courts, and a fitness centre with cardio equipment and free weights on site. A heated outdoor pool is available on site. Antalya city centre is 18 km from Sherwood. Antalya Airport is a 15-minute drive away.

name: miramor hotel
address: sahil caddesi no:55, Antalya 00718
description: No description found

name: The Marmara Antalya
address: Eski Lara Yolu No. 136 Sirinyali, Antalya 07100
description: Located on the famous Falez Hills with sweeping Mediterranean views, the Marmara Antalya offers a private beach on the Turquoise Coast. Apart from the main building, this hotel features a unique revolving annex that rotates 360 degrees throughout the day. Guests can enjoy the revolving building experience by waking up to views of the pool or the Mediterranean Sea each day. A signature fusion of Turkish and international cuisine can be enjoyed at the Marmara Antalya. Organic and locally sourced products are used to create low-calorie meals and tempting afternoon teas. Guests can enjoy a drink while admiring the view on the garden terrace of the bar. The Marmara Antalya’s rooms have a unique décor in pastel colours. They are spacious and bright, and feature extra-large windows overlooking the sea or the Taurus Mountains. Personal trainers organise your training schedule at Marmara Antalya’s fitness centre. A 5-minute drive from Antalya city centre, The Marmara Antalya is about 7 km from Antalya International Airport.

name: Ramada Plaza by Wyndham Antalya
address: Genclik Mh. Fevzi Cakmak Caddesi No:22, Antalya 07100
description: Ramada Plaza Antalya combines your vacations and business trips with comfort, luxury and fun. In a spot where Mediterranean Sea embraces Taurus Mountains and stretches vastly, a new vacation experience is waiting for you on the natures wonders cliffs surrounding Antalya just like a lace. You will enjoy a resort like vacation right in city center within luxury and comfort and be pampered with the matchless beauties of blue and green in one of our 223 rooms that all come with panoramic sea view. Ramada Plaza Antalya shall become your permanent destination in your vacations and business trips with specially designed Cliff Top VIP Suite, Executive Club Floor and Lounge that is prepared for elite guests, businessmen and business world or Suite and Deluxe room options. Executive Club Lounge with special equipped and privileged services for our guests who stay at Executive Suites and Executive Rooms. The services provided in Executive Club Lounge include - Breakfast between 7 AM - 10 AM Tea, coffee, cookies and beverages service between 10 AM - 4 PM Snacks and local-import drink service between 4 PM - 10 PM High Speed Internet connection LCD TV Private meeting Room Desktop PC, Fax, e-mail services With Ramada Plaza Antalya privilege and difference, you can. Stroll around the historical Old Town within walking distance or get to know more about Antalya with tours to be organized by our Concierge Team. Ramada Plaza Antalya combines your vacations and business trips with comfort, luxury and fun. In a spot where Mediterranean Sea embraces Taurus Mountains and stretches vastly, a new vacation experience is waiting for you on the natures wonders cliffs surrounding Antalya just like a lace. You will enjoy a resort like vacation right in city center within luxury and comfort and be pampered with the matchless beauties of blue and green in one of our 223 rooms that all come with panoramic sea view. With Ramada Plaza Antalya privilege and difference, you can. Stroll around the historical Old Town within walking distance or get to know more about Antalya with tours to be organized by our Concierge Team. Renovate and rest in company with massages and skin and body cares in Ramada Plaza City Club SPA and Fitness on an area of 2700 sq m, energize in City Club Fitness and spend a more powerful and energetic vacation. Enjoy sun and sea in a peaceful and tranquil atmosphere at Ramada Beach and rest in the indoors swimming pool. Enjoy breakfast, lunch and dinner in Ristorante Verona, Fish Inn or Moods Restaurant and try alternative tastes and cuisines. Spend the most enjoyable moments of the day at Indigos Pub with alternative foods and drinks and party until the small hours with live music. Share the comfort of your office at Executive Club Floor and Lounge with your privileged guests if you are one of those that prefer comfort and privilege in your business trips. And organize your events with Ramada Plaza Antalya team in one of our meeting rooms equipped with the state of the art technology meeting any kind of need and varying between 25 sq m and 1050 sq m in size turning your conferences and business meetings into joy. Rates are Breakfast Inclusive.Wyndham

name: Maxx Royal Belek Golf Resort
address: Iskele Mevkii, Antalya
description: At Maxx Royal Belek Golf Resort, we've created a space where modernity and beauty coexist in perfect harmony. Our design is inspired by the elemental forces of earth, fire, water, and air, seamlessly blending ancient and current influences to create a truly unique ambiance.For golfers, our resort is a paradise, with an exceptional 18-hole course designed by Colin Montgomerie, attracting the biggest names in the sport, such as Tiger Woods and Justin Rose. In addition, the golf club offers illuminated evening play, allowing golfers to enjoy the stunning course even after sunset."At Maxx Royal, we understand that true luxury is about more than just external beauty. That's why our deeply personalized service ensures that every guest receives an experience tailored to their specific needs and desires. We believe in creating extraordinary experiences that not only indulge your senses but also make a positive impact on the world we share.From impeccable service to stunning aesthetics, every cornerstone of our hospitality is infused with a human-centered commitment to excellence. We're proud to weave sustainable practices throughout our resort, ensuring that your stay with us is not only unforgettable but also mindful of the planet we call home.iHotelier/iStay

name: Akka Antedon Hotel
address: Beldibi 1 Mevkii, Göynük 07985
description: Offering extensive and unique facilities specifically-tailored for kids,Akka Antedon Hotel - Premium Ultra All Inclusive comes with a mini club, movie screening sessions and variety of games. You will find pools for children as well. The hotel's entertainment crew organises children events with themes such as Peter Pan, pirates and sleepover parties. Children can join ecological activities such as tree planting and gardening. Along with a special kids restaurant and a playground, creativity activities are available such as origami, cooking classes, handcrafting workshops and puzzle games to keep your kids inspired during your stay at Akka Antedon Hotel - Premium Ultra All Inclusive. Babysitting service can be provided upon your request at a surcharge for your convenience. Baby cots, strollers, baby bathtub, baby monitoring radios and high feeding chairs are offered free of charge. Other baby facilities include bottle warmer and blenders to facilitate your meal preparations. With a seafront location a short drive south of Antalya, Akka Antedon Hotel - Premium Ultra All Inclusive is a luxury resort with a lagoon-style outdoor pool, a tennis court and a lavish spa and fitness centre.

name: Radisson Collection Hotel, Bodrum
address: Akyarlar Mahallesi, Ataturk Caddesi 352, Bodrum
description: Located in Akyarlar, 400 metres from Aspat Beach, Radisson Collection Hotel, Bodrum provides accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel features a sauna and an ATM. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Every room is fitted with a kettle, while selected rooms include a balcony and others also provide guests with sea views. At Radisson Collection Hotel, Bodrum every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a halal or gluten-free breakfast. Radisson Collection Hotel, Bodrum offers 5-star accommodation with a spa centre. Karaincir Beach is 1.3 km from the hotel, while Akyarlar Beach is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 60 km from Radisson Collection Hotel, Bodrum.

name: Prive Hotel Bodrum - Adult Only
address: Bardakci Koyu, Bodrum 48400
description: Located just 900 metres from Bodrum city centre, this beachfront resort has an outdoor swimming pool with panoramic ocean views. It also features 1 main restaurant as well as an international a’la carte restaurant. The rooms at the Voyage Bodrum include a minibar, air conditioning and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The International a’la carte restaurant serves fresh international cuisines, while the Main Restaurant offers variety of dishes. The Voyage also features a Pastry Shop, where guests can enjoy a range of deluxe desserts. Meals at the hotel can be enjoyed indoors or outdoors. The Bodrum’s outdoor swimming pool is surrounded by palm trees and parasols. Guests can also enjoy a drink at the pool bar or beach bar. This resort also provides its guests with a well-equipped SPA center. The property is accessible from the sea. Milas-Bodrum Airport is 40 km away.

name: Ramada Resort by Wyndham Bodrum
address: Kavakli Sarnic Cad., 1531 Sok No: 4, Bodrum 48470
description: The 100 percent Non-Smoking Hotel is located 4 km from the center of Bodrum, on hill in view of Kos Island. The hotel has leisure facilities such as including outdoor and indoor pools, sauna, steam bath, Turkish bath, squash, tennis court, fitness including spinning plates etc. We have free seasonal shuttle service to the beach from May 15 - September 30. P of the rooms has a spectacular sea view. We have two restaurants and two bars. You can find the most famous and delicious sushi Restaurant which called "The Club" in Hotel. There is free high speed wireless internet in all rooms and public areas. The Hotel has also meeting and banquet facilities up to 500 pax with a amazing view at foyer.Wyndham

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Bodrum Isil Club Resort
address: Torba, Kaynar Mevkii No:11, Bodrum 48400
description: Located in Torba, 10 km from Bodrum Marina Yacht Club, DoubleTree by Hilton Bodrum Isıl Club Resort provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Featuring a kids' club, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant, a water park and a terrace. Providing free WiFi throughout the property, the non-smoking resort features a sauna and nightclub. The resort will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. All units will provide guests with a fridge. Guests at DoubleTree by Hilton Bodrum Isıl Club Resort can enjoy a continental breakfast. The accommodation offers 5-star accommodation with a hammam and children's playground. You can play billiards, table tennis and darts at this 5-star resort, and the area is popular for windsurfing and canoeing. Around the clock assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak German, English and Turkish. Bodrum Municipality Bus Station is 8.4 km from DoubleTree by Hilton Bodrum Isıl Club Resort, while Bodrum Bar Street is 8.8 km away. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 33 km from the resort.

name: Mirada Exclusive Bodrum
address: Asarlik Mevkii Turkuaz Sk No 8-10 Bodrum, Bodrum 48400
description: Located in Bodrum City, 1.1 km from Bitez Beach, Mirada Exclusive Bodrum provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel features an indoor pool, sauna, entertainment staff and a kids' club. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Mirada Exclusive Bodrum each room has bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Mirada Exclusive Bodrum offers a terrace. Gumbet Beach is 1.6 km from the hotel, while Mor Plaj is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 45 km from Mirada Exclusive Bodrum.

name: Rammos Hotel
address: Gazi Mustafa Kemal Bulvarı No: 327 B Turgutreis / Bodrum / Muğla, Bodrum 48400
description: Situated in Bodrum City, 700 metres from Fener Beach, Rammos Hotel Bodrum - Special Class features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel has a terrace and a bar. The hotel has a sauna and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Rammos Hotel Bodrum - Special Class rooms have bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers à la carte, vegetarian or vegan options. The accommodation offers a spa centre. Soytas Beach is 2.5 km from Rammos Hotel Bodrum - Special Class, while Bodrum Marina Yacht Club is 22 km from the property. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum, 63 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Caresse, a Luxury Collection Resort & Spa, Bodrum
address: Adnan Menderes Caddesi No: 89, Bodrum 48400
description: Caresse, a Luxury Collection Resort & Spa in Bodrum has 84 rooms, including 67 rooms, 9 suites, 6 One-Bedroom Residences, 1 Three-Bedroom Residence and a Caresse King Villa. All rooms offer excellent amenities, such as modern technology and Marriott's Signature Luxury Collection Beds. Every guest at the Caresse Luxury Collection Resort & Spa can experience the captivating view of the Aegean Sea, since each room has its own private terrace or balcony. Luxury extends to a stylish blend of chic furnishings and tasteful bathrooms, that stand as the epitome of lavish comfort. Relax, unwind and allow your senses to fully embrace the unique tranquility of Bodrum. In addition to this luxurious experience, our discreet and attentive guest assistant is always on hand to grant your every wish.Marriott

name: The Marmara Bodrum - Adult Only
address: Yokusbasi Mah. Suluhasan Cad. No:18, Bodrum 48400
description: Set on a hilltop, this design hotel offers a free-form outdoor pool with 180° views of Bodrum Bay and Kos Island. It has a spa and a fitness centre, and rooms with free Wi-Fi. The Marmara Bodrum features a collection of statues created by painter and sculptor Mevlut Akyildiz. The hotel's transparent toilet doors are designed by French architect Christian Allart. All rooms at Marmara Bodrum have luxury bedding and are fitted with ornate wooden furniture. Each one has air conditioning, flat-screen TV and a private balcony or terrace, some of which overlook the sea. The Marmara Bodrum welcomes its guests on the private beach all summer long. Free beach shuttle service is available on the dates when the beach is open. A mix of international and Turkish items including fresh bread and local cheese are served for the buffet breakfast. Lunch and dinner are served a-la-carte style. Guests can also relax with a glass of wine and enjoy sunset views from the pool’s deck chairs. The aduly only Marmara Bodrum is 15 minutes’ drive from Bodrum Milas Airport. Bodrum Marina is a 2-minute drive away, and Bodrum Castle is 1 km from the hotel. Free parking is available on site. The Marmara Beach invites their guests from 25 May till 15 September. Free shuttle service to the beach is available during the day.

name: Kaya Palazzo Resort & Residences Le Chic Bodrum
address: Yakamoz Sk., Bodrum 48400
description: Situated in Bodrum City, 1.1 km from Gumbet Beach, Kaya Palazzo Resort & Residences Le Chic Bodrum features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The hotel has a sauna and room service. The hotel offers some rooms with sea views, and rooms have a balcony. The rooms in Kaya Palazzo Resort & Residences Le Chic Bodrum are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. A vegetarian, halal or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. With staff speaking German, English, Russian and Turkish, advice is available at the reception. Bitez Beach is 1.5 km from the accommodation, while Bardakci Bay Beach is 2.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 45 km from Kaya Palazzo Resort & Residences Le Chic Bodrum.

name: Azka Hotel
address: Bardakci Koyu, 26, Bodrum
description: Azka Hotel offers a privileged location on a private sandy beach with sun loungers and parasols in beautiful Bardakçı Bay. Each room has a private balcony with views of the sea, or the hotel’s gardens. Free WiFi and private parking are available on site. The hotel’s rooms are all air-conditioned and include satellite TV. Azka Hotel provides a range of activities for guests to enjoy – the hotel has an outdoor pool and an indoor pool. There are also squash facilities and tennis on site. A range of local and international cuisine is served in the hotel’s restaurants which have outdoor seating for al fresco dining. Drinks are available from the poolside bar, beach bar or lobby bar. There is also 24-hour room service available. Bodrum centre is just 1.5 km away from Azka Hotel and can be easily reached via the regular water taxis from the nearby jetty.

name: The Bodrum EDITION
address: Dirmil Mahallesi, Balyek Cd. No 5a, Bodrum 48990
description: Enjoy luxury living at The Bodrum EDITION. Set on the Turkish Riviera, our boutique hotel offers an inspiring location to explore Turkey. This beachfront hotel in Bodrum offers easy access to numerous watersports, places to explore such as Yalikavak Marina, Yalikavak Market and Bodrum Amphitheatre, as well as enticing shops and restaurants. The hotel has 108 guest rooms, lofts, suites and villas with custom furnishings, indulgent bedding and signature linens, ergonomic workstations, free Wi-Fi. Spacious bathrooms include oversized tubs, decadent monsoon rain showerheads and Le Labo bath products. Some accommodations boast gardens, terraces and private pools. Indulge in our creative restaurants, including BRAVA by Diego Munoz, and socialize at Discetto. Take a dip into our infinity pool, work out in the modern gym or rejuvenate at our replenishing hotel spa. For your wedding in Bodrum, meetings or social celebrations, choose from our 12 light-filled venues, with splendid views of the Aegean Sea.Marriott

name: Duja Bodrum
address: Zeytinli Kahve Mevkii, Bodrum 48400
description: The magnificent Duja Bodrum is located in Zeytinlikahve Torba, just near the sea. It is only 11 km from Bodrum. Benefit from the numerous activities and indoor and outdoor pools. The hotel presents comfortable and unique architecture with carefully chosen colour and design. The hotel rooms, bungalows and annex rooms provide guests with standard comfort for a pleasant stay. Enjoy your own balcony and the bath in each bathroom. A variety of in- and outdoor main restaurants is available. Enjoy a snack or lunch by the pool before getting a tan. The à la carte Sultan Restaurant is a good choice at night for a tasty evening dinner. The hotels Mini Club Team offers unforgettable memories for children visitors. The experienced animators will come up with fun activities that will amuse the little ones from morning until bed time. If you want to get active, profit from the numerous activities which are on offer. Play tennis, basketball or billiards. Water sports are also available, as well as various animation activities. During the day, you can watch amusing contests, colourful shows and amazing performances. For total relaxation, purify your soul with the wonderful treatments and wellness programs Duja Bodrum has on offer. Enjoy a Turkish steam bath or the hammam facilities. The hotel offers private parking. The airport is 21 km away.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Bodrum Marina Vista
address: Neyzen Tevfik Cad No 168, Bodrum 48400
description: Nestled in the heart of the city, our quaint oasis overlooks Bodrum Marina, less than a mile from Bodrum Castle. We’re just 26 miles from Milas Bodrum Airport and within walking distance of restaurants and shops. Lounge by our outdoor pool, relax in the sauna or indulge in a spa treatment. Enjoy onsite dining and room service.Hilton

name: Diamond of Bodrum
address: Kumbahce Mh. Ataturk Cd No 136, Bodrum 48400
description: Located in Bodrum City, a few steps from Akkan Beach, DIAMOND OF BODRUM provides accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features a sauna, evening entertainment and family rooms. All units at the hotel are equipped with a TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. DIAMOND OF BODRUM offers certain units with sea views, and the rooms are equipped with a balcony. At the accommodation every room comes with bed linen and towels. Guests at DIAMOND OF BODRUM can enjoy a continental breakfast. You can play billiards and darts at the hotel, and car hire is available. Speaking Arabic, German, English and French, staff are willing to help at the 24-hour front desk. Popular points of interest near DIAMOND OF BODRUM include Bodrum Castle, Bodrum Museum of Underwater Archeology and Bodrum Bar Street. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 39 km from the accommodation.

name: Divan Bodrum - Special Class
address: Kelesharim Cad No. 22, Bodrum 48483
description: Situated in Golturkbuku, Divan Bodrum offers elegant 5-star accommodation, as well as a private beach and a swimming pool. It also provides complimentary wireless internet. The hotel has 60 rooms and has been recently refurbished. It provides meeting rooms and a 24-hour reception, as well as a basketball court. The rooms are air conditioned and include a pillow menu, tea and coffee making facilities and a mini bar. There are also a number of rooms designed for families. Those staying at Divan Bodrum can enjoy a beverage at Sahil Bar, before enjoying a meal at Taşev. Divan Bodrum offers private parking on site for those travelling with a car. Bodrum and Yalikavak are also just a short car ride from the property.Revato

name: TUI MAGIC LIFE Bodrum - Adults Only
address: Pk 3357, Bodrum 48400
description: This all inclusive 5-star TUI MAGIC LIFE Bodrum - All Inclusive - Adults Only is set on a 70.000 m² beachfront area and offers indoor and outdoor pools and an aqua park. Guests can enjoy spa with fitness centre, sauna, hammam, steam room and a hot tub. Free WiFi is provided throughout and private parking is available. At TUI MAGIC LIFE Bodrum - All Inclusive - Adults Only's some rooms with views of the Aegean Sea, botanical gardens or pool. All rooms are air-conditioned and decorated. Tiled floor is provided along with a private bathroom fitted with shower and toiletries. Kids club with many activities is available for younger guests. Leisure options also include a cinema and tennis courts. Guests can schedule a traditional Thai massage or skin care treatment at TUI MAGIC LIFE Bodrum - All Inclusive - Adults Only's Spa & Wellness Centre. Bodrum’s centre is 7.8 km away. Milas-Bodrum Airport is located a 42-minute drive away.

name: Xanadu Island
address: Akyar Burnu Mevkii 91, Bodrum 48980
description: Facing the beachfront, Xanadu Island offers 5-star accommodation in Akyarlar and features a garden, shared lounge and terrace. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel has an outdoor swimming pool, indoor pool, karaoke and a kids' club. At the hotel rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with a sea view. All rooms are fitted with a kettle, while certain rooms come with a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and a stovetop. The rooms have a safety deposit box. A continental, Full English/Irish or American breakfast is available each morning at the property. At Xanadu Island you will find a restaurant serving Italian, Turkish and international cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. The accommodation offers a hot tub. You can play billiards, table tennis and darts at Xanadu Island, and the area is popular for snorkelling. The hotel provides an ironing service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Akyarlar Beach is a few steps from Xanadu Island, while Meteor Beach is 700 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 66 km from the accommodation.

name: Titanic Luxury Collection Bodrum
address: Meselik Mah. Comca Mevkii Sok. No. 8, Bodrum 48200
description: Titanic Luxury Collection Bodrum is located in Gvercinlik, Pina Peninsula which is one of the most beautiful bays of Bodrum. The 5 star hotel is touched by the architectural features of two sides of Aegean; Bodrum and Mikanos presenting a concept design for ultimate comfort. With Titanic Luxury Collection Bodrum, your heart will remain in Aegean.Titanic Luxury Collection Bodrum covers 80 thousand square meter of an exquisite landscape on Gvercinlik Bay, is on the seafront with a 350 meter long beach.Titanic Luxury Collection Bodrum creates personalized approaches for the comfort and pleasure for its guests and provides a real sense of serenity by offering luxury and elegance simultaneously. Titanic Luxury Collection Bodrum steps forward with its restaurants led by well-versed Culinarians and its pleasing flavours which appeals to every palate.Titanic Luxury Collection Bodrum offers comfort and savor in conjunction with joy to its guests. It is the perfect choice for who would like to have a vacation along with every color of the nature.iHotelier/iStay

name: Swissôtel Resort Bodrum Beach
address: Turgutreis Mah, Gazi Mustafa Kemal 2, Bodrum 3669
description: Swissotel Resort, Bodrum Beach lies directly on the waterfront in Turgutreis, approximately 20 km from the centre of Bodrum, a very popular destination offers ideal conditions for water sports, culture and Aegean relaxation. The main two-story hotel of Swissotel Resort, Bodrum Beach comprises 66 rooms and suites, with minimum 40 sqm per room. The restaurants and bars are places of entertainment, where the ambience runs from formal to casual and dishes are prepared with the best local products. With indoor and outdoor pools and Purovel Spa and Sport facilities, the resort provides you with a wide variety of sport and leisure opportunities.Fairmont

name: Rixos Premium Bodrum
address: Torba Mah. Zeytinli Kahve Mevkii, P.K. 244, Bodrum
description: Rixos Premium Bodrum offers activities galore, making it the perfect destination for revitalising mind, body and soul. Nestled between the sparkling turquoise waters of the Aegean sea and the stunning national parks of the Bodrum Peninsula, the hotel is a haven for sunseekers and watersport enthusiasts. Bodrum is a glamorous destination with magnificent beaches and lively nightlife.accorhotels.com

name: Maxx Royal Bodrum
address: Gölköy Mah 312 Sk No 3 Bodrum /Mugla No 3, Bodrum 48400
description: Situated in Bodrum City, 1.3 km from Akkan Beach, Maxx Royal Bodrum features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Featuring a restaurant, the property also has a terrace, as well as an indoor pool and a hammam. The accommodation offers a kids' club, room service and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. Maxx Royal Bodrum provides some rooms with sea views, and every room comes with a patio. At the accommodation rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at Maxx Royal Bodrum can enjoy a buffet breakfast. The hotel offers a children's playground. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at this 5-star hotel. The property has an in-house hot spring bath, hairdresser's and business centre. Speaking German, English, Russian and Turkish, staff are willing to help at the 24-hour front desk. Popular points of interest near Maxx Royal Bodrum include Bodrum Castle, Bodrum Marina Yacht Club and Bodrum Museum of Underwater Archeology. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 41 km from the accommodation.

name: Sianji Well-Being Resort
address: Kadikale Mevkii 25864, Bodrum 48960
description: Hanging gardens and 7 swimming pools await guests at this luxurious hotel in Bodrum. Mediterranean cuisine is served at the hotel’s Elani Beach, featuring a private marina. Inspired by one of the Wonders of the Ancient World, Sianji Well-Being Resort’s spa features massage and therapy rooms, a Finnish bath, a Roman bath and a sauna. There is even a cinema and a shopping arcade. The carefully decorated villas and suites at the Sianji Well-Being Resort offer plenty of space. Each is fitted with a seating area and satellite TV. Minibars and work desks are standard in all units. Another distinguished spot where the guests of Sianji Well-Being Resort treat themselves is Muu Spa, which offers a set of different alternatives such as Asian massages, traditional Turkish bath, Turkish body scrubbing, foam massage, VIP bath and family bath. Guests can use VIP bath if they wish and have a chocolate, champagne bath in a hot tub in VIP massage rooms after the massage. You can benefit from Muu Spa's exclusive services upon request at a surcharge. Sianji Well-Being Resort presents a variety of different tastes. A new gourmet experience can be lived at Elani Beach Restaurant as a la carte service, On the other hand healthy food specialties and trendy raw food cuisine a la carte menu is presented at Wellness Restaurant. Nunu Restaurant is the open buffet restaurant where wide variety of both healthy and fusion dishes from all over the world chosen during summer. The resort is situated 3 km from Turgutreis town, surrounded by islands of Kos and Kalimnos. Milas-Bodrum Airport is 55 km from Sianji Well-Being Resort.

name: Asteria Bodrum Resort
address: Asarlik Mevkii Guembet, Bodrum 48400
description: Selectum Colours Bodrum features a free-form pool with a hot tub, a traditional Hammam and wellness centre offering alternative health and beauty treatments. It is 5 minutes’ walk away from Gumbet beachfront. Each room is air-conditioned and feature a TV with multilingual channels and a comfortable armchair in the seating area. Each one has a private balcony, some with panoramic sea views. At Selectum Colours Bodrum, guests can take part in diving, windsurfing and canoeing or enjoy a refreshing work-out in the fitness centre. In the evening, the hotel’s entertainment staff organises cabaret, disco evenings or live music shows. Selectum Colours Bodrum is 3.5 km away from Bodrum Amphitheatre. Attractions located in central Bodrum, such Bodrum Castle, is 5 km away.

name: Ailla Yalikavak
address: Ömer Efendi Caddesi No 48, Bodrum 48990
description: Situated in Bodrum City, 2.1 km from Yalikavak Public Beach, Ailla Yalıkavak features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Featuring a restaurant, the property also has a terrace and a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Ailla Yalıkavak rooms have bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an à la carte breakfast. Bodrum Marina Yacht Club is 19 km from Ailla Yalıkavak, while Pedasa Antique City is 17 km from the property. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 59 km from the hotel.

name: MGallery The Bodrum Hotel Yalikavak
address: Yalikavak Mahallesi 91 Sokak No 6, Bodrum 48990
description: Nestled in the charming town of Yalikavak, MGallery The Bodrum Hotel is your closest destination, to the famous Marina. The hotel offers a range of designed rooms from cozy Junior Suites to luxurious Executive Suites, and spacious Two-Bedroom Family Suites, each room combines comfort and style for a delightful stay. Enjoy the hotel's amenities, including an infinity pool, a beachfront restaurant and bar, a poolside bar, and the main restaurant Bohemy. The spa features an indoor pool, hammam, gym, treatmenaccorhotels.com

name: Olira Boutique Hotel&spa
address: Yali Mevkii, Gundogan Plaji No: 66, Bodrum 48400
description: Situated in the seafront of the picturesque Gundogan Bay, Olira Boutique Hotel&SPA has stylish accommodation with a private balcony. The hotel offers a private beach with a sun terrace, an outdoor pool and spa facilities. Each of the contemporary rooms is equipped with plenty of modern amenities, including an LCD TV, air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. They all offer sea or pool views. There is also a hot tub in some rooms. The restaurant of Olira offers selected dishes of Turkish and international cuisine accompanied with sea views. Daily breakfast is served as an open buffet at the hotel. You can also enjoy refreshing drinks and delicious cocktails from the bar. The spa and wellness centre of the hotel includes a sauna, steam bath and massage room. There is also a well-equipped fitness centre on site. Bodrum city centre is 20 km from the hotel. Milas-Bodrum Airport is 50 km away.

name: Root Redrock Yalikavak
address: Yalikavak Mahallesi 94.Sokak Bodrum, Bodrum 48990
description: Set in Bodrum City, Root Redrock Yalıkavak offers accommodation with a terrace or a balcony, free WiFi and flat-screen TV, as well as a private beach area and pool with a view. There is a private bathroom with shower in every unit, along with bathrobes, slippers and a hair dryer. The wellness area at the villa is comprised of a hammam, a spa facilities and a fitness room. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Root Redrock Yalıkavak. Yalikavak Public Beach is 1.1 km from the accommodation, while Bodrum Marina Yacht Club is 19 km away. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum, 58 km from Root Redrock Yalıkavak, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Doria Hotel Bodrum
address: 1410 Sokak Gündönümü Mevkii, Bodrum 48400
description: Doria Hotel Bodrum, situated in a dramatic hilltop location inBitez, is the hippest boutique hotel in this historiconce-upon-a-time fishing village that has evolved into a jetsetheaven. The open and airy hotel features an extensivecollection of contemporary art as well as innovative cuisineand spectacular views of the Aegean, all just 10 minutes drivefrom vibrant Bodrum and an easy half-hour trip from theMilas-Bodrum International Airport. While you are soakingup the stunning views and being caressed by the Bodrum sun,you will also want to set out on an exploration of thePeninsulas historic and natural treasures, including theMausoleum, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World,and the Crusader Castle of Saint Peter, now home to theMuseum of Underwater Archaeology.Dining and Entertainment at BluCombining the regions exceptional freshproduce with its equally superior olive oil,adding the catch of the day from Gumbet Bayand Bodrum, Blu by Doria Hotel Bodrumoffers contemporary Mediterranean cuisine.The Club House serves a combination ofsnacks and refreshments and the poolsidebar is the perfect place to wind down with atempting cocktail as the sun sets overGumbet Bay.iHotelier/iStay

name: Salmakis Resort & Spa
address: Bardakci Koyu, Bodrum 0
