description: Situated right next to the beach, this Mediterranean-style resort offers a large pool complex with panoramic views over Bodrum Bay. Salmakis features an extensive spa with hot tub, hammam and massage facilities. Free WiFi and satellite TV are available in the spacious, air-conditioned guestrooms of Salmakis Resort & Spa. They also include a bathroom with a bathtub, a balcony and a seating area. Salmakis Resort’s Ottoman restaurant serves appetizers and traditional kebabs. The Mediterranean restaurant specialises in sea food. Guests can enjoy a drink at one of 5 bars, which include a beach bar and a vitamin bar. The Salmakis Resort & Spa also offers a high-tech gym with cardio-fitness activities, diving facilities and tennis courts. Bodrum city centre with its marina and castle is 15 minutes away on foot from the resort. Milas-Bodrum International Airport is less than 30 minutes by car. Private parking is available for free.WebBeds

name: Isis Charm Beach Hotel
address: Kemer Mevkii Akyarlar Turgutreis, Bodrum
description: Situated in Akyarlar, 700 metres from Karaincir Beach, CHARM BEACH HOTEL features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Boasting a shared lounge, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant, a water park and a terrace. The accommodation provides a sauna, evening entertainment and room service. At the hotel, all rooms include a balcony with a garden view. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hairdryer, some rooms at CHARM BEACH HOTEL also boast a sea view. At the accommodation rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. A buffet, Full English/Irish or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At CHARM BEACH HOTEL guests are welcome to take advantage of a Turkish bath. You can play billiards at this 4-star hotel. Staff speak English and Turkish at the 24-hour front desk. Akyarlar Beach is 700 metres from the hotel, while Aspat Beach is 1.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 62 km from CHARM BEACH HOTEL.

name: No 81 Hotel
address: Kelesharimi Mevkii. Mimoza Sk. No:10, Bodrum
description: Overlooking the marina and Aegean Sea, this hotel is located in Bodrum Golturkbuku. It boasts a spacious seaside sun deck and has and a terrace with sun loungers. Rooms at the No81 Hotel have stylish modern furnishings and balconies with panoramic views. They come equipped satellite TV and a minibar. Some rooms have hardwood floors and a large work desk. Daze Restaurant serves traditional breakfast with coffee, omelette and it also offers dinner. You can sample cocktails and lighter fare from the beach bar. Daze turns into a night club in the evening, which serves special cocktails. No 81 guests can visit the fitness centre. There hotel’s tour desk assists with car hire and provides information on local attractions. No81 Hotel is located 29 km from Milas Airport. It offers 24-hour front desk service and free on-site private parking along with valet service.

name: Susona Bodrum, LXR Hotels & Resorts
address: Torba district Kaynar street No15, Bodrum 48420
description: Susona Bodrum lies in the heart of Torba District, Turkiye overlooking the Aegean Sea. The hotel offers on-site dining, meeting space, and a full-service spa. The refined resort also features a tennis court, two pools, and four restaurants and bars. Guests can enjoy a spacious green landscape, coastal views, and a private beach with a sun deck. Find the ultimate relaxation in one of the poolside and beachside cabanas. All rooms are air-conditioned and include free WiFi, a mini-bar, and tea and coffee making facilities. Upgrade to a suite for more space to work and relax. Nearby attractions include wine tasting and vineyard visits, Etrim Carpet Village, the ancient city of Bodrum, and the Mausoleum of Halicarnassus.Hilton

name: Family Life Bodrum Imperial Hotel
address: Bankev Cad. No:39, Bodrum
description: Set in Akyarlar, 17 km from Bodrum Marina Yacht Club, Kairaba Bodrum Imperial offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Featuring a restaurant, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features a kids' club, room service and currency exchange for guests. The units come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, minibar, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. The hotel provides certain units with sea views, and the rooms are fitted with a balcony. At Kairaba Bodrum Imperial every room includes bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Kairaba Bodrum Imperial offers a hammam. You can play billiards, darts and mini-golf at the hotel, and car hire is available. Languages spoken at the reception include German, English, French and Turkish. Bodrum Windmills is 14 km from Kairaba Bodrum Imperial, while Pedasa Antique City is 15 km away. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 57 km from the accommodation.

name: Royal Asarlik Beach Hotel
address: Asarlik Mevkii, Adnan Menderes Cd, Bodrum 48400
description: This hotel is situated on a relaxed beachfront for your immediate convenience, with a short walk to the main services, activities and night life of Bodrum. Royal Asarlik Hotel is an excellent place to loosen up with its combination of good location and entertainment. The hotel has its own entertainment team that organizes day time activities and theme nights 7 days a week. During summer, the Royal Asarlik Hotel has a main terrace restaurant, a la carte restaurant, pool bar, terrace bar and lobby bar open for guests. A children's playground is offered as well. Royal Asarlik Hotel is great for a beach holiday and you can experience a number of water sports and outdoor activities on the coast. The night life in Bodrum is also very vibrant, with the closest bars and clubs a walk away. Free WiFi is accessible in the lobby area. There is also a computer room with an additional charge. Milas-Bodrum Airport is 39 km from the property.

name: Hotel Ambrosia
address: Haci Ahmetler Mevkii Bitez Yalisi 1, Bodrum
description: Boasting the biggest private beach in Bitez, Hotel Ambrosia offers numerous water sport facilities along with a swimming pool, children's pool, 3 restaurants and 5 bars. It is 7 km from Bodrum city. A Turkish bath, sauna and hot tub are provided for relaxation, while a full menu of treatments includes aromatherapy, medical massage and shiatsu. For those who would like to stay fit, there is a modern gym. Rooms at the Ambrosia are air conditioned and offer private balconies. Free WiFi is available in the hotel’s public areas. The Ambrosia Hotel offers a seaside restaurant, where guests can experience romantic sunsets over the Bitez Bay. In addition to Turkish cuisine, guests can choose from a rich snack menu, have drinks at the beach bar or pool bar. It is located 40 km from Bodrum International Airport offering an airport shuttle service and private transfers to Bodrum. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Casa Nonna Bodrum - Adult Only
address: Icmeler Mevkii, PK 357, Bodrum 48400
description: Located on the seafront among palm trees, Casa Nonna Bodrum - Adult Only offers a private beach and an outdoor pool. The resort has a spa centre, and luxurious rooms with stunning views of the Aegean Sea. Tastefully decorated in contemporary style, all rooms include a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. Some rooms also offer a private terrace, a small private pool or a spa bath. The restaurants of Casa Nonna Bodrum - Adult Only serves meals a-la-carte style. The pool and beach bars offers a variety of alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks. The spa centre includes a sauna, Turkish bath and massage facilities. Bodrum city centre and Bodrum Castle are within 5 km from Casa Nonna Bodrum - Adult Only. Milas-Bodrum Airport is 40 km from the Casa Nonna Bodrum - Adult Only.

name: Lvzz Hotel
address: Yokusbasi Mah. Akdeniz Cad. No:4, Bodrum 48400
description: Featuring panoramic views of Bodrum Castle and the Aegean Sea from its outdoor pool, Lvzz Hotel offers rooms with free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV. The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Lvzz feature a modern interior. All rooms have a minibar, tea and coffee making facilities and a seating area. Guests can get a relaxing massage at Lvzz Hotel’s spa, which also features a fitness centre, a Turkish bath. The hotel also offers a 24-hour reception, a tour desk, and car rental. Bodrum Castle is 1.5 km from Hotel Lvzz, and the Ancient Theatre is 1.2 km away. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Hapimag Sea Garden Resort
address: Çiftlik Mahallesi, Yalidag Caddesi No:40, Bodrum 48400
description: Hapimag Sea Garden is a luxurious 5-star resort located amidst a pine forest on the southern coast of Bodrum Peninsula. It has a private beach, outdoor pool and rooms with balconies. Featuring flat-screen TVs, all rooms are air conditioned and equipped with minibars. Each spacious room has a seating area with free Wi-Fi. Guests can dine at the hotel’s romantic restaurant with views of the Aegean Sea and mountains. A variety of drinks can be enjoyed at the bar and there is a night club for entertainment. Hapimag Sea Garden Resort has an indoor pool, fitness centre and a steam bath. Water sports facilities are available at the beach and there is a separate kids pool with waterslides. Mini clubs and activities are available for younger guests.

name: Hilton Istanbul Bomonti Hotel & Conference Center
address: Silahsor Cad. No: 42 Bomonti Sisli, Istanbul 34381
description: Enjoy contemporary luxury at Hilton Istanbul Bomonti Hotel & Conference Center, the largest of its kind in the city. Located in the central area of Sisli, adjacent to the former Bomonti Beer Factory, which is today’s new entertainment hub, this impressive, 34-story hotel offers easy access to many Istanbul attractions, historical buildings, shopping malls and neighboring business districts. Unwind in an elegant, air-conditioned guest room at this Istanbul hotel with a range of amenities, including ergonomic work areas, WiFi (fee applies) and floor-to-ceiling windows. Upgrade to an executive room or suite for exclusive Executive Lounge access. Gaze upon the Marmara sea from an executive sea view room. With a wealth of flexible meeting spaces, including a grand ballroom with a capacity of 3000, this stunning hotel is perfect for business meetings and glamorous celebrations in Istanbul. A business center offering a range of services and amenities and a professional team of staff are available, to help ensure a truly unforgettable event. Enjoy breathtaking Bosphorus and city views from the rooftop bar Cloud 34, located on the 34th story and dine in style in our all-day dining restaurant, The Globe. Maintain your fitness regime with the very latest exercise equipment in the modern, 24-hour fitness center, soothe tired muscles in the Turkish bath or treat yourself to a luxurious massage in the expansive eforea Spa. Cool down in the indoor or outdoor swimming pools or unwind with a drink at the pool bar as you soak up the Turkish sunshine.Hilton

name: Fairmont Quasar Istanbul
address: Buyukdere Caddesi, 76, Istanbul 34393
description: A city with a rich history and colorful culture, Istanbul has always been a favorite destination for travelers from around the world. If you are planning to visit this wonderful city soon, you can make your stay worthwhile by choosing Fairmont Quasar Istanbul, where luxury heritage meets eclectic energy. Located in the city center, Fairmont Quasar Istanbul is a five-star luxury hotel that provides a unique experience to its guests that come to stay, celebrate, or do business.accorhotels.com

name: Hilton Istanbul Bosphorus
address: Cumhuriyet Cad. No:50, Harbiye, Istanbul 34367
description: Hilton Istanbul Bosphorus, with its beautifully landscaped gardens and stunning Bosphorus views, is an oasis of serenity amid the bustle of one of the world's most vibrant cities. As the longest operating Hilton Hotel internationally, we have offered traditional Turkish hospitality, first-class comfort, and timeless elegance since 1955. The hotel's location in Istanbul's city center ensures that is just a short walking distance to Taksim Square, the upmarket district of Nisantasi, and the Istanbul Congress Center. It is just 45 km from Sabiha Gokcen International Airport, and 45 km from the New Istanbul Airport. All rooms offer private balconies which combine to create a resort-style atmosphere. Hilton Istanbul Bosphorus offers cuisine alternatives including famous Turkish cuisine, Cantonese, and Mediterranean delights from awarded Hilton chefs. The hotel has hosted numerous global and local conferences and meetings since 1955 with its extensive indoor and outdoor event spaces- 27 meeting rooms including Hilton Ballroom and Conference Center, and boardrooms that accommodate 10 to 3,000 guests.Hilton

name: Novotel Istanbul Karakoy
address: Kemankes Caddesi No: 57-59, Istanbul 34425
description: Hotel that makes every moment matter. Istanbul offers a wide variety of choices to visitors with its historical background, modern architecture and business opportunities. Novotel Istanbul Bosphorus Hotel has a splendid situation among the most preferred hotels on the European side. Its perfect location in Karaköy, comfortable and stylish rooms, flavors from ethnic to international dishes and modern facilities make our Hotel a highly preferable five-star accommodation venue in Istanbul.accorhotels.com

name: Grand Hyatt Istanbul
address: Harbiye Mah. Taskisla Caddesi No.1, Istanbul 34367
description: Located in the heart of the city, this luxurious Istanbul hotel is within walking distance from Taksim Square, and main convention and exhibition centres. It offers an outdoor pool, a spa and fitness centre, and modern meeting rooms. Grand Hyatt Istanbul has luxury rooms decorated in light colours. All rooms include a seating area, LCD TV and a work area. The marble bathrooms come with a bath tub and a glass-enclosed rain shower. Free wiFi is available in the rooms. ‘34’ offers wide culinary variation and features both regional Turkish and Mediterranean cuisine. Mezzanine Lounge & Bar is the perfect place to relax in the cozy and live atmosphere. The Library Bar offers a relaxing atmosphere reflecting the style of English Gentlemen’s Clubs. On sunny days, there is nothing more refreshing than a barbecue and cocktails by the pool at the Gazebo. Gaia Spa&Fitness Centre offers modern spa treatments and authentic hammam rituals. There is also a floodlit tennis court on site. Taksim Metro Station is only 400 metres from Grand Hyatt. The historical Sultanahmet area is 5 km away including Topkapi Palace, Hagia Sophia and Blue Mosque. Ataturk Airport is within 20 km. Private parking is available on site for an additional fee. Istanbul Airport is 50 km from Grand Hyatt Istanbul.

name: Intercontinental Istanbul, An IHG Hotel
address: Asker Ocagi Cad No: 1 Taksim, Istanbul 34435
description: Located in the modern Taksim district, the high-rise InterContinental Istanbul hotel has superior rooms and suites with breathtaking views over the Bosphorus and the historic city skyline. Our state-of-the-art meeting facilities include three ballrooms and can accommodate up to 900 people. Exceptional on-site dining offers everything from gourmet buffet breakfasts to traditional Turkish cuisine. Guests can unwind with a soothing massage or gentle swim in our acclaimed SPA InterContinental.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: The Marmara Taksim
address: Taksim Square, Istanbul 80090
description: The Marmara Taksim is an unforgettable Istanbul luxury hotel located in a landmark building in the heart of the city's Taksim Square. The hotel is located conveniently close to Ataturk Airport, and has a metro station across the street. There is a range of international dining options available at the Marmara Taksim hotel, offering everything from a buffet lunch to authentic Turkish dinner. The hotel features vast meeting and function spaces with 12 meeting and breakout rooms. Rest and relaxation facilities include a spa, massage rooms, solarium, Turkish bath, and sauna. Part of the WorldHotels Elite collection. The hotel features 388 deluxe rooms, along with 61 Marmara Club rooms offering an exclusive hotel experience. Club rooms offer panoramic views of the Bosphorus, Golden Horn and Istanbul city. All rooms feature stylish design and cutting edge amenities. To stay in a top Istanbul luxury hotel, please see our rates and availability for the Marmara Taksim.bestwestern.com

name: Divan Istanbul
address: Asker Ocagi Cd. No:1, Taksim, Sisli, Istanbul 34367
description: Conveniently located in the centre of the city, this 5-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Istanbul. It also offers free Wi-Fi, an express check-in and check-out feature and meeting rooms. This modern hotel provides an on-site fitness centre, a 24-hour reception and a concierge. Airport transfers, a laundry service and a dry cleaning service are available upon request. It also has its very own wellness centre, Divan Istanbul Spa. Rooms are air-conditioned and have top-of-the-range amenities such as a mini bar, a pillow menu and a flat-screen TV. They feature tea and coffee making facilities, a laptop safe and a telephone. Divan Istanbul features both a restaurant and a bar where guests can unwind at the end of the day with dinner and a drink. Eateries at the hotel include Divan Patisserie and Divan Lokanta. A variety of dining options are also found in the area. Istanbul's well-known attractions are within close proximity to Divan Istanbul, with BJK Inonu Stadium, Taksim Square and the Monument of the Republic only 10 minutes away. The hotel also offers parking for those travelling by car.Revato

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Istanbul - Moda
address: Caferaga Mh Albay F Sozdener Cd 31, Istanbul 34710
description: Welcome to the first Hilton Worldwide hotel on the Asian side of Istanbul. The DoubleTree by Hilton Istanbul-Moda hotel offers upscale accommodations and the most convenient of locations on the Asian side of Istanbul. Located in the heart of the bustling commercial center of Kadikoy and the historic residential district-Moda, the hotel enjoys a prime coastal position within a 5 minute walk of the Kadikoy Ferry Docks. This luxury Istanbul hotel is less than 30 minutes from either Istanbul International Airport (IST) or Sabiha Gökcen International Airport (SAW) (by car or shuttle). Situated within walking distance of the Kadiköy Bus Station, and soon the new underground station, the Hilton Istanbul-Moda hotel is the perfect choice when staying in the lively and cosmopolitan district of Moda-Kadiköy on the Anatolian side of the Bosphorus. Modern hotel conveniences, Istanbul magic Vibrant and contemporary with eclectic cultural touches, our new Istanbul hotel offers a variety of guest rooms and suites with a long list of pampering guest amenities and the majority offer spectacular views of the Old Town Peninsula in Istanbul from the Marmara Sea Banks. Enjoy generous work surfaces, flat panel TVs, our luxurious Sweet Dreams bedding and wireless internet access at the DoubleTree by Hilton. Our guests also enjoy full use of convenient hotel amenities like: - Fitness Centre with weight, cardio and exercise rooms - Spa with massage rooms and sauna, steam room and hammam - Complimentary internet access in all guestrooms and public spaces - Sparkling indoor pool - Roof-top infinity pool with panoramic views - 24-hour in-room dining Taste the world at our luxury Istanbul hotel Enjoy a variety of exciting cuisines at one of our inviting hotel restaurants, including a selection of local and international dishes served buffet or a la carte style for breakfast, lunch and dinner daily at The Doubles Restaurant. Join colleagues for our DoubleTree Signature cocktails and snacks in the La Gazetta Cafe and Bar or meet friends or someone special for cocktails at the Rooftop Bar overlooking Istanbul city lights. Other choices include an a la carte dinner at HOO Restaurant, Bar Patisserie for a variety of cakes, tarts, pies and chocolates. And do not forget to start the day right with our extensive DoubleTree Breakfast Buffet. Do business in Istanbul at the DoubleTree by Hilton Istanbul-Moda hotel We offer 12 flexible meeting rooms, most with natural daylight and sea views, to serve your corporate or business travel needs. A well-equipped 24-hr Business Centre and wireless HSIA will keep you connected and productive while away from the office. And the ambiance couldn't be finer. Just let us know how we can make your next Istanbul meeting, seminar, conference or social event a memorable success. Stay in the middle of it all Our hotel is near everything, so there is something for everyone to enjoy. Tennis courts and jogging trails are within walking distance. The Moda peninsula and KadikÃy, known as an entertainment district, has miles of colorful narrow streets lined with cafes, shops, bars and eateries. Visit historic Istanbul churches, monuments and parks, Bagdat Street and Kalamis Yacht Marina. Marvel at the architecture, the minarets and the lovely fountains. Let our concierge help you find the perfect Istanbul restaurant, whatever your budget and taste. Whether you come to Istanbul on business or pleasure, our caring staff looks forward to welcoming you the DoubleTree by Hilton on the Asian side with our signature, warm chocolate chip cookie at check-in.Hilton

name: Conrad Istanbul Bosphorus
address: Cihannuma Mh., Saray Cad. No 5, Besiktas, Istanbul 34353
description: Centrally located in the lively Besiktas area, the hotel is a 5-minute walk from the Bosphorus. Ortakoy, Dolmabahce Palace and Vodafone Stadium are nearby while Zorlu, Kanyon, Metrocity and Ozdilek shopping malls and the Nisantasi district are a short drive away. Conrad Istanbul Bosphorus has everything travelers need including complimentary WiFi, a 24-hour health club with Turkish hammam, two swimming pools, a separate children's pool as well as covered and open clay tennis courts. Conrad Bosphorus Suite Services* feature in-room check-in, a special VIP set up and fresh flowers in the suite. Luxurious bathroom amenities are personalized, and we offer a complimentary ironing service for 3 pieces of clothing. In addition, the services include Executive Lounge access and two hours of complimentary meeting room time for five people, subject to availability. Summit Bar serves fabulous cocktails and offers a 270-degree city view from the terrace. Guests can also enjoy delicious Mediterranean cuisine at Manzara. The hotel has been recognized by World Travel Awards such as 'Türkiye's Leading Business Hotel', 'Türkiye's Leading Conference Hotel', 'Europe's Leading Conference Hotel', and 'World's Leading City Hotel' in 2021. This Conrad hotel features 3,000 sq. m. of function space, a 15th floor Bosphorus Lounge and terraces with a panoramic view. *Service does not apply to Family Suites and Day use suites.Hilton

name: Istanbul Marriott Hotel Sisli
address: Abide-i Hurriyet Street, Sisli, Istanbul 34381
description: Explore the many wonders of this historic city once the seat of the Ottoman Empire when you stay at Istanbul Marriott Hotel Sisli. Boasting a prime location in the city center our 5-star hotel places you within easy reach of world renowned sites including the Grand Bazaar, Taksim Square and Topkapi Palace. Shop the new, more Western influenced Cevahir Mall for all the latest styles from Europe and Asia. Take in breathtaking views of the Bosphorus or the city from floor to ceiling windows in our modern rooms, book a soothing service from our onsite spa, swim in our indoor pool or remain fit at our 24 hour gym. Our hotel also offers a variety of onsite dining options including an all day restaurant, a bar, a Starbucks coffee shop and an Executive Lounge. If a business meeting or social gathering brings you to Istanbul, you will find our extensive venues, exemplary services and custom catering provide the backdrop to ensure success. We look forward to helping you create lasting memories.Marriott

name: Sofitel Istanbul Taksim
address: Gumussuyu Mah Siraselviler Cad No 13 Taksim, Istanbul 34437
description: Founded in the location of a historical theatre and music hall from the 70s, Sofitel Istanbul Taksim sits in the heart of the city, with unique views of Taksim Square and the mesmerizing Bosphorus. As past and present converge in unique settings, we welcome you to discover Turkey from the comfort of a 5-star hotel with sea view rooms and suites, an authentic spa, impeccable dining options including a rooftop bar, and a business-ready Club Millesime. Stay in central Istanbul and dare to explore.accorhotels.com

name: Sheraton Grand Samsun Hotel
address: Liman Mahallesi Ataturk Bulvari No:55, Samsun 55100
description: With its unique location, the Sheraton Grand Samsun Hotel enjoys magnificent views of the black sea. The hotel is within walking distance of the city’s business, shopping and entertainment districts and the transportation network. It is an ideal choice for both business and leisure travelers alike who value the hotel’s personalized service. Our 1,750 square meter spa and fitness facilities offer you a sauna and steam room, yoga and Pilates room, relaxation parlor, 7 treatment rooms, indoor pool, fitness center and a spa terrace. At our on-site Feast Restaurant, enjoy local and intercontinental flavors with a magnificent sea view located on the lobby floor. The restaurant, Ristorante Fora, overlooks the Black Sea and the ancient light house and will offer you delicious flavors.Marriott

name: Radisson Blu Hotel Trabzon
address: Boztepe Mh. Numan Gül Cd. Çamlık Sokak No: 2, Ortahisar, Trabzon 61030
description: Set in Trabzon, Radisson Blu Hotel Trabzon is 2.9 km from Hagia Sophia Museum and offers various facilities, such as a bar. The hotel is also 4 km away from Forum Trabzon Shopping Centre. There is an on-site restaurant and an indoor swimming pool. Featuring a private bathroom, some units at the hotel also boast a balcony and sea view. For any tips on how to get around or what to do in the area, guests can ask at the reception. The Museum of Trabzon is 900 metres from Radisson Blu Hotel Trabzon. The nearest airport is Trabzon Airport, 6 km from the accommodation.

name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Ordu
address: Nizamettin Mahallesi Boztepe Küme Evler No: 54 / 1, Ordu 52000
description: Featuring an indoor pool, Radisson Blu Hotel, Ordu is 4.2 km from Pasaoglu Konagi Museum. Guests can relax at the hotel's garden and terrace. Concierge service is offered for your convenience. A children's playground is also available. Boasting a modern décor, each room comes with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, minibar, electric kettle and views of the city and the Black Sea. You will find a sofa in the room. You can sip your drink at the hotel's bar and enjoy your meals at the à la restaurant. Guests can also benefit from room service at their own room's comfort. Relax at Radisson Blu Hotel, Ordu's spa centre, hammam and sauna or indulge yourself with a massage. An equipped fitness centre is also featured. The nearest airport is Ordu Giresun Airport, 21 km away. Airport shuttle can be provided upon request at a surcharge.WebBeds

name: Sunprime C-Lounge Hotel - Adults Only
address: Ahmet Tokus Cad. No:7, Sok. No:1, Alanya 07400
description: Featuring free WiFi, a spa centre, indoor pool and a seasonal outdoor pool, Sunprime C-Lounge - Adult Only offers accommodation in Alanya. The hotel has a sauna and fitness centre, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant. All rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms include a seating area where you can relax. You will find a coffee machine in the room. Every room is fitted with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find bath robes and slippers. There is a 24-hour front desk, concierge service and hairdresser's at the property. This hotel has a private beach area and bike hire is available. Car hire is available at this hotel and the area is popular for cycling. Alanya Ataturk Square is 4.1 km from Sunprime C-Lounge - Adult Only, while Alanya Red Tower is 4.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Gazipasa Airport, 34 km from Sunprime C-Lounge - Adult Only.

name: Swissotel Buyuk Efes Izmir
address: Gaziosmanpasa Bulvari No 1, Izmir 35210
description: Izmir is known as the pearl of the west coastline of Turkey. It is a very popular destination for tourists visiting the Aegean beaches in summer and a commercial and cultural contact zone in autumn, winter, and spring. To cover the accommodation needs of these visitors, Swissotel Büyük Efes Izmir provides all the comfort and luxury expectations. Swissotel Büyük Efes Izmir is a popular venue for small and large-scale events such as meetings, conferences as well as wedding and reception organizations.accorhotels.com

name: Mövenpick Hotel Izmir
address: Cumhuriyet Blv 138, Izmir 35210
description: Located in the heart of the city and within walking distance to the business and shopping districts as well as the trade-fair grounds. It's the ideal starting point for visits to local attractions such as the world-famous ancient cities like Ephesus, Per gamon, Sardis, and Klazomenai and popular destinations such as Kusadasi, Cesme, Foca, and Bodrum. The 185 modern hotel rooms, including 36 Executive rooms and 17 Suites, extend the highest levels of comfort for business travelers.accorhotels.com

name: Ladonia Adakule
address: 9400 Bayraklidede Mevkii Kusadasi, Kusadasi 09400
description: Situated in a private cove, flanked by rocky shores, the elegant hotel Adakule sits on 52,000 m2 of land close to the popular holiday resort of Kuşadası, overlooking the shimmering waters of the Aegean Sea. The antique city of Ephesos is only 15 km away, while the Adnan Menderes Airport and the city of Izmir are at a distance of 75 km and 90 km, respectively. The hotel with its distinctive architecture offers a wide variety of services and amenities, such as an Aquapark with water slides and various outdoor pools. Sports facilities include a football pitch, tennis and basketball as well as a gym and several water sports facilities including a diving school. The restaurants offer a range of dishes from Aegean and Turkish food over Italian food to international cuisine. Some of the restaurants and bars have fantastic views, so that guests can enjoy the beautiful sunsets. An ideal place for couples and families with children.FarePortal

name: Grand Amisos Hotel
address: Guzelyali Mah., 3006 Sok. No. 20/24, Samsun 55270
description: Jısut a few steps from the seafront, Grand Amisos Hotel is located in Atakum District of Samsum. Guests can benefit from the indoor pool, Turkish bath, sauna and gym free of charge. Salt room facilities are also provided at a surcharge. Free WiFi is accessible throughout the premises. The air-conditioned units at Hotel Grand Amisos feature a minibar, satellite TV and a safety deposit box. The private bathrooms include a shower, hairdryer, slippers and free toiletries. Daily breakfast is served buffet style. For other meals, the a-la-carte restaurant offers various dishes from local and international cuisines. Room service is available 24 hours a day. Grand Amisos Hotel has a Blue Star Certificate for hygienic foods. Around-the-clock front desk service and free on-site parking is provided. There are numerous restaurants and supermarkets 150 metres from the property. Samsun city centre is 12 km away. Samsum Airport is within 30 km and airport shuttle services are arranged at a surcharge.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Istanbul Topkapi
address: Orta Mahalle, Anit Sokak: No: 1, Istanbul 34040
description: Situated on the European side of Istanbul, DoubleTree by Hilton Istanbul Topkapi boasts a superb E100 location in Topkapi near Old Town and historic attractions. The hotel is just a few kilometers away from textile, machinery and printing producer sites. Public transport is easily accessible and Istanbul Atatürk Airport is just 11km away. Spanning 18 floors, this modern hotel offers elegant rooms and suites, many with panoramic bird’s eye views of the city, the Marmara Sea and the Princess Islands. Make use of complimentary WiFi or watch the 42-inch TV. A relaxing easy chair and tea/coffee facilities will help you feel at home. For extra space, select a suite with a separate living and dining area, two TVs and two bathrooms. Some suites feature a kitchenette. Turquaz Restaurant offers a vast breakfast buffet and is also available for group luncheons and dinners. Savor a delicious afternoon tea or unwind with drinks and small bites at the Lounge Café Bar with outdoor seating. Work out in the fully equipped fitness center, plunge into the indoor pool, luxuriate in the spa with a range of treatments or in the Turkish Hammam and steam rooms for men and women. This Istanbul hotel features 2,500 sq. m. of meeting space including a pillarless ballroom with a modern foyer, exclusive entrance and two open air terraces, excellent for weddings. Our dedicated meeting floor with flexible options and the adjacent foyer is ideal for medium-sized meetings, and our Vip Lounge is perfect for boardroom meeting.Hilton

name: Oludeniz Turquoise Hotel
address: Carsi Cad. no:18, Fethiye 48340
description: Located only 600 metres from Oludeniz Beach, Oludeniz Turquoise Hotel offers an outdoor pool, sauna, hammam and a fitness centre. The hotel has a private beach area. The rooms of Oludeniz Turquoise Hotel include a flat-screen TV, electric kettle and a minibar. All rooms have a balcony. The restaurant serves dishes from Turkish and international cuisine. Breakfast and dinner are served in open buffet style. Terrace Restaurant also offers an à la carte menu. Fethiye city centre is 15 km from the hotel. Dalaman Airport is 65 km away.

name: Side Star Resort
address: Sancak Mh. Feslegenli Sk.,11/A, Side
description: This renovated beachfront hotel in Side offers 2 pools, a disco and various spa facilities. The rooms are elegantly decorated and have garden or sea views from their private balcony. With free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV, all of the elegantly decorated rooms offer lots of daylight and a small seating area. Each room has a private bathroom with a shower and hairdryer. After a dip in the indoor or outdoor pool, guests can relax in the hammam or play tennis. Using the hotel’s watersport facilities, guests can go windsurfing or canoeing from the private beach. The property also offers an aqua park and a mini club. The main restaurant serves international dishes from morning till late evening. In addition, there are 3 bars and a pool bar serving afternoon cakes. The lounge with its dome-shaped ceiling offers a luxurious setting for a mint tea. The 24-hour reception staff can arrange car rentals and shuttle services to Antalya International Airport, 64 km away. Antalya’s lively city centre is a 1.5-hour drive from the hotel.

name: Duja Didim
address: Altinkum Mah. 240 Sokak, No 13/2, Didim 09270
description: Offerring a private beach area, fitness centre and an outdoor pool, Duja Didim Resort is located in Didim. Free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk are available. Each room features air conditioning, a balcony, seating area and a minibar. Equipped with a shower, private bathroom includes a hairdryer. Views of the garden and the sea are also available. The hotel offers all-inclusive service including open buffet breakfast, lunch and dinner at on-site restaurant. Local and imported drinks are included. Guests can relax at the sauna or hammam. Bicycle and car renting services are available on site. Kid's can play safely in the childrens' playground or enjoy their time in the kids' club. Babysitting services are also offered. The property is 6.1 km from Didim town centre and 6 km from Didim Bus Terminal. Milas-Bodrum Airport is 92.9 km away.

name: Novia Lucida Beach Hotel
address: Aga Ceylan Caddesi No:8, Kemer 07990
description: Providing an indoor pool and a private beach, Lucida Beach is a deluxe place to stay in Kemer. It also offers a Turkish steam bath and a sauna. There are a range of amenities available to those staying at the hotel, such as a kids club, a beauty centre and a kids pool. It also provides family-friendly facilities, with room layouts and services for families of any size, as well as a playground and babysitting/child services. Rooms at Lucida Beach offer a stylish space to unwind, complete with a mini bar. There are also a number of rooms geared towards families. Antalya Airport is a 75-minute drive from Lucida Beach. The hotel's multilingual staff are available to ensure that every traveler has a comfortable stay.HotelsCombined

name: Divan Mersin
address: Akkent Mh Gazi Mustafa Kemal Bulv, Mersin (Icel)
description: Divan Mersin provides luxury 5-star accommodation in Mersin. It has a spa and wellness centre, as well as free Wi-Fi, an indoor pool and a sauna. There are a variety of facilities available to those staying at the hotel, including facial treatments, body treatments and car hire. Guests can also enjoy free private parking on site. Divan Mersin provides 170 air conditioned rooms filled with all the necessities to ensure a comfortable stay. Hot drinks can be made with the provided tea and coffee supplies. Divan Mersin features both a restaurant and a bar where guests are able to relax at the end of an evening with dinner and a drink.Revato

name: Ricosta Hotel
address: Alipasa Mahallesi Sahil Caddesi #1, Rize 53870
description: Located in Rize, 8.3 km from Rize Museum, Ricosta Hotel provides accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. This 5-star hotel offers a kids' club and room service. There is a spa and wellness centre with a terrace, indoor pool and sauna, as well as a hot tub. At the hotel every room comes with air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with a sea view. All units will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and American options. At Ricosta Hotel you will find a restaurant serving French, Mediterranean and Turkish cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and halal options can also be requested. The accommodation offers a children's playground. Activities such as hiking, fishing, cycling can be enjoyed in the surroundings, and guests can relax along the beachfront. The property has an on-site hammam, hairdresser's and business centre. Speaking Arabic, German, English and Turkish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are willing to help at any time of the day. Rize University is 8.7 km from Ricosta Hotel, while Atatürk House Museum is 10 km away. The nearest airport is Trabzon, 64 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Wyndham Grand Istanbul Levent
address: Esentepe Mahallesi Buyukdere Caddesi No 177-183 Sisli, Istanbul 34394
description: Featuring luxurious interiors, Wyndham Grand Istanbul Levent is located on Buyukdere Road. The hotel offers direct access to Levent Metro Station and numerous shopping malls including Ozdilek Park through underground connection. Guests can get a variety of health and beauty treatments at the 7900 m² extensive spa, including an indoor and outdoor pool, gym, sauna, and a Turkish bath. Tastefully decorated with fine furnishings, guest room management system, each air-conditioned room offers 47” flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Free WiFi and wired internet, a minibar, safe box and a work desk are also provided. There is an electric kettle with tea and coffee setup in each room. Iron and ironing board are available in all rooms. Most rooms also offer city views. All exclusive and suite rooms boast turndown service. The Hotel has connecting rooms in Deluxe city view and Deluxe Partial Sea view room categories. Connecting rooms can be arranged subject to availability and connecting room rate difference will be applied as EURO 82.50 (including taxes) per room per night. 7 dining outlets including buffet and à la carte restaurant and a lounge are available. You can start the day with a rich breakfast buffet boasting a wide range of products. The Plaza 177 Restaurant and Caréme Restaurant serve international cuisine and Turkish dishes. Guests can enjoy a drink at Vertice Cafe & Brasserie or at the breezy terrace of Carême Restaurant. Taksim Square is just 4 stops away from Levent Metro Station. Metrocity and Kanyon shopping malls are within walking distance from Wyndham Grand Istanbul Levent and Istinye Park is within 5 km. Istanbul Airport is 45.6 km from Wyndham Grand Istanbul Levent.

name: Sundia Exclusive by Liberty Fethiye
address: Çalis Beach, Foca Mah.1085. Sok., Fethiye 48300
description: Sundia Fethiye by Liberty; our 5-star luxury facility offers for you a unique view in the Çalış Region, the attraction point of the city, the pedestrian path between the resort and the beach, guest rooms each with sea view, comfortable, spacious and suites where you feel the comfort of your home, outdoor swimming pool, concept restaurant and bars, fully equipped Spa and fitness center, conference and meeting halls equipped with the latest technology, the sea breeze that never stops even in the hottest summer days, an incredible sunset that you can encounter in very few parts of the world with its light show as it turns from orange to red, and most importantly, it offers unforgettable moments and memories. We invite you to Fethiye by LibertyViajes Exito Hotels

name: Shangri-La Bosphorus, Istanbul
address: Sinan Pasa Mah. Hayrettin Iskelesi Sok. No:1 Besiktas, Istanbul 34353
description: Shangri-La Bosphorus Istanbul is an elegant base when visiting Istanbul and is close to everything the area has to offer. In addition to free private parking on site, the hotel features comfortable 5-star rooms and a lounge bar. Guests of Shangri-La Bosphorus Istanbul can start their day at CHI, The Spa, or use the many leisure amenities, such as an indoor pool. Facilities include free Wi-Fi, a sauna and an express check-in and check-out feature. The comfortable rooms at Shangri-La Bosphorus Istanbul include a mini bar, a marble bathroom and movies-on-demand. All provide tea and coffee making facilities, a flat-screen TV and an in-room safe. Shangri-La Bosphorus Istanbul boasts convenient dining options, such as Mediterranean and Asian cuisines at IST TOO and Chinese meals at Shang Palace. In the evening, guests are welcome to enjoy a drink in the cosy lounge bar. Shangri-La Bosphorus Istanbul is within a short walk of Dolmabahce Palace. The hotel's multilingual staff will make sure that every guest has an enjoyable stay.Revato

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Kusadasi
address: Yat Limani Mevkii,122, Kusadasi 09400
description: DoubleTree by Hilton Kusadasi, a premier hotel located next to the marina and offering luxurious accommodations and exceptional service on Turkey's stunning Aegean coast. With sweeping views of the sea and a range of modern amenities, our hotel provides a comfortable and elegant retreat for both business and leisure travelers. Our spacious rooms, suites and stone houses are tastefully appointed with contemporary decor and high-end amenities, ensuring a comfortable and relaxing stay. Indulge in delicious cuisine at our on-site restaurants, where our skilled chefs prepare delectable dishes using only the freshest ingredients. Our outdoor pool and fitness center provide the perfect venues to relax and rejuvenate, while our state-of-the-art meeting facilities offer ample space for successful business and social events. Located in the heart of Kusadasi, DoubleTree by Hilton is just a short walk from the marina and nearby attractions, making it the ideal choice for discerning travelers seeking a sophisticated and comfortable experience. We look forward to welcoming you with our signature DoubleTree Chocolate Chip Cookie and providing you with impeccable service throughout your stay.Hilton

name: Jiva Beach Resort
address: Calis Plaji 1104 Sokak No: 14, Fethiye
description: This attractively designed hotel lies within metres of Calis Beach and is surrounded by a natural lagoon, enjoying cooling sea breezes and superb sunsets. The centre of Calis is just less than 2 km away, while the market town of Fethiye just is 5 km and both can be easily reached by means of public transport. Cafe bars and restaurants can be reached by taking a pleasant 10 -15 minute walk along the beach and promenade. The resort is sure to impress visitors with spacious surroundings, beautiful décor and excellent services. The modern and beautifully designed rooms, some of which have direct access to the sparkling outside pool, guests can benefit from a good range of facilities and entertainment amenities in spacious surroundings. Patrons may enjoy delicious dishes at the hotel restaurant, which might be followed by a drink from the bar. Those who seek relaxation may balance body and soul at the on-site spa.FarePortal

name: Cevahir Hotel Istanbul Asia
address: Yali Mahallesi, Ziya Gökalp Caddesi, No. 21, Istanbul 34840
description: Located in the coast of Dragos district, Cevahir Hotel Istanbul Asia offers modern rooms with air conditioning and free WiFi. The hotel has an outdoor pool, indoor pool, a Turkish bath and a fitness centre. Featuring a contemporary décor, all rooms include a flat-screen TV, safe box and an electric kettle with complimentary tea and coffee. The modern bathrooms come with a shower or a bath tub. Some rooms also offer views of Marmara Sea and Princes' Islands. Daily breakfast is served as an open buffet at Cevahir Hotel. The restaurants including Antigoni Rotisserie, Pita Brasserie and Winter Garden serve selected dishes from Turkish and international cuisines. Every Friday, live music will take place at the on-site restaurant Pita Brasserie. The 24-hour reception provides room service and concierge services. Laundry and dry cleaning can be offered upon request at an additional charge. Bostanci Ferry Port is 5 km from the hotel, offering easy access to the European side of the city. Sabiha Gokcen Airport is 20 km away. Istanbul Airport is 74 km away. Free private parking is also available on site.

name: Grand Atakum Hotel
address: Yeni Mh. Ataturk Blv No 183 Atakum, Samsun
description: Situated 200 metres from the coast, this hotel offers air-conditioned guestrooms with balconies and views of the Black Sea and Mount Güngörmez. It has a restaurant that serves international cuisine. Rooms at the Grand Atakum Hotel have parquet floors and elegant furnishings. They come equipped with free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms include a seating area and Baroque décor. In the morning, the Grand serves a buffet breakfast with fresh fruit and pastries. Atakum Hotel also has a café that offers pizza and regional dishes. The Grand Atakum Hotel is located 12 km from the centre of Samsun and is 35 km from the Samsun-Çarşamba Airport. It has an airport transfer service for guests with disabilities available on request and offers free on-site private parking.

name: Ciragan Palace Kempinski
address: Ciragan Caddesi 32, Istanbul 34349
description: Situated conveniently in the centre of Istanbul, Çırağan Palace Kempinski Istanbul offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, free private parking and room service. With a fitness centre, the property also features a garden, as well as a terrace. Guests can enjoy Mediterranean and Turkish dishes at the restaurant or have a cocktail at the bar. All rooms come with a safety deposit box, while selected rooms will provide you with a balcony and others also have sea views. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and American options. Around-the-clock assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak Arabic, German, English and French. Dolmabahce Palace is 1.6 km from the hotel, while Dolmabahce Clock Tower is 2.3 km away. The nearest airport is Istanbul, 37 km from Çırağan Palace Kempinski Istanbul, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Four Seasons Hotel Istanbul at the Bosphorus
address: Ciragan Cad. No. 28, Istanbul 34349
description: Situated along the Bosphorus, this renovated 19th century Ottoman palace features a historic architecture in harmony with luxurious details. An indoor pool and a heated outdoor pool with free parasols and sun loungers are available. The seafront property also has a garden and a spacious terrace with panoramic views of the Bosphorus. Free WiFi and private parking are available on site. Tastefully decorated with fine furnishings, each air-conditioned room offers an iPod docking station and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. A minibar, safety deposit box and a desk are also provided. Aqua Restaurant, with its terrace overlooking the Bosphorus, serves Mediterranean cuisine, with Italian and Turkish specialties. Guests can enjoy the breakfast with international flavours in buffet style. Pool grill is an ideal choice for fresh salads, crispy grilled kebabs and tender fresh fish. The Lobby Bar and Lounge is a cozy place for socialization. You can work out in the fitness centre and then relax in the sauna. Guests of this luxurious hotel can also benefit from the exotic atmosphere of the Turkish bath afterwards. Spa therapy and body treatments are also possible. The reception is at your service 7/24, and provides room service. Four Seasons Hotel Istanbul at the Bosphorus is only a 4-minute walk from one of Istanbul’s lively scenes, Besiktas Square. Ataturk Airport is 25 km from the property while Istanbul Airport is 50 km away.

name: Side Star Elegance
address: Kumkoy Mevkii, Side
description: Located nearby the beachfront, Side Star Elegance Hotel - Ultra All Inclusive has spa facilities and outdoor pools. It offers air-conditioned rooms with a satellite TV and balcony. The rooms at Side Star Elegance Hotel - Ultra All Inclusive come with modern furnishings. They all feature a private bathroom with shower and hairdryer. The minibar is filled with sof drinks and beer everyday. You can taste local and international dishes at the buffet restaurant. There are also 4 à la carte restaurants: Italian, Turkish, Chinese and seafood. By making a reservation, guest can enjoy a complimentary meal at the à la carte restaurants once. The bars serve refreshing drinks. Spa facilities include a Turkish bath, sauna and a fitness room; massage services can also be provided. There is also a children’s playground. Only 1.8 km to Side town centre, Side Star Elegance Hotel - Ultra All Inclusive is 63 km from Antalya Airport. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Side Star Beach
address: Selimiye Mah P K 99, Side 07330
description: Facing a blue-flagged beach on the Mediterranean Sea, this comprehensive hotel is situated a 10-minute walk from Side Archaeological Site. Facilities include 2 pools, an extensive spa and water-sport equipment. Stylish rooms at Side Star Beach open out onto private balconies, some overlooking the sea or the pool area. They all include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and are fitted with wooden floors. Guests can work-out in the well-equipped gym or benefit from holistic treatments at the spa, featuring massages and a traditional Turkish hammam. An on-site bike rental helps exploring the hotel’s surroundings. Specialities from the Antalya Province and a varied menu of international classic dishes are offered at the restaurant. Outdoor dining is made possible on the large terrace by the pool or at the panoramic bar. Free private parking is available.

name: Akra Fethiye The Residence Tui Blue Sensatori – Adults Only
address: Ciftlik Kargi Koyu, Dutdibi Mevkii 226 Sk. No:4/2, Fethiye 48300
description: Situated in Fethiye, 90 metres from Akmaz Beach, Akra Fethiye The Residence Tui Blue Sensatori - Ultra All Inclusive - Adults Only features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Boasting room service, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant, a water park and a terrace. The hotel offers an indoor pool, sauna, evening entertainment and a 24-hour front desk. At the hotel, each room comes with a desk, bed linen and a balcony with a garden view. Rooms have a coffee machine, a flat-screen TV, a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while certain rooms are fitted with a patio and some have city views. The rooms at Akra Fethiye The Residence Tui Blue Sensatori - Ultra All Inclusive - Adults Only have air conditioning and a wardrobe. Buffet and à la carte breakfast options are available each morning at the accommodation. Akra Fethiye The Residence Tui Blue Sensatori - Ultra All Inclusive - Adults Only offers a hammam. You can play billiards, table tennis and darts at this 5-star hotel, and car hire is available. Calis Beach is 1.9 km from the hotel, while Fethiye Marina is 14 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dalaman, 45 km from Akra Fethiye The Residence Tui Blue Sensatori - Ultra All Inclusive - Adults Only, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Grand Hotel Huis ter Duin
address: Kon. Astrid Boulevard 5, 2200 AB Noordwijk, Zuid-Holland
description: Facing the beachfront, Grand Hotel Huis ter Duin offers 5-star accommodation in Noordwijk aan Zee and features a fitness centre, garden and shared lounge. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a terrace, as well as an indoor pool and a sauna. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Grand Hotel Huis ter Duin each room has bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available daily, and includes buffet, continental and vegetarian options. The area is popular for hiking and cycling, and bike hire is available at the accommodation. Guests can make use of the business centre or relax in the bar. Noordwijk aan Zee Beach is 200 metres from Grand Hotel Huis ter Duin, while Keukenhof is 12 km away. The nearest airport is Schiphol Airport, 29 km from the hotel.

name: NH Atlantic Den Haag
address: Deltaplein 200, 2554 EJ The Hague, Zuid-Holland
description: Set in the middle of the dunes, NH Atlantic Den Haag is located directly on the Kijkduin beach. Scheveningen, a lovely seaside town, and The Hague city center are only a 20-minute drive away. Conveniently, bus number 24 stops nearby and will take you to The Hague, where you can enjoy sights such as the Peace Palace, Madurodam miniature city and bustling squares. There is also a boulevard dotted with international restaurants along the ocean. NH Atlantic Den Haag offers a choice of 152 rooms with balconies. Most have large windows and some offer views of the ocean. The suites have themed designs, decorated in Asian, Mondrian and honeymoon styles. A fresh breakfast is served daily. Guests can also enjoy a meal with an ocean view at the Gusto Restaurant or head to Atlantic Beach right on the ocean. Some nights there is a live DJ, or unwind with a drink at the Sabor bar. For active travelers, NH Atlantic Den Haag offers bike rentals and a gym. There is also a heated indoor pool, solarium. An excellent choice for functions, there are 19 meetings rooms at the hotel. Free Wi-Fi and parking are available.NH Hoteles

name: Carlton Beach
address: Gevers Deynootweg 201, 2586 The Hague, Zuid-Holland
description: This hotel offers rooms with a balcony only 50 metres from the beach in Scheveningen. Carlton Beach includes wellness facilities and and two restaurants. Carlton Beach features rooms with modern bathrooms with a sliding glass door design. Each of the rooms has a refrigerator with various drinks and has a Nespresso coffee machine. Holland Casino Scheveningen is a 10-minute walk from the hotel and the famous pier is only 5 minutes’ away. The centre of Den Haag is a 15-minute tram journey away from the Zwarte Pad tram stop which is 50 metres from Carlton. The wellness facilities at Carlton Beach include an indoor swimming pool with a solarium, steam bath and fitness centre. There are also indoor and outdoor saunas plus guests can enjoy a range of relaxing massages treatments. The Beach Brasserie serves light lunch bites and bar snacks in a casual setting with an open-fire of unique design. International cuisine and organic dishes are served in the Smugglers Grill & Bar.

name: Hotel Zuiderduin
address: Zeeweg 52, 1931 Egmond aan Zee, North Holland
description: Located just 350 metres from the beach, Hotel Zuiderduin’s spa includes an indoor pool, 3 saunas and squash facilities. Its rooms have box-spring beds, satellite TV and a balcony. Each room is decorated with warm colours, modern furnishings and a work desk. They come with a private bathroom with free toiletries. Guests can choose from various activities such as bowling, squash or a work-out in the fitness room. There is an extensive playground available for children as well. Hotel Zuiderduin also houses a restaurant which serves international cuisine for breakfast, lunch and dinner. The brasserie offers drinks and light snacks through the day. From Zuiderduin Hotel, it’s only 300 metres to Egmond aan Zee’s shopping street. The Sluispolder golf courses are 10 km away. Bicycle rental is also available at the hotel.

name: Coral Level at Iberostar Selection Cancun
address: Boulevard Kukulkán KM 17 B, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Cancún, 1.6 km from El Rey Beach, Coral Level at Iberostar Selection Cancun offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property features a hot tub, evening entertainment and a concierge service. At the resort, rooms are equipped with a balcony. All rooms are equipped with a coffee machine, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box, while some rooms come with a terrace and some have sea views. A continental, American or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. You can play table tennis and tennis at the 5-star resort. Playa Marlin is 1.6 km from Coral Level at Iberostar Selection Cancun, while La Isla Shopping Mall is 1.2 km away. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 19 km from the accommodation.

name: Royalton Splash Riviera Cancun, An Autograph Collection Resort
address: Carretera Federal 307 Tulum-Cancun Km 332, 150, Municipio de Benito Juarez, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Hotel Riu Latino
address: Sm 006, Mza 002, Lte 001, Subcondominio Playa, Condominio Costa Mujeres, 77400 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Iberostar Cancun
address: Boulevard Kukulcan, Km. 17, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Cancún in the Quintana Roo Region, 5 km from La Isla Shopping Mall, Iberostar Selection Cancun \features a private beach area and water sports facilities. There is a restaurant and guests can have fun at the water park. Every room at this resort is air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV and DVD player. You will find a coffee machine in the room. Each room is equipped with a private bathroom fitted with a bath. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. There is a 24-hour front desk, hairdresser's and gift shop at the property. You can play tennis at the resort. It also offers car hire. Coco Bongo is 8 km from Iberostar Selection Cancun, while Cancun Government Palace is 11 km from the property. Cancun International Airport is 10 km away.

name: Breathless Cancun Soul Resort And Spa
address: Blvd. Kukulcan Km. 4.5, Num Ext.: Mz 34, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Nestled between the Caribbean Sea and Nichupte Lagoon, Breathless Cancun Soul Resort & Spa offers vibrant, contemporary décor and is located along the Cancun strip in the Hotel Zone. This beachfront resort will feature 429 suites, including the xhale club and the Unlimited-Luxury® vacation concept with a variety of luxurious amenities and services. Breathless Cancun Soul Resort & Spa also features the standard CleanComplete Verification™ protocols on property. This 360-degree quality, safety and hygiene program takes into account every aspect of the on-property experience, backed by the highly-respected third-party certificationWebBeds

name: Trs Coral Hotel
address: Boulevard Vialidad Paseo Mujeres Smz No. 3 Mz 1 Vialidad Paseo Mujeres, 77400 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Hilton Cancun Mar Caribe
address: Kukulcan Km 17, Zona Hotelera, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Cancun, the resort is a short walk from Iberostar Cancun Peninsula Convention Centre and offers a private beach, free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool. It is a short drive from Hard Rock Cafe Cancun and provides free public parking on site. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or enjoy a drink at the bar. It provides family-friendly facilities, with room layouts and services for families of any size, as well as a kids pool and a kids club. Those staying at the property can also hire a bicycle to explore Cancun and its surrounds. After a day of discovering the nearby region, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. Each have a flat-screen TV, tea and coffee making facilities and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. Hilton Cancun Mar Caribe boasts convenient dining options, including Mediterranean and Italian dishes at La Luce and Mexican meals at Maxal. Eateries at the resort include Azulinda and Noriku. A selection of dining options are also available in the area. The resort is less than a 20-minute drive from Cancun International Airport and Iberostar Cancun Golf Course is a brief stroll away. The staff at the tour desk are available to book and organize activities in Cancun.HotelsCombined

name: Grand Fiesta Americana Coral Beach Cancun
address: Blvd. Kukulcan Km. 9.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Location This excellent luxury hotel is situated directly beside the fine sandy beach on the Mexican Caribbean coast. The hotel lies in the tourist centre of Cancún, just a few minutes' walk from the town centre where guests will discover shops, boutiques, cafés, bars, restaurants and nightlife venues. Facilities The establishment comprises a total of 602 accommodation units. Guests of the establishment are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. A lift can be used to access the upper floors. Services such as a cloakroom, a safe and currency exchange facilities make for a comfortable stay. Internet access (for a fee) and wireless internet access (for a fee) are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant, a dining area, a breakfast room, a café and a bar. The grounds of the establishment feature a playground and an attractive garden. Additional features of the establishment include a newspaper stand and a playroom. Guests arriving by car can park their vehicles in the garage (for a fee) or car park (for a fee). Among the additional services available are medical assistance, room service, a laundry and a hairdressing salon. Rooms All accommodation units feature air conditioning and a bathroom. Bathrooms with wheelchair access can also be booked. A balcony or terrace comes with most rooms as standard. Many of the rooms also offer a sea view, adding to the ambience. Each accommodation unit features a double bed or a king-size bed. Among the amenities are a safe and a minibar. Tea and coffee making equipment is included as standard. An ironing set is also available to guests. Most accommodation units are equipped with internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio, a CD player and an alarm clock. Wheelchair-accessible rooms are also bookable. In the bathrooms, guests will find a shower, a bathtub, a spa bath and a hairdryer. Sports/Entertainment The establishment offers an outdoor pool and a children's pool. Sun loungers and parasols offer the ideal way to unwind. A hot tub provides an opportunity for relaxation. The poolside bar serves a selection of refreshing drinks. For those wishing to enjoy some exercise, tennis and beach volleyball are offered onsite. The establishment offers indoor sporting activities such as table tennis, or for a fee, a gym. The establishment offers various wellness options, including a spa and a sauna, or for a fee, a steam bath and massage treatments. An entertainment programme, an entertainment programme for adults, an entertainment programme for children and a kids' club provide guests with recreational options during their free time. Meals The establishment offers the following bookable meals and board options: breakfast, lunch and dinner. Payment All major credit cards, including American Express, VISA, Diners Club, JCB and MasterCard, are accepted for payment.WebBeds

name: Secrets The Vine Cancun Adults Only
address: Blvd Kukulcan Km 14.5, Zona Hotelera, Zona Hotelera Cancun Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Suites Malecon Cancun
address: Av. Bonampak Sm 6 M1 L1, 77503 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Only 10 minutes’ walk from Boulevard Kukulkan, Suites Malecon Cancun features panoramic views of Cancun city and Nichupté Lagoon. The property is in the same location as Américas Shopping Mall. The apartments are fully equipped and include ironing facilities, satellite channels in a flat-screen TV, safe, and terraces overlooking the lagoon and the city landscape. They are divided into seating area, dining area, well-equipped kitchen, bedroom and private bathroom with shower. Toiletries are provided. Las Américas Shopping Mall features several different restaurants that guests can explore, or they can also choose to prepare their own meals en suite. The complex has an infinity pool with a hot tub, BBQ facilities, plus sun terraces with beds and loungers. The facilities also offer a gym and a business centre. The International Airport is 20 minutes’ drive from the complex and Cancun’s town centre is 10 minutes’ drive away.

name: Atelier Playa Mujeres
address: Lote 13, Rth-4, SM003, Mz.001, 77400 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: General description: The hotel Atelier Playa Mujeres (adults only) is located right on a sandy beach. At the beach, there are sun loungers and sun umbrellas free of charge. The town Cancun is around 14 km away (Playa del Carmen around 80 km, Tulum around 143 km). For mobility there is a car rental company. The airport (CUN) is approx. 28 km away. Amenities: The 5-storey beach hotel consists of a main building and an adjoining building, and has 429 rooms in total. It offers its guests a reception (check-in from 15:00, check-out until 12:00), a lobby with bar, 6 lifts, air conditioning, a safe (for free), a shop, theater, a free parking area and a money changing facility. For the meals, there are 8 restaurants (air-conditioned). In a total 7 bars, you can relax in good company. WiFi is available for free. Room service is free of charge. Room cleaning, laundry / ironing service, concierge service and medical service are available for a fee. Pool: In the outdoor area of the hotel you will find one fresh water pool. Here, there are sun umbrellas and sun loungers for free available. Refreshing beverages can be consumed directly at the pool bar. Sport and Leisure: Sports and entertainment: Table tennis (where applicable, for a fee) and fitness. Spa area, sauna, solarium and massages available for a fee. Entertainment for adults: activity programme. Additional information: Additional fees may apply for certain facilities, amenities or activities. Some services depend on the local climatic conditions and the season. Languages spoken: English and Spanish. Accepted methods of payment: Euro / MasterCard, Visa and American Express. Some services and facilities might be closed or offered with restrictions due to COVID19 Prevention measurement. Changes can be applied without previous notice.Ticket Package

name: Canopy by Hilton Cancun La Isla
address: Boulevard Kukulcan South North Km 12 5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Hello and welcome to Canopy by Hilton Cancun La Isla, a new, urban hotel beside the lagoon in Cancun hotel zone. Enjoy being steps from some of the best shopping brands, restaurants and white sand beaches. We will introduce you to the neighborhood with a local welcome gift at check-in. At Canopy, we have got you covered. Our Just-Right Rooms are comfortable, modern spaces with the amenities you want, like free WiFi, a 55-inch HDTV, murals from local artists and our exclusively designed Canopy beds. Deluxe rooms feature views of the ocean and double shower, while our suites include a living room, dining area, espresso/bar cart and hanging chair as well as signature Canopy bathrobe. Feel better going forward and fill up your bottles with filtered water on every floor. Welcome the day in the cafe with a delicious artisanal breakfast made with fresh ingredients and local produce or have a Canopy Break Fast bag delivered to your door. Dine at Azulinda Cafe and Bar or head to the roof to sip cocktails, fresh juices or coffee al fresco. Enjoy the view while working out or relaxing poolside at our rooftop fitness center and outdoor pool. If there is business to be done, settle into our co-working space with comfortable seating and plenty of charging outlets. We also offer three boardrooms for meetings and events, and our beautiful terrace will accommodate up to 36 guests. Enjoy all Hilton Honors benefits at our Energizing hotel.Hilton

name: Occidental Costa Cancun
address: Boulevard Kukulcan, Km. 4,5 | Cancún, Quintana Roo, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: 概述 4 星級住宿 可通往眾多當地景點。 海濱住宿 位置 位於 Cancun 郊區. Located in the heart of Hotel Zone 當地名勝 Isla Mujeres Ferry -.25 miles. Downtown Cancun - 3 miles. description: Dreams Vista Cancun is an all-new, all ocean view, family resort! Set beachfront along the Caribbean Sea, there’s activities for the kid in everyone—a beautiful beach, four pools and watersports galore. The resort’s prime location is close to the wonders and ruins of the Mayan Riviera, and right next door to the Puerto Cancun Golf Club The brand new, modern rooms and suites at Dreams Vista Cancun all offer ocean views from a private, furnished balcony or terrace, an in-room mini-bar and more. Connecting rooms, family suites, and Sun Club upgrades are also available. All rooms and suites are non-smoking.WebBeds

address: Blvd Kukulcan Km 11.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This hotel is situated in the leisure district of Cancún, just a short walk to the town centre, where guests will discover countless restaurants, shops and nightlife venues. Links to the public transport network are to be found directly outside of the hotel. This accommodation establishment comprises a total of 410 rooms and features a number of in-house facilities. The comfortable rooms come with an en-suite bathroom and are well-appointed with amenities to ensure a pleasant stay. In the outdoor complex, guests can enjoy a freshwater swimming pool and relax on a sun terrace. Sports enthusiasts may make use of the in-house gym and tennis facilities SMOKE FREE PROPERTYFarePortal

name: Nizuc Resort and Spa
address: Kukulcan Boulevard Km 21 Punta Nizuc, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Offering panoramic views of the Caribbean Sea, Nizuc Resort & Spa is located on the secluded Punta Nizuc and features an outdoor pool, private dock and spa. Free Wi-Fi and free private parking are available to guests. The air-conditioned rooms offer Nespresso coffee makers and flat-screen TVs. The spacious bathrooms feature a bath tubs with rainfall showers. The 6 on-site restaurants serve modern Mexican dishes, Peruvian ceviches as well as Asian and Mediterranean food. Tours and activities can be arranged by the concierge. Nizuc Resort & Spa has event and meeting facilities. Guests can enjoy a variety of massages or treatments in the luxurious on-site spa. The Nizuc Thermal Experience is a feast to awaken the senses through a guided circuit of hydrotherapy. Laguna Nichupté can be reached 6.9 km. Cancun International Airport is a 10 minutes’ drive from Nizuc Resort & Spa. The center of Cancun can be reached within 25 minutes by car.

name: The Westin Cancun Resort Villas & Spa
address: Boulevard Kukulcan Km 20.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Plan an unforgettable getaway at The Westin Cancun Resort Villas & Spa. Tucked away between the Caribbean Sea and a peaceful lagoon, our beachfront vacation ownership resort offers the perfect destination for family vacations or getaways with friends. Unwind at one of the sparkling pools or on the white-sand beaches at our Cancun beach resort. Soothe tired muscles after an exciting day of Cancun adventures with a relaxing beauty treatment at The Heavenly Spa. Savor delicious cuisine and libations at our Cancun villa resort's restaurants and bars. Recharge in a spacious ocean-view or lagoon-view villa with a balcony and fully equipped kitchen, or select a comfortable studio with views of the water. All accommodations include Westin Heavenly® Beds and free Wi-Fi. Best of all, we do not charge resort or per person fees.Marriott

The hotel offers an excellent spa, various exceptional restaurants and a wonderful infinity pool, making it the ideal place for an unforgettable stay. SMOKE FREE PROPERTYFarePortal

The rooms are equipped to provide maximum comfort and offer the necessary amenities for an unforgettable stay. The restaurant is elegant, casual, classy and loaded - for breakfast, lunch and dinner. description: Offering direct access to Cancún Beach, Live Aqua Cancun Beach Resort Cancun. Only features an outdoor swimming pool overlooking the Caribbean Sea. It has attractive rooms with balconies, 9 restaurants, 5 bars and a spa. Each spacious, air-conditioned room at the Live Aqua Beach Resort Cancun has stylish décor with tiled floors. All rooms include a TV, coffee maker, aromatherapy products, a safety-deposit box and a minibar which is refilled daily. The stylish Siete Restaurant serves a range of Mexican cuisine, while European and Asian dishes are on offer in the mb Restaurant. The Azur serves international options set by the pool and overlooking the sea. The Aqua’s extensive spa offers hydrotherapy treatments, massage and aromatherapy. There are also hot tubs and steam baths. There is a gym available, while yoga classes are also available. Located in Cancún’s Hotel Zone, the Live Aqua is set next to Nichupte Lagoon and in front of the popular La Isla shopping centre. Please note this is an adults-only hotel.

There are freshwater pools for adults and children, a full- service spa, fitness center, beach, terrace and villa massage service, tennis courts with floodlighting for evening play, two restaurants and a snack bar, to name just a few. description: Find the perfect getaway at The Westin Lagunamar Ocean Resort Villas & Spa, Cancun in Mexico. Situated on the Caribbean Sea in the Cancun Hotel Zone, the studio and villa rentals at our beachfront vacation ownership resort boast endless amenities designed to make your stay exceptional. Explore popular Cancun attractions such as Tulum, Chichén Itza and more from our resort. Go for a swim in our infinity pool, spend the day on our white-sand beach, indulge at our spa or play a round of kid-friendly mini golf. Satisfy your vacation cravings at our resort restaurants or relax poolside and let us bring snacks and drinks right to you. If you've come to Mexico for a wedding, let our team make planning your event a success in an outdoor space on the beach and with our custom catering services. At the end of the day, settle into your Cancun vacation rental featuring a fully equipped kitchen and a balcony with ocean views. We look forward to welcoming you to our family-friendly Cancun beach resort in Mexico.Marriott

description: Located along the Caribbean Sea, this Cancun hotel is 3.5 km from Aqua World Marina. It features a water park with 8 water slides and The Spa offers hair and body treatments. Every spacious room offers balcony with beautiful ocean views and air conditioning. All rooms are brightly decorated and include a satellite TV, refrigerator and coffee maker. Guests can enjoy a poolside massage or relax in the hot tubs. A gym and 2 tennis courts are available for active guests. Crown Paradise Cancun offers free on-site activities, such as a mini-golf course and game room with billiards. A variety of cuisine is available at Club Cancun’s 7 restaurants, including Japanese specialties at Fujiyama and Italian dishes at La Piazza. Beer and cocktails are served at 6 bars, such as Club Caribe Pool Bar and Beach Bar.

address: Blvd. Kukulkan Km 16.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Cancun's hotel zone, next to one of the city's most beautiful beaches, this property offers enjoyable facilities and luxurious spa services with great views of Nichupte Lagoon. The family-friendly resort of Fiesta Americana Condesa Cancun consists of 3 main buildings, each sheltered by a palapa. Go swimming in the outdoor pool or spend the day at the beach. The hotel offers several eating options, including Argentinian dishes in San Telmo, Trattoria and Pizzeria offering typical Italian classics, Sushi Corner, Cantina offering the Mexican flavour, The Grill to enjoy your meals while also enjoying the outdoor view, a children's option at the Pirate Ship and for the adults La Cevichería, where they can snack and sip a refreshing beverage while watching their kids play. The Deli & Gift Shop is a relaxing corner where guests can enjoy a cup of coffee, a pastry and a good book. The Fiesta Americana's Miiluma Spa offers massage and beauty treatments. There is also a modern gym, and yoga classes are offered.

description: Situated upon a white-sand beach in the heart of Cancun's hotel zone, Dreams Sands Cancun Resort & Spa is also 10 minutes' drive from the city centre. Guests are offered with gourmet dining, bars and nightlife entertainment, plus 2 swimming pools. The elegantly decorated rooms offer stunning views of the Caribbean Sea and Isla Mujeres. They include a full, spacious bathroom with luxury toiletries, a daily stocked minibar that offers beers, soft drinks and bottled water, and amenities including an iPod dock. Dreams Sands Cancun Resort & Spa boasts an equipped spa and fitness centre, and for children's amusement there is the Explorer's Club. The resort also features an outdoor hot tub, plus non-motorized water sports activities can be arranged by the Dreams Entertainment team. Guests will be able to choose between 9 different restaurant options, all offering gourmet cuisine. Four festive bars and lounges will serve a wide menu of unlimited top-shelf spirits. Guests can also perfect their swing at a nearby golf course with complimentary greens fees. Cancun International Airport can be reached in a 25-minute drive. Family friendly hotel, please see fine print for additional information.
