address: Blvd. Kukulcan, Manzana 51, Lote 7, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This stunning beachfront resort is set on the beautiful strip of Punta Cancun and framed by the Caribbean Sea, where you can enjoy a white sand beach and clear-blue waters. All rooms at Hyatt Ziva Cancún include a flat-screen TV, mini bar and a coffee machine. Rooms feature a private bathroom equipped with a shower as well as bath robes and slippers. Hyatt Ziva Cancun offers a variety of activities, from theater shows to water sports to tequila tastings and a microbrewery. Choose to lounge in a beach cabana, sip a margarita and enjoy diving, snorkeling, sailing, and swimming in the Caribbean. Soak up the sun at cascading pools overlooking the sea, including the pool bar. Enjoy the oceanfront spa, with a massage, holistic body treatments, hydrotherapy and a fitness center. Hyatt Ziva Cancun is located 300 metres from Coco Bongo while La Isla Shopping Mall is 3.4 km away. Cancun International Airport is 17 km away.

description: This Grand Hotel Cancun - Managed by Kempinski features 2 outdoor swimming pools, a spa and a private beach. Kempinski spa and Salon offers a wide range of massage therapies, body treatments and facials. There is also a gym and tennis court. Cabanas are available on the hotel’s private beach. The Grand Hotel Cancun - Managed by Kempinski elegant rooms feature a mini bar and work desk. All rooms have a balcony with ocean views. The private bathroom includes a bathrobe, slippers and hairdryer. Dining options range from traditional Asian specialties at The Sushi Bar to Mediterranean cuisine at Fantino. Indoor or outdoor dining is available and cocktails are served at the Lobby Lounge. Just 20-minutes from Cancun International Airport, the Grand Hotel Cancun - Managed by Kempinski can arrange airport and area attraction transportation. Aquaworld, offering boat trips, is 2 km away.

Featuring 424 suites, 9 restaurants and 7 bars; open air spaces make it ideal to enjoy the warm ocean breeze and get a tropical feeling. It features two protected flora and fauna areas where some of the region's flowers and birds can be seen and photographed. Each of the luxurious, comfortable suites are finely appointed with wood elements and spacious terraces.  All Secrets Playa Mujeres guests have the opportunity to enjoy Exchange Privileges (Free flow access) to Dreams Playa Mujeres, located next door, adding 10 restaurants and 13 bars options. description: Secrets Playa Blanca Costa Mujeres offers the perfect backdrop for romantic relaxation and exploration, situated along a secluded strip of idyllic oceanfront coast, only 12 miles north of Cancun and a short drive to championship golf and a variety of historical local attractions. This all-adult, luxury property resides on an expansive and pristine white-sand beach with crystal-clear waters and features 507 modern suites each embellished with handmade art and furnishings crafted from organic, locally sourced materials, providing a truly authentic experience. The elevated Preferred Club accommodations provide an extra level of luxury with upgraded amenities and exclusive access to the Preferred Club Lounge, an oceanfront Beach Bar and a unique pool surrounded by lush vegetation. Indulge with Unlimited-Luxury®, where everything is included. Astonish your palate with limitless gourmet dining, sip top-shelf spirits served at our elegant bars and lounges and enjoy a wide variety of entertainment offered both day and night. From calming beachfront infinity pools overlooking the ocean to an engaging activities pool offering excitement throughout the day, there is something for everyone. Wind down with a specialty treatment at the Secrets Spa by Pevonia®, delight in evening shows at the theater or try one of our culinary experiences from wine and tequila tastings to cooking classes.Sembo

name: All Ritmo Cancun Resort & Water Park
address: Km. 1.5 Carretera a Puerto Juarez, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Boasting a privileged location in a beautiful corner of the Caribbean, this charming complex is the perfect choice for families travelling with children. Guests will find themselves just 22 kilometres from Cancun International Airport and just a few steps from a white sandy beach ideal for those looking for peace and tranquillity. The comfortable and spacious accommodation options offer all the necessary services and amenities to enjoy an unforgettable holiday experience. Standard suites have been decorated in a contemporary style and offer views over the garden or to the pool. The suites include vibrant colours and come with a balcony or terrace and a cosy living room ideal to share moments with the family. Visitors will be delighted by the wide selection of dining options including national and international specialities and the youngest guests may appreciate the complete entertainment programme.FarePortal

name: Margaritaville Island Reserve Riviera Cancun
address: Carr Chetuma Km 27 5, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: This sophisticated hotel, which can be found in North Riviera Maya, is a great option for families. The total number of rooms is 148. Wi-Fi internet connection is available for further comfort and convenience. All guests staying at this property can enjoy the convenience of 24-hour reception. Margaritaville Island Reserve Riviera Cancun does not offer cots on demand. Common areas are suitable for wheelchair-disabled people. The car park may be useful to those arriving by car. Margaritaville Island Reserve Riviera Cancun follows environmentally sustainable practices. Those who stay at this establishment may take advantage of its catering options. Visitors may appreciate the health and wellness services offered at the hotel. Some services may be subject to additional charges.FarePortal

name: Paradisus Cancun
address: Boulevard Kukulkan Km 16.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Perfectly situated on the soft white sand beaches of Cancun, this exclusive beach resort provides the perfect accommodations for your vacation getaway. Paradisus Cancun is a chance to experience the stunning beauty that has made Cancun an international destination in the comfort of a luxury resort on par with the highest standards of excellence. This commitment to quality is why Paradisus Cancun has been awarded Four Diamond honors since 2006 by AAA. Luxurious, spacious and elegantly decorated rooms on a pristine beach that is short 15 minutes from the airport. Whether you are on the beach, at one of the four lagoon-inspired pools, or dining in any of our nine on-site restaurants, our goal is your total satisfaction. Indulge yourself with upgraded The Reserve service, an exclusive experience for adults, families and groups with skilled concierge service, private areas and a complete list of upgraded amenities. YHI SPA with authentic wellness activities and treatments. Romance by Paradisus offers six packages meticulously designed to meet every dream.FarePortal

name: JW Marriott Cancun Resort & Spa
address: Blvd. Kukulcan, Km 14.5, Lote 40-A, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Indulge in a revitalizing retreat at one of the best Cancun luxury resorts JW Marriott Cancun Resort & Spa, where you'll discover numerous upscale amenities including spacious, sand-toned accommodations, on-site dining and premier access to alluring destinations. Dedicate a day to exploring the historical Mayan ruins and experience the area's lively clubs and bars, dancing your nights away. Watch the sunrise over the blue Mexican Caribbean Sea, unwind with a dip in the infinity pool, retreat to a beachfront Bali daybed or pursue a little wellness at the world-class Mayan-inspired spa Sens-yah. JW Marriott Cancun Resort & Spa offers five international restaurants Sasi Thai, Gustino Italian Grill, Bella Candela, Bravio Spanish Cuisine & La 16 Mexican cuisine. The only thing left to do is toast to it all with creative craft cocktails offerings from the JW Lobby Bar’s 150 Margaritas Menu and delight exquisite shareable plates at Bella Candela. Check out our Cancun resort deals today.Marriott

name: Royal Solaris Cancun
address: Boulevard Kukulcan Km 20.5, Lote 64, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: General description: Approx. 50 m from sandy beach is located the hotel Royal Solaris Cancun. At the beach, there are sun umbrellas and sun loungers free of charge available. The nearest shopping facilities are located approx. 7 m from the hotel, a supermarket can be reached after around 6 km. For evening dancing you will find a nightclub in a distance of approx. 10 km. For medical treatment in emergencies there is a hospital around 22 km away. The airport (CUN) is approx. 32 km away. The hotel and airport are linked by a shuttle (for a fee). Amenities: The 7-storey beach hotel has 305 rooms in total. It offers its guests a reception (check-in from 15:00, check-out until 11:00), a lobby with bar, 3 lifts, air conditioning, a safe (for free), theater and a free parking area. For the meals, there are three restaurants (air-conditioned). You will be warmly welcomed in both the hotel’s bars. WiFi is available for free. Room cleaning and concierge service are free of charge. Laundry / ironing service and medical service are available for a fee. Pool: In the outdoor area of the hotel you will find one fresh water pool with a children´s pool integrated into the main pool. Here, there are sun umbrellas for free available. Refreshing beverages can be consumed directly at the pool bar. Meals: Breakfast from the buffet. Sport and Leisure: Sports and entertainment: Fitness. A golf course is located approx. 16 km from the hotel. Spa area and massages available for a fee. Solarium, steam bath and hamam available (where applicable for a fee). Entertainment for adults: activity programme. In the outside area of the hotel there is a play area for children. Child supervision: activity programme for children (from 4 - 12 years) and babysitting (for a fee). Additional information: Additional fees may apply for certain facilities, amenities or activities. Some services depend on the local climatic conditions and the season. Languages spoken: English and Spanish. Accepted methods of payment: American Express and Visa. Some services and facilities might be closed or offered with restrictions due to COVID19 Prevention measurement. Changes can be applied without previous notice.Ticket Package

name: The Royal Cancun All Suites Resort
address: Kukulcan Boulevard Km 4.5 Hotel Zone, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 201 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with refrigerators and ovens. Your pillowtop bed comes with down comforters and premium bedding. Rooms have private balconies. 32-inch LCD televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature deep soaking bathtubs and complimentary toiletries. Amenities Treat yourself with massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, which include 2 outdoor swimming pools, outdoor tennis courts, and a fitness center. Additional features at this aparthotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge). Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the complimentary area shuttle. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a business center, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Free self parking is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at The Royal Cancun All Suites Resort in Cancun (Zona Hotelera), you'll be within a 15-minute drive of Tortuga Beach and La Isla Shopping Mall. This 4-star aparthotel is 0.8 mi (1.2 km) from Playa Tortugas and 2.2 mi (3.5 km) from Puerto Cancun Marina Town Center. Dining Satisfy your appetite with American cuisine at La Palapa Restaurant, one of the aparthotel's 4 restaurants. Relax with a refreshing drink at the beach bar, the poolside bar, or one of 4 bars/lounges. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: Deposit: USD 500.00 per stay A tax is imposed by the city: USD 4.43 per accommodation, per night Sanitation services: USD 3.89 per night We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Optional Charges Late check-out fee: USD 500 (subject to availability) The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. name: Riu Palace Las Americas
address: Blvd. Kukulcan, Km 8.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: A slice of Spain on the Caribbean is on display at Riu Palace Las Americas, in the heart of the hotel zone and near shops and night clubs. This beachside resort is 8.5 km (less than 6 mi) from downtown Cancun. The resort features 6 restaurants, 5 bars, 2 outdoor pools, an outdoor spa tub, and a swimming pool. Room rates include 24-hour room service, spa, gym, water-sports equipment, daily activities, and RIU evening programs. Most Riu Palace guestrooms feature balconies with ocean or lagoon views. All suites feature minibars, satellite TVs, turndown service, WIFI, in-room safes, and bathroom amenities.WebBeds

name: The Fives Oceanfront
address: Av. Javier Rojo Gomez SM 002 Mza 25 LT 1, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Puerto Morelos, a few steps from Playa Puerto Morelos, The Fives Oceanfront offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. The property features a bar, as well as a restaurant serving Italian cuisine. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. The Fives Oceanfront features certain units with city views, and all rooms are fitted with a balcony. At the accommodation every room has bed linen and towels. Guests at The Fives Oceanfront can enjoy a continental breakfast. You can play table tennis at this 5-star hotel, and the area is popular for cycling. Cancun Underwater Museum is 30 km from the hotel, while ADO International Bus Station is 36 km away. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 25 km from The Fives Oceanfront.

name: Hideaway at Royalton Riviera Cancun, An Autograph Collection Resort, Adults Only
address: Carretera Federal 307, 77500 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Reignite meaningful connections at an adults-only aged 18+ resort where elevated experiences create memories to last a lifetime. Located only 15 minutes from Cancun International Airport, your every desire is tailor-made. From exclusive dining to private beach and pool access and luxury accommodations, our resort-within-a-resort offers a premium Riviera Cancun getaway that also affords you access to all our neighboring Royalton Riviera Cancun has to offer.Marriott

name: Ocean Coral & Turquesa
address: Super Manzana 12, Lote 1-05, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Special check-in instructions Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Know Before You Go Reservations are required for massage services and spa treatments. Reservations can be made by contacting the property prior to arrival, using the contact information on the booking confirmation. A fee for a mandatory Christmas Eve gala dinner is included in the total price displayed for stays on December 24. A fee for a mandatory New Year's Eve gala dinner is included in the total price displayed for stays on December 31. Children 2 years old and younger stay free when occupying the parent or guardian's room, using existing bedding. Only registered guests are allowed in the guestrooms. No pets and no service animals are allowed at this property. This property advises that enhanced cleaning and guest safety measures are currently in place. Disinfectant is used to clean the property; commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant between stays; bed sheets and towels are laundered at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F. Social distancing measures are in place; staff at the property wear personal protective equipment; a shield is in place between staff and guests in main contact areas; periodic temperature checks are conducted on staff; temperature checks are available to guests; guests are provided with hand sanitizer. Fees Late check-out is available for a fee (subject to availability) The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.Ticket Package

name: Intercontinental Presidente Cancun Resort
address: Boulevard Kukulkan KM 7.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Enjoy breathtaking views of the Caribbean Sea from one of our 300 equipped rooms and suites in the best 5 star hotel in Cancun. Located in the hotel zone and the best beach in Cancun, a wide beach with a calm sea and no waves. 15 minutes from the city and nightlife and 30 minutes from the airport. Relax in our spa in a peaceful environment while your children have fun in our kids club with professional staff.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hotel Nyx Cancun
address: Blvd Kukulcan Km 11.5 Hotel Zone, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Located on a 14-mile stretch of pristine beachfront in Cancun’s hotel zone, NYX Hotel Cancun. has an infinity pool overlooking the Caribbean Sea. Some of its rooms have views of the sea or Nichupté Lagoon. All air-conditioned rooms at the NYX Hotel Cancun feature a flat-screen cable TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. A coffee maker and free WiFi access are also included. Bellavista Restaurant offers international options. The Chianti Restaurant offers Italian cuisine, open for dinner with prior reservation required. There is also a poolside bar, as well as a lobby bar. The surrounding beaches are popular for water sports. You can go scuba diving at the 2 coral reefs or visit ancient Mayan sites nearby. Cancun Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Flamingo Cancun Resort
address: Blvd. Kukulcan Km. 11, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Please do NOT book Instantly please enquire for latest rates and availability before booking,as pricing is dynamic,we will get back to you straight away. This hotel is next to the beach, only 20 minutes from downtown Cancun. The hotel features 2 outdoor pools, a restaurant and rooms with satellite TV. Flamingo Cancun Resort also features air conditioning and a private bathroom in every guest room. The rooms offer a view of the lagoon or a view of the Caribbean Sea. Guests can enjoy music, activities and a swim-up bar at the main pool. The Flamingo also offers an oceanfront pool with a relaxing atmosphere. A gym is available. La Fuente Restaurant serves international cuisine with views of the Caribbean Sea. The beachfront Albatros Restaurant and Bar is open for lunch and dinner. Cocktails and music are available at the Palenque Lobby Bar. This is our guests' favorite part of Cancún, according to independent reviews. Couples in particular like the location - they rated it 8.8 for a two-person trip. We speak your language! Flamingo Cancun Resort has been welcoming  guests since Sept 13, 2010 Most popular facilities 1 swimming pool Spa Fitness center Room service Restaurant Facilities for disabled guests Non-smoking rooms Bar Good Breakfast Beachfront ATM & Currency Exchange: Need cash? There's an ATM and a currency exchange service at this property.VRBO

name: Krystal Cancun
address: Paseo Kukulcan Km 9 Lotes 9 y 9 A, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This resort is on the ocean and across from the Cancun Convention Center. It features a sauna, hot tub, an oceanfront pool, while rooms include a minibar and cable TV. Each room at Krystal Cancun provides air conditioning. A safety deposit box is available in every room. The Krystal offers on-site car rental services. Other services include event organization, laundry facilities and a tour desk. Hacienda El Mortero restaurant is on-site at Cancun Krystal. It provides traditional Mexican cuisine and live mariachi music. The resort also offers a buffet breakfast and on-site bars. Only a short walk from the Krystal Cancun are numerous shops and restaurants. Guests at the resort will also find easy access to a variety of recreational activities including snorkeling, sailing and fishing.

name: Dreams Natura Riviera Cancun
address: Sm 31, Mz 03, Lote 101-21, Km 332, 77500 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Located 15 minutes away from Cancun International Airport This family-friendly beachfront resort offers guests an Unlimited-Luxury® vacation, where everything is included: 24-hour access to unlimited food and beverage options, à la carte dining with no reservations, endless activities for all ages and more. Rooms and suites feature comforts including a private balcony or terrace and a fully stocked mini-bar. Opening November 2019- Inspired by the surrounding Mayan jungle, the all-new Now Natura Riviera Cancun will offer a unique Unlimited-Luxury® experience. Facing the Caribbean Sea on a white sand beach, the 556-room resort is a short 10-mile drive from the Cancun International AirportWebBeds

name: Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort
address: Lote Rth-7-pm-ii, Lte1, Mz 1, Smz 3, 77400 Isla Mujeres, Quintana Roo
description: Perfectly situated in the exclusive gated community of Playa Mujeres, within a world-famous golf course, rests the stunning AAA Four Diamond Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort. This all-suite resort boasts 502 graciously appointed and luxuriously equipped suites, surrounded by secluded white sand beaches and the turquoise Caribbean Sea. Three levels of swimming pools spanning over 65,000 square feet, including two infinity pools with breathtaking ocean views, six hot tubs, a children’s pool, a water park for little ones, a water park for all ages. Located just 10 minutes from downtown Cancun and 35 minutes from Cancun International Airport, this luxurious resort provides an ideal vacation setting for couples and couples with children. At Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort, guests will enjoy the benefits of Unlimited Luxury®, where everything is included and no wristband — unlimited premium drinks at any of our 13 bars and lounges, gourmet à la carte dining, room service, daily refreshed mini-bar, pool and beach wait Service. All adult guests (+18 years old) from Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort will have free flow access to Secrets Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort, located next door. With 9 additional restaurant options, 7 additional bars, 2 additional pools and more! If Preferred Club room category is reserved, status and inclusions are provided in both properties!

name: Breathless Riviera Cancun Resort & Spa (Adults Only)
address: Calle 12 Mza. 41 Lote 2-04, Bahia Petempich, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Breathless Riviera Cancun Resort & Spa, nestled between the Caribbean Sea and the Lagoon of Bahia Petempich, is a vibrant, chic, and modern all-suite resort for adults seeking a sophisticated and lively getaway. The resort’s layout consisting of two horseshoe-shaped buildings and sections, each with its own unique personality and vibe, offers singles, couples, and friends the perfect balance of excitement and relaxation. Mix and mingle at a water aerobics class or relax with a curated cocktail in hand by the energy pool or become immersed in entertainment and dance to the music of international DJs in the Xcelerate zone. Enjoy the Unlimited-Luxury® inclusions of boundless gourmet dining and premium brand beverages at 9 trendy options; including five à la carte restaurants, a tapas option, one buffet, a grill on the beach, a snack area by the Xcelerate pool and The Nook café. Guests can enjoy bites at Spoon and nine bars and lounges, along with 24-hour room and concierge services, a captivating Events Calendar, and more. There is a 24-hour front desk, a cash machine and hairdresser's at the property. Free use of bicycles is available at this resort and the area is popular for snorkeling and diving. Playa del Carmen is 38 km from Breathless Riviera Cancun Resort & Spa, while Cozumel is 45 km away. Cancún International Airport is 16 km from the property.

name: Cyan Cancun Resort & Spa
address: Km 20.5, Blvd. Kukulcan, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This property is 1 minute walk from the beach. Set in Cancún, 700 metres from Playa Punta Nizuc, Cyan Cancun Resort & Spa offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a bar and a private beach area. The property is located 1.2 km from Playa Delfines, 2.8 km from San Miguelito Beach and 7 km from La Isla Shopping Mall. The hotel provides a terrace, a 24-hour front desk, and free WiFi is available throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The units feature a wardrobe. Cyan Cancun Resort & Spa offers a hot tub. Coco Bongo is 10 km from the accommodation, while Beto Avila Stadium is 13 km away. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 10 km from Cyan Cancun Resort & Spa.

name: Novotel Gdansk Marina
address: Jelitkowska 20, 80-342 Gdansk, Pomorskie
description: Relax with family at 3 star seaside Novotel Gdansk Marina which offers a variety of activities. Enjoy a la carte restaurant and Fish and Gin bar, relax in fitness room for guests of min. 16 years of age, indoor pool, and sauna. There is a kids playground, and during summer Fish Grill Bar 78 offers a range of dishes. You are welcome with pets. Well equipped meeting rooms guarantee high quality meetings.accorhotels.com

name: Diune Hotel by Zdrojowa
address: Sulkowskiego 4 A, 78-100 Kolobrzeg, Zachodniopomorskie
description: Located in a quiet part of Kołobrzeg, Diune Hotel is 20 metres from a local beach. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi in a stylish modernist property featuring art deco elements. There is free access to a SPA area including an indoor swimming pool with counter current, side massages and a waterfall. Apart from that the free facilities include two hot tubs, dry sauna, an aromatic sauna, a water cave and a rest area. At extra charge, 18 wellness rooms offering cosmetic and health treatment, massages, hydrotherapy and other treatments are available. Rooms come with a flat-screen TV offering satellite channels. Each room's private bathroom features a shower. A bathrobe and toiletries are provided free of charge. Some rooms have a sea view. Extras include a desk and a safety deposit box. The Diune also features a Arte restaurant, a café and Classic restaurant featuring an outdoor, sunny terrace open in spring and summer. Other facilities offered include luggage storage. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including cycling and hiking. Guests can rent bicycles and bicycle side-cars, as well as nordic walking sticks, deckchairs and beach windscreens. The property is 2 km from the Kołobrzeg Train Station and 3 km from the Kołobrzeg Lighthouse.

name: Hilton Swinoujscie Resort & Spa
address: Baltic Park Molo 4, 72-600 Świnoujście, Zachodniopomorskie
description: Welcome to Hilton Swinoujscie Resort & SPA, where you'll enjoy a beautiful retreat boasting a private beach and stunning panoramic views of the Baltic Sea. Every stylish guest room features complimentary WiFi, an HDTV, minibar, bathrobes, slippers and a furnished balcony. Upgrade your room for stunning views of the Baltic Sea. To enjoy individualized service and our largest spaces, including a separate living area, check out our suites. Hilton Swinoujscie Resort & SPA is next to a popular Aquapark, where you'll find attractions for the whole family, including water slides, a spray park, sauna zone, whirlpools, wild river and an exclusive artificial surfing wave. Our hotel is family-friendly - check out our Kids Club with a dedicated animation program and ask about our babysitting services. Our Resort is designed to make your stay remarkable. Relax in the wellness zone or bask in the sun of our private beach. We have a fully equipped fitness center when you're craving a cardio session and there's a beauty salon to help you feel at your best while on vacation. From tasty à la carte options in Polonaise Restaurant to hand-crafted cocktails at Wander rooftop bar, you'll love the choices at our Hilton Resort. Our Lobby Bar, Spice Bar and Sushi Bar & Grill are sure to entice, also Garner Restaurant has a wealth of delicious buffet options to enjoy. Whether you're traveling for a business meeting, social event or local convention, our hotel is the perfect venue for all types of events. We offer two breakout rooms, each 25 sq. m; that can also be combined. Along with available A/V equipment rental, both stylish meeting spaces offer complimentary WiFi.Hilton

name: Hotel Aurora Family & Spa
address: ul. Boh. Warszawy 17, 72-500 Międzyzdroje, Zachodniopomorskie
description: Overlooking the pier, Hotel Aurora Family & SPA offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. The hotel houses an extensive spa area. The rooms at the Aurora Family & SPA come with a 32-inch LCD TV and a safety deposit box. All feature a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Aurora’s spa features a 20-metre swimming pool, a sauna, a gym and a massage parlour. Guests can also book a range of beauty treatments. There also is a special swimming pool for children, as well as activities for children are organised by the hotel. The hotel has a restaurant serving traditional Polish dishes, as well as fresh fish and seafood. In the morning guests can enjoy breakfast buffet.

name: Sheraton Sopot Hotel
address: Powstancow Warszawy 6, 81-718 Sopot, Pomorskie
description: Sheraton Sopot Hotel is a 5 star spa hotel located, right at the beach, next to the longest wooden pier in Europe and just 30 minutes away from Gdansk city center and the airport. Our spa hotel offers 189 elegant rooms and renovated suites. The Sheraton Sopot hotel is the ideal destination for every occasion, from family getaways to business stays. Our large Conference Center with 3000 square meters of space divided between 14 conference rooms and 2 foyers can accommodate up to 1100 delegates. After a day of the conference or an active family day out the guests can relax in Sheraton Sopot Spa, which includes a fitness center, swimming pool, Spa Experience Zone with a wide range of saunas, and treatment rooms.Marriott

name: Fitzpatrick Castle Hotel
address: Killiney, Dublin
description: The Fitzpatrick Castle Dublin Hotel overlooks Dublin Bay and is a 20-minute drive from Dublin. It offers rooms with free Wi-Fi, a pool and 2 award winning restaurants. The rooms at the Fitzpatrick Castle Dublin Hotel feature en suite bathrooms and satellite TVs. They also include hairdryers, telephones and tea/coffee making facilities. The AA Rosette PJ’s Restaurant serves fine food and The Mapas restaurant features fresh local produce. The leisure centre has a whirlpool spa, a 20 metre indoor heated swimming pool, a Scandinavian wood sauna and a steam room. There is also a fully equipped gym. Please note that all guests are required to wear a swimming cap while in the pool, pool caps are available to purchase from our Fitness centre reception. Children are welcome in the swimming pool and reception can give you a copy of specific swimming times for children. There is a DART station 10 minutes away which services Dublin. The James Joyce Museum and Dalkey Castle are both within one mile and free parking is available at the Fitzpatrick. Dublin airport is 43 km from the property.

name: Royal Marine Hotel
address: Marine Road, Dublin
description: The Royal Marine overlooks Dublin Bay and has direct access to Dun Laoghaire Promenade and Pier. It boasts a health club, spa, indoor pool and air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. There is a DART train line just 2 minutes walk from the Royal Marine, which has regular services to Dublin City. From outside the hotel there is a coach service to and from Dublin Airport. The Pier Health Club has a steam room, spa bath and free weights. A range of indulgent treatments are on offer at the Sansana Spa including a rock sauna, a mud room and experience showers. Designed over 2 floors, Hardys Bar offers fine cuisine in a modern environment. The Dun Bistro has stunning harbor views and serves modern European cuisine. There are plenty of beautiful coastal and countryside walks, including Peoples Park, in the immediate vicinity. Free parking is available at the hotel. Notable former guests include Charlie Chaplin and Queen Victoria.

name: Actons Hotel
address: Pier Road Kinsale 0000 IE, Kinsale 0000
description: Actons Hotel is a period building filled set landscaped gardens overlooking the beautiful Kinsale Harbour. It offers en suite rooms, many with harbour views and a Health and Fitness Club with indoor pool, gym and sauna. Rooms at the hotel are individually designed and all feature satellite TV, free Wi-Fi and tea and coffee making facilities, as well as a telephone and hairdryer. Guests at the Actons Hotel can enjoy a range of dishes in the waterfront Bar and Bistro, which serves lunch and dinner. Tea, coffee and home-baked scones are also available in the morning. The Acton’s Health and Fitness Club has a steam room, hot tub and children’s pool and offers a range of aerobics and fitness classes, as well as beauty and holistic treatments. Kinsale, with its winding narrow streets, has a range of interesting shops, pubs, cafes and galleries. Nearby activities include golf, sailing and fishing. The Actons Hotel has free parking and is 30 minutes’ drive from Cork.

name: Trump International Golf Links & Hotel Doonbeg Ireland
address: Doonbeg Golf Club Doonbeg 00000 IE, Doonbeg
description: Located in Doonbeg, Trump International Golf Links & Hotel Ireland is an easy drive from Kilkee and provides a sauna. It offers 5-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. Guests can enjoy a range of massage treatments and beauty therapy at the on-site spa, White Horses. It also provides family-friendly facilities, with room designs and services for families of any size, as well as a playground and babysitting/child services. Every room at Trump International Golf Links & Hotel Ireland includes tea and coffee making facilities and cable/satellite channels, while the bathrooms feature bathrobes and showers. All offer an in-room closet, an in-room safe and ironing facilities. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient place to enjoy a meal. Breakfast is available daily and can be savoured in the comfort of the rooms. Guests can experience scenic countryside walks or make use of Trump International Golf Links & Hotel Ireland's bike rental service to explore the surrounding area. The hotel also offers parking for guests with a vehicle.Revato

name: The Galmont Hotel & Spa
address: Lough Atalia Road, Galway
description: The Galmont Hotel & Spa overlooks Galway Bay and is just 200 metres from Eyre Square. It has an award-winning restaurant, Spirit One Spa and Energize fitness and leisure. Large rooms at The Galmont Hotel & Spa all feature a wall-mounted LCD TV and free Wi-Fi. Large luxurious beds have Egyptian cotton sheets and goose feather pillows. The spa centre boasts a gym, a sauna and a swimming pool, and offers spa treatments, including Elemis. In addition to a full-service spa, The Galmont features an indoor pool and a health club. Dining is available at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants. A bar/lounge is on site where guests can unwind with a drink. Public areas are equipped with complimentary wireless Internet access. Marina's Restaurant serves both breakfast and dinner. The Coopers Bar & Lounge has a waterfront terrace and serves an all day menu. A business center is on site at this 4-star property. This eco-friendly hotel also offers a children's pool, a sauna, and spa services. Onsite parking is available (surcharge). The Galmont is a smoke-free property. Ireland West Airport is 55 miles from the hotel and Galway Racecourse is just a 10-minute drive away. Galway city centre is 5-minute walk from The Galmont Hotel & Spa.

name: Hotel Ísland - Spa & Wellness Hotel
address: Armuli 9, Reykjavik 108
description: Featuring a wellness centre with a spa, beauty salon and yoga facilities, this hotel is 600 m from Reykjavik's main street, Laugavegur. A local bus stop is within a 5-minute walk and tour buses stop right outside the hotel. Laugardalur Park recreational area is within a 5-minute walk. Free parking is available. The rooms at Hótel Ísland Spa and Wellness feature a TV. Panoramic views of the mountains can be enjoyed from several rooms. The hotel's own contemporary Hekla Restaurant & Bar is open for lunch and dinner, and guests can enjoy food and drinks here. Laugardalslaug Public Pool is 1.3 km away from Hótel Ísland Spa and Wellness, while Kringlan Shopping Centre is 1.3 km away. Hlemmur Square is only 1.7 km away. Silfra Spa access is not permitted for guests under the age of 16

name: Diamond Suites by Reykjavik Keflavik Airport
address: Vatnsesvegi 12-14, Keflavik 230
description: Offering a barbecue and hot tub, Diamond Suites by Reykjavik Keflavik Airport is situated in Keflavík, 34 km from Reykjavík. The hotel has a terrace and views of the sea, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and free private parking is available on site. A flat-screen Bang Olufsen TV, an iPad and an iMac are standard in all rooms at Diamond Suites by Reykjavik Keflavik Airport. All rooms feature luxurious furniture and a spacious seating area. Rooms are fitted with a private bathroom with a bath or a shower, bath robes and free toiletries. Superior rooms feature spa tubs and hot tubs. The top floor room offers a beautifully designed seating area where guests can walk onto the balcony where there is a luxury spa hot tub with a complete view of town, the Atlantic ocean and Reykjanes Peninsula. There is free shuttle service at the property. Free use of bicycles is available at this hotel and the area is popular for cycling. The hotel also offers car hire. The Blue lagoon in 21 km away and the nearest airport is Keflavik International Airport, 4 km from the property.

name: Four Seasons Hotel Sydney
address: 199 George Street, Sydney, NSW 2000
description: Overlooking Sydney Harbour, Four Seasons Hotel Sydney offers complimentary Premium WiFi, a bar, restaurant, fitness centre and swimming pool. Situated in Sydney CBD (Central Business District) and the historic Rocks, it features luxurious rooms with panoramic views over the iconic Sydney Opera House and Circular Quay. All rooms at Four Seasons Hotel Sydney have been carefully designed and subtly furnished with the highest quality amenities. To enjoy the best views of Sydney’s harbour, the Deluxe Full Harbour Room and Four Seasons Full Harbour King Rooms both provide unobstructed views of the harbour. Complimentary access to Lounge 32 is available for all guests in a Four Seasons Full Harbour King room and signature suites. Each room offers an LCD TV, slippers and Christian Lacroix toiletries. Chinese tea can be provided in the rooms upon request. Guests can dine at Mode Kitchen & Bar, which serves modern Australian dishes made with quality local and seasonal produce. Grain Bar offers a selection of cocktails, wine, local beer and craft spirits. Four Seasons Hotel Sydney state-of-the-art 350 square metre fitness centre is fully equipped. Guests can also unwind in the hotel’s therapeutic spa and wellness centre, which offers skin treatments and relaxing massages. Airport transfers are available upon request. Chinese speaking staff are available on-site to assist you. Union Pay credit cards are accepted.

name: Intercontinental Sydney
address: 117 Macquarie Street, Sydney, NSW 2000
description: Nestled in the dress circle of Circular Quay with unparalleled views across the Harbour City, InterContinental Sydney has been an icon for more than 35 years. Set within the restored Treasury Building of 1851, the luxury hotel’s exquisite guest rooms boast views of Sydney Harbour Bridge, Sydney Opera House, the Royal Botanic Gardens or the city skyline.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: The Ritz-Carlton, Melbourne
address: 650 Lonsdale Street, Melbourne, VIC 3000
description: Rising 80 stories above the city, The Ritz-Carlton, Melbourne offers panoramic views the Dandenong Ranges, Victoria Harbour, and Port Phillip Bay. Celebrating Australia’s ancient stories and vibrant cultures, Melbourne’s newest leading luxury hotel features the awarded Atria restaurant, The Ritz-Carlton Club®, and immersive spa and wellness facilities.Marriott

name: Rendezvous Hotel Perth Scarborough
address: 148 The Esplanade, Scarborough, WA 6019
description: Situated in Perth, the hotel is within a 40-minute drive of Perth Airport and provides a heated pool. It offers complimentary Wi-Fi and impressive ocean views. This modern hotel provides an executive floor, a ballroom and an express check-in and check-out feature. For those travelling with children Rendezvous Hotel Perth Scarborough offers a kids pool. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a hair dryer, a flat-screen TV and a shower. They all have an in-room safe, a desk and ironing facilities. Rendezvous Hotel Perth Scarborough serves a daily breakfast, and has a bar where guests can relax with a drink. Straits offers local meals and is open for lunch and dinner. A choice of cafés and restaurants are also found in close proximity to the property. Rendezvous Hotel Perth Scarborough is just a short stroll from Scarborough Beach. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book tours and sightseeing trips in Perth.Revato

name: Oaks Glenelg Plaza Pier Suites
address: 16 Holdfast Promenade, Glenelg, SA 5045
description: The sensational ocean views and resort facilities of Oaks Plaza Pier make this property an ideal choice for corporate and leisure travellers seeking fabulous Glenelg accommodation. Enjoying an absolute beach frontage location Oaks Plaza Pier allows you to really experience Glenelg. Luxurious 1 and 2 bedroom apartments feature wide balconies overlooking the beach or park full kitchen and laundry facilities. Just one minute from Glenelgs city centre modern and heritage attractions Oaks Plaza Pier is also just 10 minutes from Adelaide airport. Onsite amenities include swimming pool spa sauna gymnasium and restaurants and cafes including The Rocks Restaurant all of which were recognised with the AHA 2004 Award for Excellence as Best Superior Accommodation. Undercover parking is available for additional AUD20 and subject to availability.priceline.com

name: Stamford Grand Adelaide
address: 2 Jetty Road Moseley Square, Glenelg, SA 5045
description: Located right on Glenelg Beach, Stamford Grand a fully equipped fitness centre, an outdoor swimming pool and a gaming room with poker machines. All grand rooms have a chic and modern décor accentuating the relaxed and stylish beachside culture of Glenelg Stamford Grand Adelaide is located 25 minutes’ drive from the Adelaide city centre, and 15 minutes’ drive from Adelaide Airport. The famous Glenelg Tram is located right outside the hotel which can take you to the Adelaide city centre, Adelaide Oval and Adelaide Entertainment Centre. All air-conditioned rooms have a minibar and tea/coffee making facilities. Each room has a safety deposit box and a work desk. Some rooms feature beautiful city, hills or ocean views. The Promenade Restaurant offers stunning views of Glenelg Beach and a menu featuring local Australian produce. Situated on the ground floor, Horizons Cocktail Lounge serves premium beers, wines and cocktails in a relaxed atmosphere with panoramic ocean views. The Grand Bar overlooks the picturesque Glenelg Beach and Moseley Square. Grand Bar’s menu features fresh South Australia seafood, steaks, burgers, fresh salads bowls and pub classic dishes.

name: voco Gold Coast, an IHG Hotel
address: 31 Hamilton Avenue, Surfers Paradise, QLD 4217
description: Sleep better and take a moment to indulge at voco™ Gold Coast. Discover what makes voco™ reliably different in our luxury Surfers Paradise accommodation, where the finest amenities are enhanced by a personal touch. Stay close to the beach and Cavill Avenue's shops, dining and nightlife. Catch the G:link tram from right outside. Ease into holiday mode in our gym and 2 pools. Dine on fresh seafood or premium steaks in gorgeous restaurants that are stylish yet unstuffy. Kick back in plush suites with ocean views, cushy bedding and the latest tech.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Crowne Plaza Surfers Paradise
address: 2807 Gold Coast Highway, Surfers Paradise, QLD 4217
description: Settle into the Gold Coast and relax at Crowne Plaza Surfers Paradise. Towering over one of Australia’s favourite stretches of coastline, Crowne Plaza Surfers Paradise is neatly nestled between the Surfers Paradise entertainment strip and Broadbeach’s local dining scene. Crowne Plaza Surfers Paradise is the perfect place for families, couples, and business travellers. Experience a full range of flexible accommodation options, facilities and dining options for guests of all ages. Wake up to the sounds of the surf in one of our many ocean view rooms, and breakfast on your own private balcony overlooking the beach. During the day, treat yourself and find a quiet spot to take advantage of our waiter service by the outdoor lagoon pool. When it comes to meetings, Crowne Plaza Surfers Paradise offers the complete confidence that your next event on the Gold Coast will be a success. With an array of function rooms, dedicated business facilities and an experienced and enthusiastic meeting and events team, Crowne Plaza Surfers Paradise is a hassle-free place to host professional meetings, conferences and events. Nothing’s too hard for our down-to-earth team to make your time at Crowne Plaza Surfers Paradise special.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hilton Surfers Paradise Hotel & Residences
address: 6 Orchid Avenue, Surfers Paradise, QLD 4217
description: Stay at Hilton Surfers Paradise Hotel & Residences, perfectly located between Orchid Avenue and Surfers Paradise Boulevard on the Gold Coast. Enjoy luxury accommodations, complemented by an impressive range of facilities and outstanding meeting and conference venues. Soaring above the iconic Surfers Paradise beach, Hilton Surfers Paradise Hotel & Residences puts all of the Gold Coast’s famous features right at your fingertips.Hilton

name: JW Marriott Gold Coast Resort & Spa
address: 158 Ferny Avenue, Surfers Paradise, QLD 4217
description: Unwind at a five-star resort in the town of Surfers Paradise. JW Marriott Gold Coast Resort & Spa boasts luxurious rooms, award-winning service and a covetable hotel location on Ferny Avenue. Attend events at Gold Coast Convention Centre, treat the family to Sea World Gold Coast and stroll the beautiful beaches of Surfers Paradise. Our redesigned hotel rooms and suites offer an ideal setting to relax, complete with high-speed Wi-Fi, plush bedding and pristine marble bathrooms. Wake up feeling refreshed and ready for adventure in Surfers Paradise. We offer family-friendly resort facilities, from peaceful saltwater lagoons and an outdoor freshwater pool with a slide to a fitness centre and Sport Court®. One-of-a-kind experiences at our hotel include culinary cooking classes, JW Garden herb planting and guided tours, daily fish feeding, snorkeling in the saltwater lagoons and much more. Leave your family vacation to Surfers Paradise richer than when you arrived at JW Marriott Gold Coast Resort & Spa.Marriott

name: BreakFree Moroccan
address: 14 View Avenue, Surfers Paradise, QLD 4217
description: With the beach just across the road your 1 or 2 Bedroom Apartment puts you in the ideal spot. Spacious and self-contained, whip up a meal in the kitchen, kick back on your private balcony or relax watching TV in the living room. Between exploring the surrounding restaurants and shops be sure to make the most of the resort pools and spa. With so many great facilities you can really enjoy the resort lifestyle.accorhotels.com

name: Novotel Surfers Paradise
address: Cnr Surfers Paradise Boulevard And Hanlan Street, Surfers Paradise, QLD 4217
description: Novotel Surfers Paradise Hotel is situated just minutes from Surfers Paradise beach. Take in magnificent ocean or city skyline views from your private balcony. Relax by the outdoor swimming pool, join friends for a glass of wine, barista made coffee or all day dining in the BLVD Cafe & Bar. The hotel's modern venues are perfect for meetings, weddings and special occasions.accorhotels.com

name: Surfers Aquarius on the Beach
address: 4-12 Old Burleigh Road, Surfers Paradise, QLD 4217
description: Surfers Aquarius offers easy direct beach access. Guests can have a game of tennis or squash, try their hand at the putting green, work out in the fitness centre and then sit back and relax in one of the 3 swimming pools, 2 spas and 2 saunas while the kids play in the play ground or cool down in the children's wading pool. Surfers Aquarius is 1.6 km from Gold Coast Convention and Exhibition Centre. Jupiters Casino is 2 km from the property. Pacific Fair Shopping Centre is 2.3 km from Surfers Aquarius. The nearest airport is Gold Coast Airport, 19 km from the property. The property also features a large B.B.Q. area setting for up to 48 people, and an 8-seat gazebo overlooking the ocean, all set within 2 acres of tropical gardens. All accommodation offers a fully equipped kitchen, a dining setting and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Free secure parking is available on site.

name: Equinox Resort
address: 3458 Main Beach Parade, Surfers Paradise, QLD 4217
description: Stunning ocean views are offered from the balcony of each apartment at Equinox Resort. Set opposite Narrowneck Beach, this resort features a hot tub, an outdoor swimming pool, and both tennis and squash courts. Guests can work out in the fitness centre, or play air-hockey and billiards in the games room. Located on the Gold Coast, Equinox Apartments are 15 minutes’ walk from Cavill Avenue in the heart of Surfers Paradise. It is 5 minutes’ drive from Seaworld and 30 minutes’ from Coolangatta Airport. Tickets to theme parks such as Dreamworld and Wet ’n’ Wild can be booked via the tour desk.

name: Breakfree Longbeach
address: 28 Northcliffe Terrace, Surfers Paradise, QLD 4217
description: Surfers Paradise is known for its sandy white beaches and thriving dining, shopping and entertainment scene, which is all just a stone's throw away from the resort. The hardest part about your holiday will be deciding whether to spend your afternoon lazing on the beach, strolling around the shops, or enjoying a long lunch at one of the nearby restaurants. Choose from 1, 2 or 3 Bedroom Apartments, all fully self-contained with large balconies to relax and unwind.accorhotels.com

name: Breakfree Peninsula
address: Cnr Clifford Street & The Esplanade, Surfers Paradise, QLD 4217
description: At BreakFree Peninsula you can experience the ultimate Gold Coast holiday and take in the sights of Surfers Paradise from your high-rise apartment. Stroll down the road to Cavill Avenue (the main shopping, dining and entertainment hub of Surfers) or laze at one of the resort's swimming pools and spas.There's affordable accommodation for singles and couples at BreakFree Peninsula, with fully self-contained 1, 2 and 3 Bedroom Apartments.accorhotels.com

name: Surf Parade Resort
address: 210-218 Surf Parade, Surfers Paradise, QLD 4217
description: Surf Parade Resort is ideally situated mid-way between Broadbeach and Surfers Paradise and only 200 metres from the surf and patrolled beaches. It offers apartments with a spa bath and a private balcony. Guests enjoy a heated outdoor pool, a hot tub and a sauna. You can enjoy a BBQ or play a game on the full-size tennis court. Surf Parade provides Mediterranean-style, self-service single bedroom apartments offering cable TV and a WiFi internet connection.

name: The Star Grand at The Star Gold Coast
address: 1 Casino Drive, Broadbeach Island Gold Coast, Broadbeach, Qld, Australia, Broadbeach, QLD 4218
description: Located in Gold Coast, The Star Grand at The Star Gold Coast provides complimentary Wi-Fi and a gym. It is situated a brief stroll from Gold Coast Convention and Exhibition Centre. Guests can enjoy a range of relaxing treatments and beauty therapy at the on-site day spa, Azure Spa & Fitness. Amenities include facial and body treatments, plus a ballroom and a heated pool. There is also a lively casino on the property. Rooms at the hotel come with tea and coffee making facilities, flat-screen TVs and rain showers. They are air conditioned and offer movies-on-demand, an in-room safe and slippers. To start the day, guests are able to have breakfast at The Star Grand at The Star Gold Coast's on-site restaurants, then later experience Italian meals at Cucina Vivo or Japanese cuisine at Kiyomi. Eateries at the hotel include M & G Cafe and Bar and Uncle Su. Guests are also able to relax with a drink at Outdoor Bar. The Star Grand at The Star Gold Coast is situated amongst the area's well-known attractions, including Oasis Shopping Centre and Pacific Fair Shopping Centre, which are within walking distance. The hotel also offers parking for guests with a vehicle.Revato

name: Ultiqa Air On Broadbeach
address: 159 Old Burleigh Road, Broadbeach, QLD 4218
description: Located in Gold Coast, ULTIQA Air On Broadbeach is an easy drive from Sea World and offers free private parking on site. It has a spa, as well as outdoor tennis courts, a heated pool and a sauna. There are a variety of facilities available to guests of the resort, including free wireless internet in public areas, rooftop terrace and car hire. Guests can enjoy the recreational activities available, such as bicycle rental and a BBQ/picnic area. ULTIQA Air On Broadbeach has air conditioned rooms with an iPod docking station, luxury linen and luxury toiletries. Each provide a private balcony, a refrigerator and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. The resort is conveniently located for sightseeing in Gold Coast, with The Wave and The Oracle only moments away on foot. Gold Coast Convention and Exhibition Centre is a 10-minute walk away.Revato

name: Ocean Pacific Broadbeach
address: 25 Surf Parade, Broadbeach, QLD 4218
description: The Ocean Pacific Resort offers modern self-contained apartments with a private balcony. It features a large outdoor pool, a hot tub and a sauna and is located just metres from Gold Coast beach. All Ocean Pacific apartments are air conditioned and feature a fully equipped kitchen, laundry facilities and a spacious living area. Guests can enjoy a meal with family and friends in the barbecue area. Ocean Pacific Resort is a short walk from patrolled beaches, fine restaurants, shopping centres, and casinos. The Gold Coast Airport is less than 20 km away. Free covered parking is available.

name: Sheraton Grand Mirage Resort, Gold Coast
address: 71 Sea World Drive, Main Beach, QLD 4217
description: Discover a new realm of luxury at Sheraton Grand Mirage Resort, Gold Coast. Ideally situated just minutes from Surfers Paradise Beach on Australia's famed and pristine Gold Coast, our five-star resort is suited for both locals and visitors. With direct beach access and an ideal location across from Marina Mirage, step outside for unexpected seascapes and water activities. Catch evening shows at Home of the Arts and find Sea World one kilometer away. Unwind at a lagoon pool or swim-up bar when you return from the Gold Coast’s biggest theme parks. Your five-star resort room or suite features a refreshing bathroom, smart amenities, high-speed Internet and Signature Sheraton Sleep Experience beds. Those planning events on the Gold Coast have 14 flexible spaces to customize, connect with colleagues and celebrate big moments. Simplify your stay in Australia at our luxury beach resort, Sheraton Grand Mirage Resort, Gold Coast.Marriott

name: The Atrium Resort
address: 510 Marine Parade, Biggera Waters, QLD 4216
description: Featuring magnificent views over the sparkling Broadwater, The Atrium Waterfront Resort is perfectly located on the quieter Northern end of the Gold Coast. Whether you’re spotting our elusive dugong, chasing crabs, building sandcastles, having a swim, strolling or cycling along the waterfront pathways stretching for kilometres in either direction, checking out the nearby Harbour Town Premium Outlet Shopping, newly opened Eat Street dining precinct or the Gold Class Cinemas you can do it all from our fabulous Gold Coast holiday accommodation. The Atrium Waterfront Resort offers self-contained apartments perfect for a Family Holiday, Business trip or romantic weekends away. We have something to suit everybody. Choose from Broadwater view, superior and standard apartments. Or for those looking to maximise their savings our budget apartments are a great option. When you’re not out and about make the most of our onsite facilities, Take in the amazing views from the spectacular Newly refurbished - "Heated" Rooftop Pool & Spa. The roof top also boasts a great Family BBQ area that has 2 Electric BBQ's, tables and Chairs. There is a lovely ground level Pool & Spa (New Sauna is arriving soon!), flood lit tennis court, gym, kids games room and adults billiards lounge. We have an onsite Cafe open for breakfast and lunch (7am-2pm). Everything you could want from your Gold Coast Holiday is close by, we are just a 10 minute drive from the famous Surfers Paradise strip. 15 min from Broadbeach, Pacific Fair and the Casino. Most importantly you can be at any of our world-renowned theme parks in under 20 minutes. We can even book your theme park tickets and many other attractions making your holiday as stress free as possible.

name: Hope Harbour Hotel
address: 11 John Lund Drive, Hope Island, QLD 4212
description: Located in Gold Coast, Ramada by Wyndham Hope Harbour is an easy drive from Warner Bros. Movie World and provides free public parking on site. It has a gym, as well as a sauna, an outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or have a drink at the bar. For a quick and effortless check-in and departure experience, guests can benefit from the express check-in/check-out feature. The 70 air conditioned rooms have living and dining areas. An in-room safe, a refrigerator and a walk-in closet are also available to guests. Ramada by Wyndham Hope Harbour's in-house restaurant, The Pier, is a popular spot to enjoy a meal. For those with day trips planned, the hotel provides packed lunches if required. Gold Coast Airport is just a 40-minute drive from Ramada by Wyndham Hope Harbour, and a shuttle service is provided for those staying at the property. The staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Gold Coast.Revato

name: Oceana On Broadbeach
address: 100 Old Burleigh Road, Broadbeach, QLD 4218
description: Located at the beachfront near Broadbeach, these luxurious apartments have spacious balconies with panoramic views of the ocean. The property is a 5-minute drive from Surfers Paradise. Guests enjoy a spa, fitness centre and a barbecue area with a gazebo. All apartments at Oceana On Broadbeach are self-catering units set in an expansive layout. Each one has modern comforts such as a well-equipped kitchen and laundry facilities. Guests can relax at the elegantly designed lap pool is 30m long. The other pool is 20m long and heated. Oceana On Broadbeach is a 3 minute walk to the Gold Coast Convention and Exhibition Centre.

name: Trilogy Surfers Paradise
address: 21-31 Cypress Avenue Surfers Paradise, Surfers Paradise, QLD 4226
description: Set amongst tropical gardens with a heated outdoor swimming pool, these apartments are only 300 metres from Surfers Paradise Beach and 5 minutes’ walk from shopping, nightlife, restaurants and cafés. Each apartment at Trilogy Surfers Paradise is air-conditioned and features a fully equipped kitchen with granite work surfaces and stainless steel appliances. All units have balconies. Facilities at Trilogy Surfers Paradise Apartments include a covered BBQ area, sauna and spa pool. Guests have access to a fitness centre. Free covered car parking is provided. Seaworld is only a 5-minute drive from Trilogy Apartments Gold Coast. Dreamworld, Movie World and Wet 'n' Wild are within a 25-minute drive.

name: Hi Surf Beachfront Resort Apartments
address: 150 The Esplanade, Surfers Paradise, QLD 4217
description: Located directly opposite Surfers Paradise Beach, Hi Surf Beachfront Apartments feature self-contained accommodation with a private balcony. Guests have access to 2 swimming pools, a tennis court and a hot tub. The modern apartments have laundry facilities and a full kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven. Each apartment has a separate living room with flat-screen cable TV. Most apartments have large balconies and magnificent, uninterrupted, panoramic ocean and beach views. Hi Surf Beachfront Resort Apartments are 5 minutes’ walk from Cavill Avenue, with its many shopping and dining options. Sea World is a 7-minute drive, and Gold Coast Airport is a 30-minute drive away. You can work out in the fitness centre, or relax in the sauna. The property also features a barbecue area, a children’s playground and landscaped gardens with outdoor seating.

name: The Ritz Resort
address: 8 Philip Avenue, Broadbeach, QLD 4218
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a sauna and a full-sized refrigerator/freezer, as well as a stovetop and a dishwasher. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, an electric kettle, and kitchenware and utensils.Expedia

name: The Darling At The Star Gold Coast
address: 1 The Darling Avenue, Broadbeach, QLD 4218
description: Located in Gold Coast, 750 metres from Kurrawa Beach, The Darling at The Star Gold Coast provides accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. Each accommodation at the 5-star hotel has garden views, and guests can enjoy access to a bar and to a casino. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests. Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel each room is fitted with a wardrobe and a private bathroom. The accommodation offers 5-star accommodation with a sauna and terrace. Popular points of interest near The Darling at The Star Gold Coast include Broadbeach, Mermaid Beach and The Star Gold Coast. The nearest airport is Gold Coast Airport, 19 km from the hotel.

name: Sofitel Gold Coast Broadbeach
address: 81 Surf Parade, Broadbeach, QLD 4218
description: A breathtaking 5 star hotel on the Gold Coast, Sofitel Broadbeach has an amazing location just 300m away from the beach. Our Broadbeach accommodation offers the ideal base for both business & leisure travellers. This spectacular luxury Gold Coast hotel is within easy reach of Broadbeach's many restaurants, bars and shops, as well as The Star Casino and Gold Coast Convention & Exhibition Centre. Sofitel Gold Coast Broadbeach is minutes from Surfers Paradise and a short drive away from Gold Coast airport.accorhotels.com

name: Bel Air on Broadbeach
address: 2633 Gold Coast Highway, Broadbeach, QLD 4218
description: Offering a sauna and an infinity pool, Bel Air on Broadbeach is located in Gold Coast and is a short walk from Pacific Fair Shopping Centre. It is conveniently positioned for guests wanting to visit local attractions. There are a variety of amenities at the property that guests can enjoy, such as a kids pool, luggage storage and a gym. There is also free private parking on site for guests travelling with a car. The apartments include air conditioning and feature a private balcony and a kitchen equipped with a dishwasher, a refrigerator and a microwave. Hot drinks can be brewed with the complimentary tea and coffee supplies, and savoured in the comfort of the apartment's living area. Bel Air on Broadbeach has a conveniently located café where guests can unwind with a drink before discovering the area. The property also offers a daily breakfast that can be enjoyed in the dining room, or there is a selection of well-known eateries in the local area to discover. The area surrounding Bel Air on Broadbeach is popular for its shopping. The Wave and Gold Coast Convention and Exhibition Centre are a short stroll away.Revato

name: Mantra Crown Towers
address: 5-19 Palm Avenue, Surfers Paradise, QLD 4217
description: Mantra Crown Towers in Surfers Paradise is an ideal destination for your family holiday on the Gold Coast. Modern 1, 2, and 3 Bedroom Apartments ensure you have the space to relax and unwind before your next action-packed day at Surfers Paradise. Relax by the tropical lagoon pool while the kids have fun and splash about in the kids' pool, complete with its own sandy beach, waterslide, and pirate ship! With plenty to enjoy at the hotel & nearby, you won't want to leave!accorhotels.com

name: Nirvana By The Sea
address: 1 Douglas Street, Coolangatta, QLD 4225
description: Nirvana By The Sea is situated on the white sandy beaches of Kirra Beach, and offers luxurious self-catering apartments with fully equipped kitchens and Pacific Ocean views. The elegant rooms of Nirvana By The Sea are well-equipped with air conditioning and plasma TVs. All the rooms have a balcony where guests can enjoy panoramic views of Queensland’s most famous beach. Guests can relax by the heated outdoor swimming pool, or unwind at the gym with spa and sauna facilities. There is also a private cinema and a sculpted Zen garden with a covered barbecue area. The retail area overlooking the beachfront consists of shops, restaurants and coffee shops. It is only a 5-minute drive to Gold Coast Airport.

name: Mantra Circle On Cavill
address: 9 Ferny Ave, Surfers Paradise, QLD 4217
description: Mantra Circle on Cavill offers luxury, high-rise apartments in a central Surfers Paradise location. Featuring spacious apartments boasting stunning city. Ocean or river views, the hotel offers unparallel facilities including lagoon pool, undercover heated lap pool, stat-of-the-art gymnasium, sauna and steam rooms, in-house theatrette, in-room wireless internet, garden roof terraces, recreation decks and a fabulous retail precinct.accorhotels.com

name: Mantra on View Hotel
address: 22 View Avenue, Surfers Paradise, QLD 4217
description: Offering views of Surfers Paradise and Surfer's Paradise Beach, Mantra on View Hotel is steps from Gold Coast's well-known landmarks. It also provides a ballroom, a coffee bar and free Wi-Fi. Guests can enjoy a range of relaxing treatments and beauty therapy at the in-house spa, Ocean Day Spa. Staff are available 24/7 and can assist with booking tours and tickets. The apartments at Mantra on View Hotel are air-conditioned and include tea and coffee making facilities, blackout curtains and a private balcony. They come with ironing facilities, an alarm clock and a telephone. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal place to have a meal. The property also offers a daily breakfast that can be enjoyed in the breakfast room, or there is a selection of popular eateries in the local area to discover. Gold Coast's attractions, including Soul Building, Cavill Avenue and Circle on Cavill, are within easy walking distance of Mantra on View Hotel. It is also within walking distance of SkyPoint Observation Deck and Q1 Building.Revato

name: Brighton Shores
address: 1 Como Crescent, Southport, QLD 4215
description: Brighton Shores is situated in Gold Coast’s vibrant Southport district, featuring picturesque panoramic views of the Broadwater marina, ocean and hinterland. Brighton shores offers 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments available for short or long-term stay. Oversized apartments feature ducted air conditioning with spacious living areas, private balcony, large kitchen, laundry facilities and satellite TV. Guests also enjoy unlimited Wi-Fi along with secure on-site parking. Most apartments have lovely ocean views. Enjoy your stay with Brighton’s fantastic resort style facilities featuring an outdoor swimming pool and BBQ area, indoor heated lap pool, sauna, spa, billiard room and gymnasium. Woolworth’s supermarket is located just across the road, along with restaurants, cafés, pharmacy, beauty and hairdresser. Australia Fair Shopping Centre is located within 5 minutes’ walk which offers numerous specialty stores and Event cinemas. For added convenience, the Gold Coast Light Rail Tram (G:link) station is located at the buildings doorstep which provides easy transport to Pacific Fair Shopping Centre, Gold Coast restaurants, universities and hospitals.

name: Peppers Broadbeach
address: 21 Elizabeth Avenue, Broadbeach, QLD 4218
description: Luxury accommodation includes one, two and three bedroom suites, elegantly appointed with European appliances, imported stone and exceptional interior design to create a sophisticated backdrop to your stay. Built across Two Towers. Featuring the latest in technology, Set in the heart of Broadbeach, over 100 decadent al fresco restaurants from the globe are on the doorstep of Peppers Broadbeach.accorhotels.com

name: Synergy Broadbeach
address: 2729 Gold Coast Highway, Broadbeach, QLD 4218
description: This modern property in Gold Coast provides free wireless internet, as well as a swimming pool and a sun deck. Only a short walk from The Wave, it offers comfortable apartments equipped with a private balcony, a private bathroom and an in-room dining area. Synergy Broadbeach boasts a variety of leisure amenities, such as a BBQ/picnic area and Outdoor Heated Swimming Pool. There is also free private parking on site for guests travelling with a car. After a day of exploring the nearby area, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned apartments. There are also a number of apartments geared towards families. Gold Coast's attractions, such as The Oracle and Gold Coast Convention and Exhibition Centre, are within easy walking distance of Synergy Broadbeach. Sea World is just an easy car ride from the property.Revato

name: Rhapsody Resort
address: 3440 Surfers Paradise Boulevard, Surfers Paradise, QLD 4217
description: Located just 100 metres from the golden sands of Surfers Paradise Beach, and trackside to the world-famous Gold Coast 600 Supercar race, Rhapsody Resort offers modern and luxurious self-contained accommodation with free WiFi and free parking (subject to availability). Guests can enjoy a leisurely swim in the outdoor pool, or admire the stunning ocean views from the rooftop terrace and BBQ area. All accommodation is air-conditioned and features a fully equipped kitchen, laundry facilities, flat-screen TV, dining area and a bathroom. The apartments also offer an outdoor dining area. If you're reluctant about visiting the fitness centre, perhaps the inspiring views of the Surfers Paradise coastline will inspire your workout. You can treat yourself to a relaxing sauna afterwards. Other facilities at Rhapsody include a tour desk, car hire and airport shuttle. The reception is open 7:00 until 22:00 daily. Cavill Avenue is a 15-minute walk from the property which offers a variety of shopping, dining and entertainment options. The Gold Coast's famous theme parks Warner Bros. Movie World and Wet n' Wild are a 20-minute drive away. Gold Coast Airport is a 40-minute drive.

name: Carmel by the Sea
address: 177 Old Burleigh Road, Broadbeach, QLD 4217
description: Just 400 metres from Broadbeach Mall, Carmel by the Sea features a hot tub and an indoor pool. It is located across Pratten Park and Broadbeach Beach. Free parking is provided. The modern, self-contained apartments come with a full kitchen, en suite bathroom with spa bath, laundry facilities and 8 hours of free Wi-Fi. All apartments have a lounge area with an iPod dock, a DVD player and a flat-screen TV. Guests can enjoy views of the surroundings from their private balcony. Guests can work out in the fitness centre or unwind in the sauna room. The property also has a tennis court, a sun terrace and barbecue facilities. Broadbeach Carmel by the Sea is 3.8 km from Surfers Paradise. Gold Coast Airport is 18 km away.

name: Broadbeach Savannah Resort
address: 46 Surf Parade, Broadbeach, QLD 4218
description: Broadbeach Savannah Resort offers self-catering accommodation just 5 minutes’ walk from Broadbeach. Most apartments have a spa bath and private balcony. The property offers guests access to a swimming pool, fitness centre and sauna. Broadbeach Savannah is just 5 minutes’ walk from the famous Star Casino and the Gold Coast Convention Centre. Coolangatta (Gold Coast) Airport is 25 minutes’ drive. Limited covered parking is available. Free street parking is available. The privately owned and managed apartments come with air conditioning, a well-equipped kitchenette and laundry facilities. Each apartment has cable TV, and most also offer gorgeous ocean views. There are a number of restaurants and cafés within a 3-minute walk.

name: Q1 Resort & Spa
address: 9 Hamilton Avenue, Surfers Paradise, QLD 4217
description: Q1 Resort & Spa’s Skypoint Observation Deck rises 230 metres above Surfers Paradise, with 360° views over the Gold Coast hinterland, Pacific Ocean and Byron Bay. Recreation options include the Q1 Spa, heated lap pool, two lagoon swimming pools, steam and sauna rooms, a well equipped gymnasium, BBQ facilities and even a mini movie theater. Each apartment feature a kitchen with oven, stove top and fridge, laundry facilities and a TV with cable channels. All accommodation features ensuite bathrooms, a spa bath, complementary WiFi as well as access to free on-site parking. Some also offer a balcony or ocean views. Q1 Resort and Spa now offers a Presidential Penthouse, taking up an entire level and boasting a swimming pool, two roof-top balconies, and views of the Pacific Ocean, Gold Coast and beyond. There is a sauna and a private theater with lounges, a TV and surround-sound. There are 4 restaurants on-site, namely Asami Teppanyaki, Skypoint Observation Deck - Bistro & Bar, Longboards Eatery & Bar and Osaka Kaiten Sushi. Limited Chinese speaking staff are available.

name: Artique Surfers Paradise
address: 16-18 Enderley Avenue, Surfers Paradise, QLD 4217
description: Centrally located in Surfers Paradise, just a short 2-minute stroll from the beach, the Artique Resort offers a range of self-catering apartments with free WiFi. Guests at the Artique can enjoy an outdoor swimming pool and sun deck, plus a fitness centre with gym, sauna and steam room. There is also a private movie theatre and golf simulator. The Artique features 176 luxury apartments, split into 1-bedroom and 2-bedroom self-contained units. All of the apartments also feature en suite bathrooms, separate living/dining areas, a private balcony with panoramic views and a well-equipped kitchen with a range of modern appliances. Gold Coast Convention and Exhibition Centre is 6 minutes' drive away while Pacific Fair Shopping Centre is 9 minutes' drive away. Gold Coast Airport is 34 minutes' drive from Artique Surfers Paradise.

name: Wyndham Surfers Paradise
address: 3018 Surfers Paradise Boulevard, Surfers Paradise, QLD 4217
description: With its world-class surf breaks, soft sand and thrill-filled theme parks Australias Gold Coast is a vacation destination for all ages. Wyndham Hotel Surfers Paradise offers easy access to all the family-friendly attractions the area has to offer. Catch an entertaining show experience a dolphin encounter at Sea World Queensland or ride the Super Tubes HydroCoaster and take the Pipeline Plunge at Whitewater World. Experience the Sky Voyager and Shockwave rides at DreamWorld or get up close and personal with native wildlife with the parks Tree Kangaroo Experience. Go diving, snorkeling or whale watching along the breathtaking Great Barrier Reef. The Gold Coast is also home to fantastic shopping and a variety of dining options just a short stroll from the resort. Plan a day exploring the lush hinterland and its charming villages, artisan galleries and antique shops. There are numerous opportunities to learn about the Aboriginal culture of the region through tours and excursions, art and dance workshops and seasonal festivals like the monthly Didgeridoo Jam at Didgeridoo Festivals in Bellbird Park. This resort offers one- and two- bedroom condo-style resort suites that comfortably sleep four to six guests. One- bedroom condo-style resort suites comfortably sleep four guests with one king bed in the private bedroom and a sleeper sofa in the living area. Two-bedroom condo-style resort suites comfortably sleep six guests with one king bed in the master bedroom, two twin beds in the guest bedroom and a sleeper sofa in the living area. You will also appreciate the convenience of separate living/dining areas, laundry facilities and a full kitchen. Stay connected during your stay with Wi-Fi access (fee).iHotelier/iStay

name: Oscar on Main Resort
address: 01 Hughes Avenue, Main Beach, QLD 4217
description: No description found

name: Peppers Soul Surfers Paradise
address: 8 The Esplanade, Surfers Paradise, QLD 4217
description: Enjoy a romantic weekend with uninterrupted ocean views, a family holiday with every comfort, or a luxury escape in one of our Signature Collection Sub-Penthouses. Dine out every night or create culinary delights in your apartment equipped with full kitchen facilities the choice is yours. Peppers Soul offers superb property facilities including luxurious spa, gym and spectacular swimming podium with striking beach viewsaccorhotels.com

name: Royal Pacific Resort
address: 484 Marine Parade, Biggera Waters, QLD 4217
description: No description found

name: Xanadu Main Beach Resort
address: 59 Pacific Street, Clear Island Waters, QLD 4217
description: Located just 200 metres from the beach, Xanadu Resort offers modern apartments with stunning Gold Coast views. It features 2 swimming pools, a hot tub, a sauna and fitness centre. Winner of the 2015 TripAdvisor Travellers Choice Award, each apartment at Xanadu Resort has a spacious balcony overlooking the beach. All include a kitchen with dishwasher and washing machine, and living room with DVD player and cable TV. Internet access can be enjoyed in the apartments. Guests have access to the barbecue area, beautiful landscaped grounds and 2 full-sized tennis courts. Free undercover parking can be reserved. Xanadu Gold Coast is a 15-minute walk from the Marina Mirage shopping centre. Surfers Paradise is 3 km from the hotel. Golf Coast City Gallery is only a 10-minute drive away.

name: QT Gold Coast
address: 7 Staghorn Avenue, Clear Island Waters, QLD 4217
description: • QT Gold Coast has just undergone a complete refurbishment of all 293 guest rooms and suites. Guests will be immersed in beach culture, tales and fashion through furnishing and fabrics, with the bed itself a ‘Queenslander beach house’ style.
