Each room has a strong, refreshed colour palette of bold and contemporary colours; where black and white meets vibrant orange and fresh turquoise. • All rooms include upgraded technology with Dyson bathroom amenities and introduction of the QT tablet direct access to digital guest services. • Luxurious features and amenities with Kevin Murphy bathroom products, designer Missoni bathrobes, and QT Dream Beds. • QT Gold Coast also has a new state-of-the-art gym with Life Fitness smart equipment allowing guests to monitor their activity through their own devices.

name: The Langham, Gold Coast and Jewel Residences
address: 38 Old Burleigh Road, Clear Island Waters, QLD 4217
description: Located in Gold Coast (Surfers Paradise), The Langham, Gold Coast and Jewel Residences is steps from Surfers Paradise Beach and a 2-minute drive from Cavill Avenue. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff.Hotels.com

name: Crystal Bay On The Broadwater
address: 182 Marine Parade, Clear Island Waters, QLD 4215
description: Each of these beautifully appointed 3.5-star apartments features a large private balcony, providing stunning panoramic views of the Broadwater, Stradbroke Island and the Surfers Paradise skyline. Crystal Bay On The Broadwater offers a fully equipped kitchen and laundry in every apartment. Cable TV, free WiFi access and air conditioning are included. Guests have access to a large temperature-controlled swimming pool with spa pool, plus a steam room and sauna. Other leisure facilities include 2 outdoor barbecues and a fitness centre. There is a grassy picnic areas and children's playground opposite the apartments. Restaurants offering a wide variety of cuisines are within 5 minutes’ walk. Overlooking the beautiful Broadwater, Crystal Bay Apartments are 100 metres from the nearest boat ramp. Coolangatta Airport is 40 minutes’ drive away.

name: Sunbird Beach Resort
address: 3540 Main Beach Parade, Main Beach, QLD 4217
description: Sunbird Beach Resort, situated less than 100 metres from the beach, offers apartments with balconies. This family-friendly property features indoor and outdoor swimming pools, fitness centre, a sauna, hot tub and tennis and squash courts. Free unlimited WiFi is provided. All of the self-catered, air-conditioned apartments at Sunbird Beach have a kitchen which includes a dishwasher, microwave, refrigerator and an oven. Each apartment also has a washing machine. Sunbird Resort is a 20-minute walk from Marine Mirage shopping centre. The Warner Bros Movie World and Wet ‘n’ Wild Water World are within 30 minutes’ drive from the hotel. Coolangatta Airport is 24 km away. The hotel has a large terrace with a barbecue and entertainment area. A small complimentary starter pack is provided in our Apartments with Tea, Coffee, Sugar, Milk, Laundry Liquid, Dishwashing liquid, soap, and toilet tissue (1 roll per bathroom). Once these items are used they are not replenished.

name: The Rocks Resort - Official
address: 828 Pacific Parade, Currumbin, QLD 4223
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a sauna and a hydromassage showerhead, as well as a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a dishwasher. Other amenities include towels, table tennis, a portable fan, and a dining area.Expedia

name: Beachcomber Resort - Deluxe Rooms
address: 18 Hanlan Street, Clear Island Waters, QLD 4217
description: Conveniently set in Gold Coast, Beachcomber Resort - Deluxe Rooms provides air-conditioned rooms, an outdoor swimming pool and a terrace. In a prime location in the Surfers Paradise district, this hotel offers a tennis court, as well as a hot tub. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel, rooms are equipped with a balcony with a sea view. Each room includes a kettle and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and free toiletries, while selected rooms are fitted with a kitchen equipped with an oven. At Beachcomber Resort - Deluxe Rooms every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests can relax in the spa and wellness centre, including an indoor pool, a fitness centre and a sauna, or in the garden equipped with BBQ facilities. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Surfers Paradise Beach, Budds Beach and Broadbeach. The nearest airport is Gold Coast Airport, 20 km from Beachcomber Resort - Deluxe Rooms.

name: Anacapri Holiday Resort Apartments
address: 43 Enderley Avenue, Clear Island Waters, QLD 4217
description: This 3-star resort offers free underground-parking, Wi-Fi and well-priced, self-contained apartments situated only a 3-minute walk to beaches at Surfers' Paradise beaches and 10 minutes to Cavill Mall: the heart of Surfers' Paradise. Anacapri Holiday Resort Apartments provides self-catering town houses and apartments with 1, 2, and 3 bedrooms. The apartments features views of Nerang River, Paradise Island and the surrounding area, whilst the townhouse-style apartments overlook the tennis court and tropical gardens. Facilities include a tennis court and heated outdoor swimming pool with a spa pool attached. Guests can relax with a sauna or work out at the fitness centre. For meals, a delivery service from local restaurants is available to all apartments. Menus are available in each apartment. Anacapri Holiday Resort is close to many restaurants, cafés, bars, nightclubs, and shopping of the Gold Coast. Theme parks such as Dreamworld, White Water World, Sea World and golf courses are easily accessible from the Anacapri.

name: Breakfree Acapulco
address: 4 Thornton Street, Clear Island Waters, QLD
description: Kick back and relax on your private balcony as you take in the views from your Gold Coast resort BreakFree Acapulco, with 1 or 2 Bedroom Apartment just moments from the beach, restaurants and shops. There's really no end of things to do with our onsite tour desk to arrange your activities. Make the most of the resort facilities by working up an appetite in the gym, challenge an opponent on the tennis court, cook up a storm in the BBQ area, or take the plunge in one of two heated pools and spas.accorhotels.com

name: Breakfree Royal Harbour
address: 60 Abbott Street, Cairns, QLD 4870
description: Overlooking beautiful Trinity Bay and the massive Cairns Lagoon and surrounding parklands and picnic grounds, BreakFree Royal Harbour is perfectly located to enjoy the best of tropical Cairns accommodation. From the level two pool deck, enjoy cool sea breezes and views of the ocean and Cairns Lagoon or watch the passing parade of vessels coming in and out of the marina from your private balcony.accorhotels.com

name: Crystalbrook Riley
address: 131-141 Esplanade, Cairns, QLD 4870
description: A portfolio of distinctive hotels where differences are applauded. Each hotel and resort carries an authentic expression of its location. Add playful designs, a stimulating environment and a passion for fun and you have a uniquely enriching experience.Synxis

name: Pullman Cairns International
address: 17 Abbott Street, Cairns, QLD 4807
description: Enjoy unique Cairns accommodation in Tropical North Queensland. Swim in the tropical pools, enjoy a relaxing treatment in Vie Spa or dine on the best local seafood & award winning pastry delicacies in Coco's Kitchen + Bar. Located in the heart of Cairns CBD & close to the departure point for daily trips to the Great Barrier Reef & other natural attractions. With 16 floors of spacious hotel rooms, this hotel means business, with 2700 sqm of state of the art meeting, conference & event facilities.accorhotels.com

name: Mantra Trilogy
address: 101 - 105 The Esplanade, Cairns, QLD 4870
description: "Located on The Esplanade overlooking the harbour, Mantra Trilogy offers contemporary comfort close to the Reef Casino, swimming lagoon and reef departure points. Mantra Trilogy offers plenty of opportunity for pure relaxation with onsite facilities including a swimming pool, children's wading area, gymnasium and BBQ facilities. Accommodation options range from modern hotel rooms to spacious self-contained one, two and three-bedroom apartments, many with magnificent water views."accorhotels.com

name: Vision Cairns Esplanade
address: 125-129 The Esplanade, Cairns, QLD 4870
description: Situated on the Cairns Esplanade, this 5 star property features self-contained apartments. Guests enjoy 2 swimming pools, a sauna and a fitness centre. Each apartment features a spacious living room which opens onto a balcony or patio with an outdoor setting. All apartments include a fully equipped kitchen, laundry facilities and satellite TV. Guests can relax on the sun loungers by the pool, surrounded by a lovely palm tree garden. There is a tour desk, massage service and BBQ area available for guest use. Vision Apartments are just 100 metres from restaurants, shops and bars. It is a 5-minute walk from Cairns Reef Fleet Terminal and Cairns Cruise Ship Terminal. Cairns Airport is 7 minutes’ drive away.

name: Drift Palm Cove
address: Cnr Veivers Rd Williams Esp, Palm Cove, QLD 4879
description: Situated in the beautiful beach side village of Palm Cove, these luxuriously appointed apartments offer comfortable accommodation with many overlooking the Coral Sea. The resort offers a stunning lagoon-style pool, manicured tropical gardens, a poolside BBQ area and a fitness centre. Free WiFi access is available in each apartment. Drift Palm Cove is a 2-minute walk from a range of shopping and dining options in Palm Cove. The location allows you to quickly access Daintree Rainforest using the Skyrail. Cairns is just 40 minutes away by bus, which stops right outside the hotel. Each of the apartments is elegantly designed and features climate controlled air-conditioning, a fully equipped kitchen and laundry facilities. Your modern, private bathroom boasts a relaxing walk in shower. All apartments above ground floor are accessible via elevator.

name: Peppers Beach Club & Spa Palm Cove
address: 123 Williams Esplanade, Palm Cove, QLD 4879
description: Your relaxing getaway, the Peppers Beach Club and Spa Palm Cove is an iconic resort comprised of lush green gardens, a rainforest rock pool and signature lagoon pool with sandy beaches. Perfect for a romantic weekend or a relaxing family holiday, wake up to majestic ocean views, a tranquil pool surrounded by lush gardens, or rainforest-clad mountains in stylish Spa Rooms, Suites, Penthouses. Dine on the catch-of-the-day near the Coral Sea, or book a tour to explore world-class attractions.accorhotels.com

name: Hilton Cairns
address: 34 Esplanade, Cairns, QLD 4870
description: Experience a sense of luxury at Hilton Cairns, located on the Cairns Esplanade. Boasting an ideal waterfront location, this property is located less than 300 meters from the Reef Departure Terminal and less than one kilometer from the Cairns Convention Centre. Hilton Cairns offers stylish rooms, all with their own private balcony overlooking mountains, rainforests, Trinity Inlet, and the vibrant city of Cairns. Features at the property include a spa pool and an outdoor lagoon-style pool, where guests can relax and soak up the beautiful weather that Tropical North Queensland has to offer. Guests can enjoy the pool bar, and make use of ample soft seating, deck chairs, and umbrellas around the pool. Following a busy day of sightseeing, relax in our hotel’s lobby bar, Gin Social, and enjoy the convenience of our hotel’s 2 restaurants with water views. The award-winning Mondo on the Waterfront offers a unique al fresco dining experience right on the water’s edge. Try the famous fajitas or treat yourself to a decadent Mondo BBQ. Signature Restaurant offers diners a more refined menu, with local produce and international inspirations. For those looking for the comfort and flexibility of in-room dining, the hotel has an extensive Room Service Menu, as well as a Grab and Go outlet for all your essential minibar items.Hilton

name: Drift Resort 2-bedroom Private Apartment with Ocean View
address: 2 Veivers Road, Palm Cove, QLD 4879
description: Situated in Palm Cove, 1.3 km from Palm Cove Beach, Drift Resort 2-bedroom Private Apartment with Ocean View features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the various facilities of this property are a bar, a spa and wellness centre and barbecue facilities. Every room comes with a balcony. At the resort rooms include air conditioning, a desk, a terrace with a sea view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. The rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a coffee machine. Guests at Drift Resort 2-bedroom Private Apartment with Ocean View will be able to enjoy activities in and around Palm Cove, like hiking and cycling. Clifton Beach is 1.3 km from the accommodation, while Ellis Beach is 2.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cairns Airport, 23 km from Drift Resort 2-bedroom Private Apartment with Ocean View.

name: Shangri-La Sydney
address: 176 Cumberland Street, Sydney, NSW 2000
description: Wake up to breathtaking views of the iconic Sydney Opera House, the Harbour Bridge or Darling Harbour each morning. You will be spoiled for choice at the Shangri-La Hotel, with a day spa, fitness centre and indoor pool at your disposal. The Shangri-la Sydney is located in the historic Rocks area, where Europeans first settled in Australia in 1788. This enviable location is just 5 minutes’ walk from both the Sydney Opera House and the MCA (Museum of Contemporary Art). After a day of sightseeing, you can relax in the bathtub of your lavish marble bathroom. All rooms include free Wi-Fi and an iPod dock, as well as fluffy bathrobes and slippers. CHI, The Spa offers a luxurious escape in its private spa suites, with a range of body treatments and massages on offer. The hotel also offers a hot tub, sauna and sun deck so you can make the most of your stay. The award-winning Altitude Restaurant boasts magnificent views of the harbour and the New York-inspired Blu Bar on 36 is the perfect spot for a creative cocktail.

name: Pinnacles Resort
address: 16 Golden Orchid Drive, Airlie Beach, QLD 4802
description: Pinnacles Resort offers luxury apartments with Coral Sea views, just 300 metres from Airlie Beach town centre. The Port of Airlie is just 900 metres away. All apartments at Pinnacles Resort Whitsundays include an internal spa bath or hot tub, a balcony and stunning views of the Coral Sea. The 1-bedroom apartments have a kitchenette whilst the 2 and 3-bedroom apartments have a fully equipped kitchen. Guests can relax in the 20-metre infinity pool or in sauna, and can work out at the fully equipped fitness centre. Pinnacles Resort is located in the heart of Airlie Beach, the gateway to the Whitsunday Islands. Whitsunday Coast Airport or Proserpine Airport is a 45-minute drive from the resort.

name: The Lookout Resort Noosa
address: 1 Picture Point Crescent, Noosa Heads, QLD 4567
description: Situated on Noosa Hill, these spacious fully self-contained apartments include full kitchen and laundry facilities and private balconies with panoramic views over Laguna Bay and Noosa hinterland, or of the surrounding gardens. Guests at The Lookout Resort enjoy access to a heated swimming pool and spa, gymnasium, as well as secure parking and a BBQ area with poolside seating. Each apartment is air-conditioned and features 2 bathrooms, ironing facilities and a spacious living and dining area with DVD player. All have a private balcony and secure covered car parking. The Lookout Noosa Resort is a 5-minute walk from Hastings Street and Noosa Main Beach. Sunshine Coast Airport is 30 km away.

name: Port Pacific Resort
address: 6-14 Clarence Street, Port Macquarie, NSW 2444
description: Port Pacific Resort is located in the heart of Port Macquarie, a 3-minute walk from Town Beach. It offers a fitness centre and a barbecue area. Free parking is provided on site. Self-contained apartments have a kitchenette with hotplates, a microwave and a dishwasher. Amenities include ironing equipment and a flat-screen TV with DVD player. Each apartment also comes with a private balcony. The property features a heated outdoor pool with shades, and offers both indoor and outdoor hot tubs. Guests enjoy free use of kayaks and sail boards. Laundry and dry cleaning services are offered. Resort Port Pacific is a 3-minute walk from the Glasshouse Regional Gallery and the Port Macquarie Visitor Information Centre. Port Central Shopping Centre and the Hastings River are both a 5-minute walk away. It takes a 15-minute drive to get to Port Macquarie Airport.

name: Rydges Newcastle
address: Wharf Road & Merewether Street, Newcastle, NSW
description: Located directly on the historic Newcastle harbour front, Rydges Newcastle boasts a range of well-appointed guest rooms with spectacular views, plus an on-site restaurant and 25-metre pool, fitness centre located next door to the hotel. Each room includes an ergonomic work space with high-speed internet access (available for an additional fee). All rooms feature a small refrigerator, a separate living room and luxurious en suite bathroom. Enjoy an indulgent meal at Wharf 350 Restaurant, open daily for breakfast, lunch and dinner, renowned for its fresh seafood and dishes prepared from fresh local produce. You can relax in the hotel bar and watch the sunset over Newcastle harbour. Remain active while you travel with the on-site fitness centre with 25-metre private swimming pool. The Hunter Valley is 45 minutes’ drive away, while Newcastle's beaches are just 800 metres away. Rydges Newcastle is just a 25-minute taxi ride from Newcastle Airport and only 100 metres from Civic Light Rail stop. Newcastle Light Rail is available from Newcastle Interchange Train Station.

name: Charlesworth Bay Beach Resort
address: 10 Bay Drive, Coffs Harbour, NSW 2450
description: Just a 10-minute drive from the heart of Coffs Harbour, Charlesworth Bay Beach Resort is located in the beautiful grounds of the Pacific Bay Resort precinct and offers studios, 1-bedroom apartments and a Penthouse, with ocean, lake or mountain views. Guests enjoy direct beach access, 3 heated pools and a spa and wellness centre. Charlesworth Bay Beach Resort is a 3-minute drive from the Big Banana and an 8-minute drive from the Dolphin Marine Conservation Centre. Coffs Harbour Airport is a 15-minute drive away. Full use of an offsite fitness centre is available to all guests, where you can choose from 50 group fitness classes a week including yoga, cycling, boxing, bodypump, and many more. Guest's can also get active with a 9 hole golf course (charges apply), 3 tennis courts and a basketball court located within our resort. You can dine at the onsite restaurant and bar, or take a short walk to Charlesworth Bay, to use the BBQ facilities with family and friends located right next to the beach.

name: Le Méridien Phuket Beach Resort
address: 29 Soi Karon Nui, Tambon Karon, Amphur Muang, Phuket City 83100
description: A luxurious beach getaway like no other awaits you on a secluded cove against a canvas of sand and sea in Thailand. Le Méridien Phuket Beach Resort offers bold new discoveries with top-rated hotel and resort facilities for land and water adventures, a rejuvenating spa, inspired cuisine and forward-thinking services exceeding your wildest desires. The resort's 416 rooms and 54 luxury suites blend the creative and the elemental with authentic Thai accents against a soothing tropical setting. Style coupled with superb amenities allows for a stay of limitless exploration and renewal on the beach. All rooms and suites at our beach resort in Phuket offer unique views, and 67% offer either pool or ocean views.Marriott

name: The Westin Siray Bay Resort & Spa, Phuket
address: 21/4 Moo 1 T.Rasada A.Muang, Phuket City 83000
description: Five-star luxury awaits in Phuket, Thailand at the Westin Siray Bay Resort & Spa, Phuket. Overlooking Siray Bay near Phuket Town, our luxurious Phuket beach resort provides an ideal locale for quiet getaways, romantic holidays and corporate retreats. Find us moments from pristine white-sand beaches and local watersports. Take advantage of our WestinWORKOUT® Fitness Studio, three outdoor pools, the Westin® Kids Club and Heavenly Spa by Westin™. Sample tantalizing cuisine and refreshing beverages at our six Phuket resort restaurants and bars, many of which boast water views. If you are planning an event in Phuket, choose one of our elegant indoor or outdoor venues. Enjoy room amenities like Heavenly® Beds, rainforest showers, spacious desks, free Wi-Fi and LCD televisions. Admire panoramic sea views or relax on a furnished balcony. Select suites and resort villas include plunge pools and generous entertaining spaces. Find your sanctuary on the beach at the Westin Siray Bay Resort & Spa, PhuketMarriott

name: Cape Sienna Gourmet Hotel & Villas (SHA Plus+)
address: 18/40 Moo 6, Nakalay Road, Kamala 83150
description: Located on Kamala Beach, Cape Sienna Phuket Gourmet Hotel & Villas - SHA Extra Plus features stunning sea views. It has 4 dining options, fitness center and an outdoor pool. Wi-Fi and parking are free. Spacious guest rooms feature modern interiors. They are equipped with air conditioning, a private shower room and flat-screen TV. Some rooms are fitted with a spa bathtub. Guests of Cape Sienna Gourmet can dine at the Poolside Bar & Restaurant, which serves both Asian and international dishes. Plum Prime Steak House at the center of your experience is the charcoal oven. Sienna Rocks Cafe serves Italian Coffee specialties, creative sandwiches & salads. Probably the Best ‘Egg Benedict’ and ‘Oeuf a la cocotte with Gruyere’ can be found. Drinks can be sipped while playing a game of snooker at Vanilla Sky Bar & Lounge, which offers views of Kamala Bay. Facilities provided include manicure, pedicure, spa treatment rooms and 2 swimming pools. Travel arrangements can be made at the hotel’s tour desk. Airport shuttle and car rental services are also available. Cape Sienna Phuket Gourmet Hotel & Villas - SHA Extra Plus is a 1-hour flight from Bangkok City, followed by a 40-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. The hotel provides free shuttle services to Kamala Beach.

name: Renaissance Phuket Resort & Spa (SHA Plus+)
address: 555, Moo 3, Mai Khao 83110
description: Indulge yourself at Renaissance Phuket Resort & Spa on Phuket Island, Thailand. Our Phuket beachfront resort offers a variety of on-site restaurants and bars. Sample exquisite Thai cuisine, global comfort food and specialty coffee drinks or sip handcrafted cocktails at our beachfront bar and eatery. Cap off a day at the beach with a rejuvenating massage or wellness treatment at the famous Quan Spa. Maintain your workout at our luxury resort in Phuket's fitness center or swim in our refreshing resort outdoor pool. If you're planning a business, wedding or social gathering in Phuket, host your event in one of our contemporary venues with help from our dedicated planning and catering teams. Retire to a luxury hotel room or beachfront villa that features stylish decor, plush bedding and sleek bathrooms with robes, slippers and deluxe toiletries. Unwind under the warm Phuket sun in tropical resort villas with private plunge pools. Your next great adventure awaits at Renaissance Phuket Resort & Spa.Marriott

name: Hyatt Regency Phuket Resort
address: 16/12 Moo 6, Kamala 83150
description: Nestled along the picturesque Kamala Bay, Hyatt Regency Phuket Resort cascades down a lush tropical hillside, offering a serene and idyllic setting for a seafront getaway. With breathtaking views overlooking the Andaman Sea, our resort provides a tranquil ambiance that invites relaxation and rejuvenation. Featuring 201 spacious and contemporary rooms and suites, each offering private balconies with spectacular sea and sunset views, our resort ensures a memorable stay. Indulge in culinary delights at our three restaurants and bar: Pool House Kitchen, an all-day dining venue with international and Asian cuisine; Mizu, offering a premium Teppanyaki experience; 180 Degrees, a poolside bar with private cabanas and sun loungers; and Casa Boho, a clifftop three-story restaurant and bar with its own entertainment lounge and infinity pool. At Casa Boho, immerse yourself in the bohemian ambiance, witness breathtaking sunsets at Kamala, and indulge in bold Latin American flavors and expertly crafted cocktails. Experience three unique dining options, including a rooftop bar with stunning views of Kamala Bay, poolside dining, and a gaming Den, all set amidst our distinctive boho-style design. Our resort offers a range of recreational facilities, including the Nahm Spa, Camp Hyatt poolside kids club, a dive center with sustainability initiatives, snorkeling and diving at the house reef, a hilltop Regency Club, a 24-hour fitness center with wellness activities, and the largest seafront infinity pool in Phuket. For meetings and events, we provide modern facilities such as White Canvas, the only fully air-conditioned, seafront glass marquee event space in Phuket, offering beautiful sea views.

name: The Boathouse Phuket
address: 182 Koktanode Road, Kata Beach, Karon 83100
description: The Boathouse Phuket is located at Kata on Phuket's west coast. Boasting an outdoor pool, a restaurant, bar and a 24-hour front desk, It provides free WiFi and parking. The Boathouse Phuket come with both guestrooms and suites. Some units feature views of the Andaman Sea. All air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a minibar, an expresso coffee machine as well as tea making facilities. There are also a working desk, a flat screen TV and and en suite bathroom. Guests at this hotel can relax at a swimming pool or engage in water recreations like surfing. The hotel offers beachfront Thai cooking classes and a tour desk. Arrangements can also be made for an airport shuttle, babysitting and dry cleaning. The seafront restaurant, Boathouse, is an award winning restaurant, serving local and international cuisines with matching wine choices from The Boathouse's wine cellar. Boathouse is a 60-minute drive from Phuket Airport and a 20-minute drive from the stunning sunsets at Promthep Cape.

name: Impiana Private Villas Kata Noi
address: 10 Kata Noi Road Moo2, Karon 83100
description: This luxury property in Karon provides complimentary wireless internet, as well as a butler service and 24-hour room service. It offers 5-star accommodation with air-conditioned villas. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or enjoy a drink at the bar. Guests can also enjoy on-site parking. After an eventful day exploring the area, Swasana Spa offers an ideal place to relax with massage services. Villas at Impiana Private Villas Kata Noi are well-appointed and provide superior amenities including a power shower and luxury toiletries. They feature a private balcony, a private terrace and an iPod docking station. In-house dining options include The Living Room, which is a convenient place to enjoy a meal. The property also offers a daily breakfast that can be enjoyed in the dining room, or there is a variety of popular eateries in the area to discover. Impiana is a short stroll from Kata Beach. For guests with a car, parking is available and Phuket Town is within easy driving distance of the property.Revato

name: Keemala (SHA Plus+)
address: Moo 6, Kamala 83150
description: Keemala - SHA Plus is nestled amidst lush flora atop rolling hills overlooking Kamala Village and the Andaman Sea. This resort boasts a spa and wellness centre, soothing massage treatments and a restaurant. Kamala Beach is 2 km away. Guests are provided with free WiFi access throughout the stay. Featuring a private pool, each tastefully unit is complete with multimedia, seating areas and a terrace, which enhances stunning views of the below woodlands and the glittering sea. Complimentary soft drinks and snacks are available in the minibar. En suite bathrooms are all supplied with a bath and free charming toiletries. For added conveniences, Keemala - SHA Plus provides a 24-hour front desk, laundry service and luggage storage. Guests can arrange day trips or ticketings at the on-site tour desk. Guests can also enjoy working out in the fitness centre or getting extra sweats in sauna room. The property is a 5-minute drive from Phuket FantaSea and a 15-minute drive from the bustling nightlife on Bangla Road in Patong. Phuket International Airport can be reached under 19 km from the resort. Open for all-day dining, the in-house restaurant serves Thai and international cuisines prepared from the fine, fresh produce and ingredients. In-room breakfast and special diet menus can be arranged upon arrival.

name: Pullman Phuket Arcadia Karon Beach Resort
address: 333 Patak Road, Karon 83100
description: Pullman Phuket Karon Resort is set in 75 acres of beautiful lush tropical gardens. Set near the Big Buddha and along the golden sands of peaceful Karon Beach, with 8 dining outlets for all tastes, 24 hour fitness center, 3 tennis courts and 2 squash courts for our active guests. With 5 outdoor swimming pools one sporting a water slide for kids, this resort is perfect for families or couples. The large pillar less Grand Ballroom, additional meeting rooms and outside space are perfect for hosting events.accorhotels.com

name: The Shore At Katathani - Adult Only (SHA Extra Plus)
address: 14 Kata Noi Rd., Karon 83100
description: Featuring an infinity pool, The Shore At Katathani - Adult Only SHA Extra Plus is situated in Karon and offers luxury accommodation. Guests also have exclusive access to the Serenity Spa and Fitness centre. The resort has a fitness centre with an infinity pool. Amenities include facial and body treatments, plus free Wi-Fi and an express check-in and check-out feature. The resort also has its very own fitness centre, Sea Pool. The Shore At Katathani - Adult Only SHA Extra Plus has air conditioned rooms with a mini bar, slippers and a coffee maker. They feature an in-room dining area, a flat-screen TV and a refrigerator. To start the day, guests are invited to have breakfast at The Shore At Katathani - Adult Only SHA Extra Plus's on-site restaurants, then later sit down to international dishes at The Harbor or Thai cuisine at Param Para. Eateries at the resort include The Nest Beach Club and Romantic in Villa. A selection of dining options are also available in the surrounding area. The Shore At Katathani - Adult Only SHA Extra Plus has easy access to Kata Beach and Kata Viewpoint. Guests are able to visit Rawai and Patong, situated within an easy drive of the property.Revato

name: The Surin Phuket (SHA Plus+)
address: 118 Moo 3 Pansea Beach, Choeng Thale 83110
description: The Surin Phuket offers a tropical getaway on Pansea Beach’s white sands. This beachfront property offers cottage-style accommodation surrounded by coconut trees. It features an outdoor pool and a spa. Guests enjoy free welcome drink and complimentary use of non-motorized sport facilities. Our hotel’s design is classy and elegant. Built into the tropical bay and verdant environment, while no elevators are installed, guests can appreciate the nature through a series of stairs and walkways that connect the resort Patong’s vibrant nightlife is a 30-minute drive from the hotel. Phuket Town is a 40-minute drive away. Rooms come with spacious outdoor lounge areas with garden and beach views. Amenities include a satellite TV. Guests can try various water sports. The sundeck on the beach offers a beautiful view of the Andaman Sea, especially at sunset. The hotel’s dining outlets offer Thai, Western and Asian menus. Barbecue and seafood specialities are also available.

name: Wyndham Grand Phuket Kalim Bay (SHA Plus+)
description: Nestled on the edge of cliff with sweeping views of the Andaman Sea, Wyndham Grand Phuket Kalim Bay is a 5-star resort with an outdoor swimming pool, sauna and an on-site restaurant. Families with children can enjoy afternoon at the Kid's Zone while adults can relax at the sauna. The 194 non-smoking guest rooms are well-appointed with modern amenities and comfort. They include a flat-screen TV, a minibar and an in-room safe. A bathtub or shower, along with free toiletries, can be found in the en suite bathrooms. Spacious suites with a private pool on the terrace are also available. A variety of cuisines, cocktails and other refreshments can be sampled at the restaurant and bar. Fresh coffee and refreshing drinks can be enjoyed at the cafe. The centre of Patong, which includes the famous nightlife on Bangla Road and the shopping paradise of Jungceylon Shopping Centre, is a 10-minute drive away. Kamala Beach is 4 km away. Phuket International Airport is a 50-minute drive from Wyndham Grand Phuket Kalim Bay and airport transfers can be arranged for an additional fee.

name: Amatara Welleisure Resort - Sha Extra Plus
address: 84 Moo 8 Sakdidej Road, Wichit 83000
description: Amatara Welleisure Resort presents a timelessly fresh, effortlessly Thai and bespoke resort experience, and features one of South-east Asias best ocean-view spa and wellness facilities. With a personality all of its own and benefitting from one of the regions most incredible locations, Amatara Wellness Resort offers an unrivalled way to explore and enjoy Southern Thailand, an endlessly popular and world renowned leisure and tourism destination.iHotelier/iStay

name: Bandara Villas, Phuket (Sha Plus+)
address: 96 Moo 8, Wichit 83000
description: Located on Panwa Beach and 2.5 km from Panwa Cape, Bandara Villas, Phuket offers private villas with sea views. Most of the villas here boast a private pool, while some come with a shared infinity pool. This property features a restaurant and a fitness centre. During the stay, guests have access to free WiFi. Within a short drive, guests can find Phuket Aquarium (2.1 km), Khaokhad View Tower (2.5 km) and Chalong Bay (5.17 km). For outdoor enthusiasts, head to Phuket Shooting Range (6.50 km). Phuket International Airport is located 34 km from the property. Offering sea and pool view through the glass wall, each villa is complete with a flat-screen TV, a DVD player and a sofa set. A terrace with outdoor furniture is available. Featuring a shower, en suites bathroom are equipped with a bathtub, a hairdryer and free toiletries. At Bandara Villas, guests can make use of the shuttle service from or to the airport at additional costs. For the guests' additional convenience, the property provides room service. The on-site restaurant serves local and international cuisine, whilst the bar can cater for fine selection of specials cocktails and drinks.

name: Pacific Club Resort
address: 16 Patak Soi 24, Karon Beach, Karon 83100
description: Perched upon a hilltop and only a 10-minute walk from Karon Beach, the uniquely-designed boutique Pacific Club Resort - SHA Extra Plus offers spectacular views and spacious accommodation with private balcony. Free WiFi is accessible in the entire premises. Pacific Club Resort - SHA Extra Plus is a 10-minute drive to Patong Beach and a 5-minute drive to Kata Beach. Phuket International Airport is a 1-hr drive away. Featuring Tuscan Travertine bathrooms made with real travertine and granite, all rooms come with air-conditioning, a flat-screen cable TV and a safety deposit box. The property has an electronic locking system for guests' safety. Select rooms have well-equipped kitchenettes and private living and dining areas. The swimming pool at Pacific Club Karon Beach Resort offers a 360-degree view of Karon Beach. Guests can relax in the spa bath and enjoy massages and body treatments at the spa. The hotel also provides a well-equipped gym. The Dining Room restaurant offers an international menu for the convenience of guests.The delectable cuisine can be served anywhere in the resort.

name: The Naka Phuket (SHA Plus+)
description: The Naka Phuket -SHA Plus Certified is a 10-minute ride from the white sands of Patong Beach and various entertainment options. Offering unique-designed villas with private balconies, the property also boasts an outdoor pool and a restaurant. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the residence. Phuket Town is approximately a 20-minute drive from The Naka Phuket -SHA Plus Certified. A 40-minute drive takes guests to Phuket International Airport. Stylish villas are tastefully decorated and offer modern facilities such as a flat-screen cable TV, a refrigerator and a safety box. En suite bathrooms come with a bathtub and shower facilities. Guests of The Naka Phuket -SHA Plus Certified can laze by the pool or enjoy pampering massage treatments at the spa. For convenience, the residence offers a 24-hour front desk, a tour desk and meeting facilities. For meals, sample a variety of both Thai and international cuisines served at The Wiwa, an all-day dining restaurant located just 5 steps away from the beach. With particular views of the sea and the sunset, The Nana offers refreshing beverages until late night. The Meka provides guests with a wide range of healthy dishes and drinks.

name: Phuket Marriott Resort & Spa, Merlin Beach (Sha Plus+)
address: 99 Muen-Ngoen Road, Tri-Trang Beach, Patong 83150
description: Plan a luxury escape to Phuket Marriott Resort & Spa, Merlin Beach. Whether you’re visiting Thailand for a family holiday, couple’s getaway or business trip, our five-star resort in Phuket’s location on the sands of Tri-Trang Beach provides a spectacular backdrop. Stay minutes from the entertainment hub of Patong Beach and Phuket Old Town. Take advantage of family-friendly resort amenities, including a 24 hour fitness center, three pools, children's activities and a day spa. Relax at our swim-up bar and sample delicious cuisine at one of the ten restaurants and bars at our Phuket, Thailand, resort. If you're hosting a meeting, choose from over 8,000 square feet of event space, including poolside and beachside settings and one of the largest ballrooms in Phuket. Unwind in rooms and suites featuring plush bedding, flat-screen TVs, mini-refrigerators, work desks, free Wi-Fi and private balconies with pool, garden, beach or sea views. A sophisticated stay awaits at Phuket Marriott Resort & Spa, Merlin BeachMarriott

name: Marriott's Phuket Beach Club (SHA Plus+)
address: 230, 232 Moo 3, Maikhao, Talang, Mai Khao 83110
description: Marriott's Phuket Beach Club welcomes you to Thailand with contemporary comfort and style. Our family-friendly vacation ownership resort is ideal for relaxation, with a great location on Phuket Island and full access to all the luxurious facilities at the adjacent JW Marriott Phuket Resort and Spa. Explore the area from our beachside resort, where we place you minutes from notable attractions and the pristine sands of Mai Khao Beach. Relax with your family by one of the resort pools or break a sweat in the on-site fitness center before spoiling yourself with a spa treatment or drink at the beachfront bar. Satisfy your appetite at our resort's array of restaurants, including a modern steakhouse, Japanese fare and an Italian eatery with pizza delivery. Our spacious two-bedroom apartments feature complimentary Wi-Fi, full kitchens, master suites with soaking tubs, washers, dryers and furnished balconies so you can spread out during your time in Thailand. Your dream getaway awaits at Marriott's Phuket Beach Club.Marriott

name: Avista Grande Phuket Karon - MGallery (Sha Plus+)
address: 38 Soi Luang Phor Chuan Soi 1, Phuket City 83100
description: Experience the enchantment of Phuket's Sino-Portuguese past just steps from Karon Beach. Our 5-star boutique resort offers 159 spacious rooms and suites, starting at 53sqm, with mountain, pool, or sea views and modern design inspired by the island's tin-mining heritage. Indulge in suites with direct pool access or a private whirlpool bath on the terrace.accorhotels.com

name: Zenmaya Oceanfront Phuket, Trademark Collection by Wyndham
address: 6/181 Moo 6, Kamala 83150
description: Thank you for choosing our Wyndham hotel. Wyndham Hotels and Resorts® is an upscale, full-service brand with properties located in key business and vacation destinations across the world.  It offers the comfort and amenities you would expect in a world-class hotel, including beautifully appointed public areas, thoughtfully detailed guestrooms and distinct dining options. Business locations feature meeting space flexible for large and small meetings, as well as business centers and fitness centers. Many resorts offer golf, tennis, beautiful beaches, spas and more.Wyndham

name: Novotel Phuket Kamala Beach (Sha Plus+)
address: 118/16 Moo 3, Kamala 83150
description: Located on Kamala Beach, Novotel Phuket Kamala Beachis a 3-minute drive from Phuket FantaSea. Offering modern air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony, the hotel is equipped with a spa, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. Situated in the quiet end of the beach, the hotel is only a 3-minute drive from Kamala Village and a 15-minute drive from Patong Beach. Phuket International Airport is a 30-minute drive away. Rooms at Novotel Phuket Kamala Beachare fitted with a flat-screen cable TV, a minibar and a safety deposit box. An electric kettle and a hairdryer are provided. An en suite bathroom comes with free toiletries and shower facilities. Children can enjoy different activities at Kid’s Club. The hotel features a business centre, a 24-hour front desk and concierge service. It also provides luggage storage facilities and currency exchange service. International dishes (Western, Thai and Indian) are served at Soul Kitchen. Drinks can be order at The Bar or at the swim up bar called Lilo. For light snacks and cocktails, guests can head to On the Roof Bar. Room service can be arranged upon request.

name: Sugar Palm Grand Hillside Hotel (SHA Plus+)
address: 1 Khoktanod Soi 3, Karon 83100
description: Situated in Karon, Sugar Palm Grand Hillside Hotel SHA Plus+ provides modern 4-star accommodation, as well as an infinity pool, a sauna and a rooftop terrace. The multiple facilities this contemporary hotel has to offer include fitness classes, massage services and a 24-hour reception. There are a range of amenities available to guests of Sugar Palm Grand Hillside Hotel SHA Plus+, such as luggage storage, porters and a tour desk. Airport transfers, a laundry service and a wake-up service are available on request. The rooms are air conditioned and feature a mini bar, a private balcony and a coffee maker. Each has a bathroom that has bathrobes and a rain shower. 7th HEAVEN Sky Bar is a relaxed place at Sugar Palm Grand Hillside Hotel SHA Plus+ to relax with a beverage before dinner. A wide choice of eating options can also be found in the area. The hotel is just a stone's throw from Kata Beach and within a 10-minute car trip from Karon Beach. Guests can also visit Kata Noi Beach and Kata Day Spa.Revato

name: Sri Panwa Phuket Luxury Pool Villa Hotel (Sha Plus+)
address: 88 Moo 8, Sakdidej Road, Wichit 83000
description: Sri panwa enjoys an idyllic setting within 40 acres of lush tropical rain forest, perched high atop Cape Panwa. With each private pool villa carefully designed to showcase the true beauty of its coastal environment, this secluded resort has been hailed as one of Thailands greatest venues, situated 40 - 60 meters above the sea level, commanding breathtaking views of the surrounding Phuket islands and Andaman Sea.All the luxurious pool villas offer panoramic ocean views, while some boast full and uninterrupted 300-degree ocean views, a total of 52-pool villas range from one to five bedrooms. The interiors embrace the essence of Tropical Contemporary design by integrating its natural jungle and ocean surroundings with the modern comforts of luxury living.Services and facilities include a panoramic sea-view Beach Pool set just over Sri panwas beach, gym & fitness facilities, play room, business center & library, steam rooms, tennis courts, Cool Spa, Baba Dining Lounge and Baba Poolclub.iHotelier/iStay

name: Paresa Resort Phuket (Sha Plus+)
address: 49 Moo 6, Layi-nakalay Rd., Kamala 83150
description: Treating guests to a superb infinity pool overlooking the sea, Paresa Resort Phuket SHA Plus+ is located in Kamala and features a plunge pool. It offers 5-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. Guests of the resort can start their day at The Spa by Paresa, or enjoy the various leisure facilities, including fitness classes. Complimentary Wi-Fi is available for those guests wishing to stay online while travelling. There is also free public parking on site for those travelling with a car. Each room is well-equipped to make guests comfortable and has a private balcony, a marble bathroom and direct pool access. They all have a pillow menu, an in-room dining area and a private terrace. Large windows provide panoramic views over the sea. Serving local cuisine, Paresa Resort Phuket SHA Plus+'s restaurant offers a romantic setting for a satisfying meal. Room service is also available during certain times. Phuket International Airport is less than a 45-minute drive from the resort. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Kamala.Revato

name: Ayara Kamala Resort & Spa (Sha Plus+)
address: 22/10 Moo 6, Layi-nakalay Road, Kamala 83150
description: Boasting stunning views of the Andaman Sea from stylish rooms, Ayara Kamala Resort offers luxurious stays with a first-rate spa and 5-star fitness facilities. It provides free Wi-Fi and parking. Ayara Kamala Resort & Spa occupies a prime hilltop location overlooking scenic Kamala Bay. Offering airport transfer service and a free beach shuttle, it is a 35-minute drive from Phuket International Aiport. Featuring spacious interiors, modern Thai-style rooms at Ayara Kamala feature light wood flooring and furnishings. They come with a comfortable seating area, a flat-screen TV and large bathroom with a bathtub. Relax at the sauna or with a soothing Thai massage after an active workout at the tennis courts. Other leisure options include a well-equipped fitness centre and water sport activities. Enjoy sunset views and a spread of international and Thai dishes at Ayara’s restaurant. Meals can also be served in rooms.

name: Phuket Marriott Resort and Spa, Nai Yang Beach (SHA Plus+)
address: 92, 92/1 Moo 3, Tambol Sakoo, Amphur, Talang, Phuket City 83110
description: Expect the ultimate comfort at Phuket Marriott Resort and Spa, Nai Yang Beach. Ideal for families, couples and business travelers, our Nai Yang beach resort inspires relaxation with beachfront rooms and private villas, each featuring plush bedding, marble bathrooms, mini-refrigerators, flat-panel TVs and complimentary Wi-Fi. Elevate your stay in a scenic beach villa with a private garden and a 400-meter pool. Relax on our resort's private beach or try out the exciting water activities at Yacht Haven and Royal Phuket Marinas. Reserve one of our dynamic meeting venues, enhanced by cutting-edge AV services, custom catering and skilled event planners. End your day in Phuket, Thailand, with a swim in our lagoon pool, a rejuvenating treatment at our resort spa or delectable fare and creative cocktails at our restaurants and bar. Set on the sands of Nai Yang Beach, minutes from Phuket International Airport, our scenic resort offers guests a serene haven in one of the world's most beautiful destinations.Marriott

name: Anantara Layan Phuket Resort (Sha Plus+)
address: 168 Moo 6, Layan Beach Soi 4, Choeng Thale 83110
description: This modern hotel in Thalang provides free wireless internet, as well as a butler service and a saltwater swimming pool. A swimming pool and a limousine service are just some of the deluxe amenities on offer to guests during their stay. Guests can make the most of the sun on the terrace or enjoy a beverage at the pool bar. There is an in-house day spa to relax at, which features a beauty centre and a sauna, as well as a range of body treatments. The hotel also has its very own gym, Lakeside Pool. The rooms are air conditioned and include slippers, a mini bar and an in-room dining area. All offer an in-room safe, a ceiling fan and a seating area. Guests of Anantara Layan Phuket Resort SHA Plus+ are invited to sample Thai and local cuisine at Dee Plee, or try Japanese dishes at Zuma Pop-up Restaurant. Room service is also available any time of the day. Anantara Layan Phuket Resort SHA Plus+ offers free private parking on site for guests with a car. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book tours and sightseeing trips in Thalang.Revato

name: Pullman Phuket Arcadia Naithon Beach (Sha Plus+)
address: 22/2 Moo 4, Sakhu 83110
description: "Located just 12 minutes from Phuket International Airport, this Phuket resort commands panoramic views of the Andaman Sea, a peaceful paradise offering ultimate privacy. Pullman Phuket Arcadia Naithon Beach Hotel is situated on Naithon Beach and surrounded by Sirinat National Park, a beautiful harmony of nature and 5-star luxuries. Lounge by one of our two pools, or pamper yourself at the hotel's award-winning Spa. Dine at our restaurants, bars and deli offering a fusion of Thai and Western cuisine. "accorhotels.com

name: Katathani Phuket Beach Resort (SHA Extra Plus)
address: 14 Kata Noi Road, Karon 83100
description: Restful beach holidays await at the award-winning Katathani Phuket, with 6 pools and 6 dining options. Located across from Kata Beach, it features a first-rate spa and tennis courts. Featuring private balconies overlooking landscaped grounds, Katathani’s spacious rooms are fitted with Thai-style furnishings and wooden flooring. Each comes with cable TV and a glass-walled bathroom. Enjoy soothing massages and treatments at Tew Son Spa after an active workout at either of the 2 fitness centres. Other leisure options include water sport facilities, a games room and library. Offering international fare, the 6 dining options at Katathani Phuket range from casual beachside barbecues to fine dining. It features a range of cuisines including traditional Thai, authentic Italian, fresh seafood and oven-baked pizzas. For drinks and small bites, guests can head over to any of the 5 on-site bars.The resort also provides a 24-hour room service and conducts cooking lessons. Katathani Beach Resort is an hour’s drive from Phuket International Airport and a 15-minute walk from entertainment spots. Shuttle services to Phuket Town and Patong Beach are available.

name: JW Marriott Phuket Resort & Spa (SHA Plus+)
address: 231 Moo 3, Mai Khao 83110
description: Plan an unforgettable escape to our Phuket, Thailand beach hotel. JW Marriott Phuket Resort & Spa is a 5-star, family-friendly resort just steps from Mai Khao Beach. From our beachfront resort in Phuket, Thailand, enjoy easy access to the islands of Phang Nga Bay, Old Town Phuket and the Royal Phuket Marina. Resort guests are treated to an award-winning spa, three outdoor pools, a modern fitness center and activities such as Thai cooking classes. Plan your special occasion in our beachfront hotel in Phuket, Thailand's indoor and outdoor venues with advanced technology, custom catering and dedicated event planners. Relax in family-friendly hotel rooms, suites and villas filled with five-star amenities like plush bedding, marble bathrooms, 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi and outdoor space overlooking tropical gardens or the ocean. Select resort rooms have whirlpool tubs, extra living space and private pools. Create lasting memories at JW Marriott Phuket Resort & Spa in Thailand.Marriott

name: V Villas Phuket - MGallery (Sha Plus+)
address: Moo 8 Ao Yon Road Vichit Muang, Phuket City 83000
description: Located 39 metres above pristine and secluded Ao Yon Bay and immersed into nature, an exclusive pool villas resort with 24 hours butler service, European and Thai Coastal cuisine, world-class rooftop bar with panoramic view as well as Spa & wellness program. V Villas Phuket offers guest unparalleled privacy and indulgence.accorhotels.com

name: Pullman Phuket Panwa Beach Resort (Sha Plus+)
address: 44/5 Moo 8 Sakdidesh Road, Wichit 83000
description: Nestled on the picturesque shores of Markham Bay, the resort offers sweeping views of the Andaman Sea. With the airport just 45 minutes away and 20 minute-drive to Phuket Town, the hotel is ideally located to explore the many attractions on Phuket island.accorhotels.com

name: The Vijitt Resort Phuket (SHA Plus+)
address: 16 Moo 2, Viset Road, Rawai 83130
description: Made up of spacious stand-alone Thai villas besides the sea, The Vijitt Resort Phuket - SHA Extra Plus provides free WiFi and a beach-facing infinity pool. A free scheduled shuttle to Phuket Town is provided. Located on Friendship Beach (Tidal Beach) in Rawai, the resort stretches over 18 acres and presents panoramic views of Chalong Bay, Cape Panwa and Coral Islands. It is less than 6 km from Kata View Point and Chalong Beach. Beautifully decorated in teak wood furnishings, the air-conditioned villas are equipped with a flat-screen TV.The large en suite bathroom has a bathtub and bathrobes. Private treatment rooms and relaxing massage therapies can be enjoyed at the spa. Guests can also exercise at the gym or arrange island day trips at the tour desk. An international breakfast is served daily at The Savoury, while traditional Thai cuisine can be enjoyed at Baan Vijitt. Premium wine from The Wine Cellar can accompany any meal. Throughout the day, light refreshments are available at The Beach Bar.

name: Hotel Ikon Phuket
address: 400/2 Patak Road, Karon 83100
description: Situated on a hillside, Hotel IKON Phuket offers spacious rooms with free WiFi and views of Karon Beach and surrounding greenery. It features massages, an outdoor pool and free parking. Hotel IKON Phuket is a 15-minute walk from the white sands of Karon Beach and the shopping and dining options in the neighbourhood. It is a 10-minute drive from Patong Beach and an hour’s drive from Phuket International Airport. World-class golf courses are within a 20-minute drive. Spacious rooms feature a private balcony with ocean or mountain views. They are fitted with air conditioning, cable TV and a safe. A minibar and hairdryer are also provided. The hotel provides car and bicycle rental. A tour desk with ticket service helps with travel arrangements. Airport transfer is also available. IKON Café offers a buffet line of Thai and European dishes, while Ombre Restaurant, which also has an outdoor seating area, serves a la carte Thai and European cuisines.

name: SAii Laguna Phuket (SHA Plus+)
address: Laguna Phuket, 323 Moo 2, Choeng Thale 83110
description: SAii Laguna Phuket is located on Bangtao Beach. It offers rooms with a private balcony and free Wi-Fi. The resort is an outdoor pool and fitness centre. A kid’s club and babysitting service are available. The property is a 20-minute drive to Patong Beach and Phuket International Airport. It is a 25-minute drive to Phuket Town. For Club, Suite and Villa room types, Club Lounge Access with VIP check-in, gourmet breakfast and afternoon snack, happy hour with beer and wine including chef's tasting menu is included. Rooms feature a flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and a safety deposit box. It also has a coffee maker and a hairdryer. A bathtub is included in an en suite bathroom. Guests can arrange daytrips at the tour desk while staff at the 24-hour front desk can assist guests with luggage storage and shuttle service. The hotel is equipped with a business centre and meeting facilities.

name: The Naka Island, a Luxury Collection Resort & Spa, Phuket (SHA Plus+)
address: 32 Moo 5, Phuket City 83110
description: Escape to a hidden paradise. The Naka Island, a Luxury Collection Resort & Spa, Phuket is tucked off the east coast of Thailand and offers unsurpassed privacy in the Andaman Sea as the only property on Phuket Island. Journey to our oceanfront beach resort in Phuket by a short speedboat ride and immerse in enchanting coconut groves, beaches and limestone cliffs. Unwind with a cocktail at waterfront Z Bar or the unexpected flavors at our three beachside restaurants. Luxuriate at Spa Naka with a revitalizing massage, facial or wellness service, and stay active with daily hotel happenings, eco-friendly experiences such as planting mangrove trees or fitness center with Technogym® equipment. In your hotel room, suite or villa, discover the same level of refinement and attention to detail. Accommodations are distinct and radiant, boasting scenic views of the garden, sea, beach or terrace. Together with our vacation packages, curate an unforgettable stay at The Naka Island, a Luxury Collection Resort & Spa, Phuket.Marriott

name: Baan Karonburi Resort (SHA Plus+)
address: 194/1 Karon Road, Karon 83100
description: A beachfront property on Karon Beach, Baan Karonburi Resort combines Siamese architecture and modern interiors. Some of its rooms enjoy direct access to the outdoor pool. Free WiFi is provided. Baan Karonburi’s spacious rooms feature dark wood furnishings and private balconies. Each air-conditioned room has satellite TV, a safety deposit box, and a fridge with minibar. The bathrooms are fitted with a bathtub and overhead shower. Guests can enjoy a traditional Thai massage, or exercise in the fitness room. The resort also has a children’s pool and a sun deck. For guests’ convenience, it has a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. Overlooking the Andaman Sea, Lai Thai Restaurant & Bar serves Thai, European and seafood specialities. Drinks, including cocktails, are available. Alternatively, guests can order room service.

name: Mövenpick Resort Bangtao Beach Phuket (Sha Plus+)
address: 35 Moo 4, Choeng Thale 83110
description: Here the best of classic Thai and contemporary designs blends in 40 inviting residences. Our bright and breezy accommodation offers living and dining areas, fully-equipped kitchens and over-sized balconies for the ultimate blissful experience. Located a few steps away from Bangtao Beach, this exclusive luxury resort of penthouses and suites treats you to unparalleled relaxation. Experience soothing treatments at Blossom Spa, relax in the pool, or walk along the endless, white Thai sands of Bangtao Beachaccorhotels.com

name: Andaman Beach Suites Hotel
address: 60/12 Rat-Uthit Song Roi Pee Road, Patong 83150
description: Located 150 metres from Patong Beach, Andaman Beach Suites Hotel overlooks the Andaman Sea and features a swimming pool. Some rooms offer views of the sea. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. Jungceylon Shopping Centre and the vibrant Bangla Road are a 15-minute walk away from Beach Suites Hotel. Phuket International Airport is a 45-minute drive away. Rooms feature classic wooden furnishings and come with a safety deposit box and tea and coffee-making facilities. Attached bathrooms come with shower facilities. Guests can enjoy a session in the sauna. A tennis court and fitness centre are available. There is a children’s playroom for little ones, and an internet corner for guests’ convenience. Suites Restaurant offers a variety of Thai and international cuisines. Drinks are served at The Poolside Snack Corner and at Lobby Bar.

name: Dinso Resort & Villas Phuket, Vignette Collection, an IHG Hotel
address: 117 Nanai Road, Patong 83150
description: A 10-min ride from Phuket Patong Beach, reconnect your senses and rediscover the delights of barefoot luxury travel. Be reinvigorated by the perfect balance of subdued, austere beauty and rustic charm. Dinso Resort & Villas is your place to escape and discover Phuket at your own pace. From local breakfast to indulgent wellness experiences, lose yourself to everything Thailand has to offer. Simplicity, tranquillity and naturalness, experience Dinso Resort & Villas, tucked away in nature and inspired by the Wabi-Sabi philosophy.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Mangosteen Ayurveda & Wellness Resort (SHA Plus+)
address: 99/4 Moo 7, Soi Mangosteen, Rawai 83130
description: Overlooking the Andaman Sea, Mangosteen Ayurveda & Wellness Resort - SHA Plus offers relaxing stays set on a peaceful hillside. It boasts a 680m² outdoor pool with a jetted pool, spa and free shuttles to Nai Harn Beach. Mangosteen Ayurveda & Wellness Resort - SHA Plus is a 15-minute drive from Kata Beach and a 50-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Surrounded by tropical greenery, spacious villa-style rooms feature a private balcony and outdoor rain showers. They have free WiFi and a sofa at the seating area. Guests can get a good workout at the well-equipped gym or enjoy relaxing massages at Ayurveda Destination Spa. Other facilities include a tour desk, gift shop and library. Boasting stunning sea views, the property's restaurant serves Thai Mediterranean specialities in a casual setting. There is also a wine cellar.

name: Sunset Beach Resort
address: 316/2 Phrabaramee Road, Patong 83150
description: Featuring a spa with massage services and an outdoor spa pool, Sunset Beach Resort - SHA Extra Plus Certified provides a quiet getaway along Patong Beach. The resort offers 1 restaurant and 3 bars. Resort Sunset Beach provides a free shuttle service to Patong Town, 2.5 km away. Phuket International Airport is a 45-minute drive away. Spacious rooms at Sunset Resort offer balconies with outdoor seating areas. A TV with cable channels and tea/coffee makers are provided. Guests can work out in the well-equipped fitness centre. Sightseeing arrangements and car rental services are available at the tour desk while a business centre takes care of guests’ communication needs. Sea & Sun Restaurant offers traditional Thai and European cuisine. The restaurant also serves an American buffet breakfast daily. The Rock Bar serves light snacks and beverages and offers views of the pool. Guests can also enjoy the drinks at the pool bar.

name: Karon Phunaka Resort
address: 22/1 Soi Patak 22, Karon 83100
description: Occupying a prime location on Naka Mountain, Karon Phunaka Resort offers panoramic ocean and forest views. Wi-Fi, parking and shuttle service to Karon Beach are provided for free. Enjoy stunning views of the ocean from the comfort of private balconies. Pleasantly furnished with warm colours, each room comes with a flat-screen cable TV, a fridge and safe. Karon Phunaka’s outdoor infinity pool provides an ideal place for relaxation. Regular workouts can be maintained at the fitness centre and squash courts. Cool sea breezes accompany Thai specialities at Resort Karon Phunaka’s open air restaurant. Meals can also be served in rooms. Karon Phunaka Resort is a 10-minute drive from the nightlife on Patong Beach. Karon Beach is a 15-minute walk away. It is a 50-minute drive from Phuket International Airport.

name: Mida Grande Resort Phuket
address: 179/450 Had Surin Soi 4, Moo 3, Phuket City 83110
description: Set in Surin Beach, 1.4 km from Surin Beach, Mida Grande Resort Phuket SHA Plus offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a kids' club and a shared lounge, along with free WiFi. The hotel features a terrace and a 24-hour front desk. At the hotel every room has air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Mida Grande Resort Phuket SHA Plus rooms include bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes American, Asian and halal options. Pansea Beach is 1.8 km from the accommodation, while Bang Tao Beach is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 21 km from Mida Grande Resort Phuket SHA Plus.

name: Rak Elegant Hotel Patong
address: 45 Thanon Nanai, Patong 83150
description: Set in Patong Beach, 1.4 km from Patong Beach, Rak Elegant Hotel Patong - SHA Extra Plus offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Offering a restaurant, the property also has a shared lounge, as well as a sauna and a hot tub. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Some rooms also offer a kitchenette with a microwave and a stovetop. At Rak Elegant Hotel Patong - SHA Extra Plus all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, American or Asian options. The accommodation offers a terrace. Kalim Beach is 2.8 km from Rak Elegant Hotel Patong - SHA Extra Plus, while Patong Boxing Stadium is 600 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 35 km from the hotel.

name: Intercontinental Phuket Resort, An IHG Hotel
address: Moo 3, Kamala Sub-district,Kamala Beach, Phuket City 83150
description: Nestled on the powder-soft sands of Kamala Beach, InterContinental® Phuket Resort is a sleek, sophisticated, and elegant beachside hideaway. The resort is cocooned by jungle-covered hills at one end and offers heavenly views of the Andaman Sea on the other. Enjoy a global culinary adventure at one of our seven themed dining outlets, relax by one of our five stunning swimming pools, welcome bliss at our Sati spa, or just spend the day on a private sunbed listening to the sound of the waves.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Thavorn Beach Village Resort & Spa Phuket (SHA Plus+)
address: 6/2 Moo6, Nakalay Bay, Kamala 83150
description: Featuring a private beach, a sauna and a swimming pool, Thavorn Beach Village Resort & Spa Phuket SHA Plus+ is located in Kamala and provides comfortable accommodation. Guests also have exclusive access to the Chann Wellness Spa and Lagoon Swimming Pool. There are a variety of facilities at the resort, including complimentary wireless internet and free private parking on site. It offers family-friendly amenities, with room designs and services for families of any size, as well as a kids club and a kids pool. It also features a sun deck with impressive pool, sea and garden views. Offering 5-star accommodation, the rooms at Thavorn Beach Village Resort & Spa Phuket SHA Plus+ feature a private balcony. They are air conditioned and offer a mini bar, slippers and a refrigerator. To start the day, guests are invited to have breakfast at Thavorn Beach Village Resort & Spa Phuket SHA Plus+'s on-site restaurants, then later experience international, Thai and Chinese meals at Marisa Terrace or international cuisine at Thai Sala Cafe. The resort is a convenient place to discover nearby Patong Beach and Kamala Beach. Patong and Phuket Town are located a short drive away.Revato

name: Sunsuri Phuket (Sha Plus+)
address: 11/5 Moo 1, Naiharn Beach, Rawai 83130
description: Located in the secluded area of Nai Harn Beach, the property is a 10-minute ride from Rawai Beach and Promthep Cape. Sunsuri Phuket features cosy accommodation with two outdoor pools, purpose built kids pool and kids club. Free WiFi is offered in the entire resort. Set on a hillside, Sunsuri Phuket is a 30-minute drive from Phuket Town and Central Festival Phuket Shopping Centre. Phuket International Airport is a 50-minute ride away. A free scheduled shuttle service to the popular Patong Beach area is available. Beautifully decorated rooms have air conditioning, a cable TV and a private balcony. En suite bathrooms offer free toiletries and slippers. Guests can workout in the fully-equipped gym or relax with pampering massage treatments at the spa. For convenience, the resort offers a 24-hour front desk, meeting facilities and library. The on-site restaurant serves international cuisine, while a variety of drinks can be enjoyed at the wine bar. Room service is available around the clock.

name: Chabana Kamala Hotel
address: 66/4 Moo 3, Kamala & Patong Road, Kamala 83150
description: Located a 5-minute walk from the beach, Chabana Kamala Hotel boasts an outdoor pool and free WiFi access in public areas. With shops, bars and restaurants nearby, this hotel is 1 km from Phuket FantaSea. The bustling centre and nightlife of Patong is a 15-minute drive across the hill. Phuket International Airport is a 40-minute drive away. Air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen TV, a desk and a safety deposit box. They also have a minibar and an electric kettle. A shower and free toiletries are provided in the en suite bathroom. Services and facilities at Chabana Kamala Hotel include a laundry and a 24-hour reception. Guests can also enjoy a pampering treatment at their spa. Thai and international dishes are served at the hotel's restaurant.

name: Princess Seaview Resort & Spa
address: 382 Patak Road, Karon 83100
description: Providing a free half-hourly shuttle to Karon Beach, Princess Seaview Resort & Spa in Phuket offers a rooftop outdoor pool. Its spacious rooms have a private balcony with views of the sea or Karon Town. Fully air-conditioned, rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV, electric kettle and free bottled water. See-through glass bathrooms come with a separate bathtub and hot-water showers. Princess Seaview Resort is a 15-minute drive from Patong Beach and a 20-minute drive from Phuket Town. It is a 45-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Free parking is available. The large outdoor pool is surrounded by sun loungers, where guests can suntan while enjoying a cocktail or burger from the pool bar. For guests' convenience, there is also a fitness centre and laundry services. Princess Restaurant & Bar serves a daily buffet breakfast, as well as international, Thai and seafood specialities.

name: Anda Beachside Hotel
address: 210/2 Karon Road, Karon 83100
description: Stop at Anda Beachside Hotel to discover the wonders of Phuket. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Anda Beachside Hotel. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature television LCD/plasma screen, cleaning products, clothes rack, complimentary instant coffee, complimentary tea. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Discover all Phuket has to offer by making Anda Beachside Hotel your base.priceline.com

name: Cape Panwa Hotel (SHA Plus+)
address: 27, 27/2 Mu 8, Sakdidej Road, Wichit 83000
description: Cape Panwa Hotel where a long, sandy, private beach and the nearby shade of the hillside coconut plantation enhance a truly tropical feel. Relaxing in the generous comfort of your fully-appointed suite or simply strolling hand-in-hand next to gently rippling wavelets, feel the stresses and strains of everyday life just melt away. Cape Panwa Hotel, a former haunt of royalty and current favorite of ‘A’-listers, retains the warmest of welcomes where everyone can feel treated like a very special visitor, thanks to the care and attentions of a staff of whom we are truly proud. A short hop from Phuket town, Cape Panwa Hotel offers all the services and facilities you would expect of a Cape property, with a range of restaurants to suit all tastes and the renowned Cape Spa. It is also an ideal venue for weddings or other celebrations under the caring and expert guidance of our dedicated Function Planner and the team. This is the venue to get back in touch with nature, with each other or just with yourself. Whether for a short family break or a working holiday, Cape Panwa wins hands-down every time.

name: The Nai Harn (SHA Plus+)
address: 23/3 Vises Road, Rawai 83130
description: Set in Rawai, The Nai Harn is a five-minute walk from Nai Harn Beach and offers an infinity pool, outdoor tennis courts and a sauna. Featuring views of Promthep Cape, it also provides a variety of amenities, including a butler service, a rooftop terrace and valet parking. Those staying at this 5-star hotel can plan excursions with the assistance of the tour desk. It also offers babysitting services, a currency exchange and a reception that operates 24/7. The rooms at The Nai Harn have air conditioning and offer a private balcony, a coffee maker and a mini bar. They each include converters/voltage adaptors, a flat-screen TV and bottled water. The hotel offers a variety of in-house dining options with Cosmo all-day-dining restaurant & Rock Salt beach restaurant and Reflections "sprawling infinity-edged rooftop bar". Breakfast is available daily and can be savoured in the comfort of the rooms. Phuket International Airport is a 70-minute drive from The Nai Harn. Karon and Chalong are also a short drive away.Revato

name: Pakasai Resort
address: 88 Moo 3, T. Ao Nang, A. Muang, Krabi
description: Located amidst a tropical garden setting near Aonang Beach in Krabi, Pakasai Resort by Tolani - SHA Extra plus offers comfortable accommodation and a range of facilities. Rooms feature wooden flooring and a large balcony with views of the lush greenery. It also offers air conditioning, an en-suite bathroom with shower and a DVD player amongst other amenities. Relax and leave your troubles behind when you take a dip in Pakasai's rooftop freshwater infinity-edge pool. With views of the sea, lounge around with a cool drink from the pool cafe. To further ease your stress and soothe your body, visit the Adora Spa, which offers a selection of massages, aromatherapy and body treatments that will rejuvenate you. Other facilities at Pakasai Resort by Tolani - SHA Extra plus include a full equipped fitness centre with juice bar, a small library and mountain bikes to explore the area with. Guests will sample daily traditional Thai sweets and herbal tea and participate in on-site activities including demonstrations of how to make Thai handicraft and enjoy a Thai folk dance. Enjoy a buffet spread of Thai and international favourites when dining at Dalah Restaurant. It also serves the freshest seafood and the specialities of southern Thailand.

name: Panan Krabi Resort
address: 945 Moo 2, T. Aonang, Krabi 81180
description: Panan Krabi Resort provides 4-star accommodation in Krabi. There is also a gym with a swimming pool. There are a variety of amenities at the resort on offer to guests, including meeting rooms, a 24-hour reception and a fitness centre. Guests can also enjoy free private parking on site. The rooms at Panan Krabi Resort are air-conditioned and offer a mini bar, a refrigerator and a private balcony. The private en suite includes complimentary toiletries in addition to slippers and bathrobes. Panan Krabi Resort features a variety of places to dine, including D-Plee Restaurant and Catch Up Sky Lounge - Wine & Pool Bar. Breakfast is available each morning and can be savoured in the comfort of the rooms. Krabi International Airport is a 40-minute drive from the resort. The staff at the tour desk are available to book tours and sightseeing trips in Krabi.Revato

name: Sofitel Krabi Phokeethra Golf & Spa Resort
address: 200 Moo 3 Klong Muang Beach, Krabi 81000
description: The luxury resort in Krabi offers 276 elegant styled rooms and suites set within a beautiful tropical garden. Guests at the beach resort enjoy the largest lagoon swimming pool in Krabi, a spa, restaurants serving Thai, Italian and Indian cuisine, and luxury speedboat tours to nearby islands. You also get to pamper your kids with fun activities and kids meals with MyKids package.accorhotels.com

name: Holiday Inn Resort Krabi Ao Nang Beach, An IHG Hotel
address: 244 Moo 2,Ao Nang, Krabi 81000
description: Situated amidst a tropical garden, Holiday Inn Resort Krabi Ao Nang Beach - SHA Extra Plus offers accommodation on a hillside of downtown Ao Nang. It is within a 5-minute walking distance to Aonang Beach and provides easy access to the city's main attractions. The elegant rooms at the resort feature Thai décor and a private balcony that overlooks lush gardens. Rooms are fitted with 49-inch flat-screen Smart TV and free WiFi access for guests' convenience. Guests can enjoy a meal at the Rakhang Thai Bistro and Bar, which specializes in Thai and European cuisines. Chao Nang Spa offers massage treatments for guests to unwind. Staff at the resort’s tour desk can arrange snorkeling excursions. Guests traveling with children can make use of a kids' playground. The nearest airport is Krabi Airport, 25 km from Holiday Inn Resort Krabi Ao Nang Beach - SHA Extra Plus.

name: Varana Hotel Krabi
address: 258 Moo 3 Tambol Nongtalay Amphur Muang, Krabi 81180
description: No description found

name: Zeavola Resort
address: 11 Moo 8 Laem Tong, Krabi 83000
description: Zeavola is the definition of barefoot luxury and one of the most sustainable hotels in Thailand: This charming retreat is a jungle resort and themed to be a Thai Village from over 30 years ago, without missing all the amenities and services of a typical 5 Star Hotel. Grass-roofed teakwood villas blend with traditional Thai influences and a charming feel rustic. You won't find golden faucets and white marble here. Together with the tropical jungle, its sand paths, and the authentic Zeavolians is what will spark the magic. Zeavola is located on Phi Phi Don’s northeast coast and is only reachable by boat. Away from the hustle and bustle of Tonsai, the main village, and pier of Phi Phi Islands. There are no streets, cars, or motorbikes. Zeavola’s, Zann Zanook Activity, and 5 Star Padi Dive center offer professional diving. They also guided island-hopping and snorkeling tours. The Activity Center provides complimentary sports equipment so guests can play volleyball or frisbee on the beach or enjoy free kayaks. Before booking, ensure that your flights are in line with our boat transfers. The resort recommends that international travelers plan a day before and after departure on the mainland. This will help to ease your travel stress and any weather-related timeline changes. Insider Tip: Stay a minimum of two nights to get the feel and the understanding of what the Zeavola is trying to create What to bring: Mosquito spray, sun blocker, your positive energy For more information, please visit our official website or contact us directly. Emails and messages on online platforms will be replied to within 24 hours. In urgent matters call +66 75 627 000

name: Aonang Villa Resort
address: 113 Moo 2 Aonang Beach, Krabi 81000
description: Steps from Ao Nang Beach, Aonang Villa Resort - SHA Extra Plus features spectacular views of the Andaman Sea, a spa and 2 large freeform outdoor pools. It offers free afternoon tea and free Wi-Fi. The Aonang Villa Resort - SHA Extra Plus is about 30 km from Krabi International Airport. Rooms are bright and spacious, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows and private balconies with views of the Andaman Sea or cliffs. Some rooms are just steps from the swimming pool. Guests can exercise at the fitness centre or relax at the hot tub. Traditional Thai massage and body wraps are available at The Villa Spa. The hotel can arrange for airport shuttle, car rental and excursions to nearby attractions. Offering an outdoor dining setting, nestled within tropical gardens, Kiang Le serves a varied buffet breakfast and an international menu for dinner. Kiang Tarn Lobby Bar provides magazines and newspapers for a light read with refreshments.

name: The Shellsea
address: 999 Moo 6, Sai Thai, Muang, Krabi, Ban Ao Nam Mao 81000
description: Beautifully set next to the beach in Ao Nam Mao, The Shell Sea offers stylish accommodation in a convenient area of Krabi.
