Boasting an unsurpassed spa experience and sauna for guests' casual enjoyment, the resort features an outdoor pool overlooking the views of the sea. Delectable and fresh seafood dishes can be sampled daily at the on-site restaurant, while refreshing drinks are served at the bar. All guests have an access to free WiFi in public areas. Free private parking is also available for those who drive. The rooms here are equipped with an air conditioning and come with a flat screen TV. Selected units are fitted with a spacious seating area. The en suite bathroom includes a bathtub, bathrobes and premium amenities. Friendly staff are 24-hour available to assist all guests at the front desk. Gastropo Fossils The World Museum is 1.4 km from the property, while Thara Park is 19 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi Airport, 26 km from The Shell Sea.

name: Krabi Heritage Hotel
address: 312 Moo 2 Tambol Ao-Nang, Krabi 81000
description: Located in Ao Nang Beach, within 600 metres of Ao Nang Beach and 1.5 km of Pai Plong Beach, Krabi Heritage Hotel - SHA Extra Plus provides accommodation with a fitness centre and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. This 4-star hotel offers a tour desk and luggage storage space. Gastropo Fossils The World Museum is 7.8 km from the hotel and Dragon Crest Mountain is 17 km away. At the hotel every room is fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Krabi Heritage Hotel - SHA Extra Plus offers certain units with city views, and each room includes a kettle. All units will provide guests with a fridge. A buffet, à la carte or American breakfast is available daily at the property. Nopparat Thara Beach is 1.7 km from the accommodation, while Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi International, 24 km from Krabi Heritage Hotel - SHA Extra Plus, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hula Hula Resort Ao Nang
address: 222, Moo 3, Klonghang Road, Krabi 81180
description: Situated on the peaceful hill overlooking the Andaman Sea, Hula Hula Resort, Ao Nang -SHA Extra Plus Beach boasts four outdoor swimming pools including one main pool, one kids' pool and two private pools, an on-site Thai art and crafts centre and free WiFi. Both Ao Nang and Nopparat Beach can be reached within 3 minutes, using the resort's free shuttle bus or 12 minutes on foot. All guests are welcomed by exotic seasonal fruits and tropical drinks. Guests can also enjoy views of the pineapple field at the back of the resort. Decorated with pineapple-themed pillows and tropical colours, the rooms features genuine wood furnishings. It has a flat-screen TV, a minibar and an electric kettle. The en suite bathrooms include slippers and free toiletries that offer the fragrance of frangipani. Rooms come with a balcony or a patio with direct pool access. Special features include unique art pieces created by local Krabi painters. Guests staying at Hula Hula Resort can enjoy pampering massage treatments. The Hula Hut restaurant serves tasty Thai meals, including of pineapple juice and special dishes cooked from pineapples. The outdoor pool also comes with a relaxing plunge pool and a kids pool. There is also a tour desk, free parking and a 24-hour front desk. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, a 30-minute drive from Hula Hula Resort, Ao Nang -SHA Extra Plus Beach.

name: Phulay Bay, A Ritz-Carlton Reserve
address: 111 Moo 3, Nongthalay, Muang, Krabi 81180
description: Beyond the limestone mountains, lush rainforests, and crystal clear waters of southern Thailand, a secluded paradise awaits you in one of the most spellbinding locations. Embark on a voyage of discovery at Phulay Bay, a Ritz-Carlton Reserve, where glistening sands and blue skies converge with the Andaman Sea to reveal one of the most captivating Krabi beach resorts. Here, the charm and natural beauty of the country blend with an aura of serenity and luxury, and nature unveils its power to inspire the senses. This personalized escape combines a refined, casual setting, indigenous flavours, and the most individualized service as you are immersed in the culture and beauty of the surrounding landscape. For those who appreciate luxurious sanctuaries tucked away in exquisite corners of the world, Phulay Bay, a Ritz-Carlton Reserve is a magnificent revelation.Marriott

name: Krabi Tipa Resort
address: 121/1 Moo 2, Krabi 81000
description: This resort is conveniently positioned in Ao Nang and offers a swimming pool. Those staying at the property also have access to complimentary wireless internet and on-site parking. This 4-star resort offers a coffee bar, a kids club and an executive floor. It also provides family-friendly amenities, with room layouts and services for families both large and small, as well as a kids pool and babysitting/child services. The rooms are air conditioned and include a telephone. There are also several rooms especially for families. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient spot to have a meal. A wide selection of cafés and restaurants are also available in the area. Tipa Resort is moments from Ao Phra Nang. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Krabi.Revato

name: Dusit Thani Krabi Beach Resort
address: 155 Moo 2, Nong Thale, Krabi 81180
description: Dusit Thani Krabi Beach Resort offers a modern setting while in Krabi. It provides 5-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. The resort boasts luxurious amenities, including a limousine service and Spa Krabi. It also includes family-friendly facilities, with room layouts and services for families both large and small, plus a kids club and a kids pool. The rooms at Dusit Thani Krabi Beach Resort offer a mini bar, a private balcony and a refrigerator. All provide slippers, an in-room dining area and a kitchenette. Those staying at Dusit Thani Krabi Beach Resort can indulge in a drink at Cocovida Pool Bar, before savouring a meal at Mangosteen’s. Places to dine at the resort include Toh Kin Khaw and Limoncello Italian Restaurant. Dusit Thani Krabi Beach Resort is within walking distance of Khlong Muang Beach. Ao Phra Nang and Tup Kaek Beach are within an easy car ride from the resort.Revato

name: Avani Ao Nang Cliff Krabi Resort
address: 328 Moo 2, Ao Nang, Krabi 81180
description: Set against a backdrop of lush green hills, Avani Ao Nang Cliff Krabi Resort in Krabi features spacious accommodation with views of the tropical landscape. Featuring wood panelling, rooms provide various amenities that include a balcony with a sitting area, internet access and a rain shower in the bathroom. Room service is also offered for your comfort. Cool off with a dip in the swimming pool, or sunbathe with a refreshing drink from the pool bar. For some fun in the sun, Aonang Beach with its white sands and blue waters is just a 5-minute walk away. A fitness room is also available for those needing to recharge after a long day. Enquire with the tour desk for activities and day trips to explore the island. Enjoy both local and international flavours at Ao Nang's Cliff Beach Resort's all-day dining restaurant, which overlooks the Andaman Sea. Buffet breakfast is served at The Cliff REstaurant, while The Orchid Bar & Bistro offers refreshing drinks and cocktails.

name: Anyavee Tubkaek Beach Resort
address: 146 Moo 3, Nongthale, Muang, Krabi 81000
description: Located along Tubkaek Beach, Anyavee Beach Resort offers rooms and villas with views of Ao Nang Bay from the balcony. It also features a swimming pool and beachfront restaurant. Rooms at Anyavee Tubkaek are decorated in a modern Asian design. Offering an LCD TV, they also have a coffee/tea maker, minibar and large bathroom with hairdryer. Guests can have a refreshing swim in the pool, which also has an attached children's pool. To relax, massage services are available. Anyavee Tubkaek Beach Resort- SHA Plus is a 40-minute drive from Krabi International Airport. The tourist centre of Ao Nang Beach is just 20 minute drive away. Half and full day tour arrangements can be made at Anyavee, along with car rentals. Free private parking is offered.

name: The Tubkaak Krabi Boutique Resort
address: 123 Moo 3, Tubkaak Beach, Krabi 81000
description: Nestled within abundant greenery, The Tubkaak Krabi Boutique Resort - SHA Extra Plus offers beachfront accommodation on Tubkaak Beach. Offering spacious rooms, it also features a full-service spa and an outdoor pool. Tubkaak Boutique Resort’s rooms feature wooden interiors, giving them a cosy feel. Guests can sit and enjoy mountain views from the balcony. Each room has an outdoor, tropical-style bathroom. With oversized armchairs and a collection of books and magazines, the library is great for quiet reading. Sun loungers are provided on the beach and by the pool. The resort also offers tour arrangements and cooking classes. The Arundina restaurant serves Thai and European dishes. Surrounded by water lily ponds, it boasts a relaxing atmosphere with ocean views. Private meals on the beach can also be arranged, while drinks are available at the library’s bar. The Tubkaak Krabi Boutique Resort - SHA Extra Plus is 20 minutes’ drive from Ao Nang Beach. Krabi Airport is a 45-minute drive away.

name: Krabi Resort
address: 232 Moo 2 Ao Nang Beach, Krabi 81000
description: Located on Ao Nang Beach, Krabi Resort- SHA Extra Plus provides direct beach access and charming rooms with private terraces. It has a large outdoor pool and a restaurant offering beautiful sea views. Conveniently situated near Krabi’s spectacular diving sites and limestone cliffs, The Krabi Resort- SHA Extra Plus is also just 4 km from Phra Nang Cave. It takes 30 minutes by car from the hotel to Krabi International Airport. Fitted with fine furnishings, rooms present a traditional Thai decor or contemporary designs. Each room has a cable TV, a minibar and ample seating space. Most rooms come with a luxurious bathtub. Recreation facilities include rock climbing, scuba diving and snorkelling. The resort also provides tour services, airport transfers and wireless internet access for a fee. The Boat, the resort’s all-day dining restaurant, serves Thai and international cuisine. Fresh seafood barbeque dishes are also available. Guests can enjoy refreshing beverages at the Beach and Pool Bar.

name: Maneetel Krabi Beachfront
address: 225 Moo 3, Nopparat Tara Beach, Ao Nang 81000
description: With the peaceful Nopparat Thara Beach across the road, Maneetel Krabi Beachfront-SHA Plus offers comfortable accommodation, and outdoor pool and free WiFi access. Each room at this hotel is air-conditioned and comes with a flat-screen TV. Other amenities include a seating area, a minibar and a balcony. The bathroom comes equipped with a shower, slippers and free toiletries. During their stay at Maneetel Krabi Beachfront-SHA Plus, guests can make use of the fitness centre or grab a meal at the on-site restaurant. Additional restaurants, bars and shops can also be found nearby. The hotel is 1.2 km from Ao Nang Beach and 1.8 km from Nopparatthara Pier, where boats can take guest to the popular Phi Phi Islands. Krabi Airport is a 40-minute drive from the property.

name: Beyond Krabi
address: 98 Moo 3 Tambon Nongtalay, Ban Khlong Muang 81000
description: Inspired by nature, the luxurious Beyond Krabi offers a tropical escape on a private stretch of Klong Muang Beach. With an outdoor pool, it also has a fitness centre and restaurant. Featuring relaxed yet modern Thai design, air-conditioned rooms enjoy beautiful views of the gardens, pool or sea. All come with a flat-screen cable TV, minibar and personal safe. En suite bathrooms have hot showers and a hairdryer. Guests can indulge in a relaxing Thai body massage, or arrange day trips at the tour desk. Currency exchange and ticketing services are available at the 24-hour front desk. Thai and international cuisines are served at the hotel's restaurant. A daily breakfast buffet is also offered. Beyond Krabi is 7 km from Ao Nang Beach and 11 km from Railay Beach. It is a 45-minute drive from Krabi Airport. Free parking is available.

name: The L Resort
address: 31 Moo 2 - Ao Nang Beach, Ao Nang 81000
description: The L Resort is located in the Ao Nang Beach area of Krabi. The eco-friendly resort features cushioned sun loungers on the terrace and a large outdoor pool with a waterfall. It is just a 40-minute drive from Krabi Airport. The chic and non-smoking units are decorated with bright colours and feature white linens on the beds. A 40-inch flat-screen TV, tea/coffee making facilities and a minibar are offered in all air-conditioned rooms. The 4-star resort offers free Wi-Fi access and room service from 07:00-23:00 hrs. On-site, private parking is available free of charge. Day excursions can be arranged for guests as well. The Thai-Swiss restaurant, Wanna's Place serves a great selection of Thai and international dishes as well as Swiss cuisine.

name: Arawan Krabi Beach Resort
address: 107, Moo 5, Ao Nam Mao, Ao Nang 81000
description: Boasting views of the Andaman sea and limestone cliffs, Arawan Krabi Resort features outdoor swimming pools overlooking a private beach of Ao Nam Mao. Ao Nang beach is only a 12-minute drive away from the resort. Guests are also offered with complimentary shuttle services by Tuk Tuk. Featuring air conditioning, rooms at Arawan Krabi Resort are spacious and and fully equipped with flat screen satellite TVs and a seating area. En suite bathrooms include refreshing showers, toiletries and slippers. Guests can enjoy on-site restaurants serving Thai cuisines. There is an on-site free parking and bike rental available. Koh Phi Phi Don is 32 km from Arawan Krabi Beach Resort,while Railay Beach is 17 km away. The resort is only a 45-minute drive from Krabi International Airport.

name: The Ozone Krabi Condotel
address: 195, Pak Nam, Muang, Krabi, Krabi 81000
description: Situated in Krabi town in the Krabi Province region and Wat Kaew Korawaram reachable within 4.7 km, The Ozone Krabi Condotel features accommodation with free WiFi, barbecue facilities, a rooftop pool and free private parking. Featuring a terrace, some units are air conditioned and have a dining area and a seating area with a satellite flat-screen TV. Some accommodation includes a balcony with sea views, a fully equipped kitchen and a shared bathroom with shower. The apartment offers 4-star accommodation with a fitness centre and indoor pool. A a baby safety gate is also available for guests at The Ozone Krabi Condotel. Thara Park is 5.4 km from the accommodation, while Krabi Stadium is 5.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Krabi International, 11 km from The Ozone Krabi Condotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Banyan Tree Krabi
address: 279 Moo 3 Tambon Nongtalay Amphoe Muang Krabi, Nong Thale 81180
description: Step into our sanctuary for the senses, where the sapphire blue sea meets tropical white sands against a backdrop of lush jungle-green mountains. Unwind in an oasis of peace and comfort at our idyllic beachfront resort. Feel the warm embrace of Banyan Tree hospitality - from the tranquil spa treatments to mouthwatering cuisine at our restaurants to spectacular vistas of the Andaman Sea. Retreat to a setting of unparalleled indulgence where you can truly unwind and rejuvenate your mind, body and soul.accorhotels.com

name: Hyatt Regency Koh Samui
address: 99/11 Moo 5, Koh Samui 84320
description: Situated in Chaweng, 1.9 km from Choeng Mon Beach, Hyatt Regency Koh Samui- SHA Extra Plus features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. This 5-star hotel offers a kids' club and room service. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and organising tours for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. Rooms include a shared bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, while certain rooms have a kitchenette equipped with a dishwasher. At Hyatt Regency Koh Samui- SHA Extra Plus all rooms have bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers buffet, à la carte or American options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean, Seafood and Thai cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Hyatt Regency Koh Samui- SHA Extra Plus offers a children's playground. Guests at the hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Chaweng, like snorkelling and canoeing. Chaweng Beach is 2.5 km from Hyatt Regency Koh Samui- SHA Extra Plus, while Big Buddha is 4.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Samui International, 2 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Ampersand Resort
address: 9/132 Moo 5 Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Set in Bophut, 500 metres from Thongson Bay Beach, Ampersand Resort offers accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. Among the various facilities of this property are a garden, a shared lounge and a terrace. The accommodation features room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. The resort will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Ampersand Resort all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, Italian and American options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean, Mexican and Middle Eastern cuisine. Vegetarian, halal and vegan options can also be requested. The area is popular for canoeing and cycling, and car hire is available at this 5-star resort. Plai Laem Beach is 500 metres from Ampersand Resort, while Naturism Beach is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Samui International, 4 km from the resort, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Kimpton Kitalay Samui
address: 10/78 Moo 5, Bo Phut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Grand Opening Winter 2021. With an enchanting fusion of contemporary design and traditional accents, Kimpton Kitalay Samui conjures the romance of a village intimately connected to the sea. Enjoy any of our 138 rooms, suites or villas, many with their own private pool, access to a swimming pool and views of the sea. Our 500 square meter Kids Club celebrates adventure and a taste of village living, and distinctive restaurants and bars provide irresistible culinary curations all day.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Renaissance Koh Samui Resort & Spa
address: 208/1 Moo 4, T. Maret, Lamai Beach, Koh Samui 84310
description: Relax in a boutique resort by the beach where five-star service and opulent amenities abound. Renaissance Koh Samui Resort & Spa is set amidst manicured gardens, nestled along the shores of Koh Samui Island. Our hotel's prime location places you steps away from Lamai Beach, Chaweng Beach and Fisherman's Village. After a day on the beach in Thailand, rest well in an elegant hotel room with plush bedding, high-speed Wi-Fi and outdoor whirlpool. Or select one of our resort's lavish villas, each featuring a private pool. Satisfy your hunger at our delicious hotel restaurants with classic dishes from Thailand, locally sourced seafood or tasty international fare. Stay fit in Koh Samui with a workout in our fitness center or recharge with a swim in our hotel pools or a gentle massage at Quan Spa. If you're planning an event in Thailand, take advantage of stylish venues supported by on-site catering. We look forward to making your visit to Renaissance Koh Samui Resort & Spa a memorable one.Marriott

name: W Koh Samui
address: 4/1 Moo 1, Tambol Maenam, Koh Samui 84330
description: Savor boundless tranquillity by day. Then, ramp it up at night. Situated on a 30-square-mile tropical island in the middle of the Gulf of Thailand, overlooking stunning beaches and lush forests, W Koh Samui resort awakens as the sun goes down, igniting the unexpected. Life is done right. Hotel guests can start the day at our Koh Samui resort with a workout at FIT or dip at WET before unwinding with a locally inspired therapy at AWAY Spa. Then light up the evening with signature cocktails at WOOBAR and dinner at our hotel's on-site restaurants, Namu and The Kitchen Table. Surrounded by verdant foliage, each of our resort's 74 luxury, pet-friendly villas boasts a private outdoor pool and infinite island views. Inside, premiere technology meets signature W pillow top beds, Away Spa amenities and Whatever/Whenever service. Relax and take it easy in Thailand at W Koh Samui Hotel.Marriott

name: Vana Belle, a Luxury Collection Resort, Koh Samui
address: 9/99 Moo 3 Chaweng Noi Beach, Koh Samui 84320
description: Surrounded by tropical forests, mythical gardens, crystal clear blue ocean water and pristine white sand beach. Vana Belle, A Luxury Collection Resort, Koh Samui is located at Chaweng Noi Beach. This Koh Samui hotel is moments away from attractions such as the Elephant Sanctuary, Wat Phra Yai, and Chaweng Beach. Discover the unsurpassed services, unrivaled location and comfort of our Koh Samui, Thailand, resort. Each of our suites and villas boasts private pools. Bring to light the luxurious rooms that feature signature Luxury Collection Bed and pillows, remarkable marble bathrooms and extra amenities. Unwind by the infinity-edge pool at the beachfront with the pool bar or experience the authentic Southern Thai cuisine at Panali or tasteful international cuisine at Kiree. Complete the holiday at Vana Spa with a Spa treatment featuring our signature Siam Boran massage.Marriott

name: Napasai, A Belmond Hotel, Koh Samui
address: 65/10 Moo 5 Baan Tai, Koh Samui 84330
description: The luxurious Napasai, A Belmond Hotel, Koh Samui offers a 5-star tropical getaway in Ko Samui, with its very own beachfront, beautiful sea view infinity pool, and pampering spa services. Overlooking Ban Tai Beach, it has 4 dining options. Spacious air-conditioned villas feature modern Thai decor and large patios with views of the sea. Equipped with free Wi-Fi, each has a DVD player, TV and a Thai-style sofa. En suite bathrooms present a terazzo bathtub and rainshower. Napasai, A Belmond Hotel, Koh Samui is located along Mae Nam Beach and is about 25 minutes' drive from Samui Airport. Free parking is available. Guests can take PADI-certified diving and snorkelling lessons, or even take part in elephant trekking tours. An 18-hole championship golf course is just a 5-minute drive away. Boasting 180° views of the ocean, as well as outdoor seating, Lai Thai Restaurant serves authentic Thai cuisine all day. Fresh seafood barbecue and international dishes are offered at the casual Beach Restaurant. Drinks can be enjoyed at the 2 bars.

name: Melia Koh Samui
address: 83 Moo 5, Choeng Mon Beach, Bo Phut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Meliá Koh Samui is a perfect blend of traditional Thai hospitality and modern architecture that is ideal for romantic getaways and family holidays overlooking the glorious Choeng Mon Beach. The stylish, u-shaped resort’s layout starts with the main lobby building that also houses Koko Kitchen, Boat’s Bar a. Upstairs is the award-winning YHI Spa. Along each side of the luxury family resort are six sleek, low-rise buildings that effortlessly blend into the tropical landscape and include 159 well-appointed guest rooms and 41 luxurious suites. Ground floor guest rooms boast spacious verandahs that lead directly to the 700-metre long lagoon, which meanders its way around the resort and sports features such as slides, waterjets, jacuzzi, fountains and the Pool Bar. For this reason alone, you begin to understand why the readers of Condé Nast Traveler magazine have voted Meliá Koh Samui as among Thailand’s top resorts, The crowning glory of Meliá Koh Samui are surely the 30 stunning boat suites that sit majestically in their own private gardens surrounded by water. These beautifully restored marvels of Thailand’s rich maritime heritage offer contemporary interior designs with a stand-alone bath tub and double showers on the lower level, while up the spiral staircase is the glorious bedroom with polished wooden floors. A private al fresco deck replete with a sumptuous day bed and huge pillows make a picture-perfect backdrop for romantic couples. Situated on the fringes of the beach is the highly-regarded The Breeza Beach Restaurant and Bar, a relaxing setting any time of the day. It is one of the island’s best kept secrets and serves the most amazing cuisine found anywhere on Koh Samui.

name: Sala Samui Chaweng Beach Resort
address: 99/10 Moo 2, Chaweng Beach, Koh Samui 84320
description: Enjoying a peaceful beachfront location on the white and sandy Chaweng Beach, SALA Samui Chaweng Beach Resort comprises of two buildings. The resort features luxurious pool villas and suites, a signature 'moon pool' that overlooks the sea and a romantic beachfront restaurant. The spacious pool deck also comes with plenty of sunbeds and a kid's pool. Inspired by Asian culture, the uniquely designed rooms come with handcrafted furnishings and air conditioning. A cable/satellite TV and minibar are standard features. Bathrooms have hot-water showers and a hairdryer. The open-air Tent Beachfront Restaurant and Bar features fresh seafood and serves a variety of international and traditional Thai favourites. Options for an intimate indoor dining, romantic private gazebos or a complete beachfront dining experience can all be arranged. SALA Samui Chaweng Beach Resort is less than 5 minutes' walk from Chaweng Town. It is a convenient 10-minute drive from Samui Airport.

name: Banyan Tree Samui
address: 99/9 Moo 4 Maret Koh Samui, Koh Samui
description: Overlooking the sapphire waters of scenic Lamai Bay, Banyan Tree Samui is nestled in a series of cascading terraces on a private cove on the Southeastern coast of Koh Samui. The luxury all-pool villa resort combines the best elements of a tropical getaway with a pristine beach, blissful spa escapes, bespoke dining experiences, locally-infused elements and an unparalleled view of the Gulf of Thailand.accorhotels.com

name: Silavadee Pool Spa Resort
address: 208/66 Moo4, Maret, Koh Samui 84310
description: Set upon a hill in Koh Samui, Silavadee Pool Spa Resort enjoys a private beach and an outdoor infinity pool. Aside from free WiFi, it also has a free DVD library. Overlooking the Gulf of Siam, Silavadee Resort offers free shuttle services to Lamai and Chaweng. Samui Airport is about 9 km from the resort. Spacious and decked with luxurious teak wood furnishings, the Thai-style rooms feature modern amenities like a flat-screen TV, iPod dock and minibar. En suite bathrooms are equipped with bathtubs and hairdryers. The peaceful Silavadee Wellness Spa has a relaxing menu of massage treatments and beauty therapies. The resort also arranges a business centre and laundry services. Fresh seafood, traditional Thai and international dishes are served at The Height Restaurant, which has open-air seating overlooking stunning views of the Gulf of Thailand. The pool has a bar offering cocktails and fruit juices.The Moon Restaurant provides all guests with all day dining, serving varieties of International and Mediterranean dinner a la carte.

name: Samui Resotel Beach Resort
address: 17 Moo 3 Chaweng Beach, Koh Samui 84320
description: Sitting on the white sands of Chaweng Beach, the breathtaking Samui Resotel Beach Resort offers beautiful accommodation with ocean or tropical garden views. It is a 15-minute drive from the airport. Soak up the sun on your private terrace complete with daybeds, or relax with a DVD on the flat-screen TV. All rooms and villas at Samui Resotel are equipped with a tea/coffee machine and high-speed internet access. Lazy afternoons by the pool and indulgent massages await guests at Samui Resotel. There is also a well-equipped gym and a dive centre. Capriccio Restaurant offers authentic Italian and Thai dishes, and a great selection of wines. Samui Resotel Beach Resort also has 3 bars where guests can enjoy refreshing beverages. Room service is available. The resort offers car rental facilities, as well as, a tour desk which organises day trips and island exploration excursions. The Thai Boxing Stadium is about 1.2 km from the hotel.

name: Santiburi Koh Samui
address: 12/12 Moo 1 Mae Nam Beach, Koh Samui 84330
description: Santiburi Koh Samui is located along beautiful Mae Nam Beach in Koh Samui. Featuring luxurious villas and suites, it offers a tropical outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi. Surrounded by greenery, the spacious accommodations at Resort Santiburi Beach feature polished wooden floors and traditional Thai furnishings. In-room entertainment is provided with the flat-screen cable/satellite TV and DVD player. Guests can relax in the hot tub or indulge in a pampering massage at the spa. An 18-hole championship golf course is just a 5-minute drive from Santiburi. For a good workout, water sports facilities are also available. Regarding "Authentic Thai dishes and Mediterranean food can be enjoyed under the stars at The Beach House. Refreshing evening drinks are served at the cozy Lounge." The Thai Food would be served at the Sala Thai. Description of that as below Indulge in true Thai flavours with innovative presentation. Take your seat for a fine-dining experience as authentic Thai cuisine is served with flair in a tropical garden setting. Ancient recipes, passed down through generations are reimagined with contemporary techniques and infused with creative influences from global gastronomy. Spectacular set menus take diners on a journey of exquisite flavours and unique creations are available a la carte. Our expert team will be delighted to welcome you at Sala Thai. Santiburi Koh Samui is about 8 km from Samui Airport.

name: Casa De Mar
address: 154/16 Moo 2, Bo Phut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Fronting glittering water of the gulf of Thailand, Casa De Mar offers an outdoor pool and a restaurant. This modern resort is just a few steps from the sandy beach of Chaweng, 1.5 km from Ark Bar and 2 km from Samui Airport. Guests can enjoy free WiFi throughout the stay. Offering a choice of private villa to cosy rooms, all units are fully air-conditioned and comes with a flat-screen cable TV, a seating area and a safety deposit box. Some rooms boast outdoor furniture and a coffee machine. Two bottles of drinking water is provide, daily. A shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries are standard in all en suite bathrooms. Tasty local and international cuisines are served at The Journey Terrace. A breakfast buffet is served daily from 07:00 – 10:30 hrs. Guest can enjoy special drinks or mingle with the other guests at the bar. Alternatively, a range of dining outlets can be found within a 5-minute walk of the property. For guests’ convenience, Casa De Mar provides luggage storage, car hiring and laundry service. Guests can enjoy themselves at the luscious garden or at the sun terrace. Within a short drive from the accommodation, guests can find KC Beach Club Chaweng (2.5 km), Chaweng Walking Street (2.8 km) and Big Buddha (3.7 km). For ferry, Bangrak Pier is located 3.5 km from the property; whilst Bo Phut Pier can be reached under 5 km.

name: Saii Koh Samui Choengmon
address: 63/182 Moo 5, Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Located on its very own beach at Hanuman Bay, SAii Koh Samui Choengmon provides a luxurious tropical getaway. An outdoor pool, yoga classes, and free WiFi are provided. All accommodation comes with a private pool. Fitted with high ceilings and antique furnishings, the chic air-conditioned villas and suites have a flat-screen TV. High-quality cotton bedsheets, and spa toiletries are included. The en-suite bathroom has either a shower or bathtub. SAii Koh Samui Choengmon is a 7-minute drive from Samui International Airport and Chaweng Beach. Cheong Mon Beach is a 4-minute ride away. Free parking service are available. Airport transfers can be arranged at an extra charge. Guests can exercise at the fitness room, shop at the stylish Galleria boutique, or lounge at the book and music library. There are also relaxing body massages the spa. Water-front international dining is available at Miss Olive Oyl Restaurant. Drinks can be enjoyed at The Wet Bar.

name: Four Seasons Resort Koh Samui
address: 219 Moo 5 Tumbon Angthong, Koh Samui 84140
description: Surrounded by tropical gardens, Four Seasons Resort Koh Samui - SHA Extra Plus is situated on the island’s northwestern tip, a quiet oasis on Laem Yai Bay. Windsurfing, golf and a spa are featured. Each room is fitted with a private infinity pool, private bar and iPod dock. Guests can enjoy views of the gardens or Gulf of Siam on the outdoor day bed. The bathroom’s glass doors open onto the private deck for an al fresco bathing experience. Chilled towels are offered at Koh Samui Four Seasons’ beachside infinity pool. Guests can recharge with a game of tennis, a variety of beach sports or a workout at the fitness centre. A large book and DVD library is provided. The hotel’s SIAMSEAS cruising boat offers access to Marine National Park and a variety of other locations. The resort is about a 30-minute drive from both Big Buddha and Koh Samui International Airport. The Four Seasons’ restaurant serves fresh local seafood seasoned with exotic herbs from nearby gardens. Both Thai and International cuisine are offered. The Beach Bar serves a variety of tropical cocktails.

name: Six Senses Samui
address: 9/10 Moo 5, Baan Plai Laem, Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: On the northern tip of Samui Island, the luxurious Six Senses Samui enjoys panoramic views of the Gulf of Siam. Boasting a beautiful infinity pool, it has a spa and private beach. Air-conditioned villas feature large open spaces and wooden flooring which give rooms a bright and airy feel. Fitted with a cable/satellite TV, villas also come with free internet and large daybeds. Six Senses Samui is a 10-minute drive from Samui International Airport. It is around 800 metres from Bo Phut Pier and Fisherman's Village. The elegant Six Senses Spa provides relaxing massage therapies and yoga classes. The hotel's tour desk can help organise jungle treks, island boat trips and diving excursions. Dining on the Rocks offers a farm-to-table cuisine with stunning ocean views. Dining on the Hill features authentic Thai dishes and fresh barbecued seafood.

name: Conrad Koh Samui
address: 49/8-9 Moo 4, Hillcrest Road, Amphur Koh Samui, Suratthani, Koh Samui 84140
description: Experience complete luxury at this stylish resort in your own villa with infinity-edge pool. Conrad Koh Samui is situated on the south-western tip of the island, overlooking the azure reefs of the Gulf of Thailand from its unique position on a scenic hillside. Set only a few steps from an idyllic white-sand beach, the resort features stunning sunset views. Ride in one of a variety of our luxury limousines from Koh Samui airport, only 45 minutes from the resort, and to destinations throughout the island. The resort's secluded location is home to 65 free-standing one bedroom villas overlooking the pristine Aow Thai beach and sprawling across 25 acres of dramatic hillside. All villas have private terraces and a minimum 10m infinity-edge pool. This incredible resort boasts unobstructed ocean views and a range of sumptuous amenities and modern conveniences guaranteed to please the most discerning travellers. Two and three bedroom luxury pool villas are also available at the exclusive residential wing, Conrad Koh Samui Residences. Plan an unforgettable celebration or design the wedding of your dreams at the exclusive Conrad Koh Samui. Hold the ceremony on the powder white sands of the beach as the sun sets over the iconic five islands or celebrate with an evening gala dinner in the resort's function room. Enjoy a variety of on-site recreation activities and water sports during your stay. Energize in the contemporary 24-hour Fitness Centre and practice yoga outdoors on the sun-soaked, wooden deck. Experience Thailand's legendary snorkelling and incredible views of the coast at our on-site diving and sailing booking centre, sunbathe on the resort's beach or the sea terrace, or in an over-water hammock. Soothe mind and spirit with a relaxing holistic beauty treatment in our opulent spa.Hilton

name: Anantara Lawana Koh Samui Resort
address: 92/1 Moo 2, Koh Samui 84320
description: Anantara Lawana Koh Samui Resort is set on Koh Samui, and provides 5-star accommodation as well as an infinity pool. Guests also have exclusive access to the on-site Anantara Spa and Chang Noi Kids' Club. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or enjoy a drink at the bar. Couples on a romantic getaway will adore the hotel's features like valet parking and massage services. Rooms at Anantara Lawana Koh Samui Resort feature a complimentary fruit bowl and a rain shower. All are air conditioned and offer a private balcony, a marble bathroom and a private terrace. The en suite bathrooms provide slippers, bathrobes and luxury toiletries. Guests of Anantara Lawana Koh Samui Resort are welcome to experience international cuisine at Tree Tops Signature Dining, or try Asian and international meals at OceanKiss. Guests can enjoy scenic countryside walks or make use of Anantara Lawana Koh Samui Resort's bicycle rental service to explore the surrounds. For those travelling by car, parking is available and Chaweng is within easy driving distance of the hotel.Revato

name: Muang Samui Spa Resort
address: 13/1 Moo2, Chaweng Beach, Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: A relaxing destination in Koh Samui’s east coast, Muang Samui Spa Resort is located by the white sand of Chaweng Beach. It features an outdoor pool and a beachfront restaurant. Decorated with traditional Thai furnishings, each room at Muang Samui Spa has cable TV, a DVD player, and tea/coffee making facilities. A work desk and a safety deposit box are provided. Private bathrooms feature a spa bath and separate rain shower facilities. Guests can visit Rai-Ra Spa for a massage or aromatherapy treatment, or exercise at the fitness room. Muang Samui provides tour arrangements and car rental. Wi-Fi is free in public areas. Lare Lae Restaurant and Bar serves a variety of international specialities, including Thai and Italian choices. Located across the road, Samui Seafood Grill and Restaurant offers seafood and Italian dishes in a fine dining setting. The Muang Samui Spa Resort is only a 10-minute drive from Samui International Airport. It is 25 km away from Nathon City and its ferry pier.

name: The Spa Resorts - Lamai Beach
address: 71/7 Moo 3, Maret, Koh Samui 84310
description: Located in Lamai, a few steps from Lamai Beach, The Spa Resorts - Lamai Beach provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. This 5-star resort offers a tour desk and luggage storage space. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the resort each room has air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The rooms are equipped with a kettle, while selected rooms are fitted with a terrace and others also offer sea views. At The Spa Resorts - Lamai Beach rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, American and Asian options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Seafood, Sushi and Thai cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Silver Beach is 1.2 km from The Spa Resorts - Lamai Beach, while Coral Cove Beach is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Samui International Airport, 10 km from the resort.

name: Sheraton Samui Resort
address: 86 Moo 3 Chaweng Noi Beach, Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Find premium beachfront accommodations at Sheraton Samui Resort. Our hotel in Koh Samui offers a stylish blend of modern and Mediterranean décor in every room. Take in stunning views from your spacious in-room balcony overlooking our tropical Garden Pool and Beachfront Pool, just steps from sparkling turquoise waters. Our beach resort delivers a one-of-a-kind Star Kids Club for families with young children, and our partnership with the Koh Samui Blue Swimmer Crab Bank offers guests a hands-on opportunity to learn about seafood sustainability. We are 15 minutes away from Samui International Airport and a short ride to well-known Koh Samui attractions. Savor authentic Thailand cuisine and signature alfresco dining at our hotel restaurants. Other resort amenities include a Balinese-inspired Glow Spa, mindfulness beach yoga and the 24/7 Sheraton Fitness and outdoor tennis court, perfect for an energizing workout before exploring Koh Samui. Sheraton Samui Resort welcomes you to the timeless serenity of Thailand.Marriott

name: Chaweng Regent Beach Resort
address: 155/4 Chaweng Beach, Koh Samui 84320
description: Chaweng Regent Beach Resort is situated on Koh Samui and offers 4-star accommodation as well as free Wi-Fi. Popular facilities, such as a sauna and a swimming pool, make for a satisfying stay in Chaweng. Guests can make the most of the sun on the terrace or have a beverage at the bar. There is also free private parking on site for guests travelling with a car. The hotel also has its very own gym, Swimming Pool. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a shower, a mini bar and cable/satellite channels. All offer slippers, an in-room safe and a DVD player. Chaweng boasts convenient dining options, such as international, Asian and Thai dishes at Chom Talay and Thai, Mediterranean and European food at Red Snapper. Breakfast is available daily and can be savoured in the comfort of the rooms. A wide choice of cafés and restaurants can also be found in close proximity to the property. Conveniently situated, Chaweng Regent is a short drive from Samui International Airport and Chaweng Noi Beach. It also is a convenient base to discover Bo Phut and Maret.Revato

name: Chaweng Cove Beach Resort
address: 17/4 Moo 3, Chaweng Beach, Koh Samui 84140
description: Chaweng Cove Beach Resort offers several accommodation types along Chaweng Beach in Koh Samui. The resort features an outdoor swimming pool, a beachfront restaurant and a beach bar overlooking the ocean. Free W-Fi is available throughout. Chaweng Cove Beach Resort is around 20 minutes’ drive from Samui International Airport. It is a 15-minute walk from Chaweng’s town centre. Featuring wooden furnishings, the air-conditioned rooms come with a flat-screen TV and a DVD player. A minibar and tea/coffee making facilities are provided. Some rooms have a private balcony with sitting area. Guests can relax on the sun loungers provided on the beach. Samui Wellness Spa offers massages, facials and body treatments. The resort has a small fitness room, a tour desk, and a library area. Fresh seafood, Thai and international dishes are served at the restaurant. Cocktails and traditional Thai refreshments are available at Sea Almond Beach Bar.

name: Sareeraya Villas & Suites
address: 100/1 Moo 2, Chaweng Beach Rd., Koh Samui 84320
description: Sareeraya Villas & Suites - SHA Extra Plus is located on the quiet northern end of Chaweng Beach, less than 2 km from Samui Airport. The hotel offers free internet and 3 swimming pools. The Sareeraya Villas & Suites - SHA Extra Plus is a short walk from the main stretch of shops, restaurants and bars on Chaweng Beach. It is about 5 km from Fisherman’s Village. Decorated in a modern Oriental style, the suites and villas at Sareeraya feature flat-screen TVs and DVD players. Some rooms come with an outdoor spa pool while some have a private plunge pool. Guests can enjoy relaxing massage services at Raya Spa or by the pool. The hotel has a fitness centre, a library, and a transit lounge. Buffet breakfast is served at Chef’s Table restaurant, which also offers local, international and fresh seafood dishes. Cocktails and refreshing drinks are available at the hotel’s 2 bars.

name: Peace Resort Samui
address: 178 Moo 1, Bophut Beach, Koh Samui 84320
description: Situated on Bo Phut Beach, Peace Resort offers 1 outdoor pool and an outdoor restaurant. Its spacious bungalows feature a private terrace with sea or garden views. Free WiFi is available in all areas. Equipped with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV, bungalows at Peace also come with a tea/coffee maker and a minibar. Private bathrooms feature a spacious layout and include a hairdryer. The Sea Wrap Restaurant serves International and Thai dishes, with the option of dining outdoors right on the beach. Guests may also enjoy a refreshing drink at the pool bar. Room service is provided. Guests can take a dip in the spa pool or have a quiet read in the resort’s library. Day trips can be arranged at the tour desk, which also assists with car rentals. Peace Resort is a 7 minutes walk from Walking Street at Bophut's Fisherman's Village. It is within a 14-minute drive from popular Chaweng Beach and Samui Airport. For added convenience airport transfers can be arranged for an additional charge.

name: Anavana Beach Resort
address: 28/1 Moo 3, Koh Samui 84320
description: Anavana Beach Resort offers a tropical boutique retreat along southern Chaweng Beach on Koh Samui. Overlooking the Gulf of Siam, it boasts an outdoor pool and Thai-style cottages with free Wi-Fi. Set within landscaped gardens, cottages at Anavana Beach Resort feature private terraces and stylish open-air bathrooms. Equipped with both air conditioning and a ceiling fan, each room has a flat-screen cable TV and a DVD player. Guests can enjoy a relaxing massage at the spa or borrow a complimentary movie at the hotel’s library. Anavana Beach Resort also provides a gift shop and a helpful tour desk. Anavana restaurant serves fine Thai cuisine and a vegetarian menu. Beautiful pool and sea views can be enjoyed throughout the entire meal. Anavana Beach Resort is a 20-minute drive from Samui Airport.

name: Nora Beach Resort and Spa
address: 222 Moo 2, Chaweng Beach, Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Nora Beach Resort and Spa is set on Koh Samui and offers 4-star accommodation as well as a ski school and free Wi-Fi. There is also a fitness centre with fitness classes, a saltwater swimming pool and a garden terrace. Guests of Nora Beach Koh Samui can enjoy a variety of relaxation amenities at Anodas Spa, which features a swimming pool and a sauna. There is also free private parking on site for guests travelling with a car. Nora Beach Resort & Spa features 113 air conditioned rooms. A refrigerator, an in-room safe and bottled water are also included. Serving international, Thai and seafood dishes, Nora Beach Resort & Spa Koh Samui's contemporary brasserie provides a convenient dining option for those who wish dine on site. Room service is also available during certain times. For those who enjoy exploring local restaurants and cafés, there is a wide range within walking distance. For guests travelling by car, parking is available on site and Chaweng is within easy driving distance of the hotel.Revato

name: Impiana Resort Chaweng Noi
address: 91/2-3 Moo 3, Chaweng Noi Beach, Koh Samui 84320
description: Impiana Resort Chaweng Noi is set on Koh Samui and offers 4-star facilities as well as free Wi-Fi. The multiple amenities this relaxed resort features include an outdoor heated pool, 24-hour room service and a kids pool. Guests can enjoy a range of massage treatments and beauty therapy at the in-house spa and wellness centre, Swasana Spa. It also offers babysitting services, a currency exchange and a reception that is available around the clock. The rooms are air conditioned and include a refrigerator, a mini bar and a private bathroom. They all have tea and coffee making facilities, bottled water and a flat-screen TV. Impiana Resort Chaweng Noi's traditional bar is an ideal spot to unwind with a beverage after dinner. Lunch and dinner are served daily at Sabai Restaurant. There is also a selection of drinks to enjoy at the bar, which offers a view of the beach. Within a 20-minute drive of Chaweng Beach, Wat Phra Yai and Samui International Airport, the resort offers an airport shuttle transfer for its guests. It is also a short car ride from Bo Phut and Maret.Revato

name: Royal Muang Samui Villas
address: 89 Moo 5 Choengmon Beach, Koh Samui 84320
description: Located on the white sands and clear waters of Choengmon Beach, Royal Muang Samui Villas offers rooms, villas and pool villas with free WiFi. This beachfront property also features an outdoor pool and 24-hour front desk. Suites and pool villas feature an LCD television, CD and DVD player and en-suite bathroom with a large spa bathtub. Room service is provided. Guests can experience aromatherapy and a variety of treatments at Cave Rai Ra Beach Spa. Other facilities include a fitness centre and a tour desk. Samui Sailor Bar & Grill serve Thai and Italian favourites with fresh seafood. Guests can enjoy wines and cocktails at Spice Beach Restaurant. Royal Muang Samui Villas is a 10-minute drive from Chaweng's shopping and nightlife area. Bophut, Big Buddha Beach and Maenam are nearby, while Samui Airport is a 15-minute drive away.

name: Garrya Tongsai Bay Samui
address: 84 Moo 5 Bophut Tongsai Road,Ko Samui (Suratthani), Koh Samui 84320
description: Surrounded by tropical gardens, Garrya Tongsai Bay Samui offers luxurious seaside accommodation and a 200-metre private beach. A spa and 2 outdoor pools aside, it also has 3 restaurants and free Wi-Fi. Elegantly decorated with wooden furnishings, the air-conditioned rooms at Tongsai Bay feature cable TV and minibar. Each has an ocean-view terrace with sun loungers, and some terraces come with an outdoor bathtub. Garrya Tongsai Bay Samui is a 10-minute drive from Samui Airport and a 15-minute drive from popular Chaweng Beach. The hotel provides airport shuttle service at an additional charge. Guests who are driving can enjoy free parking privileges. 8LEMENTS Spa features a relaxing menu of herbal baths and massage treatments. For a refreshing workout, guests may exercise at the gym or play a game of tennis. The resort also provides on-site water sport facilities for guests' enjoyment. Guests can enjoy meals at Rhoy Rhoy! restaurant, Fish Tales restaurant, EVOL restaurant and at the Po Lad Beach Bar and Bistro. There is also a themed restaurant which is open during high season. Drinking water is provided all-day.

name: Mantra Samui Resort
address: 9/123-124 Moo 1, Koh Samui 84320
description: Located on the hillside and boasting stunning views of Bo Phut Bay, Mantra Samui Resort offers luxurious boutique accommodation. Offering free WiFi, it also has an 24-metre outdoor infinity pool and a pampering spa. Spacious rooms feature dark wood furnishings and neutral fabrics. They are fitted with flat-screen cable TVs. Guests have the use of free tea/coffee making amenities and a safe. Mantra Samui Resort is a 5-minute drive to Bo Phut Beach, 10-minute drive from Fisherman's Village and about a 15-minute drive from Samui Airport. The on-site View Restaurant opens daily, serving a wide variety of tasty traditional Thai dishes as well as selected international meals. Other restaurants and dining options can also be found nearby the property. For those looking to exercise, Mantra Samui has a state-of-the-art fitness centre. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide concierge and travel services. A shuttle service to shopping malls is available with an additional charge.

name: Cape Fahn Hotel Samui
address: 24/269 Moo 5, T. Bo-Phut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Situated in Choeng Mon Beach and with Bang Rak Pier reachable within 2.7 km, Cape Fahn Hotel Samui offers a private beach area, non-smoking rooms, free WiFi and water sports facilities. Each accommodation at the 5-star resort has pool views, and guests can enjoy access to an outdoor swimming pool. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar or a meal in the restaurant. All guest rooms at the resort come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a bath. Featuring a terrace, all rooms are fitted with a kettle, air conditioning and a desk. At Cape Fahn Hotel Samui guests are welcome to take advantage of a fitness room. Snorkelling is among the activities that guests can enjoy near the resort. For any tips on how to get around or what to do in the area, guests can ask at the reception. The nearest airport is Samui International Airport, 3 km from the property.

name: Nora Buri Resort & Spa
address: 111 Moo 5, Chaweng Beach, Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Set in a prime location of Samui, Nora Buri Resort & Spa puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. All the necessary facilities, including free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, are at hand. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as television LCD/plasma screen, complimentary instant coffee, complimentary tea, free welcome drink, mirror. To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as private beach, fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool, spa. Convenience and comfort makes Nora Buri Resort & Spa the perfect choice for your stay in Samui.priceline.com

name: Saree Samui
address: 135 Moo 4 Baan Tornsai, Tumbol Mae Nam, Amphur Koh Samui, Surathani, Koh Samui 84320
description: Presenting a blend of traditional Thai and Balinese decor, Saree Samui provides luxurious villas with free Wi-Fi. Its outdoor infinity pool overlooks the sandy shores of Mae Nam Beach. Spacious and elegant, all villas are fitted with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Guests can lounge at the private sundeck, in the comfortable living room, or even by the private pool in some villas. Semi-outdoor bathrooms come with a bathtub and rainshower. Saree Samui is a 20-minute drive from shopping and dining at popular Chaweng Beach. It is a 30-minute drive from Samui International Airport. Saree Rarom Spa provides relaxing herbal steam baths, Thai massage and morning yoga sessions. Staff at the tour desk can help arrange day trips to Angthong Marine National Park, the Crocodile Farm and The Samui Aquarium. Surya Chandra Restaurant serves local and international dishes, with the choice of al fresco beachfront dining. Drinks can be enjoyed by the Beach Bar.

name: Avani+ Samui Resort
address: 53/5 Moo 4, Phang Ka, Taling Ngam, Koh Samui 84140
description: Avani+ Samui Resort is located on Koh Samui, and offers 5-star facilities, including an infinity pool and a private beach. Guests also have exclusive access to the AvaniSpa and AvaniFit. Guests can make the most of the sun on the terrace or enjoy a beverage at the bar. Guests can also enjoy free private parking on site. Free Wi-Fi is also provided. Rooms are air-conditioned and have premium amenities such as a mini bar and a flat-screen TV. They feature a desk, a seating area and an in-room safe. In-house dining options include Essence Restaurant, which is an ideal place to enjoy a meal. Breakfast is available each morning and can be savoured in the comfort of the rooms. Avani+ Samui Resort is situated next to Pang Ka Bay. The resort also offers complimentary bicycle rental so guests can easily discover the surrounding sights.Revato

name: Shasa Resort & Residences, Koh Samui
address: 116/1 Moo 2 Tambon Mared, Laem Set, Koh Samui 84310
description: Nestled in a tropical hillside, this 5-star property boasts 3 beachfront pools and spacious suites overlooking the beautiful Gulf of Thailand. It offers attentive service, hearty buffets and free Wi-Fi. Located away from the crowds of Samui, ShaSa Resort & Residences, Koh Samui - SHA Extra Plus & Residences, Koh Samui offers shuttles to the Chaweng and Lamai beaches. It is 45 minutes’ drive from Samui International Airport. Bright and airy, well-designed suites feature modern interiors with fully furnished kitchens. They come with a flat-screen cable TV, laundry facilities and spacious bathrooms with a large bathtub. Guests can take relaxing dips in the hydro-therapy pool or get a Thai massage at the spa. The resort also houses fitness facilities, a library and games room. Beyond The Sea Siamese Brasserie offers a spread of fine Thai and international dishes. It also features an extensive wine list and gourmet coffees.

name: The Sea Koh Samui Resort & Residences by Tolani
address: 7/64 Moo 5, Bang Por, Koh Samui 84330
description: The Sea Koh Samui is located along the sandy shores of Mae Nam Beach, a 10-minute drive from Nathon. The hotel offers free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool. The contemporary rooms feature a flat-screen cable TV and a spacious living area. A kitchen area with microwave is provided. Rooms come with an indoor or outdoor hot tub. The Sea Koh Samui is a 20-minute drive from Chaweng Town. Samui Airport is about 11 km away. A fitness centre is available for guests wishing to keep up with their regular work-out. The spa features massage treatments. A tour desk and car rentals are available. Drinks and cocktails are available by the pool. Guests can dine in-room with room service.

name: Ammatara Pura Pool Villas
address: 128/75-76 Moo 3, T.Maret, Koh Samui 84310
description: This boutique resort features contemporary Thai villas with living area, kitchen and a balcony overlooking Lamai Beach. Offering free Wi-Fi, it houses a multi-cuisine restaurant with 24-hour room service and an outdoor pool with whirlpool. Fitted with tiled flooring, the spacious villas at Ammatara Pura feature classic and natural beige and brown interiors, decorated with influences from traditional Thai palaces and temples. Equipped with a dining area and a washing machine, they offer a flat-screen TV and a minibar. Each has a private pool. Situated on Ko Samui, Ammatara Pura is 20 km from Samui International Airport. It is an hour by flight from Bangkok City. Guests can play a game of table tennis or enjoy a soothing massage. The on-site tour desk can help arrange transport rentals and an airport shuttle service.

name: Anantara Bophut Koh Samui Resort
address: 99/9 Moo 1 Bophut Bay, Koh Samui 84140
description: Anantara Bophut Koh Samui Resort is located on Koh Samui and offers 5-star facilities as well as a rooftop terrace and outdoor tennis courts. The numerous amenities this modern hotel features include a kids pool, a kids club and valet parking. This elegant hotel provides an on-site gym, a coffee bar and 24-hour room service. For those wanting to get outdoors the hotel has a wide variety of activities, such as windsurfing, snorkeling and scuba diving. Anantara Bophut Koh Samui Resort offers air conditioned rooms with a rain shower, a marble bathroom and luxury toiletries. Each have a private balcony, a mini bar and a private bathroom with bathrobes. Anantara Bophut Koh Samui Resort features a restaurant and a bar where guests can relax at the end of an evening with a meal and a drink. A wide selection of eating options are also found in close proximity to the property. Bo Phut's well-known attractions and landmarks are within close proximity to Anantara Bophut Koh Samui Resort, with Bo Phut Pier just a short stroll away. For guests with a car, parking is available on site and Mae Nam is within easy driving distance of the hotel.Revato

name: Code Samui Hotel
address: 55/13 Moo 6, Bang Por Soi 4, Meanam, Koh Samui 84330
description: Situated in Bang Por area of Ko Samui, Code is a luxurious collection of contemporary apartments with beautiful ocean views. Featuring a fitness centre, the hotel boasts a stylish infinity outdoor pool, a tennis court and pampering spa treatments. Free WiFi is available at this property. The beach can be reached within a 2-minute drive. Spacious and well-designed, all apartments are equipped with a flat-screen TV, DVD player and iPod dock. A kitchen, living room and balcony are included. En suite bathrooms come with hot-water showers. Samui International Airport is 16 km away. Hotel offers free shuttle service to and from Bang Por Beach and Maenam Beach. Guests can lounge on the pool deck, work out at the fitness centre, relax at the steam room or take a dip in a hot tub. Car rentals, area shuttles, tour bookings and luggage storage can be arranged at the 24-hour front desk. Vanilla offers an all-day dining menu from 07:00-23:00. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar equipped with a billiard table. The hotel also provides barbecue facilities.

name: Bo Phut Resort & Spa
address: 12/12 Moo 1, Tambol Bo Phut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Bo Phut Resort and Spa - SHA Plus is 8 minutes walk from the beach. Boasting Thai accommodation, Bo Phut Resort and Spa - SHA Plus offers outdoor pools and a golf course. Located on Bo Phut beach, the resort is about 1.5 km from the Fisherman's Village and 5 km from Samui International Airport. It offers airport transfers for convenience. All rooms and villas come with private balconies and windows with garden views. En suite bathrooms have separate shower and bathtub, while facilities like a satellite TV, DVDs and a CD player are provided for guests’ entertainment. Massages and other personalised spa treatments are also provided at Bo Phut Resort’s spa. Guests also have the luxury of a sauna and spa tub. Recreational activities include canoeing, and table tennis. Alternatively, there is a small library on site for a quiet day indoors. The restaurant offers local and international dishes. Cocktails and lights snacks are served by the pool or at the Beach Bar.

name: Prana Resort Nandana
address: 14/3 Moo 4, T. Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Prana Resort Nandana boasts a stunning beachside infinity pool and a second pool surrounded by shaded palms with a swim-up bar. It also features the Tropikana Beach Club & Bistro, a poolside café, rooftop spa, fitness centre, 24-hour reception with concierge, and free WiFi for all guests. Stylish, spacious air-conditioned rooms have private balconies or terraces with seating. All are equipped with a 42-inch flat-screen TV, tea/coffee making facilities, hairdryers, and a safety deposit box. Suites include a separate living area with sea views, while some rooms feature direct pool access or their own plunge pool. Additional services include a kid's club, meeting facilities, and an outdoor spa bath. Free on-site parking is provided and a shuttle can take guests to the city centre or Fisherman's Village. Prana Resorts Samui (SHA Certified) is a 10-minute drive from Samui Airport and a 3-minute drive from both Fisherman's Village and the Big Buddha. Chaweng Beach and Central Festival Samui are also a short drive away. Koh Phangan, with its monthly full moon party, is just 30 minutes by ferry from the nearby port. From personal beach bags and delicious candy treats to super comfy beds and fresh flowers, it’s the little touches that make a difference at Prana. Perfect for couples, singles, groups, and families — rated 8.5 for a two-person trip.

name: Explorar Koh Samui - Adults Only Resort and Spa
address: 44/134 Moo 1, Koh Samui 84330
description: Set in a prime location of Samui, Sensimar Koh Samui puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. All the necessary facilities, including free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, fireplace, infirmary, are at hand. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with television LCD/plasma screen, complimentary instant coffee, complimentary tea, fireplace, free welcome drink. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room or take advantage of the hotel's recreational facilities, including snorkeling, private beach, fitness center, outdoor pool, water sports (non-motorized). For reliable service and professional staff, Sensimar Koh Samui caters to your needs.priceline.com

name: Conrad Koh Samui Residences
address: 49/8-9 Moo 4 Hillcrest Road, Koh Samui 84140
description: Conrad Koh Samui Residences are situated within Conrad Koh Samui Resort & Spa on Thailand's third largest island, Koh Samui, surrounded by the azure waters of the Gulf of Thailand. The idyllic luxury resort island is highly accessible from key gateway cities in Southeast Asia and only a 60-minute flight from Bangkok. Located on the south-western tip of the island, the residences showcase dazzling sunset views from all 15 of its two- and three-bedroom Oceanview Pool Villas. These deluxe villas are set over two levels. Separate living and dining rooms with kitchenette are located on the upper level, and bedrooms, private pool and outdoor deck are on the lower level. The villas are perfect for families and friends who wish to share the ultimate vacation experience. The 25-acre property consists entirely of beautifully decorated, free-standing contemporary Thai-style villas built along the rocky peninsula to ensure the greatest level of privacy and unobstructed ocean views. Conrad's array of world-class facilities cater to every need - from incredible culinary delights at three restaurants, two lounges and bar, private wine cellar and in-villa dining experience to beach-side activities and water sports – and enable guests to keep to their routines, discover new experiences, or just relax at the award-winning spa. Young families will be delighted with the large, infinity-edge main pool with an ocean view, and the Kid's Club, which also offers babysitting services and fun activities. Guests will find basic items at the resort shop. For those who wish to shop for local goods, the DoiTung Lifestyle Shop sells Thai handicrafts and momentos made by hilltribe people in the north of Thailand. Conrad Koh Samui Residences is an ideal choice for conferences, intimate meetings and celebrations. From spectacular gala events to informal celebrations or a private beachfront wedding, the resort offers a unique variety of indoor and outdoor locations to create the wedding of your dreams.Hilton

name: The Sarann
address: 95-96 Moo 3, Chaweng Noi Beach, Koh Samui 84320
description: Nestled on the tip of Koh Samuis pristine Chaweng Noi beach, The Sarann is an intimate oceanfront villa resort offering a distinctive level of relaxation and luxury. The name 'The Sarann' refers to a state of mind where all worries drift away and one's spirit is at peace. A stones throw from Koh Samuis main dining and nightlife area, and just 20 minutes from the airport, the resort offers a beautiful balance between quiet and convenience.iHotelier/iStay

name: Weekender Resort
address: 124/19 Lamai Beach, Koh Samui 84310
description: Be warmly welcomed by the friendly staff and stunning views of Weekender Resort, which offers comfortably furnished rooms and easy access to the entertainment. The resort is located in the centre of the Lamai Beach area. It is 15 km from Samui Airport. Equipped with all the necessary amenities, rooms are furnished with air conditioning, en-suite bathroom with shower and bathtub, as well as free bottled water daily. Soak up the sun while lounging around the swimming pool, or enjoy the view of the sea while taking a refreshing dip. To soothe your muscles, indulge in a traditional Thai massage while the calming sea breeze relaxes you. After working up an appetite, head over to Weekender Resort's stylish on-site restaurant. Overlooking the beach, it serves fresh seafood, as well as a delicious selection of Thai and Western food.

name: Homm Chura Samui
address: 99/9 Moo 2 Chaweng Beach, Koh Samui 84320
description: Featuring a beach area, Chura Samui boasts relaxing massage treatments and a white marble infinity pool overlooking Chaweng Beach. This hotel offers free WiFi in all areas. Decorated in earth tones, the contemporary air-conditioned rooms overlook the tropical garden and feature a lounge area. A flat-screen TV and DVD player are provided. Private bathrooms feature double sinks. Chura Samui is a 5-minute drive from bars and restaurants and a 10-minute drive from Samui International Airport. For meals, fresh seafood awaits guests at this property. Alternatively, sip on a cocktail whilst enjoying views and refreshing sea breeze at the bar. Guests can have breakfast, prepared to order, and served at KAN Restaurant. Guests may exercise in the gym or make travel arrangements at the tour desk.

name: The Lamai Samui
address: 146/24 Moo4 Lamai Beach, Koh Samui 84310
description: The Lamai Samui is situated on Koh Samui, and provides 5-star accommodation as well as a private beach. Boasting views of Gulf of Thailand (Thailand), it also offers a wide range of facilities, including complimentary Wi-Fi, private parking and an outdoor pool. This luxury hotel provides a gym, a concierge and a 24-hour reception. Forming part of the hotel are the beautifully manicured grounds, designed for taking a relaxing walk. The rooms at The Lamai Samui are air-conditioned and offer slippers, a refrigerator and a mini bar. They come with bottled water, an in-room safe and tea and coffee making facilities. The Lamai Samui provides a variety of places to have a meal, including The Plate and The Lounge. There is a range of breakfast options on offer every morning. The hotel is an ideal place to discover nearby Koh Taen and Chaweng Noi Beach, as well as everything the local area has to offer. Chaweng and Bo Phut are also a brief car ride from the property.Revato

name: Celes Samui
address: 175/3 Thaveerat-Pakdee Road, Koh Samui 84320
description: Admirably located right next to the beach, Celes BeachFront Resort - Koh Samui offers stylish accommodation. The resort building is designed to allow natural light in the lobby area. The outdoor pool directly faces a panoramic view of the sea and has comfortable relaxing areas and shades. Guests can enjoy drinks at the poolside bar. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and free private parking is offered on site. With a private balcony overlooking the refreshing views, all spacious rooms at this property feature an air conditioning and wooden floor. Each room provides a seating area for guests to relax in and a flat-screen TV to enjoy. Extras include an electric kettle, complimentary coffee/tea and bottles of water. The en suite bathroom comes with a shower and premium amenities. Guests can indulge in pampering spa treatments or work out at the fitness centre. Staff are 24-hour available at the front desk. Surcharged airport shuttle service can be arranged upon request. Fisherman Village is 2.2 km from the property, while Bo Phut Pier is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Samui Airport, 8 km from Celes BeachFront Resort - Koh Samui.

name: Anahata Resort
address: 95/70 Moo 2, Lipa Noi, Koh Samui 84140
description: Anahata Resort is located on Lipa Noi Beach on the western coast of Koh Samui. This Eco-friendly, traditional Thai tropical beachfront hideaway boasts 2 accommodation areas, connected by a beach front path. All guests rooms are air-conditioned and include a tea/coffee maker. Free drinking water is available throughout your stay when you purchase the Trash Hero bottle or if you have your own recyclable bottle. Guests staying at Anahata Resort can enjoy traditional Thai massages and spa treatments at a pavilion by the beach or in the indoor treatment rooms, with experienced therapists and products that are chemical free. You can watch the the sunset, at the beachfront restaurant, Alchemy Cafe and Juice Bar, which offers an extensive selection of raw, vegan, vegetarian and healthy Flexitarian Thai and fusion foods. The property selects local, natural and organic ingredients to create delicious and nutritious dishes. Many of the ingredients used are grown in the properties garden. The helpful staff can also provide assistance in motorbike and car rentals. For those looking for more activities, the on-site tour desk can arrange day trips and other activities. Yoga classes and group activities on site are available at an additional charge. Anahata Resort is just steps away from Niki Beach Samui. The resort is a short 10-minute drive from Lipa Noi Pier and a 15-minute ride from Nathon Town. Samui Airport is approximately 29 km away.

name: Zazen Boutique Resort & Spa
address: 177 Moo 1, Bophut Beach, Koh Samui 84320
description: The award-winning Zazen Boutique Resort & Spa, which means "finding inner peace" in Japanese, is located on a private beachfront on Bo Phut Beach. This peaceful sanctuary features an outdoor pool, free Wi-Fi and 3 dining options. The luxurious non-smoking bungalows and villas feature modern Thai decor, high ceilings and large living spaces. All are equipped with a flat-screen TV, DVD player and an open-air bathroom with a rainshower. Zazen Boutique Resort & Spa is about a 15-minute walk from Fisherman Village. The resort provides free parking and is a 10-minute drive from the Big Buddha Temple. Guests can relax with a massage at the garden spa, take a yoga class or go windsurfing. A hot tub and water sports facilities are also available. Travel and sightseeing arrangements can be made at the tour desk. Thai and international dishes can be enjoyed at the beachfront Zazen Restaurant. Refreshing cocktails are offered at Rouge Lounge, while Le Salon de Ti serves high tea.

name: Nikki Beach Resort & Spa
address: 96/3 Moo 2, Lipa Noi, Koh Samui 84140
description: Steps from Lipa Noi’s beautiful sunset coast, the luxurious Nikki Beach Resort & Spa offers relaxing stays with an exclusive beachfront and modern bungalows. This chic boutique resort features a beachfront pool, fitness facilities and soothing massages. A short drive from various attractions, Nikki Beach Resort & Spa is 15 km from Nathon Pier and 10 km from beautiful Namuang Waterfall. It offers free parking and is a 45-minute drive from Samui Airport. Featuring tasteful dark wood furnishings, bungalows open out to sweeping views of Thailand’s Gulf or tropical greenery. They have a 42-inch flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. Lazy afternoons can be spent on day beds by the landscaped pool or with a soothing massage in the outdoor pavilion. Staff are on hand to help coordinate daily activities and tours. The spa centre offers a copious variety of treatments ranging from body massages, scrubs, facials and steam room sessions. Tropical garden views accompany seafood, Thai and international specialities at Nikki’s restaurant. After-meal drinks and signature cocktails can be enjoyed at the bar, which features a DJ and Nikki Beach’s signature brand of music and entertainment.

name: Hansar Samui Resort & Spa
address: 101/28 Moo1, Koh Samui 84320
description: Located on Bophut Beach, Hansar Samui features sea view rooms. Less than 500 metres away from Fisherman’s Village, it also offers dining outlets, a fitness centre and an infinity pool. The resort’s spacious rooms feature handmade furniture, wooden floors and stone basins. Each room has a living area with a daybed. Modern amenities include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and free WiFi access. Hansar Samui’s H-Bistro serves local and Western dishes and seafood. To sip drinks with views of the sea, guests can head to the resort’s Pool and Beach Bar or the Chill Lounge. Guests of Hansar Samui can work out at the fitness centre or enjoy body treatments at the spa. A tour desk can assist with travel and sightseeing arrangements. Hansar Samui Resort & Spa is a 10-minute drive from Koh Samui Airport.

name: Paradise Island Estate
address: 74/82 Moo 5, T. Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a soaking tub and a rainfall showerhead, as well as a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a stovetop. Other amenities include Frette Italian sheets, premium bedding, a Select Comfort bed, and down comforters.Expedia

name: New Star Beach Resort
address: 83 Moo 3 Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Situated on Chaweng Beach in Koh Samui, New Star Beach Resort offers luxurious beachfront accommodation. It features an infinity-edge pool and 2 dining options. Free parking is provided. Rooms and villas are decorated in a tropical style with wooden furnishings. Each room has a private balcony, TV and minibar. Treat yourself to a massage at Akiira Spa, or go on a dive trip or an elephant trek. Other facilities include laundry service and car rental. Breakfast buffet is served at Lime Restaurant, which offers indoor and al fresco seating. Sip afternoon tea at the Lobby Lounge or arrange for a meal by the pool. New Star Beach Resort is a 15-minute drive from Samui Airport.

name: Thai Fight Hotel
address: 26/1-3 moo3 Tambol Maret Lamai Beach, Koh samui, Koh Samui 84310
description: Situated in Lamai, 200 metres from Rocky's Beach, Thai Fight Hotel features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Boasting room service, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant and a terrace. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared lounge and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Thai Fight Hotel the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an Asian breakfast. Thai Fight Hotel offers 4-star accommodation with a hot tub. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Lamai Beach, Grandfather's Grandmother's Rocks and Lamai Viewpoint. The nearest airport is Samui International Airport, 14 km from Thai Fight Hotel.

name: Samaya Bura Beach Resort - Koh Samui
address: 171/4-9 Moo 4, Lamai, T Maret, Koh Samui 84310
description: The 3.5-star Samaya Bura Hotel offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Samui. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Take advantage of the hotel's free Wi-Fi in all rooms, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, room service, babysitting. Television LCD/plasma screen, slippers, towels, umbrella, separate living room can be found in selected guestrooms. Access to the hotel's hot tub, fitness center, outdoor pool, pool (kids), garden will further enhance your satisfying stay. Discover all Samui has to offer by making Samaya Bura Hotel your base.Agoda

name: Karma Resort
address: 182/3 Moo 1, Koh Samui 84320
description: Facing the beachfront, Karma Resort - SHA Extra Plus offers 4-star accommodation in Bophut and features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre and garden. A few steps from Bophut Beach and 1.7 km from Mae Nam Beach, the property offers a shared lounge and a terrace. Guests can enjoy American and French dishes at the restaurant or have a cocktail at the bar.
