The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a patio and a private bathroom with a bidet. Selected rooms here will provide you with a kitchen with a fridge, an oven and a microwave. At Karma Resort - SHA Extra Plus all rooms come with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or American options. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Bophut, like hiking, snorkelling and cycling. W Koh Samui Beach is 2 km from Karma Resort - SHA Extra Plus, while Fisherman Village is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Samui International, 5 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Ritz-Carlton Koh Samui
address: 9/123 Moo 5, Tambon Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Surrounded by the crystal-clear waters of the Gulf of Thailand, our Koh Samui resort is located in a world-renowned island paradise that boasts turquoise waters and perfect beaches with a more laidback and authentic lifestyle. The Ritz-Carlton, Koh Samui - nestled within the private bay at the island’s northern tip and set in a 58 acres of a former coconut plantation – features a variety of suites and private pool villas that suit every guest's needs. It is perfect for wellbeing and leisure with its unique facilities, guest activities and experiences embracing the southern Thai culture and tradition within the resort. Highlights at our Koh Samui 5-star hotel include Muay Thai boxing classes, local-inspired treatment at Spa Village Koh Samui and a vibrant culinary journey at restaurants and bars as well as southern Thai cooking classes.Marriott

name: Samujana Villas
address: 63/154 Moo 5, Baan Plai Laem, Koh Samui 84320
description: Samujana Villas is located on Koh Samui, and offers 5-star facilities, including a private beach, an infinity pool and a butler service. It has a gym, as well as outdoor tennis courts, free Wi-Fi and a private cinema. The property provides a garden to unwind in, as well as free private parking on site. It offers body treatments and a sun deck, as well as fitness classes. All the villas at Samujana Villas include direct pool access, plus all the essentials for an enjoyable stay. They are air conditioned and offer a marble bathroom, a coffee maker and a private garden. A mini bar, a private terrace and a private balcony are also provided to guests. Samujana Villas has easy access to Choeng Mon Beach. Those wanting to explore the area can also visit Chaweng, located within an easy drive of the property.Revato

name: Samui Bayview Resort & Spa
address: 104 Moo 3, Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Standing on the green hills of Chaweng Noi, Samui Bayview Resort & Spa - SHA Plus offers guests breathtaking views of the sea and a peaceful location close to the busy city centre of Chaweng. The tranquil Samui Bayview Resort overlooks the most popular beach of Koh Samui. Among the facilities provided by Samui Bayview Resort & Spa - SHA Plus are an outdoor pool overlooking the sea and a fine spa offering treatments like outdoor massages. The Bayview Restaurant awaits you with delicious food paired with panoramic views of Chaweng Beach or Chaweng’s night lights. Every room is furnished with an Asian touch and comes with modern amenities. The suites offer a hot tub on the balcony while other rooms provide private balconies with beautiful sea views.

name: Rawi Warin Resort and Spa
address: 139 Moo 8, Ko Lanta 81150
description: Rawi Warin Resort And Spa - SHA Extra Plus offers 5-star luxury with 4 large outdoor pools, fitness centre. Boasting 5 dining options, it offers stunning views of Klong Tob Bay. Featuring spacious layouts and private balconies, modern Thai-style rooms have fine wood furnishings and flooring. They are fitted with cable TV. A fridge and tea/coffee making amenities are provided. For relaxation, there is a library and games room with numerous facilities. Leisure activities can be planned at the tour desk. Specialising in seafood dishes, The Watermark offers diners a memorable outdoor dining experience. Hearty breakfasts and international dishes are available at The Golden Pond. The Wave Bar serves light refreshments. Rawi Warin Resort And Spa - SHA Extra Plus is a 2-hour car and ferry transfer from Krabi Airport. From Krabi Airport, it is about an hour’s flight from Suvarnabhumi International Airport.

name: Dusit Thani Pattaya
address: 240/2 Pattaya Beach Road, Pattaya 20150
description: Located in Pattaya, Dusit Thani Pattaya offers relaxed 5-star accommodation, as well as an outdoor heated pool, a private beach and outdoor tennis courts. Guests also have exclusive access to the Devarana Spa and DFIT and Wellness Facilities. Dusit Thani offers free wireless internet, as well as a garden for guests to relax in. The hotel's amenities, such as meeting rooms, executive floor and photocopier, kids pool, kids club and playground, and massage make this an ideal choice for business travellers, families and couples alike. The rooms at Dusit Thani in Pattaya are air-conditioned and include slippers, a mini bar and a refrigerator. They come with an in-room safe, a flat-screen TV and a telephone. Dusit Thani Pattaya Hotel provides a range of places to have a meal, including Cascade and The Lobby Lounge. Places to dine at the hotel include Dusit Gourmet and The Bay Restaurant. Guests can also enjoy a drink at Chaba Pool Bar. Dusit Thani Pattaya Resort is located in the heart of Pattaya’s entertainment district with restaurants, cafés and nightlife on the doorstep. The hotel's multilingual staff will ensure that every guest has an enjoyable visit.Revato

name: Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya
address: 429 Moo 9, Pattaya Beach Road, Pattaya 20150
description: Stop at Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya to discover the wonders of Pattaya. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. All the necessary facilities, including 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, gift/souvenir shop, wheelchair accessible, are at hand. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, additional bathroom, additional toilet, complimentary instant coffee, complimentary tea. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool, spa, massage. Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya is an excellent choice from which to explore Pattaya or to simply relax and rejuvenate.priceline.com

name: The Yana Villas Hua Hin
address: 122/138 Soi Mooban Takieb, Nongkae, Hua Hin
description: Located in Hua Hin, a few steps from Khao Takiab Beach, The Yana Villas Hua Hin provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a terrace and a bar. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. Guest rooms at the resort come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Each room has a kettle, while selected rooms come with a patio and others also offer sea views. The units will provide guests with a fridge. A continental, American or Asian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Popular points of interest near The Yana Villas Hua Hin include Hua Hin Beach, Khao Takiap Temple and Cicada Market. The nearest airport is Hua Hin Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: Intercontinental Hua Hin Resort, An IHG Hotel
address: 33/33 Petchkasem Road, Hua Hin 77110
description: InterContinental Hua Hin Resort blends Eastern and Western design heritage set alongside sparkling gulf waters for a truly alluring destination. Two accommodation wings feature spacious rooms and suites as well as a swimming pool at each wing. Facilities and amenities include a spa, a fitness centre, versatile event spaces and wide-ranging food and drink venues. Club InterContinental accommodation level, meanwhile, provides guests with more benefits and highly personalised service.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Amari Pattaya
address: 240 Pattaya Beach Road, Pattaya 20150
description: The luxurious Amari Pattaya along Northern Pattaya is about 3 km from the famous Walking Street. It offers stunning sea views, an outdoor pool with a pool bar. Free parking and free WiFi is available in all rooms. Amari Pattaya is 84 km from Suvarnabhumi International Airport. Bangkok is a 2-hour ride away. The property also offers chargeable airport transfer services. All guest rooms and suites feature panoramic floor-to-ceiling windows or a private balcony overlooking the glittering bay. Fitted with wooden floors and warm lighting, they come with satellite TV, slippers and minibar. En suite bathrooms includes free toiletries and toothbrushes. Breeze Spa features a range of relaxing body massage and beauty treatments. Guests can also exercise at the fitness centre. Water sports activities are also available at the beach.

name: Anantasila Beach Resort Hua Hin
address: 33/17 Soi Mooban Huadon, Petchasem Road, Hua Hin 77110
description: A lovely beachfront property just outside Hua Hin Town, Anantasila Beach Resort Hua Hin offers a relaxing getaway with an outdoor pool and sea-facing restaurant. Rooms and villas are nestled amidst tropical gardens. Decorated with Thai-style furnishings and beddings, Anantasila’s rooms feature floor-to-ceiling windows with views of surrounding greenery. Each room comes with cable TV, a DVD player and a safety deposit box. Private bathrooms have a bathtub and shower. Guests can play a round of mini golf, or relax on the sun loungers provided on the beach. Massages can be enjoyed on the beach, by the pool, or in the privacy of guests’ rooms. Beach views accompany meals at the restaurant, which serves Thai, Western and Italian specialities. Cocktails are available at the beach bar. Anantasila Villa is a 15-minute drive from Hua Hin’s town centre. It provides a free shuttle to a bus stop where guests can catch a minibus to the town centre.

name: Layana Resort & Spa
address: 272 Moo 3 Saladan, Ko Lanta 81150
description: Layana Resort and Spa is located in Ko Lanta and offers free Wi-Fi. Guests also have exclusive access to the on-site Linger Longer Spa and Wellness Pool. Guests staying at Layana Resort and Spa can enjoy taking a dip in the outdoor pool, working out in the fitness centre or unwinding with a drink in the bar. Guests can try out the recreational facilities on offer, such as a sauna and a playground. There is also free private parking on site for those travelling with a car. Each room is equipped with an iPod docking station, a mini bar and a refrigerator. All are air conditioned and provide slippers, an in-room dining area and a flat-screen TV. Layana Resort houses Seasky, which serves breakfast, lunch and dinner and provides guests with all they need for an enjoyable night within the resort. Located within a short walk of Layana Resort And Spa Koh Lanta is Serenity Massage and Spa. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to organise tours and activities in Ko Lanta.Revato

name: SYLVAN Koh Chang
address: 63 Moo 4 Koh Chang, Ko Chang
description: SYLVAN Koh Chang is situated on Ko Chang, and offers 5-star accommodation in addition to a private beach. Guests also have exclusive access to the Rainforest Spa and Swimming Pool. Those staying at the resort can begin their day at Kids Area, or use the various leisure amenities, including an outdoor pool. There is also free public parking on site for guests travelling with a car. A kids club, a kids pool and free Wi-Fi are also available. The rooms at SYLVAN Koh Chang are air-conditioned and offer a mini bar, a coffee maker and a refrigerator. Each includes a private bathroom with slippers, bathrobes and a shower. Guests of the resort can wake up to breakfast daily at Sunset Restaurant, plus dinner at Sea View 1989 in the evening. For those wishing to dine out during their stay at SYLVAN Koh Chang, there are a selection of restaurants located nearby. It is conveniently situated just moments from Mu Ko Chang National Park.Revato

name: Hilton Hua Hin Resort & Spa
address: 33 Naresdamri Road, Hua Hin 77110
description: Situated on the shores of the Gulf of Thailand, Hilton Hua Hin Resort & Spa is located in the heart of the royal town of Hua Hin yet tucked away from the hustle and bustle of city life: well-known for its royal legacy, pristine white beaches, shopping areas and golf courses. Find your respite in a traditional Thai massage or herbal steam bath at the luxurious eforea Spa, relax by the lagoon-shaped pool, or simply unwind from the privacy of the spacious guest room, each with private balcony and ocean views. Choose from an array of restaurant and bars, offering a range of options from fresh seafood and authentic Thai cuisine with International flair to hand-crafted cocktails at the Sky Bar on 17th floor. Host social gatherings or business meetings in this beautiful Hua Hin hotel supported by the latest audio/visual technology and five versatile function rooms for up to 600 guests.Hilton

name: Saii Phi Phi Island Village
address: 49 Moo 8, Ko Phi Phi 81000
description: Escape to SAii Phi Phi Island Village, a dream-like tropical resort on a private 800-metre stretch of pristine white sandy beach lapped by the turquoise waters of the Andaman Sea. The resort is set amid 70 acres of coconut palm plantations, in the privacy of Loh Ba Gao Bay on the peaceful northeast coast of beautiful Phi Phi Island. Accommodations include 189 traditional Thai-style bungalows and 12 exclusive Hillside Pool Villas. Each villa has its own private pool overlooking the island’s magnificent scenery. Resort facilities include five restaurants, three bars, a spa, gift shop, recreation centre, 5-Star PADI dive centre, fitness room, two large swimming pools and tennis courts. At the Marine Discovery Centre, experts educate and inspire guests and locals with sustainability efforts including raising baby sharks and clownfish. Having been off-limits to the public for three and a half years to allow for environmental rejuvenation, Maya Bay in Ko Phi Phi National Park has now officially reopened to tourists and, as one of Thailand’s true national treasures, is a must-visit destination.

name: Santhiya Koh Yao Yai Resort & Spa
address: 88 Moo 7, Phunai, Ko Yao Yai 83000
description: Santhiya Koh Yao Yai Resort & Spa is set on Ko Yao Yai, and provides 5-star facilities, including an infinity pool and a waterfall pool. Guests also have exclusive access to the on-site Ayurvana Spa and Swimming pool. This cosy resort offers valet parking, a beauty centre and free Wi-Fi. Additionally, the multilingual staff are available to provide local information. The rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a refrigerator, a mini bar and a private balcony. All feature their own bathroom with robes and amenities. Guests of Santhiya Koh Yao Yai Resort & Spa are welcome to experience seafood, Thai and international cuisine at By The Sea Restaurant and Bar, or try Thai dishes at Chantara Restaurant. A buffet breakfast is served each morning.Revato

name: Mövenpick Siam Hotel Na Jomtien Pattaya
address: 55 Moo 2, Pattaya 20250
description: Welcome to Na Jomtien Beach, a burgeoning district on Thailand's eastern seaboard, home to Moevenpick Siam Hotel Na Jomtien Pattaya. Offering direct beach access, luxurious facilities, and a warm sense of Swiss hospitality, Mövenpick Siam Hotel Na Jomtien Pattaya has everything guests need for a relaxing and enjoyable stay.accorhotels.com

name: Hua Hin Marriott Resort and Spa
address: 107/1 Phetkasem Road, Hua Hin 77110
description: Gazing out over one of the most magnificent beaches in Thailand, Hua Hin Marriott Resort & Spa offers luxury services and accommodation, gorgeous landscaping, upscale amenities and direct access to the sand and surf. The Night Market and other Hua Hin attractions are just a few moments away from our hotel. Our strikingly manicured grounds include a lagoon that winds through the resort, five pools and several superb restaurants, highlighted by a seafood eatery right on the beach. Stretch out in spacious accommodations with a blend of contemporary convenience and unique Thai design. Our rooms feature featherbed mattresses, marble bathrooms and high-speed internet access. Quan Spa is a tranquil oasis offering soothing treatments and our fitness center offers everything resort guests need to stay healthy during your stay in Hua Hin. For those planning a romantic wedding or important business event in Hua Hin, our hotel’s versatile event spaces include a ballroom, boardrooms and picturesque outdoor spaces.Marriott

name: Paradee
address: 76 Moo 4, Tumbol Phe, Amphur Mueng, Ko Samet 21160
description: Located on the palm-fringed beaches of Koh Samed Island, Paradee hotel offers teak and Thai silk decorated villas with a private balcony and free internet connection. It features an on-site library. Paradee features thatched-roof villas with a separate living area and spacious bathroom. All villas have private pools and a patio. They are equipped a flat-screen television, DVD player and mini-bar. Rejuvenating massage treatments can be enjoyed at Paradee's spa or head out to the sea for windsurfing and snorkelling. Island day trips and diving lessons are available at the hotel. Cocktails are served at Sunset Bar. Guests can also enjoy Paradee's on-site restaurant, which serves a delicious selection of Thai and international dishes.

name: Ana Anan Resort & Villas Pattaya
address: 288, Moo 2, Soi Na Jomtien 20, Sattahip
description: Located in Na Jomtien, 100 metres from South Na Jomtien Beach, Ana Anan Resort & Villas Pattaya provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a kids' club and a shared lounge, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests. At the resort, every room has a wardrobe. All rooms are complete with a private bathroom and air conditioning, and certain rooms here will provide you with a terrace. All units include a safety deposit box. Ana Anan Resort & Villas Pattaya offers an American or Asian breakfast. North Na Jomtien Beach is 500 metres from the accommodation, while Eastern Star Golf Course is 32 km away. The nearest airport is U-Tapao Rayong-Pattaya International Airport, 32 km from Ana Anan Resort & Villas Pattaya.

name: Hilton Tokyo Odaiba
address: 1 Chome-9-1 Daiba, Tokyo 135-8625
description: Located in the waterfront area of Tokyo Bay, Hilton Tokyo Odaiba enjoys spectacular 180-degree ocean views. Each guest room provides stunning views of Tokyo's skyline, Rainbow Bridge or Tokyo Tower from a private balcony. The hotel is situated just minutes from a popular entertainment and shopping area as well as a key business and commercial district. With a wide selection of dining options and two levels of flexible meeting facilities, the Hilton Tokyo Odaiba hotel offers both business and leisure travelers a memorable stay like no other.Hilton

name: Andaz Tokyo Toranomon Hills - a concept by Hyatt
address: 1-23-4 Toranomon, Minato-ku, Tokyo 105-0001
description: Opened in June 2014, Andaz Tokyo, the 12th hotel of the Andaz brand by Hyatt features a spa, a fitness centre and an indoor pool with a view. This completely non-smoking, 5-star hotel is centrally located just a 15-minute walk from Tokyo Tower and an 18-minute walk from the Imperial Palace. Toranomon Subway Station is a 5-minute walk away. Rooms at Andaz Tokyo - A Concept by Hyatt include free WiFi access, complimentary snacks, soft drinks and other non-alcoholic beverages from the minibar, and a modern en suite bathroom with hairdryer. A flat-screen TV and free domestic phone calls are also included. Next to the Andaz Lounge on the 51st floor is the main dining venue, The Tavern - Grill & Lounge. Guests will be served refined European provincial cuisine cooked with fresh Japanese produces. The roof-top bar on the 52nd floor offers breathtaking views of the city. Andaz, meaning 'personal style' in Hindi, offers a variety of facilities and services. Guests can get a soothing massage at a surcharge, order room service or relax in the sauna. Laundry, dry cleaning and luggage storage services are available at the 24-hour front desk. Andaz Tokyo - A Concept by Hyatt is located within an 18-minute walk from the fancy Ginza district and a 14-minute train ride from the Marunouchi area. Haneda Airport is just 20 km away from the hotel and Narita International Airport can be reached within 1 hour train ride.

name: Grand Prince Hotel Osaka Bay
address: 1-13-11 Nanko-Kita, Suminoe-Ku, Osaka 599-0034
description: Set in a prime location of Osaka, Hyatt Regency Osaka Hotel puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Take advantage of the hotel's free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, facilities for disabled guests, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas. Television LCD/plasma screen, linens, towels, separate living room, internet access – wireless can be found in selected guestrooms. Take a break from a long day and make use of hot tub, fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool, indoor pool. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Osaka, Hyatt Regency Osaka Hotel will make you feel instantly at home.Agoda

name: Grand Prince Hotel Hiroshima
address: 23-1 Motoujina-machi Minami-ku, Hiroshima 734-8543
description: -G7 Hiroshima Summit 2023 Venue- Overlooking the Seto Inland Sea, Grand Prince Hotel is located a 15-minute drive from central Hiroshima. The hotel offers 5 dining options, a outdoor pool (only summer) and hot spring baths. The hotel is featured in Michelin Green Guide Japan 2013. A free shuttle is available from Hiroshima Station, a 30-minute ride away. Luggage storage is available at its Welcome Counter at the station. Hiroshima Peace Memorial Park and the Atomic Bomb Dome are a 15-minute drive. Miyajima Island is 25 minutes away by high-speed boat from Motoujina Pier, located in front of the hotel. Air-conditioned rooms with a large picture window and a flat-screen TV await guests of the Grand Prince Hotel Hiroshima. Guests can unwind with a bath or watch satellite TV channels. Guests can use the on-site fitness and relaxation facilities such as the spa, sauna, jet bath, fitness centre or massage salon, all at an additional charge. The hotel also provides a business centre, travel desk and concierge services. Nadaman Restaurant offers Japanese dishes and 20th-floor views. Riho serves a Chinese menu, and guests can enjoy Hiroshima speciality Okonomi-yaki at Kakkun. A cafe, bar, buffet restaurant and steak & seafood restaurant are also on site.

name: Yokohama Royal Park Hotel
address: 2-2-1-3, Minatomirai, Nishi, Yokohama 220-8173
description: Located above the 52nd floor of Yokohama Landmark Tower, all rooms at Yokohama Royal Park Hotel offer free WiFi and views of Yokohama City or the Yokohama Bay Bridge. Guests can take a swim at the indoor pool at the fitness centre with addtional charge, enjoy various cuisines at the 8 dining venues or request soothing massage treatments for an extra cost. Minatomirai Subway Station is a 3-minute walk and JR Sakuragicho Train Station is a 5-minute walk away. All spacious air-conditioned rooms are located between the 52nd and 67th floor, featuring carpeted floors and a flat-screen satellite TV. Each comes with a minibar and an electric kettle with green tea bags. The en suite bathroom includes a bathtub and nightwear is provided for all guests. The 24-hour front desk provides dry cleaning services, luggage storage and daily newspapers. Guests can use the business centre or make travel arrangements at the concierge desk. Local gifts can be purchased at the hotel’s souvenir shop. Landmark Spa is located on the 49th floor, and above 18 years old guests can use the facilities at a surcharge. There is also a barber and beauty shop, as well as a photo studio at the property. Offering spectacular views from the 68th floor, restaurant Shikitei offers Japanese dishes, and French full courses are served at Le Ciel restaurant. You can enjoy a late-night cocktail with panoramic views of Yokohama Bay at the Sirius Lounge, located on the 70th floor. Royal Park Hotel Yokohama is a 20-minute walk from the Red Brick Warehouse and Yokohama Chinatown. The Pacifico Yokohama convention centre is an 8-minute walk away. Guests can take a 50-minute limousine bus ride to Haneda International Airport or a 2-hour limousine bus ride to Narita International Airport (charges apply).

name: Intercontinental Yokohama Grand, An IHG Hotel
address: 1-1-1 Minatomirai, Nishi-ku, Yokohama
description: The InterContinental Yokohama Grand soars magnificently above the transformed city centre like a sleek yacht under sail. You will find a host of attractions within easy reach of the hotel, including Yokohama Cosmo World, Motomachi, a famous Yokohama shopping street, and Yamashita Park. The Yokohama Cup Noodle Museum is just 5-minutes walk away. You'll find that this iconic business hotel in Yokohama caters to your every need, including a fitness centre, spa, lounge bar and five restaurants.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: The Kahala Hotel & Resort Yokohama
address: 1-1-3 Minatomirai, Yokohama 220-0012
description: Ideally located in Yokohama, The Kahala Hotel & Resort Yokohama, open from September 2020, offers lavishly-decorated air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This non-smoking 5-star modern hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, shops onsite, spa and fitness facilities for the guest's comfort. At The Kahala Hotel & Resort Yokohama all stylish rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV. The en suite bathroom offers both bath and shower with free toiletries. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Pacifico Yokohama, Cupnoodles Museum and Yokohama Museum. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda International, 32 km from The Kahala Hotel & Resort Yokohama, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Apa Hotel & Resort Yokohama Bay Tower
address: 5-25-3 Kaigandori, Naka, Yokohama 231-0002
description: Situated in Yokohama, 1.8 km from Yokohama Marine Tower, APA Hotel & Resort Yokohama Bay Tower features a spa and wellness centre. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 500 metres from Yokohama Cosmo World and 600 metres from Cupnoodles Museum. The hotel has a restaurant, and Sankeien is 6 km away. A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Speaking English and Japanese at the 24-hour front desk, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area. Nissan Stadium is 11 km from the hotel, while Red Brick Warehouse is 600 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda International Airport, 29 km from the property.

name: Kobe Portopia Hotel
address: 6-10-1 Minatojima-nakamachi, Chuo, Kobe 650-0046
description: Offering 13 restaurants, cafes and bars and a 24-hour front desk, Kobe Portopia Hotel is conveniently located just a 5-minute walk from Shimin Hiroba Station on the Port Island Line. Free WiFi access is available throughout the property. A free shuttle service from JR Sannomiya Station and Shinkobe Station is also available. Rooms here will provide you with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a minibar. Rooms are equipped with a refrigerator, an electric kettle and a green tea set. En suite bathrooms come with free toiletries, a hairdryer and a bath. Portopia Hotel Kobe offers an indoor pool, a fitness centre and a tennis court. In addition, reception services such as a concierge service, currency exchange and luggage storage are also offered. A wide variety of Japanese, French, Chinese and Western cuisines are available at the many restaurants, cafes and bars on site. The Nankin-machi China Town area is a 10-minute train ride away, while Sannomiya Station is a 15-minute shuttle bus ride away. Kobe Kitano Ijinkai-gai can be accessed within a 25-minute train ride. Kansai International Airport is a 65-minute shuttle bus ride away from Sannomiya Station.

name: Hilton Tokyo Bay
address: 1-8 Maihama, Urayasu 279-0031
description: Enjoy panoramic ocean views from Hilton Tokyo Bay, the official hotel of Tokyo Disney Resort®. The iconic, crescent-shaped hotel is situated on the eastern shore of Tokyo Bay and is just 20 minutes from Tokyo Station. Enjoy a great family day out at the nearby Tokyo Disneyland® and Tokyo DisneySea®. Soak up the Japanese culture with a visit to the Imperial Palace or Asakusa. Spend the afternoon window shopping at downtown Ginza, Mitsui Outlet Park at Makuhari or one of Tokyo's largest malls, LaLaPort Tokyo Bay - destinations that are sure to delight all shoppers. In the evening, relax and enjoy Shanghai specialties at Dynasty restaurant, one of this Tokyo Bay hotel’s five restaurants and bars. Stay in one of the uniquely styled Tokyo Bay guest rooms. Enjoy the magical fantasy experience at Happy Magic Room or celebrate special occasions at our celebrio rooms. Our 16 elegant function rooms, which overlook the breathtaking Tokyo Bay, are modern and accommodate up to 1,400 guests. Hilton Tokyo Bay is the ideal choice for your next conference, meeting, corporate or wedding event.Hilton

name: Hotel Okura Kobe
address: 2-1 Hatoba-Cho, Chuo, Kobe 650-8560
description: Hotel Okura Kobe is located on the waterfront, 500 metres from the Motomachi shopping area. Featuring Western-style rooms with free WiFi access, the hotel offers 6 dining options. Guest rooms offer both air conditioning and heating facilities. Each room is equipped with a fridge and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The en suite bathroom comes with a hairdryer and a bathtub. Guests can request air-purifiers for in-room use. Guests can work out at the fitness centre, the indoor pool or unwind in the sauna rooms at a surcharge. The hotel also has a seasonal outdoor pool and a tennis court. Laundry and dry cleaning services are available. Overlooking a Japanese garden, restaurant Yamazato serves regional specialities. Other restaurants offer French cuisines, Western and Chinese food. Hotel Okura Kobe offers a free shuttle service from Sannomiya Station. The hotel is adjacent to Meriken Park and Kobe Port Tower, and a 5-minute walk from Chinatown.

name: Hotel New Otani Makuhari
address: 2-120-3 Hibino, Mihama-ku, Chiba 286-0107
description: Located within a 5-minute walking distance from JR Kaihinmakuhari Train Station, Hotel New Otani Makuhari offers guests the luxury of choosing from 10 restaurants to dine at and a variety of outdoor and indoor activities. The hotel is situated just next to the Makuhari Messe and the Tokyo Disney Resort is a 20-minute train ride away. Carpeted rooms feature a flat-screen TV, air conditioning/heating and an en suite bathroom. Rooms also come with a refrigerator, an electric kettle and free toiletries. Guests can relax in the seating area and enjoy the view of Tokyo Bay or of Chiba City. At Hotel Makuhari New Otani, guests can access the indoor pool, spa and fitness centre at a cost. At a surcharge, guests can also enjoy the sauna, get a relaxing massage or break a sweat playing tennis. A 24-hour front desk and a gift shop can be found on site as well. Guests can dine at the All-Day Dining Satsuki, the Chinese Restaurant Taikanen or get a taste of Teppanyaki at Keyaki or Keyaki Sky Salon. Guests can also feast at one of the 3 authentic Japanese restaurants Senbazuru, Isshin or Sazanka. The Lounge Café or Bay Court Café and the Patisserie Satsuki are also open for light meals and desserts. Narita International Airport is 40-minutes by limousine bus and Haneda International Airport can be reached with a 70-minute bus ride. Guests can also access the Odaiba shopping malls within a 45-minute train ride from the hotel. In addition, Aeon Mall Makuhari New City is a 6-minute drive or 13-minutes by train and walk.

name: Shore Hotel
address: 1515 Ocean Avenue, Santa Monica, CA 90401
description: Located in Santa Monica, The Shore Hotel is a perfect starting point from which to explore Los Angeles (CA). The property offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Facilities like free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, gift/souvenir shop, ticket service, 24-hour front desk are readily available for you to enjoy. Closet, carpeting, slippers, flat screen television, mirror can be found in selected guestrooms. Take a break from a long day and make use of the hot tub, fitness center, golf course (within 3 km), outdoor pool. The Shore Hotel is an excellent choice from which to explore Los Angeles (CA) or to simply relax and rejuvenate.Agoda

name: Marina del Rey Marriott
address: 4100 Admiralty Way, Marina del Rey, CA 90292
description: Experience Southern California’s allure at the Marina del Rey Marriott. Overlooking Mother’s Beach, this boutique hotel offers a location that is a perfect balance of relaxation while accessible to the technology and entertainment industries in Playa Vista and Culver City. This dog friendly hotel will allow you and your furry friend to experience the beachside escape that is Marina Del Rey. Indulge in craft cocktails at the Sinder bar and outdoor patio, work out in our Fitness Center, and escape in our new M Club with indoor and outdoor lounges. Take a swim in our pool, cruise the beach on an electric bike, and experience a curated meal in our restaurant. We offer 20,000 square feet of flexible meeting space, including a rooftop ballroom with views of the marina and Pacific Ocean. At the end of the day, retreat to our modernized guest rooms with private balconies overlooking the marina or Santa Monica. Inspired by local influences, our hotel captivates both business and leisure guests alike.Marriott

name: Shutters on the Beach
address: 1 Pico Boulevard, Santa Monica, CA 90405
description: Located directly on the beach, this Santa Monica, California resort features 2 oceanfront restaurants, an outdoor swimming pool and a spa. Providing luxury white linens, every room offers plush bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries at Shutters On The Beach. Styled in hardwood floors with a refined Tibetan rug, each room provides an iPod docking station and a 42-inch flat-screen TV. An in-room library is offered. Select rooms offer a balcony and select rooms offer spacious spa bathtubs. Boasting a panoramic ocean view and an oversize elegant white fireplace, One Pico offers seasonal cuisine on intimate tables with blue plush chairs. The beachfront café, Coast offers a casual atmosphere with a bar and lite bites. Featuring a heated terrace with an ocean view, the Living Room features afternoon tea, cocktails and a full menu of freshly prepared morsels. A poolside outdoor hot tub is offered. Valet parking is provided. A gift shop is also available at Sutter On the Beach Santa Monica. Santa Monica Pier is just 5 minutes’ walk down the beach. Los Angeles International Airport is 9 miles away from Shutters On The Beach.

name: Kimpton EPIC Hotel
address: 270 Biscayne Boulevard Way, Miami, FL 33131
description: Why drive when you can sail? At Kimpton EPIC Hotel, Miami’s only downtown waterfront hotel with private dockside arrival, style always trumps convention. Live the good life right on Biscayne Bay, find some shade in a chic cabana at one of the two rooftop pools, or pull up a chair at one of the two savory, sultry restaurants. Kimpton EPIC Hotel is within a short stroll to downtown nightlife.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Four Seasons Hotel Miami
address: 1435 Brickell Avenue, Miami, FL 33131
description: Located above trendy Brickell Avenue, it's here where you will find the best of both big city adventure and tropical paradise, where a two-acre sun-kissed sanctuary overlooks the city's fashionable art, dining, and entertainment scenes all minutes from its doorstep A flat-screen cable TV, marble private bathroom, and a city or bay view are featured in all rooms. Four Seasons Hotel Miami also provides a seating area and desk with ergonomic chair. When guests are not in of the 2 outdoor pools, they can enroll in fitness classes like cycling or yoga. Access to free Wi-Fi, a hot tub, and sauna are provided to all Four Seasons Hotel guests. Edge, Steak & Bar features contemporary American cuisine from locally sourced seafood and vegetables to steaks in a dining room, bar, and outdoor terrace. Bahía offers poolside dining and beverages. Guests will find a variety of boutiques and eateries within 2 miles of the hotel at Bayside Marketplace. American Airlines Arena is 2 miles away.

name: Fortune House Hotel Suites
address: 185 Southeast 14th Terrace, Miami, FL 33131
description: On Brickell Avenue, and less than 3 miles from the Port of Miami, this apartment-style Florida hotel provides an outdoor pool, hot tub, and on-site restaurant. The spacious, fully-furnished suites at Fortune House Hotel feature a full kitchen, private laundromat, and a balcony. Separate bedrooms and a dining areas are also included. A state-of-the-art fitness center and sauna are available to all guests at the Hotel Fortune House. Guests will have access to free property-wide Wi-Fi and a 24-hour front desk for added convenience. Madison's Restaurant and Lounge serves unique fusion of contemporary and traditional Latin fare. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner are made-to-order from the menu. Fortune House is less than 2 miles from American Airlines Arena and a 15-minute drive from Miami Beach. Miami International Airport is less than 10 miles away.

name: Hotel Victor
address: 1144 Ocean Drive, Miami Beach, FL 33139
description: This luxury South Beach hotel features a pool overlooking the Atlantic Ocean. The rooms include flat-screen TVs and MP3 docking stations. Modern bathrooms with bathrobes are standard in the rooms at Hotel Victor South Beach. The rooms also include plush white bedding and windows with tropical views. Guests can relax in the hammam spa, which is a Turkish style bath house with massage services and other spa treatments. The property also offers bike rentals to explore South Beach. Hotel Victor South Beach is 5 minutes' walk of the Art Deco District. Lincoln Road Mall is within 5 minutes' drive of the property. The Versace Mansion is adjacent to the property.

name: Mr. C Miami - Coconut Grove
address: 2988 McFarlane Road, Miami, FL 33133
description: Located in Miami, a few steps from Cocowalk Shopping Center, Mr. C Miami - Coconut Grove has accommodations with free bikes, private parking, a fitness center and a garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi. The property provides evening entertainment and a concierge service. At the hotel, rooms contain a desk. Featuring a shared bathroom with a bath and free toiletries, certain accommodations at Mr. C Miami - Coconut Grove also feature a sea view. The rooms have a safety deposit box. An American breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Mr. C Miami - Coconut Grove has a terrace. Vizcaya Museum is 2.8 miles from the hotel, while University of Miami is 3.2 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Miami International Airport, 6.2 miles from Mr. C Miami - Coconut Grove.

name: Hilton Bentley Miami/South Beach
address: 101 Ocean Drive, Miami Beach, FL 33139
description: Daily Resort Charge will be added to the room rate and includes: Guest internet access: beach services (2 chairs, 2 bottles of water, 1 umbrella, towels): 15% discount on Spa & Salon services: 2 in-room bottles of water: small sunblock: turndown services on request: Pressreader.Experience the beautiful Hilton Bentley Miami/South Beach hotel at world-famous 101 Ocean Drive of South Beach, Miami. Discover a luxurious beachfront paradise in an intimate, elegant world-class setting. The Hilton Bentley hotel offers a stellar walk-to-anything location in South Beach's 'Sofi', a refined and sophisticated enclave of Miami Beach. Guests are footsteps to Miami Beach's playground of the finest restaurants and nightlife, one mile away from Lincoln Road and the Miami Beach Convention Center, three miles away from the Port of Miami, and only seven miles from Miami International Airport. Relax in style in the amenity-rich suites of Hilton Bentley. Offering modern elegance, each of our studio, one-bedroom, two-bedroom and penthouse suites have been designed to exquisite detail. Enjoy contemporary European furnishings, Italian marble floors,50-inch LCD TVs, and stainless steel gourmet kitchens and kitchenettes. Experience the majestic views of the Atlantic Ocean and Miami Beach.Hilton

name: The Palms Hotel & Spa
address: 3025 Collins Avenue, Miami Beach, FL 33140
description: This oceanfront hotel on Miami Beach has an outdoor pool in a tropical garden setting. Rooms feature Chromecast streaming. Select rooms have a separate seating areas. All rooms at the Palms Hotel & Spa have flat-screen TVs. Guests will find a work desk and ironing facilities, as well as BeeKind® toiletries. Views from the rooms include the hotel gardens, the cityscape or the Atlantic Ocean beaches. The on-site The Palms AVEDA Spa offers a variety of body care services. There’s Wi-Fi in the guest business center and throughout the hotel. Along with the pool, the hotel has a fitness center and is adjacent to the city pedestrian boardwalk. Guests can enjoy al fresco dining at Essensia Restaurant, which features sustainably-sourced ingredients prepared to showcase seasonal favorites. The hotel’s Tiki Bar provides poolside drinks. Guests can also use on-site beach amenities like lounge chairs and towels, along with food and beverage service. The Palms Hotel & Spa is one mile from the Julia Tuttle Causeway on Interstate 195. The Bayshore Municipal Golf Course is 2 miles from the hotel and Miami International Airport is 12 miles away.

name: Leslie Hotel Ocean Drive
address: 1244 Ocean Drive, Miami Beach, FL 33139
description: Hailing from 1937, Leslie Hotel offers art deco style in sunny Miami Beach. The hotel is located on Ocean Drive, directly across from the beach. Guestroom amenities include small refrigerators, flat-screen TVs, and private bathrooms complete with a shower and bath. Hardwood floors and rich accents abound. Select suits offer ocean views. The rooftop pool and spa is exclusive for guests of Leslie Hotel. The business center, indoor lounge area, and fitness center with aqua aerobics classes may also be enjoyed. Free WiFi is provided, as are beach towels, toys, and chairs. Enjoy the nightlife of the Art Deco District. during your stay The Miami International Airport is 9.3 mi away.

name: The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort
address: 9703 Collins Avenue, Miami Beach, FL 33154
description: The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort welcomes you to savor an exceptional experience at our exquisitely appointed retreat in Miami Beach, FL. Rising 27 stories over fashionable Collins Ave and a brilliant white-sand beach, our luxury hotel resides at the intersection of art, fashion and design. Prestigious Forbes Five-Star and AAA Five-Diamond accolades set the stage for unparalleled service and amenities. Step into spacious guest rooms and suites with direct ocean views from expansive private balconies. Then, luxuriate in superb resort amenities including 14,000 square feet of indulgence at The Spa at St. Regis, Oceanfront Day Villas and gourmet dining options. An oasis of pampering and privilege at the northern tip of Miami Beach, FL, Bal Harbour is one of the most distinguished addresses in South Florida, and our hotel has long been a favorite destination for jet-setting travelers worldwide.Marriott

name: DoubleTree Resort & Spa by Hilton Ocean Point-N. Miami Beach
address: 17375 Collins Avenue, North Miami Beach, FL 33160
description: Daily Resort Charge will be added to the room rate and includes: guest internet access: two beach chairs: two beach towels: 25% discount on food in restaurant outlets: two bottles of water: 15% salon discount: local and toll-free calls. The Doubletree Ocean Point Resort & Spa - Miami Beach North is a full service, beachfront resort hotel and spa situated between the Bal Harbour and Aventura areas of the northern section of Miami Beach. Ideally located in sunny south Florida, the Ocean Point Resort hotel is less than 30 minutes from either Miami International Airport (MIA) or Fort Lauderdale / Hollywood International Airport (FLL). This exquisite resort hotel features spacious guestrooms and one- or two-bedroom apartment-style suites with fully equipped kitchens. Our luxurious accommodations include refrigerator, wet bar, microwave, washer and dryer, high-speed internet access (wired and wireless), and panoramic ocean views from all guest rooms. Most rooms and suites have a balcony. At the Ocean Point Resort, we believe in pampering. Indulge yourself with full-service European-style spa and beauty salon treatments. Have a massage in one of our hotel oceanside cabanas - you're worth it. We recommend that you call 786-528-2900 in advance of your arrival for Spa reservations and treatment details. Dine overlooking the Atlantic Ocean in The View restaurant, serving Continental cuisine and fresh seafood with a Miami flair. Or, try The Market Coffee Shop & Deli for lighter fare in casual surroundings just steps from the pool and beach. For special events or social occasions, our versatile meeting rooms and outdoor terraces can accommodate up to 300 guests. Allow our talented professionals to create your dream wedding reception in the most spectacular atmosphere. Go snorkeling or sport fishing. Relax under a beach umbrella. Explore the exclusive Bal Harbour Shops or Aventura Mall. Enjoy sightseeing and gallery-browsing along Miami Beach's historic Art Deco District. Take the family to Miami Seaquarium or Parrot Jungle. There is so much to see and do in the Miami area - or opt to do nothing at all. Our attentive, caring hotel staff looks forward to welcoming you to the Doubletree Ocean Point Resort & Spa with our special, signature warm chocolate-chip cookie at check-in.Hilton

name: Kimpton Surfcomber Hotel
address: 1717 Collins Avenue, Miami Beach, FL 33139
description: As part of the candy-colored historic Art Deco District, Kimpton Surfcomber Hotel welcomes you to the sea-and-be-seen revelry of Miami’s South Beach. Famed nightlife, shops, cafes and galleries are a stroll away. But even without leaving the hotel you can soak up the fun with Kimpton Surfcomber’s playful “Daylife.” Think ice cream sundaes by our glorious pool, bocce ball tournaments at a private sandy oasis and beach side food and beverage service on the beach. Some say we’re the most social hotel around. To that we say, SoBe it.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Edition Miami Beach
address: 2901 Collins Avenue, Miami Beach, FL 33140
description: With luxury hotel accommodations and an oceanfront setting, The Miami Beach EDITION is an ideal escape. Local venues and iconic attractions, including Miami Beach Convention Center, the Fillmore and Perez Art Museum Miami, are minutes away. Return from the beach and experience exceptional dining at our restaurants developed by Michelin-starred Chef Jean-Georges Vongerichten. This Miami Beach hotel boasts two ocean-facing pools, a wellness spa with a gym, a nightclub, a bowling alley and an ice-skating rink, as well as chic indoor and outdoor event space. Decorated in sophisticated style, every hotel room features large windows and views of the city, pool or ocean. Unwind from the Miami Beach scene in your pet-friendly room that showcases plush bedding, a marble bathroom, a desk and free Wi-Fi. Revel in the living and dining areas of our oceanfront suites, ideal for entertaining family and friends. Our luxury bungalows promote a sense of privacy and well-being with their plunge pools and serene terraces.Marriott

name: Newport Beachside Hotel & Resort
address: 16701 Collins Avenue, Sunny Isles Beach, FL 33160
description: No description found

name: Royal Palm South Beach Miami, A Tribute Portfolio Resort
address: 1545 Collins Avenue, Miami Beach, FL 33139
description: Reflecting the vibrancy and culture, Royal Palm South Beach Miami, A Tribute Portfolio Resort, is a trendy downtown resort in Miami Beach, where Ocean Drive and Collins Avenue intersect. Renowned among South Beach resorts, we connect you with the area’s popular attractions. Arrive in style at our opulent hotel lobby, which retains elements of the building’s original design, including a compass rose on the terrazzo floor, a green-glass reception desk and porthole windows in the lounge. After browsing Miami Beach, unwind with a vitalizing dip in one of the two resort-style pools at our South Beach resort hotel. We also boast a 24-hour fitness center and direct access to our own stretch of sand and surf in Royal Palm Beach. If you’re here for a meeting or wedding, our beachfront venues and attentive service break the mold of Florida events. Relax in luxe hotel rooms and suites inspired by the colorful spirit of Miami. Our boutique resort near Miami Beach beckons you to write your own compelling narrative.Marriott

name: Four Seasons Hotel At The Surf Club
address: 9011 Collins Avenue, Surfside, FL 33154
description: This 1930s-era Four Seasons Hotel at The Surf Club is in the northern Miami Beaches on Collins Avenue 5.7 mi from South Beach and 13 mi from Downtown Miami. Features include on-site restaurant, beach, and pool area. Oceanfront dining is possible at the Amalfi Coast-inspired Le Sirenuse Miami and Champagne Bar & Lounge, which is a sister restaurant to the Michelin-starred Le Sirenuse's La Sponda in Positano, Italy. The property features architecture by Pritzker-prize winning architect, Richard Meier, and interior designer Joseph Dirandan. A holistic spa, fitness center, and kid's club are offered. The front desk is open 24 hours. Custom furnishings, a flat-screen TV, and floor-to-ceiling windows in addition to a marble bathroom are standard in every Four Seasons Hotel at The Surf Club room. Some rooms have a balcony with an ocean or city view, and 5 unique Cabana Studios are offered as well. Bal Harbor Shops is 16 minutes' walk away, while the Miami Beach Convention Center is 5.6 mi from Four Seasons Hotel at The Surf Club. Lincoln Road is 6.2 mi from the property, and Miami International Airport is 15 mi away.

name: Nautilus Sonesta Miami Beach
address: 1825 Collins Avenue, Miami Beach, FL 33139
description: This hotel is located in South Beach, and offers a sun deck, an express check-in and check-out feature and an outdoor pool. It is ideally positioned for those wishing to discover the area's attractions. Nautilus Sonesta Miami Beach boasts a range of recreational amenities, including bicycle rental and Outdoor Pool & Cabanas. Welcoming and helpful staff are available 24 hours a day. There are 75 rooms at Nautilus Sonesta Miami Beach, each offering all the essentials to ensure a comfortable stay. Nautilus Sonesta Miami Beach houses both a restaurant and a lounge bar where guests are able to relax of an evening. In the evening, guests are welcome to wind down in the comfortable lounge bar. A wide selection of eating options are also found in the surrounding area. Local attractions near the hotel include the Holocaust Memorial of the Greater Miami Jewish Federation, Miami Beach Convention Center and Lincoln Road. Miami City Ballet is within a 10-minute walk and Fort Lauderdale-Hollywood International Airport is 40 minutes' drive away.Revato

name: Sherry Frontenac Oceanfront
address: 6565 Collins Ave, Miami Beach, FL 33141
description: Facing the beachfront, Sherry Frontenac Oceanfront offers 3-star accommodations in Miami Beach and features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness center and restaurant. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and an ATM, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Certain rooms at the property include a patio with a city view. At the hotel, the rooms include a desk. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, guest rooms at Sherry Frontenac Oceanfront have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms are equipped with a balcony. At the accommodation each room comes with bed linen and towels. Guests at Sherry Frontenac Oceanfront can enjoy a continental breakfast. You can play pool and table tennis at the hotel. Miami Beach is a 5-minute walk from Sherry Frontenac Oceanfront, while Surfside Beach is 1.6 miles away. The nearest airport is Miami International Airport, 12 miles from the accommodation.

name: Grand Beach Hotel Surfside
address: 9449 Collins Avenue, Surfside, FL 33154
description: The Grand Beach Hotel Surfside in Miami, Florida is situated in the town of Surfside, nestled between Miami Beach and Bal Harbour. Based on the success of the Grand Beach Hotel Miami Beach, we have refined the ideas and advantages which made our first hotel in Miami so popular.Synxis

name: Churchill Suites Monte Carlo Miami Beach
address: 6551 Collins Avenue, Miami Beach, FL 33141
description: Located in Miami Beach, these Florida apartments feature 2 outdoor heated pools and a fitness center. A full kitchen and free WiFi is provided in each apartment. Bayshore Golf Course is 3.6 mi away. A flat-screen cable TV, separate seating area, and hairdryer are provided. Some Churchill Suites Monte Carlo Miami Beach apartments have a balcony with an ocean or bay view. A hot tub is available to guests at this Miami Beach Churchill Suite Monte Carlo Miami Beach property. Valet parking is provided on site for an additional fee. The Miami Beach Convention Center is 3.9 mi away. The property is also 4 mi from the Jackie Gleason Theater of the Performing Arts and 30 minutes’ drive from the Miami International Airport.

name: The Goodtime Hotel
address: 601 Washington Avenue, Miami Beach, FL 33139
description: Offering 4-star accommodation, The Goodtime Hotel is conveniently situated in South Beach. It offers free Wi-Fi, a swimming pool and a rooftop terrace. There are a range of facilities on offer to guests of the hotel, such as fitness classes, a sun deck and valet parking. Guests can unwind with a book in the on-site library. The Goodtime Hotel offers air conditioned rooms with a flat-screen TV, luxury toiletries and blackout curtains. Each has a bathroom that provides bathrobes and a shower. The hotel offers breakfast each morning that guests can enjoy before venturing out to discover the local region. Miami Beach's attractions, such as the Jewish Museum of Florida, Lummus Park and the Wolfsonian-FIU, are easily accessible on foot from The Goodtime Hotel. Located within a five-minute walk is Ocean Drive.Revato

name: Loews Miami Beach Hotel
address: 1601 Collins Avenue, Miami Beach, FL 33139
description: Located in South Beach, Loews Miami Beach Hotel is a perfect starting point from which to explore Miami Beach (FL). The property offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Loews Miami Beach Hotel. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Loews Miami Beach Hotel is an excellent choice from which to explore Miami Beach (FL) or to simply relax and rejuvenate.Agoda

name: Intercontinental Miami, An IHG Hotel
address: 100 Chopin Plaza, Miami, FL 33131
description: An iconic fixture on the downtown Miami skyline for 40 years, InterContinental Miami boasts a waterfront location on Biscayne Bay, steps away from arts and entertainment in Miami’s Brickell neighborhood. A beacon for both business and leisure travelers, the hotel rises 34 stories over the city with breathtaking views of the Atlantic Ocean, Biscayne Bay and the Port of Miami. The hotel, which recently completed a $40 million renovation, features 652 newly redefined luxury guest rooms.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: The Ritz-Carlton Key Biscayne Miami
address: 455 Grand Bay Drive, Key Biscayne, FL 33149
description: Escape to a luxury Miami Beach resort that exudes the classic charm of South Florida. Located on an exclusive five-mile-long barrier island, The Ritz-Carlton Key Biscayne, Miami is just minutes from dynamic downtown, yet provides an atmosphere of sequestered serenity. With elegant architecture inspired by West Indies Colonial design, The Ritz-Carlton Key Biscayne, Miami is one of the finest beach hotels Miami, Florida has to offer.Marriott

name: InterContinental Boston
address: 510 Atlantic Avenue, Boston, MA 02210
description: Historic elegance meets modern luxury at the InterContinental Boston. Our waterfront hotel, located on the Boston Harbor, is one of the city's most celebrated hotels in a truly iconic location. Our beautifully redesigned rooms showcase the Boston cityscape with floor to ceiling windows. Whether hosting an event or relaxing in our Spa InterContinental, you will appreciate the close proximity to Boston’s most sought-after landmarks, like the Boston Tea Party & Ships Museum.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Boston Yacht Haven
address: 87 Commercial Wharf, Boston, MA 02110
description: This waterfront inn features an on-site marina that is filled with boats during the summer season. All rooms feature free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV, and views of the harbor or city. Faneuil Hall/Quincy Market is 10 minutes’ walk away. Each room at Boston Yacht Haven has nautical theme decor, a microwave, and a refrigerator. Select rooms include a sea view, private balcony, or sofa bed. A fitness center is available for guests to use at the Commercial Wharf Boston Yacht Haven. Laundry facilities are available as well. A free continental breakfast is served each morning. Various waterfront dining options, including the Chart House Restaurant and Joe's American Bar & Grill are within 5 minutes’ walk from the inn. The New England Aquarium is half a mile from the Yacht Haven. Boston Common is 1 mile away.

name: The Oberoi Mumbai
address: Nariman Point, Mumbai
description: Centrally located in Mumbai's business district, close to South Mumbai's shopping and entertainment areas, The Oberoi offers luxury and convenience with its outdoor heated pool, 24-hour spa, fitness and concierge service. It also features 5 food and beverage options offering a variety of cuisines. Complimentary WiFi is available in all rooms. The hotel's elegant rooms feature wooden floors, large windows offering beautiful views and en suite bathroom separated by a glass panel with electronic blinds. Rooms are equipped with an LCD TV, tea/coffee maker and iPod docking station. The Oberoi, Mumbai offers luxury and convenience with a wide range of 24 hour services like spa, butler service, laundry, concierge, business centre and travel desk. There are female butlers for the comfort of female guests travelling alone. Guests can enjoy shopping at the luxury retail arcade. The Oberoi Spa offers a variety of treatments and therapies. European, Asian and Indian specialities are featured on the menu at Fenix, alongside traditional Japanese delicacies. Vetro serves Italian dishes, while Indian cuisine can be savoured at Ziya. The Eau Bar overlooks the Arabian sea and features a live Jazz band. The Champagne Lounge serves an extensive selection of Champagne and teas. Situated at Nariman Point at the end of Marine Drive, The Oberoi Mumbai is 24 km from Mumbai's Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport. Mumbai Central Railway Station is 6 km away.

name: Trident Nariman Point
address: 400021 Nariman Point Mumbai 400 021, Mumbai 400 021
description: The 5-star Trident Nariman Point is located in Mumbai, overlooking the beautiful Arabian Sea from Marine Drive. Featuring a 24-hour business centre, the hotel has an outdoor pool, a fitness centre and pampering spa treatments. Complimentary WiFi is available in all rooms. Fitted with air conditioning, all rooms are equipped with a flat screen TV offering satellite channels, personal safe and minibar. Some rooms enjoy views of the sea. En suite bathrooms come with a shower or bathtub and offers free toiletries. Day trips and car rentals can be arranged at the tour desk. The hotel also provides daily newspapers and luggage storage at its 24-hour front desk. Mediterranean cuisine is served at Frangipani restaurant, while Southeast-Asian flavours and Japanese food are available at Indian Jones restaurant. Other dining options include buffet breakfast at Veranda and cocktails at Opium Den. Trident Nariman Point is 5.8 km from Mumbai Central and Western Railway Station Terminus. It is 24 km from Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport.

name: The St. Regis Mumbai
address: 462 Senapati Bapat Marg, Mumbai 400013
description: Enjoy luxurious staycations at The St. Regis Mumbai. We invite you to choose your favourite staycation package from our offers page. Situated in Lower Parel, our 5-star hotel brings the storied history and exceptional service of St. Regis to this vibrant area. Discover sophisticated elements crafted to make you feel at home, blended with luxuries such as on-call Butler Service, traditional Afternoon Tea and Champagne Sabering ceremony. Relax in beautifully designed rooms, suites and apartments, each with stunning vistas of the city or sea. Celebrate and dine around the globe in our award-winning specialty restaurants. If a meeting, wedding or social event brings you here, you will revel in our expansive ballrooms, banquet halls and outdoor venues, the perfect setting for any gathering. Nearby, discover Mumbai's attractions within minutes of our hotel. Whether traveling for work or on a vacation, we look forward to greeting you at our Lower Parel hotel in Mumbai.Marriott

name: Four Seasons Hotel Mumbai
address: 1/136, Dr. E. Moses Road, Mumbai
description: In the heart of Worli, the business hub of India’s largest city, Four Seasons Hotel Mumbai creates a tranquil, chic haven filled with sincere Indian hospitality. The Four Seasons offers comfortable rooms offering sweeping views of the city. It has an outdoor pool, spa and fitness centre. The spacious air-conditioned rooms come with a DVD player, 42-inch LCD TV, an iPod docking station and a bar. The marble bathroom has a separate bathtub and walk-in shower. Guests at the Mumbai Four Seasons can enjoy the ice fountain or the steam bath and Ayurvedic treatments at the spa. The hotel offers a concierge, babysitting services, and an ATM. Spanning 2 floors, Asian restaurant San Qi has a wine bar and a menu offering Indian, Chinese and Japanese dishes. Four Seasons Hotel Mumbai is located in the Worli-Lower Parel commercial area. It is a 10-minute drive from Siddhivinayak Temple and a 15-minute drive from Shivaji Park.

name: The Resort
address: 11, Madh Marve Road, Mumbai 400 095
description: Located on the shoreline of the Arabian Sea, The Resort is a hotel offering modern rooms with free Wi-Fi. It is 1 km from the INS Hamla Naval Base. The air-conditioned rooms feature garden, pool or sea views. Each is equipped with a cable TV, wardrobe and desk. Private bathroom includes free toiletries and a shower. The Resort is 10 km from Malad Railway Station and 22 km from Chatrapathi Shivaji International Airport in Mumbai. Relax by the outdoor pool or enjoy a work-out at the fitness centre. The hotel has a 24-reception and travel desk. Available at an extra charge are laundry, dry cleaning and car rental services. The property also offers an Adventure Zone known as "Gravity" consisting of Burma Bridge, archery, air rifle etc. Indian, Chinese and European meals can be ordered from High Tide Restaurant. Bay Watch is a 24-hour coffee shop while a variety of drinks are available from the Upper Deck Bar. Bar timing is 11 AM to 11 PM

name: Novotel Mumbai Juhu Beach
address: Balraj Sahani Marg, Juhu Beach, Mumbai 400 049
description: Novotel Mumbai Juhu Beach is Accor's breathtaking beachfront property located in the financial capital of India. Offering an inventory of 204 guest rooms and suites along with 6 dining options serving Chinese, Indian, Italian and Continental cuisines.accorhotels.com

name: Intercontinental Marine Drive Mumbai, An IHG Hotel
address: 135 Marine Drive, Mumbai
description: Located strategically in Mumbai’s Art Deco district and with a panoramic view of the Arabian Sea, InterContinental Marine Drive-Mumbai stands out with its large rooms and suites. Dining at the hotel is just as indulgent. Dome, our rooftop bar exudes the best things in life: wine, food, music, and the stars. L&S Bistro & Pizzeria brings the world to Mumbai with its global street food menu. History meets gastronomy at Kebab Korner where heritage recipes are given a contemporary touch.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: JW Marriott Mumbai Juhu
address: Juhu Tara Road, Mumbai 400 049
description: Nestled along Juhu Beach, JW Marriott Mumbai Juhu is a five-star haven where luxury reigns supreme. Upscale comfort awaits in stylishly appointed hotel rooms and suites showcasing featherbed mattresses, chic décor, high-speed Internet, marble bathrooms and 24-hour room service. Replenish your spirits with diverse fine dining at distinctive restaurants and bars or energize in our well-equipped fitness center. The sparkling waters of our outdoor infinity and saltwater pools are the perfect prelude to walks on the beach. Spark your imagination in our flexible event spaces, which are masterfully designed for flawless meetings, conferences, weddings and social affairs in Mumbai, India. After a busy day in Juhu Beach, attend to your well-being with luxury massages and therapies at our five-star Quan Spa. Frequented by celebrities and Bollywood luminaries, JW Marriott Mumbai Juhu is one of Mumbai's most elegant destinations along the glittering Arabian Sea.Marriott

name: Sun N Sand Hotel Mumbai
address: 39 Juhu Beach, Mumbai
description: Located on Juhu Beach, Sun-n-Sand Mumbai offers beachfront accommodation with an outdoor pool, a fitness centre and 5 dining options. Each room at the Sun-n-Sand Mumbai is equipped with a flat-screen cable TV, an electronic safe and tea/coffee maker. Cookies, bottled water and a fruit basket are provided. The hotel’s health club overlooks the Arabian sea and features a fitness room, sauna, steam and spa pool facilities. Enjoy body treatments and massages at Sohum. A business centre and business lounge offering free cocktails and snacks during certain hours are available. The 24-hour AQUA coffee shop offers views of the Arabian Sea. Traditional Awadhi cuisine is served at The Kabab Hut. Haaochi, the new addition to the hotel speciality restaurant offers contemporary Chinese cuisine, an elaborate dim sum menu and a full service bar. Sun-n-Sand Mumbai is a 20-minute drive from Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport. ISKON Temple and the Prithvi Theatre are both a 5-minute drive away.

name: Oleo Cancun Playa
address: Blvd. Kukulkan Km 19.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: The Pyramid at Grand Oasis
address: Blvd. Kukulcan, Km. 16.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Located in the heart of Cancun’s hotel area, The Pyramid offers its guests restaurants and an outdoor pool. The bright and spacious rooms are air conditioned. The amenities available include a flat-screen TV with cable channels, safe and outdoor furniture. The full bathroom includes free toiletries and may either have a bath or shower. The Pyramid also features tennis courts and a fitness centre as part of its facilities. Night entertainment with a show, nightclub and a shared lounge are also some of the features that guests will find here. The surroundings are good for practicing snorkelling, diving and windsurfing. La Isla Shopping Village, an elegant shopping mall featuring designer and brand shops, restaurants and bars, is 1.2 km from the resort. Cancun International Airport can be reached in a 30-minute drive.

name: Dreams Riviera Cancun Resort & Spa
address: Carretera Federal 307, Chetumal-Puerto Juarez, Benito Juarez, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: 概述 5 星級住宿 Unlimited-Luxury ® Breath taking views and exceptional service! 典雅設計和裝飾 一應俱全的度假村 位置 地處美麗的 Puerto Morelos,位置絕佳. 休閒娛樂 戶外游泳池 Beachfront resort 水上運動 Live entertainment 戶外活動 全套放鬆身心的水療服務 設備齊全的健身中心 Outdoor hot tub 兒童 提供兒童俱樂部 餐廳與休息室 9 Restaurants 6 酒吧 服務 24 小時客房服務 24 小時禮賓服務，滿足您的所有需求 會議設施 提供婚禮場地 宴會設施 活動設施 Multiple conference/meeting rooms 住宿 486 間客房. 豪華客房WebBeds

name: Sensira Resort & Spa Riviera Maya
address: KM 27.5 Carr. Cancún - Tulum Mz 40 Lt 16, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Puerto Morelos, 21 km from Cancun Underwater Museum, Sensira Resort & Spa Riviera Maya All Inclusive provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a restaurant. With free WiFi, this 5-star resort offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. There is a hot tub, nightclub and a kids' club. The resort will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Sensira Resort & Spa Riviera Maya All Inclusive each room comes with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and American options. The accommodation offers a children's playground. Guests can enjoy playing billiards and tennis, or take advantage of the business centre. Beto Avila Stadium is 28 km from Sensira Resort & Spa Riviera Maya All Inclusive, while Cancun Government Palace is 29 km away. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 16 km from the resort.

name: Majestic Elegance Costa Mujeres
address: Carr. Libre 85, Punta Sam-Isla Blanca Sm 006, Mz 2 I Isla Mujeres I Mexico, 77400 Isla Mujeres, Quintana Roo
description: Very Important Perks!*From resort credits and upgrades to welcome gifts and freebies, you’ll enjoy exclusive perks at our VIP hotels in some of the hottest destinations when you book with JetBlue Vacations.One souvenir polo shirt2:00pm late check-out$50 Spa CreditFree hydrothermal water circuitGuaranteed dining reservation at the Bistro RestaurantAll-Inclusive 5 Star sophisticated and luxurious resort located on white sand beaches in Playa Mujeres Cancun, Majestic Elegance Costa Mujeres is the destination for discerning travelers in search of a luxurious beach vacation. This resort is surrounded by the most breathtaking landscape, making it an ideal place for Caribbean lovers and first timers visiting Playa Mujeres in Mexico’s Yucatán Peninsula. This 570 room resort is more adult oriented counting with 383 dedicated to accommodate adults in the Elegance Club (Adults Only 18+) section and while catering families on the Family Section(All Ages).Playa Mujeres is known for its turquoise calm waters and white sand beaches surrounded by vegetation ideally located 20 minutes away from downtown Cancun and just a couple of minutes away from the Punta Sam Ferry Terminal for a day-trip to Isla Mujeres.The south eastern coast of Mexico enjoys tropical weather year-round. The temperatures range from 68° to 86° Fahrenheit from Oct – March and from 75° to 91° from April to Sept.* Very Important Perks! See bottom of page for JetBlue Vacations Terms and Conditions.jetBlue
