address: Blvd. Kukulcan Km. 14.5, Retorno San, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Please note i need 30 days notice for your reservation. Onsite food and beverages are included in the room price Additional gratuities at guests' discretion are accepted. All buffet and à la carte meals, snacks, and beverages are included. 24-hour room service (limited menu) Meals and beverages at companion properties All onsite activities and use of facilities and equipment are included. Fitness facilities / Tennis / Volleyball Aerobics / Water Fitness / Yoga Beach bar Coffee/tea in common areas / Elevator / lift Number of bars/lounges - 4 Fitness facilities Full-service spa Local Expert Concierge 24-hour front desk Beach umbrellas Poolside bar Billiards or pool table Spa treatment room(s) Internet Available in all rooms: Wireless internet access ( MXN 300 per day ) Available in some public areas: Wireless internet access ( MXN 300 per day ) Parking Free self parking, Parking (limited spaces) Room Amenities Free bottled water Pay movies Room service (24 hours) Separate sitting area Balcony Air conditioning In-room climate control (air conditioning) Blackout drapes/curtains Phone Free toiletries Hair dryer Where to Eat Paradise - Glass-walled dining room and ocean-view terrace. Food-court-style restaurant serving breakfast, lunch buffets daily. Dress code: casual. The resort features a 38-meter-long (125-foot) hourglass-shaped swimming pool terraced above a long, 18.25-meter-deep (60-foot) flat beach furnished with lounge chairs and 45 thatch-roof palapas. Ecotours nearby / Boat tours nearby / Golfing nearby / Snorkeling nearby / Fitness classes on site / Basketball on site / Volleyball on site / Beach volleyball on site / Windsurfing nearby / Scuba diving nearbyVRBO

name: Emporio Cancun
address: Boulevard Kukulcan Retorno Gucumatz Km 17 L49 Zona Hotelera, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Featuring free WiFi throughout and accommodation with terraces and views of the Caribbean Sea, Emporio Cancun is set on the beach in Cancún’s Hotel Zone. It has a picturesque setting between the Caribbean Sea and Nichupté Lagoon. Each air-conditioned room and suite has bright décor and tiled flooring. All accommodation at the Emporio Cancun has cable TV. Suites also come with a kitchen and a dining and seating area. San Miguelito Archaeological Site and the Cancún Maya Museum are located in front of the hotel.

name: El Beso Adults Only at Ocean Coral & Turquesa All Inclusive
address: Sm 12 Mza 15 Lote 1-02 1-03, 77511 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Dreams Sapphire Resort & Spa
address: Super Manzana 11, Manzana 9, Lote 10, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: This outstanding award-winning resort has a privileged location, situated on a wonderful landscape and offering a spectacular view of the Caribbean Sea. The property is set in Puerto Morelos, a famous fishing village located at only 35km from Cancun, where visitors can find multiple leisure options such as exciting excursions and water activities as well as a wide range of restaurants and cafes. This hotel offers a world of luxury to its guests with spacious and elegant rooms equipped with a private balcony or a terrace and a complimentary mini-bar refreshed daily with soft drinks and bottled water. Travellers will find unlimited activities for their entertainment as well as a spa offering the most advanced treatments. Guests can choose between six different restaurants offering a huge variety of international cuisine and various bars and lounges where they can taste a delicious cocktail.FarePortal

name: Azul Beach Resort Riviera Cancun, Gourmet All Inclusive by Karisma
address: Carretera Cancun Puerto Morelos km 27.5, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Puerto Morelos on Bahia Petempich Beach, this 5-star resort features a renowned Gourmet Inclusive service, contemporary Caribbean-style suites, all of them including a hot tub, plus a full-service spa. It also boasts 3 outdoor pools. Every suite at the Azul Beach Resort Riviera Cancun offers a canopy bed, air conditioning and a balcony overlooking the ocean or gardens. The minibar is stocked daily, plus a coffee maker is included. The elegant bathrooms provide deluxe bathrobes, rain showers, marbled double sinks and a hairdryer. The Gourmet Inclusive service includes 6 different restaurants and bars. The casual-elegant restaurants offer author cuisine, which features unique courses designed by a renowned chef; world cuisine, Italian, Caribbean, Mexican. The bars include a place specialized in mojitos, cantina-style venues and a lounge serving international drinks. Azul Beach Resort Riviera Cancun also offers meeting and banquet facilities that can host up to 200 guests are also part of this resort's facilities. The 13,000-square-foot Vassa Spa and health club provides a fully-equipped gym and 18-foot rock climbing tower. A variety of classes are available at the resort including cooking, dancing and yoga.

name: Cancun Bay Resort
address: Boulevard Kukulkan Km 3.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: With breathtaking views of Mujeres Bay, Cancun Bay Resort features a beachfront pool and relaxation pool, tennis courts and a hot tub with a bar. It is located near several of Cancun's restaurants, shops and entertainment venues. Cancun International Airport is 20 minutes' drive away and Cancun's commercial area can be reached in 15 minutes by car. Each room and suite at the resort has a private balcony or terrace with views of the lagoon, garden or sea.FarePortal

name: Seadust Cancun Family Resort
address: Boulevard Kululcan Km 17 Lote 52 04, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Temptation Cancun Resort
address: Boulevard Kukulcan K.M. 3.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Catering to free-spirited travelers (21+), Temptation Cancun Resort is the ideal hotspot for fun in the sun by day, and sexy signature themed parties by night, all surrounded by a fun, empowering atmosphere, allowing you to feel sexy, free, and uninhibited.jetBlue

name: Ocean View Cancun Arenas
address: Blvd Kukulkan Km 2.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Steps from the beach, in Cancun's Hotel Zone, surrounded by gardens, nightclubs and restaurants, this hotel offers many meal options with 3 on-site restaurants and has free wireless internet access. Ocean View Cancun Arenas features an outdoor pool with daily activities and nightly entertainment. Guests can relax with a drink from the poolside snack bar or workout in the fitness center. After a day spent at the beach, visitors can relax on their private balcony or terrace. Guests at the Cancun Arenas Holiday Inn will appreciate a variety of restaurant options ranging from casual to fine dining. Arenas buffet-style restaurant is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Visitors can choose from beachfront dinning in Ocean Grill Tequila or fine Italian cuisine in Diletto.

name: Desire Resort & Spa Riviera Maya - Couples Only
address: Carretera Puerto Morelos Km 27.5, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: This attractive hotel lies directly beside the beach and is just 15 minutes' walk from the centre of Puerto Morelos. Guests will discover many shopping and entertainment venues. Transfer to Cancún International Airport takes about 20 minutes. This luxury hotel offers a fabulous pool and garden complex. Additionally there is a hairdresser's salon, cosy bar and an air-conditioned restaurant. Room and laundry services are additionally available for use and there are parking facilities to be found outside the hotel. Each of the tastefully decorated apartments comes with a bathroom, a telephone, Internet access and a hire safe. In the outdoor complex is a freshwater swimming pool as well as a furnished sun terrace for guests to take advantage of. Furthermore, there is an indoor swimming pool, a sauna and a gym available for use.FarePortal

name: Dreams Jade Resort & Spa
address: Unidad 26, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Set right on a stunning sandy beach and surrounded by a beautiful landscape of crystal blue waters, this spectacular holiday resort offers a unique experience of complete luxury on the Mexican coast. The complex is situated at just a 10-minute drive away from Puerto Morelos and lies between the city of Cancun and Playa del Carmen. The guest rooms are fitted with a beautiful Mediterranean decoration and top-notch amenities such as a private balcony, free Internet access and an iPod docking station. When it comes for dining, travellers can choose between different culinary options including local and international dishes. There is also a great selection of bars and lounges where visitors may taste some delicious drinks. The hotel offers a wide range of entertainment venues for all ages, including a kids' club, activities for teens, game courts and a spa where guests may indulge themselves with the latest treatments.FarePortal

name: Villa del Palmar Cancun Luxury Beach Resort & Spa
address: Carretera Punta Sam Km. 5.2, 77400 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: The beachfront Villa del Palmar Cancun Beach Resort & Spa is located just 15 minutes’ drive outside central Cancún. It offers 5 outdoor pools, 4 outdoor hot tubs and elegant, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen cable TV and a balcony. The rooms at the Villa del Palmar Cancun feature tiled floors and stylish décor. Each one comes with a private bathroom and a kitchenette with a microwave. The hotel organises trips in a glass-bottomed boat, as well as other activities. Staff at reception can provide information about what to see and do on the Yucatán Peninsula. A buffet breakfast is served on the terrace or in the dining room. The hotel features a Deli and 6 restaurants serving international food. The Mayan ruins at Tulum are around 1.5 hours’ drive from the Villa Palmar. You can drive to Cancún Airport in 25 minutes.

name: Nerea Tulum
address: Fraccionamiento Tankah III Mza 3 Lote 21, 77760 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Situated in Tulum, a few steps from Tankah Bay Beach, Nerea Tulum features accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a garden. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The hotel has a terrace and a hot tub. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Nerea Tulum the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. A Full English/Irish, American or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean, Seafood and Steakhouse cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Activities such as snorkelling, canoeing, cycling can be enjoyed in the surroundings, and guests can relax along the beachfront. Soliman Bay Beach is 2.2 km from Nerea Tulum, while Tulum Archeological Site is 9.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 70 km from the hotel.

name: Xela
address: Carretera Tulum-Boca Paila Km 8.7, 77766 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Tulum, a few steps from South Tulum Beach, XELA offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Featuring a bar, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features room service and a 24-hour front desk for guests. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. Tulum Archeological Site is 12 km from XELA, while Parque Nacional Tulum is 5.1 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 86 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Ma'xanab Tulum
address: Carretera Tulum-Boca Paila, Boca Paila Km6.5, 77760 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Situated in Tulum, a few steps from South Tulum Beach, Hotel Ma'xanab Tulum features accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. With a garden, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers room service, a concierge service and organising tours for guests. At the hotel, every room includes a desk. The rooms include a coffee machine, while some rooms are fitted with a terrace and others also feature sea views. At Hotel Ma'xanab Tulum each room has bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, American and vegetarian options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mexican cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. Tulum Archeological Site is 10 km from Hotel Ma'xanab Tulum, while Parque Nacional Tulum is 3.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 84 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Bahia Principe Grand Tulum
address: Crta Chetumal - Cancun Km 250, 77760 Akumal, Quintana Roo
description: Featuring an outdoor pool, free WiFi access, and a spa, Bahia Principe Grand Tulum - All Inclusive is located in Akumal, Mexico. A flat-screen satellite TV, telephone, and alarm clock are included in each room. A minibar, refrigerator, and coffee machine are also furnished. Free toiletries and a hairdryer are provided in all private bathrooms. A tennis court and fitness centre are featured at the Bahia Principe Grand Tulum - All Inclusive as well as 9 bars and 4 restaurants. A waterpark, nightclub, and adjacent casino are also available for guests to enjoy. Aktun Chen Natural Park is 4.4 km from the hotel, Xcacel Beach is 9.7 km away, and Xel-Há Park is 11 minutes' drive away from the Bahia Principe Grand Tulum - All Inclusive.

name: The Beach Tulum
address: Road Tulum-Boca Paila km7, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: The adults-only The Beach Tulum Hotel offers a beautiful setting on Tulum Beach within 7 km of its famous Mayan Ruins. It features beach-front rooms with terraces and lounge area, an outdoor pool, beach club and a restaurant. Onsite Spa and onsite shop. Each luxurious, beach-front room has stylish, minimalist décor. Each air-conditioned accommodation includes free WiFi and a seating area. Guests can enjoy full breakfast either in the Ziggy's restaurant or Fresco's. Ziggy's Beach Club serves drinks and snacks from 09:00 until sunset. Tulum National Park is less than 4 km from the hotel, while the town centre is 10 minutes’ drive away. Cancún is within 140 km away and Playa del Carmen is within 60 km away.

name: Bahia Principe Luxury Akumal
address: Carretera Chetumal Benito Juarez KM 250, 77719 Akumal, Quintana Roo
description: This exclusive beach hotel is located amidst tropical vegetation and beside a kilometre-long untouched sandy beach of the Mayan Riviera with a protective coral reef. the center of Akumal is about 3.5 km away offering a range of shops and entertainment. The turist area of Tulum is about 15 km. Playa del Carmen is 35 km away. Cancún Airport is 60 min away. Both Xel-ha and Xcaret theme parks are 15 km or within around half an hour of the hotel. Car rental is available nearby.WebBeds

name: Casa Malca
address: Carretera Tulum-Boca Paila Km 9.5, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Special check-in instructions Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Know Before You Go Reservations are required for massage services and spa treatments. Reservations can be made by contacting the hotel prior to arrival, using the contact information on the booking confirmation. Only registered guests are allowed in the guestrooms. No pets and no service animals are allowed at this property. This property advises that enhanced cleaning and guest safety measures are currently in place. Disinfectant is used to clean the property; commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant between stays; bed sheets and towels are laundered at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F. Personal protective equipment, including masks and gloves, will be available to guests. Social distancing measures are in place; staff at the property wear personal protective equipment; periodic temperature checks are conducted on staff; temperature checks are available to guests; guests are provided with hand sanitizer. Contactless check-in and contactless check-out are available. Individually-wrapped food options are available through room service. Each guestroom is kept vacant for a minimum of 48 hours between bookings. This property affirms that it adheres to the cleaning and disinfection practices of Safe Travels (WTTC - Global). Fees Early check-in fee: USD 120 (subject to availability) Late check-out is available for a fee (subject to availability) The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.Ticket Package

name: Hotel Cabañas Tulum Beach Hotel & Spa
address: Carretera Cancun-Tulum Bocapalia Km 7, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: This hotel is located on one of the nicest beaches in Tulum, Mexico. The hotel offers a secluded location, guest rooms with free WiFi, an on-site restaurant and the Ziggy's Beach Club. Rooms at Cabanas Tulum include hammocks on the private terrace. Some rooms are located directly on the beach. Some rooms feature a private rooftop terrace with hot tub. Fresco's offers international cuisine and has children menu. Hotel guests can enjoy the beach club amenities, as well as cocktails and beers. The bilingual staff at Cabanas Tulum can arrange tours to nearby eco-friendly attractions like Sian Ka'an, a natural biosphere, or tours to sightseeing the cenotes, the natural underground pools, or travel to the archaeological sites nearby including Cobá, Chichen Itza and Ek Balam. Cabanas Tulum has Naj Naay Spa. Our guests minimum age is 14 years.

name: Akumal Bay Beach & Wellness Resort
address: Km 104 Carr. Cancun-Chetumal, 77760 Akumal, Quintana Roo
description: Located on Akumal Bay, this 4-star beach resort is only a 20-minute drive to Tulum. This resort features 2 beach-side pools and 3 restaurants serving international cuisine. Every room at the Akumal Bay Beach & Wellness Resort offers a full ocean view and a private balcony or terrace. The air conditioned rooms offer color TV and an in-room safety deposit box. On-site activities at the Akumal Bay Beach & Wellness Resort include fitness classes, beach volleyball and snorkelling. A Kid’s Club provides supervised fun activities for children. Guests can enjoy drinks and snacks at the Pool Bar. Downtown Akumal is within walking distance of the resort and Cancun is within an hours’ drive.

name: Mereva Tulum
address: Frac. Tankah III No. Mza 3 Lote 35, 77760 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Offering Two outdoor pools and gourmet food, Mereva Tulum by Blue Sky is located 10 minutes' drive from Tulum town and 15 minutes’ drive from the Tulum Mayan Ruins. It has a private dock and offers kayaking and snorkelling, complimentary paddle board. The air-conditioned rooms feature free WiFi, an HDTV with satellite channels and a balcony with sea views. All with private bathrooms, most of them count with double rain shower, twin sinks and mirrors. A la carte American breakfast is included. At Mereva Tulum by Blue Sky you can enjoy romantic dinners or spa treatments with wonderful Caribbean Sea views on the 45-metre dock. The Manati Cenote is located right across from Mereva Tulum by Blue Sky. This Boutique Hotel is 10 minutes’ drive from Xel-Há Eco-Theme Park and 90-minutes’ drive from Cancún International Airport. Free parking is available on site.

name: Conrad Tulum Riviera Maya
address: Carretera Cancun Tulum 307, 77774 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Experience the magic of Tulum with views of the ocean from every room and suite, approximately a 2-hour drive from Cancun International Airport. Uncover your sense of wonder in our resort with five pools, 11 restaurants, and magnificent views. Our personalized concierge can help you unwind or fill your day with beach activities, spa treatments, and excursions to nearby attractions. Tulum is a Magical Town with an eco-chic atmosphere that provides a spiritual and relaxing sensation. Tulum city center, underwater caves, amusement parks, and more are all within 30 minutes. The ultimate place for an unplugged beach vacation, explore historic ruins and the Sian Ka’an Biosphere Reserve, as well as shops and restaurants. Enjoy beautiful white-sand beaches, lagoons, cenotes, and caverns that show the beauty of nature in all its splendor.Hilton

name: Dreams Tulum Resort & Spa
address: Carretera Chetumal-Puerto Juarez KM 236.7 No.1, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Among acres of tropical gardens and jungle, Dreams Tulum Resort & Spa is located just minutes' from the ancient Mayan ruins and the trendy and bohemian town of Tulum. Dreams Tulum is a AAA Four Diamond award-winning resort, with all the benefits of Unlimited-Luxury® - where everything is included. Dreams Tulum’s magnificent Mexican colonial architecture blends tastefully with an up scale contemporary design where every room offers a private and furnished terrace or balcony, marble bathroom, daily refreshed mini-bar and 24-hour room service. Dreams Tulum also offers a secluded adults-only section and swim out suites for direct access to a pool. Additionally, there is a splash park for kids located near the Explorer’s Club. The pools are heated from December and March depending on climate conditions. Dreams Tulum sits on 2 miles of powdery white sand with activities to make the whole family happy including on-site watersports and dive shop, discounted greens fees at the nearby Riviera Maya Golf Club, an Explorer’s Club for Kids and a Core Zone Teens Club. The Dreams Spa by Pevonia® offers serene jungle and beach cabins, a spa pantry for guests to create their own spa products and a Temazcal for a traditional Mayan spa ceremony experience. With authentic and gourmet dining options, unlimited top-shelf spirits and nightly entertainment, guests can enjoy a Dream vacation at Dreams Tulum Resort & Spa.

name: Hilton Tulum Riviera Maya
address: Carretera Cancun Tulum 307, 77774 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: The hotel facilities and services include air conditioning, free WiFi, car parking, gym/fitness facilities, spa facilities (extra charge), conference room, 24hr reception, restaurant, bar, swimming pool, kids pool, children playground and elevator. The room amenities include room service, air conditioning, free WiFi, safe box, TV, balcony/terrace, mini bar, coffee/tea maker, hairdryer and telephone. Please note that some of the above facilities may be closed due to weather / seasonal conditions Address: Carretera Cancun Tulum 307, Tulkal Chemuyil, 77774, Tulum, Mexico.Ticket Package

name: Alea Tulum

description: Set in Tulum, a few steps from Tankah Bay Beach, Alea Tulum offers accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has sea views, and guests can enjoy access to a garden and to a shared lounge. Offering free WiFi throughout the property, the non-smoking hotel has a hot tub and evening entertainment. All guest rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The rooms come with a coffee machine, while selected rooms also feature a terrace and others also feature pool views. At Alea Tulum rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes à la carte, Full English/Irish and American options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mexican and local cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Activities such as snorkelling, canoeing, cycling can be enjoyed in the surroundings, and guests can relax along the beachfront. Speaking English and Spanish, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the 24-hour front desk. Soliman Bay Beach is 2 km from Alea Tulum, while Tulum Archeological Site is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 70 km from the hotel.

name: Hotelito Azul
address: Carretera Tulum-Boca Paila, Km. 5.8, 77760 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Tulum, 6 km from Tulum Archeological Site, Hotelito Azul has a number of amenities including a private beach area and free WiFi. Open since 2017, this 4-star hotel is within 5 km of Parque Nacional Tulum and Cesiak. Guests can have a cocktail at the bar. At the hotel, rooms are fitted with a desk. All rooms include a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. All rooms at Hotelito Azul are equipped with a seating area. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an American breakfast. Hotelito Azul offers a terrace. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at this 4-star hotel. Tulum Bus station is 5 km from the hotel, while Bus station Tulum Ruins is 6 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 67 km from Hotelito Azul.

description: Located in Tulum, 200 metres from South Tulum Beach, Maya Tulum By G Hotels provides accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a restaurant. Conveniently situated in the Zona Hotelera district, this hotel offers a bar, as well as an indoor pool. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Tulum Archeological Site is 8.1 km from Maya Tulum By G Hotels, while Parque Nacional Tulum is 1.8 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 82 km from the accommodation.

description: Featuring an outdoor pool, restaurant and spa, Secrets Akumal Riviera Maya is located in Riviera Maya. This adult-only hotel offers a fitness centre, beauty shop, nightclub and evening entertainment. Free WiFi access is available. Each room at the hotel provides a hot tub, a flat-screen cable TV and a minibar. Featuring a spa bath and shower, private bathrooms come complete with a hairdryer and free toiletries. A sofa, a desk and an outdoor seating area are also featured in every room. A 24-hour front desk welcomes guests to Secrets Akumal Riviera Maya, and it offers a private beach area, a sauna and a terrace. Guests will also e able to enjoy of the tennis court and the bicycles on loan. Other facilities offered at the property include a games room. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including snorkelling. The property offers free parking. Playa del Carmen is a 30-minute drive away. Cancun is a 60-minute drive away.

Other facilities offered at the property include a tour desk and luggage storage. Free parking is available. All units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a coffee machine, a shower, a hairdryer and a wardrobe. At the hotel every room comes with a private bathroom with free toiletries. A à la carte breakfast is available daily at Mvngata Beach Hotel. The accommodation offers a terrace. Cancun International Airport is 51 km from the property.

The resort will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. Playacar Beach is 1.1 km from Iberostar Tucan, while ADO International Bus Station is 3.1 km from the property. Located around 400 metres from Playacar Beach, the resort with free WiFi is also 3.3 km away from ADO International Bus Station. The resort offers an outdoor swimming pool, evening entertainment and a kids' club. At the resort, all rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. description: Live a unique experience in an exclusive resort in the Riviera Maya, Banyan Tree Mayakoba Triple AAA 5 Diamond resort has private villas with swimming pools surrounded by vegetation offering you a stay of luxury and harmony. Diamond resort, because we believe in our mission: to offer you the most memorable vacations of your life and a simply unforgettable experience.accorhotels.com

name: The St. Regis Kanai Resort, Riviera Maya
address: Paseo Kanai 15, 77730 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Discover an exceptional address at The St. Regis Kanai Resort, Riviera Maya. We offer you a central location near Cancun and Playa Del Carmen. Find our vacation resort built on a natural mangrove reserve, with a setting inspired by the neighboring Sian Ka’an Reserve, a UNESCO World Heritage Site in Quintana Roo. Take in sweeping ocean views from a 620-acre reserve set on the shores of Mexico’s Yucatan Peninsula. The Pleiades constellation inspired the circular architecture of our resort's avant-garde exterior, which floats above the canopy of the mangrove trees below. Each of our 124 rooms, suites and residences boasts dramatic views, along with bespoke furniture and a private terrace or plunge pool. Reserve one of our vacation packages and revel in our resort's unique range of culinary destinations and other experiences. From our signature St. Regis Butler Service to the state-of-the-art St. Regis Spa, every touchpoint allows time to stand still in this undiscovered slice of paradise in Mexico.Marriott

description: Moments from the Caribbean Sea and ancient ruins in Playa del Carmen, this property is surrounded by lush vegetation and offers fully furnished condos with fully equipped kitchens and ocean views. The Elements features a private beach, beach club and spacious outdoor pool. Guests will also enjoy the fully equipped fitness center and an on-site business center, both with ocean views. The one and 2 and 3 bedroom condos at the Elements offer flat-screen TVs and high-count linens. After a busy day, guests can relax on their private terrace or enjoy the evening breeze from the living room.

Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. You can play billiards, table tennis and tennis at this 5-star resort, and the area is popular for golfing. Guests can sing karaoke, plan their trips at the tour desk, or make use of the business centre. Church of Guadalupe is 7.4 km from Impression Moxché by Secrets - Adults Only, while Kantenah Bay is 41 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 43 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

description: El Dorado Casitas Royale is an adults-only resort that features gourmet cuisine with the Gourmet Inclusive Experience, a full-service spa, and 13 swimming pools. The elegant and lavish suites are fully appointed and feature a DVD and CD library, personal concierge services from 08:00 until 17:00, a pillow menu and aromatherapy scents delivered in your room. The bright bedrooms offer mosquito nets over the canopy beds. The elegant bathrooms have double sinks and a shower. Some units have an outdoor shower or a hot tub. El Dorado Casitas Royal has an extensive selection of different appealing cuisines from around the world including 10 different restaurants offering world cuisine, contemporary Italian menus, a flavour from the Pacific, a Mediterranean fusion, Caribbean style, and Mexican cuisine. Pizzas and authentic Italian cooking are also offered. There are also 10 swim-up bars, 1 beach bar and 4 lounge bars available. Naay Spa is dividen into the Spa Royale and the Spa Casitas. Spa Royale is in the centre of the property, while Spa Casitas is a 20,000 sq-ft facility offering an extensive menu of traditional and alternative spa treatments. The Bonanza Ranch is the property's own stables with riding horses. There is a guided horseback tour through the jungle so guests can experience the true Riviera Maya beauty.

It features a spa, 2 large outdoor swimming pools and an à la carte restaurant. All air-conditioned accommodation has bright, attractive décor. Each suite and room has a flat-screen TV and an iPod docking station. The Garden Restaurant serves a selection of regional and international cuisine. The hotel also offers Mexican cookery classes. The Esencia’s spa features a plunge pool, sauna and hot tub. Treatments include massage and facials. The Riviera Maya coastline is ideal for diving and snorkelling. Guests can visit the Mayan ruins at Tulum, as well as the resort of Playa del Carmen, which can be reached within 15 minutes by car.

The guest rooms are tastefully decorated and feature high-quality amenities, such as a relaxing hydro spa tub for couples, which will ensure an unforgettable stay on the Riviera Maya. Travellers who stay in this hotel may enjoy exquisite national and international cuisine choosing between different on-site restaurants and bars. The establishment boasts a wide range of activities and leisure options during the day, and when the sun goes down guests may enjoy fantastic parties with professional DJ's. The spa, with its huge variety of treatments, is the best place to relax and recharge batteries after being dancing all night.FarePortal

name: Mahekal Beach Front Resort & Spa

description: Welcome to the enchanting and magical Mayan paradise in Playa del Carmen - Mexico. Nestled between lush tropical gardens rich in flora and fauna - the vast white sandy beach and the indescribable turquoise water of the Caribbean Sea await you. Among the most pictures accommodations in Playa del Carmen - the Mahekal Beach Resort is a beach front hotel with exquisite hotel accommodation with unique spa services and exciting Mayan excursions to the nearby ancient ruins. The resort has well established roots in the area and provides the perfect getaways for guests since 1982. Our resort welcomes guests to our unique 4 star resort retreat with thatched roof palapas and spacious - oceanfront rooms featuring private terraces or balconies. The resort is located on the Caribbean Sea with a gorgeous beach in Playa del Carmen along the Riviera Maya. Convenient to the shops and restaurants of 5th Avenue - or "La Quinta" as it is known locally.iHotelier/iStay

In addition to multiple meeting spaces, the hotel also houses an extensive outdoor deck for large-scale events and parties. description: Mexico's beautiful Mayan Riviera is home to this exceptional beachfront resort, offering a variety of on-site activities and entertainment along with numerous dining options, spacious swimming pools and comfortable accommodations. Begin the day at the Barcelo Maya Colonial Beach with a delicious meal from one of the 7 on-site restaurants. Enjoy lounging by one of 3 swimming pools or participate in the resort's daily group activities, including horseback riding through the forest. Relax with a cocktail from one of the Maya Colonial's numerous on-site bars or take advantage of on-site diving lessons, kayak rentals or basketball courts. Finish the evening at the on-site nightclub or play a game on the resort's mini-golf course.

description: El Dorado Royale is an adults-only, beachfront resort on The Riviera Maya. It features 14 restaurants with the exclusive Gourmet Inclusive Experience, more than a mile of a secluded beach area, a lavish spa, and concierge services. A wonderful cenote site can be found within 25 minutes' drive away. The elegant suites and rooms at El Dorado Royal offer an indoor hot tub, bathrobes, cable TV, a furnished terrace with a small table, 2 chairs and a hammock upon request, plus a private bathroom including a hairdryer. The minibar is daily stocked with beer, soft drinks and water, plus there is a coffee maker available. The Gourmet Inclusive Experience includes flavours from the international cuisine, contemporary Italian dishes, Pacific flavours, Caribbean selection, authentic Mexican delights, traditional Italian and gourmet pizzas, among others. Naay Spa is divided into Spa Royale and Spa Casitas. Both offer an extensive menu of traditional and alternative spa treatments. Other activities that guests can enjoy at this resort include diving lessons and the rental of the equipment, a gift shop on site, WiFi access, tennis lessons and wave runners to cruise the sea.
