name: Fiesta Americana Puerto Vallarta & Spa Hotel
address: Av. Francisco Medina Ascencio km 2.5, 48333 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Location This hotel lies on the Bahía de Banderas bay and is around 200 m from the nearest beach and the town centre with its access to the public transport network. The airport is only some 5 minutes away. Facilities The hotel features 291 accommodation units. A lift can be used to access the upper floors. Amenities include a cloakroom, a safe, currency exchange facilities and a cash machine. Internet access (for a fee) and wireless internet access (for a fee) are available in the public areas. In addition, guests can also enjoy a balcony. The hotel features a range of facilities for guests with disabilities. Gastronomic options offered by the hotel include a restaurant, a dining area and a bar. Shopping facilities are available. The grounds of the hotel feature a playground and an attractive garden. Parking facilities available to guests include a garage and a car park. Among the additional services available are a childcare service, medical assistance, room service and a laundry. Rooms All rooms feature air conditioning and a bathroom. Most accommodation units additionally feature a balcony or a terrace. Each accommodation unit features a double bed or a king-size bed. Extra beds can be requested. A safe and a minibar also feature. The rooms offer a range of amenities, including tea and coffee making equipment. An ironing set is also available to guests. Convenient features include internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio and an alarm clock. In each of the bathrooms, guests will find a shower, a bathtub and a hairdryer. Sports/Entertainment The hotel offers an outdoor pool and a children's pool. Sun loungers and parasols offer the ideal way to unwind. A hot tub provides an opportunity for relaxation. The hotel offers an extensive outdoor sport and leisure programme, with tennis, volleyball, golf and horse riding. Those who enjoy watersports can have fun with diving and aquafit. Guests of the hotel can enjoy indoor activities including a gym. A wellness area with a spa can be used by guests of the hotel. For a fee, massage treatments are also available. An entertainment programme, an entertainment programme for children, a disco and a kids' club provide guests with recreational options during their free time. Meals The hotel offers a wide range of bookable meals and board options, including breakfast, lunch, dinner and full board. Payment All major credit cards, including American Express, VISA and MasterCard, are accepted for payment.WebBeds

address: Paseo de Los Corales 139, 48390 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: With a stunning view of city and Pacific Ocean, this impressive hotel is located on the hills of the exclusive Conchas Chinas area, 7 minutes’ drive from the famed boardwalk of Puerto Vallarta. The main terrace features 3 pools, one exterior hot tub and activity space. Boasting an adult-only terrace, it features 2 hot tubs and a heated pool. Also, all the suites are richly appointed with a modern-style décor and include a flat-screen TV, luxurious amenities and a distinctive combination of marble and wood detailing. Some units have their own outdoor hot tub. The private chef assures a dining experience for the guests. Venue choices include two specialty restaurants, poolside snacks and 24-hour suite service. A wine and spirits selection is available and the breakfast buffet included is only for adults. Grand Miramar Resort & Spa Puerto Vallarta is the only property with a stunning view of the full bay. It has a lounge snack bar and the service hours are 09:30 to 18:30. Direct transportation including round trip exclusively for guests is offered. The spa has a hydrotherapy area and a large selection of massages and treatments. Professional business meetings, events and weddings can be held at this resort.

description: Featuring suites with ocean views, Villa Premiere Boutique Hotel & Romantic Getaway is set on Puerto Vallarta’s main beach. Guests also receive butler service. A range of international cuisine is served in the Villa Premiere Boutique Hotel & Romantic Getaway's restaurant. There is also a lobby bar and a swim-up bar. The hotel offers cocktail-making workshops. The Villa Premiere’s spa features a hot tub, sauna and an oxygen bar. Treatments include hydrotherapy, facials and massage. There are daily yoga classes on the beach. The hotel is set next to Puerto Vallarta’s beachfront promenade. The city’s airport is a 10-minute drive away.

Guests even have the privilege to visit nearby participating resorts with the Sip, Savor & See Dining Experience. All 278 spacious suites offer remarkable tropical views, partial ocean views & ocean views, modern décor and refined luxury amenities including daily refreshed mini-bar and 24-hour room service. Relax at the world-class Secrets Spa by Pevonia® Additionally, all guests have free flow access to nine restaurants, seven bars, two snacks and one coffee shop, and facilities at nearby Dreams Bahia de Mita. Gustavo Diaz Ordaz Airport, 9 km from the property.

description: Travel your own way at Marriott Puerto Vallarta Resort and Spa. Located steps from one of the most beautiful beaches in Jalisco Mexico our oceanfront resort pampers you with a stunning infinity pool diverse restaurants and the exquisite Ohtli Spa. You and your loved ones will have plenty to do while at the resort. All rooms and suites come with a balcony or terrace so your will never be far from an incredible view. You will also have a cozy pillowtop mattress to lie on Netflix availability through your flat panel TV and complimentary robes to lounge in. We offer 15 venues indoors and outdoors for special occasions such as an LGTB wedding. Be sure to inquire about our exclusive packages when booking to enjoy unique perks and upgrades. Internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning, mini bar, balcony/terrace can be found in selected guestrooms. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include hot tub, fitness center, outdoor pool, massage, children's playground. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Puerto Vallarta has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Krystal Vallarta.Agoda

description: Situated on the golden sand beach right on the Pacific coast and located just minutes from the famous 'El Malecón' boardwalk. Secrets Vallarta Resort & Spa boasts a world-class spa and an outdoor pool. Guests can also enjoy free WiFi, free calling and the ability to book excursions. The well-appointed rooms offer ocean views, contemporary décor and marble floors. Each elegantly-appointed suite is complete with 24-hour room service, Secrets Box for private room service delivery, turn down service, mini-bar refreshed daily, bathroom with shower and hot tub. Guests can dine at reservation-free gourmet restaurants and bars. Each restaurant offers a unique cuisine, ranging from exceptional Pan-Asian delights to elegant French fare. Relax with your favorite cocktail at any of the three lively bars, featuring premium brand domestic and international brands. The centre of Puerto Vallarta is just over 1 km from the hotel. The city’s airport is a 5-minute drive away.

Deli Coffe Shop from 6am to 11pm. The on-site Taste restaurant serves Mexican-style dishes and American cuisine and also features views of the tropical forest and the sea. There is also a bar and free Wi-Fi is available in all areas. The Zoo and Botanical Garden is 10 km away and the Puerto Vallarta International Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

description: Located on a breathtaking beach, the 5-star adults-only hotel is theideal place to enjoy moments of relaxation, well-being and fun, anexquisite gastronomic variety and amenities such as spa, recreationareas and theme nights; in an intimate and exclusive environment.iHotelier/iStay

name: Velas Vallarta Condo
address: Av. Paseo de la Marina Nte 585 Apt # 4312, 48350 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: No description found

name: Melia Puerto Vallarta
address: Paseo De La Marina Sur Lot H-7, 48335 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: This property is located Puerto Vallarta International Airport 6 km away from Puerto Vallarta city center, 8 km away from an eco park, and 3 km away from Puerto Vallarta International Airport. Facilities and services include 24-hour reception, air conditioning, balcony, bar, ATM machine on-site, concierge, dry cleaning (extra charge), elevator, garden, gym, laundry facilities (extra charge), outdoor pool, restaurant, safe, and spa facilities. Rooms feature air conditioning, bath and shower, hairdryer, towels, balcony, safe, television, mini bar, and telephone. Address: Paseo de la Marina Sur 7, 48354, Puerto Vallarta, JAL, Mexico.WebBeds

name: Hotel Mousai - Adults Only
address: Carretera a Barra de Navidad Km. 7.5, 48390 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: The first and only AAA Five Diamond rated resort in Puerto Vallarta and the state of Jalisco, Hotel Mousai’s fresh flirtatious aesthetics and luxurious comfort will inspire you to live sensationally. Hotel Mousai is an amazing vacation, breathing life into every opportunity to provide the sassiest activities and experiences. Located in one of Mexico’s most beautiful beach destinations, Puerto Vallarta.VRBO

name: Grand Park Royal Puerto Vallarta
address: Carretera Barra de Navidad KM 8.5, Zona, 48390 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: With a stay at Grand Park Royal Luxury Resort Puerto Vallarta in Puerto Vallarta (South Shore Hotel Area), you'll be steps from Playa Gemelas and 12 minutes by foot from Garza Blanca Beach. This 4-star property is 4.6 mi (7.3 km) from Playa de los Muertos and 6.1 mi (9.9 km) from Malecon.FlyUS

name: Club Regina Puerto Vallarta
address: Paseo De La Marina Sur 205, 48335 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Raintree's Club Regina Puerto Vallarta wraps elegance and tradition around relaxing ocean and marina views. Guests have access to all amenities that the resort has to offer including an on-site restaurant and bar, beautiful accommodation and large swimming pools. Beaches and the rich biodiversity draw tourists from around the globe. The Malecon, one of the most popular locations for tourists, is a flourishing art scene on the south side of Vallarta that is home to art galleries, restaurants and bars. This is a 1 bedroom suite with a full kitchen that sleeps 4. It has a king bed in the master bedroom and the couch folds out into a double bed. Must book Saturday-Saturday. Must book at least 60 days in advance. Must contact before booking reservation.VRBO

name: Sunscape Puerto Vallarta Resort & Spa
address: Blvd Francisco Medina Ascencio Km 3.5, 48333 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Featuring free WiFi and a year-round outdoor pool, Sunscape Puerto Vallarta Resort offers accommodation in Puerto Vallarta, 1.2 km from Cruise Ship Pier. The resort has a children's playground and terrace, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. Free private parking is available on site. Enjoy a cup of coffee while looking out at the sea or pool. All rooms come with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer, flat-screen TV with cable channels is offered. There is a 24-hour front desk, a cash machine and hairdresser's at the property. This resort has a private beach area and car hire is available. You can play tennis at this resort, and the area is popular for fishing. The nearest airport is Lic. Gustavo Diaz Ordaz Airport, 4 km from Sunscape Puerto Vallarta Resort. Family Friendly hotel, please see fine print for additional information.

name: Canto Del Sol Plaza
address: Clemente Orozco 125, 48333 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Enjoying a prime location on Banderas Bay Beach, right in the heart of Puerto Vallarta's hotel zone, this magnificent complex offers an ideal base to spend a pleasant family holiday as well as a romantic getaway for couples. Guests can find many leisure options in the immediate vicinity and Puerto Vallarta downtown is only a 10-minute drive away. The hotel's guest rooms are tastefully appointed in warm tones and feature some Mexican touches that blends perfectly with the beautiful surrounding area. Room facilities include individual climate control, a 32” flat-screen TV and complimentary Wi-Fi access. When it comes for dining, travellers may choose between different options including authentic regional specialities as well as delicious Italian cuisine, while the pool bars offer light snacks and refreshing cocktails. An on-site spa, a sparkling outdoor pool and a wide variety of recreational activities complete the hotel's facilities and will ensure a truly memorable stay.FarePortal

name: Friendly Vallarta Beach Resort & Spa
address: Blvd. Francisco Medina Ascencio #2199, 48300 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: A reimagined and reinvented hotel, made to enjoy, live together, rest and create unique moments. For those who are looking for different, memorable and fun experiences.With one of the best beaches in Puerto Vallarta, excellent location near to hospitals, bars, restaurants, shopping mall, etc. just a few minutes from the Airport and the Malecon or downtown.The friendliest hotel now is fun.iHotelier/iStay

name: Sunscape Residence Tower
address: Boulevard Francisco Medina Ascencio, 48333 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Sunscape Residence Tower has a garden, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Puerto Vallarta. Featuring room service, this property also provides guests with a water park. The resort features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, evening entertainment and a kids' club. The resort will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a bath. At Sunscape Residence Tower all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. At the accommodation guests are welcome to take advantage of a hot tub. Speaking English and Spanish at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area. Playa de Oro is 400 metres from Sunscape Residence Tower, while Puerto Vallarta International Convention Center is 5.3 km away. The nearest airport is Lic. Gustavo Diaz Ordaz Airport, 3 km from the resort.

name: Iberostar Cozumel
address: Km 17 782 Carretera Costera Sur, 77600 Cozumel, Quintana Roo
description: This luxury family friendly beachfront resort has something to offer for everyone no matter what age. The property is located in Cozumel and just 19 kilometres from the Cozumel Airport and 17 kilometres from the city. All the rooms are bungalow styled with a bright tropical décor with private patios and hammock. Some of the room amenities include minibar service, complimentary Wi-Fi, air conditioning and plush bedding. With great attention spent every detail making your stay as comfortable and care free as possible. The property includes multiple restaurants with both a la carte and buffet options. From classical Mexican delights to international cuisine from around the world. Get a light snack along with a cool refreshing cocktail from one of the many bars and lounges spread throughout the property available day and night for your pleasure. The resort offers many activities for all ages including Star Camp for the children with organized recreation based on age range, with over 140 fun filled experiences to educate and make new friends. The hotel offers many sports and activities including snorkelling, windsurfing and kayaking. There is also a gym and tennis courts available along with nightly shows and entertainment. The spa is available with many treatment options to relax and rejuvenate your body, mind and spirit. Enjoy your magical vacation in beautiful Cozumel Mexico.FarePortal

name: Aldea Kuká, Luxury Eco Boutique Hotel
address: Calle Paseo Kuka, 77130 Holbox, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Barcelo Karmina
address: Avenida Vista Hermosa, 13, 28867 Manzanillo, Colima
description: Barcelo Karmina is located 50 m from private beach, 200 m from Playa Azul, 13 km from Karmina centre and 32 km from Manzanillo International Airport. The hotel facilities include 24h reception, several restaurants and bars, several pools, children’s pool, spa, gym, tennis court, games room, discotheque, business center, conference rooms, wireless internet (extra charge), laundry service (extra charge) and car rental. The guestrooms are equipped with bathroom (bath/shower), hair dryer, TV, telephone, wireless internet (charge), mini-bar, safe, air conditioning, ceiling fan and balcony/terrace. Address: Avda. Vista Hermosa 13, Fracc. Peninsula de Santiago, 28867 Manzanillo, MexicoWebBeds

name: Vivo Resorts
address: Avenida Vivo L 46-B, 71996 Puerto Escondido, Oaxaca
description: This luxurious property offers fully equipped, luxurious apartments located on a long stretch of pristine beach, just a 15-minute drive from Puerto Escondido. It has an 3 swimming pools with pool towels, a swim-up bar and views of the ocean. Each modern apartment at this property boasts breathtaking views of the Pacific Ocean and comes equipped with air conditioning, a kitchen and a satellite TV. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. A courtesy coffee is offered. Dining options include Ernesto's and Coco Thai. Benefits include equipment for the tennis court, Pickle ball court, basketball court and table tennis. The property also offers complimentary recreation classes when available. If you feel like visiting the surroundings, you can explore Laguna Manialtepec, 5 km away, or Carrizalillo Beach which is 14 km from the property. Vivo Resorts also offers an airport shuttle service with an extra cost and free on-site parking.

name: Iberostar Selection Playa Mita
address: Comercial Camino Ingreso a Litibú, Lote 2, Higuera Blanca, Mexico, 63734 Punta de Mita, Nayarit
description: Iberostar Playa Mita offers accommodation in Punta Mita. Guests can enjoy 2 outdoor pools, a swim up bar and a water park. A variety of cocktails is available at each of the 8 different bars. Rooms come with a flat-screen TV, balcony and terrace. Some rooms have a seating area for your convenience and a coffee machine. Some units have ocean views and for your comfort, you will find bath robes and a hair dryer. High-speed internet is also available. You will find a 24-hour front desk and hairdresser at the property. There is also a fitness centre and library. At Iberostar Playa Mita guests can enjoy a wide variety of dishes in one of the 4 specialty restaurants as well as a buffet. Room service is available 24/7. You can play tennis at this resort, and the area is popular for windsurfing and other water activities. Rincon de Guayabitos is 37 km from Iberostar Playa Mita, while Puerto Vallarta is 34 km from the property. The nearest airport is Lic. Gustavo Diaz Ordaz Airport, 30 km from Iberostar Playa Mita.

name: Occidental Nuevo Vallarta
address: Paseo de Los Cocoteros 18 Villa 8 | Fracc. Náutico Turístico | Nuevo Vallarta |Nayarit |, 63732 Nuevo Vallarta, Nayarit
description: Located a 1-minute walk from Nuevo Vallarta Beach and Marina, Occidental Nuevo Vallarta offers outdoor pools for adults and children, tennis courts and a gym. The stylish air-conditioned rooms include flat-screen satellite TV and a coffee maker. Unlimited food and both local and international drinks are available from Occidental Nuevo Vallarta's 4 restaurants, which serve Mexican, Mediterranean and international cuisine, and from the snack bar, beach bar and lounge bar. You can also order your meals to the privacy of your room 24 hours a day. The Occidental Nuevo Vallarta offers daytime and evening activities, including waterpolo, windsurfing and kayaking. Children from 4 to 12 years old can enjoy games in the supervised kids’ club. The hotel is located just a few meters from Nuevo Vallarta’s main shopping centre. Puerto Vallarta International Airport is a 25-minute drive away, while central Puerto Vallarta is a 35-minute drive away. Staff at the 24-hour front desk are happy to organize excursions or arrange car hire. Free private parking is available on site. Butler service is available.

name: Las Villas Hotel & Golf By Estrella del Mar
address: Camino Isla de la Piedra KM 10, 82267 Mazatlán, Sinaloa
description: This hotel offers access to a 3.5 mile long beach on the Pacific Ocean. Guests can relax at the full-service spa or work in their rooms with the free Wi-Fi. Estrella del Mar Resort Mazatlan features spacious rooms with views of the ocean or garden. The hotel features horse riding on the beach and a golf course. Guests can go for a swim in the outdoor pool or explore the beach. Dining options at the hotel include 4 restaurants and 3 bars. Guests can shop in the gift shop or stock their room at the convenience store. Estrella del Mar Resort Mazatlan is within a 30-minute drive of downtown Mazatlan. The Mazatlan International Airport is within a 10-minute drive of the hotel.

name: Grand Isla Navidad Resort
address: Circuito de Los Marinos, 28830 Manzanillo, Colima
description: This luxury beachfront resort, in Barra de Navidad, features a golf course, gym, spa and 2 outdoor pools, one located on the 10th floor. There are tennis courts and on-site water sports facilities. Free WiFi is included in public areas. Spacious air-conditioned rooms have a terrace with ocean, pool or mountain views. There is a living room with a sofa, cable TV and coffee maker. Rooms have a ceiling fan and private bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries. Grand Isla Navidad Golf & Spa Resort with Marina offers several bars and restaurants. Room service is also available. There is free on-site parking and the hotel has 24-hour reception, as well as a tour desk and concierge service.

name: Seaview Hotel - Adults Only 16 Plus
address: Qawra Road, Bugibba
description: With panoramic views of St. Paul's Islands, this modern hotel offers two swimming pools, a sun terrace, a gym, a rooftop bar and a restaurant. The property is located within a 5-minute walk of Bugibba Perched Beach and offers convenient access to the other rocky and sandy beaches in the area. With air conditioning and free WiFi, rooms at the Sea View feature a furnished balcony. They all come with tea/coffee making facilities, a minibar, a safe and a satellite TV. The en-suite bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer and free toiletries. A continental breakfast is available daily and includes cooked dishes. The restaurant serves both Maltese and English specialities. Diving, fishing and horse riding excursions can be booked at reception. Boats to the nearby islands leave from Plajja Tal'Bognor, a few minutes' walk away. The property is a 5-minute walk from Bugibba centre. Shops, restaurants and clubs are within 500 metres of the Seaview Hotel - Adults Only 16 Plus.

name: Be.Hotel
address: 3311 St. George's Bay, St. Julians, St. Julian's STJ 3315
description: Just 200 metres from the sandy beach of St George’s Bay, the 4-star be.HOTEL is located within the Baystreet Tourist Complex. It boasts a large panoramic pool on its 11th-floor rooftop terrace. In this modern and colourful hotel, you can book a massage at the nearby beauty salon. Set in 2 wings, air-conditioned rooms come with an interactive HD TV and en suite bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. All rooms have free WiFi. Inside the complex you will find a huge number of shops, a family entertainment centre, a bowling alley and a large range of restaurants. Pubs, bars and clubs are all located close by be.HOTEL, allowing you to make the most of Paceville's lively nightlife. Malta International Airport is 9 km away.

name: The Preluna Hotel
address: 124 Tower Road, Sliema SLM 1000
description: Set on Sliema’s seafront, Malta’s The Preluna Hotel features 4 restaurants, a free gym, and a private beach. The spacious rooms have modern décor, and some units offer views of the Mediterranean Sea. All rooms at the Preluna are air-conditioned and feature a tea/coffee maker, satellite flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with bath and shower. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The private beach area features a large swimming pool, a kids' pool, and a bar and grill. The Feelgood spa includes an indoor heated pool with hydromassage and a sauna. Massages and treatments can also be reserved. The restaurants are open for lunch and dinner. The Triton, the main restaurant with Mediterranean Sea views, is buffet style with international dishes and an open show kitchen. Breakfast is a generous hot and cold buffet. At the Skyroom Cocktail Bar & Grill guests can enjoy a drink or head to the sea-view open terrace for dinner.

name: Hyatt Regency Malta
address: St George's Bay, St. Julian's STJ 3310
description: Conveniently set in the centre of St Julian's, Hyatt Regency Malta provides air-conditioned rooms, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a fitness centre. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a garden, as well as an indoor pool and a sauna. A terrace, an on-site bar and shared lounge are available. At the hotel, each room has a desk. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, certain rooms at Hyatt Regency Malta also offer a city view. Guest rooms in the accommodation are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer. A continental, Full English/Irish or Italian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Hyatt Regency Malta offers 5-star accommodation with a spa centre. Staff speak Arabic, German, English and Spanish at the reception. Popular points of interest near the hotel include St George's Bay Beach, Balluta Bay Beach and Bay Street Shopping Complex. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 9 km from Hyatt Regency Malta.

name: 1926 Le Soleil Hotel & Spa
address: 6 Thornton, Sliema SLM 3143
description: Located in Sliema, 200 metres from MedAsia Beach, 1926 Le Soleil Hotel & Spa provides accommodation with a shared lounge, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. A spa and wellness centre comprising a fitness centre, an outdoor swimming pool, a sauna, as well as a terrace can be used by all guests. Selected rooms have a kitchen with a fridge, an oven and a stovetop. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. Qui-Si-Sana Beach is 400 metres from 1926 Le Soleil Hotel & Spa, while Fond Ghadir Beach is 700 metres away. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 9 km from the accommodation.

name: Pergola Hotel & Spa
address: Adenau Street, Mellieha MLH 2014
description: The Pergola Hotel & Spa is a 4-Star hotel located in a beautiful residential area, overlooking the quaint village of Mellieha, the popular bay and the sister islands of Gozo and Comino. The hotel is situated just a few metres away from shops, restaurants, bars, banks and only 10 minutes or 1km away from the largest sandy beach on the island; Mellieha Bay. The Pergola offers a range of accommodation from deluxe self-catering apartments to hotel rooms. Some of the apartments enjoy what many consider to be Malta’s best postcard view! The hotel offers free Wi-fi for all to keep connected! Pergola is popular with families and couples who want a break from the hustle and bustle of everyday stress, but yet want to be within easy proximity to the amenities. Buses to Malta’s main tourist attractions including Valletta, Mdina, Blue Grotto, Sliema and St. Julian’s, pass through the village very frequently. The Pergola enjoys ample panoramic sun-terraces, 2 outdoor pools with children’s paddling pools, 2 conference rooms, fitness centre and Jacuzzi. Da Vinci Spa provides an extensive range of health, beauty and well-being treatments at reasonable prices. The bars and restaurants within Pergola all offer variety and promise a different experience and a window into the Mediterranean cuisine. The Cave Bar (seasonal) is the hotel’s signature outlet; a bar into the natural rock that has been not only serving drinks, cocktails and a vast range of snacks but also showing live sports and events from across the globe. Da Ciccio Cucina is the latest addition and has become popular with those loving Italian cuisine whilst the Bonaventura and Al Fresco (seasonal) remain favourites for those preferring the differently daily themed buffets. The PADI dive-centre within the hotel is an another facility that literally gives you access into another world!Official Hotel Information

name: Grands Suites Hotel Residences and Spa
address: Triq Ir- Rebha, Gżira GZR 1321
description: Set in Il-Gżira, Grands Suites Hotel Residences and Spa features 4-star accommodation with private balconies. Ideally set in the Ta' Giorni district, this hotel offers a bar, as well as a sauna and a hot tub. The property has a seasonal outdoor pool, indoor pool, fitness centre and restaurant. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Grands Suites Hotel Residences and Spa provides some units with city views, and rooms have a patio. At the accommodation the rooms come with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes buffet, continental and Full English/Irish options. Languages spoken at the reception include English, Spanish, Italian and Maltese. Popular points of interest near Grands Suites Hotel Residences and Spa include Rock Beach, Balluta Bay Beach and Qui-Si-Sana Beach. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 7 km from the hotel.

name: db San Antonio Hotel & Spa
address: Triq it-Turisti, Saint Paul’s Bay SPB 1024
description: San Antonio Hotel & Spa overlooks St. Paul’s Bay in Malta. It offers indoor and outdoor swimming pools, and a Moroccan-style spa complete with hot tub, a steam bath and a fitness centre. Modern rooms of the San Antonio Hotel & Spa are air conditioned, and offer a balcony and a 32" LCD satellite TV.Free WiFi is available throughout. Massages and treatments at the beauty salon are available at an additional cost at the db San Antonio Hotel & Spa. Guests can enjoy discounts at the nearest private sandy beach, just 150 metres away. Start your day with a rich and varied breakfast buffet. For lunch and dinner you have a choice of cuisine in a variety of restaurants and cafés. San Antonio Hotel & Spa has a fun selection of multilingual entertainment the whole year round. A local bus service stops just 100 metres away and connects you to the rest of Malta.

name: Hotel Juliani
address: 25, St George's Road, St. Julian's STJ 3208
description: Offering a rooftop terrace and pool, Hotel Juliani - Boutique Hotel has panoramic views across Spinola Bay. Set in an elegant town house on Saint Julian's seafront, it offers free Wi-Fi and free parking. Spacious, air-conditioned rooms at this boutique hotel include a minibar and a TV with satellite channels. Each private bathroom has soft bathrobes plus Walk-In Shower and Rain Showers, hairdryer and free toiletries. The on-site Zest restaurant specialises in European and Asian cooking, and includes a terrace bar. A continental buffet breakfast is served in the Juliani Cafe, which also offers light meals and snacks throughout the day. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from the beach at Balluta Bay. Spinola bus stop is right outside with great connections around Malta.

name: Paradise Bay Resort
address: Cirkewwa Paradise Bay, Mellieha MLH 02
description: Featuring 3 outdoor pools, and spacious, sunbathing terraces, Paradise Bay Resort overlooks Paradise Bay on one side and the islands of Gozo and Comino on the other. Free WiFi and private parking are available on site. The hotel features sea-view rooms with satellite TV, mini fridge, and tea/coffee making facilities. The private bathroom comes with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. A generous buffet-style continental breakfast is provided daily. Guests can also enjoy a meal at one of the 3 on-site restaurants. Lunch and dinner is in the form of a rich, Mediterranean buffet, with an à la carte menu also available. Paradise Hotel's private beach can be enjoyed during the summer. Water sports and scuba-diving courses with qualified instructors are available all year round. The heated indoor pool is open during cooler months. On requests, relaxing moments can be savoured in the hot tub and sauna, and discounts are available for on-site massages. A tennis court and a playground for children are also featured at the property. The hotel has a dedicated team of multi-lingual staff who are always happy to be of assistance. The Paradise Bay also has 4 meeting rooms, suitable for a maximum of 180 delegates. A nearby bus will offer you connections to Valletta and Malta International Airport, both within 30 km of the property. The hotel is also within walking distance of the Ferry Terminal to Gozo island. Mellieha beach is 3.5 km away.

name: Ax Odycy Hotel
address: Qawra Coast Road, Saint Paul’s Bay
description: Located in Qawra, Seashells Resort - AX Hotels offers cosy 4-star accommodation, as well as a sauna, a Turkish steam bath and a saltwater swimming pool. It also provides squash courts, body treatments and water slides. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a mini bar and a telephone. The resort also has several connecting rooms to accommodate families. Those staying at Seashells Resort - AX Hotels can dine on local cuisines at the in-house restaurant, conveniently based for those who want to stay close by for a meal. Each evening, guests are welcome to wind down in the comfortable lounge bar. Seashells Resort - AX Hotels is a convenient place to discover nearby Bugibba and St Pauls Bay, which are within a 10-minute drive. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Qawra.Revato

name: AX Sunny Coast Resort & Spa
address: Qawra Bay, Saint Paul’s Bay SPB 1981
description: Sunny Coast offers modern, self-catering apartments, all with a private balcony. It is set in Qawra, one of the most beautiful bays on the island of Malta. The resort offers spectacular views across the bay, the Mediteranean Sea, and the Maltese Islands. Each apartment has a contemporary design and is complete with a kitchenette and balcony. On site you will find a wide range of facilities including a leisure and fitness centre, plus a squash court. You can relax on the beach, in the swimming pools (both indoor and outdoor), or in one of the 3 hot tubs.

name: Waterfront
address: The Strand Sliema,230327, Sliema GZR 1028
description: The Waterfront Hotel is set in central Malta, along the sea promenade of Sliema, and features views of Sliema's port, the Manoel Island and Valletta. The property is 4 km from some of Malta's most popular beaches. This hotel features a restaurant, bar and free WiFi throughout. All rooms are air-conditioned, and feature a balcony, most with views of the sea, and an en suite bathroom. Each also has a minibar, TV and safe. A buffet breakfast is available daily at The Waterfront Hotel, and guests can enjoy light snacks at the bar or have dinner at the on-site Regatta Restaurant. The hotel is a 15-minute walk from Tigné shopping mall, and restaurants and shops are found in the immediate surroundings. Sliema Ferry Port is 600 metres away. Malta International Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Doubletree by Hilton Malta
address: Qawra, Saint Paul’s Bay SPB 2402
description: Beautiful located at the waters edge, the Dolmen Hotel is the perfect retreat for an island holiday in Malta. Our hotel facilities include 488 guest rooms + suites, a variety of 7 restaurants & bars and 6 pools to choose from, an Inhouse Casino,state of the art conference facilities + meeting rooms, stunning wedding venues and Free WiFi so guests can stay connected throughout their stay. To ensure an utterly memorable vacation, take advantage of our spacious Amazonia Beach lido, 4 outdoor pools, kids' pool, PADI diving school and water sports centre. Indulge in a relaxing treatment at the Myoka leading Spa in Malta or reenergise in one of the two heated indoor pools, fitness room, hydro massage, and sauna. Animation activities are provided on a daily basis together with a kids club during the summer months and Daily entertainment is held during the evenings. As one of the best quality Malta hotels, the Dolmen Hotel also provides a multi-storey car park with over 400 car spaces. Discover the warmth of traditional Maltese hospitality, the flavours of authentic cuisine and the excitement of the Mediterranean – experience the vacation you deserve with the Dolmen Hotel.FarePortal

name: Radisson Blu Golden Sands Resort & Spa, Golden Bay
address: Golden Bay, Mlh 5510 Mellieha, Malta Mellieha, Mellieha MLH 5510
description: Set into the sandy coast of Malta's Golden Bay, the Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Malta Golden Sands includes a large swimming pool, a adult only pool and a children's pool. It also offers a private beach and a spa. Rooms are large and luxurious. Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Malta Golden Sands enjoys a quiet, private setting, with peaceful views of the sea and the surrounding countryside. It is a 10-minute drive from the harbour where ferries leave for Gozo Comino. The spa extends over 1000 m² of space, and the resort's Leisure Centre offers stunning views of the sea from its large windows overlooking the bay. Rooms are furnished with modern decorations and offer a balcony with sea or countryside views. During summer the rate includes 1 parasol and 2 sun loungers per room.

name: Malta Marriott Hotel & Spa
address: 39 Main Street, Balluta Bay, St. Julian's STJ 1017
description: The Malta Marriott Hotel and Spa located metres from Balluta beach, alongside a tranquil seafront promenade within the bustling, cosmopolitan St. Julian’s town and a 20-minute drive from Valletta, a European capital of culture city. Our newly €30M refurbished hotel, combines luxurious charm and the relaxed feel of a Mediterranean spa, with well-appointed premium category rooms and luxury suites. With four diverse restaurants and two bars, our luxury hotel has something for every palate. The M Lounge offers spectacular views and the ideal space to work or relax. A rooftop pool gives leisure travelers time to soak up the sun, whilst the spa provides an array of treatments, including an indoor heated pool, Jacuzzi, sauna, steam room, fitness center and squash court. Our 5-star hotel also provides 15,000 square feet of versatile meeting and banqueting space.Marriott

name: Barceló Fortina Malta
address: 3012 Tigne Seafront Sliema, Sliema SLM 3012
description: Set 500 metres from Tigné Point Beach, Barceló Fortina Malta offers 5-star accommodation in Sliema and has a bar. Offering a restaurant, the property also has an outdoor swimming pool, as well as an indoor pool and a fitness centre. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a shuttle service, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Barceló Fortina Malta provides some units with city views, and every room is fitted with a balcony. At the accommodation all rooms have bed linen and towels. Guests at Barceló Fortina Malta can enjoy a buffet breakfast. MedAsia Beach is 700 metres from the hotel, while Qui-Si-Sana Beach is less than 1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 9 km from Barceló Fortina Malta.

name: Radisson Blu Resort, Malta St Julian's
address: St. George's Bay, St. Julian's STJ 3391
description: Set on the seafront in St. George's Bay, this 5-star hotel offers central but quiet location in St.Julians. It features 3 outdoor pools, a heated indoor pool and rooms with free WiFi and a large balcony. Air-conditioned rooms at the Radisson Blu Resort, Malta St. Julian's all come with a TV, free tea and coffee making facilities as well as bottled water upon arrival. All rooms have views of the Mediterranean Sea. An appetizing selection of snacks, wines and cocktails are available at the Bridge Bar. A generous buffet breakfast is served daily at the Kontiki restaurant. The resort also features a touch of Mediterranean cuisine at Le Bistro and outdoor casual dining at The Edge. Public transport stop to the capital city Valletta and Hop-on Hop-Off Sightseeing tour is a 2-minute walk from the property. Malta international Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Iniala Harbour House
address: 12, St. Barbara Bastions, Valletta
description: Located in Valletta and with Valletta Waterfront reachable within 1.1 km, Iniala Harbour House provides concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a tour desk. There is a spa and wellness centre with a terrace, indoor pool and fitness centre, as well as a sauna. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. All rooms include a kettle, while selected rooms have a balcony and others also provide guests with city views. At Iniala Harbour House every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers Full English/Irish, American or vegetarian options. Bike hire and car hire are available at this hotel and the area is popular for cycling. Staff speak Catalan, Czech, English and Spanish at the reception. University of Malta - Valletta Campus is 400 metres from the accommodation, while Upper Barrakka Gardens is 300 metres away. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 7 km from Iniala Harbour House.

name: Hilton Malta
address: Portomaso, St. Julians, Malta Ptm 01, Malta, St. Julian's PTM 01
description: Hilton Malta is located in the Portomaso Yacht Marina, just 15 minutes away from UNESCO World Heritage Capital City Valletta. Relax in stylish and spacious guest rooms with year-round Mediterranean sunshine. Each of the guest rooms are rich with Mediterranean tones and furnishings. Executive Rooms and Suites also include access to the Executive Lounge.  Three on-site restaurants offer delicious Mediterranean cuisine and impressive dining and cocktail options. Dine on the beach during summer months, or enjoy Royal Thai cuisine choices in a unique setting at the Blue Elephant Restaurant. Indulge in the vast amenities at this Malta hotel including a day spa with a sauna and steam rooms with themed treatment rooms and over 80 specialized treatments, outdoor pools and one indoor pool, fully-equipped gymnasium and full aerobic timetable, tennis and squash courts. Hilton Malta features an extensive range of meeting rooms, with a conference center hosting up to 1330 delegates. Choose a spectacular seafront setting for a wedding, from an extravagant celebration or an intimate gathering of family and friends.Official Hotel Information

name: The Westin Dragonara Resort, Malta
address: Stj02 Dragonara Road, St. Julians, St. Julian's STJ 3143
description: Standing apart on a natural peninsula fringed by the sea, The Westin Dragonara Resort, Malta brings warm-hearted, luxurious Mediterranean living to a vibrant, historic island. The property has an enviable beachside position and is accessed via private gateway, inscribed with Virgil thoughtful proverb, “God made this gem for us”. A reflection of Malta’s generous character lives through the way each guest is welcomed with easy-going charm and personalized attention. Our family resort features 408 rooms and suites which have been recently renovated. Landscaped around age-old artefacts, sunken gardens and impressive pools, our 5-star hotel has stunning ocean views throughout. The villa-style lobby is naturally light and spacious where floor-to-ceiling windows and sun-drenched terrace overlook unspoiled coastline. A multi-generational favorite, it is equally appealing to both leisure and business visitors, supported by the team organic approach to wellbeing, informed by the island’s rich culture.Marriott

name: Bayview Hotel By St Hotels
address: 143, The Strand, Sliema GZR03
description: Bayview Hotel & Apartments offers a 24-hour internet café, and a rooftop swimming pool overlooking the harbour at Sliema. Some accommodation comes with a balcony, and some feature sea views. Rooms come with a private bathroom, satellite TV and Air Conditioning. Bayview Hotel has a range of dining options including an Asian restaurant complete with Indian and Chinese cuisine, and a continental buffet. The spa and fitness centre offers massage and beauty treatments, and a thermal pool with sea views. Bayview is located a 15-minute walk from Sliema town centre, and just a few steps away from boat trips around the island and to the capital Valletta. Buses to Valletta, St Julian's, and across the island stop right outside the property. Malta International Airport is just 9 km away. The hotel offers a shuttle service on request. This is our guests' favourite part of Il-Gżira, according to independent reviews. Solo travellers particularly like the location — they rated it 9.1 for a one-person stay.

name: LABRANDA Riviera Hotel & Spa
address: Marfa Bay, Mellieha
description: Labranda Riviera Hotel & Spa is located in one of the best-preserved areas of northern Malta and overlooks the scenic Marfa Bay. Unspoiled views over the islands of Gozo and Comino create an idyllic Mediterranean atmosphere of relaxation. Guests of the LABRANDA Riviera Hotel & Spa have access to a wide range of amenities, including two outdoor seawater swimming pools, an indoor seawater pool and a full-service Spa Centre. At Elysium Spa guests can choose from a wide range of therapy and beauty treatments. True relaxation, however, requires a holistic approach. It is more than just enjoying sea views, swimming pools and spa treatments. Indulging in superior food is also part of a comforting and rejuvenating vacation. The ability to savour an appetisingly crafted quality meal or taste a snack by the pool is among the most important experiences for guests of a Select Hotel. Therefore, Labranda Riviera Hotel & Spa does its best to offer a wide array of world-class restaurants as well as bars for its valued guests. The hotel is located in Mellieha, a popular and picturesque village in Malta. It offers visitors a nice mix of experiences, from idyllic sandy beaches and authentic restaurants, to several historical sites. The latter include Saint Agathas Tower, the Church of our Lady Victory, and the Mellieha WWII air-raid shelters. Labranda Riviera Hotel & Spa also provides adventure seeking guests with the ability to take part in various scuba diving activities. Labranda Riviera Hotel & Spa is the perfect choice for travelers looking for a diverse vacation in the middle of the Mediterranean Sea.iHotelier/iStay

name: The Embassy Valletta Hotel
address: Strait street 173, Valletta
description: The Embassy Valletta Hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a terrace and restaurant in Valletta. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation provides an ATM, a concierge service and organising tours for guests. At the hotel every room is fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Each room has a kettle, while some rooms will provide you with a balcony and others also provide guests with city views. At The Embassy Valletta Hotel rooms include bed linen and towels. A continental, Full English/Irish or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include University of Malta - Valletta Campus, Upper Barrakka Gardens and Valletta Waterfront. The nearest airport is Malta International Airport, 8 km from The Embassy Valletta Hotel.

name: Corinthia Hotel St Georges Bay
address: St. Georges Bay, St. Julian's
description: Combining a luxurious setting with premium facilities, Corinthia Hotel St Georges Bay offers a swimming pool, a private beach and free Wi-Fi. It is located a 20-minute car ride from Malta International Airport and an airport shuttle is available for guests. Guests of the hotel can begin their day at Richard Geres Personal Training, or enjoy the various fitness amenities, such as a diving centre. It also includes family-friendly facilities, with room layouts and services for families both large and small, plus a kids pool and babysitting/child services. It also has its very own spa and wellness centre, Apollo Day. The rooms are air conditioned and include a mini bar, a private balcony and a coffee maker. They each offer slippers, heating and a flat-screen TV. Guests of Corinthia Hotel St Georges Bay are invited to sample regional and international cuisine at Fra Martino, or try local dishes at Caviar & Bull. Dining options at the hotel include Le Café and Henry J. Bean's Bar & Grill. Guests can also enjoy a drink at Pearl Lounge. The area around Corinthia Hotel St Georges Bay has a range of cafés and restaurants. St Julians is within a 20-minute walk of the hotel, and local sightseeing information can be found at the tour desk.Revato

name: Deep Blu Boutique Hotel
address: Triq Il-Madonna Tar-Ruzarju, Żurrieq QRD 3010
description: No description found

name: Grand Hotel Excelsior
address: 1810 Great Siege Road, Floriana Valletta, Valletta FRN 1810
description: Luxury 5 Star Hotel and Beach Resort with private sandy beach and private 30 Berth Yacht Marina.Located by the Waters edge and in close proximity to the Capital City of Malta, Valletta.The hotel is embraced by the historical bastion walls of the World Heritage City of Valletta. The spectacular water's edge location is breathtaking, blending contemporary vision with the rich history that graces Marsamxett Harbour and Valletta. A Grand Ballroom, an Exhibition Hall and meeting rooms; the majority having natural light, The hotel offers over 4,000 square meters of versatile conference & banqueting facilities with complimentary WIFI also available throughout the hotel.iHotelier/iStay

name: The Phoenicia Malta
address: The Mall 0, Valletta
description: Renowned for its excellent quality of service the hotel is located on the doorstep to the City of Valletta offering views over The Grand Harbour, historic Valletta, the hotel’s 7 acres of private gardens, or Floriana. The Phoenicia Malta offers extensive services including a relaxing Spa and Gym, indoor and outdoor swimming pools, iconic Palm Court Lounge, The Club Bar and 2 Restaurants. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from both the ferry terminal to Sliema and Barrakka Lift, which links to Valletta Waterfront ferry terminal and promenade. The Phoenicia Malta’s infinity pool sits at the bottom of the hotel’s gardens against the beautiful Bastions and overlooks the harbour. During spring and summer, the Bastion Pool Bar & Restaurant is open for dining and beverages. An extensive breakfast buffet offering both hot and cold items including specialty coffees is served daily in The Phoenix Restaurant. The Phoenix Restaurant is open daily offering a menu which features a combination of Maltese and Mediterranean dishes. Rooms are elegantly appointed with Mediterranean tiled floors. All air-conditioned, they also feature a minibar and tea and coffee-making facilities. They are all equipped with complimentary wireless internet access, and Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel.

name: Marina Hotel Corinthia Beach Resort
address: 1, St. Georges Bay, St. Julian's STJ 3390
description: Set in Pembroke, Marina Hotel Corinthia Beach Resort Malta offers a range of superior features, including 6 swimming pools and exclusive access to a secluded beach. It also provides a private dock, a beauty centre and free wireless internet access in all areas. Guests of the hotel can start their day at Pilates Centre, or enjoy the many leisure facilities, such as a diving centre. There is also free public parking on site for those travelling with a car. It also has its very own spa and wellness centre, Apollo Day. There are 249 rooms at Marina Hotel Corinthia Beach Resort Malta, each offering all the essentials to ensure a comfortable stay. There are also several rooms especially designed for families. Guests of Marina Hotel Corinthia Beach Resort Malta are welcome to sample Asian cuisine at Buddhamann, or try Italian and regional meals at Da Marina. Dining options at the hotel include Cafe24 and White Olive. Other dining options are also available. The area around Marina Hotel Corinthia Beach Resort Malta has a variety of cafés and restaurants. St Julians and Is-Swieqi are just a short drive away.Revato

name: Golden Tulip Vivaldi Hotel
address: Dragonara Road, St Julians, Stj 06, St. Julian's
description: Golden Tulip Vivaldi Hotel is set in St Julians centre, 100 metres from the beaches. It offers panoramic views on the Mediterranean Sea and a rooftop pool with sun loungers. Hotel Vivaldi’s rooms are all air conditioned and feature balcony, minibar and satellite TV. Most of them have sea views. Services at Golden Tulip Vivaldi include the Newtones Leisure Club with indoor swimming pool, sauna, hot tub and gym. Parking facilities and Wi-Fi are available. The hotel is in the Paceville district, the main entertainment area of Malta, 300 meters from the Dragonara Casino and 400 meters from St Julian’s bus terminal. Valletta is around a 15-minute drive away. Malta International Airport is reachable in 20 minutes by car.

name: Salini Resort
address: Salina Bay, Saint Paul’s Bay -
description: Set on a gentle slope overlooking the Salina Bay and the Mediterranean Sea, the 4-star Salini Resort offers 2 outdoor pools. The spacious and stylish rooms come with either sea or countryside views. All rooms and suites are air conditioned and include a balcony or terrace. The en-suite bathroom comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Other facilities at the Salini include 1 tennis court, 1 padel court and a wellness area with an indoor pool and fitness facilities. A restaurant and bar, as well as large lounge and dining areas are also at guests' disposal. The property features meeting rooms and a spacious hall which can accommodate 1000 guests. The town of Bugibba is 3.5 km away, while St. Paul's Bay is a 10-minute drive away.

name: Maritim Antonine Hotel & Spa Malta
address: George Borg Olivier Street, Mellieha MLH 1021
description: Offering a rooftop pool, a spa, and 3 restaurants, Maritim Antonine Hotel & Spa is set in the hillside village of Mellieha, 1 km from Malta’s largest beach. It boasts panoramic sea and country views. It is just 25 km from Malta International Airport. Maritim Antonine Hotel & Spa includes 3 pools, one of which is a heated indoor pool, and a sauna. There is also a modern gym and numerous state-of-the-art treatments available. Wi-Fi throughout is free. All spacious, elegant and air conditioned, the rooms come with satellite TV and free coffee-making facilities. Some overlook the sea, garden, or city. Guests can enjoy a variety of cuisines at the on-site restaurants, which offer both indoor and outdoor dining spaces. In summer months, pool-side BBQs are also arranged. Situated in the north of the island, the property is a 30-minute drive from the capital Valletta.

name: Vila Foz Hotel & SPA - member of Design Hotels
address: Av. Montevideu, 236, 4150-516 Porto, Porto
description: Facing the beachfront, Vila Foz Hotel & SPA - member of Design Hotels offers 5-star accommodation in Porto and has a garden, restaurant and bar. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can use the spa and wellness centre with an indoor pool, fitness centre, and sauna, as well as free bikes. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All rooms include a kettle, while some rooms also boast a balcony and others also feature city views. At Vila Foz Hotel & SPA - member of Design Hotels the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, American or vegetarian options. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Porto, like cycling. Vila Foz Hotel & SPA - member of Design Hotels features amenities such as an on-site business centre and hammam. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Molhe Beach, Castelo do Queijo Beach and Ingleses Beach. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 12 km from Vila Foz Hotel & SPA - member of Design Hotels, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Next - Savoy Signature
address: Rua Carvalho Araújo 8, 9000-022 Funchal, Madeira
description: Conveniently set in the centre of Funchal, NEXT - by Savoy Signature provides air-conditioned rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a fitness centre. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a garden, as well as a sauna. A terrace, an on-site bar and shared lounge are available. All units at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. Each room includes a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, while selected rooms are fitted with a kitchenette fitted with a fridge. At NEXT - by Savoy Signature each room comes with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Around the clock guidance is available at the reception, where staff speak German, English, French and Portuguese. Popular points of interest near NEXT - by Savoy Signature include Almirante Reis Beach, Marina do Funchal and Madeira Casino. The nearest airport is Cristiano Ronaldo Madeira International Airport, 20 km from the hotel.

name: Enotel Lido
address: Rua Simplicio Dos Passos Gouveia, 29, 9004-576 Funchal, Madeira
description: This stunning hotel basks in its enchanting location, lying just a few steps away from the sea. Guests will find themselves just a short distance away from the town centre, offering the ideal setting from which to explore the delights that the area has to offer. The hotel is located within easy access of a host of shopping opportunities and dining options. This charming hotel features beautifully-appointed guest rooms, which are well equipped with modern amenities for added comfort and convenience. Guests can enjoy a leisurely swim in the pool, relax and unwind in the sauna, or enjoy the ultimate rejuvenation in the spa. Guests can also enjoy an energetic workout in the in-house gym.FarePortal

name: Allegro Madeira Adults Only
address: Rua Gorgulho NR 1, 9004-540 Funchal, Madeira
description: No description found

name: Pestana Carlton Madeira
address: Largo António Nobre, nº 1, 9004-531 Funchal, Madeira
description: Offering 4 restaurants, 2 bars and Atlantic Ocean views, the 5-star Pestana Carlton Madeira Ocean Resort Hotel is situated on a cliff top on Madeira Island. Funchal’s centre is 10 minutes' walk away. Pestana Carlton Madeira's leisure offer includes a giant chess board, a certified, on-site diving school and a tennis court. All suites and rooms feature elegant décor, flat-screen TVs and balconies with sea, mountain or pool views. One of the 2 saltwater pools has stairs leading to the sea. For relaxation, Pestana's Venus Health Spa includes an indoor heated pool, Scottish shower and massage treatments. Guests can choose from the rustic atmosphere of the hotel's Taverna Grill or by the cool pool and gardenside setting of the Garden Pool Restaurante & Bar. Activities such as paragliding, yacht excursions and windsurfing are available nearby. The Pestana Carlton Madeira Ocean Resort Hotel is a 20-minute drive from Madeira's International Airport. Private parking is available, at an extra fee.

name: Saccharum - Hedonist Design Resort
address: Rua Serra de Água, 1, 9370-083 Estreito da Calheta, Madeira
description: Timezone: Atlantic/Madeira Located in Calheta, Savoy Saccharum Resort & Spa is by the sea, within a 10-minute drive of Church of Our Lady of Light and Beachside Square. This 5-star hotel is 19.1 mi (30.8 km) from CR7 Museum and 19.5 mi (31.3 km) from Funchal Marina. Make yourself at home in one of the 243 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and slippers. Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, which include 2 outdoor swimming pools, a health club, and a sauna. This Art Deco hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and an arcade/game room. Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Snacks are also available at the coffee shop/café. Relax with a refreshing drink at the beach bar, the poolside bar, or one of 3 bars/lounges. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 7:30 AM to 10 AM. Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Expedia

name: Savoy Palace - The Leading Hotels of the World - Savoy Signature
address: Avenida do Infante, 25, 9004-542 Funchal, Madeira
description: Located in Funchal, 1.7 km from Almirante Reis Beach, Savoy Palace - The Leading Hotels of the World - Savoy Signature provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Featuring room service, this property also has a restaurant and a terrace. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a bidet. Each room is equipped with a kettle, while some rooms are equipped with a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and an oven. At Savoy Palace - The Leading Hotels of the World - Savoy Signature every room comes with bed linen and towels. A Full English/Irish, Italian or American breakfast is available daily at the property. You can play table tennis at this 5-star hotel, and bike hire and car hire are available. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Gorgulho - Gavinas Beach, Marina do Funchal and Madeira Casino. The nearest airport is Cristiano Ronaldo Madeira International Airport, 20 km from Savoy Palace - The Leading Hotels of the World - Savoy Signature.

name: Quinta Splendida Wellness & Botanical Garden
address: Estrada Ponta Da Oliveira, 11, 9125-001 Caniço, Madeira
description: Quinta Splendida Wellness & Botanical Garden is situated in a restored 19th-century manor house on 30,000 m² of landscaped botanical gardens. It features panoramic Atlantic Ocean views, indoor pool and one of the largest spas in Madeira, with 10 treatment rooms. Free WiFi access is available. Rooms at the Quinta Splendida Wellness & Botanical Garden feature private balconies and modern furnishings. They come equipped with satellite TV and a minibar. Some units also include a kitchenette. The hotel provides a variety of dining options At La Perla guests can enjoy gourmet Portuguese cuisine. There is a Thai lounge, a cocktail bar, and a restaurant overlooking the pool that serves salads and smoothies. At the Botanical Garden guests can relax in a sun lounger by the pool, or play a game of billiards. The spa centre includes a Finnish sauna and an ice pool. Nearby leisure activities include golfing, diving and whale watching. Quinta Splendida Wellness & Botanical Garden is located 100 metres from the centre of Caniço and is 7 km from Funchal. The hotel has a tour desk that rents bicycles and assists with car hire.

name: Estalagem Da Ponta Do Sol
address: Quinta da Rochinha nº6, 9360 Ponta do Sol, Madeira
description: Perched on a cliff facing the Atlantic Ocean, this design hotel is within a renovated traditional farmhouse. Set on Madeira’s South Coast, Ponta do Sol has a stunning infinity pool and hot tub with panoramic views. Floor-to-ceiling windows lead from the hotel guestrooms out onto balconies. Some rooms provide sea views, others overlook the garden. The total-white décor is complemented by flat-screen cable TVs. A game of tennis can be enjoyed on the court, located a 2-minute walk from the Estalagem Da Ponta Do Sol. Guests can also relax the spa & wellness centre where a sauna and massage therapies are provided. Boasting the most hours of sunshine in Madeira, Ponta Do Sol village is just minutes from the hotel and can be reached with free bikes.

name: Hotel Alto Lido
address: Estrada Monumental, 316, 9004-529 Funchal, Madeira
description: Renovated in 2018, the 4-star Hotel Alto Lido is located in Funchal’s prime area – Lido, 2.5 km from the city centre. It offers an indoor and an outdoor heated swimming pool as well as a pool for children and Spa facilities. Hotel Alto Lido includes modernly decorated rooms, suites and studios with frontal or side se views. Each accommodation is equipped with a flat-screen cable TV, a private bathroom with shower and hairdryer, air conditioning, telephone, safety deposit box and free WiFi. Studios have fully equipped kitchenette. On site, guests can choose amongst 3 restaurants. The Flôr de Sal restaurant is a buffet restaurant on the ground floor and serves local specialties. On the 1st floor, The Tale offers an ample veranda with sea views and a carefully prepared à la carte menu. Linha de Água offers light meals and salads by the outdoor pool. In addition, guests may enjoy live music and a cocktail at the 360 bar. Guests have a gym and cardio-fitness facilities at their disposal as well as a sauna and a Turkish bath. There are 2 conference rooms with capacity for 80 and 100 persons, a laundry service and a games room. Private shuttle service to the centre of Funchal is available 4 times per day. Funchal International Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Enotel Magnólia
address: Rua Dr Pita 6, 9000-089 Funchal, Madeira
description: No description found

name: Pestana Grand
address: 23 Rua da Ponta da Cruz, 9000-103 Funchal, Madeira
description: Surrounded by tropical gardens, the seaside Pestana Grand Ocean Resort Hotel features the largest salt water pool on the Madeira Island. The hotel offers fine dining and access to the Funchal coastline promenade. The resort is set on the rock of Ponta da Cruz, with views of the high sea cliffs of Cabo Girão. Its bright interiors have large windows, designed to let in plenty of natural light. Pestana Grand Ocean Resort Hotel has a full-scale spa with steam baths, saunas, and hot tubes. Guests can work out at the gym, have a relaxing massage or swim in the panoramic indoor pool. The Pestana Grand's rooms include private balconies. Each is air conditioned and has an en suite bathroom with a bathtub. The hotel offers an extensive range of restaurants, including fine Moroccan, Italian and Portuguese cuisine. Guests can enjoy a drink in the piano bar, or a fine cigar in the lounge. Free Private parking is available and is subject to availability.

name: Pestana Promenade
address: Rua Simplicio Dos Passos Gouveia, #31, 9000-001 Funchal, Madeira
description: The 4-star Pestana Promenade Ocean Resort Hotel in Funchal is close to the Lido and offers direct access to the promenade that stretches to Praia Formosa. It features indoor and outdoor pools, an outdoor hot tub, a spa and gym. The bright and airy rooms at the Pestana Promenade Ocean Resort Hotel have hardwood floors. They feature Atlantic Ocean views from the balcony, and include modern amenities such as air conditioning and a private bathroom with complimentary soaps and shampoos. The stylish restaurant at the Pestana Ocean Resort serves authentic local specialities. Meals and refreshing drinks can also be enjoyed al fresco on the terrace, which is surrounded by an exotic garden and palm trees. The Promenade’s spa features a range of relaxation options, including a sauna and a Turkish bath. More active guests can work out with cardiovascular equipment and free weights at the modern gym. Parking is available, at an extra fee. A 24-hour front desk is among the convenient amenities offered by the hotel.

name: Tui Blue Gardens - Adults Only - Savoy Signature
address: Azinhaga da Casa Branca, 320, 9000-542 Funchal, Madeira
description: Nestled against an oceanfront hillside, this quiet adult-only hotel boasts a heated outdoor pool, a sauna, and a hot tub. It offers panoramic mountain and sea views, and is located in the Lido area. Tui Blue Gardens features guest rooms with modern furnishings, and balconies that overlook the Atlantic Ocean. Each spacious room comes with satellite TV, as well as tea and coffee making facilities. Guests can enjoy live cooking and themed buffets for breakfast and dinner. Romantic and al-fresco dining is also available upon request. During the day, guests can relax on the rooftop terrace and get a drink from the honesty bar. In the evenings, The Tui Blue Gardens night club offers live music and a variety of shows. Tui Blue Gardens is just 2 km from the Funchal city centre and in situated near various public parks and shops. Paid private parking is possible on site

name: Vila Gale Santa Cruz
address: Rua De Sao Fernando, 5, 9100-157 Santa Cruz, Madeira
description: Overlooking the Atlantic Ocean in a tranquil area of Madeira, Vila Galé offers deluxe accommodation with a wellness centre. It features a pool, beauty treatments and nearby golf facilities. Fitted with anti-allergic duvets and modern furnishings, rooms at Vila Galé Santa Cruz all open out onto private balconies. Each includes a TV set with satellite channels, DVD and CD players. Bathrooms are en suite. On-site Versatil Restaurant serves regional specialities and international cuisine throughout the day. Inevitável Pasta Lounge offers a la carte dishes during lunch and dinner, with an accent on Mediterranean food. Madeira International Airport and Pico do Cruz Mountain are both within a 5-minute drive from Santa Cruz Vila Galé.

name: Calheta Beach
address: Vila Da Calheta, 9370-133 Estreito da Calheta, Madeira
description: No description found

name: The Views Baia - Adults Only
address: Rua Das Maravilhas, 74, 9000-177 Funchal, Madeira
description: Featuring views of Funchal Bay, The Views Baia - Adults Only Hotel offers modern accommodation. Facilities include the Four Feelings Spa, 2 swimming pools, and a well-equipped gym. Rooms at the Four Views open onto private balconies overlooking the Atlantic Ocean or the mountains. All rooms have bathrooms with walk-in showers, and some rooms have cooking facilities or a private spa bath. A varied menu of Mediterranean, international and vegetarian dishes is served at the Bay View Restaurant. Guests can enjoy drinks and cocktails accompanied by live music at the Woogie Boogie Bar. A hot tub, massage treatments and indoor and outdoor swimming pools are available. The Hotel The Views Baia - Adults Only is located uphill from São João Fortress. It is 30 minutes’ drive from Madeira Airport and on-site private parking is free.

name: Madeira Regency Cliff
address: Rua da Quinta da Calaca, 6, 9000-108 Funchal, Madeira
description: The Madeira Regency Cliff - Adults Only is a 4-star boutique Hotel offering panoramic Atlantic Ocean views from its cliff-top location. It offers indoor and outdoor pools and massage treatments. The contemporary rooms offer a furnished balcony where guests can relax with a drink from the minibar. Modern amenities include flat-screen TVs and free Wi-Fi. Some rooms feature a seating area and dining furniture. A workout can be enjoyed in the well-equipped gym. For relaxation, Madeira Regency Cliff - Adults Only offers a Turkish bath. Guests can also unwind in the tranquil surroundings of the landscaped garden. Mistral Restaurant offers a rich breakfast buffet and a terrace overlooking the Ocean. In the evening, local and international cuisine is served. Monte Palace Tropical Garden and Santa Clara Monastery are both less than a 10-minute walk away.

name: Royal Savoy - Ocean Resort - Savoy Signature
address: Rua Carvalho Araujo 1, 9000-022 Funchal, Madeira
description: The luxurious Royal Savoy - Ocean Resort is set amidst tropical gardens in the Bay of Funchal, featuring 2 heated lagoon-style pools and private ocean access. The 5-star hotel combines exotically decorated interiors and contemporary architecture." All the stylish suites and rooms are beautifully decorated and have sophisticated furnishings, as well as a private balcony with panoramic views of the Atlantic Ocean. Each has a modern bathroom with free toiletries and the suites have a full kitchenette. The Royal Savoy - Ocean Resort - Savoy Signature also boasts a poolside bar and a bar with nightly live music and refreshing cocktails. Guests may have a taste of exquisite Portuguese flavours at The Armada, an à la carte and buffet restaurant, which also offers international cuisine options. Following a day of touring the island and enjoying the sights, guests may unwind at the spa, an ideal spot for a relaxing massage, a visit to the gym or indoor pool. Guests can soak up the sun on the extensive ocean front solarium. The attentive staff can organise various off-site activities, including arrangements for golf as well as provide a rental car service. The Funchal Marina is a 14-minute walk from the Hotel. Guests may also try their luck at the slot machines of Madeira Casino, which is 700 metres away. The greenery of Madeira's Botanical Gardens is 4 km away, while the stunning views of Girão Cape are within 12 km. The Royal Savoy - Ocean Resort - Savoy Signature is 23 km from Madeira International Airport.

name: Reid's Palace, A Belmond Hotel, Madeira
address: Estrada Monumental 139, 9000-098 Funchal, Madeira
description: Set on a cliff in 10 acres of subtropical gardens overlooking the Atlantic, this 5-star resort features an oceanfront spa, 3 swimming pools and direct access to oceanic waters. All rooms at Reid's Palace are elegantly furnished and include a balcony and marble bathroom with amenities. A minibar with complimentary soft drinks and free in-room movies are available to each room. Reid’s Palace Spa features indoor and outdoor therapy suites with a private whirlpool. It offers an indulgent menu of treatments using world-class spa brands. Dry and wet saunas are also on site. Active guests can play a match on the tennis courts, or get energised with cardiovascular equipment at the modern gym. Madeira's finest ingredients are brought to life at Michelin-starred William Restaurant, while the Villa Cipriani serves classic Italian dishes. The Dining Room organises elegant soirees in Edwardian ambiance, during the winter season. The Reid’s is 3 km from Praia Formosa Beach and 15 minutes’ walk to Funchal city centre with plenty of nightlife. It provides free private parking.

name: Porto Santa Maria Hotel
address: Avenida do Mar e Das Comunidades Madeirenses, 50, 9050-029 Funchal, Madeira
description: Porto Santa Maria is located at the water's edge with direct access to the sea front promenade. Behind the hotel lies the old centre of Funchal, the well-known "old town". Its close relationship to the sea, the outstanding and exclusive views over the harbour where the cruise ships dock, its picturesque surroundings and the unique flavours of its cuisine result in genuine urban tranquility. The Porto Santa Marias location is fantastic for both the actively inclined and those who would prefer to relax and listen to the breaking of waves. A congenial hotel offering 146 rooms, restaurant, bars with terrace, direct access to the promenade, outdoor pool, indoor pool, SPA, gym, parking (extra fee). all in the heart of the city. Porto Santa Maria is an adult only hotel, only accepting reservations for guests over 16 years old.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Orca Praia
address: Estrada Monumental 355, 9000-236 Funchal, Madeira
description: Situated on a cliff overlooking the Atlantic Ocean and a sandy beach, this hotel is 6 km from the centre of Funchal. It features an outdoor pool with panoramic views and spacious guestrooms with private balconies. Rooms at the Hotel Orca Praia have stylish furnishings and a seating area with satellite TV. They come equipped with a small refrigerator, on request, and a private bathroom with solar-heated hot water and a hairdryer. In the morning, the hotel serves a buffet breakfast with fresh pastries and juice. There is a cocktail bar and a restaurant with floor-to-ceiling windows that serves international cuisine. Guests can enjoy an aromatherapy massage at the spa, or rent a bicycle and explore the seaside. There is also a games room with billiards and table tennis. Hotel Orca Praia is 2 km from the fishing village Camara de Lobos. Madeira Airport is 15 km away. The hotel offers 24-hour front desk service and free on-site public parking.

name: The Reserve
address: Avenida do Infante 25 B, 9004-542 Funchal, Madeira
description: Situated in Funchal, 1.7 km from Gorgulho - Gavinas Beach, The Reserve features accommodation with a garden, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Attractively situated in the Se district, this hotel provides a bar, as well as a hot tub. The hotel has an outdoor swimming pool, indoor pool, evening entertainment and room service. At the hotel rooms include air conditioning, a desk, a balcony with a sea view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. The rooms have a safety deposit box. A buffet, continental or Full English/Irish breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Speaking German, English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are willing to help at any time of the day. Popular points of interest near The Reserve include Almirante Reis Beach, Marina do Funchal and Madeira Casino. The nearest airport is Cristiano Ronaldo Madeira International Airport, 20 km from the accommodation.

name: Sentido Galosol
address: Rua D. Francisco Santana, 9125-909 Caniço, Madeira
description: This beach resort in Caniço, Madeira offers a gym, massage services and beauty treatments. It has 2 restaurants, 2 bars, 3 pools and panoramic sea views. Funchal’s centre is a 20-minute drive away. The rooms at the 4-star Galo Resort Hotel Galosol have a balcony with panoramic sea views. They also have air conditioning, satellite TV and a private bathroom with toiletries. All rooms have free WiFi access. Guests can enjoy a range of relaxation treatments at the spa, including stone massages, pedicures and manicures. They can also attend aerobics or yoga classes and anti-stress programs.
