A diving centre is also available. The Hotel Galosol also features a restaurant which serves local and international cuisine which can be enjoyed on the terrace overlooking the ocean. The Galo Resort is a 20-minute drive from Madeira Airport.

name: Pestana Palms
address: Rua do Gorgulho, 17, 9000-107 Funchal, Madeira
description: Set within a leafy garden, this apart-hotel boasts an outdoor pool overlooking Funchal coastal cliffs. Pestana Vila Lido Madeira Ocean Hotel‘s studios are spacious and decorated with soft beige colours. Each one has low-back armchairs in the lounge area and TV with multilingual cable channels. A Flor do Mar Restaurant has large windows overlooking the ocean and also hosts regular entertainment events. Salads, light snacks and cakes are available in the cosy Vila Lido Tea Room. The hotel’s attentive staff can organize outdoor excursions around the coastline. The apart-hotel’s surrounding area also features nature and walking trails. Pestana Vila Lido Madeira Ocean Hotel is 2 km away from Funchal town centre’s local museums. Free parking is available on site, subject to availability.

name: Sentido Galomar - Adults Only
address: Rua D Francisco Santana 10, 9125-909 Caniço, Madeira
description: Perched on a cliff at Ponta D’Oliveira, Galo Resort Hotel Galomar offers stunning views of the Atlantic Ocean. It features direct sea access and indoor and outdoor pools. The rooms at Hotel Galomar are decorated in a modern style. All rooms have satellite TV and an en suite bathroom. Some rooms have a private balcony with scenic sea views. The Ashoka Spa offers a wide variety of treatments, including Ayurveda therapy. It also offers saunas and a hot tub. Guests can enjoy fresh seafood at Restaurant Atlantis, at Hotel Galosol also features our buffet restaurant which serves local and international cuisine which can be enjoyed on the terrace.The Blue Bar at Galosol and Capoeira Pub offer a wide variety of drinks and snacks. Caniço’s centre is 2.5 km from Galo Resort Hotel Galomar, and Funchal’s centre is 12 km away.

name: The Cliff Bay
address: Estrada Monumental 147, 9004-532 Funchal, Madeira
description: The Atlantic Ocean stretches as far as the eye can see at the foot of The Cliff Bay. Perched on the top of a natural promontory, the hotel is surrounded by gardens - with innumerable secluded corners and centenary palm trees extending to the very edge of the cliff face. The panorama is completed by a magnificent view over the bay of Funchal to the east of the hotel. This 5 star hotel, one of PortoBay Hotels premium resorts, assures that every single little detail has been carefully conceived to present genuine peace, well-being and elegance. In the hotels sea access area one can combine the Atlantic Ocean breeze with the spell-binding views when choosing the new pontoons and solariums. The most influential restaurant guide in the world, the Michelin Guide, has awarded the Il Gallo d'Oro, The Cliff Bay's gourmet restaurant, run by Chef Benot Sinthon, with 2 Stars.iHotelier/iStay

name: Village Cabo Girao
address: Rua 1º De Julho, Nº 2, 9300-081 Câmara de Lobos, Madeira
description: Located on a slope overlooking the Atlantic Ocean, Village Cabo Girao offers villas and apartments with access to indoor and outdoor swimming pools, free private parking and free WiFi in shared areas. Surrounded by tropical vegetation the accommodations include a living room with flat-screen satellite TV, a DVD player, a telephone and a dining area. Guests can prepare their own meals using the fully equipped kitchenettes. Village Cabo Girao features a restaurant that serves traditional Madeira cuisine. Guests can enjoy a breakfast buffet and a snack bar that serves pastries and coffee. A mini-market on site allows guests to buy supplies for their stay. The staff of Village Cabo Girao can provide car rental, tour guide and shuttle services. Guests can enjoy the Spa with sauna and massage facilities. A games room with billiards and table soccer is available as well as a tennis court and minigolf are at guests’ disposal free of charge. Madeira International Airport is located 30 Km away and the city of Funchal is at a 14-minute drive. Curral das Freiras is 23 Km away and the village of São Vicente situated in the northern coast of Madeira is at a 28-minute drive.

name: Vidamar Resort Hotel Madeira - Dine Around Half Board
address: Estrada Monumental 175-177, 9000-100 Funchal, Madeira
description: A popular hotel due to its extensive 5-star facilities and exclusive DINE AROUND meal plan. Competitively priced large sea front rooms with balconies and King Size beds. Thalasso Sea Spa and free membership to the exclusive VIDA health and fitness club.iHotelier/iStay

name: Yeotown Health Retreat
address: Caminho do Verde 60 Arco da Calheta, 9370-729 Estreito da Calheta, Madeira
description: Yeotown Health Retreat features an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a terrace and restaurant in Arco da Calheta. This 5-star hotel offers room service and free WiFi. The property is allergy-free and is located 25 km from Girao Cape. At the hotel, each room comes with a wardrobe, bed linen and a balcony with a mountain view. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at Yeotown Health Retreat also offer a sea view. An à la carte, vegetarian or vegan breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Porto Moniz Natural Swimming Pools is 34 km from the accommodation, while Marina do Funchal is 34 km away. The nearest airport is Cristiano Ronaldo Madeira International Airport, 52 km from Yeotown Health Retreat.

name: Monte Mar Palace Hotel
address: Sítio do Montado, São Vicente, Madeira
description: The Montemar Palace hotel is a 4-star hotel, designed to cater for the high standards of the new millennium with its modern design, equipment and spacious leisure areas. It is located in a rural area (60km/ 50 minutes away from the airport by car), overlooking the crystal clear Atlantic ocean and the beautiful ‘Laurissilva’ forest on the north coast of the island of Madeira. The hotel is set in an area of absolute silence, with lovely surroundings and magnificent views in a sub-tropical climate with an average temperature of 19ºC.

name: Quinta Mirabela - Design Hotel
address: Caminho do Monte, 105, Funchal, Madeira
description: Panoramic terrace and rooms overlooking the Funchal Bay await guests at this 5-star hotel. Located 2 km from Funchal, it also features a sea-view outdoor pool and a spa with massages. The air-conditioned rooms at the Quinta Mirabela include satellite TV, a minibar and safety deposit box. The marble bathrooms come with bathrobes and hairdryers. Guests can swim in the outdoor swimming pool, or relax at the spa, which has a hammam, a hot tub and a sauna. There is also a modern gym equipped with cardiovascular equipment and free weights. The Mirabela’s elegant restaurant serves Madeiran and international cuisine, which can be enjoyed on the panoramic terrace. Stephan’s Bar offers exotic cocktails, while the pool bar serves natural fruit juices.

name: Melia Madeira Mare
address: Rua Leichlingen, Nº 2-4, 9000-003 Funchal, Madeira
description: Located close to Funchal’s city centre, overlooking the Atlantic Ocean, Meliã Madeira Mare offers free WiFi, an indoor and outdoor pool and a spa. Its elegantly-furnished rooms offer a balcony and cable TV. Some rooms of Melia Madeira Mare include scenic views of the Atlantic Ocean from the balcony. Many of the hotel’s rooms also have a seating area. Guests can relax in the sauna at Melia Madeira Mare’s spa. Massage treatments and a steam bath are also offered. Melia Madeira Mare’s restaurant serves a breakfast buffet and an a la carte menu for dinner. The hotel’s pool bar provides refreshing beverages. Free parking is available. Madeira International Airport is a 25-minute drive away. Melia Madeira Mare is a 14-minute drive from the city centre.

name: Hotel Jardim Atlantico
address: Caminho Lombo da Rocha, 1 Prazeres, 9370-612 Prazeres, Madeira
description: Set in tranquil Prazeres with Atlantic Ocean and mountain views, this 4-star hotel offers self-catering accommodation within 2 km of the Natural Park of Madeira. Rooms at the Jardim Atlantico have contemporary décor and include a satellite TV, kitchen and seating area. Rooms also offer balconies with panoramic views of the countryside. The breakfast buffet includes fresh bread, fresh fruit and homemade jams. For lunch and dinner, the restaurant prepares regional and international dishes made with fresh, local ingredients. The bar at Hotel Jardim Atlantico serves cocktails on the terrace, where guests can enjoy picturesque views of the Atlantic Ocean. Guests can relax poolside by the outdoor and indoor pools, or get a stone massage at the spa. Alternatively, they can go for a stroll through the Madeira countryside. Jardim Atlantico can be reached via the airport shuttle. Free parking is available at the hotel.

name: Rocamar Lido Resort
address: Caminho Cais da Oliveira 7, Caniço de Baixo, Apartado 23, Canico, 9125-028 Caniço, Madeira
description: Set on a cliff overlooking the ocean, Roca Mar features a solarium and an outdoor pool. Located in Caniço de Baixo, it offers spacious rooms with a private balcony. Hotel Roca Mar’s rooms are bright and sunny with glass sliding doors opening onto a furnished balcony. Each one has a lounge area with a plush armchair, work desk and cable TV. Roca Mar’s restaurant specializes in seafood including sword fish and octopus, all served alongside regional wines. Guests can also enjoy live music shows at the Bar Restaurant. Roca Mar Hotel is 8 km from Madeira Airport. Palheiro Golf Course is 20 minutes’ drive away. Hotel minibus to Funchal available on weekdays (subject to availability and payment).

name: Hotel Apartamento Cais Da Oliveira
address: Caminho Cais da Oliveira, Santa Cruz, Madeira
description: Boasting a cliff-top location a 10-minute drive from Funchal, this 4-star hotel features studios and suites with a private balcony. It has a private access to the beach, a waterfront terrace and 2 pools. The air-conditioned accommodations at Caniço's Hotel Cais da Oliveira include satellite TV and a kitchenette with a microwave and refrigerator. Each private bathroom has a shower and hairdryer. Hotel Cais da Oliveira features an à la carte restaurant. The bar serves refreshing drinks and cocktails. Guests may also go for a work-out in the fitness centre, or even relax at the solarium, both situated at the next-door Royal Orchid Hotel. The unit is located 2 km from the centre of Caniço. For golfing enthusiasts, the property is 8 km away from Palheiro Golf and 15 km from the Santo da Serra Golf Course. On weekdays, the 24-hour reception staff provides a minibus service to Funchal (subject to availability and payment), which is a 10-minute drive away. It is also possible to rent cars and bikes. The property is is 9 km from Madeira’s International Airport.

name: Balancal Apartments and Villas Palheiro Village
address: São Gonçalo
description: Located in Funchal, Balancal Apartments offers an outdoor pool. This self-catering accommodation features free WiFi. The property is 1 km from Palheiro Golf Course. The apartments will provide guests with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a balcony. Featuring a hairdryer, the private bathrooms also comes with a bidet and free toiletries. Guests can enjoy sea view and city view from the room. Guests can prepare their own meals in the fully equipped kitchen that each apartment provides. Alternatively guests can taste the local gastronomy at the restaurant on site. The Ecological Park of Funchal is 10 km away and the Old Town centre is 6 km away. Reis Magos Beach is 11 km away and the city of Machico with its golden sand beach is 20 km away. Madeira International Airport is 17 km away.

name: Porto Mare Hotel
address: Rua Simplicio Passos Gouveia 21, 9004-565 Funchal, Madeira
description: The Porto Mare hotel occupies the centre of the Vila Porto Mare resort and benefits from the use of all its facilities. There are many different corners and atmospheres here. something new to discover every day. The 198 rooms combine views over the ocean with tropical gardens. 4 restaurants, 3 bars, five pools, SPA, sports and children's facilities. The 13,400 m2 of gardens at the Vila Porto Mare resort have created one of the most interesting botanical oasis's on Madeira island. The subtropical gardens, with over 500 unique and identified botanical species have turned this space into a real paradise. Discover our little secret. the orchid corner! With an innovative concept, the Vila Porto Mare resort offers facilities which are shared by three hotels Suite Hotel Eden Mar, Hotel Porto Mare and The Residence; however, the character of each one of these is guaranteed by individual receptions and different room/apartment types.iHotelier/iStay

name: Dorisol Mimosa Studio Hotel
address: Rua da Casa Branca 98, 9004-535 Funchal, Madeira
description: Dorisol Mimosa Studio Hotel is located in Madeira, Funchal, 500 metres away from the seaside promenade. It offers views over Funchal bay. Dorisol Mimosa Studio Hotel feature studios fitted with a kitchenette, seating area, cable TV and free WiFi. Guests can enjoy panoramic views from the balcony. The Terrace Restaurant serves international cuisine by the pool. Mimosa guests also have access to the Dorisol Madeira Complex’s wellness centre and a piano bar that features live music. Guests can relax on a sun lounger by the pool, or visit the games room with darts, billiards and table tennis. There is also a fitness centre with free weights and cardiovascular equipment. The Dorisol Mimosa aparthotel is located 2 km from Funchal’s city-centre and is less than 2 km from the Madeira Casino. The hotel offers 24-hour front desk service.

name: Madeira Panoramico Hotel
address: Rua Estados Unidos da America 34, 9000-090 Funchal, Madeira
description: Boasting magnificent views of Funchal and the Atlantic Ocean, just 3 km from the city centre, this hotel features indoor and outdoor pools and a deluxe spa. All rooms at Madeira Panorâmico Hotel have a private balcony, where guests can relax. All the rooms are air-conditioned and all have a flat-screen TV. Traditional Portuguese dishes are served in a buffet style or à la carte at the Madeira Panorâmico’s restaurant. Local drinks can be sampled at the bar while admiring the Atlantic Ocean view. Madeira Panorâmico Hotel’s spa has a massage room, a sauna and a hot tub. For those who like to keep active, a game of squash or tennis can be enjoyed on the court and there is a fitness centre on site as well. Guests can benefit from the 24-hour front desk, car rental and free parking. Situated close to Quinta Magnolia Garden, the Madeira Panorâmico is just a 15-minute drive from Madeira Airport.

name: Pestana Madeira Beach Club
address: Largo Antonio Nobre nº1, Funchal Ilha da Madeira, 9000-100 Funchal, Madeira
description: What strikes your fancy, the city or the sea? Just walking distance from the capital Funchal, this resort has all the city has to offer, but is graced with a seaside view and a multitude of amenities. Head to the sea for water sports when you want a little adventure, or take advantage of all the resort offers including two pools and all the facilities of the Carlton Hotel, including the restaurants, nightclub, bars, tea room, beauty salon, fitness center and tennis court.Ticket Package

name: Pestana Royal
address: Estrada Monumental, Nr. 275, 9000-250 Funchal, Madeira
description: No description found

name: Hotel Do Campo
address: Estrada Da Banda De Além, 25, 9350-232 Ribeira Brava, Madeira
description: Do Campo is an eco-friendly hotel, perched on a cliff overlooking Madeira’s laurisilva forests and the Atlantic Ocean. It features an elevated salt-water swimming pool surrounded by sun loungers. Guests will enjoy the hotel’s gym, equipped with cardio and fitness machines, or relax at the on-site spa, offering a hot tub and Turkish bath. A reading room with free Wi-Fi and a games room are also available. Bright and airy, rooms at Hotel Do Campo open out on to panoramic balconies. They are all equipped with extra-long beds, a seating area and satellite TV channels. En-suite bathrooms with bathtub are standard. Traditional specialities are served at the restaurant and the bar, using locally grown aromatic herbs. Many eateries and entertaining options can be found in downtown Funchal, a 15-minute drive from Do Campo hotel.

name: Estalagem do Vale
address: Rua Dr. Gregório Dinis, 37 Sitio Das Feiteiras de Baixo, 9240-206 São Vicente, Madeira
description: Overlooking the valleys of São Vicente, this restored 18th-century manor house features a garden with a heated swimming pool. Guest can enjoy the on-site wellness facilities and the traditional restaurant. The air-conditioned rooms and suites at Estalagem do Vale come with a satellite TV and work desk. Some rooms have a balcony or terrace, while other rooms are decorated in a traditional style with dark wooden furniture. A breakfast buffet is served daily indoors or on the terrace. Guest can try traditional dishes from North coast of Madeira at Restaurant Caramujo. The Adega Croque bar offers tea and local cakes, and there is a snack bar. The sauna, solarium and Turkish bath offer relaxation after a busy day in Funchal, a 25-minute drive away. Alternatively, guests can read a book from the library or listen to the sounds of the crickets by the pool. The hotel is situated within the World Heritage Site of the ancient Laurissilva Forests, 2 km from São Vicente. The 24-hour reception staff can arrange car rentals and organise tours around the island.

name: Dazk Golden Estate
address: Estrada de São João nº 28 Sitio do Barreiro, 9350-103 Ribeira Brava, Madeira
description: Dazk Golden Estate in Ribeira Brava provides adults-only accommodation with pool with a view, a fitness centre and an open-air bath. Boasting a shared kitchen, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The guest house has an outdoor fireplace and a spa facilities. At the guest house, every room includes a desk and a flat-screen TV. All rooms have a kettle, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while selected rooms also offer a balcony and some have sea views. At Dazk Golden Estate every room has bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Dazk Golden Estate offers a range of wellness facilities including a wellness packages, a public bath and a solarium. Guests at the guest house will be able to enjoy activities in and around Ribeira Brava, like cycling. Ribeira Brava Beach is 2.6 km from Dazk Golden Estate, while Girao Cape is 9.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cristiano Ronaldo Madeira International, 36 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: TRYP by Wyndham Lisboa Caparica Mar
address: Avenida General Humberto, 2829-506 Lisbon, Lisbon District
description: TRYP by Wyndham is a select-service upper-midscale hotel brand with over 100 locations tucked in the heart of some of the most dynamic and cosmopolitan cities in Europe and the Americas. TRYP hotels cater to both business and leisure travelers who value quality of life with professional excellence, by offering several specialty guest rooms, including Family Rooms with bunk beds and Fitness Rooms with exercise equipment. TRYP offers a unique experience that encourages guests to enjoy the city, socialize and live life to the fullest.Wyndham

name: Rocamar Exclusive Hotel & Spa - Adults Only
address: Largo Jacinto D'Ayet 7, 8200-071 Albufeira, Faro
description: Located on Praia dos Pescadores beach, this stylish hotel is just a short walk from Albufeira. It offers a swimming pool, a restaurant with sea views and luxury spa. All the fashionable rooms are well equipped with air conditioning and satellite TV. Guests can relax on their own private balcony, some with a clear sea view. Rocamar Beach Hotel’s spa offers a variety of cosmetic treatments and body massages. All guests can enjoy free access to the hot tub, fitness centre and sauna. The restaurant offers fresh, local cuisine and a variety of international dishes. Cocktails are available at the bar and can be enjoyed on the terrace. Rocamar Beach features nightly entertainment, including live music. Numerous bars, shops and restaurants can be found in Albufeira town centre, only 300 metres from Hotel Rocamar. Reception is open 24 hours per day and free public parking is available nearby.

name: Royal Obidos Spa & Golf Resort
address: Cabeço Da Serra 0, Óbidos, Leiria
description: Overlooking the Atlantic Ocean, the design Royal Obidos Spa & Golf Resort features an outdoor pool with sun loungers. Guests can relax in the Spa, offering a varied range of treatments and massages. The property comprises an 18-hole golf course and the clubhouse offers a restaurant, 2 bars and bag storage area. With free WiFi access, the spacious and natural-light rooms come with a satellite LCD TV and air conditioning. The typical Portuguese-tile bathroom is equipped with bathrobes and a bath tub. All rooms were decorated by a design studio. Guests will also a find a fitness centre. The unit has views over golf course, Atlantic Ocean and the Óbidos Lagoon. Lisbon's Portela Airport is 1-hour driving distance from Royal Obidos Spa & Golf Resort. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Miramar Hotel & Spa
address: Rua Abel da Silva, 36, 2450-060 Nazaré, Leiria
description: Miramar Hotel Spa & Apartments is a charming hotel with a welcoming atmosphere, where every step is a discovery about the history of Nazaré. It is located 700 meters from Nazaré beach (10 minutes walk) in a privileged location overlooking the sea. This hotel has 44 rooms, of which nine are suites. All rooms have simple décor with large windows, most with sea views. Each room includes a flat-screen TV with cable channels, air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. The 7 apartments are located in a building next to the hotel and all have the best views of Nazaré. At the Mar Aberto restaurant guests can enjoy international cuisine and a variety of Portuguese delicacies, including seafood and spicy dishes. The Wine Bar offers light snacks, beers and special wines. The hotel also has indoor (under maintenance) and outdoor swimming pools and a leisure area with snooker. SPA/circuits is at Thalasso, a facility on the Nazaré beach, a 2km/5-minute drive from the Hotel. We provide free transportation if necessary. Please note that the access to the Thalasso facilities has an additional fee and is available only for guests over 12 years old and excluding pregnant women. Swimsuit, swimming cap and flip flops are mandatory in the Thalasso. Miramar Hotel Spa & Apartments is less than 10 km from Valado dos Frades Train Station. Forte de São Miguel Arcanjo and Praia do Norte, known for its giant waves, are a 10-minute drive away. Lisbon Airport is an hour away via the A8 highway.

name: Axis Vermar Conference & Beach Hotel
address: Rua Da Imprensa Regional, 4490-518 Póvoa de Varzim, Porto
description: The Axis Vermar is situated on the beach in Povoa de Varzim. It has an outdoor pool with a sun-lounger terrace and offers air-conditioned rooms with panoramic views of the North Atlantic Ocean. Rooms at the Axis Vermar Conference & Beach Hotel have simple furnishings and a private bathroom with luxury amenities. They come equipped with a TV and a minibar. The rooms with sea views feature a private balcony with sweeping views. The Jardim Restaurant boasts sea views and serves international cuisine and traditional Portuguese dishes. In the morning a buffet breakfast with fresh fruit and pastries is served. The hotel has a tennis court and a playground for children. Nearby leisure activities include mountain biking and hiking. Spa treatments are available by appointment. Axis Vermar Conference & Beach Hotel is 20 km from the airport and is 1.5 km from the Casino of Povoa de Varzim. The hotel offers 24-hour front desk service and free on-site private parking. Axis is taking part in an initiative of corporate social responsibility, integrating into its team people with intellectual disabilities. Please note that the hotel will send guests an email with a secure link to proceed with payment for the reservation after the free cancellation period ends.

name: The Oitavos
address: Rua De Oitavos 1 Quinta Da Marinha, Cascais, Lisbon District
description: The luxurious 5-star Oitavos combines ultramodern design with an untouched natural location within the Sintra-Cascais Natural Park. It features pools, state-of-the art sports facilities, an Equestrian Centre, Helipad and the award-winning Oitavos golf course. All of the elegant lofts and suites are decorated with modern furnishings in white and blue colours. They all feature comfortable extra long beds, 2 flat-screen satellite TVs and a Nespresso coffee machine. The modern bathroom is complemented by a separate dresser. Some have a separate living area, while others have it included in an open plan space that stretches towards the scenic views of the private balcony, that each unit enjoys. Guests can enjoy a selection of contemporary cuisine at the hotel’s in house Ipsylon Lounge restaurant while gazing pool and garden views. Just a short 3-minute walk from the main building is the hotel's other restaurant, Verbasco. With a more relaxed atmosphere, this dining venue specialises in Portuguese dishes and tapas. The bar of The Oitavos serves a wide variety of drinks well into the night. The Oitavos’s full-service spa offers natural and organic treatment products and a holistic approach to wellness. There are 10 massage rooms, while the hot tub and dry and wet saunas further allow guests to have a relaxing body experience. There is a 24-hour fitness centre and regular activities, like yoga and pilates classes. The sports facilities include a Tennis court, Padel, Squash, Group fitness classes, fitness academy and a semi-olimpic indoor pool. The heated (from May to September) outdoor salt-water swimming pool is ideal for guests to relax with a cocktail or refreshing beverage from the bar. The Oitavos Hotel is located 5 km from central Cascais and a 30-minute drive from Sintra, which is famed for its stunning monuments and palaces. Lisbon is a 30-minute drive away as well, featuring iconic areas and sites like Chiado, Bairro Alto and Alfama. The popular Praia do Guincho beach is a mere 5 minutes away by car. A free shuttle service is available during high season between 10:00 and 18:00 upon request and availability. Bicycles are also available at the hotel.

name: Sana Sesimbra Hotel
address: Avenida 25 de Abril, 11, 2970 Sesimbra, Setubal
description: No description found

name: Tivoli Carvoeiro
address: Apartado 1299, Vale Do Covo, 8401-911 Praia do Carvoeiro, Faro
description: Tucked into a cliffside overlooking the glistening Atlantic Ocean, the five-star Tivoli Carvoeiro Hotel is a jewel in the Algarve’s crown. This luxury resort is a 10-minute walk from the beach, and you can explore more of this stunning stretch of coastline on the Seven Hanging Valleys Trail. The hotel has 248 spacious rooms on six floors, with most offering a balcony or terrace. Decorated in elegant blues and whites to represent the sea, the rooms are equipped with Nespresso machines, flat-screen TVs and video on demand. Our Carvoeiro Suite even has a standalone tub that looks out over the ocean. You’ll be spoilt for choice by our bars and restaurants. Breakfast is an American-style buffet with pastries, local hams and cheeses, and hot options. Experience fine wines and authentic Portuguese cuisine in our three restaurants, with freshly caught seafood a menu highlight. To drink in the best views, head to our rooftop bars for a cool mojito or craft beer. Whether you want to pamper yourself with an organic seaweed treatment in the spa, invigorate yourself in the pool, dive beneath the ocean or organize a game of golf, the hotel’s incredible facilities and staff will make your stay a memorable one.NH Hoteles

name: Memmo Baleeira Hotel
address: Sitio da Baleeira, 8650-357 Sagres, Faro
description: Located in the green surroundings of the Costa Vicentina Natural Park, the Memmo Baleeira offers an outdoor pool with magnificent Atlantic Ocean views and rooms with private balconies. Some of the guest rooms of the Baleeira Hotel offer views of the sea or garden and luxurious Memmo bathroom amenities. Each includes a seating area with a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a private balcony. Guests can relax in the spa and enjoy the heated indoor pool, Turkish bath and sauna. Guests can also pamper themselves with various massages. Baleeira has a restaurant called "Fornaria", serving tasty homemade pizzas, cooked in a wood-burning oven. The "Fornaria" offers stunning views of the bay. The historical centre of Sagres is 200 metres away and it takes a 5-minute walk to reach both Tonel and Martinhal Beach. The Fortress of Sagres can be reached in a 5-minute drive. For children the hotel has a Kid’s club. The Memmo Baleeira also offers help in arranging various outdoor activities for its guests, including surfing, diving, biking and golf.

name: Pine Cliffs Hotel, a Luxury Collection Resort, Algarve
address: Praia da Falesia, P.O. Box 644, 8200 Albufeira, Faro
description: Treat yourself to a matchless vacation at the mesmerizing Pine Cliffs Hotel, a Luxury Collection Resort, Algarve in Albufeira. This iconic, 5-star cliff-top retreat is located above Portugal's famous beach, Praia da Falésia, and boasts stunning views of the Atlantic Ocean. With a Moorish influenced decor, our hotel's newly-renovated guest rooms teem with exquisite, indigenous details, plush beds and spa-inspired bathrooms. Each hotel room boasts a private balcony with views of Algarve's red cliffs overlooking the ocean or beautifully manicured gardens. Our resort's exceptional amenities include a 9- hole golf course, a tennis club, a revitalizing spa, 8 swimming pools, an up-to-date fitness center and a variety of fine dining options. Families love our fantastic kid's facilities including Porto Pirata, the biggest kids club in the region. Whether in Albufeira, Portugal for business or for pleasure, Pine Cliffs Hotel, a Luxury Collection Resort, Algarve wants to make your stay a flawless 5-star experience.Marriott

name: Hotel Vila Gale Marina
address: Avenida da Marina, Lote H2, 8125-401 Vilamoura, Faro
description: Situated in a central, quiet location in Vilamoura, Vila Galé Marina offers elegant accommodation with balconies. It features indoor and outdoor pools and a hot tub. Guest rooms have wooden floors and cable TV. Some feature a living room and dining area. Guests can sample refined dishes, either buffet-style or à la carte, at Restaurant Galeão. Portuguese specialities and international meals are served. Casa de Santa Vitória Alentejo wines are available with lunch and dinner. A game of tennis can be enjoyed on Vila Galé Marina’s court. The hotel also features a fitness centre. Galé Marina’s tour desk and bicycle rental service can benefit those who wish to organise local excursions. Facing Vilamoura’s marina, it is a 5-minute walk from the beach. Cerro da Vila Roman Ruins are a 5-minute walk away. Vila Galé Marina provides a free shuttle to Vilamoura’s golf courses.

name: Hotel Helikon
address: Mikus Gyula sétány 5., Keszthely 8360
description: Located in Keszthely, 500 metres from Keszthely Municipal Beach, Hotel Helikon, Keszthely provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel offers an indoor pool, sauna, evening entertainment and a kids' club. At the hotel each room is fitted with air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with a lake view. Every room includes a safety deposit box and selected rooms are equipped with city views. Guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. Buffet and continental breakfast options are available daily at Hotel Helikon, Keszthely. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving local, international and Hungarian cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Hotel Helikon, Keszthely offers a range of wellness facilities including a hot tub and a spa centre. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire and car hire are available at the hotel. Popular points of interest near Hotel Helikon, Keszthely include Libas Beach, Helikon Beach and Balaton Museum. The nearest airport is Hévíz–Balaton Airport, 17 km from the accommodation.

name: Amberton Hotel Klaipeda
address: Naujojo Sodo Str. 1, Klaipėda 92118
description: The modern 4-star Amberton Hotel Klaipeda is located in the city centre, a 10-minute walk of the Klaipeda Castle and other local attractions. It offers free Wi-Fi in all areas, stylish interiors, entertainment centre. All rooms at the Amberton are bright and come with a minibar, satellite TV and a spacious bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries. Most rooms have a seating area and a flat-screen TV. Most are air-conditioned. The hotel consists of two parts: rooms with sea view are in the new K-center and the rooms with city view - in the major building. Guests can enjoy a game billiards, work out in the fitness centre or simply relax in the hot tub or sauna, as well as use electric scooters for free. They are also welcome to visit the on-site spa centre and an indoor pool for an additional fee. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange for concierge and room services. Guests can visit one of 4 on-site restaurants serving exotic dishes and a wide selection of cocktails, two of which feature a panoramic view of of the city and the sea. Guests can enjoy a drink at the Lobby Bar. Amberton Hotel Klaipeda is situated 1.5 km from city’s railway station and a bus station. Private parking is provided on site. There is also a secured bicycle parking available at a surcharge. Guests staying at Amberton Hotel Klaipeda can also rent electric GoGreen scooters.

name: Palanga Life Balance Spa Hotel
address: Birutes Avenue 60, Palanga 00135
description: Located 300 metres from the Baltic Sea, this family-owned 5-star hotel offers a luxurious spa centre and water treatments. The Palanga Spa Life Balance Hotel was awarded the Best SPA Hotel in Eastern Europe in the World Spa and Wellness Awards 2018, the most innovative European SPA Hotel at ESPA awards 2018 and the Perfect Wellness Hotel by Perfect SPA 2018 awards. Guests can choose their accommodation from 74 rooms which are different in categories and situated in two different buildings: elegant Luxury building and hype and modern Design building, which is the only hotel in the world that has by 7 degrees deviated floorings. Both buildings have a lounge area with a fireplace. Luxury building has stylish interiors and elegant rooms. All rooms are bright and decorated with teak-wooden furniture and Brazilian walnut doors and floors. Each room has a balcony and is equipped with free Wi-Fi, air conditioning, mini-bar, flat-screen TV. All rooms at Design building are spacious and have a private balcony. Every room is equipped with free Wi-Fi, air conditioning, mini-bar, flat-screen TV. Located in the Design building, wellness center boasts of four different types of baths, including sauna, steam bath, laconium and outdoor wooden Kelo log bathhouse. There are several swimming pools – indoor swimming, indoor hot tub, Roman pool and outdoor hot tub. All pools use mineral water which is extracted from own mineral water bore. Guests can relax in larch therapy room with water beds. Gym is available free of charge. There is also an outdoor swimming pool with pre-heated water available in the summertime. Guests can choose from a wide range of beauty and medical treatments as well as individual programmes available upon request. Rich breakfast and modern European dishes are served at the restaurant located in the Luxury building. There is also a bar to enjoy snacks and drinks, and a lounge room with a fireplace and views of the surrounding park. The Palanga Spa Life Balance Hotel is located at Birute Avenue, just 150 metres away from the Botanical Gardens and the Amber Museum. The popular Basanavičius promenade is only 600 metres away.

name: Zuvedra
address: Meilės al. 11, Palanga 00135
description: Located 230 metres from the Baltic Sea and surrounded by pine forests and sand dunes. It has a spa area with a hot tub. Žuvėdra features a bar and a restaurant serving Lithuanian and international dishes. All rooms offer cable TV, a private bathroom, and a refrigerator. Free private parking is available at Žuvėdra, which is next to the Botanical Gardens with the Amber Museum and only a 7-minute walk from the centre of Palanga.

name: Windsor Excelsior Copacabana
address: Avenida Atlantica 1800, Rio de Janeiro 22021-001
description: Situated in front of Copacabana beach, Windsor Excelsior offers panoramic views of the ocean and the Sugarloaf. A rooftop terrace with pool, bar and gym is one of its highlights. Windsor Excelsior Copacabana features tasteful rooms with contemporary décor. Spacious and bright, they all have air conditioning, cable TV, WiFi and minibar, while some also offer sea views and a hot tub. Room service is available 24 hours a day. At the restaurant, guests enjoy tropical breakfast with various items, while admiring stunning sea views. Lunch and dinner options are provided as well, featuring Brazilian and international specialities. Amenities include dry and steam sauna units next to the fitness centre. Cardeal Arcoverde metro station is 60 metres from Windsor Excelsior. Beach Volleyball Arena 800 metres away, and Santos Dumont Airport is at a distance of 9.4 km.Read less

name: Sheraton Grand Rio Hotel & Resort
address: Avenida Niemeyer 121 - Leblon, Rio de Janeiro 22450-220
description: Located near the beaches of Rio de Janeiro Sheraton Grand Rio Hotel and Resort offers one of the only beachfront resorts with an extensive recreational area, hotel spa and other amenities. Find us tucked between trendy Barra da Tijuca and famed Ipanema Beach. Our full-service luxury resort offers extensive business facilities in a tropical setting. Take our complimentary shuttle to nearby Leblon Beach and its upscale shopping mall. Stroll our resort's lush, landscaped grounds, set on a white-sand beach facing the tropical South Atlantic, flanked by Brazils towering mountains. Each of the 538 hotel rooms and suites at our Rio de Janeiro resort include Sheraton Signature Sleep Experience beds, as well as private balconies with partial or full ocean views. Reserve a club-level accommodation for complimentary access to the Sheraton Club Lounge and a private area for breakfast.MarriottRead less

name: Arena Copacabana Hotel
address: Av Atlantica 2064 - Copacabana, Rio de Janeiro 22040-010
description: Please do NOT book Instantly please enquire for latest rates and availability before booking,as pricing is dynamic,we will get back to you straight away. Across the street from Copacabana Beach, this modern hotel is a 7-minute walk from a metro station and 15 km from the Christ the Redeemer statue.The streamlined rooms come with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs, plus minifridges and desks. Upgraded rooms feature sea views, while suites add separate living spaces. Room service is available.A breakfast buffet is complimentary. There's a casual restaurant with floor-to-ceiling windows, along with a lobby bar. Other amenities include a rooftop pool, a fitness room and a sauna. Free Wi-FiBreakfastAccessibleOutdoor poolAir-conditionedLaundry service Avenida Atlantica, 2064, Copacabana, Rio de Janeiro, CEP 22040-010, BrazilVRBORead less

name: Pestana Rio Atlântica
address: Avenida Atlantica 2964, Rio de Janeiro 22070-000
description: Situated on Copacabana's beachfront, Pestana Rio Atlantica offers modern, luxurious suites and various leisure and gastronomic options. The rooftop pool and lounge bar offers panoramic ocean views and sophisticated cocktails. Free WiFi is also available. Each of the rooms is fitted with a private balcony with city views, air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a minibar. The private bathroom includes a shower and free toiletries. Some suites also include a spa bath. Guests can sample fine Portuguese cuisine at the restaurant. A breakfast with buttered croissants and juices is served on the restaurant. Pestana Rio Atlantica is conveniently situated 8 km from Santos Dumont Airport and 20 km from Galeao Airport. Christ the Redeemer Statue is 4 km away, while Copacabana Fort is 1.6 km from the property.Read less

name: PortoBay Rio de Janeiro
address: Avenida Atlântica, 1500, Rio de Janeiro 22021-000
description: Right on Copacabana beach in the spectacular city of Rio de Janeiro, hotel PortoBay Rio de Janeiro offers the best of both worlds - the marvellous city and the stunning view of the beach right at your feet. 117 rooms with private verandas or panoramic window views to get a feel for the intense life of Copacabana, the sound of the sea, sunrise over the ocean. diverse flavours in La Finestra, roof-top pool, exclusive beach service. The hotel's roof-top terrace on the 20th floor offers a spectacular panoramic view of the famous bay and major sights of Rio de Janeiro, with Copacabana beach in the foreground and Christ the Redeemer in the background. Modern, spacious and with new services, this area has a pool, massage room, two saunas, fitness centre and pool bar.iHotelier/iStayRead less

name: Mercure Rio de Janeiro Barra da Tijuca
address: Avenida do Pepê 56, Rio de Janeiro 22620-170
description: Mercure Rio de Janeiro Barra da Tijuca, modern and perfect for your business or leisure stay. Overlooking Pepê Beach, the bedrooms are suitable for couples, singles, and families, with A/C and free WIFI. Enjoy breakfast, lunch, and dinner at the restaurant with a sea view. Host your corporate event in one of our 9 halls for up to 400 people. The hotel also has a sauna, gym, and complimentary ironing room.accorhotels.comRead less

name: Fairmont Rio de Janeiro Copacabana
address: Avenida Atlântica, 4240 - Copacabana, Rio de Janeiro 22070-002
description: Experience a unique stay at Fairmont Rio de Janeiro Copacabana for business or leisure. Enjoy the spa, sauna, massage and beauty salon services at the Fairmont SPA, including an infinity pool. The hotel has a mixology bar and restaurant specialized in seafood, plus meeting and event rooms, including beautiful panoramic view of Rio de Janeiro.accorhotels.comRead less

name: Cdesign Hotel
address: Av. Lucio Costa 17360, Rio de Janeiro 22795-009
description: Boasting a beachfront location just 1.5 km from Pontal Square, CDesign Hotel offers spectacular views to Recreio dos Bandeirantes Beach. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. All air-conditioned rooms come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, safety deposit box and a minibar. Bathrooms are private. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. At CDesign Hotel you will also find a 24-hour front desk. Barra Olympic Park is 10 km from CDesign Hotel, while Prainha Beach is 5 km from the property. Riocentro Convention Center is at a distance of 10 km, and Rio de Janeiro/Galeao International Airport is 33 km away.Read less

name: Emiliano Rio
address: Av. Atlântica, 3804, Rio de Janeiro 22070-001
description: Boasting an outdoor infinity pool, Emiliano Rio is set in a privileged location in Rio de Janeiro, beachfront to Copacabana Beach. The contemporary architecture values the natural light and the sea view, offering guests a special and unique connection with the city. Free WiFi is provided, and private parking is available on site. Each room is fitted with a flat-screen TV and a coffee machine. Some rooms have a seating area for guests' convenience. Every room has a private bathroom with a bath or shower and bidet, with bathrobes provided. It is also fitted with slippers, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Emiliano Rio, guests can taste a contemporary Brazilian cuisine made from organic products at the on-site restaurant. Other hotel facilities include a spa where guests can relax and a fitness centre where they can exercise. The rooftop boasts a swimming pool and views to the beach. Ipanema Beach is 1.2 km from Emiliano Rio, while the famous Sugarloaf Mountain is 7.5 km away, and Christ The Redeemer is at a distance of 8.4 km. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 8 km from the property, while Galeão International Airport is 20 km away.Read less

name: Hotel Nacional Rio de Janeiro
address: Av. Niemeyer, 769, Rio de Janeiro 22450-221
description: Hotel Nacional Rio de Janeiro - OFICIAL is ideally set right in front of São Conrado beach and offers an unique option for those looking for the luxury of an urban resort. The hotel is located within the grounds of a historic building, designed by Oscar Niemeyer and surrounded by Burle Marx gardens. The hotel has an outdoor pool, a spa and a fitness centre. Guests can enjoy exclusive drinks and sophisticated tapas at the Bardot Pool Bar, and also benefit from the contemporary cuisine restaurant Sereia. WiFi is available throughout the property All air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel Nacional Rio de Janeiro - OFICIAL are decorated in warm colors and offer Trussardi bed linen, LED TV, minibar, digital safe and a dock station. Ensuite bathroom offers complimentary amenities, bathrobes and hairdryer. São Conrado subway station is only 750 metres from the property. Pedra da Gávea and Jardim Botanico can be both reached within 6.5 km. Copacabana beach is 11 km from Hotel Nacional Rio de Janeiro - OFICIAL. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 13 km from the property, while Tom Jobim International Airport is 25 km away.Read less

name: Laghetto Stilo Barra Rio
address: R. Marcelo Roberto, 65, Rio de Janeiro 22630-190
description: Featuring a year-round outdoor pool, a fitness centre and a business centre, Laghetto Stilo Barra is a beach front hotel loctated on Rio de Janeiro's Barra da Tijuca Beach. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar and restaurant. Free WiFi is available troughout the property. The modern decorated rooms all include air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom. Laghetto Stilo Barra has a 24-hour front desk and private parking is available on site. Tijuca Forest National Park is 11 km from Laghetto Barra Rio, while Post 12 - Leblon is 13 km away. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 22 km from Laghetto Stilo Barra.Read less

name: Rio Othon Palace
address: Avenida Atlantica 3264, Rio de Janeiro 22070-001
description: Located beachfront to Copacabana beach, Rio Othon Palace features a rooftop pool with excellent views of the Sugarloaf Mountain and an on-site fitness centre. Boasting panoramic sea views, breakfast is served on the 3rd floor. Free WiFi access is provided throughout the property. Each of the air-conditioned accommodations at Rio Othon Palace has a balcony, cable TV and minibar. Some offer views of the sea and a separate seating area. Parking is provided on site, subject to availability. At the Skylab Restaurant and Bar, located on the 30th floor, guests can taste Brazilian and international cuisine, as well as a tradicional 'feijoada' every Saturday. There are a number of shops and restaurants within walking distance from the hotel. Cantagalo metro station is 450 metres from Rio Othon Palace, whilst Copacabana Fort is 1 km away. Santos Dumont Airport is at a distance of 11 km and Galeão International Airport is 23.8 km from the property.Read less

name: Yoo2 Rio De Janeiro By Intercity
address: Praia De Botafogo 242, Rio de Janeiro 22250-145
description: Located in front of Botafogo Beach, and offering amazing view to Sugarloaf and Corcovado Mountains, Yoo2 Rio de Janeiro boasts an outdoor pool. Guests can also enjoy drinks at the rooftop bar. Rooms at Yoo2 Rio de Janeiro have an exclusive design and feature air conditioning, flat-screen TV, and a minibar. Private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer and free toiletries. The relaxed Lobby Lounge is the perfect place for a nice breakfast and a morning coffee whilst catching up with the day’s news. Copacabana Beach is 5 km from Yoo2 Rio de Janeiro. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 4 km from the property.Read less

name: Riale Brisa Barra
address: Av. Lucio Costa, 5700, Rio de Janeiro 22620-172
description: Brisa Barra Hotel features adult and children pools and is located in front of Barra da Tijuca´s beach. Guests can enjoy their on-site gym, restaurant, dry and steam sauna. Free WiFi is available throughout the property, and parking is available for a fee. The rooms at Brisa Barra are modern and fitted with light hypo-allergenic floors and air conditioning. They boast a balcony with exterior views. The daily breakfast buffet offers a variety of fresh fruits, breads and cold meats. Guests can also enjoy regional and international specialties, as well as a selection of drinks in the hotel’s restaurant. The hotel offers 7 different meeting and event rooms. The Olympic Park is located 10 km from Brisa Barra Hotel and Pontal Beach is only 13 km away. Santos Dumont Airport is 30.8 km away, while Galeão International Airport is at a distance of 33.8 km.Read less

name: JW Marriott Hotel Rio de Janeiro
address: Avenida Atlantica, 2600 - Copacabana, Rio de Janeiro 22041-001
description: Experience a blend of luxury and comfort at JW Marriott Hotel Rio de Janeiro. Conveniently located in front of the beach and near main business districts and airports, our Rio de Janeiro, Copacabana hotel features elegant rooms and suites, upscale amenities, a variety of dining options and flexible event venues. Start your day off right at our 5-star Rio de Janeiro resort and enjoy an authentic Brazilian breakfast. After a long day in Rio, visit the Moonlounge Rooftop Bar and indulge in international street food prepared with fresh and local ingredients. Maintain your workout routine and discover our fitness center on the rooftop of our Rio hotel. Flexible event spaces are available for your business or social gatherings. During your Rio de Janeiro vacation, make sure to visit the most iconic attractions of Rio: Christ the Redeemer, the beautiful Copacabana beach, the Tijuca Forest and the Sugarloaf Mountain. Book your unforgettable stay at JW Marriott Hotel Rio de Janeiro today.MarriottRead less

name: Barra Family Resort - 3 Quartos
address: Avenida Das Américas 13.600, Bloco 3, Apto 902, Rio de Janeiro 22790-702
description: Barra Family Resort - Lindo 3 Quartos features accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. The apartment includes 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms with free toiletries, a living room and a fully-equipped kitchen. A flat-screen smart TV is featured on the living room, and another smaller flat-screen TV is featured on one of the bedrooms. Barra Family Resort also features a wellness area, where guests can make the most of facilities like a hot tub and a sauna. A children's playground can be found at the accommodation, along with a sun terrace.Read less

name: Apart hotel Twin Towers
address: 3150 Avenida Lúcio Costa, Rio de Janeiro 22630-010
description: Located in Rio de Janeiro, 100 metres from Barra da Tijuca Beach and 16 km from Rio de Janeiro Botanical Gardens, Apart hotel Twin Towers provides accommodation with free WiFi, a garden, pool views, and access to a fitness room and a sauna. The accommodation is air conditioned and comes with a spa bath. The aparthotel provides guests with a terrace, sea views, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette with a fridge and a toaster, and a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries. Rodrigo de Freitas Lake is 18 km from Apart hotel Twin Towers, while Tijuca Forest National Park is 20 km away. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 26 km from the accommodation.Read less

name: Americas Barra Hotel
address: Avenida das Americas 10500, Rio de Janeiro 22793-082
description: Americas Barra Hotel is located in Rio de Janeiro's Barra da Tijuca district, 9.2 km from RioCentro Convention Centre. Boasting modern décor, each room here provides guests with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, a telephone and a minibar. Private bathroom also comes with a shower. Extras include bed linen. At Americas Barra Hotel guests will find a 24-hour front desk, room service and a bar. Guests can also enjoy local and international cuisine at the on-site restaurant. The hotel is 7.5 km from Recreio dos Bandeirantes Beach, and 9.3 km from HSBC Arena. Olympic Park is 8.5 km, while the Olympic Golf Court is 1.5 km from the property. Galeão International Airport is 36 km away.

name: Apartamento Marina
address: Estrada Do Pontal, 7100 apto 220, Rio de Janeiro 22790-877
description: Located in Rio de Janeiro with Pontal Beach and Recreio dos Bandeirantes nearby, Apartamento Marina features accommodation with free private parking, as well as access to a hot spring bath. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The aparthotel provides a pool with a view with a pool bar, as well as a sauna and a shared kitchen. The aparthotel is equipped with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with sea views. The property offers mountain views. There is a coffee shop, and packed lunches are also available. A children's playground is also available at the aparthotel, while guests can also relax in the garden. Macumba Beach is 700 metres from Apartamento Marina, while Rio de Janeiro Botanical Gardens is 32 km away. The nearest airport is Rio de Janeiro/Galeao International Airport, 42 km from the accommodation.

name: Il Campanario Villaggio Resort
address: Avenida Dos Buzios 1760, Florianopolis 88053-301
description: Il Campanário Villaggio Resort has a restaurant, fitness centre, a bar and garden in Florianópolis. The property is situated 200 metres from Jurere Beach, 2.3 km from Praia do Forte and 2.4 km from Jurerê Tradicional. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk and room service for guests. At the hotel, each room is equipped with a balcony. At Il Campanário Villaggio Resort the rooms have air conditioning and a private bathroom. At the accommodation guests are welcome to take advantage of a sauna. Floripa Mall is 16 km from Il Campanário Villaggio Resort, while Iguatemi Florianopolis Shopping Mall is 21 km from the property. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport, 32 km from the hotel.

name: Costa Norte Ponta Das Canas
address: Rua Deputado Fernando Viegas, 560, Florianopolis 88056-730
description: This hotel is located right on the seafront of the peaceful Ponta das Canas Beach, where an idyllic landscape and the charm of a fishing colony await you. Breakfast and dinner are included in room rates. Costa Norte provides bright rooms with balconies that face either the ocean or the hotel's patio. The accommodations also feature cable TV, a minibar and air conditioning. Bathroom is private and extras include free toiletries and a hairdryer. Admire the coast while enjoying the outdoor hot tub and swimming pool, or relax in the spa and indoor pool. Your whole family can also keep in shape working out in the gym or having fun in the games room and on the playground. Services such as tours, car rentals and yoga classes are also provided at an additional charge. A TV room, computers with internet access and a tastefully decorated restaurant are also available on site.

name: Novotel Florianopolis
address: Av. Rubens Arruda Ramos, 2034, Florianopolis 88015-701
description: Novotel Florianópolis is perfect for guests looking to have an amazing time in the city. Beautifully decorated rooms for couples, single guests, and families. All with A/C and free WiFi. The Santa Cucina Restaurant serves Italian food in a welcoming environment. Our events room is great for lectures and coffee breaks. Enjoy our swimming pool, gym and the Aya Spa (with spa and massage room).accorhotels.com

name: Costa Norte Ingleses Hotel
address: Rua Das Gaivotas, 984, Florianopolis 88058-500
description: Situated in Florianópolis, Costa Norte Ingleses Hotel is located on the oceanfront of Praia dos Ingleses, in Santa Catarina. It offers a restaurant, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool, and an indoor pool. All are equipped with air conditioning, free WiFi, minibar, hairdryer, telephone, safety deposit box and flat-screen TV. At lunch and dinner times, the restaurant offers regional and international food as well as a special menu for children for a surcharge. At the 4-star Costa Norte Ingleses Hotel, guests can take advantage of a tennis court, games room, gym, and soccer, volleyball and basketball courts. A TV lounge, sauna, hot tub and spa treatments are also provided. Iguatemi Florianopolis Shopping Mall is 21 km from the accommodation, while Campeche Island is 28 km away. The International Airport is about 39 km away from property.

name: Majestic Palace Hotel
address: Avenida Beira Mar Norte, 2746, Florianopolis 88015-702
description: This 5-star hotel offers luxury accommodation, views of the North Bay, just minutes from Beiramar Shopping Mall, several beaches on the north, south and east of Santa Catarina Island. Rooms include LCD TVs, sea views through floor-to-ceiling windows, and Serta mattresses ensuring comfort. Guests can enjoy fine dining while taking in stunning views of the North Bay. For drinks, the hotel offers the Mezzanine Café and a bar. The hotel is non-smoking. The Majestic’s spa features dry and wet saunas and different massage rooms. Guests enjoy easy and fast access to Esteves Junior Square, Centrosul Convention Center, and the Hercílio Luz International Airport.

name: ApartHotel no Jurerê Beach Village
address: Alameda César Nascimento, 646, Florianopolis 88053-500
description: Located in Florianópolis, this welcoming apartment lets you experience it all. Jurere Beach is just a short walk away, so you can leave your car at the property, which offers onsite parking, or jump in your vehicle to make short work of the 3-minute drive to Jurerê Open Shopping. Spend a day at the nearby beach, relax by the outdoor pool, or sip a drink on the balcony of this apartment, which also features a fitness center. As for the great indoors, you can try your hand at billiards, or enjoy the free WiFi and LED TV. This vacation rental features luggage storage, air conditioning, a roundtrip airport shuttle, and tour/ticket assistance. The kitchen is equipped with an espresso maker, a microwave, and cookware. And there's access to laundry facilities, so you can even pack a bit lighter.Expedia

name: Studio Jurerê Beach
address: Alameda César Nascimento, 646, Florianopolis 88053-500
description: Offering an outdoor pool and a restaurant, Stúdios Jurerê Beach is located in Florianópolis. Free WiFi access is available throughout. Each guestroom comes with air conditioning and a balcony. There is a full a kitchenette with a microwave and kitchenware. Featuring a bath, private bathroom also comes with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. At Stúdios Jurerê Beach you will find a fitness centre. Other facilities offered at the property include entertainment staff, a shared lounge and a games room. The hotel is 8 km from Casa Açoriana Handcraft, 13 km from Floripa Mall and 23.4 km from Joaquina Beach. Hercilio Luz International Airport is 26 km away.

name: Hotel Porto Sol Beach
address: Rua Das Buganvilias, 123 Praia Cachoeira de Bom Jesus, Florianopolis 88056-025
description: Boasting an outdoor pool and an on-site restaurant, Hotel Porto Sol Beach is on the beachfront and offers comfortable accommodation in Florianópolis. It features a restaurant, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. With a bar, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, room service and organising tours for guests. All rooms at Hotel Porto Sol Beach feature a cable TV, air conditioning, a seating area and a modern, en suite bathroom with a hairdryer. Some rooms also have a balcony with a sea view. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Hotel Porto Sol Beach offers 4-star accommodation with a sauna and children's playground. You can play billiards, table tennis and tennis at the hotel. Praia de Canasvieiras is 350 metres from Hotel Porto Sol Beach, while Pontas das Canas Beach is 2.3 km away.

name: Costao do Santinho Resort
address: Est. Vereador Onildo Lemos, 2505, Florianopolis 88058-700
description: This award-winning resort on Florianópolis´s Santinho Beach is surrounded by native forest and archaeological sites. It features 6 restaurants which 5 have all incluvise, and a luxury spa. Sports facilities include swimming pools, and tennis. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The accommodation at Costao do Santinho Resort offers garden views or sea view, TV and ambiance music. Some rooms have a barbecue and all rooms have private parking. A children´s club organizes monitored activities. For guests of all ages, there are visits to the wildlife sanctuary Morro das Aranhas Mount. In addition, the resort hosts performances by popular Brazilian singers. The spa provides several choices for treatments, from detox to talassotherapy. Guests can have a relaxation massage or a hydromassage session. A beauty salon is available too. As for gastronomy, the casual Rancho do Pescador specializes in seafood recipes from the Azores and Santa Catarina, and Nossa Senhora Vitória features an international contemporary menu. Other options include Italian food, Japanese food and barbecue. The Rancho do Pescador is not part of the all inclusive. Costao do Santinho has been awarded as best beach resort in Brazil 7 times

name: Intercity Portofino Florianópolis
address: Rodovia José Carlos Daux, 3270, Florianopolis 88032-005
description: Set in Florianópolis, 350 metres from Floripa Mall, Intercity Portofino Florianópolis offers accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking and a bar. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi. Please note that each room can only accommodate 1 pet up to 60cm in height and a maximum of 15 kg. for an extra daily fee of BRL 120, which must be paid during check-in. If you are travelling with your pet, it is mandatory to present proof of vaccination up to date. The person responsible for the pet must sign a commitment form at check-in. Please contact the accommodation for more information. At the hotel the rooms are equipped with a desk, a Smart TV and a private bathroom. The hotel offers 4-star accommodation with an indoor pool. Iguatemi Florianopolis Shopping Mall is 9 km from Intercity Portofino Florianópolis, while Praia de Jurerê beach is 15 km from property. Azorean House of Crafts and Beiramar Shopping Mall are 8 km from Intercity Portofino Florianópolis, while the Staircase "Nossa Senhora do Rosário" is 9.5 km from the property.

name: Ingleses Praia Hotel
address: Estrada Dom Joao Becker 447, Florianopolis 88058-600
description: Located by Ingleses beach in Florianópolis, Ingleses Praia Hotel offers an outdoor pool and indoor pool with sauna. Guests can enjoy their beach service and relax by the sea. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property. The accommodations are air conditioned and have a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. Some categories have a sea view and a kitchenette. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport, 39 km from the property.

name: Il Campanário Jurerê Internacional - Studio
address: Avenida dos Búzios 1760, Florianopolis 88053-301
description: Situated in Florianópolis, 200 metres from Jurere Beach, Il Campanário Jurerê Internacional - Studio features accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a bar and a shared lounge. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property offers bike hire and features a garden and children's playground. The rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a hot tub, bathrobes and a hairdryer. At Il Campanário Jurerê rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a terrace. Praia do Forte is 1.9 km from Il Campanário Jurerê Internacional - Studio, while Jurerê Tradicional is 1.9 km from the property.

name: Oceania Park Hotel Spa & Convention Center
address: Rua Dos Mariscos, 550, Florianopolis 88058-090
description: Oceania Park Hotel & Convention Center offers accommodation in Florianópolis, just 50 metres from Praia dos Ingleses Beach and features an outdoor swimming pool. Free WiFi is offered and free private parking is available on site. The contemporary rooms at Oceania Park are fitted with air conditioning, cable TV, a minibar and a private bathroom. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast each morning in the breakfast room. It includes a variety of fresh fruits, breads and cold meats, as well as a selection of hot and cold drinks. Guests can stay active during their stay and utilise the fitness centre or entertain with friends at the sports areas. 24-hour front desk reception is available.

address: Rua São Vicente de Paula, 635 - Agronômica, Florianopolis 88025-330
description: Offering an outdoor pool and a spa and wellness centre, Casa Beira Mar is located in Florianópolis and provides free WiFi. Rooms include a seating area, a TV and a fan. The guest house is 4.4 km from Floripa Mall, 8.1 km from Santa Catarina Island and 8.3 km from Casa Açoriana Handcraft. Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport is 9 km away.

name: Jurerê Beach Village - Suíte Vista Mar
address: 646 Alameda César Nascimento Torre Francês - Suíte 307, Florianopolis 88053-500
description: Situated in Florianópolis, a few steps from Jurere Beach, Jurerê Beach Village - Suíte Vista Mar features accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. Among the various facilities of this property are a bar, a shared lounge and a garden. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and organising tours for guests. At the hotel the rooms include air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kitchenette, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. At Jurerê Beach Village - Suíte every room has bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. At Jurerê Beach Village - Suíte Vista Mar guests are welcome to take advantage of a hot tub and a sauna. Jurerê Tradicional is less than 1 km from the hotel, while Praia de Canasvieiras is 2.1 km from the property.

name: Casa da Marilú
address: Servidão do Jornalista, 135 Praia do Santinho, Florianopolis 88058-724
description: Located in Florianópolis in the Santa Catarina Island region, with Ingleses Beach and Santinho Beach nearby, Casa da Marilú features accommodation with free private parking, as well as access to a hot tub. Situated on the beachfront, this property features free bikes, a garden and barbecue facilities. The aparthotel provides mountain views, a sun terrace, a 24-hour front desk, and free WiFi is available throughout the property. The aparthotel provides guests with a patio, sea views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the aparthotel, all units include bed linen and towels. There is a coffee shop, and a grocery delivery service and packed lunches are also available. Guests can keep up their exercise routines during yoga and fitness classes. If you would like to discover the area, cycling, fishing and hiking are possible in the surroundings and the aparthotel can arrange a car rental service. Floripa Mall is 26 km from Casa da Marilú, while Iguatemi Florianopolis Shopping Mall is 31 km away. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International, 40 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Jurerê Beach Village
address: Alameda César Nascimento 646, Governador Celso Ramos 88053-500
description: JURERÊ BEACH VILLAGE features a restaurant, fitness centre, a bar and garden in Florianópolis. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The hotel provides sea views, an outdoor pool and a 24-hour front desk. At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a wardrobe. At JURERÊ BEACH VILLAGE each room is fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. The accommodation offers 4-star accommodation with a sauna and hot tub. Casa Açoriana Handcraft is 8 km from JURERÊ BEACH VILLAGE, while Floripa Mall is 13 km away.

name: Il Campanario
address: Avenida dos Búzios, Florianopolis 88053-301
description: Set in Florianópolis, 400 metres from Jurere Beach, Il Campanario offers accommodation with a terrace, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. Among the facilities at this property are a kids' club and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Each room comes with a patio with views of the sea. At the resort every room has air conditioning, a desk, a balcony with a city view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. The units in Il Campanario are equipped with a coffee machine and a computer. Guests can relax in the spa and wellness centre, including a fitness centre, a sauna and a hot tub, or in the garden. Languages spoken at the reception include English, Spanish, Italian and Portuguese. Praia do Forte is 2.2 km from the accommodation, while Floripa Mall is 17 km away. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport, 32 km from Il Campanario.

name: Vila Gale Salvador
address: Rua Morro do Escravo Miguel 320, Ondina, Salvador
description: This 4-star oceanfront hotel sits on Ondina Beach, just 2 km from Bahia Yacht Club. It offers a health club with gym and stylish pool and cocktail bar. The rooms at Vila Galé Salvador are air-conditioned and furnished with tiled floors. Some offer stunning sea views. Guests at Vila Galé can admire the sunset whilst enjoying various dishes and drinks at the pool bar. They can also benefit from a daily breakfast buffet. The restaurant at Salvador´s Vila Galé serves regional cod and meat specialities, and features an extensive selection of Casa de Santa Vitória Alentejo wines. Vila Galé Salvador is 23 km from Luis Eduardo Magalhães Airport, and just 50 metres from the bus stop. It is also 1 km from both Barra Shopping Mall and the zoo. Parking and WiFi are available for a fee.

name: Gran Hotel Stella Maris Urban Resort & Conventions
address: Praca Stella Maris, 200, Salvador 41600-500
description: This is an urban resort with the glamour of a 4-star hotel, located on the seafront of Stella Maris Beach, one of the most beautiful beaches of Salvador. Staying at Gran Hotel Stella Maris Resort & Conventions, your whole family can enjoy the sun by the outdoor pools. A games room and a gym are available on site. Let your children get special attention in the Kids Club while you take some time off or surf the internet for free. The Gran Hotel Stella Maris serves a rich breakfast in their on-site restaurant. In the hotel, you will also find a Lobby Bar. Within a short walk, you can reach the popular Itapuã Beach and Abaeté Lagoon. The historical centre of Salvador is about 30 km away.The International Airport is only 7 km away.

name: Intercity Salvador
address: Av. Tancredo Neves, 2227, Salvador 41820-021
description: Just 1 km from Iguatemi Shopping Centre, InterCity Premium Salvador features a rooftop pool, sauna and fitness centre. It offers buffet breakfast, room service and free WiFi in public areas. With a flat-screen cable TV, minibar and work desk, the air-conditioned rooms boast a contemporary décor. All feature WiFi internet and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free InterCity toiletries. Some also have sea views. You will find a games room and a 24-hour front desk at the property and a private parking is available on site. InterCity Premium is 8 km from Salvador Centre, 7 km from Pelourinho historic centre and 4 km from Armação Beach. Fonte Nova Stadium and Farol da Barra district are 10 km from the hotel. Deputado Luis Eduardo Magalhães international airport is 15 km away, and parking is available.

name: apart hotel 2 quartos frente mar
address: Avenida Oceânica apt. 423, Salvador 40170-010
description: Featuring sea views, apart hotel 2 quartos frente mar in Salvador features accommodation, a garden, a terrace and a bar. The accommodation is air conditioned and features a spa bath. Each unit has an equipped kitchen, a living room with a sofa bed and flat-screen TV and private bathroom with free toiletries and a hot tub. A fridge, an oven and microwave are also available, as well as a coffee machine. The aparthotel offers a range of wellness facilities including a sauna and a hot tub. Popular points of interest near apart hotel 2 quartos frente mar include Praia de Ondina, Praia da Sereia and Praia do Farol da Barra. The nearest airport is Salvador International Airport, 24 km from the accommodation.

name: Vogal Luxury Beach Hotel & Spa
address: Rua Coronel Inacio Vale, 8861, Natal 59090-040
description: Beachfront Vogal Luxury Beach Hotel & SPA is located in the most exclusive area of Ponta Negra, where nature and urbanity walk in perfect harmony. Guests can enjoy 5 outdoor pools or relax at the Vogal SPA by L’Occitane. Facilities are intimate, tastefully decorated and signed by artists. All suites overlook the sea and offer a double bath and 600-thread Trussardi bed linen. Complimentary L'Occitane en Provence amenities are also available. Guests will benefit from butler services, guest relations and concierges services. They can also unwind with a welcome drink with Veuve Clicquot champagne, among other treats. Vogal Luxury Beach Hotel & SPA also features a french cuisine restaurant, Le Château and the Terraço Restaurant, offering exclusive regional dishes. Languages spoken at the reception include English and Portuguese, and guests are invited to request guidance on the area when needed. São Gonçalo do Amarante International Airport is 40 km away.

name: Sheraton Vitoria Hotel
address: Avenida Saturnino De Britto, 217, Vitória 29055-095
description: Located in Praia do Canto considered Vitorias upscale neighborhood the hotel is just a few minutes from the most pleasant bars, restaurants and taverns in the city, besides the Shopping Vitoria, the Bermuda Triangle where many restaurants are located, the airport and the convention center of Vitoria. With 231 elegantly decorated rooms and suites all with view of the ocean, island of Boi, island of Frade and the Convento da Penha. For the comfort of our guest, the rooms are equipped with access to high speed internet, minibar, safe box and restricted access to the floors only for our guests.Marriott

name: Iate Plaza Hotel
address: Av Beira Mar 4753, Fortaleza 60165-121
description: Located along the seafront of Mucuripe Beach, the 4-star Iate Plaza Hotel invites you to enjoy its modern architecture and comfortable rooms with balcony and great ocean views. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. You don’t need to leave the Iate Plaza Hotel to enjoy the sun and the breeze of the beach. In the hotel’s outdoor swimming pool, you can relax while admiring the sea and savoring a drink served by the poolside bar. Guests can benefit from a restaurant overlooking the sea,serving both international and regional dishes. Within a short walk, you will find a vast array of cultural attractions and leisure activities, such as the traditional Yacht Club, the English Bridge and the Central Market.

Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. At Blue Tree Towers Fortaleza all rooms include air conditioning and a private bathroom. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Blue Tree Towers Fortaleza offers a sauna. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Mucuripe Beach, Mucuripe Fish Market and Iracema Statue - Mucuripe.
